“Yeti weegɛn borcin maka kanŋan ɛkɛti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘Ba ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yooŋdɛ ettɛ bworŋa pwadan ɔci oodɛ ɛɛŋdɛ ɛkɛ warɛti, ɔci ḍejja pwadan ɛɛŋdɛ ɛkɛ bieŋɛti, ɔci wɛyi ɛɛŋdɛ ɛkɛ ciegɛti daŋkun.
Ɔci naañ ṭɔɔlɛ caagan ŋardɛ, ɔci dala ikin noŋtin juma, ɔci dala ikin yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi!
Acaan kaci ‘ya neeni ɛkɛ bala ba ne ɛkɛ tuuni doki no, ɔci acca ɛkɛ bala tɛɛti men. Ɔci ɛkɛ yien doki, ɔci acca ɛkɛ warɛ yuarŋɛ dɔki.’ Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋjin juma doki, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
“Ɔci te oŋŋa wannati kacca tolan bala bora balji, ɔci ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni cɔɔlniti baanjiyɛ, ɛkɛ tieŋŋin waka ñiɛlki ma ne balki wiakkiy, ɔci ɛkɛ tieŋŋin ɔɔlg ma ne ma balki ñiɛlkiy.
Ɔci ɛkɛ borcin ma kanŋa gɛɛlti, ɔci tooccin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Hay! Ɛkkɛ lyɛlɛ a ɔɔn a gena yeti?’
“Ɔci mena neeni gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘I gɔrni bo, mod ɛkkɛ bɛɛn dɔɔkkin baanji, ɔci wey ɛkkɛ naña caagan neeni ŋaarŋɛ ŋoornɛ ɛkɛ, acaan ɛkɛ bɛɛn dɔɔkkin baanji weegɛnti doki. Ɛkɛ ḍakcin ɔntɔ bɛɛ.’
“Ɔci moda tolan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ looñi, ɔci ɛkɛ yookɔn te kaaccin orɔ. Ɔci wey ɛkkɛn kooyin bora nona ɛkɛti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘I bɛɛd oottin kaattin orɔ yɔŋ. Naa i noŋ a ɔɔn bɛɛ.’

Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin weegɛnti agi, ‘Gɔṭṭi, hay! Yuong aŋi ñiṭin ne ‘ya baala noŋa kanŋa iy! Ɔci jyek i bɛɛnji ‘ya oŋgati bɛɛ. Ɔci i ‘ya ‘wonna genga ba ñuaŋ ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl ɔɔn bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya noŋna i juma ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl aŋka ‘ya yomu ñɔɔdɛ i mung ɔɔn bɛɛ!
Yeti ne kaci i, mena mal i ḍaaŋŋɛ waakɛnda amaam te naŋki moonga tobin neeni ne bɛɛniyɛ, i ɛkɛ aŋka ŋoorni naña caagan!’
Ɔci weegɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Kaci ‘ya, a gena ɔɔn, ikin balkin iki ‘ya oŋkanda, ɔci wak ‘ya a wak i waakɛnda.

Yeti ikin yaakinti cietin budan te naŋki juma te oŋŋa pwadan neeni a ɔki? Acaan mod ɛkkɛ neeni bala ba ne ɛkɛ tuuni doki no. Yeti acca ɛkɛ bala tɛɛti dɔki! Ɔci moki ɛkɛ yieni. Yeti ɛkɛ warɛ yuarŋɛ dɔkɔ!’ ”

Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala, ɛkɛ a mena cyɛgan. Ɛkɛ balki mena gɔṭi mal ɛkɛ. Ɔci mena neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ tiagiyɔ ma kanŋa weegɛnti agi, ‘Mena neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ wak i ḍagdɛ te naŋka amaamo.’

Ɔci kanŋa weegɛn borcin ɛkɛti tooccin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Hay i! Jyeka tieŋŋan ‘ya te i neeni jitkɛn bala a ɔki yeti? Dala i jyek wak ‘ya kiijja worgaji waakɛnda. Acaan ‘ya buaga i kooya bora te kanŋa ‘yati. Ɔci agdi mena gɔṭi mal ‘ya oŋgati moki bɛɛ.’
“Ɔci mena neeni bala poŋi yomɛti agi, ‘Acca ‘ya noŋja a ɔki? Kanŋa weegɛn mwonnin te ‘ya doki, ɔci ‘ya yaakati pien luom bɛɛ. Ɔci ‘ya yaakati ñuon waak bɛɛ, acaan ñuon waak neeniyɛ, a lɔɔn ‘yati.
Ɛɛ, naŋka naŋdi ‘ya ŋeej ‘ya doki, aŋka mung ɔɔn ‘ya dalta bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘ya borta oorg ɛkkɛn jitin.’
“Mena gɔṭi maal neeni borcin maka balki dɛɛn kanŋa weegɛnti neeni ne cyɛɛlɔ ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ tooccin mena bɛɛn ñamɛti agi, ‘Dɛn i bala a ɔki i wey ɔɔn?’

“Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, ‘‘Ya balka dɛɛn ñɔdg capiiyan a ma baan ne ŋaanɔ (800).’ “Ɔci mena gɔṭi maal gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Anti worga i. Coocca iñɔ ne pɛñ ɔci kiejja a dɛn i a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ (400) budan.’

“Ɔci mena gɔṭi maal tooccin mena parɛti agi, ‘Oŋ i daŋkun balki dɛɛn ne ñiṭin?’ “Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, ‘‘Ya balka dɛɛn pok cowaaln a alp ne cyɛɛlɔ (1,000).’ “Ɔci mena gɔṭi maal gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Anti worga, ɔci i kiejja a dɛn i a cowaaln ma baan ne ŋaanɔ (800) budan.’

“Ɔci kanŋa weegɛn ne ɛkɛ tieŋni naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin mena gɔṭi mal ɛkɛ mena yaayan neeniti agi, ‘I ñingu tɛy tɛyo hay!’ Kanŋa weegɛn gɔki a ɔɔn te naŋki mena kanŋan ɛkɛti naŋka naŋŋɛ te ñing tɛɛn neeni. Awarɛ, maka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki ñing tɛɛn ṭɛra neeni ŋoyɛ ne tolan te maka a kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolany.
Ɛkɛ gɔkcin moki agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ ma magdɛ te mal ɛkkɛ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni aŋka ne mal ɛkkɛ baati ne baaṭiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ bortɛ Juaŋ ban ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ ciedɛ iki ɛkɛ yuonginda ɔɔn.’
“Kan mena waŋɛ tiittɛ te gena ḍiɛranyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti waŋɛ tiittɛ te gena tolan daŋkun. Ɔci kan mena noŋi ma ñingɛn te gena ḍiɛranyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋdi ma ñingɛn te gena tolan daŋkun.
Kan i waŋu tiicca te waka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni bɛɛyɛ, a menɛ i ‘wondi waka pwadin waka awarɛy?
Oŋ kan i noŋi ne pwadan te wak maka pookɛn bɛɛy, oŋ a menɛ i ‘wondi waak aŋka aga wak iy?

“Mena noŋi kanŋayɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti noŋdi kanŋa maka ne yyɛɛwɔti bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ dita yooktan te jyek weya parɛ neeni dita, ɔci andi gena jyek weya parɛ neeni dita. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti noŋdɛ ba jyek Jwaŋa Tolan yaakkɛn iki jyek yoma buagɔn waka budan neeni bɛɛ.”
Ma Pɛriciin maka ani bilk neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala tyeŋi jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkkɛn wooki Yaccu.

Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka noŋi ba ɛkkɛ agɛ maka pwadin ma ñomgɛnti, yeti yomg ɛkkɛ ŋeejɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ne ɛkkɛn yiekiy. Waka guaktan ma agi pwadgiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yeyɔ Jwaŋa Tolanti ne tolan.

“Tieŋdɛ, ne Yɔhanna baawi menyɛ, jyek ganuun Muuca ɔci jyek bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan bala kanŋan mati doki. Ɔci te oŋŋa Yɔhanna bɛɛni ɔci ne acca ɔɔnyɛ, jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, bala mati doki. Ɔci ma bala loṭi ma te ɛkkɛn. Yeti ma waakɛnda buagɔn aga ma cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan te naŋki ɛkkɛn budan ɔɔn.
Kan ṭɛɛr baadi walla kan pɔlla ñaalɔ baadiyɛ, jyek ganuun waŋɛ gɛɛl baadi bɛɛ. A’a!
“Kan mena ‘uan ɛɛŋ daldɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ ḍɛɛdi ɛŋa parɛ gɛɛlyɛ, naŋka neeni a tommo. Ɔci kan ɛɛŋ gɛɛl dalnɛ ‘war ɛkɛ, ɔci kan ɛŋa neeni ḍɛɛdɛ ‘wana parɛyɛ, naŋka wanna a tomi moki.”
“Mena ‘uan mena cyɛgan gɛɛl bala ɛŋi bworŋa wiɛlɛ pɛñan bworŋa buol oŋkanda. Ɔci ɛkɛ ciyi te yoŋni oŋkanda, lieṭi genga bɛɛ.
Ɔci kaañ tukɛ mena cyɛganti neeniyɛ, mena bɔwan gɛɛl bala niin iñɔ. Ɛkɛ yenti Lajarac. ‘Wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ gwottin ñaalɔ. Ɔci waak tuggɛn ṭoontin, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ niin a ṭuoṭ warɛ warda.
Ɔci ɛkɛ poŋi gɔki agi kan ɛkɛ omji waka mena cyɛgan tiɛdɛ ḍwayi ŋwayyɛnti neeniyɛ, agi te ɛkɛ yɔmji doki te ɛkki. Ɔci gɔṭṭi, gɔki daŋkun bɛɛni, ɔci bala noṭi ɛkɛ warɛ.
“Ɔci oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, mena bɔwan neeni tuuni, ɔci ɛkɛ eyɛ malɛɛkan nona Abrahim taaŋɛti ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci mena cyɛgan neeni tuun daŋkun, ɔci ɛkɛ jokci ma koolji.
Ɔci Non Lien nona ootti maka tuwa neeniyɛ, mena cyɛgan neeni bala wooci a waañi ne tolan. Ɔci ɛkɛ ñorcin ñaalɔ ɔci Abrahim yuarnɛ ɛkɛ ciyi nona loonan, ɔci Lajarac bala ciyi ɛkɛ taaŋɛti.
Ɔci ɛkɛ bala boori yaadan agi, ‘Abrahim, wey ɔɔn, dala i yomu pɔkka ‘yati. Dala i Lajarac cuoñña ɔci ɛkɛ bieŋɛ oldɛ pietin ɔci oldɛ ‘ya lɛmmuti, acaan ‘ya waru nokɔ ne pɛñan te maña neeni!’

“Yeti Abrahim kɛkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Hay, kacco! Dala i poŋja te coodda cieni ɛkkɛ ṭɛɛrjiy. I balki waka coŋin waka pwadin waakɛnda, yeti Lajarac balki gena waka yeyin waakɛnda. Ɔci acca coodi ɛkɛ aŋka pwanni, ɔci i aŋka wooc a waañi ne tolan.
Ɔci moki, kola tolan bala yeccu ikin kɛɛmminji. Kan ma gɛɛg bɛya te wɛnni bɛya ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaaktanti bɛɛ. Ɔci moki kan ma bɛya te aŋan bɛya ɔɔnti wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaaktanti bɛɛ.’
“Ɔci ‘wana cyɛgan gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Wey ɔɔn, oŋ kan bala a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya buaga dala i Lajarac cuña ban ɔɔn,
acaan ‘ya balka modg ɔɔn ne dɔɔyɔ aŋan. Dala ɛkkɛn miettɛ ɛkɛ te naŋka neeni, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ṭeedɛ ɛkɛ aŋka naa ɛkkɛn bɛya wɛnni nona wooca ‘ya neeni bɛɛ.’
“Yeti Abrahim gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ɛɛ, gɔṭṭi pocca, ɛkkɛn balki worga Muuca, ɔci worgan maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan. Dala ɛkkɛn tieŋdi gena jyek ɛkkɛn.’

“Yeti ‘wana cyɛgan kɛkcin agi, ‘A’a, a’a! Yɔmjin a ɔɔn bɛɛ! Hay, wey ɔɔn Abrahim, acaan ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn a tiicin te jyek ganuun Muuca bɛɛ. Yeti kan men gɛɛl jɔŋdi te lienti ooddi ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieŋdi ɔci paŋi ɛkkɛn aktanyɔ.’
“Yeti Abrahim gɔkcin ɛkɛti moki agi, ‘A’a. Kan ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek Muuca ɔci jyek maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛyɛ, kan men gɛɛl jɔŋdi te lienti ɔci ɛkkɛn myettɛ jiekyɛ, ɛkkɛn yooktan men ɔɔn.’ ”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Jyeka ma ḍɛɛmti iñɔ noŋtɛ nɔji neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛya awarɛ. Yeti mena etti jyeka neeniyɛ, taab bɛya ɛkɛti te naŋka wannayɛ, pɛñcin ne tolan.

Bolja pom jien poma tolan ḍyɛktiti ma ɛkɛ ḍwaŋɛti ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ yiɛptiti ma galŋa tolantiyɛ, a ḍiɛran te yoña bɛya ɛkɛti te naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkɛ mena ḍiɛran gɛɛlti aŋka dala mena ḍiɛran neeni noŋdi nɔjiy.
Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ! “Kan mod ɛkkɛ gɛɛl noŋdi nɔjiyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ ṭeya, ɔci kan ɛkɛ warɛ yaldɛyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ bɔɔka.
Kan ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan iti oŋki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ te oŋ jiñɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci kan ɛkɛ dɔɔkti gɔkti iti agi ɛkɛ yomɛ yaayɔ te naŋka pɔɔñjɛ ɛkɛyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ bɔɔka doki.”
Ɔci Cuudan Yaccu neeniyɛ, gɔkcin Ciɛggɔnti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, dala i ɔɔn ‘uottɔnti jyenna ɔɔn jyettɔn iti neeni.”

Ɔci Ciɛggɔn ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ‘yati ne ḍiɛran bala ba kɔba waŋɛ ḍiɛran neeniyɛ, ɔci kan ne ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ jana waayiti agi dala ɛkɛ dɔtti ñaalɔ ooddi warɛ cɔɔtti galŋjiyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyek ɛkkɛ doki.

“Oŋ ɛkkɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛ bala a ɔki? Kan ‘uan gɛɛl ɛkkɛti balki mena kanŋan ɛkɛti, ɔci kan mena kanŋan ɛkɛti neeni bala bora ooṭi yiel, walla kan bala cieti kuliny, ɔci kan ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdi baanjiy, weegɛn gɔkti ɛkɛti agi, ‘Dala I kooya orɔ, ɔci coocca iñɔ omja amɔ? A’a, a ɔɔn bɛɛ.’
Gena weegɛn aŋka gɔkti ɛkɛti agi, ‘Dala i bworŋ kanŋa ‘yɛɛŋja ɔci ‘ya noŋda am omja. Ne ‘ya ḍoodayɛ, i oŋ omja daŋkun oŋo.’
Ɔci ne mena noŋi kanŋa neeni kanŋa ɛkɛ ḍagdiyɛ, weegɛn gɔkti a pwatcin ɛkɛti te kanŋa ɛkɛ wanna bɛɛ, acaan gena kanŋa naŋdɛ ɛkɛ weegɛnti naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ wanna.

Ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun, kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek wey ɛkkɛ waakɛndayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ te waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ agi ɛkkɛ agɛ ma kanŋa budan. Ɔci agi ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ genga bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ noŋŋɛ gena pwadan gɛɛl te yomg ɛkkɛ budan bɛɛ.”
Ɔci oŋ gɛɛlti ne Yaccu baali pɔɔjɔ ooddi ban Urcaliimyɛ, ɛkɛ goṭi wɔɔka ban Camɛɛrya ɔci ban Jaliil.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛnni baanjiyɛ, ɛkɛ koogjin iki maka naŋɛ cyɛc gɛɛg ne inyaakkɛn. Ɛkkɛn bala yɔɔd lonɔ ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala yaadan boorɔ te pwana tolan agi, “I Yaccu, Ciɛggɔn, dala i yomu pɔkka ɔɔnti!”
Ne ɛkɛ gɔrni ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɔgdɛ ooddɛ gaciicin ma Icrayiilti acaan ɛkkɛ ywaŋŋin ‘ya doki. Dala ɛkkɛn gɔrti waak ɛkkɛ.” Ɔci ɛkkɛn atti. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn ywaŋŋɛyɔ doki.
Yeti men gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ne ɛkɛ gɔrni ɛkɛ warɛ pwanni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bɛɛn dɔɔkkin nona Yaccuti, ɔci ɛkɛ bala jieyi Juaŋ te pwana tolan.
Ɛkɛ ḍwoñjin iñɔ Yaccu ciegɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin Yaccuti a pwatcin. Mena neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a men ma Camɛɛrya.
Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Maka ywaŋi ‘ya bala a inyaakkɛn bɛɛ? Oŋ ba maka ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ neeni bɛ?
Maka neeni ɛkkɛn menga dɔɔkkin nona ‘yati aŋka gɔkti a pwatcin Juaŋti bɛɛ? Gena buñgɔn aŋka bɛɛn dɔɔkkin parɛ?”
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Jɔŋŋa ñaalɔ ɔci ɔgdi ootta. Te jyeni i neeniyɛ, i waru pwani doki.”
Ɔci ma Pɛriciin gɛɛg tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya ne tua?” Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Bɛɛna bɛɛdi cyɛgji Juaŋyɛ, yuartan ma te woŋgɛn bɛɛ.
Ɔci men gɛɛl yaakinti gɔki agi cyɛgji Juaŋ baalɔ wɛnni, walla baalɔ aŋan bɛɛ, acaan cyɛgji Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ɛkkɛti wɛnni doki.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka laldi ɛkɛti agi, “Ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ agi dala te ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan baljɔ ɛkkɛnti wɛnni. Yeti ‘ya yuardata ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ.
Ɔci ma gɔkti ɛkkɛti agi, ‘Ɛkkɛ gɔrcɛ ɛkta baalɔ wɛnni!’ Walla agi, ‘Ɛkkɛ gɔrcɛ ɛkta baalɔ aŋan!’ Yeti naa ɛkkɛ ooddɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ bootti jyek ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.
Bɛɛna bɛɛda ‘ya Kaci Ma Baanyɛ, ‘ya bɛɛd ne pɛñan bala ba ñaal ne wildi noon dyɛgdɛ pɔli ŋwayɛ warday.
Yeti te ñamuyɛ, ‘ya taabba ne tolan, ɔci maka bala ciyi accayɛ, ɛkkɛn yooktan te ‘ya.
Ɔci ba coodda cieki ma te oŋŋa Nɔwa baali menyɛ, ɔci ne oŋŋa ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛdayɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛn bala a ɔɔn daŋkun. Ma myeldɛ coodi ɔci powa ne ‘ya ywoṭṭanti doki.

Te wɔɔka wannayɛ, ma bala ñingɛn juadan te kanŋa waka amtan ɛkkɛn ɔci waka maattan ɛkkɛny, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ḍɛɛwɔ oŋkanda, ɔci bala poŋi te tol bɔrda bɛya ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ, ne oŋŋa Nɔwa kaanni murka tolanji ɔɔn, ɔci tol bɔrda bɛɛni, ɔci maka bala bora neeni ḍakcin waakɛnda.
Ɔci moki ne Lut baaliyɛ, ma bala omi ɔci moti ɔci wɛɛṭi waako, ɔci waak moki wiɛltanŋɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala pieti waako, ɔci cɔti oorgo.
Yeti ne oŋŋa Lut kaannɛ bora te ban Caduumyɛ, maañ ɔci gwoyya koldan bɛɛn iñɔ te ñaalɔ ba pɔllo, ɔci maka bana wannati ammɛ waakɛnda.
Ɔci ba coodi ma Caduum te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɔci ne oŋŋa ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan waru lɛɛlda borayɛ, ‘ya ma mɔkca ciyi ba coodda wanna daŋkun.

“Ɔci te oŋŋa wannatiyɛ, kan men gɛɛl bala bora ne naŋka neeni bɛɛdiyɛ, naa ɛkɛ kaatti orɔ aŋka waak oodɛ bora moki bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl bala yieljiyɛ, kan ɛkɛ wierŋɛ genga yieljiyɛ, naa ɛkɛ dɔɔdi gena neeniti moki bɛɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyek ɛŋ Luut!

Kan mena boottin ‘yati gɛɛl jyek ‘ya daldɛ aŋka naa ɛkɛ nogditi ma bɛɛyɛ, mena neeni yɔɔrdi tɛɛtin bala ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni bɛɛ. Yeti kan men gɛɛl boottin ‘yati ɔci noŋdi ba jyek ‘ya, oŋ kan te ɛkɛ noktan ma ɔɔnyɛ, mena neeni ɛkɛ aŋka yɔɔrdi tɛɛtin bala ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni.
’Ya ɛkkɛ myettin ka te ween jiñɛ wannayɛ, kan ma gɛɛg ne yyɛɛwɔ bala niin aŋgantiyɛ, men gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ eedɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ ɔci mena parɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka yada.
Ɔci kan maka moong gɛɛg ne yyɛɛwɔ moki bala jieyi nona ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɛŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ eedɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ ɔci ɛka parɛ neeni aŋka yada.
Kan ma gɛɛg ne yyɛɛwɔ bala yielji te oŋŋa wannayɛ, mena ne cyɛɛlɔ eedɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ ɔci ɛka parɛ neeni aŋka yada.”
Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Naŋka neeni bala wɛnɛ?” Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti te jwali ṭɔɔlɛ agi, “Nona niini gena tuutayɛ, wɛjjin bɛya ḍwortiti aŋan.”
Ɔci Yaccu bala loṭi maka laldɛ ɛkɛ te jwalla a caagɔn gɛɛl agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ oŋkanda, naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ toga bɛɛ.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Oŋ gɛɛlti mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala baan gɛɛlti. Ɛkɛ a ḍuaŋa godan. Ɛkɛ buayi Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci men baan gɛɛl bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyek menga bɛɛ.
Ɔci ɛŋa cieñ gɛɛl bala bana tolanti neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ ooddi nona ḍuaŋa godanti gɔ ɛkɛ moki ati ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛŋa neeni gɔkti ɛkɛti agi, ‘Dala ‘ya magda te mena yookɔn te ‘ya neeni.’
Ɔci te ñamuyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛŋa neeni maŋŋɛ bɛɛ. Yeti ne baaṭi ɛkɛ bala gɔki yomɛti parɛ agi, ‘‘Ya buay Juaŋ bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya buay ma baan bɛɛ.
Yeti ɛŋa cieñ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala poṭi ‘ya waru, ‘ya ɛkɛ magdo, hay! Kan ‘ya ɛkɛ dalja a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bɛya a ñaccu ɔci ɛkɛ ‘ya kwandaji nɔñji.’ ”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin mati agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ jyek ḍuaŋa godan ḍuaŋa yaayan neeni.
Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka yomɛ pwad pwad ma ɛkɛti. Oŋ ɛkɛ ma ɛkɛ maka wiak ɛkɛti te oŋ konɛ ɔci te weenji neeni magdɛ ɛkɛ awarɛ bɛɛ?
Tieŋdɛ! Juaŋ kwaci te maŋi ma bɛɛ. Yeti ne ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛdayɛ, ya ma mɔkca jyeti ‘yati ne pwadan boki?”
Ɔci ma gɛɛg bala poŋi gɔki agi ɛkkɛn pwadginti te naŋki ɛkkɛn pookɛn. Maka neeni yookɔn te maka pookɛn waakɛnda. Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti te jwalla a caagɔn agi,
“Gɔṭṭɛ, oŋ gɛɛlti maka ‘uay gɛɛg ati on Juaŋ ona tolan ne yyɛɛwɔ. Men gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ ɛkɛ a men ma Pɛriciin. Ɔci mena parɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena lyemi tulbay.

“Ɔci men ma Pɛriciin neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala yɔɔd ñaalɔ cɔki Juaŋti te yom ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔki Juaŋti agi, ‘Jwaŋa Tolan, ‘ya gɔkka iti a pwatcin, ‘ya baal ba maka ani eñi wak maka pookɛn neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci ‘ya waru ḍig ḍig bɛɛ. Ɔci ‘ya a tomma bɛɛ. Walla ‘ya baal ba mena lyemi tulba yɔɔd wɛnni neeni bɛɛ.
Yeti ‘Ya gwor koñ oŋki ne yyɛɛwɔ te Juaŋ jiñɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci ‘ya ‘woñ i te gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti oŋkanda.’

“Yeti mena lyemi tulba neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala yɔɔd te ɔntɔ nona loonan. Ɛkɛ wyeñɛ luoŋnɛ iñɔ. Ɛkɛ ñoṭi ñaalɔ pɔliji bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala poomi korkɛ, ɔci gɔki agi, ‘Hay! I Jwaŋa Tolan, dala i yomu pɔkka ‘yati, ‘ya a nɔɔdɔn, hay!’ ”

Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ‘wota agi, “‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin, mena lyemi tulba neeni bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ te nɔji ɛkɛ a lyɛlta, ɔci ɛkɛ ati baanji te yoma pwadan. Yeti ‘wan ma Pɛriciin neeni bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ. Acaan maka waakɛn naŋtan ba maka ḍwaŋin pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn naŋdɛ Juaŋ aga ba maka ḍyɛrin. Ɔci maka noŋi ba ɛkkɛn akki maka ḍyɛrinyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka naŋdɛ Juaŋ aga maka ḍwaŋin.”

Ɔci ma bala etti kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin nona Yaccuti. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala Yaccu kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn ordiyɔ ɔci gɔkti ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ coodɛ ne pwadan.” Yeti maka laldɛ Yaccu ɛkkɛn kɛkcin maka neeniti.
Ɔci ne Yaccu gɔrni ɛkkɛn kɛkki a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ looñi ɔci gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Dala kɛɛgin bɛya ‘yati! Naa ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn dɛɛdɛ a ɔɔn bɛɛ, acaan jyek cyɛgji Juaŋyɛ a jyek maka bala ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ne pwadan acca! Kan men gɛɛl jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan mugdɛ ɛkɛ te yoma pwadan ba kacca ḍiɛran bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti dɛndi non cyɛgji Juaŋti bɛɛ.”
Ɔci ḍuaŋa ma Icrayiil gɛɛl tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Hay, mena loṭi ma mena pwadany, ‘ya noŋja a ɔki aŋka tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni bɛɛdi ‘yatiy?”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay! I ‘ya barda a mena pwadan ogo? Mena pwadan gɛɛl bala bɛɛ, gena Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ aŋka pwatciny.
Jyek ganuun ŋeej i doki ne ɛkkɛn gɔkki agi, ‘Naa i noŋja tomi bɛɛ, naa i menga noga bɛɛ, naa i kor waak bɛɛ, naa i men gɛɛl jomgayɔ bɛɛ, ɔci dala i noŋja ne pwadan weegɔti ɔci mɛɛgɔti.’”
Ɔci ḍuaŋa neeni ṭwokcin gɔkcin agi, “Ɛɛ, ‘ya baal tiec jyeka neeni waakɛn ne ‘ya wona ḍiɛra ne acca men ɔɔn.”
Ne Yaccu tieŋni jwalla neeni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Gen gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ men. Dala i bootta ‘yati. Ne i bootti ‘yatiyɛ, dala i mal i wiɛlja ñin, ɔci bilk ‘woñga maka bɔwan.”
Yeti ne ‘wana neeni tieŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ wiak poŋi jiek acaan ɛkɛ balki waak ne coŋɔn.
Yaccu bala gɔṭi ɛkɛ ne ɛkɛ yomɛ yaaññiy, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Maka cyɛganyɛ, owwin ɛkkɛn waakɛn ootiti iñɔ bɛɛti Jwaŋa Tolan bieŋɛtiyɛ, tɛy tɛyo.”
Ɔci Yaccu jwali dɔŋŋɛji moki agi, “Wɔtcin kolŋan wɔtti ibra waŋɛtiyɛ, koocin te owwin mena maalɛ tolan warɛ oodɛ iñɔ bɛɛdɛ ban cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolany.”
Maka tieŋŋin jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Oŋ kan a ɔɔny, a menɛ uday?”
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Waka ma baan yaakinti te naŋki ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka yaakinti te naŋki ɛkkɛn.”
Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Gɔṭṭi, ɔɔn wak ɔɔn dalnɔn doki aŋka boottɔn iti.”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Tieŋdɛ, ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan. Kan men gɛɛl anna ɛkɛ anɛ ‘ya bala ñamu te anna ɛkɛ anɛ on ɛkɛ, walla ɛŋ ɛkɛ, walla modgɛn, walla mɛɛgɛn ɔci weegɛn, ɔci kɛɛgin ɛkɛyɛ,
ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ waka neeni moki ne coŋɔn ne ɛkɛ baali iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni meny, ɔci te coodda cieki ma ne baaṭiyɛ, tɛɛtin baadi ywongati bɛɛyɛ, bala ɛkɛti.”

Ɔci acca Maka A Inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn Ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, eññɛ Yaccu bora. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Tieŋdɛ! Acca ikin oottin ban Urcaliim. Ɔci jiek waakɛnda jyeka kiiwɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te ‘ya Kaci Ma Baanyɛ, bɛya bora waakɛnda dɔki.
’Ya Kaci Ma Baanyɛ, ‘ya ‘wonta ma Icrayiil ackan ma Ḍɔɔm byeŋkɛnti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ñieddi te ‘ya, ɔci juoldi ‘ya, ɔci ma noŋdi ‘yati ne yaayan. Ɔci ñaang ŋuultan ‘yati.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘ya ḍuata te woonto, ɔci ‘ya nokta ma. Yeti ne nink ne ḍoogɔ bɛɛti borayɛ, ‘ya oŋ jɔlla ñaalɔ tɛɛt moki. Gena jyek ‘ya neeni.”
Yeti ɛkkɛn jiek jitkɛn neeni tieŋjɛ ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jiek jitkɛn kuoli ñin. Ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeka guagdɛ Yaccu neeni mugɛ bɛɛ.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ cɔɔlnɛti ban Jɛrikɔyɛ, mena ‘uan mena ulli gɛɛl bala ciyi pɔy taaŋɛti ñwoyi waako.
Ɔci ɛkɛ bala tyeŋi ne poli maka coŋin balki atki gorki pɔɔjɔ nona ɛkɛ warɛtiy. Ɔci ɛkɛ tooccin agi, “A makɛ goṭi wan?”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ myetki agi, “Gena Yaccu men ma Najarɛt, ɛkɛ ati goṭi i taaŋuti wanna.”
Ɔci mena ulli yaajjin agi, “I Yaccu Kaci Daawud! I a Kiṭɔ mena pwadany. Dala i yomu pɔkka ‘yati ɔci ‘ya pɔkta ñinguti!”

Ɔci maka bala ati iki Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn mena neeni dɛɛjiti agi naa ɛkta yaadɔ bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkɛ jyeti jyek maka neeni bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ yaajjin ne tolan moki ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ yaadan gɔki agi, “I Yaccu Kaci Daawud, dala i yomu pɔkka ‘yati, ɔci ‘ya pɔkta ñinguti!”
Ɔci Yaccu yɔɔni ɔci gɔkcin mati agi, “Dala ɛkɛ oodɛ ‘yati wɛnni.” Ɔci ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni nona Yaccutiyɛ, ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi,
“I buagi ‘ya noŋja a ɔki iti?” Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin Yaccuti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, ‘ya buaga dala i woŋgu ‘ya pɔkka aŋka ‘ya noon yuarca.”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala i ñingu pɔkka. Ɔci dala i waru pwada te jyenna i jyetti ‘yati neeni.”
Ɔci ne pɛñan ɛkɛ yaakinti gwali noon doki. Ɔci ɛkɛ bootcin Yaccuti te oŋŋa wannati ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala jieyi Juaŋo. Ɔci ma waakɛnda ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala jieyi Juaŋ daŋkun.
Ɔci Yaccu dɛñjin ban Jɛrikɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ati goṭi baan konɛti.
Ɔci men gɛɛl bala a ‘uan yenti Jakka. Ɛkɛ a ḍuaŋa maka lyemi tulbay. Ɔci ɛkɛ cyɛg cyɛg te maal ne tolan.
Ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn gɔrti Yaccu ne Yaccu baali a ɔkiy. Yeti ɛkɛ yaakinti Yaccu yuarti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ ḍuul ḍul ɔci ma coŋɔ.
Ɔci acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ yiŋi ñamu, ɔci kaaccin ñaalɔ jaanti, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn gɔrti Yaccu te ñaalɔ a ɔɔn, acaan Yaccu bala bɛya ati ooddi te pɔya neeni.
Ɔci ne Yaccu bɛɛni nona neenitiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔrcin ñaalɔ ɔci borcin Jakkati agi, “Jakka, kooya iñɔ ne pɛñ. ‘Ya buaga ootta ban ɛkkɛ te oŋŋo.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ kooyin iñɔ ne pɛñan, ɔci Yaccu eññɛ on ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
Ɔci ne maka coŋin neeni gɔrki naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda bala wooki Yaccu. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Yeti Yaccu ooddi on mena nɔɔdɔn neeniti aŋka aga wɛli ɛkɛ ogo?”

Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki on ɛkɛyɛ, Jakka jɔllin ñaalɔ ɔci gɔkcin Ciɛggɔnti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, gɔṭṭi, taaŋi wak ‘yayɛ, gɛɛg wɛtka maka bɔwan. Ɔci kan gen menga eñi ‘ya budan amaamyɛ, ‘ya ɛkɛ ‘woñga ‘uotkati ne ŋaanɔ.”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “A’a, a ɔɔn moki bɛɛ, acaan te oŋŋa neeniyɛ, yɔɔt Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛn ma ona neeniti acca doki. Mena neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a kaci Abrahim, mena a men Juaŋ neeni daŋkun.
’Ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛn aŋka lier ɔci yuoc maka yieny.”

Ɔci ne ma balki tyeŋki jyek Yaccu neeni menyɛ, ɛkkɛn myennɛ ɛkɛ te jwalla a caagɔn neeni. Te wɔɔka wannayɛ, ɛkkɛn cɔɔllinti ban Urcaliimti doki, ɔci ma bala poŋi gɔki agi Yaccu agdi Ciɛggɔn Tolan ne cwakanti, ɔci agi ɛkkɛn cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan yuardinti ɛkkɛn ne cwakanti.
Jwalla a caagɔn guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni, ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Mena ḍuaŋa gɛɛl jɔllin ati bana loonan aŋka ɛkɛ naŋtan ma a mena ḍuaŋa tolan, ɔci ne baaṭi ɛkɛ dɔɔkti baanji moki.

Ɔci ne ɛkɛ jɔŋni men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ borcin maka kanŋan ɛkɛti, maka a inyaakkɛn neeniti, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ bilk gɛɛg byeŋkɛnti aŋka cɔttanyɔ. Ɛkɛ menga da ‘wonnɛ ḍeyyan naŋɛ ma te dahab, ɔci menga da ḍeyyan naŋɛ ma te dahab. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ bilka neeni wyɛldɛ cɔddɛyɔ te waak ne ‘ya bɛɛda ɔɔn.’

Yeti maka ciyi ban ‘wana neenitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn te ɛkɛ, ɔci ne ɛkɛ jɔŋni atti dokiyɛ, ɛkkɛn men gɛɛl cuuñɛ bana ooddi ɛkɛ neeniti. Ɔci mena cuuñɛ ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, gɔkcin mati agi, ‘Maka ciyi iki ‘wana neeni baanjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn naa ‘wana neeni aga ḍuaŋa tolan ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.’
“Yeti ‘wana neeni naŋɛ ma aŋi ḍuaŋa tolan ɔɔn. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɔɔŋni baanjiyɛ, ɛkɛ borcin maka kanŋan ɛkɛti, maka ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ bilk neeniti. Ɔci ɛkɛ tooccin ɛkkɛnti te waka cɔdɛ ɛkkɛn te bilka neeniy.
Ɔci mena ñamu bɛɛn nona ɛkɛti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ḍuaŋa, gɔṭṭi, ḍeyyan i neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn cɔniyɔ ‘ya ɔci eccin ḍeyyan makɛn ne inyaakkɛn.’

Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan gɔkcin mena neeniti agi, ‘I noŋŋi ne pwadan hay, i a mena pwadan. Gɔṭṭi, acaan i kanŋa ḍiɛran neeni naŋŋi ne pwadanyɛ, i da naŋdin ‘ya agdi ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ bonka ḍwaŋin ne inyaakkɛn neeni.’
Ɔci mena akki yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛn ɔci gɔkcin agi, ‘Ḍuaŋa, gɔṭṭi, ḍeyyan i cɔniyɔ ‘ya ɔci eccin ḍeyyan makɛn ne dɔɔyɔ.’
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘I noŋŋi ne pwadan hay, gɔṭṭi! I naŋdin ‘ya agdi ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ bonka ḍwaŋin ne dɔɔyɔ daŋkun.’
“Ɔci mena parɛ gɛɛl daŋkun bɛɛni, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi, ‘Ḍuaŋa, gɔṭṭi, ḍeyyan i nɛ. Ɛkɛ koniyɔ ‘ya te bworŋ ṭɔɔlɛ, ɔci ḍuaccan ‘ya bala niin a nink ɔɔn.
’Ya noŋi a ɔɔn acaan ‘ya buay i, i a mena jiekɛ tɛyan. Acaan oŋkandayɛ, waka cɔdayɔ i bɛɛyɛ, lula i te mati, ɔci waka bɛya te yielji waka dɔŋŋi i bɛɛyɛ, aga wak i.’

Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan neeni gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘I a mena yaayan hay! Ba jyeka gɔwwɔ i bora te tuk iti neeniyɛ, dɔwwan ‘ya i wyeñuti doki, acaan ‘ya looñ te naŋki i neeni. Çeej i ne ‘ya aga mena jiekɛ tɛyan. Ɔci ŋeej i waka cɔdiyɔ ‘ya bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn luldi aga wak ‘ya, ɔci waka bɛya te yielji waka dɔŋi ‘ya bɛɛyɛ, aga wak ‘ya moki.
Oŋ ba i bilk ‘ya eññi ‘wonni mena parɛ aŋka ɛkɛ bilk ‘ya cɔnna waakɛn aŋka ɛkkɛn mɔkcan ‘ya aŋan iki bilk wyetka jiettanti ma bɛ?’
“Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka bala yɔɔd ɛkɛ toŋkɛti agi, ‘Ḍeyyan luldɛ te ɛkɛti, ɔci ‘wondɛ mena balki ḍeyyan ne inyaakkɛny.’
“Yeti maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔkcin bilk weegɛnti agi, ‘Ḍuaŋa, ɛkɛ balkin ḍeyyan ne inyaakkɛn doki!’

“Ḍuaŋa Tolan gɔkcin agi, ‘Ɛɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl. Naŋka neeni pwatcin maka woŋgɛn a tiicinti ne ɛkkɛn ‘wontɛti ma waka coŋin a ɔɔn bɛɛ? Gɔṭṭɛ, maka balki waak dokiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘uottanti ma waak ɔɔn. Yeti maka balki waak oŋ woŋgɛn a tiicin bɛɛyɛ, waka bala ɛkkɛnti ne ḍiɛkan wannayɛ, lultan ma te ɛkkɛnti.
Ɔci acca maka yookɔn te ‘ya agi naa ‘ya agji ḍuaŋa tolan ɛkkɛnti bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn oodɛ ɛkkɛ ‘yati wɛnni, ɔci ɛkkɛn nogdɛ ɛkkɛ ‘ya ñamuti wɛnni!’ ”
Ɔci ne Yaccu ḍookki te jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ñamu bala ooddi ban Urcaliim.
Ban Bɛtpɛɛj ɔci ban Bɛtani, ɛkkɛn bala Pom Jɛtuun taaŋɛti. Ɔci ne Yaccu noŋi cɔɔlditi bonka neenitiyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn maka laldɛ ɛkɛ gɛɛg cundɛ ñamu ne yyɛɛwɔ.
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ne ɛkkɛ dɛndɛ bana yɔɔd ɛkkɛ ñomgɔti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl mɔktɛ yɔɔd a wiɛngɔn. Men gɛɛl taami te ɛkɛ men bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ gwottɛ, ɔci dala ɛkɛ oodɛ wɛnni.
Ɔci kan men gɛɛl tootti ɛkkɛti agi, ‘Ɛkkɛ ɛkta gujji eejji wɛnɛyɛ?’ Dala ɛkkɛ gɔkti ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ciɛggɔn buagɔn ɛkɛ.’ ”
Ɔci maka cuuññi ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn atti. Ɔci ba jwalla guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛ mɔkci ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛnti neeni.
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki gwotki tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛyɛ, tɔɔrɔn weyyɛn tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay, ɛkkɛ tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛ guddɛ eedɛ wɛnɛ?”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ciɛggɔn buagɔn ɛkɛ.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn tɔɔrɔn eyɛ Yaccuti, ɔci ɛkkɛn bworŋin ɛkkɛn ḍuacci tɔɔrɔn ŋoyɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn oŋ Yaccu taapci ñaalɔ tɔɔrɔnti oŋo.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ luoṭṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bworŋin ɛkkɛn gɛɛg cyɛtci pɔy konɛti aŋka ɛkkɛn noŋdi ɛkɛti ba mena tolan.

Ɔci ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni ne cualanti ban Urcaliimti nona pɔya ooddi iñɔ Pom Jɛtuuntiyɛ, poli ma polla tolan bootcin ɛkɛti ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala jieyi Juaŋ te pwana tolan te kanŋan naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda yuarɛ ɛkkɛny.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Dala ma jieyi i, Ciɛggɔn Tolan! I a Kiṭɔ Kaci Daawud, mena bɛɛn te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan. Dala coodi pwani bala ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci dala pwani bala Juaŋti mena bala ñaalɔ neeni!”
Ɔci ma Pɛriciin gɛɛg bala nona poli ma polla tolanti neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, gɔrca ma iti, poca, yook ɛkkɛn wanna yaayɛ Juaŋti ne tolan. Dala i gɔkca maka lala i ṭeyayɔ.”

Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin, kan maka neeni ciya liedayɛ, gwoyya neeni aŋka yaaddi te yom ñɔɔn ɔci jieddi ‘ya, ɔci gɔkti agi ‘ya agjɔ ḍuaŋa tolan ba maka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna ɔɔn.”
Ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni ne cɔɔlnitiyɛ, ɛkɛ bala gɔṭi ban Urcaliim neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ wiakcin te bana neeni.
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin bana neeniti te ɔɔli agi, “Dala te i jyek coodda pwadan neeni te ŋeej i. Acaan accayɛ, i coodda pwadan neeni yuara moki bɛɛ.
Acaan ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, maka yookɔn te i bɛya, ɔci ɛkkɛn cɔtti cɔdan tɛyan i waruti, ɔci ɛkkɛn i yuttiwi. Ɔci pɔya koodi i bora gɔ bala moki bɛɛ.
Hay, i ban Urcaliim! I looti ma bora! Ɔci i ḍakti iki kɛɛgin i a cyɛɛlɔ. Guonan gɛɛl daltan ma nina ɛka parɛ warɛti moki bɛɛ. Acaan oŋŋa ‘ya bɛɛna iti acca neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeej i bɛɛ.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ kaaccin kaañji kañ on Juaŋ ona tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ maka wɛɛṭi dok ɔci ḍɛɛk ɔci kulin ɔci boobg orɔ neeniyɛ, ŋualnɛ bora.
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, ‘On ‘yayɛ, a ona cɔkki may.’ ‘Yeti ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ a ona cieki maka ɛyyo!’”
Yaccu bala loṭi ma on Juaŋ ona tolan oŋkanda. Ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala lieṭi pɔya ɛkkɛn Yaccu noktitiy.
Yeti gena ɛkkɛn buagi aŋka naŋtan ɛkɛti gɔ yuarɛ bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn buayi mako, acaan ma waakɛnda bala tyeŋi jyek ɛkɛ ne tolan.

Oŋ gɛɛlti Yaccu bala loṭi ma on Juaŋ ona tolanti te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin. Gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn ñaagɛ nona ne cyɛɛlɔ nona baali Yaccuy.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala i ɔɔn myettɔn, i noŋ naŋka neeni te jyek menɛ? A menɛ i ‘wonni naŋka neeniy?”
Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya da buaga toocca ɛkkɛti te jwali gɛɛl daŋkun. ‘Ya ṭwoktata ɛkkɛ ñamu parun, ɛkkɛ oŋ myettin ‘ya daŋkun oŋo.
Bulti Yɔhanna bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolantɛ, walla bɛɛn te ma baanti budan? Gɔktɛ.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tyewɔ yɔtin pookɛn te jwalla neeni agi, “Kan ikin gɔktin agi bulti Yɔhanna neeni bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolantiyɛ, ɔci Yaccu tootti ikinti agi, ‘Oŋ kan a ɔɔnyɛ, ba ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyek ɛkɛti bɛ?’
Yeti kan ikin gɔktin agi bulti Yɔhanna bɛɛn te ma baanti budanyɛ, ikin yeptin ma waakɛnda te gwoyi noktin dita, acaan maka coŋin neeni bala poŋi gɔki agi Yɔhannayɛ, ɛkɛ a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Ɔɔn bulti Yɔhanna neeni ŋeejɔn ne bɛɛni te aŋɛ bɛɛ.”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin te naŋka naŋdi ‘ya neeni daŋkun bɛɛ.”
Ɔci Yaccu bala loṭi ma te jwalla a caagɔn gɛɛl agi, “Mena ‘uan gɛɛl ati pieti jang balji, ɔci ɛkɛ bala neeni ‘wonnɛ maka pookɛn byeŋkɛnti. Ɔci ɛkɛ ati bana tolan bana parɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛɛni coodi aŋan.

Ɔci ne wɔɔka pwonki ma jang ṭɔlgɛn bɛɛniyɛ, bal weegɛn mena kanŋan ɛkɛti gɛɛl cuuññɛ nona maka gɔṭi bal neeniti aŋka ɛkɛ kɛntan ma jang ṭɔlgɛn gɛɛg oodɛ baanji ɛkɛti. Yeti mena kanŋan ɛkɛti neeni jiebɛ maka gɔṭi bal neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ cuuñji duakciyɔ byeŋkɛ budan.
Ɔci moki bal weegɛn mena parɛ gɛɛl cuuññɛ moki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ jiebɛ daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkɛ naŋɛ ɛkkɛn ne yaayan, ɔci ɛkɛ cuuñji duakciyɔ byeŋkɛ budan.
Ɔci moki ɛkɛ maka kanŋan ɛkɛti mena akki ḍoogɔ cuuññɛ moki. Ɔci maka gɔṭi bal neeni ɛkɛ yacci, ɔci ɛkɛ yiɛpcɛ bora.
Ɔci bal weegɛn gɔki agi, ‘Acca ‘ya noŋja a ɔki yeti? Ɛɛ, ‘ya kaci ‘ya aŋka cundo. Ɛkɛ a kacca ana ‘yay, ɔci ɛkkɛn yooktan te jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛ.’

Yeti maka gɔṭi bal neeniyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ yuarkitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin pookɛn agi, ‘Mena neeniyɛ, gena mena wak weegɛn eedɛ ɛkɛ neeni. Dala ikin ɛkɛ noktin. Ɔci wak weegɛn waka te ooddi ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, aga wak ikin.’
Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ ŋualji bora te balji, ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ nogɛ ɛkkɛn bora oŋo.” Yaccu oŋ tooccin mati agi, “Oŋ bal weegɛn noŋdi a ɔki acca maka gɔṭi bal neeniti?

Ɛkɛ bɛya ɔci maka gɔṭi bal neeni nogdɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci bal ‘wondɛ maka pookɛn byeŋkɛnti.” Ɔci maka bala tyeŋi jyek Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Aa cca cca cca, a ɔɔn tɛy tɛyo, hay! Naa Juaŋ naŋka bala a ɔɔn wanna gɛɛl oodi ɔɔnti bɛɛ.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔrcin ɛkkɛnti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jwalla kiigin jiñɛ bala a ɔki ne jwali gɔki agi, ‘Poma guaktan maka cɔti oorg agi ɛkta yaayɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi poma pwadan on warɛti doki.’
Kan men gɛɛl ḍɛmdi poma neeni wyeñɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ nuotti jitin. Yeti kan poma neeni ḍɛmdi men gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkɛ mena neeni tiittɛ iñɔ.”

Ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn Yaccu muktan ne pɛñan te oŋŋa wanna. Yeti ɛkkɛn buayi maka coŋin. Ɛkkɛn looñi acaan ne Yaccu baali mieti ma te jwalla a caagɔnyɛ, ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn ne Yaccu baali gɔki jwalla caagɔn neeni te ɛkkɛny.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala kɛɛy ɛkɛ. Ɔci ma ɛkkɛn gɛɛg cuuñɛ ɛkkɛn Yaccuti lieda. Maka cuuñɛ ma neeniyɛ, bala noŋi ba ne ɛkkɛn buagɛ jyek Yaccu awarɛ ɔɔn. Yeti ɛkkɛn bala tyeŋi jyek ɛkɛ te yoma pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala tyeŋi jyek ɛkɛ acaan ɛkkɛn lieṭi pɔya Yaccu muktiti ɛkkɛn aŋka oltiti ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ bieŋɛtiy. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn jwalla guagdɛ Yaccu gɛɛl aktanyɔ ɛkkɛn te jwalla yaayan.

Ɛkkɛn botcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, ŋeejɔn ɔɔn jyeka guaga i loṭi ma neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyeka pwadin awarɛ. Ɔci i lor ma waakɛnda te jyeka ne cyɛɛlɔ. I ma kɛba jitin bɛɛ. Ɔci ŋeejɔn ɔɔn moki i lor ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan ne pwadan, i lor te yoma awarɛ.
Ɔɔn myettɔn, kan bɔlin Kɛɛcar ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔm neeni ‘wontin ikin tulbayɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba jyek ganuun ikin ma Icrayiil boki?”
Yeti yomg ɛkkɛn ŋeejɛ Yaccu ne ɛkkɛn balki gɔkki jyek labji neeniy. Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi,

“Giric gɛɛl oodɛ wɛnni ikin gɔrtin a cyɛɛlɔ.” Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Giric neeni balki pɔɔyama menɛ? Ɔci a yenti menɛ bala ɛkɛtiy?” Ɔci ma ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Gena pɔɔyama Kɛɛcar ḍuaŋa tolan, ɔci yenti ɛkɛ.”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛɛ, yɔɔddɛ ɛkkɛ myettin, wak Kɛɛcaryɛ, ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ. Ɔci wak Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, dala ‘wondɛ Juaŋ daŋkun.”
Ɔci maka neeni korkɛn buañi noon te jyek Yaccu neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn cien lieda. Ɛkkɛn yaakinti Yaccu bwantan te jwali gɛɛl ma ñomgɛnti bɛɛ.
Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ma Cadyuciin gɛɛg bɛɛn Yaccuti daŋkun. Maka neeni loṭi agi ne ma tuudiyɛ, ma jɔŋdɔ ñaalɔ moki bɛɛ.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, Muuca ikin kieŋnin jiek agi, ‘Kan mena mod ɛkkɛn tuwayɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ balki ɛɛŋyɛ, ɔci kan ɛɛŋ kɛɛgin ɛkɛ men baawyɛ, dala ɛŋ ɛkɛ ḍɛɛdɛ mod ɛkkɛn aŋka ɛkɛ jieda kɛɛgin jyettɛ mena tuun neeni.’
Oŋ acca gɔṭṭi! Maka ‘uay gɛɛg bala a dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɛkkɛn a modin waakɛnda jiennɛ mɛya ne cyɛɛlɔ. Moda tolan ñamuyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛɛŋ ḍɛɛnɛ, ɔci ne ɛkɛ tuuniyɛ, kɛɛgin ɛkɛ baaw men.
Ɔci moda bootcin moda tolan ŋoyɛti neeniyɛ, ɛŋa neeni ḍɛɛnɛ ɛkɛ moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ tuun moki, ɔci kɛɛgin ɛkɛ baaw men.

Ɔci moda akki ne ḍoogɔ moki ɛŋa neeni ḍɛɛnɛ ɛkɛ moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ tuun moki, ɔci kɛɛgin ɛkɛ baaw men. Ɔci maka a modin ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, ɛɛŋ ḍɛyɛ waakɛnda, yeti ɛkkɛn balki kɛɛgin gɛɛg bɛɛ. Kɛɛgin baaw ɛkkɛnti ne ɛkkɛn tuuki ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛɛŋ dalɛyɔ ɛkkɛn jieni kaci gɛɛl men bɛɛ.
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn tuuki waakɛnda a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛɛŋ daŋkun tuuni.
Ɛɛ, oŋ ne oŋŋa ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ te lientiy, ɛŋa neeni aga ɛŋ moda ɔkiy? Acaan ɛkɛ ḍɛyi ‘uay ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci ‘uay tuun kɛɛgin baaw waakɛnda?”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Tieŋdɛ, maka iñɔ baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛwɔ.
Yeti maka pwadin maka jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te kolk jitin, maka dɛndi ban Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci coodda ne baaṭi neeni yuartan ɛkkɛnyɛ, jyek ḍɛɛwin bala ɛkkɛnti moki bɛɛ.
Jyek ḍɛɛwin baaw ɛkkɛnti, acaan ɛkkɛn tuwa moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala ba malɛɛkan ɔɔn. Acaan ɛkkɛn jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te lienti, ɛkkɛn aŋi kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan ne pwadan.
Ɛkkɛ tiekɛ agi ma jɔŋdɔ ñaalɔ te lienti moki bɛɛ. Ne Muuca gɔrni maañ baali koldi jaantiyɛ, Juaŋ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Yɔrg ɛkkɛ Abrahim ɔci Icaak ɔci Yaakubyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka moṭi ‘yati.’
Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a Jwaŋ maka tuutan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a Jwaŋ maka tɛɛti. Acaan ma ɛkɛ waakɛnda a maka tɛɛti.”
Ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋ gɛɛg gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Ɛɛ, mena loṭi may, i ṭwoŋni ne pwadan te taata neeni, hay!”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn poccin tooccin ɛkɛti te genga moki bɛɛ.
Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ma gɔki agi Kiṭɔ Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Bora a kaci Daawud ogo?
Ɛkkɛ pokkɛ jyek Daawud bɛɛ? Daawud waanɛyɛ, oki ɔɔlg gɔki agi, ‘‘Ya tieŋŋan Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkcin Kiṭɔ Ciɛggɔn ‘yati agi, “Dala i coocca ‘ya taaŋuti taaŋŋa byerɔn
ne maka yookɔn te i bwandaji ‘ya ɔɔn.”’
Daawud boṭi Kiṭɔ a Ciɛggɔn ɛkɛ ba Jwaŋa Tolan. Oŋ kan Daawud boṭi Kiṭɔ a Ciɛggɔny, oŋ Kiṭɔ a kaci Daawud moki a ɔki?”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti maka coŋin ñomgɛnti agi,

“Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki maka loṭi worga Jwaŋa Tolan, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ani woon ma ñomgɛnti ɛŋi jibban becin jibban wiɛlɛn pɛñan. Ɔci ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ma ɛkkɛn naŋtan ba maka ḍwaŋin ma ñomgɛnti dukkanji oŋkanda. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛn buagɔn ciyi kokin pwadinti oorga morki ma Juaŋo, ɔci moki kan juman bala, ɛkkɛn buagɔn ciyi kokin pwadinti oŋkanda ɔɔn.

Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn omi wak moonga ciek ɔci oorg ɛkkɛn. Ɛkkɛn a yyɛcin, ɔci ɛkkɛn cɔki cɔŋŋa beyan aŋka ma gɔkti agi ɛkkɛn aninti Juaŋo. Te dienna ɛkkɛn dyetki ma ñingɛn neeniyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan jiek oldɛ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti ne tolan!”
Ɔci Yaccu ñorcin ñaalɔ on Juaŋ ona tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ maka cyɛgan yuarnɛ ɛkɛ bala ḍɔci bilk ɛkkɛn canduuk ḍɔcki ma bilka ‘wontan ma Jwaŋa Tolan.
Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛŋa cieñ ɛŋa bɔwan daŋkun yuarnɛ ɛkɛ ne ɛkɛ baali ḍɔcci girin ne yyɛɛwɔ budany.
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan awarɛ, bilka ḍuannɛ ɛŋa bɔwan, ɛŋa cieñ neeni a ḍiɛkan, yeti Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwanna pwani acaan ɛkɛ ḍɔccin.
Acaan maka neeni ɛkkɛn kɛñi te bilk ɛkkɛn wyetka kɛci bora te bilka coŋin neeniti, ɔci ḍuacci ɛkkɛn Juaŋti. Yeti ɛŋa bɔwan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍɔccin bilk ɛkɛ waakɛnda.”

Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu gɛɛg bala gɔki te on Juaŋ ona tolan neeni, agi gwoyya cɔtki ma on warɛ neeniyɛ, agi ɛkki pwannɔ agi pwadgin. Ɔci agi waka ‘woñgi ma Juaŋ on Juaŋ neeni agi pwannɔ agi pwadgin moki. Ɔci acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi,
“Gɔṭṭɛ! Oorga yuartɛ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, waka neeni laaktan ma ɔntɔ, ɔci guonan gɛɛl niindi menin parɛti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yiɛptan ma iñɔ waakɛnda.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, oŋŋa neeni bɛya bora ne tua? Ɔci ne oŋŋa neeni noŋi bɛɛdi boray, oŋ ñiitin ikin te gena?”

Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ! Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ aŋka naa ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ ma ɔntɔ bɛɛ. Acaan maka coŋin gɛɛg bɛya, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti agi ɛkkɛn aginti ‘ya Kiṭɔ awarɛ. Ɔci agi Oŋ Kiṭɔ bɛɛnɔ doki. Naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka neeni bɛɛ.
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ ma gɔkki agi lañ baalɔ ɔci agi ywobji baalɔyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ ne tolan bɛɛ. Naŋka bala a ɔɔn wanna bɛya waakɛnda, yeti jiek wyetkɛn bawwin men bɛɛ.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti moki agi, “Keedin wɛɛn warda noogdi yɔtin oŋkanda.
Ɔci bonka pookɛn gɛɛgtiyɛ, ṭɛɛr warɛ ḍieddi ne pɛñan. Ɔci koñ moki bɛya mati. Ɔci taab tol tolo. Ɔci moki naŋka ñyecki ma yuartan ma ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci ma buatti ne pɛñan.

“Yeti ne naŋka neeni bɛɛki bora men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ mwoktɛ mako. Ɔci ɛkkɛ naŋtɛ ɛkkɛn ne yaayan. Ɔci ɛkkɛ yɔɔttɛ ma ma ñomgɛnti oorga morki ma Juaŋti aŋka ma gɔrti jyek ɛkkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ oltɛ ma ciginji. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ ma gɛɛg yɔɔtti ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ɔci ḍuaŋan ṭɔlgɛn ñomgɛnti te jyek ‘ya.
Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ma lwogdɛ te jyek ‘ya.
Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ḍyɛgdɛ acca. Naa ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyeka ɛkkɛ goddi iki ma nona godanti neeni bɛɛ.
Te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɛkkɛ magdin ‘ya te jyeka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ. Ɛkkɛ ‘wondin ‘ya ñing tɛɛno, ɔci maka yookɔn te ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bwandɛ ɛkkɛ te jieko. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaaktanti gɔkti genga ɛkkɛti moki bɛɛ.

Ɔci ma waakɛnda yooktan te ɛkkɛ te jyek ‘ya. Te oŋŋa wannayɛ, mɛyi ɛkkɛ ɔci weyi ɛkkɛ, ɔci modg ɛkkɛ ɔci ma ɛkkɛ maka pookɛn, ɔci mung ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ ma byeŋkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛ ma gɛɛg noktɛ ɛkkɛn.
Yeti men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti ḍakti bɛɛ.
Kan ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyanyɛ, ɛkkɛ uddɛ.
“Gɔṭṭɛ, ne ɛkkɛ ban Urcaliim yuartɛ yuttitiwi ackanyɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ oŋŋa bana neeni yaadi cɔɔllin doki.

Kan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ban Yahuudiyayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yooŋdɛ pomk jitin ne pɛñan, naa ɛkkɛ kwattɛ bɛɛ. Naŋka neeni bɛya a yuurgɔn. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ bana tolantiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ koodɛ bora ne pɛñan. Kan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ bana tolan ŋoyɛtiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ kaattɛ bana tolanti moki bɛɛ.
Acaan oŋŋa bɛya Juaŋ jiek duaktɛ Urcaliim wyeñɛti wannayɛ, ɛkɛ a ‘Oŋ Ywobji Juaŋ Ban Urcaliimti’ ba jyeka kiigin worgaji.
Maka laci ɔci maka balki kɛɛgin ḍyɛrinyɛ, oŋŋa wanna tɛy tɛy ɛkkɛnti ne pɛñan. Acaan taab bɛya wannayɛ, pɛñña pɛñño, ɔci ywobji Juaŋ tol tol mati.

Ma noktan ma te byeŋgaaran. Ɔci ma gɛɛg eetan maka yooki ñin iki ɛkkɛn bonka pookɛnti baan warda aga kɛɛnk ɛkkɛn. Ɔci ban Urcaliim buurtan Keedin Pookɛn iñɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ciya wɛnan ne yuong ɛkkɛn bɛɛti bora ɔɔn.

“Oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, ñiitan ma te naŋki waka pookɛn, ɔci te oŋ waŋɛ, ɔci te paano, ɔci te kɛltan. Ɔci iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, maka bonka ḍwaŋin buaya ne tolan, ɔci lieṭi pɔya yooŋti ɛkkɛn ɔntɔ te pɔɔgi galŋa tolan ɔci te joon ɛkkɛn.
Ɔci ma gɛɛg yomgɛn poda te bwaji ɔci te naŋka tɛyan naŋka bɛya mati ṭɛɛrjiy. Acaan waka bala ñaalɔ pɔlijiyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn ḍieddi waakɛnda.
Hayya, ɛkkɛn oŋ ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan yuarta ne bɛɛda te pɔli te war tɛɛn ɔci pwanna pwani ne tolany.
Ne naŋka neeni noŋki bɛɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne pwadan a tyɛlga, acaan oŋŋa ɛkkɛ magdɛ Juaŋ te maka yookɔn te ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, cɔɔllin doki.”
Ɔci Yaccu ɛkkɛn myennɛ te jwalla a caagɔn gɛɛl moki agi, “Gɔrtɛ ŋuammo, ɔci janga pookɛn waakɛnda.
Ne ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ jang yuocki ɔci pworkiyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ noon aŋi ḍuoŋ tukɛ doki.
Ɔci daŋkun, ne ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ naŋka neeni ne bɛɛti borayɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan cɔɔllin doki.
“‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan. Maka accayɛ, ɛkkɛn tuwa bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg ciya ne jyeka neeni bɛɛti bora waakɛnda ɔɔn.
Pɔli ɔci ṭɛɛryɛ, ɛkkɛn baadi. Yeti jyek ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn baadi bɛɛ.

“Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ, aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ jyek coodda yaayan bɛɛ, walla ba jyek nooŋi mooyo, ɔci walla paŋi jyek coodda iñɔ baanji wɛnni bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ te naŋka wannayɛ, ɔci oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔyɛ, bɛya ne pɛñan ba yiici ne muowi waak ɔɔn.
Ɛkɛ bɛya te maka ciyi ṭɛra neeni ŋoyɛti waakɛnda.

Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci cɔktɛ oŋkanda aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ Jwaŋa Tolan war tɛɛno, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ bwantɛ taabn bɛya ɛkkɛti waakɛnda neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ yaakɛti yɔɔttɛ ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ñamuti.”
Ɔci oŋkandayɛ, Yaccu bala loṭi ma on Juaŋ ona tolan. Yeti te weenjiyɛ, ɛkɛ ooddi ciyi Pom Jɛtuunti.
Ɔci te liid ṭɔɔl ḍiɛranyɛ, ma waakɛnda bɛya ɛkɛti on Juaŋ ona tolan acaan buagɔn tieŋdi jyek ɛkɛ.
Iid Byedga Polanyɛ, cɔɔllin doki. Iid neeniyɛ, ma boṭi agi Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi a Gorŋo.
Gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn buayi mako, ɔci acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala lieṭi pɔya ɛkkɛn nokki Yaccu lieda.
Ɔci Jwaŋa Yaayan kaaccin Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti yomɛti. Ɛkɛ a mena akki maka laldɛ Yaccu Ne Inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn Ne yyɛɛwɔy.
Ɔci ɛkɛ ati ɔci ɛkɛ bala gɔṭi jiek iki gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil iki ḍuaŋan bɔlin on Juaŋ ona tolan acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn Yaccu ‘wondɛ ɛkkɛn byeŋkɛnti lieda ɔɔn.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Ɛkɛ ‘wontin bilk te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.”
Ɔci Yahuuja jyettin gɔki agi, “Ɛɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin.” Ɔci ɛkɛ ati bala lieṭi pɔya ɛkɛ Yaccu ‘wondɛ ma byeŋkɛnti ne maka coŋin neeni baaki nona ɛkɛti men ɔɔn.
Ɔci Iid Byedga Polanyɛ, bɛɛn doki. Gena oŋŋa ma ŋoorki kulin ṭɔlgɛn ba naŋki oŋ Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi a Gorŋo.
Ɔci Yaccu Butruc cuuññɛ i Yɔhanna ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ ooddɛ wak iid ywaŋdɛyɔ, ɔci ɔɔn oŋ bɛɛdɔn ikin omtin oŋo.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “I buagi ɔɔn ooddɔn waak ywaŋdɔnyɔ wɛnɛ te ikin?”
Ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, ne ɛkkɛ dɛndɛ ban Urcaliimjiyɛ, mena ‘uan gɛɛl koogdi iki ɛkkɛ. Ɛkɛ kɛṭi pieg te kuñŋan. Ɔci ɛkkɛ boottɛ ɛkɛ ŋoyɛti. Ɛkkɛ ooddɛ iki ɛkɛ ɔɔn ne ona ɛkɛ kaatti ɔɔn.
Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ on weegɛnti agi, ‘Mena Loṭi Ma bala tooci agi, “Ba ona cootta ‘ya a on wɛlg bɛ? Acaan ‘ya buaga noŋdɔn iid i maka laldi ‘yay.” ’
Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ myettɛ te ona tolan ñaalɔ. Ona neeni ywaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ doki. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ wak iid ywaŋdɛyɔ te ikin aŋan.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn atti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yɔṭi on ba jwalla guaŋnɛ Yaccu ɛkkɛntiy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn wak iid ywaŋɛyɔ aŋan.
Ɔci ne oŋ waŋa omki ma iid bɛɛni borayɛ, ɔci Yaccu cooccin iñɔ omi am iki Cuudan ɛkɛ Maka A Inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn Ne yyɛɛwɔy.
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya buaga ne pɛñan dala ikin omtin oomdin iid neeni, Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋ iki ‘ya ne taab bɛɛni ‘yati men bɛɛy.
Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan. ‘Ya omja iid neeni moki bɛɛ. ‘Ya cied ɔɔn ne oŋŋa waak waakɛnda mugdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bieŋɛti ɔɔn.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ kubaaya pyeg luutkin luullɛ, ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolantiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ma ɛkɛti agi, “Antɛ waka nɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ḍyerdɛ jitin ɛkkɛ.
Tieŋdɛ! ‘Ya motca pyeg luutkin moki bɛɛ. ‘Ya cied budan ɔɔn ne cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛdi ɔɔn.”

Ɔci ɛkɛ byentan gɛɛl luullɛ, ɔci cɔkcin Jwaŋa Tolanti. Ɔci ɛkɛ byentan wɛɛnnɛ jitin, ɔci ɛkɛ ma ‘wonnɛ byentan, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Antɛ byentan neeni! Gena war ‘ya. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn, aŋka ɛkkɛ poŋɛ te ‘ya.”

Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ḍookkɛ te amiyɛ, ɔci Yaccu kubaaya pyeg luutkin luullɛ daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin mati agi, “Antɛ! Mottɛ waka bala kubaaya konɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a yimg ‘ya, ɛkkɛn kɛɛwin iñɔ te ɛkkɛ. Ɔci te lyena tuuda ‘ya neeniyɛ, Juaŋ noŋdi jyeka wonkɛn iki ɛkkɛ.
Yeti gɔṭṭɛ, byeŋ mena ‘ya ‘wonda ma byeŋkɛnti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ balgin iki ‘ya nona amti wɛnni.
’Ya Kaci Ma Baan tuud ba jyeka kiiwɛ ma te ‘yay. Yeti mena ‘ya ‘wonda ma byeŋkɛnti neeniyɛ, taab bɛya ɛkɛtiyɛ, tol tolo.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala toyi yɔtin pookɛn agi a menɛ bala ɛkkɛnti wɛnni noŋi naŋka neeniy.
Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu bala toyi yɔtin pookɛn agi, “A menɛ a mena tolan te ikiny?”
Ɔci Yaccu ɛkkɛn myennɛ agi, “Ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, balki war tɛɛn ma ɛkkɛnti oŋkanda, ɔci ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bartan ma agi, ‘Maka Ḍɔci Ma Ne Pwadany.’
Yeti ɛkkɛyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ baldɛ ba ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin neeni bɛɛ. Kan mena a mena tolan te ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ aga ba mena ḍiɛran mena moki ma te yoma pwadan.

Kan mena ciyi omiyɛ, ɔci kan mena parɛ gɛɛl bala noŋi kanŋa ɛkɛyɛ, ba mena a mena tolan te ɛkɛ neeni bɛ? Gena mena ciyi iñɔ neeni. Gena ɛkɛ aŋka tolcin bɛɛ? Yeti ‘yayɛ, ‘ya baal ba mena ḍiɛran ɛkkɛti.
Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka bala ‘yati oŋkanda ne taab baali ‘yati ɔɔn.
Ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wondin ‘ya kanŋa maka a ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ba kanŋa ‘ya ne ‘ya ‘wonnata Wey ɔɔn kanŋa mena ḍuaŋa tolan neeni.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin omtin ɔci mottin iki ‘ya ban cyɛgji ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ naŋdin ‘ya coottɛ kokin wyetkɛnti, ɔci agdɛ ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil maka kɛɛna a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniy.”

Ɔci te wɛnni Yaccu gɔrcin Butructi ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Butruc, Butruc, tieŋŋa poca! Jwaŋa Yaayan bala tooci te ɛkkɛ waakida, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn ‘ya ɛkɛ ‘woñga naŋki aŋka ɛkɛ buagɔn poci ɛkkɛ a poccin ba kuata ma kuaki pok oŋkanda wanna ɔɔn.
Yeti ‘ya baal cɔk Juaŋti te i, Butruc, aŋka naa jyenna jyetti i neeniyɛ, ḍɛmdi iñɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci ne i waru yaldi mokiyɛ, dala i modg ɛkkɛ maga, aŋka dala ɛkkɛn yɔɔda ne tɛyan.”
Yeti Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, kan ‘ya olta ma ciginji iki iyɛ, dala ‘ya olta ma ɔɔn. Ɔci kan ‘ya nokta ma iki iyɛ, dala ‘ya nokta ma moki ɔɔn!”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Tieŋŋa, i myettin ‘ya, te ween jiña neeni ne tuan wiakti men bɛɛyɛ, i doki kɛkka te ‘ya oŋki ne ḍoogɔ. I gɔkca mati agi i ‘ya ŋeeja bɛɛ.”

Ɔci Yaccu tooccin Maka A Inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn Ne yyɛɛwɔti agi, “Oŋŋa ɛkkɛ cuuññin ‘ya ɔci ɛkkɛ attɛ, ɔci kucin ɔci cowaal ɔci wɛɛyi eññɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛyɛ, coodi ɛkkɛ tɛy tɛy boki?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn kɛkcin agi, “A’a, coodi tɛy tɛy bɛɛ.”

Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Yeti accayɛ, kan men gɛɛl balki kucin bilkyɛ, dala ɛkɛ kucin neeni eedɛ, ɔci mena balki cowaalyɛ, dala ɛkɛ cowaal eedɛ daŋkun. Ɔci mena balki byeŋgaaran bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ bworŋ jwami wiɛldɛyɔ, ɔci dala ɛkɛ wɛrdi byeŋgaaran te bilka neeni.

’Ya ɛkkɛ myettin, jyeka kiigin gɔki te ‘ya agi, ‘Jiek oljɛ ma ɛkɛ wyeñɛti i maka yeyin a cyɛɛlɔ.’ Dala jyeka neeni aga jyeka awarɛ te ‘ya. Acaan jyeka kiiwɛ ma te ‘yayɛ, noŋi cɔmdi bora waakɛnda awarɛ.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Ciɛggɔn, gɔṭṭi, byeŋgaaran bala wɛnni ne yyɛɛwɔ!” Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛɛ, kapa ɔɔn.”
Ɔci Yaccu kooyin bora te bana tolanti neeni, ɔci ati ñaalɔ Pom Jɛtuun wyeñɛti ba naŋki ɛkɛ oŋkanda. Ɔci maka laldɛ ɛkɛ daŋkun bootcin ɛkɛti.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛnni nona neenitiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Cɔktɛ Juaŋti aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ te maali Jwaŋa Yaayan neeni ɔci kɛkti te ‘ya bɛɛ.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ ati ñamu parɛ ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ ḍwoñjin iñɔ ɔci cɔkcin Jwaŋa Tolanti agi,
“Wey ɔɔn, kan i buagiyɛ, dala i noŋja naŋki i aŋka naa taab lien neeni bɛya ‘yati bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya cɔkka iti ba yom ‘ya bɛɛ. ‘Ya cɔkka iti ba yom i.”
Ɔci malɛɛka gɛɛl bɛɛn ɛkɛti te ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora ɛkɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala moki Yaccu aŋka dala ɛkɛ yomɛ tɛya.
Ɔci Yaccu yomɛ bala wiak ne tolan konɛ ñɔni warɛ te taab neeni, hay! Ɔci ɛkɛ cɔkcin Juaŋti ne tolan. Ɔci cani kɛɛwin iñɔ te ɛkɛ ñamɛti bala ba yimgo.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ ḍookki te cɔŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ ati dɔɔki nona maka laldɛ ɛkɛti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn mɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ wicɔ, acaan ɛkkɛn taabbin te yom yoño.
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Ɛkkɛ wiccɛ a ɔɔn ogo? Dala ɛkkɛ jɔldɛ ñaalɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ te maali Jwaŋa Yaayan neeni, ɔci kɛktɛ te ‘ya bɛɛ.”
Ne Yaccu baali gɔki jyeka neeni menyɛ, ɔci poli ma polla tolan bɛɛni. Ɔci Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti ɛkkɛn wɛɛññɛ nona ɛkɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ ati orcinti Yaccuti, ɔci ɛkɛ Yaccu ñiimmɛ te tukɛ ba naŋki ma ɛkkɛn.
Yeti Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Yahuuja, i ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ‘wonda ma te ñiimmɔ?”
Ɔci ne maka atki iki ɛkɛ neeni gɔrki naŋka naŋtan ma ɛkɛti wannayɛ, ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, dala ikin nooktin iki ma te byeŋgaaran ba?”
Ɔci te wɛnni mena bala Yaccuti gɛɛl mena kanŋan i gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil jyɛmmɛ jyeña byerɔn palnɛ bora te byeŋgaaran.
Yeti Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kapa ɔɔn, naa i noŋja a ɔɔn moki bɛɛ!” Ɔci Yaccu topcin men jyeñɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ men jyeña ywaŋŋɛ moki.

Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiilti, ɔci ḍuaŋan bɔlin on Juaŋ ona tolan, ɔci ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋinti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, hay! Ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ ennɛ byeŋgaaran ɔci gɔlk byeŋkɔti aŋka ‘ya mugdata ɛkkɛ ba muŋi mena ɛɛn ogo?
Ne ‘ya balgin iki ɛkkɛ on Juaŋ ona tolan oŋkanda ɛkkɛ menga poccin ‘ya muŋŋa bɛɛ. Yeti dala gena ɛkkɛ buagɛ naŋdɛ neeni dala naŋdɛ wona war tɛɛn Mena Yaayan mwoki noon men ɔŋ.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ mugɛ ɔci eyɛ lwadɛ ne on gaciic tolan ma Icrayiilti. Ɔci Butruc ɛkɛ bala bɛya booti te ŋoyɔ nona loonan.
Ɔci ne ma gɛɛg maañ olkiti jiju kaañjiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn cooccin iñɔ bala ooyi. Ɔci Butruc daŋkun bala ooyi iki mako.
Ɔci mena a ṭɔɔl gɛɛl Butruc yuarnɛ ne ɛkɛ baali ciyi ooyi maccuy. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala gɔṭi tieci Butruc warɛ a tiito. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Hay! ‘Wana neeni moki a mena booti Yaccu daŋkun, hay!”
Yeti Butruc kɛkcin, ɔci gɔkcin ɛɛŋti agi, “Hay! Ɛɛŋo, ‘ya gena guaga i neeni ŋeej bɛɛ!”
Ɔci ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ mokiyɛ, mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala gɔṭi Butruc. Ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay! I a men ɛkɛ daŋkun, hay!” Yeti Butruc kɛkcin gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay, ‘uano, ‘ya a men ɛkɛ bɛɛ!”
Ɔci ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ mokiyɛ, mena parɛ gɛɛl gɔkcin ɛkɛti moki ne pɛñan agi, “Ɛɛ, ‘wana neeni ɛkɛ bala iki Yaccu awarɛ acaan ɛkɛ a men ma Jaliil!”
Yeti Butruc gɔkcin agi, “Hay, ‘uano! Jyeka guaga i wanna ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ!” Ɔci ne pɛñan ne ɛkɛ baali gɔki jyeka neeni menyɛ, tuan wiakcin doki.
Ɔci Yaccu warɛ yallɛ, ɔci gɔrcin Butructi, ɔci Butruc ñingɛ ñieŋnɛ te jwalla guaŋŋɛ Yaccu ɛkɛti te ñamu agi, “Gɔṭṭi, Butruc, ne tuan wiakti men bɛɛyɛ, i kɛkka te ‘ya oŋki aga ne ḍoogɔ dokiy.”
Ɔci Butruc ati bora, ɔci bala wiak a joon duor konɛ te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.
Ɔci maka gɔṭi Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala juoli ɔci jiebi ɛkɛ.
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ ḍɛɛkkiti ñingɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hayya! Dala i noŋja ba naŋki maka bɔwan. Mena i jyɛmmi neeni ŋeejɛ? Gɔkca!”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala wooki ɛkɛ te jyeka pookɛn jyeka coŋin jyeka yeyin.

Ɔci ne noon bɔɔniyɛ, maka ḍwaŋin ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ nona ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci Yaccu owwɛ ma nona maka gɔṭi jiek ñomgɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi,
“Gɔṭṭi, kan i a Kiṭɔyɛ, dala ɔɔn myettɔn.” Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kan ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettinyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ bɛɛ.
Ɔci kan ‘ya tootta ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ buagɛ ṭwoktɛ genga ‘yati bɛɛ.
Yeti acca te oŋŋa neeniyɛ, ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan coocca Jwaŋa Tolan taaŋɛti, taaŋŋa byerɔn ñaalɔ.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti waakɛnda agi, “I a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan nɛ?” Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛɛ, ‘ya baal a ɔɔn, ba jwalla guagdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Hay yeh! Ikin buagin lieṭin jyeka pookɛn moki ogo? Ikin tieŋnin te jyetkɔ jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te tuk ɛkɛ parɛ neeni doki!”
Ɔci maka coŋin waakɛnda neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn jɔllin ñaalɔ, ɔci Yaccu lwadɛ eyɛ ɛkkɛn nona Bilaatucti.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tɔɔmi Yaccu Bilaatucti ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “‘Wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yuarŋɔn ɔɔn, ɛkɛ bala ma ɔɔn jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala dɛyi ɔɔn moki agi naa ɔɔn ḍɔccɔn tulba Kɛɛcar ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔmti bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkɛ agji ḍuaŋa ɔɔn ḍuaŋa tolan daŋkun.”
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ ookiti ma Bilaatuctiyɛ, Bilaatuc tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Hay, i gɔk i a ḍuaŋa tolan ma ɛkkɛ ma Icrayiil nɛ?” Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛɛ, ‘ya baal a ɔɔn ba jwalla guagdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna.”
Ɔci Bilaatuc gɔkcin gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiilti ɔci maka coŋinti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, hay, ɛkkɛ! ‘Ya gena yaayan gɛɛl yuarŋ ‘wana neeniti aŋka ‘ya jiek olda ɛkɛ wyeñɛti bɛɛ.”
Yeti ɛkkɛn gɔki ‘yeṭi ne pɛñan Bilaatucti agi, “Maka ciyi bonk Ma Yahuudiya waakɛnda, te ban Jaliil ne wɛnni ɔɔnyɛ, jyek ɛkkɛn ḍuobbin te jyeka loṭi ‘wana neeni ɛkkɛny.”
Ne Bilaatuc tieŋni jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ tooccin mati agi, “Ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ ‘wana neeni ɛkɛ a men ma Jaliil?”
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ tieŋni agi Yaccu bɛɛnɔ te ban Hiruuduc Antipacn gɛɛlti non Jaliilyɛ, ɔci Yaccu cuuññɛ ɛkɛ Hiruuducti doki.

Te baaṭi Hiruuduc buagɔn ka gɔrti Yaccu, acaan ɛkɛ tieŋŋin jyeka guaktan ma te Yaccu ne coŋɔn. Yeti Yaccu yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ men bɛɛ. Ɔci ne Yaccu cuuññɛ Bilaatuc ɛkɛti te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. Ɛkɛ poŋi gɔki agi Yaccu noŋdɔ naŋka tɛyɔ gɛɛl nona ɛkɛ ñamɛti kaapun.
Ɔci Hiruuduc bala tooci Yaccuti te jyeka coŋin, yeti Yaccu ṭwokcin genga ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
Gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil i maka loṭi worga Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala yɔɔd tɔɔmi Yaccu ne pɛñan.
Ɔci Hiruuduc ɔci ackan ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala noŋi ne yaayan Yaccuti, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala juoli ɛkɛ. Ɔci Yaccu ɛɛŋnɛ Hiruuduc bworŋa pwadan bworŋa beyan, ɔci cuuññɛ duaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ Bilaatucti.
Ɔci te oŋŋa wannatiyɛ, Bilaatuc ɔci Hiruuducyɛ, ɛkkɛn ŋeewin aŋi munin. Te ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala yoyi ñin yaakkɛn te jiek ṭɔlgɛn gɛɛg.
Ɔci Bilaatuc gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci ḍuaŋan ɔci maka pookɛn bornɛti waakɛnda. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛɛni.

Ɔci ne ma bɛɛkiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Wana neeni oonɛ ɛkkɛ ‘yati, ɔci ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi ‘wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena ma jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ. Yeti gɔṭṭɛ, jyek ‘wana neeni gwali ‘ya jitin doki ɛkkɛ ñomgɔti. Ɔci jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ tɔɔmmɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ‘ya gɛɛl yuarŋ ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
Ɔci Hiruuduc Antipac moki jwali gɛɛl yuarŋɛ ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Yaccu dɔɔnɛ ɛkɛ nona ikinti. Gɔṭṭɛ, gena naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ yaayan aŋka tuudi ɛkɛyɛ, gɔ gɛɛl bala bɛɛ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya ɛkɛ ḍuado, ɔci ‘ya oŋ ɛkɛ pɔkka oŋo.” [
Yuonginda ne Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋ bɛɛdiyɛ, naŋki Bilaatuc bala aŋka maka bala ciginji men gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ pɔktɛ ɛkɛ budan, wantan ma bɛɛ.]
Yeti polla tolan bala yaadan te pwana tolan waakɛnda te tuka ne cyɛɛlɔ agi, “‘Wana neeni ɛkɛ nogdɛ, ɔci Baraabac ɛkɛ aŋka pɔkka bɛya bora ɔɔnti!”
Baraabac neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala jiju ciginji acaan oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ma gɛɛg buagɔn akuuma muktan ɛkkɛn, ɔci Baraabacyɛ, ɛkɛ bala iki maka neeni. Ɔci moki ɛkɛ bala jiju ciginji acaan ɛkɛ men gɛɛl noŋŋɛ.
Ɔci Bilaatuc gɔgjin i ɛkkɛn moki, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn Yaccu pɔktɛ.
Yeti ɛkkɛn bala yaadan te pwana tolan agi, “Dala ɛkɛ ŋaaptɛ ñaalɔ! Dala ɛkɛ ŋaaptɛ ñaalɔ doki!”
Ɔci Bilaatuc gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti oŋki ne ḍoogɔ agi, “Ogo? Gena naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ yaayan a gena? Gena naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ yaayan tuudi ɛkɛyɛ, gɔ bala bɛɛ. ‘Ya ɛkɛ ḍuado, ɔci dala ɛkɛ ɔga ooddi.”
Yeti ɛkkɛn gɔki ‘yeṭi ne pɛñan yool a yooli te jieko. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaajjin agi, “Dala Yaccu ŋaaptɛ ñaalɔ!” Ɛkkɛn bala yaadan a ɔɔn ne Bilaatuc noŋŋi ba jwali ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
Ɔci Bilaatuc gɔkcin mati agi dala ma noŋdi ba yomg ɛkki Yaccuti.

Ɔci ‘wana bala jiju ciginji te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ yaayan ma akuumati ɔci te jyek lienyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka pɔŋnɛ Bilaatuc ba jyek maka coŋin neeni. Ɔci Bilaatuc ackan ‘wonnɛ Yaccu byeŋkɛnti aŋka dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi ɛkɛti ba yomg ma Icrayiil.

Ɔci ackan Yaccu eyɛ lwadɛ. Ɔci mena ‘uan mena yenti Cimaanyɛ, koogjin iki ɛkkɛn yomu pɔɔjɔ. Ɛkɛ a men maka ban Cayriin. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala bɛya te yielji. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ mugɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ iircɛ ɛkkɛn kɛṭi kakan Yaccu. Yaccu bala ati ñamu, ɔci Cimaan bala booti Yaccu ŋoyɛti kɛṭi kakan.
Ɔci polla tolan bootcin ɛkɛ ŋoyɛti. Ɔci maka moong bala iki ɛkkɛn daŋkun. Ɛkkɛn bala poomi korkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala wiak te Yaccu.
Ɔci Yaccu warɛ yallɛ ɛkkɛnti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Moong maka ban Urcaliim, dala ɛkkɛ joon daldɛ te ‘ya. Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka wiaktɛ te taab bɛya ḍɔɔgi ɛkkɛti pookɔy, ɔci te kɛɛgin ɛkkɛ.
Gɔṭṭɛ, oŋ bala bɛya, ɔci ma gɔkti agi, ‘Moonga balki kɛɛgin bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔyɔ. Gena maka jieni bɛɛ, ɔci maka nɛɛti kɛɛgin bɛɛ neeni.’
Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔkti pomkti agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ ɔɔnti, ɔɔn kwomdɔntiwi!’
Kan ɛkkɛn noŋdi naŋka neeni ‘ya mena pwadantiy, oŋ ɛkkɛn noŋdi a ɔki nɔñji ɛkkɛti ma Urcaliim maka yeyinti neeniy?”
Ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg bala daŋkun ne yyɛɛwɔ. Gena maka yeyin. Ɛkkɛn eyɛ lwadɛ ma iki Yaccu a cyɛɛlɔ acaan noktan ma.

Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn dɛñki nona bartan ma agi “Oon Men Baan wyeñɛtiyɛ” ɛkkɛn Yaccu ŋaapci ñaalɔ aŋan, ɔci maka yeyin ŋaapci ma ñaalɔ aŋan daŋkun. Mena ne cyɛɛlɔ ŋaapci ma Yaccu taaŋŋa byerɔnti, ɔci mena parɛ ŋaapci ma taaŋŋa aamti.
Ɔci Yaccu bala cɔki gɔki agi, “Hay! Wey ɔɔn, dala i ackan neeni bɔɔka, acaan naŋka naŋi ɛkkɛn neeni ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.” Ɔci ackan bala oomi kɔla te bworŋin ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bworŋin Yaccu cieñɛ jitin.
Ɔci ma bala yɔdi gɔṭi naŋka neeni. Yeti ḍuaŋan ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala juoli Yaccu agi, “Maka pookɛn yɔɔññɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci acca kan ɛkɛ a Kiṭɔ Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Borayɛ, dala ɛkɛ warɛ yɔɔdɛ parɛ.”
Ɔci ackan daŋkunyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala juoli ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn mooya cyɛyan eyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Anti, motca.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn moki gɔki ɛkɛti agi, “Kan i a Ciɛggɔn Tolan ma Icrayiilyɛ, dala i waru yɔya paru acca.”
Ɔci jyeka kiigin olji ma kakanti ŋaapci ma ñaalɔ Yaccu wyeñɛti gɔki agi, “MENA NEENI A CIƐGGƆN TOLAN MA ICRAYIIL”.
Ɔci mena yaayan gɛɛl, mena ŋaapci ma ñaalɔ iki Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ḍori Yaccu agi, “Hay! I a Kiṭɔ bɛɛ? Oŋ ba i war i yɔɔdi aŋka i ɔɔn da yɔɔdɔn bɛ?”
Ɔci mena parɛ neeniyɛ, mena neeni dɛɛnnɛti. Ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay! I buay Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ? Jyeka neeni bɛɛn ikin wyetkɔti waakida.
Ɔci jiek bɛɛn ikinti yaakkɔ amaam bɛɛ. Jiek bɛɛn ikinti te naŋka naŋŋin ikin yeyin neeni. Yeti gɔṭṭi poca, ‘wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛ.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Yaccu, dala i poŋja te ‘ya, ne i agdi Ciɛggɔn Tolany.”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Awarɛ, ‘ya gɔkka iti, acca neeniti ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin oottin iki ‘ya ñaalɔ pɔliji non cyɛgji ‘ya.”
Ɔci ne oŋ waŋɛ yɔɔnni yeccuyɛ, ne pɛñan noon uli doki ne oŋ waŋɛ warɛ yiɛnnɛ ɔɔn. Oŋ waŋɛ bala dɛki moki bɛɛ.
Ɔci bworŋa kɛkci ma orɔ on Juaŋ ona Tolan, bworŋa on kɛɛmmɛ jitin i on ṭɔla jiju neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍañi jitin te ñaalɔ wyeñɛti ne iñɔ ɔɔn.
Ɔci Yaccu yaadjin te pwana tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Wey ɔɔn, boŋ ‘ya ‘wondin i bieŋuti!” Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ tuun doki.
Ɔci ḍuaŋa ackanyɛ, ne ɛkɛ gɔrni naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ jieyi Juaŋ gɔki agi, “Ɛɛ, awarɛ, ‘wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena pwadan. Ɛkɛ noŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛ!”
Ɔci pooldin ḍwaŋin pooldin bɛɛn gɔṭi naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn dɔɔki baanji, ɛkkɛn bala poomi korkɛn acaan ɛkkɛn yomgɛn yeyɔ.
Ɔci mung Yaccun, ɔci moonga bɛɛn boottin ɛkɛ te bana tolan ban Jaliilyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala yɔdi te nona loonan. Ɔci naŋka neeni waakɛndayɛ, yuarcɛ ɛkkɛn.
Ɔci mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala yenti Yuocip. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn te ban Ɛrimatiiya ban Yahuudiyaji. Ɛkɛ a mena gɔṭi jiek iki maka ḍwaŋin daŋkun. Ɛkɛ pwad pwado, ɔci naŋki ɛkɛ pwatcin moki.
Yuocip neeniyɛ, bala kɛɛy oŋŋa cyɛgji Juaŋ bɛɛdiy. Ɛkɛ jiek ñaagɛyɔ iki Maka Gɔṭi Jiek i ma Icrayiil te jyek lyen Yaccu bɛɛ, a’a. Ɔci moki ɛkɛ yookɔn te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn Yaccuti neeni.
Ɔci Yuocipyɛ, ɛkɛ ati Bilaatuc ñamɛti ɔci tooccin Bilaatucti aŋka ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Bilaatuc war Yaccu.
Ɔci ɛkɛ war Yaccu oonɛ iñɔ, ɔci paarŋɛyɔ ɛkɛ te bworŋa woonɛ bworŋa tɛyan. Ɔci eññɛ joŋnɛ koolji. Gena kola wɔrŋɛ Yuocip poom konɛtiy. Men gɛɛl jogɛ ma kola neeniti men bɛɛ.
Oŋŋa neeniyɛ, a Oŋŋa Yɔŋki Ma Waako. Oŋ Cabit cɔɔllin doki oŋ tɛɛna wannati.

Ɔci maka moong daŋkun, maka bɛɛn iki ɛkɛ te bana tolan ban Jaliilyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ati booti Yuocip ŋoyɛti ne cwakanti, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔrcin ne kool baali wɛnɛy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔṭi ne ɛkɛ warɛ ḍuackiti ma jiju a ɔkiy.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn dɔɔkkin baanji, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala yɔŋi eelan a ḍuobji ɔci eelan labi ma te ñɔɔn aŋka eelan oltan Yaccu warɛti koolji. Ɔci te Oŋ Cabityɛ, ɛkkɛn wowwin ba jyek ganuun.
Ɔci te liidɔ parɛ te tinnɔ ne Oŋ Cabit noŋi bɛɛdi borayɛ, ɔci ne Oŋ Juaŋ cɔɔlniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ati kool wyeñɛti eci elin ywaŋɛ ɛkkɛn neeni.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn guonan mɔkci niin ɔntɔ te kool tukɛti.
Yeti ne ɛkkɛn kaacki jiju kooljiyɛ, ɛkkɛn war Ciɛggɔn Yaccu mɔkci bɛɛ.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn buaññi. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki poŋki te jyek naŋka neeni menyɛ, maka ‘uay bɛɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, bala ba malɛɛkan ɔci yɔɔtcin ɛkkɛn toŋkɛnti. Bworŋin ɛkkɛn galla gallo.
Ɔci moong buañi, ɔci ɛkkɛn ñomgɛn tɔcci iñɔ ṭɛɛrji. Ɔci malɛɛkan neeniyɛ, gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ Yaccu mena tɛɛti neeni non maka tuutan wɛnni ogo?
Gɔṭṭɛ, ɛkɛ bala wɛnni moki bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ ñiektɛ te jwalla ɛkkɛ myennɛ ɛkɛ ne ɛkɛ baali te ban Jaliilji meny.
Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, ‘‘Ya Kaci Ma Baanyɛ, ‘ya ‘wonta ma maka nɔɔtk byeŋkɛnti. Ɔci ‘ya ŋaapta ma, ɔci te ninna akti ḍoogɔyɛ, ‘ya jɔlla ñaalɔ tɛɛt moki.’ ”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn poŋjin te jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn yoṭṭin te kool wyeñɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn Maka A Inyaakkɛn Wilin Ne Cyɛɛlɔ neeni nɔɔtkɛ, ɔci maka pookɛn moki nɔɔtkɛ waakɛnda.
Gena Moryam Magdalin ɔci Jɔwaana ɔci Moryam mɛy Yaakubn, ɔci moonga pookɛn moonga bala iki ɛkkɛn daŋkuny. Gena ɛkkɛn Cuudan Yaccu nɔɔtkɛ te jyeka neeniy.
Yeti Cuudan Yaccu jyeti jyek ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi jyek moong neeniyɛ, a jyeka budan.

Yeti Butruc jɔŋŋin ɔci yiŋi kool wyeñɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ ḍwoñjin liercin jiju, ɔci ɛkɛ bworŋin poorki ma war Yaccu aŋka mɔŋnɛ niini pookɛn budan. Ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ ati baanji oŋo. Ɔci ɛkɛ konɛ buañi noon te waka yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ neeni.

Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, maka laldɛ Yaccu gɛɛg ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ooddi baan gɛɛlti bana yenti Ɛmeeyac. Ban Ɛmeeyac neeniyɛ, looncin te ban Urcaliimti ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ, ba wɔɔkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔɔn.
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki atki pɔɔjɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin te naŋka bɛɛn bora waakɛnda neeni.
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki gɔɔki a ɔɔnyɛ, te wɛnni Yaccu waanɛ bɛɛn oṭṭinti bala ati i ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ.
Ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ yuarcɛ ne baali atkɛ i ɛkkɛn ɔɔn, yeti ɛkkɛn ṭuoŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ñingɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ ñiyɛ bɛɛ.
Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Ɛkkɛ mung ɔɔn, ɛkkɛ jyeyɛ te jyek waaka yomɔ ɔɔn?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn yɔɔni ɔci ɛkkɛn yuarnɛ Yaccu ne ɛkkɛn ñingɛn akki cungin te yom yoñy.
Ɔci men gɛɛl ɛkkɛnti ne cyɛɛlɔ mena yenti Kliyopac, ɛkɛ ṭwokcin Yaccuti agi, “Hay! I bɛɛni ban Urcaliim a wɛli aŋka naŋka bɛɛn bora neeni kwoyi i nɛ?”

Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Naŋka bɛ?” Ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Gena naŋki Yaccu, men ma Najarɛt mena a bɔway. Ɛkɛ bala loṭi ma ne pwadan, ɔci noŋi naŋka tɛyan. Ɛkɛ pwad pwad Juaŋti ɔci mati waakɛnda.
Yeti gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci ma ɔɔn maka ḍwaŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ ‘woñgi ma byeŋkɛnti. Ɔci jiek olji ma Yaccu wyeñɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ ŋaapci ma ñaalɔ doki.
Yeti ɔɔn balgɔn poŋɔn ka ‘wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ma Icrayiil pɔktɛ ḍɔɔggɛnti te cyɛgji maka pookɛn neeni. Ɔci gɔṭṭi moki, gena ninna akki ne ḍoogɔ te wona naŋka guagdɔn ɔɔn neeni bɛɛniy!
Ɔci moki, ɔɔn korkɔ buañi noon acaan te liid ṭɔɔl ḍiɛranyɛ, moong ma ɔɔn, gɛɛg ati kool wyeñɛti,

yeti war ɛkɛ mɔkci ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn dɔɔkkin, ɔci ɔɔn myetkɔn te jyeka neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi malɛɛkan gɛɛg waakcin lɛɛlnɛ bora ɛkkɛnti, ɔci malɛɛkan neeniyɛ, gɔki ɛkkɛnti agi Yaccu baalɔ tɛɛtɔ katan moki.
Ɔci maka balgin iki ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg ati kool wyeñɛti daŋkun, ɔci kool mɔkci konɛ budan awarɛ ba jyeka guagɛ maka moong neeni ɔɔn!”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Ɛkkɛ a maka aamman, wyetkɔ baawo! Ba ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyeka guagɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan waakɛnda neeni bɛ?
Naŋka neeni yɔmjin doki acaan Kiṭɔ taabdi te waka neeni waakɛnda ɛkɛ oŋ kaatti non pwani ɛkɛ bɛɛ?”
Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn jɔɔnnɛ lwoŋnɛ jyeka guaŋŋɛ Muuca te ɛkɛy, ɔci te jyek bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan waakɛnda, te jyeka kiiwɛ ma te jyek naŋki ɛkɛy.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn cɔɔllinti baan tɛyɛti doki, bana ottan ɛkkɛn neeni. Ɔci Yaccu noŋi ba ne ɛkɛ ooddi ‘yeetti bora ñamu ɔɔn.
Yeti ɛkkɛn bala poṭi ɛkɛ warɛ agi, “Dala ikin nintin iki ɔɔn wɛnni hay! Acaan oŋ waŋɛ noŋi luutti iñɔ doki. Noon noŋi ula.” Ɔci ɛkɛ yeddin iki ɛkkɛn doki.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ baali cieki i ɛkkɛn nona amtiyɛ, ɛkɛ byentan luullɛ, ɔci gɔkcin a pwatcin Juaŋti. Ɔci ɛkɛ byentan wɛɛnnɛ jitin, ɔci ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ mako.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn pɔŋnɛ Yaccu ñingɛnti moki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ ñiyɛ moki. Yeti ne pɛñan Yaccu baaw wiin te nona ɛkkɛnti neeni.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin pookɛn agi, “Wala yuarnɛ ba! Ne ɛkɛ baali gɔki ikinti yomu nona lwowwin ikin te jyek Juaŋ jitkɛnyɛ, ikin yomgɔ kuumi te yom ñɔɔn ɔci waakɔ jimma a jimi bɛɛ?”

Ɔci te oŋ waŋɛ wannati, ɛkkɛn jɔŋŋin ne pɛñan, ɔci ati dɔɔki ban Urcaliim. Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu A Inyaakkɛn Wilin Ne Cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, mɔŋji ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ nona ne cyɛɛlɔ iki maka pookɛn maka bala iki ɛkkɛn oŋkanday. Ɔci maka mɔŋji ɛkkɛn neeni gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi,
“Ciɛggɔn ikin jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ awarɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora Butructi!”
Ɔci ‘uaya ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni daŋkun maka neeni myetkɛ daŋkun te naŋka naŋɛ ɛkkɛn pɔɔjɔy, ɔci ne Yaccu ŋeeckiti ɛkkɛn ne ɛkɛ byentan wɛɛnnɛ jitiny.
Ɔci ne maka neeni balki gɔkki te jyeka neeni menyɛ, Yaccu waanɛ bɛɛn ɔci yɔɔtcin nona maka laldɛ ɛkɛti, ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan.”
Yeti ɛkkɛn yomgɛn buañi ne tolan, ɔci bala poŋi yomgɛnti agi, “Hay! A gena bɛɛn ikinti neeniy, ɛkɛ a ‘yeeññan kaapun!”
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ korkɔ buayi noon ogo? Ɔci yomgɔ ŋoodan a ɔɔn ogo?
Gɔṭṭɛ ‘ya byeŋku ɔci gɔṭṭɛ ‘ya ciegu! Gena ‘ya waanu jiñɛ nɛ. Toptɛ ‘yati, pottɛ gɔrtɛ! ‘Yeeññan balki yoŋi ɔci owi ba ‘ya ɔŋŋi boki? A’a!”
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔki a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ma lɛɛrnɛ byeŋkɛ ɔci ciegɛ.

Yeti ɛkkɛn jyeti men bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn kuumi te yom ñɔɔn ɔci bala poŋi jiek yomgɛnti men agi, “Naŋka pwadin neeniyɛ, gena ɛkɛ waanɛ neeni boki?” Ɔci Yaccu oŋ tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ balkɛ genga wɛnni amdi ‘ya boki?”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ wɛtkɛ ŋwotkɛ yeñña piɛlgɔn.
Ɔci ɛkɛ yeñi luullɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ omjin te ɛkkɛn ñomgɛnti ɔɔn.

Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛ A Inyaakkɛn Wilin ne Cyɛɛlɔti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ poca, ne ‘ya balgin iki ɛkkɛ menyɛ, ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te naŋka bɛɛn ‘yati neeni waakɛnda. ‘Ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti ka jyeka kiinɛ Muuca te ‘ya worga ganuuntiyɛ, ɔci jyeka kiiwɛ bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te ‘ya, ɔci jyeka kiiwɛ ma te ‘ya worga Ɔɔlgtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn bɛya bora waakɛnda awarɛ.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn pɔŋnɛ jyetkɛnti aŋka ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jiek jitkɛn jyeka a kiigin neeni.
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jyeka kiigin gɔki te Kiṭɔ agi ɛkta taabdɔ ɔci tuudɔ, ɔci ne nink bɛɛdi bora ne ḍoogɔyɛ, agi ɛkta jɔŋdɔ ñaalɔ te lienti moki.
Ɔci agi dala ma ooddɔ baan wardanda, ɔci ma laldi ma te yenti ɛkta agi kan ma waakɛn yali te nɔji ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ doki. Agi dala ma ooddɔ maka ban Urcaliim laldi ñamu.
Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka naŋka neeni yuarɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ma myetti te naŋka yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ waakɛnda neeni.
Ɔci gɔṭṭɛ, Boŋa guaŋŋɛ Wey ɔɔn agi ɛkkɛ ‘woñji ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ cuoñña ‘ya ɛkkɛti. Yeti dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te ban Urcaliimji wɛnni ne ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ te ñaalɔ pɔliji ɔɔn.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ ɛkkɛn wɛɛññɛ ne ban Bɛtani ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ byeŋkɛ loonɛ ñaalɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala naŋka pwadan bala ɛkkɛti.”
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni ɛkkɛnti a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ñaalɔ pɔliji oŋo.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn morcin ɛkɛti ɔci dɔɔki ban Urcaliim, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala oŋkanda on Juaŋ ona tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala jieyi Jwaŋa Tolan.
Te ñamu Jwali bala. Ɔci Jwali bala i Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci Jwali a Jwaŋa Tolan.
Jwalla neeni bala ñamu i Jwaŋa Tolan.
Waak cɔnnɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda. Gena ne cyɛɛlɔ gɛɛl cɔnnɛ menga bɛɛ.
Tɛɛtin bɛɛn te ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena dɛki ma baano.
Ɔci nona miel dyɛgdɛ mena dɛki neeni acaan nona miel mena dɛki buannɛ bɛɛ.
Mena ‘uan cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan yenti Yɔhanna.
Yɔhanna bɛɛn aŋka mieti ma. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn mieti ma te mena dɛki aŋka ma waakɛnda jyeddi mena dɛkiti te jyeka myennɛ ɛkɛ may.
Yɔhanna, ɛkɛ a mena dɛki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn aŋka mieti ma te mena dɛki.
Mena dɛki ma awarɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena dɛki ma waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ bala bɛya ma baanti.
Baan warda cɔnnɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yeti ne bɛɛni ma baantiyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiyi ma ka gena ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ.
Ɛkɛ bɛɛn iñɔ baanji ban ɛkɛ, yeti ma ɛkɛ kɛkkin te ɛkɛ.
Yeti maka buagɔn ɛkɛ ɔci jyeti ɛkɛti te yenti ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn aŋi kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan.
Ɛkkɛn jiedi ma ba jiedi ma baan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jiedi ma ba naŋki maka ‘uay bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jiennɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.

Ɔci Jwali aŋi mena baano, ɔci ɛkɛ ciyin iki ikin a cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkɛ yuarŋin ikin ɛkɛ pwanna pwanno. Ɛkɛ pwanna pwani bala ba kacca jiennɛ weegɛn nɔɔti ne cyɛɛlɔ. Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwad pwad ɛkɛti, ɔci yom ɛkɛ gɔki awarɛ.
Yɔhanna bala mieti ma te ɛkɛ, ɔci gɔki ne pɛñan agi, “Mena neeni a mena guaŋi ‘ya ka ‘Ɛkɛ bala bɛya ‘ya ŋoyuti, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena tolan te ‘ya, acaan ne ‘ya jiennata mɛy ɔɔn men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ doki bala.’ ”
Jwaŋa Tolan yom pwani ‘uonnɛti ikinti, ɔci ikin ‘uottinti ɛkɛ moki.
Jyeka buagiti Jwaŋa Tolan agi da ma noŋdiyɛ, oonɛ Muuca. Oŋ yeti yom pwani ɔci jyeka awarɛ bɛɛn te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Menga Jwaŋa Tolan yuarŋɛ oŋgati bɛɛ. Gena kacca jiennɛ ɛkɛ nɔɔti ne cyɛɛlɔ mena ciyi ñoowi i Weegɛn a ñoowin, gena ɛkɛ ma nɔɔnnɛ te Weegɛn aŋka Weegɛn ŋeeckiti ma neeni.
Maka gaciicin ma Icrayiil ɔci ma Laawi cuuñɛ ma Icrayiil te ban Urcaliim, cuuñɛ ɛkkɛn Yɔhannati aŋka ɛkkɛn tootti ɛkɛti agi, “I a menɛ?”
Yɔhanna, ɛkɛ poccin menga diennɛ ñin bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi ɛkɛ agji Kiṭɔ bɛɛ.
Ɔci ma tooccin ɛkɛti gɔkcin agi, “Oŋ i ag menɛ yeti? I a Iliiya?” Ɔci Yɔhanna kɛkcin gɔkcin agi, “A’a.” Ɔci ma gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I a Bɔwa?” Ɔci ɛkɛ kɛkcin gɔkcin agi, “A’a.”
Ɔci ma gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Oŋ i a menɛ? Ɔɔn myettɔn aŋka ɔɔn ooddɔn maka ɔɔn cuoñkɔn myettɔn. I gɔk i a menɛ?”
Yɔhanna gɔkcin agi, “Bala ba jwalla guaŋŋɛ Icaaya mena bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan agi, ‘‘Ya a pwan mena yaadan wɔɔŋji agi, dala pɔy Ciɛggɔn ywaŋdɛ nina a tyɛlga.’”
Maka cuuñɛ ma Yɔhannati neeniyɛ, ma gɛɛg a ma Pɛriciin.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin Yɔhannati ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Kan i a Kiṭɔ bɛɛ, ɔci kan i a Iliiya bɛɛ, ɔci kan i a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ, oŋ i buor ma pietin ogo?”
Ɔci Yɔhanna gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya buor ma pietin, yeti mena kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ bala yɔdgi iki ɛkkɛ,
ɛkɛ a mena bɛya ‘ya ŋoyuti. ‘Ya baal ba wɛyi ɛkɛ looda ‘ya bora bɛɛ. ‘Ya buanna ɛkɛ ñyɛrcin bɛɛ.”
Ɔci naŋka neeni naŋi ma ban Bɛtani kuocɔ Tol Urdun ŋoyɛti nona buoṭi Yɔhanna may.
Ɔci ne liidɔ Yaccu bɛɛni, ɔci ne Yɔhanna gɔrni Yaccu baali bɛɛdi ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Gɔrtɛ, Kalŋ Šɔɔlɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɛkɛ nɔji ma baan eedɛ ɔntɔ!
Mena neeni a mena guaŋi ‘ya ka ɛkɛ bala bɛya ‘ya ŋoyuti. Ɔci ɛkɛ tolcin te ‘ya, acaan ne ‘ya jiennata mɛy ɔɔn men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ doki bala.
Ɔci ɛkɛ ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ. ‘Ya yeti bɛɛn buor ma te pieg aŋka Yaccu ŋeettiti ma Icrayiil.”
Ɔci Yɔhanna mieti ma ɔci gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya gɔrcan Booŋ peewin te ñaalɔ bala ba boom ɔci cooccin ɛkɛti.
Ɔci ɛkɛ ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ. Yeti mena ‘ya cuonna buor ma te piegyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka gɔkkin ‘yati agi, ‘Mena yuarca i Booŋ peedi ɛkɛti ɔci cootti ɛkɛtiyɛ, gena ɛkɛ a mena buoṭi ma te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolany.’
Ɔci ‘ya ɛkɛ yuarŋo, ɔci ‘ya ma myetkan ka mena neeni a Kaci Juaŋo.”
Ɔci ne liidɔ Yɔhanna bala yɔdi i maka laldɛ ɛkɛ ne yyɛɛwɔ.
Ɔci Yaccu bala ati a woon, ɔci Yɔhanna bala gɔṭi Yaccu ne ɛkɛ ati a woony, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin mati agi, “Gɔrtɛ, Kalŋ Šɔɔlɛ Jwaŋa Tolan!”
Ɔci maka laldɛ Yɔhanna ne yyɛɛwɔ tieŋŋin jyek ɛkɛ ɔci bootcin Yaccuti.

Ɔci Yaccu warɛ yallɛ ɔci gɔrcin ŋoyɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ ma yuarnɛ bala booti ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ waaka?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Rabbi, ba bana ciyi i bɛ?” (Rabbi te tuk Mabaan agi “Mena loṭi may.”)
Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Bɛɛdɛ gɔrtɛ.” Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati ɔci gɔrcin nona ciyi ɛkiy. Oŋ waŋɛ noŋi utti doki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati ɔci bala ciyi i Yaccu oŋŋa wannati.
Maka tieŋŋin jyek Yɔhanna ɔci bootcin Yaccutiyɛ, mena ne cyɛɛlɔ gɛɛl yenti Andarawuc. Ɛkɛ a mod Butrucn. Yenti Butruc yenta parɛ yenti Cimaan te tuk Ma Icrayiil
Andarawuc ati ɔci mod ɛkkɛn Butruc yuarŋɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kiṭɔ yuarŋɔn ɔɔn.” (Kiṭɔ te jyek Mabaan a “Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Boray”.)

Ɔci Butruc oonɛ Andarawuc mod ɛkkɛn Yaccuti. Yaccu gɔrcin ɛkɛti ɔci gɔkcin agi, “I a Cimaan kaci Yɔhanna? Ne baaṭi i barti ma a ‘Cipac’.” (Cipac ɔci Butruc ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ, te jyek Mabaan ma boṭi a ‘Poomo’.)
Ɔci ne liidɔ Yaccu buagɔn ooddi ban Jaliil. Ɔci ɛkɛ Pilibuc yuarŋɛ. Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Bɛɛd, ‘ya boottaŋɔ.”
Pilibuc bɛɛn te ban Bɛtceeyida. Bana neeni a ban Andarawucn i Butrucn.
Pilibuc Nataanyal yuarŋɛ, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena kiinɛ Muuca ɔci mena kiiwɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan yuarŋɔn ɔɔn. Gena Yaccu men ma Najarɛt, kaci Yuocip.”
Ɔci Nataanyal gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay! Gena pwadan gɛɛl boki bɛya te ban Najarɛtti boki?” Pilibuc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Bɛɛd, gɔrca.”
Ne Yaccu Nataanyal yuartɛ baali bɛɛdi ɛkɛtiyɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Gɔrtɛ, gena men ma Icrayiil waanɛ neeni. Labji bala ɛkɛ yomɛti bɛɛ.”
Nataanyal gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I ‘ya ŋeeja te aŋɛ?” Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Pilibuc ne borni iti men bɛɛyɛ, i yuarŋin ‘ya ŋuami ŋwayɛti doki.”
Nataanyal gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, i a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan. I a Ciɛggɔn Tolan ma Icrayiil.”
Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I jyetti ‘yati te jwalla guaŋi ‘ya ka i yuarŋin ‘ya ŋuami ŋwayɛti nɛ? Naŋka neeni ḍiɛṭ ḍyɛro. Naŋka tɛyan yuara i ne baaṭi.”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti ‘wota agi, “Tieŋŋa, ‘ya gɔkka iti, ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ pɔli tukɛ pɔktɛ, ɔci malɛɛkan kaatti ñaalɔ ɔci koodi iñɔ ‘ya Kaci Ma Baanti.”
Ɔci ne nink ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛki bora te oŋŋa akki ne ḍoogɔyɛ, ma ḍɛɛwwin ban Kɛna ban Jaliilji. Mɛy Yaccun bala aŋan.
Ɔci Yaccu borki ma daŋkun i maka laldɛ ɛkɛ agi bɛɛdɔ nonta ḍɛɛki may.
Ɔci ne mooy luutkin ḍaakkiti mayɛ, mɛy Yaccun gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mooy bawwin mati.”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mɛy ɔɔn, i tooc ‘yati a ɔɔn ogo? Oŋ ‘ya bɛɛn men bɛɛ.”
Mɛy Yaccun gɔkcin ma kanŋati agi, “Gena guagdɛ ɛkɛyɛ, dala naŋdɛ.”
Kuppan pomk bala yɔdi a dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ. Kuppan neeni yuotki ma pyega lɔkki ma Icrayiil ba naŋki ɛkkɛn. (Kuppa ne cyɛɛlɔ eci capiiyan tuggɛn ne ŋaanɔ walla ne dɔɔyɔ.)
Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kuppan kuomdɛ te piego.” Ɔci kuppan kuomgɛ ma te pieg lɛkɛn bawwin.
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Šyebdɛ acca, eektɛ mena gɔṭi oomdin mena tolan.” Ɔci gɛɛg eyi ma ɛkɛti.
Ɔci mena tolan neeni dɛccin piego, ɔci pieg waakɛn aagɛ aŋi mooy luutkin doki. Ɔci naŋka neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛ, yeti ŋeeckɔn gena maka ṭyepi piego. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ borcin mena ḍɛñi ɛɛŋtiy,

ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Oŋkanda ma pyega milin eektan ma ñamu aŋka maattan ma ñamu, ɔci ne ɛkkɛn korkɛn yoŋtiyɛ, ɔci pyega polan ootan ma moki. Yeti i pyega milin dolniyɔ ŋoyɔ aŋka maattan ma ne ŋoyɔ ogo?”
Naŋka tɛyan naŋka juannɛ Yaccu ñamu naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛyɛ, gena akta ɛkɛ pieg aaŋŋɛyɔ akki mooy luutkin ban Kɛna ban Jaliiljiy. Ɔci maka laldɛ ɛkɛ jyeti ɛkɛti.
Ɔci ne naŋka neeni baaniyɛ, Yaccu ati ban Kapɛrnyam. Ɛkɛ ati iki mɛɛgɛn ɔci modgɛn ɔci maka laldɛ ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ciyi aŋan lakun.
Ɔci oŋ iid ma Icrayiil cɔɔllin doki. Iid neeni gena Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋo. Ɔci Yaccu ati ban Urcaliim.
Ɔci maka wɛɛṭi dok ɔci kulin ɔci boobg yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ kañ on Juaŋ ona Tolanti, ɔci maka ḍoṭi girin bala ciyi tarabɛɛcan ɛkkɛnti on Juaŋ ona tolan daŋkun.

Ɔci Yaccu wyeng naŋŋɛ ba woonti ɔɔn, ɔci maka neeni ŋualnɛ ɛkɛ bora te kañ on Juaŋ ona Tolanti. Ɔci dok ɔci kulin, ɛkkɛn ŋualnɛ bora Yaccu waakɛnda. Ɔci ɛkɛ tarabɛɛcan ḍorki ma girin neeniyɛ, jitkɛn baamnɛ iñɔ.
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka wɛɛṭi boobgti agi, “Waka neeni eedɛ bora. Naa ɛkkɛ kañ on Wey ɔɔn naŋdɛ a ona wɛɛrki ma waak bɛɛ!”
Maka laldɛ ɛkɛ ñingɛn ñieki te jyeka kiigin agi, “‘Ya waru byerŋa byerŋ te kanŋa On i.”
Ɔci ma Icrayiil ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Naŋka neeni bɛɛn te aŋɛ? Ɔɔn myettɔn aŋka ɔɔn yomgɔ ñiektɔn naŋka neeni bɛɛn te iti, walla bɛɛn te mengati.”
Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ ona neeni laagdiyɔ ɔci ne ninka ne ḍoogɔ baatiyɛ, ‘ya on ywaŋdiyɔ.”
Ɔci ma Icrayiil gɔkcin agi, “Hay! Ona neeni ma cɔti yuong a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ (46), ɔci i on ywaŋayɔ lakun nink ne ḍoogɔ doki?”
Yeti ne Yaccu gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ona guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ wannayɛ, a on waanɛ bɛɛ gena war ɛkɛ guaŋŋɛ a on wanna.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ jɔlni ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti mokiyɛ, maka laldɛ Yaccu ñingɛn ñieki te jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu. Ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeti jyeka kiigin ɔci jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni.
Ɔci Yaccu bala ban Urcaliim iidti, ɔci iid neeni ma gɔṭi Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi a Gorŋo. Ɔci maka coŋin ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki naŋka tɛyan naŋŋɛ Yaccu, naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeti ɛkɛti.
Yeti Yaccu yomɛ ḍuannɛti ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ, acaan yomg ma baan ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ doki waakɛnda.
Ɔci Yaccu buagɔn menga ɛkɛ myettɛ te naŋki ma baan bɛɛ, acaan yomg ma baan ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ doki.
’Wan ma Pɛriciin bala yenti Nikɔdiimac. Ɛkɛ a mena tolan ban ma Icrayiil.

’Wana neeni bɛɛn Yaccuti te weenji ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi ma, ŋeejɔn ɔɔn i a mena loṭi ma, ɔci i bɛɛni te ñaalɔ Jwaŋa Tolanti. Kan Jwaŋa Tolan baaw mentiyɛ, menga yaakinti ba naŋka naŋŋi i ñyecki ma i neeni bɛɛ.”
Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Tieŋŋa, ‘ya gɔkka iti, maka jiettan ma oŋkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan yuartan bɛɛ.”
Nikɔdiimac gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ma jiettan ma a ɔki ne aŋi donk doki ɔɔn? Wɔtti mɛyyɛn korkɛnti moki aŋka jiettan mɛyyɛn oŋɔ?”
Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Tieŋŋa, ‘ya gɔkka iti, kan mena jiettan ma te pieg bɛɛyɛ, ɔci jiettan ma te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti ooddi non cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.
Mena jiettan mayɛ, ɛkɛ a men baano, yeti mena jieddɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a naŋki Boŋ Juaŋo.
Naa i podi te jwalla guaŋi ‘ya ka i jietti ma oŋki ne yyɛɛwɔ wanna bɛɛ.

Jwami yooŋdi nona ɛkɛ buagi, ɔci i tieŋja gena joon ɛkɛ budan, yeti nona bɛɛnɛ ɛkɛ ŋeej i bɛɛ, ɔci nona ooddi ɛkɛ moki kwoy i. Jyeka neeni bala ba jyek Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɛkɛ kanŋan a ɔɔn daŋkun maka jyeti Juaŋti waakɛnda.”
Nikɔdiimac gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Naŋka neeni bala a ɔki yeti?”
Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “I a mena loṭi ma Icrayiil ɔci i dɔki jyeka neeni kwoy i?
Tieŋŋa, ‘ya gɔkka iti awarɛ, ɔɔn gɔkɔn te jyeka ŋeejɔn ɔɔn, ɔci ɔɔn ma myettɔn te waka yuarŋɔn ɔɔn. Yeti ɛkkɛ yookɛ te jyeka mietɔn ɔɔn neeni.
Kan ɛkkɛ myettin te waka ṭɛɛrji iñɔ ɔci ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ bɛɛy, oŋ kan ɛkkɛ myettin te waka ñaalɔ pɔliji ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ a ɔki?
Men gɛɛl kaaccin te ñamu pɔliji bɛɛ. Gena mena kooyin te ñaalɔ pɔliji parɛ. Gena ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ‘ya aŋka kaacca ñaalɔ pɔlijiy.
“Ɔci ba naŋka naŋŋɛ Muuca te baaṭiyɛ, ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ŋaapta ma ñaalɔ ba kaŋa ŋaamnɛ Muuca ñaalɔ wɔɔŋji
aŋka maka jyeddi ‘yatiyɛ, ɛkkɛn baltan tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛy.
“Jwaŋa Tolan ani ma baan waakɛnda ne pɛñan. Kacca jiennɛ ɛkɛ nɔɔti ne cyɛɛlɔ ‘wonnɛ mako, aŋka maka jyeddi ɛkɛti tuwa oŋgati moki bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn tɛɛtti yuonginda.
Kaci cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan noŋi ywobji mati bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn iñɔ aŋka ma yɔɔdɛ ɛkɛ.
“Mena jyeddi ɛkɛtiyɛ, ywobji bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ, yeti mena jyeddi ɛkɛti bɛɛyɛ, ywobji bala ɛkɛti doki, acaan ɛkɛ jyeti yenti Kacca jiennɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni bɛɛ.
Ywobji bɛɛn mati acaan mena dɛki bɛɛn iñɔ baanji, yeti ma ani ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Ma ani nona miel acaan naŋki ɛkkɛn a nɔjjo.
Maka noŋi nɔji neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn nona dɛki bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛya nona dɛkiti bɛɛ acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn nɔji ɛkkɛn lɛɛltan bora bɛɛ.
Yeti mena noŋi naŋka awarɛyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka bɛya nona dɛkiti aŋka ma gɔrti naŋki ɛkɛ a naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan.”
Ɔci ne naŋka neeni baaniyɛ, Yaccu ati ban Yahuudiya iki maka laldɛ ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ciyi aŋan i maka laldɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bala buoṭi ma pietin.
Ɔci Yɔhanna daŋkun bala buoṭi ma pietin ban Enɔn. Ban Enɔn neeni cualcinti ban Celimti. Ɔci pieg bala coŋɔ aŋan. Ɔci ma bɛɛn Yɔhannati ɔci ɛkkɛn buulnɛ ɛkɛ pietin.
(Yɔhanna olji ma ciginji men bɛɛ.)
Ɔci maka laldɛ Yɔhanna i mena parɛ men ma Icrayiil, ɛkkɛn bala toyi yɔtin te jyek lɔɔŋ ba ganuun ma Icrayiil.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛɛn Yɔhannati ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “mena loṭi may, mena balgi iki i Tol Urdun ŋoyɛti, mena i ma myenni te ɛkɛ wannayɛ, ɛkɛ bala buoṭi ma daŋkun, ɔci ma waakɛnda bala ooddi ɛkɛti.”
Ɔci Yɔhanna gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Menga balki genga iñɔ wɛnni bɛɛ. Gena Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ ma ‘wonnɛ waaky.
Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek ‘ya doki ka ‘ya a Kiṭɔ bɛɛ. ‘Ya yeti cuonna Jwaŋa Tolan ñamu ne Yaccu men baawiy.
Mena ḍɛñi ɛɛŋyɛ, gena ɛkɛ balki ñooniy. Yeti mug ɛkkɛn bala bora, ɔci ne ɛkɛ tieŋdi pwan mug ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. Ɔci ba jyeka neeniyɛ, ‘ya daŋkun yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan.
Dala Yaccu tola, ɔci dala ‘ya aŋka ḍyɛrdo.”
“Mena bɛya te ñaalɔyɛ, ɛkɛ tolcin te ma waakɛnda. Maka bɛya te iñɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka a maka iñɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki te jyek maka iñɔ. Mena bɛya te pɔlijiyɛ, ɛkɛ tolcin te ma waakɛnda.
Ɔci ɛkɛ mieti ma te waka yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ ɔci te jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkɛ. Yeti menga jyeti jyeka ma myennɛ ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ.
Yeti kan mena jyeddi jyek ɛkɛtiyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ jyek Jwaŋa Tolan a jyeka awarɛ.
Mena cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ jyek Jwaŋa Tolan daldɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔki ɛkkɛn oŋkanda ɔɔn, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan ‘woñi ɛkɛ te Booŋ pɔɔdɛ a pɔɔd bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ‘woñi oŋkanda ɔɔn.
Weegɛn ani Kaci ɛkɛ ɔci waak waakɛnda ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ bieŋɛti.
Kan mena jyeddi Kacitiyɛ, ɛkɛ ciyi uda yuonginda ɔɔn. Yeti kan mena yookɔn warɛ te jyeni Kacitiyɛ, tɛɛtin bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Loñk Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka bala ɛkɛti oŋkanda ɔɔn.”
Ma Pɛriciin tieŋŋin agi maka buulda Yaccu coŋgɔ te maka buulda Yɔhannay.
(Yeti gena Yaccu buoṭi ma neeni bɛɛ. Gena maka laldɛ ɛkɛ aŋka buoṭi ma neeni.)
Ɔci ne Yaccu tieŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ uunnɛ te ban Yahuudiya ɔci ati dɔɔki ban Jaliil.
Ɔci ban Camɛɛrya bala yomɔ.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛnni ban Camɛɛryayɛ, ɛkɛ ɔŋi baan gɛɛl bala aŋan yenti Caykar. Ɔci bana neeni cualcinti te non Yaakub nona ‘wonnɛ kaci ɛkɛ Yuocip.
Ɔci jin Yaakub bala aŋan. Ɔci Yaccu taabbin te woon ɔci cooccin jiin ḍwaŋɛti. Oŋ waŋɛ bala yɔɔd yeccu.
