“Ɔci aŋanyɛ, mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala yenti Ananaayac. Ananaayac neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ bala Juaŋti ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋi ba ganuun Muuca waakɛnda. Ɔci ma Icrayiil maka bala ciyi ban ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda gɔki agi ɛkta pwadɔ katan.
Ɔci ɛkɛ bɛɛn ‘yati ɔci yɔɔtcin ‘ya taaŋuti ɔci gɔkkin ‘yati agi, ‘Mod ɔɔn Caawul, dala i yaaktiti gwali noon moki.’ Ɔci ne pɛñan ‘ya yaaŋnati gwali doki, ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan ɛkɛti.

“Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkkin ‘yati agi ‘ya kɛnnata Jwaŋ yɔrg ikin bora a kɛññin, agi Juaŋ buagda ‘ya nɔɔttata te naŋka ɛkta buagday. Agi ‘ya kɛnnata Juaŋ bora, aŋka ‘ya gɔrcɔ Yaccu Mena Pwadɔ neeni, ɔci ‘ya tieŋjɔ ɛkta gɔktɔ ‘yati
agi ‘ya kɛnnata Juaŋ bora a ɔɔn aŋka ‘ya naŋdata ɛkta agjɔ mena nɔɔtɔ ma waakcinda te jyek ɛkta te naŋka yuarnjɛji ‘yay, ɔci te jyeka tieŋji ‘ya daŋkuny,
ɔci agi acca ‘ya kwaccɔ ogo? Dala ‘ya jɔŋjɔ ñaalɔ dala ‘ya buldata ma, agi dala ‘ya cɔkcɔ Yaccuti te yenti ɛkta aŋka nɔji ‘ya luakta ɛkta ɔntɔy.
“Ɔci ‘ya dɔɔkkan ban Urcaliim. Ɔci oŋ gɛɛlti ne ‘ya baala cɔka Juaŋti orɔ on Juaŋ ona tolanyɛ,
’ya Ciɛggɔn yuarŋo, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki ‘yati agi dala ‘ya jɔŋjɔ ne pɛñan te ban Urcaliimti wɛnni, dala ‘ya ɔgjɔ ootcɔ bana pardanti, acaan ma yookɛ waakcin te jyeka lorci ‘ya ma a jyek ɛkɛy.
“Ɔci ‘ya gɔkcan ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ciɛggɔn, ɛkkɛn jyeka neeni ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn waakɛnda doki ne ‘ya baala muowa maka jyeti jyek iti, ɔci ne ɛkkɛn eeda ‘ya ḍuatta ciginji ɔci ḍuatiti may.
Ɔci ne ma balki nokki Ictipanuc mena mieti ma te jyek iyɛ, ‘ya baal yɔɔd nona nokki ma ɛkɛ gɔr bworŋin maka nokkin ɛkɛ neeni. Ɔci ‘ya baal poŋ gɔk ka naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn neeni pwad pwado.’
“Ɔci Ciɛggɔn gɔkkin ‘yati moki agi, ‘Jɔŋŋa, ɔgdi ootta, ‘ya i cundin bana loonan Keedin Pookɛnti.’ ”

Ɔci ma bala tyeŋi jyeka guagdi Buuluc neeni, yeti ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni agi Ciɛggɔn Yaccu gɔki agi ɛkɛ ootcɛ bana loonɔ Keedin Pookcɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn looñi ne pɛñan, ɔci yaajjin ne tolan agi, “Dala mena gɔki a ɔŋŋi neeniyɛ, baadi. Kan ɛkɛ kwaci coodi ɔɔn pwatcin bɛɛ, yaayɛ. Dala ɛkɛ baadi!”
Ɔci ma yomgɛn yeyɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala yaadan, ɔci bworŋin ɛkkɛn yiɛpcɛ ɔntɔ, ɔci ṭɛɛr moki nwamtan gɔ pwokcin ñaalɔ ɔɔn.

Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki noŋki a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan gɔkcin ackanti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ mena neeni eedɛ orɔ ɔci ḍuadɛ.” Ne ḍuaŋa tolan gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn aŋka Buuluc gɔkti ne pwadan aŋka ɛkɛ gɔrti jyeka yaatki ma te Buuluc neeni bala a ɔki.

Ɔci ackan Buuluc ḍɛɛgɛ acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn ḍwayi ɛkɛ. Ɔci ḍuaŋa bala yɔɔd nona ḍɛɛki ma Buuluc. Ɔci Buuluc gɔkcin ḍuaŋati agi, “Ma Ḍɔɔm ma ḍwayi ɛkkɛn boki? Kan mena godan ɛkɛ baaw men, ma yaakinti ɛkɛ ḍuatan boki?”

Ɔci ne ḍuaŋa tieŋni jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ḍuaŋa ma Ḍɔɔm ḍuaŋa tolanti, ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan myennɛ te jyek Buuluc neeni. Ɔci ḍuaŋa tooccin ḍuaŋa tolanti agi, “Hay! Hay! I gɔk ɔɔn noŋdɔn a ɔki ɛkɛti? ‘Wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a men ma Ḍɔɔm!”
Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan bɛɛn Buulucti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “‘Ya myetta i a men ma Ḍɔɔm?” Ɔci Buuluc jyettin agi, “Ɛɛ.”

Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan gɔkcin Buulucti agi, “Te ñamu ‘ya a men ma Ḍɔɔm bɛɛ. Yeti acca ‘ya aŋi men ma Ḍɔɔm acaan bilk ‘ya ‘woñgan ma ne coŋɔn.” Ɔci Buuluc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “A ɔɔn pari bɛɛ? Yeti gɔṭṭi, ne ‘ya jietkati mayɛ, ‘ya doki a men ma Ḍɔɔm.”
Ɔci maka noŋi ḍwayi Buulucyɛ, ɛkkɛn Buuluc daljɛ ne pɛñan. Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan moki buayi ne pɛñan ne ɛkɛ tieŋni agi Buuluc agi men ma Ḍɔɔm. Ḍuaŋa tolan buayi acaan Buuluc ḍɛɛgɛ ma te jyek ɛkɛ.

Ɔci ne liidɔ ḍuaŋa tolan Buuluc looŋnɛ te waka ɛkɛ ḍɛɛkkiti may. Ɔci ɛkɛ borcin gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci Maka Goṭi Jiek i ɛkɛy. Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan Buuluc oonɛ iñɔ nona mati, ɔci Buuluc yɔɔnnɛ ɛkɛ ma ñomgɛnti. Ḍuaŋa tolan noŋi a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn tieŋdi jyeka wookki ma Buuluc neeni ne pwadan.

Ɔci Buuluc bala gɔṭi ḍɛɛṭi Maka Gɔṭi Jiek neeniti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Modg ɔɔn! Gen gɛɛl bala ‘ya yomuti bɛɛ. ‘Ya yomu niin pwanna pwanno. ‘Ya noŋ ba jyeka ṭagdɛ Juaŋ oŋkanda, ɔci acca moki ɔɔn.”
Ɔci ne gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil mena yenti Ananaayac neeni tieŋni jyeka guagdɛ Buuluc neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka yɔdi iki Buuluc wannati agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ mena wanna moddɛ tukɛti.”
Ɔci Buuluc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hɔɔy, i mena noŋi ma ñingɛn neeni i jyɛbdi Jwaŋa Tolan! I waanu ciy noŋ godan ‘ya ba ganuun, ɔci i buagi dɔki i ganuun bɛɛyaji ‘ya motta makɔ?”
Ɔci maka yɔdi iki Buulucyɛ, gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I wook mena naŋŋɛ Juaŋ a gaciic tolan ma Icrayiilyɛ?”
Ɔci Buuluc ṭwokcin mati agi, “Modg ɔɔn, ŋeej ‘ya ka ɛkɛ a gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil bɛɛ. Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, ‘Naa menga gɔkti ne yaayan ḍuaŋa ɛktati bɛɛ.’”

Yeti ne Buuluc gɔrni maka yɔdi wɛnan gɛɛg akki ma Cadyuciin ɔci ma gɛɛg akki ma Pɛriciinyɛ, ɛkɛ yaajjin te nona Maka Gɔṭi Jiekti neeni agi, “Modg ɔɔn. ‘Ya a men ma Pɛriciin, ɔci ‘ya a kaci ma Pɛriciin. Ɔci acca ma noŋi godan ‘ya, acaan ‘ya gɔk ka ne ma tuutiyɛ, ma jɔŋdi ñaalɔ tɛɛti moki.”
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ma Pɛriciin ɔci ma Cadyuciin bala tyewɔ ne pɛñan, ɔci maka coŋin neeniyɛ, kɛɛptin jitin te jieko.

Ɛkkɛn kɛɛptin jitin te jiek a ɔɔn acaan ma Cadyuciin oŋkanda gɔki agi ne ma tuudiyɛ, ma jɔŋdɔ ñaalɔ moki bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki moki agi malɛɛkan balgɔ bɛɛ, ɔci agi boŋki ma baan moki baagɔ. Ma Pɛriciin aŋka gɔki agi ne ma tuudiyɛ, ma jɔŋdɔ ñaalɔ tɛɛti moki, ɔci agi malɛɛkan balgɔ moki, ɔci boŋki ma baan balgɔ moki.

Ɔci yook pɛɛdin ne tolan, ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ma Pɛriciin gɛɛg jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ, ɔci gɔkcin ne pɛñan agi, “Ikin yɔɔrtin gena yaayan gɛɛl ‘wana neeniti bɛɛ. Bala a booŋ walla malɛɛka gɛɛl gɔkcin ɛkɛti dita!”

Ɔci ne ma jiek pɛñki a pɛñiyɛ, ḍuaŋa tolan buayi agi dita Buuluc tintan ma ñaalɔ ɔci noktan te ṭɔrin. Ɔci ɛkɛ ackan myennɛ agi dala ɛkki ooddɔ iñɔ nona mati aŋka ɛkki Buuluc pɔktɛ te ma byeŋkɛnti ɔci eedi ma orɔ on ackanti.

Ɔci te ween jiñɛ neeniyɛ, Ciɛggɔn yɔɔtcin Buuluc taaŋɛti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala i yomu tɛya! Acaan i ma myenni te jyek ‘ya wɛnni ban Urcaliimyɛ, ɔci ne baaṭi i ma myetka te jyek ‘ya a ɔɔn ban Ḍɔɔm daŋkun.”

Ɔci ne liidɔ ne noon bɔɔniyɛ, ma Icrayiil gɛɛg jiek ñaagɛyɔ te lɛmma ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin a warɛ te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan agi ɛkkɛn omdinti waagga bɛɛ, ɔci mottinti waagga bɛɛ, agi ɛkkɛn Buuluc parun nogdinti ñamu.
Ɔci maka jiek ñaagɛyɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ (40), ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg bala moki.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati nona gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiilti ɔci cyekinti, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɔɔn gɔŋnɔn a warɛ te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan ka ɔɔn omdɔn waagga bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn Buuluc nogdɔn ñamu parun.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ iki Maka Gɔṭi Jiekyɛ, ooddɛ gɔktɛ ḍuaŋa tolan ḍuaŋa ma Ḍɔɔmti dala Buuluc koodɛ iñɔ nona Maka Gɔṭi Jiekti neeni, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba ɛkkɛ buagɛ gɔrtɛ jyek Buuluc moki ne pwadan ɔɔn. Yeti ne ɛkɛ koodi iñɔ ne ɛkɛ dɛndi nona ɛkkɛti men bɛɛyɛ, ɔɔn mɔktɔn kɛɛyɔn ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ nogdɔn ɔɔn doki.”
Yeti ñaakan Buuluc tieŋŋin jyeka naŋɛ ma te jyek nooŋi Buuluc neeni. Ɔci ɛkɛ bɛɛn ɔci ati kaaccin orɔ on ackan, ɔci ɛkɛ Buuluc myennɛ te jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkɛ neeni.
Ɔci Buuluc ḍuaŋa gɛɛl bornɛ ɔci ɛkɛ bɛɛn ɔci Buuluc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kaalgɔn ṭɔɔlɛ neeni eya nona ḍuaŋa tolanti acaan ɛkɛ balki jiek gɛɛg buagɔn gɔkti ɛkɛti.”

Ḍuaŋa kaalgɔn ṭɔɔlɛ eññɛ ḍuaŋa tolanti, ɔci ḍuaŋa gɔkcin ḍuaŋa tolanti agi, “Buuluc mena muŋŋin ikin neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ boṭṭin ‘yati ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki ‘yati agi ‘ya kaalgɔn neeni oojjɔ nona iti agi ɛkta balki jiek gɛɛg ɛkta buagda gɔktɔ iti.”
Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan kaalgɔn ṭɔɔlɛ muŋŋɛ te bieŋɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ati nona parɛti yaakkɛn, ɔci ɛkɛ tooccin kaalgɔnti agi, “Jwalla i buagiti ‘ya myetta neeni bala a ɔki?”

Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ma Icrayiil jiek ñaagɛyɔ. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ɛkkɛn toottinti iti agi i Buuluc oojji iñɔ ne liidɔ nona Maka Gɔṭi Jiekti. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ɛkkɛn noŋdinti ba ɛkkɛn gɔrtinti jyek ɛkta ne pwadan ɔɔn.

Yeti naa i jyedda jyek ɛkkɛn bɛɛ, acaan ma Icrayiil neeniyɛ, gɛɛg bala kɛɛy Buuluc. Ɛkkɛn a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ (40), ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg bala moki. Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin a warɛ te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan agi ɛkkɛn omdinti waagga bɛɛ, ɔci mottinti waagga bɛɛ, agi ɛkkɛn Buuluc parun nogdinti ñamu, ɔci acca ɛkkɛn jiek ḍaagɛ doki, yeti ɛkkɛn bala kɛɛy gena jyek i.”
Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan gɔkcin kaalgɔn ṭɔɔlɛti agi, “I ɔgdi ootta, naa i men gɛɛl myetka a ‘ya nɔɔnna i te jyeka neeni bɛɛ.”

Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan borcin ḍuaŋan gɛɛgti ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ ackan limdiyɔ a miyyan ne yyɛɛwɔ (200), ɔci ackan taab te muntanyɛ, ɛkkɛn limdiyɔ a ma baan ne ḍoogɔ mena parɛ byeŋkɛ (70), ɔci ackan eci ṭwaŋgi limdiyɔ a miyyan ne yyɛɛwɔ (200). Dala ɛkkɛn wak ɛkkɛn ywaŋtanyɔ aŋka ɛkkɛn jɔŋdi ne weenji ooddi ban Cɛcariiya.”

Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan gɔkcin mati agi, “Dala muntan gɛɛg eedi ma acaan taabda Buuluc.” Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin moki agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ‘ya neeni aŋka Buuluc dɛndi ne pwadan Pilikcti.” (Ɔci Pilikc neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ bana ecki ma Buuluc waayi.)
Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan ɛkɛ kieŋnɛ worga agi,
I Pilikc, ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ pwadan, ‘ya ñiep i. Gena ‘ya Klɔdyac Licyac.
Gɔṭṭi, ‘wana neeni mugɛ ma Icrayiil, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ɛkɛ noktan, ɔci ‘ya attin iki ackan ‘ya ɔci ɛkɛ wɛɛn ‘ya te ɛkkɛn byeŋkɛnti, acaan ‘ya tieŋŋan ɛkɛ a men ma Ḍɔɔm.
Ɔci acaan ‘ya buaga tieŋja jyeka wookki ma ɛkɛ neeni ne pwadanyɛ, ‘ya ɛkɛ eñi nona ma ɛkkɛnti Maka Gɔṭi Jieko.
Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan jyeka tɔɔmki ma ɛkɛ neeni. Ɔci jyeka tɔɔmki ma ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, gena ganuun ma Icrayiil pookɛn. Jyeka ɛkɛ noktiti ma neeniyɛ, baawo, ɔci jyeka ɛkɛ ḍuattiti ma ciginjiyɛ, baaw moki.

’Ya myenna men gɛɛl agi ma Icrayiil jiek ñaaŋiyɔ agi ɛkta nogdinti. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya ɛkɛ cuoññan iti. Ɔci maka tɔɔmi ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn myetkan ‘ya ka dala ɛkkɛn ooddi jyeka tɔɔmki ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ootan ɛkkɛn iti aŋan.
Ɔci ackan Buuluc eyɛ ba jyeka gɔŋni ḍuaŋa tolan ɛkkɛnti, ɔci Buuluc eyɛ te ween jiñɛ ne ban Antipatric ɔɔn.
Ɔci ne liidɔ ackan ati te ciegɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn dɔɔkkin baanji ban ɛkkɛn, ɔci ackan taab te muntanyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka ati Buuluc eyɛ ne ban Cɛcariiyati.
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn dɛñki ban Cɛcariiyatiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ ‘woñgi worga, ɔci moki ‘woñgi Buuluc bieŋɛti.
Ɔci ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ pokcin worga ɔci tooccin Buulucti agi, “Ban ɛkkɛ bana tolan yenti ɔki?” Ɔci ne ɛkɛ tieŋni agi Buuluc bɛɛnɔ te Ciliicyayɛ,

ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Maka tɔɔmi i ne ɛkkɛn bɛɛtiyɛ, ‘ya oŋ gɔrca jyek i ne pwadan oŋo.” Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin mati agi dala Buuluc eedi ma on Hiruuduc Agriipati uuldɛ ma jiju, ɔci kɛɛdɛyɔ ackan ne pwadan aŋan ona cɔnda ɛktay.

Ɔci ne ninka ne dɔɔyɔ bɛɛki borayɛ, Ananaayac gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil bɛɛn i cyekin gɛɛg ɔci mena parɛ moki, ɛkɛ yenti Tɛrtooloc. Tɛrtooloc neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena urkinti jiek ma ñomgɛnti ne pwadan ɔci ɛkɛ eyɛ ma acaan ma buagɔn dala ɛkɛ ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ myettɛ te jyek Buuluc non godanti.

Ɔci ma wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ buagɔn gɔrti jyek Buuluc. Ɔci ne Buuluc borkiti mayɛ, Tɛrtooloc jɔɔtcin ñamu ɔci gɔkcin agi, “I Pilikc, i a mena pwadan, coodi pwani bala ban ɔɔn acaan te i. Ɔci te jyek i mokiyɛ, naŋka pwadin bɛɛn ban ɔɔn acaan i ñingu tɛy tɛyo.
Ɔci ma ɔɔn baan warda yomgɛn pwad pwad iti oŋkanda.
“Ɔɔn buagɔn i taabba te jyek ɔɔn bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋi ‘ya buaga gɔkka iti jwali ne ḍuulan budan acaan i yomu pwad pwado.
Ɔɔn gɔrnɔn ‘wana neeni ɛkɛ bala yooci naŋki ma Icrayiilti baan warda, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tyewɔ te jiek te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni. Ɛkɛ a ḍuaŋa maka bartan ma agi Ma Najarɛt, jyek mali ɛkkɛn da pookɛn.
Ɔci oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi on Juaŋ ona tolan yaadɛ, yeti ɛkɛ muŋŋɔn ɔɔn. [Ɔci ɔɔn buagɔn ɛkɛ noŋdɔn godan bala ba jyek ganuun ɔɔn.
Oŋ yeti ḍuaŋa tolan yenti Licyac bɛɛn ɔci ɛkɛ eññɛ ne pɛñan te ɔɔnti.
Ɔci Licyac gɔkcin agi maka tɛki Buuluc warɛ neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn bɛya i ñamuti wɛnni.] Ɔci acca kan i gɔrca jyek ɛkɛyɛ, jyek ɛkɛ ŋeejja i, ɔci tɔmta tɔɔmmɔn ɔɔn ɛkɛyɛ, ŋeejja i moki.”
Ɔci ma Icrayiil gɔkcin agi, “Ɛɛ, jiek bala a ɔɔn.”

Ɔci ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ Buuluc gɔmnɛ bieŋɛ agi dala ɛkta gɔktɔ daŋkun, ɔci Buuluc gɔkcin agi, “Çeej ‘ya i a ḍuaŋa godan kɛɛn ɔɔn ma Icrayiil neeni te baaṭi doki. Yuong i a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya da gɔkka jyek ‘ya iti te yoma ñɔyan.
Kan i jiek gwala jitin ne pwadanyɛ, ŋeejja i ‘ya ati ban Urcaliim te baaṭi bɛɛ. Nink ‘ya ninka atta ban Urcaliimyɛ, a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ budan. ‘Ya ati morcan Jwaŋa Tolanti aŋan.

’Ya yuarka ma oŋ gɛɛlti tyewwin i menga on Juaŋ ona tolanti neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ‘ya baala oorga morki ma Juaŋtiyɛ, ‘ya noŋ jyeka yeyin gɛɛg mati bɛɛ, ɔci ma lyɛli te jyek ‘ya gɛɛg bɛɛ. Ɔci baan konɛti moki jyeka yeyin gɛɛg bɛɛn te ‘ya bɛɛ.
Maka gɔki agi ‘ya yaajjɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn men gɛɛl gen kona tɔɔmki ɛkkɛn ‘ya acca neeni oodɛ bora iti bɛɛ.

’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, ‘ya mor Jwaŋ yɔrg ikinti neeni te Pɔy Yaccu neeni, ɔci ma Icrayiil ɛkkɛn gɔki agi pɔya moṭa ‘ya neeni yaayɔ agi damgɔn. Yeti ‘ya tiek jyek Muuca gɛɛg bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya tiek jyeka kiiwɛ maka bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan gɛɛg bɛɛ.
Maka tɔɔmi ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki agi Juaŋ maka pwadgɔ luolda ñaalɔ, ɔci maka yiegɔ moki luolda ñaalɔ. Ɔci ‘ya jyeti gɔk a ɔɔn daŋkun.
’Ya baal poŋ ka dala ‘ya noŋja ne pwadan Juaŋti ɔci mati oŋkanda, acaan ‘ya buaga naa yom ‘ya wiakti te naŋka yeyin neeni gɛɛg bɛɛ.
“Yuong gɛɛgti ‘ya baaw ban Urcaliim, ɔci acca ‘ya bɛɛn ɔci ‘ya eccan bilk gɛɛg, ɔci bilka neeniyɛ, ‘woñgan ‘ya kɛɛn ɔɔn neeni budan. Ɔci waka ‘yɛrtan ma Juaŋti moki owwan ‘ya daŋkun.

Ɔci ‘ya baal noŋ naŋka neeni on Juaŋ ona tolan, ɔci ‘ya noŋjan ba naŋki ma Icrayiil te jyek ywaŋi ma waakɛn Juaŋ ñamɛti, ɔci ne ‘ya naŋka neeni cwammayɛ, ‘ya yuarka maka tɔɔmi ‘ya neeni. ‘Ya balgin i ma gɛɛg bɛɛ. ‘Ya baal paru. Ɔci jyeka yeyin baawo.
Maka ‘ya yuarka on Juaŋ ona tolanyɛ, gena ma Icrayiil maka bɛɛn te ban Ecya. Kan ɛkkɛn balki jiekyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn bɛya nona iti neeni, aŋka ɛkkɛn gɔkti jyeka tɔɔmki ɛkkɛn ‘ya neeni.
Ɔci maka bala wɛnni acca kan gena yaayan gɛɛl yuarɛ ɛkkɛn ‘yati te oŋŋa Maka Gɔṭi Jiek gɔrki jyek ‘ya neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn gɔkti.
Gena jwalla yaanna ‘ya ɛkkɛnti kaapun, ne ‘ya gɔŋna agi, ‘Acca ‘ya yɔɔd ɛkkɛ ñomgɔti wɛnni te oŋŋa neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ goddɛ ‘ya te jyenna ‘ya jyetta ka maka tuun jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te kolkti tɛɛti mokiy.’ ”

Pilikcyɛ, jyek Pɔy Yaccu ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ ne pwadan, ɔci ne ɛkɛ tieŋni jyek maka bɛɛn ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jiek bawwin acca. Ne Licyac mena ḍuaŋa ackan neeni bɛɛdiyɛ, ‘ya jyek ɛkkɛ gwaldi jitin ne pwadan waakɛnda.”
Ɔci Pilikc gɔkcin ḍuaŋati agi, “Dala i gɔrca Buuluc, ɔci kan mung Buulucn buagɔn bɛya ɛkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn bɛya ɔɔn aŋka ɛkɛ maktan te waka bala ɛkɛ buagiy.”

Ɔci ne nink gɛɛg bɛɛki borayɛ, Pilikc bɛɛn i ɛŋ ɛkɛ Drucilla. Drucilla neeni a men ma Icrayiil. Ɔci Pilikc Buuluc bornɛ, ɔci ne Buuluc bɛɛni nona ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala tyeŋi jyek ɛkɛ. Buuluc bala gɔki ɛkkɛnti te jyek jyeni ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔti.

Ɔci ne Buuluc baali gɔki ɛkkɛnti te jyek naŋka pwadin, ɔci te tiita ma tiecki waakɛn, ɔci te jyek oŋŋa bɛya a oŋ godan Juaŋyɛ, Pilikc buayi ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I ɔgdi ootta acca. Ne wɔɔka ikin gɔrtin jiek iki i baldiyɛ, i oŋ bortin ‘ya oŋo.”
Pilikc bala poŋi agi Buuluc ɛkɛ ‘wondɛti bilk kaapun, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ Buuluc bornɛ oŋki ne coŋɔn aŋka ɛkkɛn gɔwwɔ yaakkɛn.

Ɔci ne yuonga ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛki borayɛ, mena parɛ aŋi ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ non Pilikc. Ɛkɛ yenti Pɔrcyac Pɛctac. Ne kanŋa Pilikc baaniyɛ, ɛkɛ Buuluc dalnɛ te ciginji ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ Buuluc dalnɛ te ciginji a ɔɔn, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ma Icrayiil yomgɛn pwaddi.
Ɔci Pɛctacyɛ, ne ninka ɛkɛ aŋŋɛ ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ akki ḍoogɔ ban Cɛcariiyayɛ, ɛkɛ jɔŋŋin te bana neeniti ɔci ati ban Urcaliim.
Ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, jyeka tɔɔmki ɛkkɛn Buuluc neeniyɛ, eyɛ ɛkkɛn Pɛctacti. Ɛkkɛn ‘yeṭi tooccin Pɛctacti te Buuluc agi,
“Dala Buuluc oodda ban Urcaliim.” Ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛn jiek ñaagɛyɔ ɛkkɛn buagɔn Buuluc noktan yomɔ.
Ɔci Pɛctac kɛkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “A’a, Buuluc bala jiju ciginji ban Cɛcariiya, ɔci ne cwakanti ‘ya ootta ban Cɛcariiya aŋan daŋkun.
Dala ma ɛkkɛ maka ñingɛn tɛyan ɛkkɛn gɛɛg ooddin iki ‘ya. Ɔci kan gena naŋŋɛ Buuluc yaayan gɛɛl bala dala ɛkkɛn gɔkti.”

Pɛctac ɛkɛ yeddin te ban Urcaliim bala ba nink ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ walla ba nink a inyaakkɛn moki ɔɔn hayya ɛkɛ oŋ atti ban Cɛcariiya oŋo. Ɔci ne liidɔ ɛkɛ cooccin kaakci godanti ɔci ɛkɛ ma myennɛ agi dala Buuluc oodi ma nona ɛkɛti.

Ɔci ne Buuluc bɛɛniyɛ, ma Icrayiil maka bɛɛn te ban Urcaliimyɛ, ɛkkɛn Buuluc bwodiwi, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tɔɔmi ɛkɛ ne pɛñan, yeti te jyek ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn menga gena naŋŋɛ Buuluc yaayan gɛɛl oonɛ bora ḍuaŋati bɛɛ.

Ɔci Buuluc gɔkcin jyek ɛkɛ daŋkun agi, “‘Ya ganuun ma Icrayiil gɛɛg bɛɛnji bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya noŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl on Juaŋ ona tolanti neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci ‘ya jyek ḍuaŋa ma Ḍɔɔm ḍuaŋa tolan neeni gɛɛg bɛɛnji oŋgati bɛɛ.”
Yeti acaan Pɛctac buagɔn ma Icrayiil yomgɛn pwaddiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin tooccin Buulucti agi, “I buagi ikin oottin iki ‘ya ban Urcaliim aŋka ikin gɔrtin jyeka tɔɔmki ma i neenɛ?”
Ɔci Buuluc kɛkcin gɔki agi, “A’a, nona yɔɔda ‘ya neeniyɛ, gena non ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔm nona noŋki ma godany. ‘Ya noŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl ma Icrayiilti oŋgati bɛɛ. Jyeka neeniyɛ, ŋeej i doki.

Kan ‘ya jyek ganuun akuuma lɛɛŋi jitin, ɔci kan naŋki ‘ya yaayɛ ne tolan aŋka akuuma buagɔn noki ‘yayɛ, ‘ya gɔkca genga bɛɛ. Yeti kan jyeka tɔɔmki ma ‘ya neeni a jyeka budanyɛ, men gɛɛl yaakinti ‘ya ‘wonda maka neeni bɛɛ. ‘Ya buaga ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔm gɔrti jyek ‘ya.”

Pɛctac ɔci ma ɛkɛ warɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔṭi jiek ñamu pookɛn, ɔci ne ɛkkɛn jyeka neeni ḍaakkitiyɛ, Pɛctac gɔkcin Buulucti agi, “I gɔk i ootta ḍuaŋa tolanti ban Ḍɔɔm aŋka ɛkɛ gɔrti jyek iyɛ, pwatcin. ‘Ya buaga dala i ootta aŋan.”
Ɔci ne nink gɛɛg bɛɛki borayɛ, mena ḍuaŋa tolan gɛɛl bɛɛn ban Cɛcariiyati. Ɛkɛ yenti Agriipa. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn iki ɛŋa yenti Bɛrniicɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛɛn ñiepi Pɛctac.
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ɛɛni coodi nink bɛɛki borayɛ, Pɛctac ḍuaŋa tolan neeni myennɛ te jyek Buuluc. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala wɛnni. Ɛkɛ dalnɛ Pilikc ciginji.
Ɔci ne ‘ya baala ban Urcaliimyɛ, gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil bɛɛni, ɔci cyekin moki bɛɛn ‘yati, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tɔɔmi Buuluc. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn agi dala ‘ya jiek oljɔ Buuluc wyendanti.

Ɔci ‘ya ṭwokcan ɛkkɛnti ka naŋki ɔɔn ma Ḍɔɔm bala a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɔɔn noŋdɔn godan ñamu. Mena tɔmtan ma neeni gɔkti jyek ɛkɛ, ɔci ma gɔrti jyeka tɔɔmki ma ɛkɛ neeni bala a ɔki. Ɔci kan jiek yeyɔyɛ, ma oŋ noŋdi ywobji ɛkɛti oŋo.
Ɔci maka neeni bɛɛnɔn dɔɔŋnɔn iki ‘ya wɛnni, ɔci ne liidɔ ‘ya cooccan kaakca noŋki ma godan, ‘ya kwaccan bɛɛ. Ɔci ‘ya gɔkcan mati ka dala Buuluc kootan ɛkkɛn orɔ nona ‘yati.
’Ya baal poŋ ka Buuluc a nɔɔdɔn kaapun. ‘Ya gɔk ka naŋki ɛkɛ yaayɛ kaapun. Yeti ne maka tɔɔmi ɛkɛ bɛɛkiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala tɔɔmi ɛkɛ te jyeka yeyin gɛɛg bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛn bala tɔɔmi ɛkɛ te jyek mali ma Icrayiil pookɛn budan. Ɛkkɛn bala tɔɔmi ɛkɛ te jyek men gɛɛl yenti Yaccu. Ɛkɛ tuuni, yeti Buuluc bala gɔki te jyek ɛkɛ agi ɛkta baalɔ tɛɛtɔ.
Acaan ‘ya yaakati jyeka neeni gwaldi jitin ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, ɔci ‘ya tooccan Buulucti, ka dala ɛkɛ ooddi ban Urcaliim aŋka ma gɔrti jyek godan aŋan.

Ɔci Buuluc kɛkkin te woon ɛkɛ gɔki agi dala ɛkɛ kɛɛdɛti ñin ma ɔɔn ne ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔm aŋka gɔrta jyek ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkcan mati ka dala ɛkɛ gwaltan ma ne pwadan ne oŋŋa ‘ya ɛkɛ cunda ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔmti bɛɛdi ɔɔn.”
Ɔci Agriipa gɔkcin Pɛctacti agi, “‘Ya buaga tieŋŋa jyek ɛkɛ paru.” Ɔci Pɛctac ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ne liidɔ i tieŋja jyek ɛkɛ.”

Ɔci ne liidɔ Agriipa bɛɛn i Bɛrniicɛ. Ɛkkɛn bɛɛn i maka pookɛn maka a ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin, ɛkkɛn bɛɛn ɛŋi bworŋin akuuma waakɛnti i maka ñingɛn tɛyan bana neeniti. Ɔci waak waakɛnda pwanna pwanno. Ɔci ɛkkɛn kaaccin orɔ ona ḍworki ma wyetkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn cooccin iñɔ, ɔci Pɛctac gɔkcin mati agi, “Dala Buuluc oodi ma orɔ!” Ɔci ne Buuluc koonɛ orɔyɛ,

ɔci Pɛctac gɔkcin agi, “I ḍuaŋa Agriipa, ɔci maka bala wɛnni waakɛnda, acca dala ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ gena ‘wana tɔmtan ma Icrayiil waakɛnda neeni. Ne ‘ya baala ban Urcaliimyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛɛn ‘yati tɔɔmi ɛkɛ. Ɔci wɛnni moki ɛkkɛn bɛɛn ‘yati moki, ɔci bala tɔɔmi ɛkɛ moki. Ɛkkɛn gɔki ‘yati a ñaccu agi naa ‘ya ‘wana neeni daljɔ ciyɔ tɛɛtɔ moki bɛɛ. Agi dala ‘ya ɛkta nogjɔ.

Yeti ne ‘ya gɔrna jyek ɛkɛyɛ, ‘ya gena yaayan gɛɛl yuarŋ ɛkɛti aŋka ‘ya ɛkɛ nogda bɛɛ. Ɔci acaan ɛkɛ gɔki agi dala ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔm aŋka gɔrtɔ jyek ɛkɛyɛ, ‘ya gɔkcan ka ‘ya ɛkɛ cundi ḍuaŋa tolanti ban Ḍɔɔm.

Yeti acaan ‘ya jiek jitkɛn yuarcan men bɛɛyɛ, ɔci ‘ya yaakati kiejja genga men ḍuaŋa tolanti bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya ɛkɛ owwan i ñamuti Agriipa ḍuaŋa tolan, ɔci maka pookɛn neeni ñomgɛnti. Ɔci ne i gɔrti jyek ɛkɛyɛ, ‘ya oŋ kiejja jiek oŋo.
Kan men gɛɛl bala ciginji, ɔci ‘ya ɛkɛ cundi ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔmti budan, ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan neeni myetka te jyek naŋki ɛkɛ bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin bɛɛ, yaayɛ.”
Ɔci Agriipa gɔkcin Buulucti agi, “Kan i buagi gɔkca jyek iyɛ, dala i gɔkca.” Ɔci Buuluc bieŋɛ laŋnɛ ñaalɔ ɔci gɔkcin agi,
“I Agriipa ḍuaŋa tolan, ‘ya yomu ñɔy ñɔy acaan ‘ya buaga gɔkka jyek ‘ya jyeka tɔɔmki ma Icrayiil ‘ya neeni iti,
acaan i jyek naŋki yɔrg ikin ma Icrayiil waakɛnda ŋeej, ɔci jyeka gɔwwin tyewwin ikin ma Icrayiil moki ŋeej i. Naa i taabba te jyek ‘ya bɛɛ, dala i tieŋŋa ne pwadan.
“‘Ya ŋeecka ma Icrayiil acca bɛɛ. ‘Ya ŋeecka ɛkkɛn te baaṭi doki ne ‘ya wona ḍiɛra men. Ne ‘ya baala ciyin iki kɛɛn ɔɔn, ɔci moki ne ‘ya baala ban Urcaliim naŋki ‘ya ŋeecɔn ma Icrayiil waakɛnda.

Çeecɔn ɛkkɛn te ñamu doki ‘ya a men ma Pɛriciin, ɔci ‘ya baal ciy te jyek ma Pɛriciin. Ɔci ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn moki Ma Pɛriciin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a ma ikin ma Icrayiil maka tieci jyek ganuun mali ikin ma Icrayiil warɛ ne tɛyany. Yeti ma Icrayiil maka tɛki ‘ya waru neeni jyeka ‘ya aga men ma Pɛriciin neeniyɛ, owwɛ ɛkkɛn bora bɛɛ.
Ma bala noŋi godan ‘yati, acaan ‘ya jyeti jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ yɔrg ikinti te baaṭiy.

Jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyek jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ te kolk jitin tɛɛtki mokiy, jyeka kɛɛtan kɛɛn Ma Icrayiil kɛɛna a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala moṭi Juaŋti oŋkanda acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn jyeka neeni dala dɛndi bora. Ḍuaŋa tolan gena jyeka tɔɔmki ma Icrayiil ‘ya neeni.
Te gena yeti ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi Juaŋ yaakinti ma luoldɛ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki bɛɛy?
“Ɔci te ñamu daŋkun ‘ya baal poŋ ka dala ‘ya noŋja kanŋa ne tolan, aŋka jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ men ma Najarɛt neeniyɛ, baadi.

Gena jyeka bala naŋdi ‘ya ban Urcaliim neeni. Gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘ya ‘woñka worga, ɔci te jyek ɛkkɛnyɛ, ‘ya ati Ma Kiṭɔ owwan ɔci oljan jiju ciginji a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ. Ne ma balki nokki maka neeniyɛ, jyek ‘ya daŋkun bala ba jyek maka noki ma neeni ɔɔn.

Ɔci oŋkanda ‘ya baal noŋ ne yaayan Ma Kiṭɔti oorga morki ma Icrayiil Juaŋti. Ɔci ‘ya baal ‘yer ɛkkɛn ka dala ɛkkɛn jyenna jyetki ɛkkɛn Yaccuti wanna daltan. Ɔci acaan ‘ya yomu yaayɛ Ma Kiṭɔti ne pɛñanyɛ, ‘ya ati lier ɛkkɛn ne bonka loonanti ɔɔn.
“Ne ‘ya baala noŋa naŋka neeni menyɛ, oŋ gɛɛlti ‘ya baal ootta ban Ḍimaackati, ɔci worga gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiilyɛ, bala ‘yati doki, ɔci ‘ya ‘woñka ɛkkɛn kanŋa neeni.
I ḍuaŋa tolan, ne ‘ya baala yom menyɛ, oŋ waŋɛ bala yɔɔd yeccu, ɔci gen gɛɛl dɛkkin ‘yati iki maka atin iki ‘yay. Ɛkɛ dɛkkin ne pɛñan te ñaalɔ. Oŋ waŋɛ buannɛ ɛkɛ te dyɛŋŋo.

Ɔci ɔɔn ḍɛɛmnɔn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji waakida. Ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan pwan gɔkkin ‘yati te tuk ikin ma Icrayiil agi, ‘Caawul, Caawul, i noŋ ne yaayan ‘yati a ñaccu ɔɔn ogo? I yaci waru paru te naŋka naŋa i yaayan ‘yati oŋkanda neeni. I baal ba yana yaci warɛ parɛ yana yɔɔwi kɔmñi weegɛn ne weegɛn baali jiebbi cieti ɛkɛy.’
“Ɔci ‘ya gɔkcan ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ciɛggɔn, i a menɛ?’ “Ɔci Ciɛggɔn gɔkkin ‘yati agi, ‘Gena ‘ya Yaccu, mena naŋa i ne yaayan oŋkanday.
Jɔlla ñaalɔ yɔɔtca te ciegu acaan ‘ya waru lɛɛllan bora iti buaga i naŋdin a mena noŋi kanŋa ‘ya. ‘Ya buaga i ma myetka te waka yuarŋi i acca, ɔci moki te waka i nɔɔttin te ɛkkɛn ne baaṭiy.
Ɔci i yɔɔdin ‘ya oŋkanda te ma Icrayiil, ɔci i moki yɔɔdin ‘ya te Keedin Pookɛn maka i cundin ‘ya ɛkkɛnti daŋkun neeni.

’Ya i cundin aŋka i ɛkkɛn ñingɛn pɔkka ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn yaltan te nona mielti ɔci ooddi te nona bɔwan, ɔci ɛkkɛn mwondi te jyek Jwaŋa Yaayan ɔci dɔɔkti Jwaŋa Tolanti. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɔɔktɛ Juaŋ te nɔji ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn ñoodi a cyɛɛlɔ i maka jyeti ‘yati maka kɛññan ‘ya boray.’
“Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Agriipa ḍuaŋa tolan, ‘ya yaakati jyeka bɛɛn ‘yati te ñaalɔ neeniyɛ, bɛɛdji bɛɛ.

Ɔci te ñamu ‘ya baal lor maka ban Ḍimaacka ɔci ban Urcaliim. Ɔci ne baaṭi ‘ya ati lor maka ban Yahuudiya warda, ɔci ne baaṭi moki ‘ya ati lor Keedin Pookɛn daŋkun. ‘Ya ɛkkɛn myetkan ka dala ɛkkɛn waakɛn yaltan, dala ɛkkɛn yordi Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ciya ba maka waakɛn yali te nɔji ɛkkɛn awarɛ.
Acaan ‘ya baal lor ma a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya mukka ma Icrayiil on Juaŋ ona tolan neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn buagɔn noki ‘ya.

Yeti ‘ya magda Juaŋ oŋkanda, ɔci acca neeniti moki ɔɔn. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya yɔɔd wɛnni miet maka ḍwaŋin ɔci maka ḍyɛrin te jyeka awarɛ neeni. Jyek Muuca ɔci jyek maka bɔwanyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn aaŋiyɔ bɛɛ.

Ɛkkɛn bala gɔki te jyek naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ agi ne Kiṭɔ bɛɛddayɛ, ɛkta wardan eeddɔ ɔci ɛkta jɔldɔ ñaalɔ moki te koolji tɛɛti moki. Ɛkta agdɔ mena jɔɔttɔ te jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki. Ɔci agi a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkta agdɔ mena dɛki ma Icrayiil, ɔci Keedin Pookcɛn daŋkun.”
Ɔci ne Buuluc baali gɔki jyek ɛkɛyɛ, Pɛctac yaadjin gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay, Buuluc, i noŋ agdi amgɔn te jyeka i lalkiti ma ne coŋɔn neeni!”
Ɔci Buuluc ṭwokcin gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I Pɛctac Mena Tolan, ‘ya noŋ agdi aamma bɛɛ. Jyeka guagdi ‘ya neeniyɛ, gena jyeka awarɛ, a jyek amji bɛɛ.

Jyeka neeni ŋeej i Agriipa ḍuaŋa tolan, ɔci ‘ya yaakati gɔkca iti ne pwadan te jyeka neeni. Naŋka neeniyɛ, gɛɛl kwoy i bɛɛ. Naŋka bɛɛn Yaccuti waakɛnda neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn cogiyɔ ma bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn naŋɛ ma a lyɛlta waakɛnda.
I Agriipa ḍuaŋa tolan, i jyetti jyek maka bɔwanɛ? Çeej ‘ya doki i jyetti jyek ɛkkɛn.”
Ɔci Agriipa ṭwokcin Buulucti agi, “I poŋ gɔk ‘ya naŋda i agdi men Ma Kiṭɔ doki ne pɛñan ɔɔn?”

Ɔci Buuluc ṭwokcin gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala te i ɔci maka tyeŋi jyek ‘ya neeniyɛ, dala te ɛkkɛ waakida agdɛ Ma Kiṭɔ ba ‘ya ɔɔn, kan acca lakun doki, walla ne baaṭi, yeti ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka ḍɛktɛ ma te jiŋgin ba ‘ya ɔŋŋi bɛɛ.”
Ɔci Agriipa ḍuaŋa tolan jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ, ɔci ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ moki jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ, ɔci Bɛrniicɛ moki jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ, ɔci maka bala ciyi i ɛkkɛn moki jɔllin ñaalɔ.

Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn kaacki bora te ona neenitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin pookɛn te jyek Buuluc agi, “‘Wana neeni noŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl aŋka ɛkɛ noktin ikin bɛɛ, ɔci moki ɛkɛ noŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl aŋka ikin ɛkɛ oltin jiju ciginji bɛɛ.”
Ɔci Agriipa gɔkcin Pɛctacti agi, “Te ɛkɛ toonni iti agi ɛkɛ ootci ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔmti bɛɛyɛ, te ɛkɛ pɔkka i doki.”

Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn jiek ḍaakkiti agi ɔɔn ootcɔn ban Ḍɔɔm te murka tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn Buuluc ‘woñgi ḍuaŋa, ɔci maka pookɛn maka bala jiju ciginji daŋkun, ɛkkɛn ‘woñgi ḍuaŋa daŋkun aŋka gwaldɛ ɛkɛ yomu te wona ɛkkɛn ootti ban Ḍɔɔm. Ḍuaŋa neeni ɛkɛ yenti Julyac. Ackan ɛkɛ ma boṭi agi ackan ḍuaŋa tolan ban Ḍɔɔm.

Ɔci ɔɔn taamnɔn te murka tolan gɛɛlti te ban Adramittyam. Murka neeni buagɔn woon ati ooddi boddi te waan taaŋɛ ooddi ban Ecya aŋan. Ɔci ɔɔn attɔn. Ɔci men gɛɛl balgɔn iki ɔɔn murka tolanji. Ɛkɛ yenti Ɛrictaarkoc. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn te ban Tacalunika ban Macɛdɔɔnyaji.
Ɔci ne liidɔ ɔɔn dɛnnɔn ban Ciḍɔɔn, ɔci murka tolan yɔɔtcin iñɔ bana neeniti. Ɔci Julyac yomɛ pwatcin Buulucti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin Buulucti agi dala ɛkta ooddɔ jyɛyi iki mung ɛkki aŋka ɛkta magdi ɛkki.
Ɔci ɔɔn jɔŋnɔn te bana neeniti, ɔci acaan jwami tol tol ɔci ɔɔn gallinjiyɛ, ɔɔn murka ṭwoŋŋɔn pɔya parɛ ati booti Kaŋ Cayprac taaŋɛti nona jwami baawiy.

Ɔci murka tolan yɔɔtcin iñɔ bɛɛ, ɛkɛ ati ati ati ne ñamu, ɔci bala booti ban Ciliicya taaŋɛti, ɔci ban Pampiilya taaŋɛti moki. Yeti murka orcinti bonka neeniti bɛɛ, bala Galŋa Tolan yiɛŋɛji, ɔci ati ne ban Mayra ban Licyaji ɔɔn.
Ɔci bana neenitiyɛ, ḍuaŋa murka tolan maka ban Alɛkcaandriya yuarŋɛ. Murka tolan neeniyɛ, buagɔn woon ooddi ban Ḍɔɔm. Ɔci te jyek ḍuaŋayɛ, ɔɔn taamnɔn murka tolan neeniti.

Ɔci ɔɔn attɔn. Ɔci murka tolan ati ne pɛñan bɛɛ, ati ne maalan ṭɔɔlɛ, acaan jwami tol tol ɔci woon pwatcin bɛɛ. Ɔci ɔɔn attɔn goṭṭɔn ban Nidoc. Acaan jwami tol tol ɔci ɔɔn gallinji a ɔɔnyɛ, murka yaakinti woon a tyɛlga bɛɛ, ɛkɛ ooddi gɔ jyetci bora ɔɔn. Ɔci ɔɔn attɔn te pɔya parɛ, ɔci ɔɔn dɛnnɔn Kaŋ Kriit. Kaŋ Kriit neeniyɛ, a nona tolan. Ɔci ɔɔn attɔn boottɔn kaŋa neeni taaŋɛti nona jwami baawiy, ɔci ɔɔn goṭṭɔn noon gɛɛl bala yenti Calmɔɔnɛ.
Ɔci ɔɔn attɔn attɔn attɔn boottɔn Kaŋ Kriit taaŋɛti moki, ɔci ɔɔn dɛnnɔn baan gɛɛl bala bartan ma a Nona Yɔɔdki Murkan Nona Pwadan. Bana neeni cualcinti ban Laciiya.

Ɔci murka tolan yɔɔni bana bartan ma a Nona Yɔɔdki Murkan Nona Pwadan nink kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Ɔci ne ninka Gworki Ma Koñ bɛɛki bora dokiyɛ, ɔci noon ŋeejji ma aŋi ñaal jiñɛ doki, ɔci murkan yaakinti woon ne pwadan bɛɛ acaan te ñaaljiyɛ, jwami tol tolo. Ɔci Buuluc gɔkcin mati agi,

“Hay, ɛkkɛ ‘uayo! Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ! Gɔṭṭɛ, yuarca ‘ya woon tɛy tɛy yomɔ galŋji, kan ikin oottin ɔɔnyɛ, murka lɛɛkti dita, ɔci waka bala jiju murkaji neeni ḍakti. Ɔci ikin ma gɛɛg daŋkun ḍakti moki.”
Yeti Julyac ḍuaŋa ackan bala gɔṭi jiek i mena nɛɛyi murka i murka weegɛn, ɔci Julyac tieŋŋin jyeka guagdɛ Buuluc neeni bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ tieŋŋin gena jyek murka weegɛn i mena nɛɛyi murkay.

Ɔci acaan nona yɔɔdi murka tolan neeni pwad pwad te coodi ñaal jiñɛ bɛɛyɛ, maka coŋin gɔki agi dala murka ooddɔ ɔɔn, ma pottɔ woon ɔɔn, ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala murka ooddi ne bana yenti Pinikc aŋka ɛkkɛn yuoddi iñɔ bana wannati. Ɔci ban Pinikc neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a nona yɔdki murkan Kaŋ Kriit taaŋɛti te kaŋ taaŋŋa yordi pɔya nona luutti iñɔ oŋy.

Ɔci ne jwami yoŋni ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ te pɔya cuayatiyɛ, maka neeni ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Ahaa, acca woon pwanna pwanno. Ikin dɛntin ne pɛñan.” Ɔci gena cyɛgan luuttan ma iñɔ aŋka yɔɔddi murkayɛ, bala iñɔ pietin, ɔci ɛkɛ nɔɔbbɛ ma ñaalɔ te pietin, ɔci ḍuacci murka tolan konɛti. Ɔci murka oŋ luoṭi oŋo. Ɔci murka bala booti te Kaŋ Kriit taaŋɛti ne cwakanti.
Yeti ne ɛkkɛn atki ñamu ne ḍyɛṭ ṭɔɔlɛyɛ, jwamma tolan yoŋŋin te pɔya ‘wollanti te kaŋ wyeñɛtiy.
Ɔci murka tolan eññɛ jwami ne pɛñan. Murka tolan yaakinti jwami bɛɛdɛ jitin moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ buannɛ jwammo. Ɔci ɔɔn murka tolan dalnɔn ati parɛ amaam doki ɔɔn.

Murka tolan neeniyɛ, menin ḍiɛran bala eedɛ ɛkɛ jiñɛti oŋkanda. Ɔci oŋŋa ɛkkɛn jɔŋki te Kaŋ Kriityɛ, murka ḍiɛran neeni bala pieg wyetkɛnti. Ɔci ne jwamma tolan bɛɛni ne pɛñanyɛ, ma yaakinti murka ḍiɛran neeni oltan jiju murka tolan konɛti bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ɔɔn dɛnnɔn kaŋa ḍiɛran yenti Kɔdayɛ, ɔɔn murka ḍiɛran olnɔn jiju doki, yeti murka neeni naŋki ɛkɛ tɛy tɛyo, ɔɔn yaakɔnti ɛkɛ oldɔn jiju a cwakan bɛɛ.

Ɔci ne ɔɔn murka ḍiɛran neeni olnɔn jiju murka tolan konɛti dokiyɛ, ɔɔn murka tolan neeni ḍɛɛŋŋɔn te wyengo. Ɔci bworŋ murka tolan bworŋa ati ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, oljɛ ma ñaalɔ aŋka jwami murka eedɛ te pɔya parɛ acaan ma buayi murka dita eedɛ jwami nona ŋɔmiti. Çɔmma neeniyɛ, yaayɛ a niɛno.

Ɔci ne liidɔ jwamma tolan bɛɛn men. Ɔci pɔɔgi pieg bala ooddi ne ñaalɔ, ɔci murka tolan yaakinti woon moki bɛɛ. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, waka bala murka tolan konɛti neeni gɛɛg yiɛpcɛ ma ɔntɔ aŋka murka tolan pwardɛ.
Ɔci ne liidɔ moki maka kanŋan murka tolanyɛ, wyeng murka neeni yiɛpcɛ ɛkkɛn ɔntɔ.

Ɔci oŋki gɛɛgtiyɛ, ɔɔn oŋ waŋɛ yuarŋɔn bɛɛ, ɔci moki te ween jiñɛyɛ, ɔɔn kɛltan yuarŋɔn bɛɛ. Jwami bala ne tolan. Te ñamu ɔɔn poŋɔn ka ɔɔn dɛndɔn. Ɔci acca paŋŋa neeni bala moki bɛɛ. Ɔɔn buayɔn ka ɔɔn ḍaktɔn, kaapun.

Ɔci ne ma balki atki oŋkɛn kɔɔnki kɔɔni te koñ a ɔɔnyɛ, Buuluc jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te nona ɛkkɛn ñomgɛnti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala te ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek ‘ya. Ɔci te ikin yennin te Kaŋ Kriit aŋan. Ɔci kan a ɔɔnyɛ, te taab neeni bɛɛn ikinti bɛɛ, ɔci te waka bala murkati neeniyɛ, te ḍakcin bɛɛ.
Yeti acca moki ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya, acaan ikin men gɛɛl ḍakti bɛɛ. Gena murka tolan parɛ aŋka ḍakti.
Acaan Wey ɔɔn Jwaŋa Tolan mena maldi ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ malɛɛka gɛɛl cuonnɛ ‘yati weenji, ɔci ɛkɛ yɔɔtcin ‘ya taaŋuti,

ɔci gɔki ‘yati agi, ‘Buuluc, naa i buay bɛɛ. I ḍakca bɛɛ. Ne baaṭi i yɔɔtca ḍuaŋa tolan ban Ḍɔɔm ñamɛti. Gɔṭṭi, acaan i magdi Juaŋ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci maka balgi iki i murka tolanji neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn da magdɛ Juaŋ daŋkun ba i ɔɔn.’
Hay ɛkkɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya! Acaan ŋeej ‘ya ikin maktin Jwaŋa Tolan ba naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka ‘ya myennati neeni.
Yeti ne baaṭi ikin mɔrtin kaŋ wyeñɛ gɛɛlti ɔci murka lɛɛkti jitin.”

Ɔci murka tolan bala ati amaam parɛ budan ɔɔn. Nink ɔɔn ninka balgɔn Galŋ Edriyajiyɛ, aŋi inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ. Ɔci te ninka neeniyɛ, te ween jiñɛ ba ne ween jiñɛ tuodan ɔɔn, maka kanŋan murka tolanti poŋi gɔki agi ṭɛɛr moki loonɔ bɛɛ.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn wyenti ḍɛkkɛ guonan ɔci luutci iñɔ galŋji luopi galŋo, ɔci galŋ tuod twod men bala ba yardan a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ (40) ɔɔn. Ɔci murka tolan ati ñamu moki ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ, ɔci gen luutci ma iñɔ moki, ɔci galŋ ṭaali baali ba yardan a men baan ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci mena parɛ byeŋkɛ (30) ɔɔn.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn buayi agi murka tolan dita ooddɔ pomk jitin, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn waka yɔɔddi murka tolan luutci iñɔ ne ŋaanɔ murka ŋwayɛti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔki agi, “Dala noon bɔwa, hay!”

Maka kanŋan murka tolanti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi yooŋdi ɔntɔ te murka ḍiɛran neeni lieda ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkkɛn murka ḍiɛran neeni luutci iñɔ pietin doki. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ma ñingɛn, ɛkkɛn bala gɔki agi ɛkkɛn buagɔnti waka yɔɔddi murka neeni, oldɛnti luuttɛnti iñɔ pietin murka tolan ñamɛti.
Ɔci Buuluc gɔkcin ḍuaŋati ɔci ackanti agi, “Hay, kan maka kanŋan murka tolan neeni ciya murka tolanji bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ ḍaktɛ waakida acca.”
Ɔci ackan ati, ɔci wyenga luotki ma murka ḍiɛran iñɔ neeniyɛ, ɛɛrɛ jitin, ɔci murka ḍiɛran neeni ati pieg wyetkɛnti parɛ budan ɔɔn.

Ɔci te ween jiñɛ neeni ne noon noŋi bɔɔdi ɔɔnyɛ, Buuluc bala gɔki mati te jyek oomdin. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Acca ninka ɛkkɛ ciyɛ budan te oomdin aŋi inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ doki. Te jyek murka tolan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ ommɛ gen gɛɛl bɛɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ omdɛ oomdin aŋka ɛkkɛ waakɔ tɛya, ɛkkɛ men gɛɛl ḍakti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ dɛndɛ baanji ne pwadan.”
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ byedg luullɛ bieŋɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi pwatcin Juaŋti te byedga neeni. Ɛkɛ gɔkcin a ɔɔn ma ñomgɛnti waakɛnda. Ɔci byedga neeni wɛɛnnɛ jitin, ɔci ɛkɛ omjin.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda yomgɛn pwadgin, ɔci ɛkkɛn omjin oomdin daŋkun.
Ɔɔn maka bala murka tolanjiyɛ, ɔɔn agɔn a miyyan ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔci ma baan ne ḍoogɔ mena parɛ byeŋkɛ, ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ (276).
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn omki ne korkɛn yoŋkiyɛ, ɛkkɛn poka bala murka tolan konɛti neeniyɛ, yiɛpcɛ bora Galŋa Tolanji aŋka murka tolan pwardɛ.

Ne noon bɔɔniyɛ, ṭɛra iwan yuarcɛ maka neeni, yeti ṭɛra neeni ñiyi ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci nona ḍooñan yuarcɛ ɛkkɛn. Nona neeniyɛ, pwad pwad a ŋɔmi budan. Ɔci maka neeniyɛ, poŋi gɔki agi dala murka tolan ooddɔ dɛndɔ nona ḍooñan neeniti aŋka yɔɔddɔ waan tuktanti nona ŋɔmiti neeni.

Ɔci waka cyɛgan yɔɔddi murkayɛ, wyeng ɛkkɛn ɛɛrɛ ma jitin, ɔci waka neeni dalji ɛkkɛn te pietin ɔɔn, ɔci waka nɛɛki ɛkkɛn murka neeniyɛ, cɔɔtcɛ noonɛnti, ɔci bworŋ murka wiɛnji ñaalɔ murka ñamɛti, ɔci murka tolan oŋ luoṭi noŋi dɛndi bora nona iwan.

Yeti murka tolan dɛñjin bora bɛɛ. Kaŋ wyeñɛ gɛɛl bala ḍiɛṭ ḍyɛr muulɛwi piego, ɔci yuarcɛ ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci ŋɔmma kaŋ wyeñɛti neeniyɛ, murka tolan muŋŋɛ. Ɔci murka tuka ñamu dɔŋnɛ niɛnti yaakinti woon moki bɛɛ. Ɔci ŋwayɛ bala yɔɔd ñaalɔ, ɔci pɔɔgi bala jiebi ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋi lɛɛkti jitin.
Ɔci ackanyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Dala maka a kɛɛnk neeniyɛ, noktin.” Ɛkkɛn gɔki a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛn buayi te maka a kɛɛnk neeni. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ne maka neeni mualdi borayɛ, agi ɛkki dita kordɔ ɔntɔ.

Yeti ɛkkɛn ma nogɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn dɛɛnɛ ḍuaŋa. Ḍuaŋa ma dɛɛnɛ a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn naa Buuluc noktan ma bɛɛ. Ɔci ḍuaŋa gɔkcin mati agi maka yaakinti mɔɔlyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn kuaddi pietin ñamu mualdi ooddi nona iwan,
ɔci maka pookɛn, maka kookinti muali neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ooddi te jang murka janga lɛɛktin neeni. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ma ati bora nona iwanti waakɛnda. Menga ḍakcin bɛɛ.
Ɔci ne ɔɔn tonnɔn bora te galŋjiyɛ, ɔɔn myetkɔn ma agi kaŋ wyeñɛ neeniyɛ, gena kaŋ wyeñɛ bartan ma a Malta.

Maka ciyi nona neenitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pɔkki ɔɔnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ɔɔn makkɔn. Ɛkkɛn maañ oljiti, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki ɔɔnti agi ma bɛɛdɔ oottɔ maccu. Ɛkkɛn ɔɔn orkinti maañ a ɔɔn acaan ñaal bala liɛbi ɔci jwami luy luyo.

Ɔci Buuluc bala lyemi jang daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkɛ jang oonɛ, ɔci ne ɛkɛ jang olnɛ maccuyɛ, kaaŋ bala jangti, ɔci ne jang waakɛn myɛlki te maañyɛ, ɔci kaŋa neeni kooyin bora te jangti ɔci Buuluc kaññɛ bieŋɛti, ɔci kaaŋ bala cual te ɛkɛ bieŋɛti.

Ɔci maka ciyi nona neeniti, ne gɔrki kaŋa neeni baali cuali te men bieŋɛti a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin pookɛn agi, “Hay, ‘wana neeni ɛkɛ nokkin menga. Ne ɛkkɛn bɛɛki te galŋjiyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍakcin galŋji bɛɛ, yeti acca ɛkɛ tuwa, kaapun.”
Yeti Buuluc kaaŋ byɛrnɛ maccu, ɔci kaaŋ ɛkɛ yannɛ bɛɛ.

Ɔci maka ciyi nona neenitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔṭi Buuluc, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala poŋi gɔki agi ɛkta wardan wiɛndɔ wardanda ɔci ḍɛmdɔ tuudɔ ne pɛñan kaapun. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ɛɛni gwali Buuluc a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ne gena yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛni ɛkɛti bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn jiek aagɛyɔ agi ɛkta agi juaŋo!

Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan ḍuaŋa maka ciyi kaŋ wyeñɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yenti Poblyac. Ɔci kaŋ wyeñɛ neeniyɛ, noon gɛɛl a non Poblyac. Non ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, cualcinti nona ɔɔn tonnɔn bora te galŋji. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkkin ɔɔnti agi ɔɔn bɛɛdjɔn ban ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɔɔn attɔn ban ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɔɔn niinnɔn ban ɛkkɛn nink ne ḍoogɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ pwana pwani ɔɔnti.

Ɔci wey Poblyacn bala niin iñɔ warɛ yaayɛ. Ɛkɛ warɛ myɛl myɛlo, ɔci ɛkɛ ‘yɛɛd a yimg moki. Ɔci Buuluc ati ḍieŋjin ɛkɛti, ɔci ne ɛkɛ cɔŋni Jwaŋa Tolantiyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ byeŋkɛ tannɛ men warɛti, ɔci mena neeniyɛ, ywaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ doki.
Ɔci acaan mena neeni ywaŋŋɛ Buuluc a ɔɔnyɛ, maka pookɛn bɛɛn ɛkɛti daŋkun. Ɛkkɛn a maka waakɛn yeyin. Gena maka ciyi kaŋ wyeñɛti. Ɔci Buuluc bala yɔŋi ɛkkɛn waakɛnda daŋkun.
Ɔci maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwanna pwani ɔɔnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ɔɔn ‘woñkɔn waka coŋin neeni budan. Ɔci ne ɔɔn jɔŋnɔn te aŋanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɔɔn ‘woñkɔn waka coŋin moki aŋka mokɔn ɔɔn waakɔ yomɔ pɔɔjɔ.

Ɔɔn balgɔn ciyɔn kaŋa neeni wyeñɛti ponk ne ḍoogɔ, ɔci ne ponka neeni bɛɛki borayɛ, ɔɔn taamnɔn murkati moki. Murka tolan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a murka maka ban Alɛkcaandriya. Ɔci yenti ɛkɛ a Jɔkin A Yuonko. Ɔci murka tolan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala yɔɔd kaŋ wyeñɛti te wɛɛñi wyeñɛ
Ɔci baabin tool konɛ baabin tolan ati ne ban Cirakyuc, ɔci ɛkɛ yɔɔni wɛnan noŋi nink ne ḍoogɔ.
Ɔci ne ninka neeni bɛɛki borayɛ, ɔɔn jɔŋnɔn te bana neeniti ɔci attɔn ne ban Ḍejyom. Ɔci ṭienin ñaalɔ ne liidɔ jwami yoŋŋin te pɔya cuayati. Ɔci te ninna akki ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔɔn dɛnnɔn ban Putiiyoli.

Ɔci aŋanyɛ, ɔɔn yɔṭṭɔn modg ɔɔn Ma Kiṭɔ gɛɛg. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala dɛyi ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi dala ɔɔn cooccɔn aŋan lakun nink ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɔci ɔɔn coonnɔn ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ ba jyek ɛkkɛn hayya ɔɔn oŋ jɔŋnɔn attɔn ban Ḍɔɔm oŋo.

Ɔci ne ɔɔn balgɔn te yom menyɛ, modg ɔɔn ban Ḍɔɔm tieŋŋin agi ɔɔn baljɔn bɛɛdjɔn, ɔci ɛkkɛn jɔŋŋin te ban Ḍɔɔm, ɔci ɛkkɛn ma gɛɛg bɛɛn kookkin ban Apyac. Ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg bɛɛn kooŋnin iki ɔɔn bana balki oorg wɛlg oorga ne ḍoogɔy. Ɔci ne Buuluc maka neeni yuarti ne bɛɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin Juaŋti agi pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ pwanni.
Ne ɔɔn dɛnnɔn ban Ḍɔɔmyɛ, ḍuaŋa Buuluc olnɛ ciginji bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ gɔki agi dala Buuluc coottɔ pardan baan kondanti on gɛɛlti, ɔci ackan gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ olji ma gɔṭi ɛkɛ.

Ɔci ne ninka ne ḍoogɔ neeni baakiyɛ, Buuluc borcin ḍuaŋan ma Icrayiil ban Ḍɔɔm agi dala ɛkki bɛɛdɔ ḍieŋdɔ ɛkɛti. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn bɛɛki nona ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya noŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl kɛɛn ikinti bɛɛ. Ɔci jyek yɔrg ikinyɛ, ‘ya jwali gɛɛl bɛɛnji bɛɛ. Yeti ne ‘ya baala ban Urcaliimji menyɛ, ‘ya ‘woñka ma ma Ḍɔɔm byeŋkɛnti, ɔci ‘ya olka ma ciginji.
Ma Ḍɔɔm neeniyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki jyek ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn ‘ya pɔkta, acaan ɛkkɛn yɔṭi ‘ya noŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl aŋka akuuma buagɛ nokki ‘ya bɛɛ.

Yeti ma Icrayiil yookɔn te pɔkkin ‘ya. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkcan ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛti ka dala jyek ‘ya eetan gwaldɛ ḍuaŋa tolan ban Ḍɔɔm neeni. Ne ‘ya gɔŋna a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya buaga gɔkca jyeka yeyin ma ikinti bɛɛ.

Ɔci acca ɛkkɛ bornin ‘ya acaan ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛ yuardin, ɔci ikin gɔktin iki ‘ya. ‘Ya buaga ikin gɔktin iki ‘ya a ɔɔn, acaan jyeka ‘ya ḍɛɛkkati ma te jiŋgin neeniyɛ, gena jyeka kɛɛtan kɛɛn ikin ma Icrayiil neeni daŋkun.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin Buulucti agi, “Worga gɛɛl bɛɛn ɔɔnti te ban Yahuudiya te jyek i bɛɛ. Ɔci modg ikin ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɛkkɛn men gɛɛl bɛɛn gɔki ɔɔnti te i agi i yaajji bɛɛ.
Yeti dala i ɔɔn myettɔn te paŋŋa paŋa i neeni, acaan ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ma tɔɔmi te malla neeni baan warda.”

Ɔci ɛkkɛn jiek naŋɛ, gena jyek oŋŋa ɛkkɛn bɛɛti gɔrti jiek iki Buulucy. Ɔci ne oŋŋa neeni bɛɛniyɛ, ma bɛɛn nona ona ciyi Buuluc. Ɛkkɛn bɛɛn a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ, kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Ɔci Buuluc bala lwoki ma te jyeka neeni te liidɔ ne oŋ unni ɔɔn. Jyeka lwogdɛ Buuluc neeniyɛ, gena jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci Buuluc bala lwoki ɛkkɛn te ganuun Muuca, ɔci te worgan maka bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkɛ bala ‘yeṭi ɛkkɛnti ne pɛñan aŋka ɛkkɛn jyeddi Yaccuti.
Ma gɛɛg jyeti jyeka guagdɛ ɛkɛ neeniti, ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg jyeti bɛɛ.

Ɔci ma Icrayiil ɛkkɛn jiek kɛɛbɛ jitin, maga da te jiekɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi jyɛndi jitin ooddi baanji. Ɔci Buuluc gɔkcin jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl ɛkkɛnti moki agi, “Oŋŋa Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan gɔŋni yɔrg ɛkkɛti te lɛmi Icaayayɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkkin jyeka neeni awarɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔki Icaayati agi,

‘Dala i ootta maka neeniti, ɔci gɔkca ɛkkɛnti agi, ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jiek a tieŋŋin oŋkanda ɔɔn, yeti ɛkkɛ yaakɛti jiek jitkɛn yuartɛ ne pwadan moki bɛɛ. Ɔci moki, ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ a gwali oŋkanda ɔɔn, yeti ɛkkɛ yaakɛti waak yuartɛ ne pwadan moki bɛɛ.

Dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ mati a ɔɔn, acaan maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn poli doki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn jyetkɛn poli doki te tyeŋi jyek ‘ya. Ɔci ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn mitcɛti doki. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔrti te woŋgɛn moki bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn jyetkɛn pɔktan moki bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti jiek yuartanji yomgɛnti moki bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn yaltan bɛya ‘yati moki bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ywaŋdi ‘ya moki bɛɛ.’
“Ɔci acaan jwali Juaŋ neeni a jwalla awarɛyɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ jyeka yuoci Juaŋ ma neeniyɛ, ati Keedin Pookɛnti daŋkun cuuññɛ Juaŋ ɛkkɛnti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yookɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn aŋka tieŋdi.” [
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ baali gɔki jyeka neeniyɛ, ma Icrayiil kaaccin bora, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ tyewɔ yɔtin pookɛn ne pɛñan.]

Ɔci Buuluc bala ciyi on gɛɛlti, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ḍɔci bilk oŋkanda te ona neeni. Ɔci yuong ɛkɛ yuonga ɛkɛ cieni ona neenitiyɛ, a yyɛɛwɔ. Ɔci ne ma bɛɛki ḍieŋki ɛkɛti oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ pwanna pwani ɛkkɛnti.
Ɔci ɛkɛ bala mieti ɛkkɛn te cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala loṭi ma te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala loṭi ma lyɛli a lyɛllo. Men gɛɛl bala dɛyi ɛkɛ te lali bɛɛ.
Gena ‘ya Buuluc kiewan worga ɛkkɛti neeni. ‘Ya a kɛɛngɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ. ‘Ya muŋŋa Jwaŋa Tolan naŋŋa a cuuda ɛkɛ. ‘Ya muona ɛkɛ bora ‘wonna kanŋa lali jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin.
Jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyeka guaŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan mati te baaṭi te Kaci ɛkɛy. Gena jyeka kiiwɛ bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan worganjiy.
Jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, gena jyek Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan. Ne ɛkɛ aŋŋi men baanyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛɛn te yɔr ɛkkɛn Daawud ḍuaŋa tolanti.
Te oŋŋa ɛkɛ jɔŋni ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti mokiyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeejji ma ɛkɛ a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛ, ɔci pwani Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkɛti. Mena guagdi ‘ya neeniyɛ, gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ Ciɛggɔn ikin.
Ɔci te yom ɛkɛ yoma pwadanyɛ, ‘ya ‘wonna Juaŋ kanŋa, ɔci ‘ya naŋŋa ɛkɛ aŋi cuuda Yaccu te yenti ɛkɛ aŋka ‘ya maka Kɛɛna Pookɛn myetka aŋka ɛkkɛn jyeddi waakɛnda ɔci noŋdi ba jyek Juaŋo.
Ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun bornɛ Juaŋo, ɔci ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ ma Yaccu Kiṭɔ.

Maka ani Juaŋ ban Ḍɔɔm maka muonɛ Juaŋ bora waakɛnda ɔci naŋŋɛ aŋi ma ɛkɛ nɛ, ‘ya kiewan worga ɛkkɛti. Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ naŋki pwani ɔci coodi pwanno.
Acca ɛkkɛ myettin, te ñamu ne ‘ya baala cɔka Juaŋti te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ‘ya yomu pwanna pwani Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ, acaan ma bonk jitin tieŋŋin agi ɛkkɛ jyetcɛ Juaŋti doki.
Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan mena kanŋa ɛkɛ naŋdi ‘ya neeniyɛ, jyeka guagdi ‘ya neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ a jyeka awarɛ. Oŋkanda ne ‘ya baala cɔkayɛ, ‘ya cɔk te ɛkkɛ daŋkun.
Oŋkanda ne ‘ya baala cɔka Juaŋtiyɛ, ‘ya tooc ɛkɛti ka dala ɛkɛ ‘ya noŋda pɔy ba yom ɛkɛ aŋka ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ikin yɔɔrtin iki ɛkkɛ,
ɔci ɛkkɛ magdin ‘ya te jyek Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛɛtɛ.
Ne ikin baltin iki ‘yayɛ, ikin ṭeettin yɔtin pookɔ te jyek Juaŋ acaan ikin akin maka jyeti jyek ɛkɛy.

Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga jwalla parɛ gɛɛl ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ daŋkun. ‘Ya baal gɔk jyek woon oŋkanda ka ‘ya bɛɛd aŋka ɛkkɛ magdin te jyek Juaŋ aŋka ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛti jyeddi Juaŋti daŋkun ba jyeka mugɛ Keedin Pookɛn gɛɛg neeni. Yeti woon tɛy tɛy aŋa ‘yati men.
Acaan jyeka neeni bala ‘ya ḍwaŋuti aŋka eed keedin pookɛnti waakɛnda ɔci ma ‘yati. Kan ɛkkɛn a maka ñingɛn tɛyan ɔci walla kan ɛkkɛn a maka ñingɛn morŋanyɛ, ‘ya buaga jiek eed ɛkkɛnti ɔɔn.
’Ya cyegga woon ban Ḍɔɔm ka ‘ya bɛɛd aŋka ‘ya pocca ɛkkɛ laldin te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni daŋkun.

’Ya buay te miti ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni bɛɛ. Te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan yaakinti yuoci maka jyeddi jyeka neenitiy. Kan ɛkkɛn a ma Icrayiil walla kan a Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ waakɛnda ɔɔn.

Te ñamu jyek pɔya ma pwatti Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛtiyɛ, ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɔci acca te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, jyek pɔy ŋeennin ikin doki. Pɔya neeniyɛ, gena pɔya jyetti ma Juaŋtiy. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Maka pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn uda te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Juaŋti neeni.”
Jwaŋa Tolan looñi maka nɔɔtk maka noŋi naŋka yeyin neeniti, acaan jyek ɛkɛ jyeka awarɛ yiegin ɛkkɛnti aŋi ba jyeka budan.
Ne ɛkkɛn noŋti a ɔɔn, ɛkkɛn jyek Juaŋ kwoyɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn nɔɔnnɛ Juaŋ te jyek ɛkɛ doki.

Ɔci te oŋŋa ɛkɛ okki noon warda, ɔci ne acca ɔɔnyɛ, kan ma gɔrti waka aŋŋɛ ɛkɛyɛ, ŋeettan ɛkkɛn a Jwaŋa Tolan bala, ɔci ŋeettan ma Juaŋ tɛɛna tɛɛno. Kan ɛkkɛn noŋi ne yaayan oŋkanda a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti waakɛn byɛrtan te genga Juaŋti bɛɛ.
Acaan ɛkkɛn Juaŋ ŋeeckɔn doki, yeti ɛkkɛn noŋi ba ɛkɛ agi Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti Juaŋti a pwatcin bɛɛ. Paŋi ɛkkɛn aŋi paŋŋa budan ɔci wyetk ɛkkɛn wyetka baaki jiek neeni aŋi myelko.
Ɛkkɛn bala poŋi ba paŋi ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba maka ñingɛn tɛyan, yeti ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛɛcin awarɛ bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba maka aamman.

Jwaŋa Tolan pwanna pwanno. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala oŋkanda ɔɔn baadi bɛɛ, yeti ma yookɔn te ɛkɛ. Ɔci ma bala moṭi waka pɔɔtan ɛkkɛn a pɔɔt waka naŋtan ma ba ma baan, ɔci ba ḍiirg, ɔci ba leyi, ɔci ba kogi ɔɔny.
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn Juaŋ dalkiti a ɔɔnyɛ, Juaŋ daŋkun ɛkkɛn dalnɛ noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan te naŋki tommo. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala noŋi ne yaayan waak ɛkkɛnti.
Ɛkkɛn yookɔn te jyek Juaŋ ɔci jyeti gena jyeka jomginti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala moṭi waka cɔnnɛ Juaŋ a cɔniy. Ɔci Juaŋ Mena Oki Waak mena pwadan mena bala yuonginda neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka dalji ɛkkɛn te mallo.
Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn dalnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan noŋi ba naŋki ɛkkɛn pookɛn neeni. Naŋki ɛkkɛn a tommo. Maka moongyɛ, yookɔn te ‘uay ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala noŋi amaam waak ɛkkɛnti pookɛn.

Maka ‘uayyɛ, ɛkkɛn moong ɛkkɛn daljɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tob yɔtin pookɛn. Yomg ɛkkɛn buagɔn ɛkkɛn tob yɔtin pookɛn ne pɛñan. Ɔci te naŋka neeniyɛ, maka ‘uay yiegin ne pɛñan. Ɛkkɛn aŋi ba maka amgin te naŋka neeni doki, ɔci naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni ɛkkɛn yaaññɛ bala ba ywobji Juaŋ bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti doki.
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn yookɛti waakɛn te ŋeejjin ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeettitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn dalnɛ Juaŋ poŋi ba paŋi ɛkkɛn, ɔci noŋi ba naŋki ɛkkɛn. Paŋi ɛkkɛn ɔci naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni yeyɔ ne tolan.

Nɔji ɛkkɛn tol tolo. Naŋka yaayan gɛɛl dalji ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn waakɛn ḍigɔ. Ɛkkɛn cooddɛn yeyɔ acaan ɛkkɛn a ywobko. Ɛkkɛn korkɛn modɔ. Ɛkkɛn ani nooŋi mako. Ɛkkɛn woowɔ yɔtin pookɛn. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ma ñingɛn. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn yeyɔ mati. Ɛkkɛn lɔṭi ma waakɛn.

Ɛkkɛn wooki maka pookɛn. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn yeyɔ Jwaŋa Tolanti. Ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn yeyɔ. Ɛkkɛn poŋi agi ɛkkɛn pwadginti ɔci maka pookcɛn aŋka yiegɔ. Ɛkkɛn jieyi waakɛn pookɛn. Maka neeni etti naŋka wonkɛn naŋka yeyin. Ɛkkɛn tyeŋi jyek weyyɛn ɔci jyek mɛyyɛn bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛn ciyi amaam budan. Ɛkkɛn tieci jiek waakɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ani ma bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn baaw mati.

Ɛkkɛn jiek ŋeecɔn ne Juaŋ gɔki agi kan mena noŋdi ba nɔjja neeniyɛ, ɛkta tuudɔ. Jiek ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn, yeti ɛkkɛn noŋi men ɔɔn. Yeti maka noŋi nɔjja neeniyɛ, kan maka pookɛn noŋdi ba naŋka neeniyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi a ɔŋŋiyɛ, pwadɔ.

Hay, i gɔk kaapun agi ɛkɛ pwadjɛ, ɔci maka pookcɛn aŋka yiegɔ acaan i a men ma Icrayiil kaapun. Kan i gɔk agi maka pookɛn yeyɔyɛ, bala ba i wook war i paru, acaan naŋki i bala ba naŋki ɛkkɛn daŋkun ɔɔn.
Çeecin ikin kan ma noŋdi nɔjja neeniyɛ, ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti, ɔci a ɔɔn yaayɛ bɛɛ, yɔmjin.
Kan i gɔk maka pookɛn noŋi amaam ɔci kan nɔji i bala ba nɔji ɛkkɛn daŋkunyɛ, i poŋ gɔk ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya iti bɛɛ? Bɛya, hay!

Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwad pwad mati. Ɛkɛ mwondi te ma ne pɛñan bɛɛ. Acaan ywobji Juaŋ bɛɛn mati men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi ywobji ɛkta bɛɛdɔ moki bɛɛ. Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn ɛkkɛ waakɔ yaldɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkɛ yomɛ pwanni a pwani ɛkkɛti neeni.

Kan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ wyetkɔ tɛy tɛy ɔci kan ɛkkɛ wiaktɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛ bɛɛyɛ, ne baaṭi oŋŋa Juaŋ ywobji ɛkɛ lɛɛldɛ borayɛ, ywobji ɛkɛ yuardɛ ɛkkɛ pookɔ daŋkun. Kan Juaŋ noŋdi godan matiyɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ neeni a nɔji bɛɛ.
Acaan ne ɛkɛ noŋdi godan matiyɛ, “Juaŋ ma ‘wondɛ waak menga da ba naŋki ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da ba naŋki ɛkɛ.”

Maka noŋi ne pwadan oŋkanda a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ Juaŋ tɛɛtin, ɔci tɛɛtin neeniyɛ, baadi oŋgati bɛɛ. Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka lieṭi jyeka pwadin. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn agi dala Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkti agi ɛkkɛn pwadginti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn moki lieṭi tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛy.
Maka noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn ɔci yookɔn te jyeka pwadin ɔci tyeŋi gena jyeka yeyin oŋkandayɛ, ɛkkɛn ywobji Juaŋ yuartan ne baaṭi, acaan Juaŋ looñi te naŋki ɛkkɛn.
Ma waakɛnda maka noŋi ne yaayan neeni kan a ma Icrayiil walla kan a Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, taab ɛkkɛn pɛñ pɛñ ɛkkɛnti pwatcin bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn yiegdi ne pɛñan.
Maka noŋi ne pwadan oŋkandayɛ, kan a ma Icrayiil walla kan a Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, waka pwadin yuartan ɛkkɛn. Juaŋ jieddi ɛkkɛn ɔci andi ɛkkɛn ɔci coodda pwadan bala ɛkkɛnti.
Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ kɛɛb ma jitkɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi ma balgi bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ waakcinda.

Maka balki ganuun Muuca bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn noŋi nɔji oŋkandayɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍakti daŋkun. Maka balki ganuun Muucayɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn noŋi nɔji men ɔɔnyɛ, godan ɛkkɛn bala daŋkun, ɔci nona godantiyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan jiek lɛɛldɛ bora ɛkkɛnti te ganuun Muuca ganuun bala ɛkkɛntiy.
Kan ma tieŋdi jyek ganuun a tieŋŋin oŋkanda te jyetkɛn budan ɔci noŋi ba jyek ganuun bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti bɛɛ. Gena maka tieŋdi ɔci noŋi ba jyek ganuun aŋka pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛtiy.
Keedin Pookɛn ɛkkɛn balki ganuun Muuca bɛɛ. Yeti kan naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn neeni bala ba ganuunyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkkɛn balki ganuun doki.
Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ganuun jitkɛn bala ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti doki. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn noŋti gengayɛ, jiek gɔkti ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti agi naŋka neeniyɛ, pwatcin, walla naŋka neeniyɛ, yaayɛ.

Jyeka neeni bɛya bora te oŋa Jwaŋa Tolan gɔrti jyeka bala a coggɔn ma yomgɛnti te naŋki godan bala ba jyeka loṭa ‘ya ma a jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Godan neeni ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ Yaccu bieŋɛti aŋka naŋdɛ ɛkɛ.
Hay i, i bor war i agi i a men Ma Yahuud, ɔci i tier waru jyek ganuunti, ɔci i jieyi waru agi i ag men Jwaŋa Tolan,
ɔci naŋki Juaŋ naŋka ɛkɛ buagiti ŋeej i, ɔci jyek naŋka pwadan ŋeej i acaan i lalki ma te ganuun.
I gɔk agi maka kɛɛna pookcɛnyɛ, ɛkki balgi ba maka ñingɛn ulɔ, ɔci agi ɛkki balgi ba maka ciyi nona mielo. Ɔci i gɔk agi i a mena wɛɛyi maka neeni, ɔci agi i a mena dɛki maka ciyi nona ulan neeniti.
I gɔk agi i a mena loṭi maka jiek kwoyɔny, ɔci agi i a mena loṭi maka ḍyɛrin moki. Çeej i ne pwadan te ganuunyɛ, i waak ŋeeji, ɔci naŋka awarɛ moki ŋeej i.
Ne i loṭi maka pookɛn a ɔɔn wannay, oŋ i daŋkun waru lala bɛɛ? I lor ma agi, “Naa ma korti waak bɛɛ. Yeti ne i loṭi ma a ɔɔn wan, i waanu kor waak bɛɛ?”

I gɔk maka pookɛnti ne pɛñan agi, “Naa ma noŋdi tomi bɛɛ.” Yeti i noŋ tomi bɛɛ? Ɛkkɛ dɛyɛ ma agi naa ma mortɔ jɔkinti bɛɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi dala ma morti aŋa Jwaŋa Tolanti pardan. Oŋ ɛkkɛ woodgɔ jitkɔ moṭɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti te yoma awarɛ bɛɛ ogo?
I poŋ gɔk agi i baal ñamu acaan i balki worga Jwaŋa Tolan, yeti i lɛɛwi ganuun Juaŋ jitkɛn dɔki bɛɛ? Ɔci a ɔɔn i noŋ ne yaayan Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ?
Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Te naŋki ɛkkɛyɛ, maka keedin Pookɛn neeniyɛ, ḍori agi yenti Jwaŋa Tolan yaayɔ.”

I poŋ kaapun agi acaan i ŋutki mayɛ, i a men Juaŋ waanɛ te naŋka wanna. Hayɛllɛ! Yeti ne i jyek Juaŋ tiidi ñinyɛ, a ɔɔn aŋka pwatcin bala ba ne i ŋutkiti ma no. Kan i ganuun Juaŋ tiyayɔyɛ, jyek ŋwoti yɔmdi iti. Yeti kan i bɛɛy ganuun Juaŋ jitkɛnyɛ, i baal ba mena ciyi budan te jyek ŋwotto.
Yeti kan mena ŋudi ma bɛɛ jyek ganuun tiidɛ ñinyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin.
Kan i jyek ganuun tiya ñin bɛɛyɛ, mena ŋudi ma bɛɛ neeni aŋka pwatcin ne tolan te i nɔñji.
I a men Juaŋ acaan i a men ma Icrayiil budan bɛɛ, ɔci walla acaan ma gɔki agi i pwadji acaan i ŋutki ma iñuti bɛɛ.

I a men Juaŋ acaan yom i pwatcin. A ɔɔnyɛ, Juaŋ oŋ gɔkti agi i pwadji oŋo. Gena jyek naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan te Boŋ ɛkɛ ma yomgɛnti. Maka neeni buagɔn naa ma baan gɔki agi ɛkkɛn pwadginti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn gena Juaŋ aŋka gɔkti agi ɛkkɛn pwadginti.
Ɛkkɛ toocɛ agi ma Icrayiil bala ñamu te genga boki? Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi jyek ŋwoti neeni yɔmjin te genga boki?
Ɛɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ma Icrayiil neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ñamu te worga Juaŋo, acaan gena ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ worga ɛkɛ te ñamuy.
Yeti ma Icrayiil gɛɛgyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyek Juaŋ tiiyɛyɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci kan ne ɛkkɛn jiek bɛɛkitiji a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci Juaŋ daŋkun jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ma Icrayiil neeni agdɛyɔ?

Hayɛllɛ! Kan ikin gɔkin agi ma waakɛnda jomi jiekyɛ, naa ikin gɔktin a ɔɔn Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ. Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a Mena awarɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki te Juaŋ agi, “Jyeka guaŋŋi iyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ŋeettan ma ɛkkɛn a jyeka awarɛ. Kan ma gɔkti a naŋki i bala a ɔɔn walla a ɔɔnyɛ, dala jyek i jyek ɛkkɛn bwantan.”

Ma gɛɛg gɔki agi ikin akin nɔɔtko. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne ma gɔkki agi ikin akin nɔɔtk ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka pwad pwad parɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jwalla pwadan bɛɛn Juaŋti. Ɔci kan jwalla pwadan bɛya Juaŋtiyɛ, oŋ ɛkɛ moki noŋdi ywobji ikinti ogo? Ywobji ɛkɛ yaayɛ bɛɛ?
Hayɛllɛ! Ywobji Juaŋ yaayɛ bɛɛ. Kan ywobji ɛkɛ yaayɛyɛ, oŋ ɛkɛ noŋdi godan maka ciyi ṭɛɛrji a ɔki?
Kan jomi jiek ‘ya pwani Juaŋ lɛɛldɛ boray, oŋ jiek dɔɔkti ‘ya wyeñuti moki ba mena nɔɔdɔn ɔɔn ogo?
Oŋ ba ikin gɔktin agi dala ikin noŋtin ne yaayan aŋka naŋka pwadan bɛya ikinti bɛɛ? Ma gɛɛg gɔki agi ‘ya lorcɔ ma a ɔɔn. Jyeka bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti wanna yaayɛ bɛɛ. Yɔmjin.
Jiek bala a ɔki? Ikin ma Icrayiil pwatkin te Keedin Pookɛn? Hayɛllɛ! A ɔɔn bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti doki ka ma waakɛnda a nɔɔtko.
Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Mena pwadan gɛɛl bala bɛɛ.
Ɔci men gɛɛl tieŋŋin jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ, ɔci menga bala lieṭi jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ waakɛnda. Ɛkkɛn yeyɔ waakɛnda. Menga bala noŋi ne pwadan ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ. Baawo.
Jyek ɛkkɛn bala ba kool tukɛ ne pɔkkiti ma ɔci ŋooyi ne yaayany. Ɔci te lɛmi ɛkkɛnyɛ, jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn a jyeka a jomgin budan. Jyek ɛkkɛn bala ba ñaang kaaŋ ɛkkɛn tuggɛnti.
Ɛkkɛn tuggɛn kumgin te ‘wali ma te jyeka yeyin.
Ɛkkɛn ani nooŋi mako.
Nona ootti ɛkkɛnyɛ, jiek yiegdi te naŋki ɛkkɛn, ɔci ma cooddɛn yiegdi doki.
Ɛkkɛn jyek coodda pwadan ŋeecɔn bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛn buayi Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.”

Jwaŋa Tolan ma ‘wonnɛ ganuun. Gena jyek naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka ɛkɛ buagiti naŋtan may. Ganuun jitkɛn waakɛnda bɛɛn maka neeniti budan bɛɛ. Juaŋ ma myennɛ te naŋka neeni aŋka ŋeettan ɛkkɛn naŋki ɛkkɛn yɔmjin bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, menga yaakinti gɔɔdi agi ɛkɛ pwadjɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, menga yaakinti gɔɔdi agi godan ɛkɛ baawɔ ne baaṭi Juaŋti bɛɛ.
Menga yaakinti pwada Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti te jyek ganuun bɛɛ. Te jyek ganuunyɛ, ŋeettan ma naŋki ɛkkɛn yaayɛ a nɔjjo.
Pɔya ma baan pwatti Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛtiyɛ, yuarɛ ma doki. Gena jyek ganuun bɛɛ. Pɔya neeni guagɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te baaṭi, ɔci guaŋŋɛ Muuca daŋkun.
Pɔya ma baan pwatti Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti neeniyɛ, gena jyenna ma jyetti Yaccu Kiṭɔtiy. Pɔya neeni bala te ma waakɛnda maka jyeddi ɛkɛtiy. Acaan ma waakɛnda bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Acaan ma waakɛnda noŋi nɔji doki. Ɔci men gɛɛl bala pwad pwad ba Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ, naŋki ma waakɛnda bɔɔnjin.
Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, men gɛɛl yaakinti pwada parɛ bɛɛ. Ma pwaddi te naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan naŋka pwadan naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te yom ɛkɛ parɛ oŋŋa ɛkɛ ikin wanninti ɛkɛ te yimg Yaccu Kiṭɔy.

Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka jyeddi ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti ŋeedi iki ɛkɛ. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeejji ma ɛkɛ pwad pwado. Te ñamu ma bala poŋi agi naŋki ɛkta baali a ɔki ne ɛkɛ ñingɛ yalnɛ ɔntɔ te nɔji ma baanti neeniy.
Ɔci te lyen Yaccuyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan pwani ɛkɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora mati aŋka pwani ɛkɛ ŋeettan ma. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan mieti a ɛkɛ maka jyeddi ɛkɛti te yenti Yacuuyɛ, naŋdɛ pwaddi ɛkɛ ñamɛti.

Men gɛɛl yaakinti jieyi warɛ parɛ agi ɛkɛ pwadjɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti bɛɛ. Jyek jiɛta jieki ma waakɛn neeniyɛ, bala moki bɛɛ. Bawwin doki. Bawwin te jyek naŋka naŋtin ikinyɛ? A’a, bawwin te jyek jyenna ma jyetti Yaccu Kiṭɔtiy.
Ikin gɔkin agi ma pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyenna ma jyetti Yaccuti neeni parɛ, ma pwaddi te tiit jyek ganuun bɛɛ.
Jwaŋa Tolan a Juaŋ ma Icrayiil pookɛn? Walla ɛkɛ a Juaŋ Keedin Pookɛn daŋkun? Ɛɛ, ɛkɛ a Juaŋ Keedin Pookɛn daŋkun.
Maka jyeddiyɛ, kan ɛkkɛn a ma Icrayiil, walla kan ɛkkɛn a Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Juaŋti neeni. Jwaŋ ɛkkɛn a Jwaŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Te jyenna ma jyetki Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ganuun aŋi jyeka budan doki? A’a, aŋi jyeka budan bɛɛ. Ganuun pwad pwado, ɔci kanŋa ɛkɛ bala daŋkun.
Oŋ ikin gɔktin a ɔki te Abrahim mena yɔr ikin neeni?
Kan te Abrahim pwanni Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti te naŋki ɛkɛ parɛyɛ, te Abrahim aŋka jieddi warɛ parɛ. Yeti ɛkɛ yaakinti jieyi warɛ Juaŋ ñamɛti bɛɛ acaan gena Juaŋ aŋka ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ pwani wanna.
Jyeka kiigin neeni gɔki a ɔki te jyek Abrahim? Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Abrahim jyeti Juaŋti ɔci ɛkɛ pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti.”
Kan men noŋi kanŋayɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wontan ma waak budan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ‘wontan ma waak ba kanŋa ɛkɛ.

Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena yomɛ pɔktɛ noŋi naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka pwadan maka nɔɔtkti aŋka ɛkkɛn pwatti ɛkɛ ñamɛti neeni. Maka naŋdi ɛkɛ pwaddi neeniyɛ, gena maka jyeddi ɛkɛtiy. Juaŋ noŋi a ɔɔn te yom ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn te naŋki ma baan bɛɛ.
Maka naŋdi Juaŋ ɔci pwaddi ɛkɛ ñamɛti te yom ɛkɛ parɛ pwaddi te naŋki ɛkkɛn pookɛn bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn ciyi yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Daawud ne ɛkɛ gɔki agi,
“Kan mena bɔɔktɛ Juaŋ te nɔji ɛkɛyɛ, ɔci kan nɔji ɛkɛ kwomdi ñin Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ ciyi yomɛ ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
Kan mena bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ te nɔji ɛkɛ dokiyɛ, kan Juaŋ jiek duaktɛ ɛkɛ wyeñɛti bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ niin ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.”
Gena ma yomgɛn ñɔɔki neeni bala te ma Icrayiil maka ŋuodɛ ma pookɛn? Walla bala te Keedin Pookɛn maka ŋuodɛ ma bɛɛ daŋkun? Ikin gɔkin agi Abrahimyɛ, ɛkɛ pwani Juaŋti te jyenna jyetti ɛkɛ neeni.
Oŋŋa ɛkɛ pwanni Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋudɛ ma doki? Walla ɛkɛ ŋudɛ ma men bɛɛ? Ɛkɛ pwani Juaŋti te ñamu ne ɛkɛ ŋutkiti ma men bɛɛy.

Ɛkɛ ŋudi ma ne ŋoyɔ. Ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ jyek ŋwoti aŋka ɛkɛ ŋeettan ma ɛkɛ pwani Juaŋti te ñamu doki te jyenna jyetti ɛkɛ Juaŋti neeni. Abrahim naŋŋɛ Juaŋ aŋi yɔr maka pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti waakɛnda te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Juaŋti neeni. Gena maka ciyi budan te jyek ŋwotiy.
Ɔci ɛkɛ aŋi yɔr maka balki jyek ŋwoti daŋkun. Maka balki jyek ŋwoti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeti Juaŋti ba Abrahim ɔɔn ne Abrahim ŋutkiti ma men bɛɛy.
Ne Juaŋ gɔŋni Abrahimti agi dala ṭɛra neeni agdɔ ṭɛr ma ɛkta baan wardandayɛ, Juaŋ gɔki a ɔɔn acaan Abrahim pwani ɛkɛti te jyenna jyetti ɛkɛ neeni. Jyeka neeni a ganuun bɛɛ.

Kan ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔki agi gena ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te jwali neeni aga gen maka tieci ganuunyɛ, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi jyenna ma jyetki Juaŋti neeniyɛ, a genga moki bɛɛ, ɔci jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Abrahimti neeniyɛ, aŋi jyeka budan daŋkun.
Ma pwaddi Juaŋti te ganuun bɛɛ. Gena jyek ywobji aŋka bɛya mati te ganuun. Te jyek ganuun baaki matiyɛ, te genga bala lɛktan ma jitin bɛɛ.

Jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Abrahimti agi dala ṭɛra neeni agdɔ ṭɛr ma ɛkta baan kondan warda neeniyɛ, bala te jyenna ma jyetki Juaŋti, acaan Juaŋ yomɛ pwad pwado. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Abrahimti neeniyɛ, bala te kɛɛgin Abrahim waakɛnda. Gena maka balki ganuun ɔci maka jyeti Juaŋti ba Abrahim ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ a yɔr ikin waakida,

bala ba jyeka kiigin jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Abrahimti agi, “I naŋdin ‘ya agdi yɔr kɛɛna coŋin.” Jyenna Abrahim jyetti Juaŋti neeniyɛ, yɔmjin, acaan jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Abrahimti neeniyɛ, a jyeka budan bɛɛ. Gena jyek mena yaakinti ma luoldɛ ñaalɔ te lientiy. Ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti moki ma myettɛ te jyeka bɛya ne ŋoyɔy.
Ne pɔy jiedi kaci baawi menyɛ, Abrahim bala kɛɛy naŋki Juaŋ men. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi ‘yɔr kɛɛna coŋin bala ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ɛkɛti agi, “Kɛɛgin i coŋdi ɔci ma yaaktanti poki ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.”

Çeejɛ Abrahim ɛkɛ aŋi daan doki, kaci bɛya te ɛkɛti moki bɛɛ, acaan yuong ɛkɛ aŋi miyya ne cyɛɛlɔ (100) doki. Yeti ɛkɛ bala poŋi jiek bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ jyeti jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ɛkɛti te ñamuy. Ɔci ŋeejɛ Abrahim daŋkun ɛŋ ɛkɛ Caara yaakinti jieda moki bɛɛ.

Yeti Abrahim yomɛ yaañi oŋ gɛɛlti tieki jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ɛkɛti neeni bɛɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ tɛy tɛy te jyenna ɛkɛ jyetti Juaŋti neeni. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala jieyi Juaŋ agi Juaŋ yaakiti noŋdɔ ba jyeka guaŋda ɛkta te ñamu ɛkɛti neeni.
Abrahim gɔki a ɔɔn, acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ yomɛti Juaŋ yaakinti noŋdi ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ɛkɛti neeni.
Ne Abrahim jyetti Juaŋti a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ agi, “Ɛkɛ pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyenna ɛkɛ jyetti neeni.”
Ne jyeka kiigin gɔkki agi “Abrahim pwani Juaŋtiyɛ,” jyek pwani neeni bala te ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ.
Jyek pwani bala te ikin maka jyeti Juaŋti daŋkuny. Kan ma jyeddi Juaŋti ba Abrahimyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwaddi Jwaŋa Tolan mena Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ luolnɛ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti neeni ñamɛti daŋkun.
“Yaccu tuun te nɔji ikin, ɔci ɛkɛ luolnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ, aŋka ikin pwannin Juaŋ ñamɛti te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.”
Acaan ikin pwannin Juaŋti te jyenna ikin jyettin ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ikin ŋeenin iki Juaŋ doki te naŋki Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Jiek bala moki bɛɛ.

Te naŋki Yaccuyɛ, Juaŋ yomɛ pwada a pwani ikinti. Ɛkɛ yomɛ pwanna a pwani ikinti oŋkanda ɔɔn te yom ɛkɛ parɛ. Ɔci coodi ikin neeniyɛ, pwad pwado. Ɔci ikin ciyin yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn oŋkanda acaan ikin jyettin ɔci balkin kɛɛyin pwani Juaŋ pwanna bɛya ne baaṭi ikintiy.

Ikin yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te jyeka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeni pookɛn bɛɛ, te jyeka acca daŋkun. Kan taab bala ikintiyɛ, ikin yaakinti yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn men. Çeecin ikin kan taab bala ikinti ɔci kan ikin yomgɔ pwadɔ men ɔɔnyɛ, ikin yomgɔ tɛya te taab neeni.
Ɔci te yom tɛɛn neeniyɛ, ikin balkin ba kɛɛgin moki bɛɛ. Ikin loonnin doki, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin yaakinti poŋin paŋi Jwaŋa Tolan ne pwadan, ɔci ikin jyettin kɛɛyin te naŋki ɛkɛ.
Ɔci kɛɛna ikin kɛɛyin naŋki Juaŋ neeniyɛ, cwamnɛ ɛkɛ doki. Acaan ani Juaŋ bala ikin yomgɔti te naŋki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan boŋa ikin ‘wonninti Juaŋ neeni.
Ne ikin balkin ciyin te war koñi budanyɛ, Kiṭɔ bɛɛn ɔci tuun te nɔji ikin waakida. Oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛni neeniyɛ, yɔmjin.
Çeecin ikin menga warɛ ‘wondɛ lien acaan te mena parɛ gɛɛl a maam budan bɛɛ. Yeti a oŋki dita menga tuwa acaan te mena pwadan gɛɛl.
Yeti naŋki Juaŋ da parɛ. Anna ɛkɛ ani ikinyɛ, ŋeecin ikin ne pwadan te naŋki Yaccu ne ɛkɛ tuuni te ikin ne ikin akin nɔɔtk meny.
Acaan ne Yaccu tuuni te ikin ne ikin akin nɔɔtk menyɛ, acca ikin buayin ywobji Juaŋ moki bɛɛ, acaan ikin pwannin ɛkɛti doki.

Te ñamu ikin yoyyin ñin iki Jwaŋa Tolan. Yeti te lyen Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, ikin ŋeenin iki ɛkɛ doki. Ikin aŋŋin mung Jwaŋa Tolan doki. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeecin ikin ne pwadan ikin yɔɔtin Yaccu te tɛɛtin ɛkɛ tɛɛtin woonɛ neeni.
Ɔci jwalla parɛ gɛɛl bala daŋkun agi ikin yomgɔ ñɔyɔ Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋkanda, acaan ikin ŋeenin iki ɛkɛ te lyen Yaccu.
Te nɔji Adam parɛyɛ, ma waakɛnda aŋi nɔɔtko, aŋka a ɔŋŋiyɛ, lien bɛɛn mati baan warda acaan ma waakɛnda noŋi nɔjjo.
Ne ganuun Muuca baawi mati menyɛ, nɔji bala mati te baaṭi doki. Yeti acaan ma ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ganuun men bɛɛyɛ, Juaŋ bala poki nɔji ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.

Lien bala te oŋŋa Adam baali, ɔci ne Muuca bɛɛni moki ɔɔn. Menga ɛkkɛnti yaakinti lien oldɛ ɔntɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn waakɛnda buannɛ lieno. Ɔci kan mena nɔji ɛkɛ da parɛ bala ba nɔji Adam bɛɛyɛ, jyek lien bala ɛkɛti daŋkun. Ɔci ba jyek Adam neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek Yaccu daŋkun.

Bɔɔkin ikin bɔɔŋninti Juaŋ te nɔji ikin budan te yom ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, bala ba jyeka bɛɛn te Adamti bɛɛ, naŋki Adam a nɔjjo. Ɔci te nɔji mena ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, lien bɛɛn ma baanti. Naŋki Adam tol tolo, yeti naŋki ɛkɛ tol tol bala ba naŋki Juaŋ bɛɛ. Juaŋ yomɛ pwad pwad mati waakɛnda. Ɔci gena ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ ma te yom ɛkɛ budanyɛ, bala mati waakɛnda. Ɔci acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ pwanna pwani mati a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ maka coŋin ‘wonnɛ gena neeni budan te yom ɛkɛ. Juaŋ noŋi a ɔɔn te naŋka naŋŋi mena ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni. Gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ.

Jyek naŋki Yaccu ɔci jyek naŋki Adam ɛkkɛn kɛɛptin. Ɔci te nɔjja naŋŋɛ Adam parɛ neeniyɛ, ma waakɛnda ḍɛɛmdin iñɔ. Ɔci te naŋka naŋŋɛ Yaccu parɛ neeniyɛ, maka balki nɔji ne tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti doki. Ma ‘wonnɛ Yaccu naŋka neeni budan te yom ɛkɛ.

Te nɔji mena ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, lien bɛɛni, ɔci menga yaakinti lien oldɛ ɔntɔ bɛɛ. Jyek lien tɛy tɛy mati oŋkanda. Yeti maka Juaŋ yomɛ pwanna pwani ɛkkɛnti neeniyɛ, maka pwadgin ɛkɛ ñamɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka ciyi ne pwadan. Ɛkkɛn bwandɛ genga bɛɛ.

Yeti te naŋka ne cyɛɛlɔ yaayan a nɔji neeniyɛ, jiek bɛɛn ma wyetkɛnti waakɛnda. Ɔci te naŋka naŋŋɛ Yaccu te lyen ɛkɛ pwadan ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, ma waakɛnda yaakinti pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ tɛɛtin.
Yeti mena ne cyɛɛlɔ aŋka jyek Juaŋ bɛɛññɛji. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛ ma waakɛnda aŋi nɔɔtko. Ɔci mena parɛ gɛɛl bala jyek Juaŋ tiiññiyɔ, ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛyɛ, ma waakɛnda pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti.
Worga ganuun bala, ɔci ma yookɔn te worga ganuun, a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn nɔji ‘uotkiti, ɔci nɔji toli ne pɛñan. Nɔji tol tol awarɛ, yeti ɛkɛ tol tol ba yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan mati bɛɛ.

Te ñamu ma a kɛɛnk nɔjjo, ɔci jyek lien bala. Accayɛ, jyek yom pwani Juaŋ bala mati. Ɔci te yom pwani Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ma pwadgin ɛkɛ ñamɛti, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, tɛɛtin Juaŋ bala mati te Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci tɛɛtin neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ.
Oŋ acca ikin noŋtin a ɔki? Ikin noŋtin nɔji oŋkanda aŋka Jwaŋa Tolan ikin ‘uottinti yom pwani ɛkɛ?
A’a, a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Oŋ kan jyek nɔji a jyek ikin moki bɛɛy, oŋ ikin noŋtin nɔji moki a ɔki?
Jyeka neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki, oŋŋa ikin buulkin mayɛ, ikin aŋŋin yoŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ iki Yaccu Kiṭɔ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, lyena tuuni ɛkɛ neeni aŋi ba lyen ikin daŋkun.

Te bulta neeniyɛ, ikin jokkin ma i Yaccu a cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci moki, ba lulta Yaccu luolnɛ Weegɛn ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka tɛyan naŋka pwadan neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek ikin daŋkun. Ikin jɔŋnin ñaalɔ iki ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci acca coodi ikin aŋi coodda woonɛ ba coodi ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
Acaan jyek ikin ñoowin iki jyek Yaccu te jyek lyen ɛkɛyɛ, ɔci unna ɛkɛ unni te oŋŋa ɛkɛ jɔŋni ñaalɔ te lienti neeni aŋi ba uni ikin daŋkun. Ikin unnin ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
Çeecin ikin yom ikin yoma buagɔn noŋi nɔji neeniyɛ, tuun iki Yaccu a cyɛɛlɔ. Ikin tuunin iki ɛkɛ a ɔɔn aŋka yoma buagɔn noŋi nɔji neeniyɛ, baadi. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin akin kɛɛnk nɔji moki bɛɛ.
Kan men gɛɛl tuun dokiyɛ, pɔya ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyek nɔji bala moki bɛɛ.
Kan ikin tuunin iki Kiṭɔ a cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɔci jyek tɛɛtin ŋeecin ikin daŋkun, agi ne Yaccu unniyɛ, ɔci ikin da unnin te ɛkɛ.
Çeecin ikin Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, luolnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki, ɔci ɛkɛ tuwa ywongati moki bɛɛ. Lien yaakinti ɛkɛ nogdɛ moki bɛɛ.
Oŋŋa Yaccu tuuniyɛ, ɛkɛ tuun te jyek nɔji ma baano. Ɛkɛ tuun oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ budan, ɔci te oŋŋa tuuni ɛkɛ wannayɛ, jyek nɔji bawwin ɛkɛti doki. Ɔci acca ɛkɛ ciyi iki Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda a cyɛɛlɔ.
Ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun dala paŋŋa neeni bala ɛkkɛti a ɔɔn. Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ jyek nɔji neeniyɛ, a jyek ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ. Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ maka tɛɛti Jwaŋa Tolanti te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Naa nɔji aga ciɛggŋ waak ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ, acaan ciɛggɔn neeni buagɔn ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek yomg ɛkkɛ yomga buagɔn noŋi nɔji neeni.

Naa ɛkkɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan ‘wondɛ waak ɛkkɛ noŋdi nɔji waak ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba maka luolnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ ɔci ‘wonnɛ tɛɛtin ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala waak ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bieŋɛti aŋka Jwaŋa Tolan noŋdi kanŋa te waak ɛkkɛ.
Ɔci nɔji aga ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ. Jyek ganuunyɛ, ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ, gena yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ.
Oŋ kan Juaŋ yuoci ikin te tiid jyek ganuun moki bɛɛy, oŋ ikin noŋtin a ɔki? Ikin noŋtin nɔji oŋkanda ɔɔn acaan Juaŋ yomɛ pwani ikinti doki? Hayɛllɛ!

Kan ɛkkɛ waakɔ ‘wondɛ genga oŋkanda ɔci ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ kɛɛnk ɛkɛ doki. Kan a jyek nɔjiyɛ, ɛkkɛ nogdɛ lien ne baaṭi. Kan gena jyek Jwaŋa Tolan tiidɛyɔ ɛkkɛ wannayɛ, ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ Juaŋ ñamɛti.
Ikin gɔktin Juaŋti a pwatcin, acaan acca ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛnk nɔji moki bɛɛ. Jyeka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ma neeniyɛ, tiiññɛyɔ ɛkkɛ doki te yoma pwadan.
Ɔci oŋŋa ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Juaŋ te jyek nɔji ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ kɛɛnk naŋka pwadin.

’Ya gɔk ɛkkɛti te jyeka guaktan ma baan iñɔ baanji neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek Juaŋ ne pwadan. Te ñamu waak ɛkkɛ a kɛɛnk nɔjjo. Ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛnk nɔji te yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ nɔjja yaayan. Ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ bɛɛyɛ jyek Juaŋ a ñaccu gɔ ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛdjɛ ɔɔn. Yeti acca dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ byerdi te naŋka pwadin. Dala ɛkkɛ agdɛ kɛɛnk naŋka pwadin te yomg ɛkkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ awarɛ.
Ne ɛkkɛ men agɛ kɛɛnk nɔjiyɛ, jyek naŋka pwadin yaakinti noŋi genga ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.

Ɔci acca kan ɛkkɛ ñingɔ ñiektɛ te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛnk nɔji men neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ lɔɔddɛ. Kan ne ɛkkɛ noŋɛ a ɔɔn wannayɛ, naŋka neeni yɔmjin te genga boki? A’a, yɔmjin te genga bɛɛ, hay! Naŋka neeni etti gena lien budan.

Yeti acca jiek ooki da pookɛn. Acca ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te nɔji ɛkkɛ doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ kɛɛnk ɛkɛ doki. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ maka pwadin, ɔci ɛkkɛ moki tuudɛ bɛɛ. Tɛɛtin neeni bala ɛkkɛti yuonginda baadi bɛɛ.

Kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ naŋki nɔji oŋkandayɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘wondi nɔji gena lien budan. Yeti gena ma ‘wondi Juaŋ te yom ɛkɛ budanyɛ, gena tɛɛtin. Tɛɛtin neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ma ‘wonnɛ tɛɛtin neeni te naŋki Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Modg ɔɔn, maka jyek ganuun ŋeecɔny, kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ? Kan men tuun dokiy ganuun yaakinti noŋi genga ɛkɛti moki? Acaan ɛkɛ bawwin doki.
Mena ɛɛŋ kan ‘war ɛkɛ bala menyɛ, ɛkkɛn ciy yaakkɛn ba jyek ganuun. Yeti kan ‘war ɛkɛ tuun dokiyɛ, jyek ḍɛɛwin ɛkkɛn bawwin doki.

Mena ɛɛŋ kan ‘war ɛkɛ bala men ɔci kan ɛkɛ ḍɛɛdɛ ‘wana parɛyɛ, ɛkɛ bartan ma agi ɛŋa toban. Yeti kan ‘war ɛkɛ tuun dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ oŋ ḍɛɛtan ma oŋo. Acaan ḍɛɛwin iki ‘wana te ñamu bawwin dokiyɛ, a ɔɔn ma gɔki agi ɛŋa neeni a ɛŋa toban moki bɛɛ.

Ba jyek ɛŋa neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Oŋŋa ɛkkɛ tuunɛ iki Yaccu a cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Juaŋ te jyek ganuun doki. Jyek ganuun yaakinti noŋi genga ɛkkɛti moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Juaŋ a ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ agdɛ ma mena parɛ, mena luolnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti mokiy, ɔci moki aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ kuma te naŋka pwadin ba jana wyeñɛ kuumi te ṭɔlgɛy.

Yomg ikin yomga buagɔn nɔji neeniyɛ, bala gɔki waak ikinti te jyek nɔjjo. Ɔci naŋki waak ikin neeni etti gena lien budan. Te ñamu ne ikin balkin ciyin amaam te yomg ikin pookɔ budanyɛ, yomg ikin buagɔn nɔjjo, ɔci te jyek ganuunyɛ, ikin pɛɛnnin te nɔjjo.
Yeti acca ikin pɔŋnin Juaŋ te jyek ganuun. Acaan ikin tuunin iki Yaccu a cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ikin akin kɛɛnk ganuun moki bɛɛ. Acca ikin noŋin kanŋa te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan te yoma pwadan.

Jiek bala a ɔki? Jyek ganuun yeyɔ? Hayɛllɛ! Jyek ganuun yeyɔ bɛɛ. Kan te jyek ganuun baakiyɛ, te jyek naŋka yeyin ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ. Jyek ganuun gɔki agi, “Naa ma ani wak maka pookɛn bɛɛ.” Yeti ‘ya baal an wak maka pookɛn ɔɔn, ɔci te jyek ganuun neeniyɛ, ŋeejjan ‘ya naŋki ‘ya neeniyɛ, a nɔjjo.
Ne jyek ganuun ŋeenna ‘yayɛ, ɔci jyek nɔji ŋeejjan ‘ya. Ɔci ŋeejjan ‘ya yom ‘ya buagɔn waka budan ne pɛñan.

Kan te jyek ganuun baakiyɛ, te nɔji bala niin ma yomgɛnti lieda ɔɔn. Ɔci ‘ya daŋkun, ne jyek ganuun baaki ‘yati menyɛ, ‘ya baal ba mena tɛɛta. Ɔci ne jyek ganuun ŋeenna ‘yayɛ, nɔji ŋeejjan ‘ya yomuti a ‘ya yaakati noŋ gena pwadan gɛɛl bɛɛ. ‘Ya aŋi ba mena tuuta doki.
Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ma uda te jyek ganuun. Yeti jyek ganuun neeniyɛ, eccin gena lien ‘yati,
acaan te oŋŋa jyek ganuun ŋeenna ‘yayɛ, nɔji warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya aŋi ba mena tuuta doki.
Jyek ganuun pwadɔ. Gena naŋka Juaŋ buagiti ikin noŋtin neeni. Ɛkkɛn pwadɔ waakɛnda, ɔci yɔmjin moki.

Gena pwadan neeni eccin lien ‘yatɛ? A’a, a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Gena nɔji aŋka bala ‘ya yomuti yaayɛy. Acaan ne jyek ganuun bɛɛki borayɛ, nɔji yaakinti niin lieda ‘ya yomuti moki bɛɛ. Jyek nɔji bɛɛn bora, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya aŋi ba mena tuuta. Jyek ganuun bɛɛn aŋka ‘ya jyek nɔji ŋeenna ‘ya ɛkɛ yaayɛ ne pɛñan ‘yati wanna.
Çeecin ikin jyek ganuun bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti. ‘Ya aŋka a men baan budan. ‘Ya a kɛɛngɔn nɔjjo.
Naŋka naŋdi ‘yayɛ, yuarca ‘ya bɛɛ. Kan ‘ya buaga noŋja gengayɛ, ‘ya yaakati bɛɛ. Kan ‘ya buaga naŋka yaayan daljayɛ, ‘ya yaakati bɛɛ, ‘ya noŋ ɔɔn.
Ne ‘ya noŋa naŋka yaayan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ne yom ‘ya yookiti te naŋka wannayɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ‘ya gɔk ka jyek ganuun aŋka pwadɔ.
Gena ‘ya noŋ naŋka yaayan neeni bɛɛ. Gena nɔjja niin ‘ya yomuti oŋkanda aŋka noŋi naŋka yaayan neeniy.
Çeej ‘ya ‘ya yaayo. ‘Ya buaga noŋja naŋka pwadan, yeti ‘ya yaakati noŋ a ɔɔn bɛɛ.
’Ya noŋ naŋka yaayan naŋka yom ‘ya yookɛtiy.
Kan ‘ya noŋ naŋka ‘ya buaga bɛɛyɛ, gena ‘ya waanu noŋ naŋka neeni bɛɛy, gena nɔjja niin ‘ya yomuti aŋka noŋi naŋka neeniy.
Jiek tɛy tɛyo. Kan yom ‘ya buagɔn noŋdi ne pwadanyɛ, ɔci ‘ya kɛkta yom ‘ya yoma yaayan agi naa ‘ya noŋji ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya aŋi kɛɛngɔn te nɔjja bala ‘ya yomuti neeni.
Yom ‘ya yoma awarɛyɛ, gɔki agi ganuun Jwaŋa Tolan pwad pwado.
Yeti yoma parɛ bala men. Gena yoma yaayan yoma neeni aŋka yookɔny. Yomg ‘ya noowɔ a ɔɔn.
’Ya yomu yaayɛ, hay! ‘Ya pɔkta menɛ yeti te yoma buagɔn noŋi naŋka yaayan naŋka etti lien neeniy?
’Ya gɔk Juaŋti a pwatcin acaan ‘ya pɔŋna ɛkɛ doki te naŋka naŋŋi Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔy. ‘Ya noŋ kanŋa Juaŋ te war ‘ya ɔci te paŋi ‘ya moki, ɔci war ‘ya war ma baan noŋi kanŋa ganuun nɔjjo.
Maka Yaccu bala ɛkkɛnti dokiyɛ, jyek godan Juaŋ bɛya ɛkkɛnti moki bɛɛ.
Jyek nɔji tɛy tɛyo. Ɔci jyek lien tɛy tɛy moki. Yeti acaan Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala ikintiyɛ, ikin pɔŋnin Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan te jyeka neeni, acaan Boŋ ɛkɛ tɛy tɛyo, ɔci ikin ‘wonnin ɛkɛ tɛɛtin.

Naŋka jyek ganuun yaaŋnɛti naŋŋɛ bɛɛ acaan war ma baan koocinyɛ, cwamnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan. Jwaŋa Tolan naŋka neeni naŋŋɛ te cuoññin ɛkɛ kaci ɛkɛ waanɛ cuonnɛ iñɔ aŋŋi ba men baan mena a nɔɔdɔn neeni aŋka aga ‘yɛṭa nɔjiy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Juaŋ nɔji men baan nuuññɛji.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan ikin tieŋtin jyek yomg ikin yomga yeyin bɛɛ, ɔci kan ikin tieŋtin gena jyek Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ikin yaakinti jyek ganuun tiitinyɔ.
Maka noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn budanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ani naŋki ɛkkɛn. Maka noŋi ba jyek Boŋ Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn ani jyek ɛkɛ.
Maka poŋi ba paŋi ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, lien yuartan ɛkkɛn. Maka poŋi ba jyek Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, tɛɛtin bala ɛkkɛnti, ɔci coodda pwadan bala ɛkkɛnti moki.
Jiek bala a ɔɔn kan ma poŋi ba paŋi ɛkkɛn pookɛnyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkkɛn yookɔn te Jwaŋa Tolan. Yomg ma baan yomga buagɔn noŋi ne yaayanyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieŋdi ganuun Juaŋ bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn.
Maka noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budanyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti noŋi naŋka pwadan Juaŋti bɛɛ.

Ɛkkɛyɛ, jyek ɛkkɛ da pookɛn. Kan Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkkɛti awarɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ciyɛ te jyek yoma te baaṭi moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ ciyɛ te war tɛɛn Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan. Mena Boŋ Yaccu Kiṭɔ baaw ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ a men Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛ.
Acaan ne Yaccu Kiṭɔ baali ɛkkɛtiyɛ, yoma te baaṭi tuun doki. Ɔci yoma woonɛ aŋka bala ɛkkɛti te naŋki Yaccu, ɔci acca ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ naŋka pwadin.
Ne Boŋ mena Yaccu luolnɛ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki neeni baali ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ da ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ tɛɛtin te Boŋ ɛkɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan mena bala ɛkkɛti neeni.
Modg ɔɔn, jiek bala aŋka naŋtin ikin. Yeti gena jyek yomg ikin pookɔ bɛɛ.
Acaan kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ budanyɛ, ɛkkɛ tuudɛ. Yeti kan naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka yaayan lɛgdɛ ɛkkɛ jitin te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛ uddɛ.
Maka wɛɛdɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkandayɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan waakɛnda.
Acca ɛkkɛ buayɛ ɛkɛ ba maka kɛɛnk moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ pirŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛ yaakɛti gɔktɛ Juaŋti agi, “Wey ɔɔn!”
Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ waanɛ parɛ gɔkti ikin yomgɔti agi ikin akcin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan.

Ɔci kan ikin akin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan a ɔɔnyɛ, wak ɛkɛ aga wak ikin daŋkun. Ɔci waka aga wak Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, aga wak ikin daŋkun. Kan taab Yaccu aŋi taab ikin daŋkunyɛ, ne baaṭi jyeka pwadin jyeka bɛya ɛkɛtiyɛ, bɛya ikinti daŋkun.
Paŋi ‘ya neeni, jyeka bɛya ikinti ne baaṭiyɛ, pwanna pwanno. Ɔci taab bala wɛnni ikinti accayɛ, ɛkɛ a genga bɛɛ.
Ɔci waak waakɛnda, waka cɔnnɛ Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn kɛɛy oŋŋa pwani bɛɛdi bora kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolantiy.
Waka cɔnnɛ Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yiegin te jyek ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan bɛɛ. Gena naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛnti. Yeti ɛkkɛn jyeti kɛɛy oŋŋa jyeka pwadin bɛɛti ɛkkɛnti daŋkuny.
Oŋŋa kɛɛtan ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, gena oŋŋa ɛkkɛn pɔktɛ Juaŋ te jyeka yeyin. Ba jyek pɔkkin Juaŋ ma pɔŋni neeniyɛ, jyek pɔkkin neeni ooddi waka cɔnnɛ ɛkɛti daŋkun, ɔci ɛkkɛn pwada.
Çeecin ikin waka cɔnnɛ Juaŋ waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn bala wiak waakɛnda bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ oŋkanda kɛɛy oŋŋa Juaŋ ɛkkɛn pɔktɛ, ɔci ne acca ɔɔn.

Ɔci jwalla parɛ bala daŋkun. Ikinyɛ, ikin akin maka dɛccin Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan a dɛccin wɛnni. Ɔci Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan yuartin ikin ne tolan ne baaṭi. Ɔci ikin wiakin yomgɔti ne ikin kɛɛyin oŋŋa bɛya neeniy. Ikin kɛɛyin oŋŋa ikin aktin kɛɛgin ɛkɛ ne pwadany. Gena oŋŋa waak ikin akti waaka wonkɛny.
Ikin jyettin jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ te naŋka bɛya ne baaṭi, ɔci ikin yɔɔññin ɛkɛ doki. Yeti ikin jyettin kɛɛyin yɔɔta bɛya ne ŋoyɔy. Kan gen yuarɛ ma te woŋgɛnyɛ, ma yaakinti jyeddi kɛɛy ɛkɛ moki bɛɛ.
Ɔci ikinyɛ, ne ikin kɛɛyin gena yuarŋin ikin te woŋgɔ men bɛɛ neeniyɛ, naa ikin yomgɔ tieki agi gen bɛɛdɔ baaw bɛɛ. Dala ikin kɛɛyin te yoma pwadan ɔɔn.

Ne ikin waakɔ kooki men ɔɔnyɛ, ikin maktin Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan te cɔŋŋo. Ne ikin cɔkin Juaŋti ɔci ne jyeka cɔkin ikin neeni ŋeecin ikin ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan Boŋa bala ikin yomgɔti neeni cɔkti Juaŋti te ikin te jyeka ikin yaakinti gɔɔtin bora te tugi ikin bɛɛy.
Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan mena yomg ma baan ŋeejɛyɛ, paŋŋa paŋdi Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ ne ɛkɛ cɔki te ma ɛkɛ ba yom Jwaŋa Tolany.
Ɔci moki ŋeecin ikin maka ani Jwaŋa Tolan maka muonɛ ɛkɛ bora ba jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu neeniyɛ, naŋka bɛya ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda naŋdɛ Juaŋ etti naŋka pwadin ɛkkɛnti.

Ne ma baaki menyɛ, maka jyeddi Juaŋti ne baaṭi ŋeejɛ Juaŋ doki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn oonɛ ɛkɛ bora te maka pookɛnti ɔci aŋi ma ɛkɛ. Ɛkkɛn oonɛ Juaŋ bora acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn ɛkkɛn aga ba Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Kaci ɛkɛ neeni aga ba mod ikin moda tolan waakida.

Maka oonɛ Juaŋ bora te ñamu neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn oonɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn jiek ywaŋɛ iki ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn pwadgin ɛkɛ ñamɛti te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni. Ɔci maka pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti neeniyɛ, coodi ɛkkɛn pwanna pwani te naŋki ɛkɛ ɛkkɛnti neeni.
Oŋ acca ikin gɔktin a ɔki te jyeka neeni? Kan Juaŋ buagɔn ikin a ɔɔny, oŋ men gɛɛl yaakinti noŋdi gena yaayan ikinti boki? A’a,
Jwaŋa Tolan jyek taab bɛya Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccutiyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ. Yeti ɛkɛ yookɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin Yaccu ɔɔn. Oŋ acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ ikin da ‘wontin waak waakɛnda te yoma pwadan bɛɛ? Ikin ‘wontin, hay!
Maka oonɛ Juaŋ bora neeni menga yaakinti ɛkkɛn tiagdɛyɔ Juaŋtɛ? A’a, menga yaakinti ɛkkɛn tiagdɛyɔ bɛɛ. Acaan ɛkkɛn pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti doki te naŋki ɛkɛ.

Ɔci menga yaakinti jiek kɔɔdɛ ɛkkɛn ḍɔɔggɛnti moki? A’a, Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena tuun ɔci luolnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ moki neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ciyi Juaŋ taaŋɛti te byeŋa byerɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ bala cɔki Juaŋti te ikin oŋkanda.

A menɛ yaakinti ikin kɛptin jitin te anna Kiṭɔ ani ikin? Menga bala bɛɛ. Baawo. Kan a taab bɛya ikinti te jyek Juaŋ, ɔci kan a coodi tɛɛnɛ, ɔci kan a naŋka noŋki ma ne yaayan ikinti te jyek Juaŋ, ɔci kan a koñ, ɔci kan ikin ankin, ɔci kan waka etti taab ɔci lien ikin waakɔti bala, ɔci kan ma noki ikinyɛ, jyeka neeni yaakinti ikin kɛptin jitin iki Yaccu Kiṭɔ te anna ani ɛkɛ ikin neeni bɛɛ.
Jyek taab neeniyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin te baaṭi. Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Ɔɔn balgɔn lien jitin oŋkanda te jyek i. Ɔɔn balgɔn ba kulin ŋartan ma a ŋarto.”
Kan taab neeni bala ikinti waakidayɛ, ikin yaakinti yɔɔttin ne tɛyan te mena ani ikiny. Ikin bwantin genga bɛɛ.

Lien walla coodi ikin iñɔ wɛnni, walla malɛɛkan, walla ḍuaŋan ñaalɔ pɔliji, walla war tɛɛn pookɛn gɛɛg war tɛɛn bala ñaalɔ neeni bɛɛ. Waka neeni yaakinti ikin kɛptin jitin iki Jwaŋa Tolan te anna ani ɛkɛ ikin neeni bɛɛ. Gena ikin kɛptin jitin iki Juaŋ bala bɛɛ, ɔci gɛɛl bala ne baaṭi daŋkun bɛɛ.

Jɔkin yeyinyɛ, kan bala ñaalɔ pɔliji walla kan bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛl yaakinti ikin kɛptin jitin iki Juaŋ te anna ani ɛkɛ ikin neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci moki waka cɔnnɛ Juaŋ waakɛndayɛ, gen gɛɛl yaakinti ikin kɛptin jitin iki ani Juaŋ neeni bɛɛ. Anna Juaŋ ani ikin neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin te naŋki Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ Kiṭɔ ñamɛti. Çeejɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan Boŋa bala ‘ya yomuti neeni jyeka guagdi ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeni a jyeka awarɛ.
’Ya gɔk ka ‘ya yomu yaayɛ. ‘Ya yomu wiak oŋkanda te modg ɔɔn ma Icrayiil.
