Kan te ma baan yaakinti yuoci makɛn te yaata ɛkkɛn waakɛn yaatɛti nuotti jitinyɛ, te war ‘ya doki ‘woñgan Juaŋ yiɛmnɛ bana yaayan aŋka ma ɔɔn ma Icrayiil eedɛ Juaŋ ban ɛkɛ te naŋki ‘ya neeni.

Ma Icrayiil myennɛ Juaŋ agi ɛkɛ buagiti dala ɛkki agdi kɛɛgin ɛkɛ. Juaŋ bala iki ɛkkɛn te baaṭi doki. Jwaŋa Tolan jiek naŋɛ iki ɛkkɛn agi ɛkɛ noŋji naŋka pwadan ɛkkiti. Ɛkkɛn myennɛ ɛkɛ te ganuun ɛkɛ buagiti naŋtan ɛkkɛny. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ mali ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn myennɛ ɛkɛ te jyeka pwadin jyeka bɛya ɛkkɛnti ne baaṭiy.
Yɔrg ɛkkɛn te baaṭi, ɛkkɛn a maka ḍwaŋin. Ɔci Yaccu Kiṭɔ daŋkunyɛ, ɛkɛ a kɛɛn ɛkkɛn. Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkɛ a Jwaŋa Tolan. Waak waakɛnda buannɛ ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ pwad pwad yuonginda ɔɔn. Ɛɛ, dala bala a ɔɔn.
Jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te ñamu aŋi jyeka budan bɛɛ. Kɛɛgin Icrayiilyɛ, kɛɛptin jitin, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda a ma Juaŋ bɛɛ.
Kɛɛgin Abrahim kɛɛptin jitin acaan jiek naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te ñamu iki Abrahim. Juaŋ gɔki ɛkɛti agi, “Kɛɛgin bɛya te kaci i Icaaktiyɛ, ɛkkɛn owwa ‘ya bora.”

Maka bɛɛn te Abrahimtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn a ma Juaŋ acaan ɛkkɛn a kɛɛgin Abrahim? A’a, a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ma Juaŋyɛ, gena maka bornɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ba jwalla ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛ Abrahimti te ñamuy. Ɛkkɛn aŋka a kɛɛgin Abrahim kɛɛgin awarɛ.
Jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Abrahimti te ñamu te jyek kaci ɛkɛ Icaak parɛ neeni gɔki agi, “Ne ywoniti ba wɔɔka ḍuañi ‘yayɛ, ‘ya dɔɔkka wɛnni, ɔci ɛŋ i Caara jieda kacca ‘uano.”
Ɔci jwalla parɛ gɛɛl bala daŋkun. Gena jwali Ribɛɛka acaan kɛɛgin ɛkɛ kɛɛgin ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni bɛɛn te weya ne cyɛɛlɔ. Gena kɛɛgin yɔr ikin Icaak.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ jienni men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ myennɛ Juaŋ te kɛɛgin laayi ɛkɛ neeni agi,

“Kacca jieda i ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka aga ba kacca tolan, ɔci kacca jieda i ñamuyɛ, ɛkɛ aga ba kacca ḍiɛran.” Ne Juaŋ noŋŋi jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ poŋi te naŋka naŋtan kɛɛgin neeni bɛɛ. Acaan ɛkkɛn noŋi gena pwadan walla gena yaayan gɛɛl men bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn baaw men bala te mɛɛgɛn konɛti men. Jyeka kiigin jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ te baaṭi gɔki agi, “‘Ya an Yaakub, ɔci ‘ya yomu baaw Icɔti.” Jyek naŋki Juaŋ bala a ɔɔn kɛɛgin neeniti ogo? Naŋki Juaŋ bala a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ ma oodɛ bora aga ma ɛkɛ te naŋka naŋtan ma baan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ma oodɛ bora te yom ɛkɛ parɛ.
Oŋ acca ikin gɔktin a ɔki te jyeka neeni? Ne Juaŋ noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi amaamɔ? Hayɛllɛ!
Acaan Juaŋ gɔki Muucati agi, “Kan ‘ya buaga yomu pɔkka mengatiyɛ, gena yom ‘ya.” Ɔci agi, “Kan ‘ya buaga menga magdiyɛ, gena yom ‘ya.”
Menga dɛndi ban Jwaŋa Tolan te yom ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ. Kan men kanŋan ne pɛñanyɛ, kanŋa neeni yɔmdi bɛɛ. Kan Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pɔktɛ mentiyɛ, mena neeni ɛkɛ dɛndi ban Juaŋo.
Jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Pɛɛrɔti neeniyɛ, bala worgaji agi, “I ḍuannin ‘ya aŋŋi ḍuaŋa tolan aŋka ma gɔrti naŋka tɛyan naŋka naŋdi ‘ya iti aŋka yenti ‘ya ooddi baan konɛ warda.”

Te naŋka naŋŋi Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin kan Juaŋ buagɔn yomɛ pɔktɛ matiyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ pɔktɛ ba yom ɛkɛ. Ɔci kan ɛkɛ buagɔn noŋdi naŋka tɛyan mati aŋka ma wyetkɛn tɛɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ moki noŋdi a ɔɔn ba yom ɛkɛ parɛ.
Ɛkkɛ toottɛ ‘yati kaapun gɔktɛ agi, “Oŋ kan Jwaŋa Tolan noŋi ba yom ɛkɛ parɛ mati a ɔɔny, men gɛɛl yaakinti dɛyi ɛkɛ boki? Oŋ kan a ɔɔnyɛ, Juaŋ wooki ma te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn ogo?”

Kan ɛkkɛ toottɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin bɛɛ. Mug ɔɔn, i a menɛ aŋka i gɔki a ɔɔn Juaŋti wan? Lomma eeki ma waak ɛkɛ yaakinti gɔkti mena eyi waakti agi, “I ‘ya eeda a ɔɔn ogo?” Hayɛllɛ! Ɛkɛ gɔkti a ɔɔn bɛɛ.

Ɔci kan mena eyi waak buagɔn eyi gena parɛ gɛɛl mokiyɛ, ɛkɛ ooddi etti lomi te lomi mɛɛgɛnti, ɔci ɛkɛ eedi gena parɛ neeni moki. Yeti ɛka parɛ neeniyɛ, pwad pwad ba ɛki ñontan ɔɔn bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛn bɛɛn te lomma ne cyɛɛlɔti. Mena eyi waak neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti waak kɛbdɛ jitin te een ba yom ɛkɛ.

Maka cɔnnɛ Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba lomi Jwaŋa Tolan bieŋɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ noŋi ɛkkɛnti ba yom ɛkɛ. Ɔci ba waka eetan ma gɛɛg ne damkiti ma te eenyɛ, bala ba maka nɔɔtk daŋkun. Ɛkkɛn bala Juaŋ bieŋɛti, ɔci ne baaṭi ywobji Juaŋ bɛya ɛkkɛnti, ɔci te naŋka neeniyɛ, Juaŋ ŋeettan ma ne ɛkɛ tɛyi awarɛy. Yeti acaan Juaŋ loomgɛ tɛy tɛy maka yeyintiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ciyi men ɔɔn.
Ma gɛɛg muonɛ Juaŋ bora te baaṭi doki, ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn dala pwani ɛkɛ ŋeettan ma acaan ɛkɛ tol tolo.
Maka muonɛ ɛkɛ bora neeniyɛ, gena ikin. Ma gɛɛg ikinti ɛkkɛn a ma Icrayiil, ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg moki ikintiyɛ, ɛkkɛn a Keedin Pookɛn.
A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiinɛ Hɔɔca mena a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan agi, “Maka a ma ‘ya bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn bardi ‘ya a ma ‘ya. Ɔci maka ana ‘ya bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn bardi ‘ya a maka ana ‘yay.”
Te ñamu Juaŋ gɔki Keedin Pookɛnti agi ɛkki agi ma ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci oŋŋa parɛ moki ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Maka neeni bartan ma agi ɛkki agi kɛɛgin Jwaŋa tɛɛti.”
Icaaya ma nɔɔnnɛ te jyek ma Icrayiil agi, “Ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɛkkɛn kɔɔna kɔɔni bala ba ŋɔmi ñingɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛn waakɛnda dɛndi ban Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.
Acaan Juaŋ noŋdi godan ma baanti baan warda, ɔci Juaŋ jiek kɔɔktɛ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti. Juaŋ noŋdi godan ne pɛñan ɛkkɛnti. Ɛkɛ jwali gɛɛl daldɛ bɛɛ.”
Jwalla guaŋŋɛ Icaaya gɛɛl bala moki. Gena jwali jyeka gɛɛka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ agi, “Kan te Juaŋ ma ikin gɛɛg dɔɔnɛ bora te lienti bɛɛyɛ, te ikin balkin ba ma Caduum, ɔci ma Gamɔɔra daŋkun.”
Oŋ acca ikin gɔktin a ɔki te jyeka neeni? Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, te ñamu ɛkkɛn bala lieṭi pɔya ɛkkɛn pwatti Juaŋ ñamɛti bɛɛ. Yeti acca ɛkkɛn pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti doki te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Jwaŋa Tolantiy.
Ɔci ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi kan ɛkkɛn jyek ganuun tiidintiyɔyɛ, a ɔɔn ɛkkɛn pwaddinti Juaŋ ñamdanti. Yeti ɛkkɛn pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti men bɛɛ.

Ɛkkɛn pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti men bɛɛ ogo? Acaan ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ma pwaddɔ Juaŋ ñamdanti te jyenna ma jyetki neeni bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ɛkkɛn pwaddinti pookɛn te naŋki ɛkkɛn. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn tworŋɛ guonan tuor ma.

Ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɛkkɛn jiek pɔɔdɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala ba maka twordɛ guonan ɔci ḍɛɛmdi iñɔy. Acaan jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ bala worgaji gɔki agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, guonan tuor ma ḍuaccan ‘ya ban ma Icrayiilji ɔci ma twordɛ ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ a guonan yooci ma yomgɛn. Yeti kan mena jyeddi ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ wiakti oŋgati bɛɛ.”
Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya yomu wiak te ma Icrayiil ma ɔɔn. ‘Ya baal cɔk Juaŋti oŋkanda te ɛkkɛn aŋka dala ɛkkɛn yɔɔdɛ Juaŋo.
Çeej ‘ya ɛkkɛn waakɛn byerɔ te jyek Juaŋo, yeti paŋi ɛkkɛn bala ɔntɔ, acaan ɛkkɛn jyek Juaŋ ŋeecɔn ne pwadan bɛɛ.

Pɔya naŋŋɛ Juaŋ aŋka ma pwatti ɛkɛ ñamɛtiyɛ, ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi ɛkkɛn pwadginti Juaŋ ñamdanti te naŋki ɛkkɛn pookɛn. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, pɔya naŋŋɛ Juaŋ aŋka ma pwatti neeniyɛ, dalji ɛkkɛn doki.
Naa ma poŋi gɔki agi ɛkkɛn pwanninti Juaŋ ñamdanti te tiit jyek ganuun waakɛn bɛɛ. Jyeka neeni bawwin doki. Yaccu aŋka a pɔyo. Maka jyeddi ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti.
Muuca ikin ‘wonnin gena jwalla tɛyan jwalla gɔki agi, “Kan i jyek ganuun tiya ñin waakɛndayɛ, i uddi.”
Yeti Jwali jyeniyɛ, ɛkɛ tɛɛcin a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “I yaakiti kaacca ñaalɔ pɔliji” (aŋka Yaccu owwa iñɔ aŋka i yɔɔdi bɛɛ.)
“I yaakiti ootta iñɔ” (aŋka Yaccu luolla ñaalɔ ɔci dɔwwa te lienti bɛɛ.)
“Yeti jwali bala cualcinti iti, i yaakiti gɔkca ɛkɛ ɔci jyedda ɛkɛ.” Gena jyenna neeni ɔɔn nɔɔtɔn i te ɛkɛ neeni.
Kan i gɔŋni te tuk i agi Yaccu agi Ciɛggɔn ɔci kan i jyetti te yoma awarɛ agi Yaccu luolnda Juaŋ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti mokiyɛ, i yɔɔdi Juaŋo.
Kan ma jyeddi te yomg ɛkkɛn awarɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn ma nɔɔttan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ awarɛ.
A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Kan mena jyeddi ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkta lɔɔddɔ oŋgati bɛɛ.”
Ma Icrayiil ɔci Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda a maka ne cyɛɛlɔ acaan Jwaŋ ɛkkɛn a Jwaŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci kan ma cɔkti ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ pwanna pwani ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda.
Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Maka borti te yenti Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn yɔɔdɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda.”

Yeti kan ma jyeti menti men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti cɔkti ɛkɛti boki? A’a, ɔci kan ma tieŋŋin jyek mena neeni men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti jyeddi ɛkɛti boki? A’a, ɔci kan ma ooddi ɛkkɛn myettan bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti tieŋdi jyek ɛkkɛn boki? A’a.
Ɔci kan ma cundɛ Juaŋ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti ooddi mieti ma boki? A’a, jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Maka etti jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jyeka etti coodda pwadanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ciegɛn pwanna pwanno.”
Yeti ma waakɛnda jyeti jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni bɛɛ. Bala ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Icaaya ne ɛkɛ baali cɔki Juaŋti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, men gɛɛl jyeti jyeka ɔɔn ɛkkɛn myennɔn neeni boki?”
Jyeni bɛya te tieŋŋin jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Yeti ‘ya toocca ɛkkɛti, jiek ati mati bɛɛ? Ɛɛ, jiek ati mati baan konɛ warda pɔli ŋwayyɛ waakɛnda. “Pɔɔdg ɛkkɛn ati baan konɛ warda ɔci jyek ɛkkɛn ati baan konɛ warda moki.”

’Ya toocca ɛkkɛti moki, ma Icrayiil tieŋŋin jiek jitkɛn ne pwadan boki? A’a, Juaŋ gɔkcin mati te lɛmi Muuca agi, “Ma Icrayiil yomgɛn yiegdi keedin pookɛnti te naŋka naŋdi ‘ya pwandin keedin pookɛntiy. Gena maka guaktan ɛkkɛn agi maka budany. Ma Icrayiil loondi maka kɛɛna ñingɛn morŋanti te naŋki ‘ya ɛkkɛnti.”

Ɔci Juaŋ gɔkcin te lɛmi Icaaya daŋkun, ɔci Icaaya buayi ma te miti ma bɛɛ. Juaŋ gɔki agi, “Maka bala lieṭi ‘ya te ñamu bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘ya yuarka doki, ɔci maka bala tooci ‘ya bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘ya ŋeecka doki te naŋki ‘ya.”
Yeti Icaaya gɔki te ma Icrayiil agi, “‘Ya baal boor ma ‘ya oŋkanda oŋkanda ɔɔn, yeti ma tieŋdi bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn tɛy tɛyo.”
’Ya toocca ɛkkɛti, Jwaŋa Tolan mwonnin te ma ɛkɛ ma Icrayiil waakɛnda boki? Hayɛllɛ! Ɛkɛ mwonnin te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Acaan ‘ya daŋkun a men ma Icrayiil. ‘Ya a kaci Abrahim, ɔci ‘ya bɛɛn te kɛɛn Benjaminti.
Maka jyek ɛkkɛn ŋeejɛ Juaŋ te ñamuyɛ, Juaŋ mwonnin te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Jyeka bala worgaji a jyek Iliiya ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛ?

Iliiya bala tɛki ma Icrayiil waakɛn Juaŋti agi, “I, Ciɛggɔn, ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɔwan i nogɛ waakɛnda, ɔci nonka ɛrki ma waak itiyɛ, lɛɛkci ɛkkɛn iñɔ doki. ‘Ya dalka ɛkkɛn paru, ɔci acca ɛkkɛn buagɔn noki ‘ya daŋkun.”

Ɔci Juaŋ ṭwokcin ɛkɛti a ɔki? Juaŋ ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Te naŋka naŋi ‘ya neeniyɛ, maka ‘uay bala men a alpn ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ (7,000). Ɛkkɛn a ma ‘ya. Ɛkkɛn ḍwoñjin iñɔ morcin jwaŋa yenti Baalti oŋgati bɛɛ.”
Ɔci bala ba te baaṭi, ɔci acca moki, ma Icrayiil gɛɛgyɛ, ɛkkɛn a ma Juaŋo. Juaŋ yomɛ pwad pwad ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn kɛnnɛ ɛkɛ bora te yom ɛkɛ parɛ.

Acaan maka neeni kɛnnɛ Juaŋ bora te yom ɛkɛ parɛyɛ, ɔci acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ pwad pwad ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ŋeecin ikin ɛkkɛn kɛnnɛ Juaŋ bora te kanŋa ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Kan ma kɛndɛ Juaŋ bora te kanŋa ɛkkɛnyɛ, jyek yom pwani Juaŋ bala a ɔki?

Kan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, oŋ ikin poŋtin a ɔki? Gena liltan ma Icrayiil maka coŋin neeniyɛ, yuarɛ ɛkkɛn men bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala lieṭi men. Maka kɛnnɛ Juaŋ borayɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka gena neeni yuarɛ doki. Yeti ma Icrayiil maka coŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn tɛɛna tɛɛno.

A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka bala worgaji te baaṭi ne gɔkki agi, “Jwaŋa Tolan ma dalda ma wyetkɛn tɛyɔ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti gɔṭi te woŋgɛn moki bɛɛ, ɔci yaakinti tyeŋi te jyetkɛn moki bɛɛ, ne acca neeniti men ɔɔn.”
Ɔci Daawud gɔki agi, “Dala waka amtin aga ba gena yiecki ma waak ɛkkɛnti. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmdi kola loorɛ ɛkkɛn pookɛn dɔkiy. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ywobji bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti doki.
Dala ɛkkɛn ñingɛn ula, naa ɛkkɛn gɔrti noon moki bɛɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛn jualtan iñɔ waka eetan ɛkkɛn oŋkanda.”

’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti moki, ne ma Icrayiil ḍɛɛmki iñɔy, ɛkkɛn kookinti jɔllin ñaalɔ moki? Hayɛllɛ, a ɔɔn bɛɛ! Te oŋŋa ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmki iñɔ neeniyɛ, jyek yɔɔd Jwaŋa Tolan ati Keedin Pookɛnti doki aŋka dala ma Icrayiil yomgɛn bwagdɛ naŋka naŋdɛ Juaŋ pwadin Keedin Pookɛntiy.

Oŋŋa ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmki iñɔyɛ, jyeka pwadin ati maka pookɛnti baan warda. Oŋŋa kɛɛn Icrayiil yiekiyɛ, Keedin Pookɛn ati ñamu doki. Ɔci ne baaṭi ne ma Icrayiil waakɛn yaltiti Juaŋti waakɛndayɛ, Juaŋ yaakinti noŋdi aŋka jyeka neeni pwaddi ne pɛñan mati baan warda.
Keedin Pookɛn, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti. ‘Ya kanŋ ne tolan
acaan ‘ya buaga maka a kɛɛn ‘ya dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn bwagdɛ naŋka naŋdɛ Juaŋ Keedin Pookɛnti neeni aŋka ɛkkɛn yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ daŋkun.

Te jyek kyɛŋŋa Juaŋ kɛŋni te ma Icrayiilyɛ, maka pookɛn maka ciyi baan konɛ wardayɛ, ɛkkɛn ŋeewin iki Juaŋo. Ɔci oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔ oŋŋa ma Icrayiil akti ma Juaŋyɛ, jyeka pwadin ooddi mati, ɔci jyeka neeni pwadɔ te ɛkkɛn te ñamu. Acaan maka ‘wondɛ Juaŋ tɛɛtin ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba maka tuutan moki bɛɛ.

Kan ma etti poñña ñamuyɛ, poñña neeni a poñi Juaŋo, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba pokkin pookɛn waakɛnda aŋi pokkin Juaŋ doki. Kan jaan bɛɛkkɛ pwadɔyɛ, ɔci jaan jyetkɛ pwadɔ daŋkun, a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ma Icrayiil daŋkun Juaŋti ne ɛkkɛn dɔɔkti ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwaddi.

Ma Icrayiilyɛ, gɛɛg bala ɔntɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti. Ɛkkɛn yookɔn te Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba jaan kɛrka yiegin ne tɔɔckiti ma ɔntɔy. Ɔci ɛkkɛ Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛ cɔɔckɛ ma nona neeniti aŋka ɛkkɛ ñoowɛ i ma Icrayiil a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba jan jɛtuun kɛrkɛ jana yuli bora budan ne cɔɔckiti ma jana parɛ neenitiy. Ɔci ba kɛrka neeni ne tɛɛtki te jaan mɛɛgɛnyɛ, ɔci bala ba ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Jyek Juaŋ bɛɛn ma Icrayiilti te ñamu, ɔci acca bala ɛkkɛti daŋkun.

Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ jieyɛ waakɔ pookɔ agi ɛkkɛ pwadgɛ te ma Icrayiil maka ḍɛɛmdin iñɔ neeni bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ buagɛ jieyɛ waakɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyek ma Icrayiil neeni ñamu. Acaan ba ne jaan kɛrkɛ yɔɔtki ne tɛyan te jaan mɛɛgɛnyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ da yɔɔdɛ ne tɛyan te jyeka bɛɛn te ma Icrayiilti te ñamu neeni.
Ɔci ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ kaapun, agi jaan kɛrka wanna tɔɔnnɛ Juaŋ ɔntɔ aŋka dala ɛkkɛ cɔttɛti ɛkɛ non ɛkkɛn kaapun.

Awarɛ, kɛrka wannayɛ, ɛkkɛn tɔɔnnɛ Juaŋ ɔntɔ acaan jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Yaccuti bala bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ jaan warɛti te naŋki ɛkkɛ pookɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ jaan warɛti oŋkanda te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Yaccuti neeni. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ jieddɛ waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ buayɛ te ḍɛɛmdin ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔny.
Jaan kɛrkɛ woodgɛn jitkɛn tɔɔnnɛ Juaŋ ɔntɔ doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi kɛrka oonɛ ɛkɛ ɔci cɔɔnnɛti ɛkɛ jaanti neeni kan ɛkkɛn yeyɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn daldɛ ɛkɛ boki? A’a.

Dala Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ yomɛ pwadi matiy, ɔci dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ moki jyek ɛkɛ a jyeka a ñiek bɛɛ. Jyek ɛkɛ tɛy tɛyo. Ma Icrayiil maka ḍɛɛmdin iñɔyɛ, jyek Juaŋ tɛy tɛy ɛkkɛnti. Yeti ɛkkɛ, kan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ te yom pwani Juaŋ oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ da yomɛ pwad pwad ɛkkɛti oŋkanda ɔɔn daŋkun.
Ɔci maka ḍɛɛmdin iñɔ a ma Icrayiil neeniyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn mwonti te yookin jyek jyeniyɛ, ɔci Juaŋ yaakinti ɛkkɛn cɔttɛti jaan mɛɛgɛnti moki.

Ɛkkɛ Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba jan jɛtuun kɛrkɛ jana yuli luom jitin parɛ ne kɛnɛ tɔɔkiti ma ɔci olkiti ma jana pwadantiy. Kan Juaŋ yaakinti noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, oŋ ɛkɛ yaakinti jaan kɛrkɛ woodgɛn cɔttɛti bɛɛ? Yaakinti, hay!

Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jwalla guaŋi ‘ya neeni. Naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi ɛkkɛ jiek waakɛnda ŋeejɛ bɛɛ. Wyeñ tɛɛn ma Icrayiilyɛ, bala yuonginda bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn tɛy tɛy acca ɔɔn ne Keedin Pookɛn maka muonɛ Juaŋ bora neeni jyetti ɔɔn.

Ɔci ma Icrayiil oŋ yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ oŋo. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Mena Yuoci Ma bɛya te ban Icrayiil ɔci yuoci ma Icrayiil. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛyɛ, ma Icrayiil mwondi te nɔjja naŋtan ɛkkɛn Juaŋti neeni.”
Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki agi, “Ne ‘ya nɔji ɛkkɛn eeda ɔntɔyɛ, ‘ya jiek naŋdin iki ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ te jyek yɔɔta neeni.”

Ma Icrayiil maka yookɔn te jyeni jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yoyi ñin iki Juaŋ agi ɛkkɛ Keedin Pookɛn aŋka aŋŋɛ mung Juaŋo. Yeti Juaŋ ani ma Icrayiil men ɔɔn acaan Juaŋ jiek naŋɛ iki yɔrg ma Icrayiil te baaṭi. Ɔci acaan ma Icrayiil muonɛ ɛkɛ bora te baaṭiyɛ, ɛkɛ jiek agdiyɔ te ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ.
Acaan Juaŋyɛ, kan ɛkɛ boor mayɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ buagɔn ma ‘wondɛ waakyɛ, ɛkɛ jiek agdiyɔ bɛɛ.
Te baaṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ba jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ. Yeti accayɛ, ɛkkɛ ciyɛ te jyek ɛkɛ acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ɛkkɛti. Ɔci ma Icrayiil maka muonɛ Juaŋ bora te baaṭi neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka yookɔn te jyek ɛkɛ.

Ɔci acca ma Icrayiil yookɔn men te yom pɔkkin Juaŋ ɛkkɛnti men ɔɔn, yeti acaan Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ɛkkɛti dokiyɛ, ɔci ma Icrayiil poŋdi te naŋka neeni. Ɔci ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn yaltan Juaŋti, ɔci Juaŋ yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkkɛnti daŋkun.

Ma Icrayiil ɔci Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛɛyi jyek Juaŋ oŋkanda, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti waakɛn pɔktan pookɛn te bɛɛn jiek bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛn dalnɛ nɔji jitin aŋka ɛkkɛn pɔktɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda te naŋki ɛkɛ ne ɛkɛ yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkkɛntiy.

Paŋi Jwaŋa Tolan tol tol ne pɛñan hay! Ɔci ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛyɛ, tɛy tɛy ne pɛñan. Ɛkɛ waak ŋeejɛ waakɛnda. Gena kwoyi ɛkɛ gɛɛl bala bɛɛ. Menga yaakinti paŋi Juaŋ pagdɛ bɛɛ. Menga yaakinti naŋki ɛkɛ ŋeeddɛ bɛɛ.
A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “A menɛ paŋi Juaŋ ŋeejɛy? Juaŋ tooccin mengati te jwali gɛɛl aŋka ɛkɛ maktan ma te jwali gɛɛl boki? A’a.”
“Jwaŋa Tolan balki dɛɛn mengati boki? A’a, ɛkɛ eci genga te mengati boki? A’a.”
Waak waakɛnda bɛɛn te ɛkɛti, ɔci te war tɛɛn ɛkɛyɛ, waak waakɛnda bala oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci waak waakɛnda aŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ḍwaŋ ɛkɛ parɛ. Dala ma jieyi ɛkɛ oŋkanda yuonginda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.

Modg ɔɔn, Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ikinti, ɔci acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya gɔk ɛkkɛti dala ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ‘wondɛ waak ɛkkɛ. Dala waak ɛkkɛ daldɛ, dala Juaŋ noŋdi ba yom ɛkɛ, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin Juaŋti. Ne ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ‘wondɛ waak ɛkkɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ yomgɔti agi Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ parɛ a Juaŋo.

Naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba naŋki maka ciyi budan te jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ. Paŋŋa yaayan daldɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ooktɛ paŋŋa parɛ paŋŋa woonɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka wonkɛn, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka Juaŋ buagiti agi naŋji ɛkkɛyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ jyek naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, pwadɔ, ɔci Juaŋ yomɛ ñɔya te naŋka neeni. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, jyeka neeni yɔmjin.

Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwad pwad ‘yati, acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ḍwaŋdi bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi ɛkkɛ pwadgɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ jyenno, ɔci magga jyeti ne tolan ɔci magga jyeti ne ḍiɛran. Ɔci maka jyeti ne ḍiɛran neeniyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn gɔki agi jyeni ɛkkɛn tolɔ bɛɛ. Dala ŋeettan ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ne jyenna ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeni baali a ɔkiy.
Men warɛyɛ, balki jyetkɛ, ɔci woŋgɛ, ɔci ‘womgɛ, ɔci tukɛ, ɔci waka pookɛn daŋkun. Ɔci waka bala men warɛti neeniyɛ, balki kanŋan, genga da te kanŋa ɛkɛ, ɔci genga da te kanŋa ɛkɛ.

Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ikin daŋkun. Ikinyɛ, coŋkin, yeti acaan ikin balkin Yaccu Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ikin balkin ba mena ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci moki ikin kɛɛptin jitin te kanŋa, menga da te kanŋa ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da te kanŋa ɛkɛ. Ɔci ikin moowin yɔtin pookɔ.

Juaŋ yomɛ pwad pwad ikinti. Ikinyɛ, ‘wonnin ɛkɛ ñing tɛɛno, menga da te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin kantin te ñing tɛɛna ‘wonninti ɛkɛy. Kan men gɛɛl ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ ñing tɛɛn te kanŋa mieti ɛkɛ mayɛ, dala ɛkɛ mieti ma ne pwadan ba ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeni.
Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ ñing tɛɛn te kanŋa maŋi ma Juaŋ te kanŋa waakyɛ, dala ɛkɛ kandi ne pwadan. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ ñing tɛɛn te lali ma te jiekyɛ, dala ɛkɛ loṭi ma ne pwadan.

Ɔci mena ṭeyi mayɛ, dala ɛkɛ waŋɛ tiittɛ te ṭeen mako. Mena ‘woñi ma te waakyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ma ‘wondɛ waak te yoma pwadan yoma bɔwan. Ɔci mena ḍuaŋayɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi kanŋa ɛkɛ ne byeran. Ɔci mena moki mayɛ, dala ɛkɛ moki ma te yoma ñɔyan.
Dala ɛkkɛ anɛ ma te yoma awarɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yookɛ te jyek naŋka yeyin, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyek naŋka pwadin.
Dala ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin ne pwadan bala ba oonnin maka modin. Dala maka pookɛn bala ñamu te ɛkkɛ.
Naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolan morndɛ a morŋin a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ byerdɛ a byergin te kanŋa ɛkɛ.

Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi ne ɛkkɛ balgi kɛɛyɛ jyeka pwadin jyeka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeniy. Ɔci ne taab baali ɛkkɛti te jyek Yaccuyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi ne pɛñan bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya. Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Naa cɔŋi daldɛ bɛɛ.
Ɔci kan wak Ma Kiṭɔ bɔɔnjinyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn magdɛ te waako. Ɔci kan maka wɛlg bala ciyi ban ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn magdɛ te waka amtin, ɔci te nona ninki ɛkkɛn daŋkun.
Kan ma noŋi ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti. Naa ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn ḍardɛyɔ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti ɔɔn.
Kan ma yomgɛn ñɔyɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi iki ɛkkɛn daŋkun. Ɔci kan ma bala wiakyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ wiaktɛ iki ɛkkɛn daŋkun.
Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ba yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ. Naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi maka pookɛn yeyɔ bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ yookɛ te maka ŋoyɔ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ iki ɛkkɛn. Naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba maka yɛcin ɔɔn bɛɛ.
Kan ma noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne yaayan ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te coodi ɛkkɛ aŋka coodi ɛkkɛ pwada ma ñomgɛnti waakɛnda.
Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ba maka nɔji ɛkkɛn baaw ɔci ywobji ɛkkɛn baawo. Kan maka pookɛn balki jiekyɛ, aŋi ba jyek ɛkkɛn pookɛn doki.

Maka ana ‘yay, kan ma noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne yaayan ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ jyeka neeni oldɛ aŋa Juaŋti, ɔci kan ɛkɛ buagɔn noŋdi ywobji ɛkkɛntiyɛ, gena yom ɛkɛ. Jyeka kiigin jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ gɔki agi, “‘Ya waru yoddo, ‘ya jiek olji ma wyetkɛnti.”

Ɔci worga gɔki moki agi, “Kan men gɛɛl yookɔn te ɛkkɛ ɔci kan ɛkɛ amɛ koñyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ waka amtin. Ɔci kan ɛkɛ amɛ yiɛnyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ pieg motti. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛ neeni pɛñ pɛñ ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ aga lɔɔno.”
Naa ɛkkɛ bwantɛ naŋka yeyin bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka naŋka yeyin bwandɛ te naŋka pwadin.
Dala ma waakɛnda noŋdi ba jyek akuuma ban ɛkkɛn, acaan gena Jwaŋa Tolan ‘woñi ma te jyek akuumay.
Ɔci kan men gɛɛl yookɔn te jyek akuumayɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkɛ yookɔn te jyek naŋka ma ‘wonnɛ Juaŋy. Ɔci maka yookɔn te naŋki Juaŋ neeniyɛ, jiek bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti.

Maka noŋi ne pwadanyɛ, ɛkkɛn buayi jyek akuuma bɛɛ. Gena maka noŋi ne yaayan aŋka buayi jyek akuumay. Kan ɛkkɛ buayɛ jyek akuumayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ naŋka yeyin neeni daldɛ ɔci ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ naŋka pwadin, ɔci jyek bwajja neeniyɛ, bɛya ɛkkɛti moki bɛɛ. Ɔci akuuma gɔkti ne pwadan ɛkkɛti.

Ma akuumayɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛnk Juaŋo. Ɛkkɛn gɔṭi ɛkkɛ aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ne yaayan bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ne yaayanyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ. Ma akuuma jiek oltan ma wyetkɛnti budan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn a kɛɛnk Juaŋ awarɛ, kan men gɛɛl noŋdi ne yaayanyɛ, jiek duaktɛ akuuma ɛkɛ wyeñɛti.

Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ma akuuma. Naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek akuuma te bwaji ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek akuuma te jyek Juaŋ daŋkun, aŋka naa jyeka yeyin neeni bɛya ɛkkɛ yomgɔti bɛɛ.
Ɔci moki te jyeka neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ma akuuma ‘wondɛ bilk tulba. Acaan ma akuumayɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛnk Juaŋ ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔṭi jyek kanŋa Juaŋo.

Ma akuuma waakɛnda kan ɛkkɛn buagɔn tulba te ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ. Ɔci moki kan ma akuuma buagɔn tulba te wak ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ ñieyɛ a ñiek te jyek maka ḍwaŋin bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkkɛn ne pwadan te yoma pwadan.

Kan dɛɛn bala itiyɛ, naa dɛna neeni ḍwaya ḍuad budan ɔci ‘uotkati i ɛka parɛ a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Yeti gena bala ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti ba dɛɛnyɛ, gena anno. Dala ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin pookɔ oŋkanda, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba naŋki ganuun.

Jyek ganuun jitkɛn gɔki agi, “Naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ tomi bɛɛ, ɔci naa ɛkkɛ nokkɛ ma bɛɛ, ɔci naa ɛkkɛ kortɛ waak bɛɛ, ɔci naa ɛkkɛ buagɛ wak maka pookɛn bɛɛ.” Jyek ganuun jitka neeni ɔci jyek ganuun jitka pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda a jyeka ne cyɛɛlɔ i jwali ṭɔɔlɛ neeni, “Dala anna ɛkkɛ anɛ maka pookɛnyɛ, yoomdi i anna ɛkkɛ ani waak ɛkkɛy.”
Kan mena ani mayɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan mati bɛɛ. Mena ani mayɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti Jyek ganuun tiidɛyɔ ne pwadan.

Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ a ɔɔn ba jyeka neeni. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te coodi ɛkkɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba maka wici budan ɔɔn bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ jiek ŋeeddɛ ne pwadan acaan oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛdi ɔci ikin yɔɔtintiyɛ, looncin moki bɛɛ. Oŋŋa neeni bɛya ne cwakanti.
Ween jiñɛ looncin moki bɛɛ. Noon noŋi bɔwa doki. Naa ikin noŋtin ba naŋka naŋtan ma te ween jiñɛ nona mielti wanna bɛɛ. Dala ikin cietin ne pwadan ba maka ciyi te nona bɔwan.
Dala ikin noŋtin naŋka pwadan ba maka ciyi te nona bɔwan. Naa ikin noŋin amaam ba maka nokkin mooy, walla ba maka noŋi tomi, ɔci walla ba maka balki jyek pɛɛdin, ɔci walla ba maka korkɛn modin bɛɛ.
Yeti dala ikin wɛɛtin gena Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti ne pwadan. Naa ikin poŋin te paŋi yoma te baaṭi aŋka paŋi yoma te baaṭi neeni bɛya ikinti moki bɛɛ.
Kan men gɛɛl tɛy tɛy te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan men bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ balgɛ iki ɛkkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ oŋkanda ɔɔn. Kan ɛkɛ buayi gengayɛ, naa ɛkkɛ wookɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛ.
Ma Kiṭɔ gɛɛg yaakinti omi waak waakɛnda. Yeti ma gɛɛg kan ɛkkɛn tɛy tɛy te jyek Juaŋ men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn buayi te ami waka pookɛn ba yoŋgi ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn omi waka jang ṭɔlgɛn pookɛn budan.
Maka omi waakyɛ, ɔci maka omi bɛɛyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ woowɛ yɔtin pookɔ bɛɛ, acaan Juaŋ ani ɛkkɛ waakida.

I a menɛ aŋka i wooki kɛɛngɔn Juaŋy? Kanŋa mena kɛɛngɔn kan pwatcin walla kan yaayɛyɛ, gena jyek i bɛɛ. Gena jyek kɛɛngɔn Weegɛn. Ɔci ɛkɛ magdɛ Ciɛggɔn ɔci yɔɔtti iñɔ acaan Ciɛggɔn yaakinti ɛkɛ magdɛ.
Ma gɛɛg gɔki agi oŋki iidn gɛɛg ḍwaŋgɔ. Ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg moki gɔki agi oŋki iidn waakcinda balgɔ bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ waakida menga da jyek yom ɛkɛ ŋeejɛ ne pwadan.

Kan men gɛɛl poŋi gɔki agi oŋ gɛɛl tolɔ ɛkɛtiyɛ, oŋŋa neeni tolcin ɛkɛti te Juaŋo. Mena omi waakyɛ, ɛkɛ omi waak budan bɛɛ, ɛkɛ omi waak te Juaŋo. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkti ɛkɛti agi pwatcin. Ɔci mena gwoṭi koñyɛ, ɛkɛ gwoṭi koñ budan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gwoṭi koñ te Juaŋo. Ɔci ɛkɛ da gɔkti ɛkɛti a pwatcin daŋkun.
Ikin menga yaakinti ciyi parɛ budan bɛɛ. Ɔci ikin menga tuwa parɛ budan bɛɛ, acaan Juaŋ bala.
Kan ikin balkin meni, ɔci walla kan ikin tuunin dokiyɛ, ikin akin ma ɛkɛ men ɔɔn.
Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋi Ciɛggɔn maka tɛɛtan ɔci maka tuutan. Gena jyek cyɛgja neeni aŋka Yaccu tuuni ɔci jɔlni ñaalɔ tɛɛti moki neeni.
Te gena yeti aŋka i wooki mod ɛkkɛy? Ɔci te gena yeti i noŋ ba ne mod ɛkkɛ a genga bɛɛy? Ne baaṭi godan bala ikinti waakida. Ɔci ikin yɔɔttin Juaŋ ñamɛti te godan ikin.
Jyek Ciɛggɔn jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Awarɛ, ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ma waakɛnda ḍwondi iñɔ ‘ya ñamuti, ɔci ma waakɛnda jieddi ‘ya.”
Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ikin waakida Juaŋ myettin te naŋki ikin.
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ikin woowin yɔtin pookɔ moki bɛɛ. Dala ikin poŋtin jiek yomgɔti aŋka naa mod ikin gɛɛl ḍɛmdi iñɔ bɛɛ.
Acaan ‘ya baal Yaccutiyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya ne pwadan genga yaayɛ mengati budan bɛɛ, yeti kan men gɛɛl yookɔn te gengayɛ, ɔci gena neeni da yaayɛ ɛkɛti daŋkun.

Kan mod ɛkkɛ gɛɛl bala poŋi jiek te waka amdɛ ɛkkɛ a waka ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkinti ɔci kan ɛkɛ gɔki agi a ɔɔn yaayɔ Juaŋti ɔci kan ɛkkɛ omɛ men ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ yomgɔ baaw mod ɛkkɛti neeni. Naa mod ɛkkɛ gɛɛl lɛgdɛ ɛkkɛ jitin te jyek waka amdɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, acaan Yaccu tuun te ɛkɛ daŋkun.
Kan naŋki i pwad pwad ɔci kan maka pookɛn poŋi gɔki agi naŋka neeni pwadɔ bɛɛyɛ, dala naŋki i neeni dalja acaan te ɛkkɛn.
Jyek cyɛgji Juaŋyɛ, gena jyek waka amtin bɛɛ, ɔci a jyek waka maattan ma bɛɛ. Gena jyek naŋka pwadin, ɔci jyek coodi pwani mati ɔci jyek yom ñɔɔno. Yom ñɔɔn neeniyɛ, bɛɛn te Boŋ Juaŋti.
Ne ɛkkɛ kanŋi Juaŋti ɔci waka pwadin balki ɛkkɛtiyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin Juaŋti ɔci pwatcin mati daŋkun.
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin jyek coodda pwadan tiitinyɔ, ɔci dala moki ikin woŋgɔ tiittin te jyek moowin yɔtin pookɔ aŋka ikin yɔɔttin ne tɛyan te jyek Yaccu.

Naa ɛkkɛ kanŋa Juaŋ lɛgdɛ jitin te jyek waka amdɛ bɛɛ. Waka amtin pwadɔ waakɛnda, gen gɛɛl yaayɛ budan bɛɛ. Yeti kan men gɛɛl bala omi genga ɔci kan mena parɛ poŋi jiek ɔci ḍɛmdi iñɔ te naŋka neeniyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkɛ lɛɛŋŋɛ men jitin, ɔci a ɔɔn amma ɛkɛ omi neeniyɛ, yaayɛ.
Kan i poŋ gɔk men gɛɛl ḍɛmdi te naŋki i ne i omdi yoŋga ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkinti, ɔci walla ne i motti mooy, ɔci kan i waka neeni dalja te mod ɛkkɛyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin.
Kan ŋeej i yomuti gen gɛɛl pwatcin Juaŋtiyɛ, dala i noŋja Juaŋ ñamɛti parɛ. Kan i noŋ genga, ɔci kan yom i poŋi jiek bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, i yomu pwanna pwanno.

Kan men gɛɛl omi genga ɔci kan ɛkɛ poŋi jiek yomɛti te gena amdɛ ɛkɛ neeni ɔci kan ɛkɛ omi men ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn yaayɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, bɛɛn te jyenna ɛkɛ jyetti Juaŋti neeni bɛɛ. Kan ikin noŋtin genga ɔci kan ikin jyettin yomgɔti bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn a nɔjjo.
Ikin maka yomgɛn tɛɛn te jyek Juaŋyɛ, dala ikin maka yomgɛn koyan maktin daŋkun. Naa ikin poŋin te waak ikin pookɔ bɛɛ. Dala ikin poŋtin te maka pookɛn daŋkun.
Ɔci dala ikin waakida noŋtin ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti aŋka ɛkkɛn kooptin ñaalɔ aŋka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn tɛya te jyek Juaŋ daŋkun.

Dala ikin noŋtin a ɔɔn acaan ne Kiṭɔ baaliyɛ, ɛkɛ bala poŋi te war ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala poŋi te ikin daŋkun. Naŋki ɛkɛ neeni bala ba jyeka kiigin ne ɛkkɛn gɔkki agi, “Jyeka wookki ma iyɛ, bɛɛn ‘ya wyeñuti doki”.

Jyeka kiiwɛ ma te baaṭi waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ikinti aŋka ikin laltin ɛkkɛn. Te jyek Juaŋ jyeka kiigin neeniyɛ, Juaŋ bala ṭeyi ikin aŋka naa ikin mwontin ne pɛñan te jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Dala ikin kɛɛyin naŋki ɛkɛ te yoma pwadan.
Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ma yɔɔda ne tɛyan te ɛkɛ. Ɔci ma ṭeedɛ ɛkɛ. Dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ magdɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan oondɛ yɔtin oŋkanda.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti jieyɛ Jwaŋa Tolan Wey Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti jieddɛ ɛkɛ te lɛmma ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Dala ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin pookɔ bala ba Kiṭɔ ne ani ɛkkɛ wanna ɔɔn. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, maka pookɛn jieddi Jwaŋa Tolan agi Juaŋ pwadɔ.
Kiṭɔ aŋi kɛɛngɔn ma Icrayiil aŋka ŋeettan ma jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ neeni a jyeka awarɛ, ɔci aŋka jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ iki yɔrg ɛkkɛn te baaṭi neeniyɛ, bɛya bora.

Ɔci moki Kiṭɔ aŋi kɛɛngɔn ma Icrayiil aŋka Juaŋ yomɛ pɔktɛ maka pookɛnti daŋkun, ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, Keedin Pookɛn neeniyɛ, jieddi ɛkɛ daŋkun. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “‘Ya jiey i Keedin Pookɛnti. Ɔci ‘ya ‘ualja ɔɔlla gɔki agi yenti i pwadɔy.”
Ɔci moki agi, “Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔya i ma ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ.” Ɔci moki jyeka kiigin gɔki agi,
“Keedin Pookɛn waakɛnda dala ɛkkɛ jieddi Ciɛggɔn. Dala maka pookɛn waakɛnda jieddi Ciɛggɔn.”
Ɔci Jyek Icaaya daŋkun gɔki agi, “Men gɛɛl bala bɛya te ma Daawud kaci Jɛciti, ɔci ɛkɛ aga Ciɛggɔn Keedin Pookɛn, ɔci Keedin Pookɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeddi kɛɛddi gena ɛkɛ parɛ.”

Jwaŋa ikin jyettin kɛɛyin naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ yom ñɔɔn ɔci coodi pwani ne tolan te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ɛkɛti neeni. Ɔci te war tɛɛn Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ciedɛ ne pwadan ne ɛkkɛ kɛɛyɛ naŋki ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
Modg ɔɔn, ŋeej ‘ya te yom ‘ya ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ ne pwadany. Ɛkkɛ ñingɔ tɛy tɛy te jyek Juaŋo, ɔci ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ṭeyɛ waakɔ pookɔ.
Yeti ‘ya kiewan worga ɛkkɛti te jiek gɛɛg aŋka ɛkkɛ ñingɔ ñiektɛ te jyeka neeni. ‘Ya gɔkkan a ɔɔn ɛkkɛti acaan Juaŋ yomɛ pwad pwad ‘yati te yom ɛkɛ,

’ya naŋŋa ɛkɛ a gaciic. ‘Ya a gaciic Yaccu Kiṭɔ Keedin Pookɛnti, acaan ‘ya ma myetka te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin. Ɔci acaan ‘ya a gaciic ɛkkɛnyɛ, ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛn pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti te naŋki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti. ‘Ya ɛkkɛn ‘woñga Jwaŋa Tolan.
’Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te naŋka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ mati te kanŋa ‘ya ne ‘ya baala noŋa kanŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔy.
’Ya yomu tɛya ɔci gɔkca te gena waka naŋŋɛ Yaccu te ‘ya pookɛn aŋka Keedin Pookɛn noŋdi ba jyek Juaŋo. Naŋka neeni naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te jiek ɔci te naŋko,

ɔci te naŋka tɛyan ɔci naŋka ñyecki ma Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci te war tɛɛn Boŋ Juaŋ aŋka ma jyetki ɛkɛti neeni. Bonka wɛnni waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍaaŋi ‘ya te lallo. Gena ban Urcaliim, ɔci bonka pookɛn bonka yomɔ waakɛnda ne ban Iliirikom ɔɔn.

Yom ‘ya buagɔn loṭi ma bonka pookɛn bonka jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin baaw matiy. Yom ‘ya buagɔn naŋka neeni ne pɛñan. Ɔci kan mena parɛ gɛɛl mɔkca bala loṭi ma bana parɛ gɛɛlti te jyek Yaccu dokiyɛ, ‘ya ootta non ɛkɛti moki bɛɛ. Ɔci ba jyek lali ‘ya neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek ono. Kan men gɛɛl cuoti on dokiyɛ, ‘ya ootta non ɛkɛ byɛldi bɛɛ. ‘Ya da ootta cuotca on nona parɛ daŋkun.
Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, maka pookɛn tieŋdi jyek Juaŋ daŋkun bala ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Icaaya agi, “Maka nɔɔtki ma men bɛɛyɛ, dala jiek ooddi ɛkkɛnti, ɔci maka tieŋŋin men bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn tieŋdi.”
’Ya baal poŋ oŋkanda ka ‘ya bɛɛd ban ɛkkɛ, yeti te kanŋa jyek lali ma bonka pookɛn neeniyɛ, wɔɔka bɛɛda ‘ya gɔ bala bɛɛ.
Yeti acca kanŋa ‘ya bawwin nonka neeniti. Acca ‘ya buaga bɛɛdo. Yuonga coŋin neeniyɛ, ‘ya baal gɔk ka ‘ya bɛɛd ban ɛkkɛ.
Ne ‘ya bɛɛda oodda ban Icpeenyɛ, ‘ya ɛɛra ikin yɔɔrtin iki ɛkkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘ya ‘wondata waagga eca pɔy yomɛ ne ban Icpeenti.
Yeti acca ‘ya baal pɔɔjɔ ootta ban Urcaliim aŋka mok Ma Kiṭɔ aŋan.
Ma kaniica Macɛdɔɔnya ɔci ma kaniica Akeeya, ɛkkɛn bilk limiyɔ te ma kaniica maka anin ban Urcaliim.

Ne ɛkkɛn balki lyemki bilka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. Ne ɛkkɛn ma Urcaliim makkiti te waka neeniyɛ, te ñamu ɛkkɛn aŋka magɛ ma Urcaliim. Maka neeniyɛ, Jyek Juaŋ bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti te maka ban Urcaliim. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛn ma Urcaliim maktan daŋkunyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin.
Ne ma Urcaliim ‘wonda ‘ya bilka limiyɔ ma neeni ɔci ne naŋka neeni ḍagda ‘yayɛ, ‘ya oŋ bɛɛd ootta ban Icpeen oŋo. Ɔci ‘ya ɛɛra ban ɛkkɛ.
Çeej ‘ya ne ‘ya bɛɛda ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ikin maktin Kiṭɔ ne pwadan.

Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ te ‘ya ne tolan te wona ‘ya oodda ban Urcaliimji neeni. ‘Ya tooc ɛkkɛti te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci ‘ya tooc ɛkkɛti moki te anna ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolany.

Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te ‘ya aŋka naa ywobji maka yookɔn te jyek Juaŋ neeniyɛ, bɛya ‘yati bɛɛ. Gena maka ban Urcaliim. Ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ te ma Juaŋ ban Urcaliim te bilka eed ‘ya ɛkkɛnti neeni, aŋka bilka neeni lultan ɛkkɛn te yoma pwadan.
Kan ne naŋka neeni baatiyɛ, ɔci kan Juaŋ buagɔn ‘ya bɛɛd ban ɛkkɛyɛ, ‘ya oŋ bɛɛd oŋo. ‘Ya bɛɛd te yoma ñɔyan, ɔci ‘ya wowwa ban ɛkkɛ ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ lakun.
Jwaŋ ikin mena ma ‘wondɛ coodda pwadanyɛ, dala ɛkɛ baldɛ iki ɛkkɛ oŋki waakɛnda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.
Acca ɛkkɛ myettin ‘ya te kow ikin Piibi mena noŋi kanŋa kaniica ban Cɛnkriyati neeni.

Ɛkkɛ myettin ‘ya te ɛkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ ñiibdɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te ɛkɛ, acaan ɛkɛ a men Kiṭɔ. Ne Ma Kiṭɔ noŋti a ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmdi. Kan jyeka tɛyan gɛɛg balayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ magdɛ, acaan ɛkɛ maka pookɛn maŋŋɛ a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ, kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Ɔci ‘ya daŋkun maŋŋa ɛkɛ daŋkun.
Dala ɛkkɛ Pricilla ɔci Akwilla ñiibdɛ te ‘ya, ɛkkɛn bala ciyi boki? Ɛkkɛn a maka noŋin iki ‘ya kanŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ.

Ne ma noŋki ‘ya noktatayɛ, maka neeni ɛkkɛn buayi lien bɛɛ. ‘Ya makka ɛkkɛn ɔɔn. ‘Ya yomu pwad pwad ɛkkɛnti te naŋki ɛkkɛn. ‘Ya yomu pwad pwad ɛkkɛnti paru bɛɛ. Ma kaniican Keedin Pookɛn waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki a pwatcin te ɛkkɛn.
Maka ḍwoṭi wyetkɛn te jyek Juaŋ on ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ñiibdɛ te ‘ya, ɛkkɛn bala ciyi boki? Mug ɔɔn Ɛpeenatac ñiibdɛ daŋkun. Ɛkɛ a mena jyeti Kiṭɔti ñamu ban Ecya.
Moryam ñiibdɛ daŋkun te ‘ya, ɛkɛ bala ciyi boki? Ɛkɛ bala noŋi kanŋa ne tolan ɛkkɛti.

Andronaaykac ɔci Junyac ɛkkɛn ñiibdɛ te ‘ya daŋkun, ɛkkɛn bala ciyi boki? Ɛkkɛn a maka ban ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn balgin iki ‘ya ciginji a cyɛɛlɔ. Cuudan Yaccu jieyi maka neeni agi ɛkki pwadgɔ. Ne ‘ya jyetta men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeti Kiṭɔti doki ñamu.
Mug ɔɔn Ampliiyatac ñiibdɛ te ‘ya, ɛkɛ a men Kiṭɔ.
Orbeenoc ñiibdɛ te ‘ya. Ɛkɛ bala kanŋin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ te kanŋa Kiṭɔ. Icteekic mug ɔɔn mena onga ‘ya ñiibdɛ daŋkun, ɛkɛ bala ciyi boki?
Apɛllɛc mena guaktan ma agi ɛkta anɔ Kiṭɔ ne pwadanyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiibdɛ te ‘ya. Ɔci ma Ɛrictobyuuloc ñiibdɛ daŋkun.
Ɛrɔɔdyan mena bɛɛn te ban ɔɔn, ñiibdɛ te ‘ya. Ɔci ma Narciicac Ma Kiṭɔ ñiibdɛ te ‘ya, ɛkkɛn bala ciyi boki?
Tripiina ɔci Tripɔɔca, moonga bala kanŋan ne tolan oŋkanda te kanŋa Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, ñiibdɛ te ‘ya. Mug ɔɔn Pɛrcic ñiibdɛ te ‘ya. Ɛkɛ ‘wota a ɛŋa bala kanŋan ne tolan te kanŋa Kiṭɔy.
Rupac ñiibdɛ daŋkun. Ɛkɛ a mena ñingɛ tɛyan te jyek Kiṭɔ. Ɔci mɛy ɛkkɛn ñiibdɛ daŋkun. Ɛkɛ bala ba mɛy ɔɔn daŋkun ‘yati.
Aciiŋkritac ñiibdɛ, ɔci Pligɔn, ɔci Ɛrmic, ɔci Patrɔbac ɔci Ɛrmac, ɛkkɛn ñiibdɛ, ɔci maka bala iki ɛkkɛn a modgɛnyɛ, ñiibdɛ daŋkun.
Pilɔɔlogoc ɔci Julya ñiibdɛ, ɔci Nireeyoc ɔci kow ɛkkɛn ñiibdɛ, ɔci Ɔliimpac, ɔci Ma Kiṭɔ maka bala iki ɛkkɛn waakɛnda, ɛkkɛn ñiibdɛ daŋkun, ɛkkɛn bala ciyi boki?
Dala ɛkkɛ ñiebdɛ yɔtin pookɔ te yoma pwadan. Kaniican Kiṭɔ ñiepi ɛkkɛ waakɛnda.

Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ ne pwadan jyeka gɔwwa ‘yay, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te maka kɛɛbi ma jitkɛn te jieko, ɔci te maka noŋi ne yaayan, aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ bɛɛ. Maka noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, jyek ɛkkɛn bala ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ma te ñamu neeni bɛɛ. Naa jyek ɛkkɛ ñoodi i jyek ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn kanŋan te kanŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Kiṭɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan. Ɛkkɛn gɔki te lɛmma milan ɔci maka pookɛn naŋtan ñin doki.

Ma waakɛnda tieŋŋin agi ɛkkɛ baljɛ noŋjɛ ba jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin ne pwadan. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te jyek ɛkkɛ. Yeti ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ tɛya te jyeka pwadin. Naa jyeka yeyin bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
Jwaŋa Tolan mena ma ‘wondɛ coodda pwadanyɛ, ɛkɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan bwandɛ ne cwakanti. Accayɛ, dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomɛ pwada pwani ɛkkɛti.

Timutawuc mena noŋin kanŋa iki ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ gɔki agi ‘ya ɛkkɛ ñiibjɛ te ɛkɛ daŋkun, ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkkɛ niinjɛ boki? Ɔci Luciiyoc, ɔci Jɛcan, ɔci Cɔciipatɛr, ɛkkɛn a maka ban ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ‘ya ɛkkɛ ñiibjɛ te ɛkkɛn daŋkun agi ɛkkɛ niinjɛ boki?
Gena ‘ya Tɛrcyac, mena Buuluc kieŋnɛ worga neeni, ‘ya ñieb ɛkkɛ daŋkun, acaan ‘ya a men Kiṭɔ daŋkun ba ɛkkɛ ɔɔn, ɛkkɛ niinnɛ boki.

Gayac mena onɛ ciya ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Gayac neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena moki Ma Kiṭɔ wɛnni waakɛnda. Iraactac, mena gɔṭi bilk akuuma ban ɔɔn neenitiyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Ɔci mod ikin Kwartoc, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun. [
Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomgɔti waakida. Amɛɛn.]

Dala ikin jieyin Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkɛ yaakinti ɛkkɛ yɔɔttɛ iñɔ ne tɛyan te jyeni ɛkkɛ. ‘Ya lor ma te Yaccu Kiṭɔ ba jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin, ɔci ba jyek liɛlti naŋka awarɛ naŋka niin lieda warɛ a coggɔn te baaṭi loonan neeni.

Acca naŋka neeni warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora te worgan kiiwɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci te jwalla guaŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan mena ciyi yuonginda neeniy. Naŋka neeni mieddɛ ma bora keedinti waakɛnda, a ɔŋŋi aŋka ma waakɛnda tieŋdi ɔci jyeddi.
Dala Jwaŋa Tolan mena nɔɔti ne cyɛɛlɔ a ñing tɛɛn neeniyɛ, jiɛtan ma te Yaccu Kiṭɔ ne baaṭi ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.
Gena ‘ya, Buuluc mena bornɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka aga Cuuda ɛkɛ ba yom Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci mod ikin Cɔctanic kiewɔn worga neen neeni.

Worga neeni ooddi kaniica Jwaŋa Tolanti ban Kuruntuc, ooddi maka bornɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, aŋka aga ma ɛkɛ maka pwadin te ñoowin ɛkkɛn ñooki iki Yaccu Kiṭɔ i maka moṭi ɛkɛti noon warday. Ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛn ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin.
Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin, ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwanno.
’Ya gɔk a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋkanda te ɛkkɛ, acaan Juaŋ yomɛ pwad pwad ɛkkɛti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Acaan ɛkkɛ korkɔ kuumi te ɛkɛ te pɔyi waakɛnda te jyeka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ waakɛnda, ɔci te ŋeejin ɛkkɛ waak ŋeejɛ waakɛnday.
Acaan jyeka gɔɔnɔn ɔɔn bora te Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, niinjin ɛkkɛ yomgɔti ne tɛyan. Ɛkkɛ balkɛ waka ma ‘wondɛ Juaŋ te Boŋ ɛkɛ waakɛnda doki.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ kɛɛyɛ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ɔɔn.
Ɛkkɛ tiidɛyɔ ɛkɛ ne tɛyan ne baaṭi ɔɔn. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, lɔɔn gɛɛl bɛya ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti te oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdɛ neeni bɛɛ.
Jwaŋa Tolan mena ɛkkɛ oonɛ nona ñoowɛ ɛkkɛ iki Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ Kaci ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena tieci jyek ɛkɛ waakɛn.

Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya toocca ɛkkɛti te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, dala ɛkkɛ waakida yɔɔddɛ te jwalla ne cyɛɛlɔ. Naa jyeka a kɛɛbgin bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ, yeti dala ɛkkɛ coodɛ te yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci te paŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya nɔɔtka ma on tukɛ Klawi agi jyek kɛɛptin baalɔ ɛkkɛti.

Jyeka guagdi ‘ya neeni jitkɛn bala a ɔŋŋi, ɛkkɛ men da gɔki agi, “‘Ya bootca Buulucti,” ɔci mena parɛ moki agi, “‘Ya bootca Apɔɔlɔcti,” ɔci mena parɛ agi, “‘Ya bootca Cipacti,” ɔci mena parɛ moki agi, “‘Ya bootca Yaccu Kiṭɔti.”
Kiṭɔ warɛ ŋuonnɛ jitin? Buuluc ŋaapci ma kakanti te ɛkkɛ? Ɛkkɛ buulki ma te yenti Buuluc?
’Ya gɔkca Juaŋti a pwatcin acaan ‘ya buoṭi menga te ɛkkɛti bɛɛ, yeti Kricpac buuli ‘ya yaakkɛn i Gayac,
acaan naa menga gɔkti agi ɛkɛ buulliti ma te yenti ‘ya bɛɛ.
Ɛɛ, on tukɛ Ictɛɛpanucyɛ, buuli ‘ya moki. Menga buuli ‘ya moki maka neeni ŋotkɛnti moki boki? Çeej ‘ya bɛɛ.
Kiṭɔ ‘ya cuonna buor ma bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya cuonna lor ma te jyek ɛkɛ, oŋ yeti te jyek ñing tɛɛn ma baan budan aŋka war tɛɛn kakan Kiṭɔ aga jyeka budan bɛɛ.
Maka yienyɛ, jyek Kiṭɔ ñaltan a jyeka budan ɛkkɛnti, oŋ yeti ikin a maka yɔɔññɛ ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ñaltin ikin a war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan.
Acaan kiiwɛ ma worga Juaŋji agi, “‘Ya ñing tɛɛn maka ñingɛn tɛyan nuud jitin, ɔci wyeñ wɔŋi maka wyetkɛn wɔkin uutca ‘ya ɔntɔ.”
Ba ‘wana ñingɛ tɛyan bɛ? Ba mena urkinti worga ne tolan bɛ? Ba mena lieṭi jiek jitkɛn yuonga neeniti bɛ? Jwaŋa Tolan ñing tɛɛn iñɔ baanji wɛnni naŋŋɛ a wyeñ booji bɛɛ?

Acaan Juaŋ te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛyɛ, maka iñɔ baanji wɛnni dalnɛ, ɛkɛ ñiyɛ te ñing tɛɛn ɛkkɛn pookɛn bɛɛ, Juaŋ yomɛ pwatcin te jyeka loṭin ikin ma ñaltan maka iñɔ a wyeñ booji neeni, aŋka maka jyeddi jyeka neeni yɔɔdɛ ɛkɛ.
Ma Icrayiil buagɔn gɔrti naŋka tɛyan, ɔci ma Giriik lieṭi ñing tɛɛno.
Yeti ne ikin loṭin ma ka Yaccu ŋaabɛ mayɛ, lalla neeni ma Icrayiilti bala ba jyeka kooki ɛkkɛn te jyek Juaŋo, ɔci lalla neeni a wyeñ booji Keedin Pookɛnti.
Yeti maka bornɛ Juaŋ waakɛnda, kan ɛkkɛn a ma Icrayiil, walla a maka Kɛɛna Pookɛnyɛ, Kiṭɔ a war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci a ñing tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛnti.
Wyeñ wɔŋi Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, bala ñamu te wyeñ wɔŋi ma baano, ɔci war tɛɛn ɛkɛyɛ, bala ñamu te war tɛɛn ma baano.
Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ ne ɛkkɛ bornɛ Juaŋ ɛkkɛ balgɛ a ɔki. Magga ɛkkɛti ñingɛn tɛɛcin ba bolji ma baan bɛɛ, ɔci waakɛn tɛɛcin bɛɛ, ɔci menga jiedi ma ba mena tolan bɛɛ.
Oŋ yeti Juaŋ muowin maka ñingɛn morŋan aŋka maka ñingɛn tɛyan lɔɔddi, ɔci Juaŋ muowin maka waakɛn koyan baan konɛti, aŋka maka waakɛn tɛyan lɔɔddi.
Juaŋ muowin maka ḍyɛrin, ɔci maka waaktan ma ɔci maka baaw aŋka maka bala neeni uuttan ɔntɔ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa menga noŋi warɛ Juaŋ ñamɛti bɛɛ.
Yeti Juaŋ ɛkkɛ oonɛ ɔci ñaaŋŋɛyɔ i Yaccu Kiṭɔ, mena aŋi ñing tɛɛn ikin te Jwaŋa Tolan mena a pwani ikin, ɔci ikin wanniny.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin worga Juaŋji ne gɔkki agi, “Dala mena noŋi warɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi warɛ te Ciɛggɔn.”
Modg ɔɔn, ne ‘ya bɛɛna ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ myennin jyek Juaŋ te jyeka ḍwaŋin ɔci te ñing tɛɛn bɛɛ.
Acaan ne ‘ya baala ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ‘ya buaga gena parɛ gɛɛl ŋeejja ɛkkɛti aŋan bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya buaga Yaccu aŋka ŋeejja i ŋaamma ɛkɛ ŋaapkiti may.
Ɔci ‘ya da waru koy koyo, ɔci buayo, ɔci waru ḍiedan.
Jyeka guaŋi ‘ya, ɔci jwalla owwan ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn guaŋi ‘ya te ñing tɛɛn ma baan budan bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn guaŋi ‘ya te liɛlti Boŋ Juaŋ ɔci war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.
Aŋka naa jyeni ɛkkɛ bala te ñing tɛɛn ma baan budan bɛɛ, yeti dala jyeni ɛkkɛ bala te war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan.
Ɔɔn gɔkɔn te ñing tɛɛn maka ñingɛn tɛɛnti, yeti ɔɔn gɔkɔn te ñing tɛɛn yuonga neeniti walla te ñing tɛɛn maka ḍwaŋin yuonga neeni bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka eedɛ Juaŋ ɔntɔ baadi budany.
Yeti ɔɔn gɔkɔn te jyek Juaŋ jyeka jitkɛn a coggin maka ñingɛn tɛyantiy, ɔci te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ ñing tɛɛn guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te baaṭi te yuonga baaw te pwani ikiny.
Maka ḍwaŋin yuonga neeniti jyeka neeni jitkɛn yuarcɛ bɛɛ. Te ɛkkɛn jyeka neeni jitkɛn yuarkitiyɛ, te ɛkkɛn Ciɛggɔn pwadan neeni ŋaabɛ kakanti bɛɛ.
Bala ba jyeka kiigin worga Juaŋji gɔki agi, “Gena ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te maka ani ɛkɛyɛ, yuarŋɛ menga te waŋɛ bɛɛ, walla tieŋnɛ menga te jyeñɛ bɛɛ, walla konɛ yuarnɛji menga bɛɛ.”
Gena neeni lɛɛlnɛ Juaŋ bora te Boŋ Juaŋo. Acaan Boŋ ɛkɛ lieṭi waak jitkɛn waakɛnda i wak Juaŋ waka jitkɛn loonan.
Acaan a menɛ paŋi men baan ŋeejɛy? Pari ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ? Bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, menga bala paŋi Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeejɛ bɛɛ, gena Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ aŋka paŋi ɛkɛ ŋeejɛy.
Acca ikin mwokkin Boŋ Juaŋ bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolantiy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin yaakinti waka ikin ‘wonninti Juaŋ neeni jitkɛn yuartin. Ikin mwokkin boŋa iñɔ baanji wɛnni bɛɛ.
Ɔci ɔɔn gɔkɔn a ɔŋŋi te jyeka laltan ma te ñing tɛɛn ma baan budan bɛɛ, yeti ne ɔɔn loṭɔn te jyek wak Booŋ maka balki Booŋtiyɛ, ɔɔn gɔkɔn te ñing tɛɛn jyeka loṭɛ Boŋ Juaŋy.
Mena baaki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛtiyɛ, waka ma ‘wondɛ Booŋ mugdɛ ɛkɛ yomɛti bɛɛ, acaan waka neeni jitkɛn yuartɛji ɛkɛ bɛɛ, acaan waka neeni jitkɛn yuartan ma te Boŋ Juaŋo.
Mena balki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ wak Jwaŋa Tolan jitkɛn ŋeejɛ waakɛnda. Yeti waka bala ɛkɛ yomɛti ŋeejɛ menga bɛɛ.
“A menɛ paŋi Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeejɛy? A menɛ yaakinti ɛkɛ myettɛy?” Yeti ɔɔn balkɔn paŋi Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya yaakati gɔkkan ɛkkɛti ba maka balkin Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ, oŋ yeti ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti ba maka baan konɛti, ɔci ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti bala ba ne ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin Yaccu Kiṭɔti ɔɔn.
’Ya ɛkkɛ lallin te jyeka koyan, ga ‘ya ɛkkɛ lallin te jyeka jitkɛn tɛyan bɛɛ. Acca ɛkkɛ yaakɛti muŋi ɛkkɛn men bɛɛ. Ɔci acca men ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ waakɔ ywaŋŋɛ bɛɛ,
acaan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba coodda baan konɛti men. Acaan ne kon moni ɔci wɛyyin balki ɛkkɛti menyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ ma baan konɛ budan, ɔci noŋɛ ba naŋki ma baan konɛ budan bɛɛ?
Ne ɛkkɛ men da gɔki agi, “‘Ya bootca Buulucti,” ɔci mena parɛ moki agi, “‘Ya bootca Apɔɔlɔcti,” te naŋki ɛkkɛ neeni ɛkkɛ agɛ ma baan konɛ budan bɛɛ?
Apɔɔlɔc a menɛ? Ɔci ‘ya Buuluc a menɛ? Pari te lali ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ jyettɛ neeni bɛɛ? Ɔɔn yaakkɔ menga da kanŋan ba kanŋa ɔɔn ‘wonnɔnti Juaŋy.
’Ya kookin piinno, ɔci Apɔɔlɔc ɛkkɛn moonnɛ piego, oŋ yeti Juaŋ ɛkkɛn yuolnɛ ñaalɔ.
Mena pieti kookin ɔci mena mooti kookinyɛ, ɛkkɛn a genga bɛɛ, oŋ yeti Juaŋ aŋka a mena waak ‘wondɛ ḍɔŋo.
Mena pieti ɔci mena mootiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ, oŋ yeti men da yɔɔrdi gena ɛkɛ ‘wondi Juaŋ ba taab kanŋa ɛkɛ.
Ɔɔn agɔn maka kanŋan Juaŋti, ɔci ɛkkɛ agɛ bal Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkkɛ agɛ on Juaŋ moki.

Te yom pwani Juaŋ yom pwani ‘wonnata ‘ya neeniyɛ, ‘ya jɔɔtcan te cɔni on ŋwayɛ ba mena gɔɔñgɔn. Ɔci mena parɛ eñi ɛkɛ wyeñɛti, yeti dala menga da waŋɛ tiittɛ te eeno, ne ɛkkɛn balki cɔtki on ŋwaya neeni wyeñɛtiy.
Menga gorndi cwoddi ona parɛ gɛɛl te ɛka cɔnnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan neeni moki bɛɛ. On ŋwaya neeniyɛ, gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Kan menga cɔti on ŋwaya neeni wyeñɛti te dahab, ɔci te bil pɔdda, ɔci te gwoyya pwadin, ɔci te jang, ɔci te luom, ɔci te waaŋgiyɛ,
kanŋa ɛkɛ warɛ lyɛldɛ. Acaan te oŋŋa wannayɛ, maañ menga da nɔɔtki kanŋa ɛkɛ.
Kan maka cɔti on ŋwaya neeni wyeñɛti neeni gɛɛl kanŋa ɛkɛ maañ kɔɔrniyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Jwaŋa Tolan genga.
Kan men gɛɛl kanŋa ɛkɛ ammɛ maañyɛ, kanŋa ɛkɛ nuottin budan, oŋ yeti ɛkɛ aŋka uda te maaño.
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkkɛ agɛ on Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ? Ɔci Boŋ Juaŋ ciyi ɛkkɛti bɛɛ?
Mena on Juaŋ nuudɛ jitinyɛ, ɛkɛ da nuudɛji Juaŋo, acaan on Juaŋyɛ, balkɔn giikin bɛɛ, ɔci ona neeniyɛ, gena ɛkkɛ.
Naa menga warɛ dieddiyɔ parɛ bɛɛ. Kan menga ɛkkɛti gɔki agi ɛkɛ agji ‘wana ñingɛ tɛyan ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ aga aamma, aŋka ɛkɛ aga mena ñingɛ tɛyan awarɛ.
Acaan waka guaktan ma ṭɛɛrji agi ñing tɛɛnyɛ, ñaldɛ Juaŋ a wyeñ booj bala ba Jyek Juaŋ jyeka A kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “‘Ya labji ɛkkɛn yuarcaji te ñing tɛɛn ɛkkɛn jitin ɔɔn.”
Ɔci moki agi, “Ciɛggɔn paŋi maka ñingɛn tɛyan ŋeejɛ a paŋŋa budan.”
Naa menga warɛ naŋdɛ te kanŋa men baan budan bɛɛ, acaan waak waakɛnda a wak ɛkkɛ.
Kan a ‘ya, walla a Apɔɔlɔc, walla a Butruc, ɔci walla baan warda, ɔci walla a tɛɛtin walla lieno, ɔci walla acca ɔci ne ñamu, waka neeni waakɛndayɛ, a wak ɛkkɛ.
Ɔci ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔ, ɔci Kiṭɔyɛ, a Men Jwaŋa Tolan.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ma ɔɔn ñaltɔn ba maka kanŋan Kiṭɔti maka ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ wak Juaŋ waka jitkɛn a cogginy.
Ɔci kanŋa weegɛn buagɔn dala maka ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ kanŋa neeni kandi ba jyeka ṭagdɛ ɛkɛy.
Kan ɛkkɛ jiek dɔɔdɛ ‘ya wyeñuti, walla kan a godan ma baan budanyɛ, naŋka neeni tolcin ‘yati bɛɛ. ‘Ya waru noŋga godan paru bɛɛ.
’Ya yomu wɔɔkcin, yeti naŋka neeni ‘ya naŋda agdi mena pwadan bɛɛ.

Naa ɛkkɛ jiek naŋdɛ te genga men ne wɔɔka awarɛ men baawi bɛɛ. Da ɛkkɛ kɛɛddɛ lakun ne Ciɛggɔn bɛɛdɛ ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ waka bala miel jitin ɔci waka bala ma yomgɛnti, lɛɛldɛ ɛkɛ bora. Te wɔɔka wannayɛ, Juaŋ menga da ‘wondɛ jiɛd ɛkɛ oŋo.

Acca modg ɔɔn, waka guaŋi ‘ya neeni, guaŋi ‘ya te war Apɔɔlɔc ɔci te war ‘ya te ɛkkɛ modg ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ urtɛti te ɔɔn, aŋka naa ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ ‘yeettɛ bora jyeka kiigin ŋotkɛnti ɔci menga ɛkkɛti noŋdi warɛ mengati bɛɛ.
Acaan a menɛ i naŋŋi tol te maka pookɛny? A gena baaw iti oŋ ɛkɛ yuarŋi i bɛɛy? Oŋ ne kan i gena neeni yuarŋi dokiyɛ, oŋ i noŋ waru bala ba ne gena neeni i ‘wonniti Juaŋ a ‘woñgin bɛɛ ɔɔn ogo?

Ɛkkɛ balkɛ waka ɛkkɛ buagɛ waakɛnda doki. Ɛkkɛ korkɔ kuumi doki. Ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ cyekin ḍwaŋin te yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ doki, yeti bolja wanna yɔmjin bɛɛ. ‘Ya baal kɛɛy awarɛ, ka dala te ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ cyekin ḍwaŋin, aŋka te ɔɔn da aŋŋɔn cyekin ḍwaŋin iki ɛkkɛ.
Acaan yuarca ‘ya Juaŋ ɔɔn cuudan ɛkɛ neeni lɛɛlnɔn bora te maka coŋin jitin ba maka wanɛ ma te lien aŋka noktan ma. Ɔɔn aŋŋɔn liɛlti waka cɔnnɛ Juaŋti waakɛnda, malɛɛkan ɔci ma baanti daŋkun.
Ɔɔn wyetkɔ baaw te Yaccu, yeti ɛkkɛ balkɛ wyetkɔ ne tolan Kiṭɔti. Ɔɔn waakɔ koocin, yeti ɛkkɛ aŋka waakɔ tɛɛcin, ma noŋi ne pwadan ɛkkɛti, yeti menga bala noŋi ne pwadan ɔɔnti bɛɛ!
Ne acca men ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn amdɔn koñ ɔci yiɛno, ɔci atɔn waakɔ budan. Ɔɔn jiepkɔn ma. Ɔɔn balkɔn baan bɛɛ.
Ɔɔn kanŋɔn ne pɛñan te byeŋki ɔɔn. Ne ɔɔn ‘walkɔnti mayɛ, ɔɔn gɔkɔn ɛkkɛnti ne pwadan men ɔɔn, ne ɔɔn naŋkɔnti ma ne yaayanyɛ, ɔɔn yomgɔ tieŋnɔn,
ne ɔɔn jomkɔntiyɔ mayɛ, ɔɔn ṭwoktɔn ɛkkɛnti te yoma pwadan. Ɔɔn baallɔn ba tuok baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni, ɔci baallɔn ba giikin baan konɛ wɛnni.
’Ya kiew jyeka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ waakɔ aga lɔɔn bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya kiew jyeka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ ṭyɛldinyɔ ba kɛɛgin ‘ya kɛɛgin onga ‘yay.
Kan ɛkkɛ balkɛ maka wɛɛyi ɛkkɛ a alpn a inyaakkɛn (10,000) Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balkɛ weyyɔ ne coŋɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ oonin ‘ya Yaccu Kiṭɔti te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk ɛkkɛti ne pɛñan aŋka ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki ‘ya.

Te naŋka neeniyɛ, ‘ya Timutawuc cuoñña ɛkkɛti, ɛkɛ a kacca ana ‘yay. Ɛkɛ a mena pwadan Ciɛggɔn ñamɛti. Ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ nɔɔttɛ te coodi ‘ya Yaccu Kiṭɔti. Coodi ‘ya bala ba jyeka loṭa ‘ya ma noon warda kaniican jitin neeni.
Ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛti noŋi waakɛn poŋi gɔki agi ‘ya baaljɔ bɛɛdjɔ ḍieŋjɔ ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
Yeti ‘ya baal bɛɛd ɛkkɛti ne pɛñan kan Juaŋ buagɔny, ‘ya buaga gɔrca war tɛɛn ɛkkɛn. ‘Ya buaga gɔrca jyek maka noŋi waakɛn neeni budan bɛɛ.
Acaan cyɛgji Juaŋ ɛkɛ a war tɛɛno. A jyeka budan bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛ buagɛ gena? Ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘ya bɛɛd ecca wiici bieŋuti, walla ‘ya bɛɛd te ani ɔci boŋa pwadan?
Jiek ati noon warda te tomma bala ɛkkɛtiy. Tomma neeni yaayɛ ne tolan moki maka moṭi waka budantiy. Acaan menga bala ɛkkɛti wɛnni niin i ɛŋ weegɛn.
Ɛkkɛ yaaktiti noŋi waakɔ a ɔki? Ba ɛkkɛ kuuyɛ bɛ? Mena noŋi a ɔɔn wannayɛ, dala ɛkɛ ŋualdɛ bora te ɛkkɛ jitkiti wɛnan.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne ‘ya waru baawa ɛkkɛti aŋanyɛ, boŋ ‘ya balgi iki ɛkkɛ aŋan, ɔci ‘ya jiek olja mena noŋi ne yaayan neeni wyeñɛti doki, bala ba ne ‘ya baala aŋan ɔɔn.
Ne ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ ḍɔɔldɛ te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ‘ya balgin iki ɛkkɛ te booŋo, ɔci te war tɛɛn Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ,
dala ɛkkɛ ‘wana neeni ‘wondɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan bieŋɛti, dala war ɛkɛ baadi, ɔci boŋ ɛkɛ aŋka yɔɔdɛ Ciɛggɔn te oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdɛy.
Naŋka noŋɛ ɛkkɛ waakɔ wanna pwatcin bɛɛ. Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ, ñamga ne ḍiɛkan ḍuobja wayi ma ne tolan caaba warda te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ?
Dala ɛkkɛ nɔji ɔci naŋka yeyin uuttɛ ɔntɔ te ɛkkɛti aŋka ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ, acaan Kiṭɔ ŋaabɛ ma kakanti te ikin.
Dala ikin codin nɔji ɔci naŋka yeyin waakɛnda neeni daltin, dala ikin cietin te coodi pwani ɔci te coodda awarɛ moki.
Ɛkkɛ kieŋnin ‘ya worga acaan naa ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ i maka noŋi tomi bɛɛy.
’Ya gɔk maka moṭi jɔkin yeyinti maka tobin neeni, ɔci maka yomgɛn ḍwaŋin te waak, ɔci maka a ɛɛjan, ɔci maka moṭi jɔkin yeyinti bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ noŋŋɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ kaannɛ bora te baan konɛti doki.

’Ya kiewan worga ɛkkɛti acaan naa ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ i mena bardɛ ɛkkɛ a mod ɛkkɛ te Kiṭɔ, oŋ yeti ɛkɛ a tomma, ɔci yomɛ tolcin te waak ɔci moṭi jɔkin yeyinti, ɔci ḍori ma, ɔci nokkin mooy, ɔci a ɛɛja wanna bɛɛ. Mena bala a ɔɔnyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ omdi i ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ.
Te gena aŋka ‘ya jiek olja maka bora wyetkɛnti budany, pari ɛkkɛ jiek oldɛ maka kaniicaji wyetkɛnti bɛɛ?
Acaan maka bala bora te kaniicajiyɛ, Juaŋ jiek oldɛ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti bala ba jyeka a kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ mena yaayan neeniyɛ, ŋualdɛ ɔntɔ te kaniicaji wɛnan.”
Ne men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti yomɛ yaayɛ moodɛn gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkɛ moodɛn tiagdɛyɔ non godan maka a ma Juaŋti bɛɛ ogo? Ba ɛkɛ moodɛn eedɛ ma Juaŋti bɛ?
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ maka pwadin noŋdi godan maka baan konɛti wɛnni bɛɛ? Ɔci kan maka baan konɛti wɛnni noŋdɛ ɛkkɛ godany, oŋ ɛkkɛ yaakɛti jyeka bala ɛkkɛti ḍyɛrin neeni ñaldɛ pookɔ bɛɛ?
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ a ikin noŋtin godan malɛɛkanti bɛɛ? A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyeka bala ɛkkɛti ñaldɛ ɛkkɛ pookɔ ne koyan budan.
Oŋ te gena ɛkkɛ godan ɛkkɛ eedɛ bora maka a ma kaniicati bɛɛy?
’Ya gɔkka a ɔŋŋi aŋka ɛkkɛ waakɔ aga lɔɔno! Menga bala ɛkkɛti aŋan a mena ñingɛ tɛyan ne tolan aŋka jyeka neeni ñaldɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛ?
Yeti mod gɛɛl ooddi moodɛn tiagdɛyɔ non ganuun maka a Ma Kiṭɔti bɛɛ ogo?
Naŋki godan neeni ne baali ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ buannɛji ɛkɛ doki. Ba ɛkkɛ naŋka damɛ ma ɛkkɛti ḍuattɛ ḍɔɔggɔti bɛ? Ba dienna dyetki ma ɛkkɛ ñingɔ neeni ḍuattɛ ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti bɛ?
Yeti ɛkkɛ woodgɔ noŋi ma ñingɛn, ɔci noŋɛ modg ɛkkɛ ñingɛn daŋkun!
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ a maka yeyin neeni non cyɛgji Juaŋ yuartan ɛkkɛn baaw bɛɛ? Naa ɛkkɛ dieddɛ ñin menga bɛɛ. Kan a maka tobin, walla kan a maka moṭi jɔkin yeyinti, ɔci kan a maka niin i maka a ‘uayi,
ɔci kan a maka a ɛyi, ɔci maka yomgɛn ḍwaŋin, ɔci maka nokkin mook, ɔci maka ḍor ma, ɔci maka kwayi wak mayɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda dɛndi non cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ.
Ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛti bala a ɔɔn te ñamu. Yeti ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Juaŋ te nɔjjo, ɔci ɛkkɛ pwannɛ ɔci aŋŋɛ maka awarɛ te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci te Boŋ Jwaŋ ikin.
’Ya dita gɔkca ka “Waak waakɛnda pwadɔ ‘yati,” oŋ yeti waak waakɛnda yɔmjin bɛɛ. “Waak waakɛnda pwadɔ ‘yati,” oŋ yeti genga bala ‘ya naŋda a kɛɛngɔn ɛkɛ bɛɛ.

“Amyɛ, te kono, ɔci konyɛ, te amo.” Oŋ yeti Juaŋ ɛkkɛn nuudɛji yaakkɛn. Naa wara bala ikinti neeni oltin noŋin ikin tomi bɛɛ, yeti oltin kanŋin ikin gena Ciɛggɔnti. Ɔci Ciɛggɔn noŋi kanŋa te waak ikin.
Juaŋ Yaccu Kiṭɔ jɔɔŋnɛ ñaalɔ te lienti te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin jɔɔŋtin ñaalɔ daŋkun.
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne waak ɛkkɛ ñooki i Kiṭɔ bɛɛ? ‘Ya wara ñoowin i Kiṭɔ owwa bora ɔci ñaagdiyɔ i ɛŋa a tomma? Hayɛllɛ!
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ, a mena ñoodi i ɛŋa a tomma ɛkkɛn aŋi wara ne cyɛɛlɔ i ɛkɛ bɛɛ? Jyeka a kiigin gɔki agi, “Ɔci ɛkkɛn ñoowin yaakkɛn.”
Oŋ yeti mena warɛ ñaaktiti Ciɛggɔntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋi ba mena ne cyɛɛlɔ i ɛkɛ te booŋo.
Dala ɛkkɛ tomi daldɛ. Nɔjja naŋdi men baan waakɛndayɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi te bora budan, oŋ yeti mena noŋdi nɔji tomiyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi nɔji war ɛkɛti.
Waak ɛkkɛ ŋeejɛ ne akki on Boŋ Juaŋ mena bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti mena bala ɛkkɛti neeni bɛɛ? Ɛkkɛ agɛ wak waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛ agɛ wak Juaŋo.
Ɛkkɛ agɛ wiɛlgɔn, a ɔŋŋi dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan Juaŋti te waak ɛkkɛ.
Te taata taaññɛ ɛkkɛ te worga oonɛ ɛkkɛ ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ṭwoggin ‘ya bala a ɔŋŋi, kan i ḍɛññi bɛɛyɛ, pwatcin doki.
Oŋ yeti te bwaji naŋki tomiyɛ, dala maka a ‘uay men da baltan ɛŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci moong men da baltan ‘war ɛkɛ.
’Uanyɛ, ɛɛŋ ‘wondɛ waka ɛkɛ buagiy, ɔci ɛɛŋ daŋkun noŋdi ba ‘war ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
Ɛɛŋyɛ, war ɛkɛ te ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ, yeti te ‘war ɛkɛ daŋkun, ɔci ‘uan daŋkunyɛ, war ɛkɛ bala te ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ, yeti te ɛŋ ɛkɛ daŋkun.
Naa ɛkkɛ ṭiewɛ yɔtin pookɔ i ɛŋ i bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ jiek ñaagdiyɔ ne wɔɔka baali te cɔŋiy, ɔci ɛkkɛ waakɔ ñaagdɛ moki oŋ aŋka naa Jwaŋa Yaayan ɛkkɛ pɔɔdɛ te bolja ɛkkɛ yaakɛti waakɔ mugdɛ bɛɛy.
’Ya gɔk jyeka neeni acaan ‘ya ‘yer ɛkkɛ te ḍɛɛn bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya gɔk aŋka dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ ŋeeddɛ, kan ɛkkɛ buagɛ awarɛy.
’Ya buaga dala ma waakɛnda ciya budan te moong bala ba ‘ya ɔɔn. Oŋ yeti men da balki gena ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋy, magga buagɔn ḍɛɛdi, ɔci magga buagɔn ḍɛɛdi bɛɛ.
Acca ‘ya gɔkka te maka baakin moong ɔci moonga a cieky, pwatcin te ɛkkɛn. Dala ɛkkɛn ciya budan te ḍɛɛn ba ‘ya ɔɔn.
Oŋ yeti kan ɛkkɛn yaaŋnɛti waakɛn tiekɛ bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛdi. Ḍɛɛn aŋka pwatcin te coodda i ciyi budan te ɛɛŋ oŋ buagiti noŋi gena tomiy.
Maka balkɔn moongyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn ‘woñga jyeka neeni, yeti a ‘ya bɛɛ, gena Ciɛggɔn. Ɛɛŋyɛ, naa ‘war ɛkɛ daldɛ bɛɛ.
Kan ɛkɛ ‘uarɛ dalniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ciya budan te ‘uano, ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛn jiek ywaŋtan i ‘uarɛ. Ɔci mena ‘uan daŋkunyɛ, naa ɛŋ ɛkɛ daldɛ bɛɛ.
’Ya gɔkka maka pookɛnti moki (gena ‘ya, a Ciɛggɔn bɛɛ), kan mod ikin gɛɛl a men Kiṭɔ oŋ ɛkɛ balkɔn ɛŋa jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn ciyi i ɛkɛyɛ, naa ɛkɛ ɛɛŋ daldɛ bɛɛ.
Ɔci moki kan mena a ɛɛŋ a men Kiṭɔ oŋ ɛkɛ balkɔn ‘wana jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ, yeti kan ‘uan buagɔn ciyi i ɛkɛyɛ, naa ɛkɛ ‘uan daldɛ bɛɛ.

Acaan ‘wana jyeti Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ neeniyɛ, pwani te ɛŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛŋa jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ neeniyɛ, pwani te jyeni ‘war ɛkɛ. Kan te bala a ɔɔn bɛɛyɛ, te kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn yɔmjin Juaŋti bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti ba bolja men gɛɛl ɛkkɛnti agi men Juaŋ neeniyɛ, kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn yɔmjin Juaŋti doki.

Oŋ yeti kan mena a men Kiṭɔ bɛɛ neeni buagɔn jyek doortinyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba naŋka ɛkɛ buagiy, acaan mod ɔci kow genga bala ɛkkɛn mugdɛyɔ te coodda wanna bɛɛ. Acaan Juaŋ ikin bornin coodda pwadanti.
Çeej i a ɔki, a ɛŋa jyeti Kiṭɔtiy, ‘war i yɔya i? Ɔci ŋeej i a ɔki, a ‘wana jyeti Kiṭɔtiy, ɛŋ i yɔya i?
Dala men da coodi ɛkɛ bala ba bolja ɛkɛ ‘wonni Juaŋy, ɔci ba borkin Ciɛggɔn men da bornɛy. Jyeka neeniyɛ, ‘ya gɔkca kaniicanti waakɛnda a ɔɔn.
Mena bornɛ Juaŋ oŋ ɛkɛ a ŋudgɔnyɛ, naa ɛkɛ warɛ naŋdɛ a ɛkɛ a ŋudgɔn bɛɛ, ɔci mena bornɛ Juaŋ oŋ ɛkɛ a ŋudgɔn bɛɛyɛ, naa ɛkɛ ŋuttan ma bɛɛ.
Kan men gɛɛl a ŋudgɔnyɛ, a genga bɛɛ, ɔci kan mena ciyi budan te ŋuniyɛ, a genga bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti tiid ganuun Jwaŋa Tolan warɛyɛ, aŋka pwatcin.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala men da ciya ba bolja ɛkɛ bornɛ Juaŋy.
Ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛnk ne ɛkkɛ bornɛti Juaŋyɛ? Baatɔ, yeti kan ɛkkɛ balkɛ wɔɔka aŋka ɛkkɛ agdɛ kɛɛnk bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ doki.
Acaan mena bornɛ Juaŋ ne ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ pɔŋnɛ Ciɛggɔn doki. Bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, kan mena bornɛ Juaŋ ne ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn bɛɛyɛ, acca ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn Kiṭɔ.
Ɛkkɛ agɛ wiɛlgɔn, A ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ agdɛ kɛɛnk ma baan bɛɛ.
Modg ɔɔn, dala ma waakɛnda ciya i Juaŋ a cyɛɛlɔ ba borkin ɛkkɛn bornɛ ɛkɛy.
Acca te maka a kaalk ɔci maka ṭɔlgyɛ, ‘ya balka jwali gɛɛl te Ciɛggɔnti aŋka guagdi ‘ya te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya ɛkkɛ ‘wondin paŋi ‘ya ba mena pwani Ciɛggɔn ñamɛti te yom pwani ɛkɛy.
Yuarca ‘ya acca tɛɛcin te coodi ikin Ma Kiṭɔ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya poŋ ka mena buagɔn ciyi budan te ɛɛŋyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ciya budan ɔɔn.
I ḍɛññi ɛɛŋɔ? Yeti naa i pocca ɛkɛ pɔkka bɛɛ. I ḍɛññi boki? Kan baawiyɛ, naa lierca gɛɛl bɛɛ.

Yeti kan i ḍɛññiyɛ, naŋka wanna a nɔji bɛɛ. Ɔci kan ṭɔɔl gɛɛl ḍɛyɛ mayɛ, ḍɛɛn ɛkɛ wanna a nɔji bɛɛ, yeti coodda yaayan daŋkun bɛya maka neeniti, ɔci ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛ ‘uottinti coodda yaayan neeni moki bɛɛ.
Modg ɔɔn, gena gen kona guagdi ‘ya neeni, wɔɔka bɛɛdɛ Kiṭɔ cualcin acca, ɔci ne ñamu ɔɔnyɛ, dala maka balki moong neeni cootti ba ɛkkɛn balkiti moong bɛɛ ɔɔn.

Ɔci maka yomgɛn yeyinyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ciya ba ɛkkɛn yomgɛn yieki bɛɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci maka yomgɛn ñɔyinyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ciya ba ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔki bɛɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci maka wɛɛṭi waakyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ciya ba ɛkkɛn baakiti waak ɔɔn.
Ɔci maka kanŋan te waka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ḍuattanti waka neeniti bɛɛ. Acaan ṭɛra ciyin ikin acca neeni ati noŋi baadi doki.
’Ya buaga naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ jiek yomgɔti ne coŋɔn bɛɛ. Mena ḍɛñi bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ poŋi te wak Ciɛggɔn aŋka Ciɛggɔn yomɛ pwada.
Mena ḍɛñiyɛ, ɛkɛ poŋi te waka baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni aŋka ɛkɛ ɛɛŋɛ ywaŋdɛ yomɛti.

Ɔci kanŋan ɛkɛ ŋuottin jitin, ɛŋa ḍɛyɛ ma bɛɛ walla a ṭɔɔl menyɛ, ɛkɛ poŋi te wak Ciɛggɔn aŋka ɛkɛ ciyi te wara pwadan, ɔci te boŋa pwadan Ciɛggɔn ñamɛti. Yeti ɛŋa ḍɛyɛ ma dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ poŋi te waka baanji wɛnni aŋka ‘war ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada.

’Ya gɔk a ɔɔn acaan ‘ya yɔŋ ɛkkɛ a ywaŋŋo, ga ‘ya waka cyɛgan kɔɔnja ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ gena pwadan ɔci awarɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ ‘wondɛ Ciɛggɔn waakɛnda aŋka paŋi ɛkkɛ cyɛndi jitin bɛɛ.
Kan men gɛɛl poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ noŋjɛ ne pwadan ñan ɛkɛti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ aŋi ṭɔla tolan dokiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba naŋka ɛkɛ buagɛ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛdi. Ɛkɛ noŋi nɔji te naŋka wanna bɛɛ.
Yeti mena yomɛ tiektɛ, ɔci ñan ɛkɛ tiidiyɔ ciya a ṭɔɔl ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ne pwadan.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, mena ñan ɛkɛ ḍɛɛdɛyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ne pwadan, yeti mena ñan ɛkɛ daldɛ te ḍɛɛnyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka noŋi ne pwadan nɔñji.
Mena ɛɛŋ ne ‘war ɛkɛ ciyi a tɛɛta menyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍwaŋɛ wɔɔkcin bɛɛ, yeti kan ‘war ɛkɛ tuun dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍwaŋɛ wɔɔŋi oŋ aŋka ḍɛɛdɛ ‘wana bala ɛkɛ buagɛy, yeti ɛkɛ ḍɛɛdɛ ‘wana a men Kiṭɔ.
Yeti ‘ya poŋ ka ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔya ñɔɔn ne tolan ne ɛkɛ coodi budan te ḍɛɛny. Gena paŋi ‘ya neeni, ɔci ‘ya poŋ ‘ya daŋkun balka Boŋ Juaŋo.
Acca te jyek yoŋga ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyinti neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin, ikin waakida balkin ŋeejin ikin waak ŋeeciny. Çeejinyɛ, ɛkɛ a yɛcan kotti ne ñaalɔ. Yeti aniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka cɔti warɛ.
Kan men gɛɛl poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ waak ŋeejjɛ waakcindayɛ, haldu, ɛkɛ genga ŋeejɛ awarɛ men bɛɛ.
Yeti kan men gɛɛl ani Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeejɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.
Oŋ a ɔŋŋi te jyek yoŋga ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyinti neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin jɔkin waakɛnda iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a waagga bɛɛ, ɔci Juaŋ gɛɛl bala parɛ moki bɛɛ, gena Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ.
Ne kan waak gɛɛg bala bartan ma a “jɔkin yeyin” iñɔ ṭɛɛrji ɔci pɔlijiyɛ, bala ba “jɔkin yeyin” bala kɔɔna kɔɔni ɔci “cyekin” kɔɔna kɔɔnno.

Ikin balkin Juaŋ ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Gena Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin, mena waak waakɛnda bɛɛn te ɛkɛtiy, ɔci ikin moki tɛɛtin te ɛkɛ. Ɔci ikin balkin Ciɛggɔn ne cyɛɛlɔ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena waak waakɛnda bɛɛn te ɛkɛtiy, ɔci ikin moki bɛɛnin te ɛkɛti.

Jyeka neeni ŋeecɔn ma waakɛnda bɛɛ. Yeti ma gɛɛgyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn aanɛ te ami waka ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyinti, ɔci ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi waka ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyinti neeniyɛ, ‘yɛrŋi ma aŋŋi wak jɔkin agi wardan. Ɔci acaan ɛkkɛn yomgɛn koocinyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn aŋi giikin.
Oomdinyɛ, ɛkkɛn ikin eetin Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ, ɔci kan ikin omminyɛ, ikin yɔɔrtin genga te ami ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
Yeti dala i waŋu tiicca aŋka naa naŋki i neeni aga guonan tuor mod ɛkkɛ mena yomɛ koyan neeni bɛɛ.

Kan mena warɛ koyan gɛɛl, i a mena balki ŋeejin neeni yuardi baal om waka ŋartan ma jɔkin yeyinti neeni on jɔkin yeyin neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ oldɛti ɔci omdi wak jɔkin yeyin neeni acaan ɛkɛ i yuarŋi baal om wak jɔkin bɛɛ?
Te ñing tɛɛn iyɛ, mod ɛkkɛ ‘wana yomɛ koyan mena Kiṭɔ tuun te ɛkɛ daŋkun neeniyɛ, nuottin jitin doki.
Nɔjja naŋa i modgɔti te amma omi i wak jɔkin yeyin ɔci yooci i yomg ɛkkɛn yomga koyan wannayɛ, i noŋ nɔji Kiṭɔti.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan ami wak jɔkin ɛkɛ a gena mod ɔɔn yiɛptɛ iñɔyɛ, ‘ya omja yoŋi waka ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyinti gɛɛl moki aŋka mod ɔɔn ḍɛmdi te naŋki ‘ya bɛɛ.
’Ya ḍwaŋu wɔɔkcin bɛɛ? Pari ‘ya a cuuda bɛɛ? ‘Ya Ciɛggɔn ikin Kiṭɔ yuarŋ bɛɛ? Pari ɛkkɛ a ma kanŋa ‘ya Ciɛggɔnti bɛɛ?
Kan ‘ya a cuuda maka pookɛnti bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya a cuuda ɛkkɛti, acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ wyeñ kanŋa ‘ya Ciɛggɔnti.
Gena ṭwoggin ‘ya maka poci ‘ya neeniti neeni.
Hay! Yɔmjin ɔɔnti ne ɔɔn omɔn ɔci motɔn te wak kanŋa ɔɔn bɛɛ?
Hay! Yɔmjin ɔɔnti ne moong ɔɔn wɛɛdɔn ba cuudan pookɛn, kan ɔɔn balkɔn moong bɛɛ? Ɔci ba modg Ciɛggɔn ɔci Cipac bɛɛ?
Walla ɔɔn yaakkɔ i Barnabac aŋka a maka kanŋan waak pookɛn aŋka ciyɔn tɛɛtɔn ɔɔn?
A menɛ kanŋan a ackan oŋ warɛ ḍɔɔktɛ bilk parɛy? A menɛ cuoti jang jiniinaji oŋ omi jang ṭɔlgɛn bɛɛy? A ḍɛɛnɔn ɔki moti ak mala ciddɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛy?
Jyek ‘ya neeni a jyek ma baan budan boki? Pari ganuun gɔki jwalla neeni moki bɛɛ?
Acaan jyeka a kiigin jyek ganuun Muuca gɔki agi, “Naa yaan ḍyɛga tukɛti ne ɛkɛ baali deyi pok bɛɛ.” I poŋ Juaŋ poŋi te yotk pookɛn ne ɛkɛ gɔkki jwalla neeni nɛ?
A’a, a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala poŋi te ikin. Jyeka neeni kiiwɛ ma te ikin. Mena ooṭi ṭɛɛr konɛ ɔci mena ɛṭi pokyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi kanŋa ɛkɛ ɔci jyeti kɛɛy acaan ɛkɛ yɔɔrdi waak te kanŋa ɛkɛti.
Kan ɔɔn kookin pwadin piinnɔn ɛkkɛ yomgɔtiyɛ, oŋ yɔmjin doki kan ne ɔɔn yɔɔrdɔn waak te ɛkkɛti bɛɛ?

Kan maka pookɛn gɛɛg ñoonɛ i ɛkkɛ te eñi waakyɛ, pari ɔɔn a maka eci ne tolan nɔñji bɛɛ? Oŋ yeti ɔɔn naŋka awarɛ neeni naŋŋɔn bɛɛ? Yeti ɔɔn naŋka neeni waakɛnda ḍuannɔn ḍɔɔggɔti, acaan naa pɔy jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin te Kiṭɔ neeni uuldɔnti bɛɛ.
Çeej i maka kanŋan on Juaŋ ona tolanti oomdin ɛkkɛn bɛya te on Juaŋ ona tolanti, ɔci maka kanŋan nona ɛrki ma waakyɛ, ɛkkɛn omi waka ‘yɛrtan ma neeni daŋkun bɛɛ?
Bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, Ciɛggɔn gɔkkin agi maka kanŋan loṭi ma te worga Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, waka amtan ɛkkɛn bɛya te kanŋa lorki ɛkkɛn ma te worga Juaŋti daŋkun.
Yeti ‘ya noŋi waka neeni gɛɛl bɛɛ, walla ‘ya kiew worga aŋka ‘ya ‘wonta ma waka neeni gɛɛl bɛɛ, acaan lyena tuuda ‘ya aŋka yɔmjin, aŋka naa menga pwani ‘ya naŋdɛ aga gena budan te naŋki warɛ bɛɛ!

Ne ‘ya loṭa jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin matiyɛ, ‘ya balka genga aŋka ‘ya jiɛtati ma bɛɛ, acaan lalla loṭa ‘ya neeni ɛkɛ a gena bala ‘ya ḍwaŋuti aŋka naŋdi ‘yay. Kan ‘ya lor ma te jyeka neeni bɛɛyɛ, naŋka yaayan bɛya ‘ya wyeñuti!
Kan ‘ya lor ma te yom ‘ya waanɛyɛ, ‘ya yɔɔra genga te Juaŋti. Yeti kan ‘ya lor te yom ‘ya waanɛ bɛɛyɛ, kanŋa ‘ya ‘wonnata Juaŋ neeni naŋi ‘ya awarɛ bɛɛ.
’Ya ‘wonta ma gena? A’a, ne ‘ya loṭa jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin matiyɛ, ‘ya lor acaan ‘ya ‘wonta ma genga bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya noŋja gena kanŋa ɔci wierta te paŋi waka ‘ya ‘wontati ma te kanŋa ‘yay.
’Ya a kɛɛngɔn men baan gɛɛl acaan ɛkɛ ‘ya ḍɔɔkta bilk kanŋa ‘ya bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya waru naŋi a mena kanŋan mati waakɛnda aŋka ɛkkɛn owwa Kiṭɔti ne coŋɔn.

Ne ‘ya baala kanŋa ma Icrayiiltiyɛ, ‘ya baal ciy ba coodi ɛkkɛn ɔɔn, aŋka ‘ya yaakati ɛkkɛn owwa Kiṭɔti. Ɔci ‘ya baal noŋ ba ne ‘ya baala byeŋ ganuun Muuca ɔɔn, ne ‘ya baala kanŋin iki maka balki jyek ganuun aŋka ‘ya ɛkkɛn owwa Kiṭɔti.

Maka baakɛ ganuunyɛ, ‘ya baali ba ne baakati ganuun ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn. Yeti ‘ya baaka ganuun Juaŋ bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya balka ganuun Kiṭɔ. Oŋ ‘ya waru naŋi ba baakati ganuun ɔɔn, aŋka ‘ya maka baaki ganuun neeni owwa Kiṭɔti.
Maka waakɛn koyantiyɛ, ‘ya waru naŋi ba ‘ya waru koyi ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn, aŋka ‘ya ɛkkɛn owwa Kiṭɔti. ‘Ya aŋi waak waakɛnda mati waakɛnda aŋka ‘ya ma gɛɛg uddo.
’Ya noŋ a ɔɔn te jyeka loṭa ‘ya ma a jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin aŋka naŋka pwadan bɛya ‘yati daŋkun te jyeka neeniti.
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ non boddin maka ñwobbɔ ɛkkɛn ywoddɔ waakɛnda, oŋ mena ma boddɛ aŋka ‘wontan ma genga bɛɛ? A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ kuadɛ aŋka gena neeni buuŋdɛ ɛkkɛ.
Maka ñieyi waakɛnda ɛkkɛn tieci waakɛn te waak waakɛnda. Ɛkkɛn noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛn yɔɔrdi taagga bɔnnin taagga baadi budan neeni. Yeti ikinyɛ, yɔɔrtin taagga baadi bɛɛy.
’Ya yiŋ mɔr amaam budan bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya jieb noon te buam budan amaam ba mena jieb jwami budan ɔɔn bɛɛ.
Yeti ‘ya waru tiido, ɔci ‘ya agdi ḍuaŋa ɛkɛ, dita ‘ya yɔmja te genga te lalla loṭa ‘ya neeni bɛɛ.
’Ya buaga dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, hay modg ɔɔn! Weyi ikin waakɛnda bala ati pɔli pwanɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn Tola Tidan jyɛdɛji.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda buullɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te pɔllo, ɔci toolji moki aŋka ɛkkɛn aga maka bootcin Muucatiy.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda omi ama pooktan,
ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda moti pyega pooktany. Acaan ɛkkɛn moti te pyega bɛɛn te guonan pooktanti, guonan bala ati i ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔy. Ɔci guonan neeni Gena Kiṭɔ.
Yeti ɛkkɛn muŋŋɛ Juaŋ waakɛnda bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmdin wɔɔŋji aŋan.
Waka neeni mieti ikin aŋka naa ikin antin naŋki nɔji ba ɛkkɛn moki ɔɔn bɛɛ.
Naa ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka moṭi jɔkin yeyinti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn te baaṭi ma gɛɛg bala moṭi jɔkin yeyin neeniti bala ba kiiwɛ ma agi, “Ma cooccin iñɔ aŋka omi ɔci moti, ɔci ɛkkɛn jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ aŋka ñiɛldi.”
Naa ikin noŋtin tomi ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn gɛɛg noŋi tomi ɔci ḍɛɛmdin tuun a alpn a men baan wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ (23,000) te oŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Naa ikin Ciɛggɔn pɔɔtin bɛɛ. Acaan ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛntiyɛ, Ciɛggɔn pɔɔyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn kooyɛ kogi ɔci tuuni.
Ɔci walla naa ikin ywontin waakɔ ba ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛnti ne ywoñki waakɛn te baaṭi ɔci ɛkkɛn yaaññɛ Malɛɛka Yooci Noon wanna bɛɛ.
Naŋka neeni bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti aŋka ɛkkɛn myettan, yeti ɛkkɛn kiiwɛ ma, aŋka loṭi ikin maka acca yuonga ookkin ne ŋoyɔ neeni.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala mena poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ yɔɔdjɛ ne tɛyan neeni waŋɛ tiittɛ aŋka naa ɛkɛ ḍɛmdi bɛɛ.

Pɔɔta parɛ gɛɛl bɛɛn ɛkkɛti bɛɛ, gena pɔɔta ŋeecɔn ma waakɛnday. Yeti Juaŋ ɛkɛ pwad pwado. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ daldɛ pɔɔt jitin ne tolan ne ɛkkɛ bwanditiji ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ war tɛɛn aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ pɔya ɛkkɛ koodɛ boray.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, hay modg ɔɔn maka ana ‘yay, dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ uuttɛ te mali jɔkin yeyinti.
’Ya gɔk maka ñingɛn tɛyantiy, dala ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ gena guagdi ‘ya acca neeni ne baali a ɔkiy.
Kubaaya motin pyeg luutkin Ciɛggɔn, ɔci ikin gɔkin a pwatcin te ɛkɛ neeni, ne ikin motin ɛkɛyɛ, ikin ñoowin te yimg Kiṭɔ. Ɔci byentan wɛttin ikin jitin neeniyɛ, ikin ñoowin te war Kiṭɔ.
Acaan byentan a cyɛɛlɔ budan ɔci ikin coŋkin, yeti ikin agin wara ne cyɛɛlɔ budan acaan ikin ñoowin te byentan ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Gɔrtɛ ma Icrayiil maka omi waka ‘yɛrtan may, pari ɛkkɛn ñoowin te nona ɛrki ma waak bɛɛ?
’Ya gɔkca a ɔki, waka maltan ma a jɔkin yeyin neeni a genga? Walla waka ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyin neeniti a genga?
A’a, waka ‘yɛrtan ma baan konɛyɛ, ŋoortan ɛkkɛn jɔkin yeyin, ŋoortan Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. ‘Ya buaga naa ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ i jɔkin yeyin bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti mottɛ pyeg luutkin Ciɛggɔn i pyeg luutkin jɔkin yeyin bɛɛ. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti ñoodɛ te am Ciɛggɔn ɔci am jɔkin yeyin bɛɛ.
Ikin poccin Ciɛggɔn aŋka ɛkɛ loondi ikinti ogo? Ɔci ikin waakɔ tɛɛcin te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ boki?
Waak waakɛnda pwadɔ, oŋ yeti waak waakɛnda yɔmjin bɛɛ. Waak waakɛnda pwadɔ ‘yati, oŋ yeti waak waakɛnda i uutti ñamu bɛɛ.
Naa ikin menga poŋdi te war ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ poŋdi te war moodɛn, ɔci te gena pwadan te ɛkɛy.
Yoŋga wyɛltan ma te dukkan yoŋgitiyɛ, ɛkkɛ omdɛ ɛkkɛn. Yeti naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tooci jiek bɛɛ.
Bala ba jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Šɛɛr konɛ ɔci waka bala ɛkɛ konɛti waakɛndayɛ, a wak Ciɛggɔn.”
Kan ɛkkɛ ‘uommɛ mena jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ, amti oŋ kan ɛkkɛ attiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ omdɛ waka oodɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ñomgɔti waakɛnda, naa ɛkkɛ tooci jiek yomgɔti bɛɛ,
oŋ yeti kan ɛkkɛ nɔɔnnɛ menga agi, “Waka neeni ŋaarŋi ma nona ɛrki ma waak jɔkin yeyintiyɛ,” naa ɛkkɛ omdi bɛɛ, acaan te mena ɛkkɛ nɔɔnnɛ wanna, ɔci te yom ɛkɛ moki.
’Ya gɔk te yomg ɛkkɛ bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔk te yomg maka pookɛn. Menga tooci agi, “Yom mena parɛ yom ‘ya mugdɛyɔ ogo?
Kan ‘ya gɔkcan Juaŋti a pwatcin ɔci omjan amy, oŋ mena parɛ jiek oldɛ ‘ya wyeñuti te gena gɔŋna ‘ya Juaŋti a pwatcin ogo?”
Kan ɛkkɛ omɛ walla motɛ walla noŋɛ naŋki gɛɛlyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ naŋka neeni naŋdɛ waakɛnda te jied Jwaŋa Tolan.
Naa ɛkkɛ agdɛ guonan tuor ma Icrayiil, ɔci Keedin Pookɛn, ɔci kaniica Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.
Ɔci moki ‘ya buaga ma waakɛnda yomgɛn pwada te naŋka naŋdi ‘ya waakɛnday, ‘ya lier waka pwadin te war ‘ya paru bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya lier te pwani ma waakɛnda aŋka ɛkkɛn uda.
Dala ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki ‘ya bala ba ne ‘ya lɔka naŋki Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.
Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya baal jiey ɛkkɛ acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ poŋi te ‘ya, ɔci balgɛ noŋɛ ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lallin ‘ya waakɛnday.
’Ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ ne pwadan. Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a wyeñ maka a ‘uay waakɛnda, ɔci wyeñ mena a ɛɛŋyɛ, a ‘uano. Ɔci Kiṭɔyɛ, wyeñ ɛkɛ a Jwaŋa Tolan.
Kan mena ‘uan gɛɛl cɔki Juaŋti ɔci mieti ma te jyek Juaŋ ne ɛkɛ wyeñɛ a kwomgɔn te taagga ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan Kiṭɔti.
Ɛŋa cɔki Juaŋti ɔci mieti ma te jyek Juaŋ ɔci wyeñɛ a kwomgɔn te bworŋ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan wyeñ ɛkɛti. Kan ɛkɛ wyeñɛ kwommɛ bɛɛyɛ, bala ba ɛkɛ wyeñɛ ‘yɛnnɛ doki no.
Kan mena ɛɛŋ kwomi wyeñɛ bɛɛyɛ, dala jyeyi ɛkɛ tuomdɛ bora. Kan a lɔɔn mena ɛɛŋti te twomti ɔci yiɛli jyeyi borayɛ, dala ɛkɛ wyeñɛ kwomdɛ.
Naa mena ‘uan ɛɛŋdi genga wyeñɛti ne ɛkɛ cɔki bɛɛ. Acaan ɛkɛ aŋŋɛ Juaŋ ba bolji ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ a pwani Jwaŋa Tolan. Yeti mena a ɛɛŋyɛ, ɛkɛ a pwani mena ‘uano.
Acaan mena ‘uan bɛɛn te mena ɛɛŋti bɛɛ. Mena ɛɛŋ aŋka bɛɛn te mena ‘uanti.
Mena ‘uan aŋŋɛ Juaŋ oŋnɛ mena ɛɛŋ bɛɛ. Mena ɛɛŋ aŋka aŋŋɛ Juaŋ oŋnɛ mena ‘uano.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala mena a ɛɛŋ wyeñɛ kwomdɛ te ‘war ɛkɛ, ɔci te malɛɛkan moki.
Te coodda ikin ciyin te jyek Juaŋyɛ, mena ɛɛŋ ciyi parɛ ḍwaŋɛ wɔɔkcin te mena ‘uan bɛɛ, ɔci mena ‘uan daŋkun ciyi parɛ ḍwaŋɛ wɔɔkcin te mena ɛɛŋ bɛɛ.
Acaan mena ɛɛŋ bɛɛn te mena ‘uanyɛ, mena ‘uan daŋkun jiedi ma te mena ɛɛŋo. Oŋ yeti waak waakɛnda bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti.
Dala ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ jwalla mugdɛ ɛkkɛ te jyeka neeniti te waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ. Pwatcin a ɔɔn mena ɛɛŋti ne ɛkɛ cɔki Juaŋti wyeñɛ daldɛ te kwomiyɛ?
Ɛkkɛ jyek bolja te baaṭi ŋeejɛ ne loṭi ɛkkɛ agi kan mena a ‘uan jyeyi ɛkɛ daldɛ ne becinyɛ, etti lɔɔn ɛkɛti bɛɛ?
Oŋ yeti kan mena ɛɛŋ jyeyyɛ beciy, pari pwani ɛkɛ bɛɛ? Ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ jyeyya becin aŋka kwomi ɛkɛ wyeñɛ.
Kan mena buagɔn tyewwinyɛ, ɔɔn balkɔn naŋka wanna bɛɛ, ɔci kaniica Jwaŋa Tolan balkɔn naŋka wanna daŋkun bɛɛ.
’Ya buaga ɛkkɛ myettin te jyeka a caagin gɛɛg. Ɔci ‘ya baal jiey ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, acaan ne ɛkkɛ ḍwoṭɛ wyetkɔ a cyɛɛlɔ kaniicajiyɛ, ɛkkɛ ḍwoṭɛ wyetkɔ te pwani bɛɛ, ɛkkɛ ḍwoṭɛ wyetkɔ te naŋki yoño.
Gena jwali ‘ya jwalla te ñamu neeni, ne ɛkkɛ ḍwoṭɛ wyetkɔ ba ma kaniicayɛ, ‘ya tieŋŋan agi jyek kɛɛptin baalɔ ɛkkɛti, ɔci jyeka neeni gɛɛg mugdi ‘ya.
’Ya yomu moda te jyeka wanna bɛɛ. Acaan jyek kɛɛptin ne balki ɛkkɛtiyɛ, maka a Ma Kiṭɔ woodgɛn waakɛn lɛɛltan bora te mati.
Ne ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ ḍɔɔldɛ aŋka omiyɛ, ama amdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna ɛkkɛ omɛ Ciɛggɔnti bɛɛ.
Acaan ne ɛkkɛ omɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ kɛɛwwɛ yɔtin bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋi ɛkkɛ men gɛɛl aŋka daldɛ amɛ koño, ɔci ɛkkin pookɛn aŋka nokkin mooyo.

A gena ɔɔn? Ɛkkɛ balkɛ oorg aŋka ɛkkɛ omɛ ɔci motɛ bɛɛ? Walla ɛkkɛ ñieyɛ te kaniica Juaŋ a ñieko, ɔci maka baaki waak neeni ‘wondɛ lɔɔn ḍɔɔggɛnti? ‘Ya gɔkka a ɔki ɛkkɛti moki? ‘Ya jiejja ɛkkɛ? A’a, ‘ya jiejja ɛkkɛ bɛɛ.
Acaan gena muŋi ‘ya te Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ myettin ‘ya daŋkun neeni, ka Ciɛggɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ te ween kona ɛkɛ mukkiti mayɛ, ɛkɛ byentan luullɛ.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋnɛ a pwatcin Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkɛ byentan wɛnnɛ jitin, ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Gena war ‘ya wara wɛɛttin jitin te ɛkkɛ neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn daŋkun oŋkanda, aŋka ɛkkɛ poŋɛ te ‘ya.”

Ɔci moki ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn te pyeg luutkin ne ɛkkɛn ḍookki te amy. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Pyeg luutkin neeni gena jyeka ñaagɛ ma i Juaŋ wonkɛn te yimg ‘yay. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn oŋkanda ne ɛkkɛ mottɛ ɛkkɛn aŋka ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te ‘ya.”
Ne ɛkkɛ omɛ byentan neeni, ɔci motɛ pyeg luutkin neeni oŋkandayɛ, ɛkkɛ mietɛ ma te lyen Ciɛggɔn ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ɔɔn.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan men gɛɛl omdi byentan neeni, ɔci motti pyeg luutkin neeni ne ɛkɛ yɔmjin acaan motti bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi nɔjjo, acaan ɛkɛ war Ciɛggɔn ɔci yimg Ciɛggɔn cuullɛyɔ.
Dala men da gɔrti war ɛkɛti ñamu lakun, ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ omdi byentan ɔci motti pyeg luutkin neeni oŋo.
Kan mena omdi ɔci motti pyeg luutkin ne ɛkɛ naŋka neeni jiña yuartɛji bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ omi ɔci moti ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan war ɛkɛti.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛti bomcin, ɔci waakɛn yeyɔ, ɔci gɛɛg tuun doki.
Kan te ikin waakɔ noŋnin godan pookɔ dokiyɛ, te ikin noŋtin Juaŋ godan moki bɛɛ.
Yeti ikin noŋnin Juaŋ godan, ɔci ikin ṭeenin ɛkɛ aŋka naa jiek bɛya ikin wyetkɔti i maka baan konɛ warda neeni bɛɛ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, hay, modg ɔɔn, ne ɛkkɛ coottɛ a cyɛɛlɔ non Juaŋ acaan omɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ kɛɛddɛ yɔtin.
Kan menga amɛ koñyɛ, dala ɛkɛ omdi te baanji aŋka naa jiek dɔɔkti ɛkkɛ wyetkɔti a cyɛɛlɔ waakida bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ myettin ‘ya te waka pookɛn ne ‘ya bɛɛda aŋany.
Acca te jyek waka ma ‘wondɛ Boŋ Juaŋyɛ, hay, modg ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ jyeka awarɛ neeni jitkɛn ŋeeddɛ.
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ, ne wona ɛkkɛ agɛ maka moṭi Juaŋti bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ attɛ bora jɔkin yeyinti jɔkin gɔki jiek bɛɛ neeni byeŋkɛnti, ba eñña ɛkkɛ eekiti ɛkkɛn doki wanna.

Acca ‘ya miet ɛkkɛ ka mena gɔki te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti gɔkti agi, “Yaccu a ‘walgɔn” bɛɛ, ɔci menga yaakinti gɔkti agi, “Yaccu a Ciɛggɔn” budan bɛɛ. Gena mena balkɛ Boŋ Juaŋ aŋka yaakinti gɔkti a ɔɔny.
Waka ma ‘wondɛ Juaŋ jitkɛn coŋɔ, yeti ɛkkɛn bɛya te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniti.
Ɔci kanŋan jitkɛn bala coŋɔ, yeti Ciɛggɔn a cyɛɛlɔ budan.
Ɔci naŋki bala jitkɛn ne coŋɔn, yeti gena Jwaŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ ma kiennɛ ɛkkɛn waakɛnda wanna.
Ɔci Juaŋ ma ‘wonnɛ Booŋ waakɛnda a lyɛlta te gena pwadan te ma waakɛnda.
Men gɛɛl ‘wonnɛ Boŋ Juaŋ boŋ ñing tɛɛno, ɔci ɛka parɛ balkɛ boŋ ŋeejin, yeti ɛkkɛn bɛya te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniti.
Ɔci mena parɛ balkɛ jyenno, yeti te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniti, ɔci ɛka parɛ yɔŋi ma waakɛn te wajan, yeti naŋka neeni bɛya te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniti.

Men gɛɛl a mena noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki may, ɔci ɛka parɛ a mena mieti ma te jieko, ɔci mena parɛ balkɛ war tɛɛn aŋka waka bɛya te Boŋ Juaŋti ɔci waka bɛya te boŋka pookɛnti byɛŋdɛ jitin. Ɔci men gɛɛl a mena gɔki te tugga pookɛn, men gɛɛl a mena ma myettɛ jiek te tugga pookɛnti.
Waka neeni waakɛnda naŋdɛ Boŋ Juaŋ ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ waak ‘wondɛ ma waakɛnda ba yom ɛkɛ parɛ.
Bala ba waryɛ, ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ budan, yeti ɛkɛ balkɛ waak ne coŋɔn. Ɔci wak wara ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn coŋɔ, yeti ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ budan. Ɔci war Yaccu daŋkun bala a ɔɔn. Gena kaniica.
Acaan ikin buulkin ma te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni, ɔci aŋŋin wara ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ma Icrayiil ɔci Keedin Pookɛn, ɔci maka bɔwan ɔci maka cyɛganyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda moti Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni.
War men baan balki waak ne coŋɔn.
Kan ciyu gɔkti agi, “‘Ya a bieŋ bɛɛ, war balkin genga ‘yati bɛɛ,” jwalla neeni ɛkɛ naŋdɛ aga gena ḍiɛran te warti bɛɛ.
Ɔci kan jyeñ gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya a waŋ bɛɛ, war balkin genga ‘yati bɛɛ,” jwalla neeni ɛkɛ naŋdɛ aga gena ḍiɛran te warti bɛɛ.
Kan war warda niin a waŋy, oŋ ba tyeŋi bɛ? Oŋ kan war warda a jyeñy, oŋ ba ŋood bɛ?
Yeti bala a ɔɔn, Jwaŋa Tolan war cuonnɛ waako, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ba naŋka yom ɛkɛ buagitiy.
Oŋ kan waka neeni waakɛnda niin a cyɛɛlɔ budany, oŋ war bala wɛnɛ?
Waak bala kɔɔna kɔɔnno, yeti war a cyɛɛlɔ budan.
Waŋu yaakinti gɔkti bieŋuti boki agi, “‘Ya buaga i ba.” A’a. Ɔci wyeñu yaaktanti gɔkti cieguti boki agi, “‘Ya buaga genga ɛkkɛti ba.” A’a.
Te cyɛŋŋa wannayɛ, waka men warɛti ɛkkin ñaltin ikin ba waakɛn kookɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yɔmjin ne tolan.
Ɔci waka men warɛti ɛkkin ñaltin ka ɛkkɛn a genga bɛɛyɛ, ikin noŋin ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti ne tolan. Ɔci waka bala ikin waakɔti ñaltin ka yeyin neeniyɛ, ikin noŋtin ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti ne tolan,
gena naŋka yookɛti makɛn pwadin neeniy. Yeti Juaŋ ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ñaaŋŋɛyɔ ba gena ne cyɛɛlɔ, aŋka ɛkkɛn nooŋdi yɔtin ne pwadan.
Ɔci waryɛ, ɛkɛ a kɛɛptɔn bɛɛ, waka men warɛti ɛkkɛn gɔɔr yɔtin pookɛn waakɛnda.
Kan gen gɛɛl te waka neeniti konɛ ñakcin te gengayɛ, ɛkkin pookɛn wanna da korkɛn ñakti ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci waka neeni kan gɛɛl naŋɛ ma ne pwadanyɛ, ɛkkin pookɛn waakɛnda yomgɛn ñɔya ñɔɔn i ɛkɛ.
Yeti ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ war Kiṭɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛ agɛ maka balgɛ i ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ.

Ɔci Juaŋ ma kɛɛmnɛ kanŋa jitkɛ kaniicaji. Ma gɛɛg a cuudan, ɔci ma gɛɛg a maka mieti jieko, ɔci gɛɛg a maka loṭi may, ɔci gɛɛg a maka noŋi naŋka tɛyan, ɔci gɛɛg a maka yɔŋi ma waakɛn te wajan, ɔci gɛɛg a maka moki may, ɔci gɛɛg a maka ma ḍɔɔltanyɔ kanŋati nona ne cyɛɛlɔy, ɔci gɛɛg gɔki te tugga pookɛn ne coŋɔn.
Ma waakɛnda a cuudanɛ? Ma waakɛnda a maka lwoki ma te jiekɔ? Ma waakɛnda a maka loṭi makɔ? Hay, ma waakɛnda noŋi naŋka tɛyanɛ?
Hay, ma waakɛnda balkɛ kanŋa ywaŋi ma te wajanɛ? Hay, ma waakɛnda gɔki te tugga pookɛn? Ma waakɛnda a maka jiek jitkɛn ootan bora?
A’a, a ɔɔn bɛɛ, yeti dala i bwagdi ne pɛñan aŋka naŋka pwadan neeni gɛɛl bala iti. Yeti ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛ myettin pɔya pwadan ‘wota men.
Kan ‘ya yaakati gɔk te tugga iñɔ ṭɛɛrji ɔci tugga ñaalɔ pɔliji waakɛnda, oŋ ‘ya an ma bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya a genga bɛɛ, ɔci jyek ‘ya bala ba joon lɔlŋa ɔci ba joon bila garan.

Ɔci kan ‘ya ‘wonna Juaŋ miti jiek ɔci kan ‘ya jyeka a coggin ŋeej ɔci kan waak ŋeej ‘ya waakɛnda, ɔci moki kan ‘ya balka jyeni ne pwadan aŋka pomk uutca ɔntɔ te nonkɛnti, oŋ kan ‘ya an ma bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya a genga bɛɛ.
Kan ‘ya mal ‘ya ‘woñgan maka bɔwan waakɛnda, ɔci war ‘ya oljan nokka ma te jyeni ‘ya, oŋ kan ‘ya an ma bɛɛyɛ, genga yɔmdi te ‘ya bɛɛ.
Mena ani mayɛ, ɛkɛ kɛɛy ɔci noŋi ne pwadan. Mena ani mayɛ, yomɛ motcin bɛɛ, ɔci moki noŋi warɛ bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ a yɛcan bɛɛ,
ɔci ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan bɛɛ, ɔci buagɔn genga te war ɛkɛ bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ poŋi ne yaayan bɛɛ, ɔci loomgɛ koocin bɛɛ.
Mena ani mayɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔcin te jyeka awarɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔcin te nɔji bɛɛ.
Mena ani mayɛ, ɛkɛ jiñɛ tɛɛcin te waak waakɛnda, ɔci jyeti waak waakɛnda, ɔci kɛɛy waak waakɛnda, ɔci balkɛ kɛɛn te waak waakɛnda.
Aniyɛ, baadi bɛɛ, oŋ yeti miti jiek mati baadi, ɔci jyeka te tugga pookɛn baadi, ɔci ŋeejin baadi moki.
Acaan ŋeejin ikinyɛ, bɔɔnjin, ɔci jyeka mittin ikinyɛ, bɔɔnjin.
Oŋ yeti mena yɔmjin neeni ne bɛɛdiyɛ, waka bɔɔnjin neeniyɛ, eedɛ bora.

Ne wona ‘ya aga kaciyɛ, ‘ya baal gɔk ba kacca ḍiɛran, ɔci baal poŋ ba kacca ḍiɛran, ɔci ‘ya waka jitkɛn yuartanji kɛɛgin, yuarcanji ‘ya daŋkun. Ne ‘ya aŋŋa ‘uanyɛ, ‘ya pɔy kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin daljan doki.

Acaan waka ñaltin ikin acca neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba pɔɔyama yuar waŋɛti budan, oŋ yeti te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ikin ñoortin woŋgɔti a ñoorin. Ɔci ‘ya waak gɛɛg ŋeejo, yeti te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ‘ya waak ŋeejja ne pwadan bala ba ŋeejin ‘ya ŋeejati Juaŋy.
Oŋ accayɛ, jyeni, ɔci jyenna jyettin ikin kɛɛyin, ɔci aniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala oŋkanda. Oŋ yeti ɛka pwadan ne tolanyɛ, gena anno.
Dala ani aga paŋi ɛkkɛ paŋŋa tolan. Ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛ andɛ waka ma ‘wondɛ Boŋ Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ lwokɛ ma te jyek Juaŋo.
Acaan mena gɔki te tugga pookɛnyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔki ma baanti bɛɛ, ɛkɛ gɔki Jwaŋa Tolanti. Awarɛ, menga jyek ɛkɛ tieŋdɛ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ gɔki te Booŋ yomɛti te waka a cogginy.
Oŋ yeti mena lwoki ma te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ nɔɔti ma, ɔci moki ɛkkɛn, ɔci cyeŋi ɛkkɛn te war tɛɛno, ɔci mwoni ɛkkɛn jitkɛn.
Mena gɔki te tugga pookɛnyɛ, ɛkɛ moki war ɛkɛ parɛ, oŋ yeti mena lwoŋi jyek Juaŋ jitkɛn ŋeejɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ma kaniica magdɛ.

Kan ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ te tugga pookɛn waakidayɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin, yeti kan ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti lwoŋi jyek Juaŋ jitkɛnyɛ, a ɔɔn aŋka pwatcin ne tolan ‘yati. Mena yaakinti lwoŋi jyek Juaŋ jitkɛnyɛ, pwatcin ne tolan te mena urkinti tugi maka pookɛny, yeti kan men gɛɛl balayɛ, dala jyeka lwogdɛ ɛkɛ neeni oodɛ bora. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, kaniica yaakinti ‘uotti ñamu.

Acca hay! Modg ɔɔn, kan ‘ya bɛɛn ɛkkɛti oŋ gɔkcan te tugga pookɛn oŋ ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ bɛɛy, oŋ jyeka neeni ɛkkɛ maktɛ a ɔki?
