Yeti kan ‘ya bɛɛn ɔci gɔkcan te jyeka lɛɛlnɛ Juaŋ bora ‘yati neeni, ɔci walla ɛkkɛ nɔɔttin te waka ŋeej ‘ya neeni, ɔci walla te waka bala bɛya neeni, ɔci walla te jyek Juaŋ jyeka pwadin jyeka buagiti ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ maktɛ.
Kan waka kuuttan ma bala ba luañ ɔci waka cyɛptan ma bala ba coŋkɔn, kan pɔɔdgɛn pwadɔ bɛɛy, oŋ pwana wiak ne pwadan tieŋtin a ɔki?
Ɔci moki kan ṭuoŋ kuudi ma ne pwadan bɛɛy, a menɛ warɛ ywaŋdɛ te lañy?
Ɔci moki kan ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ te tugga pookɛn tugga tieŋtan ma bɛɛy, oŋ ɛkkɛn jyeka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna jitkɛn ŋeettan a ɔki? Jyek ɛkkɛ neeni peedɛ jwami bora budan.
Awarɛ, tugga pookɛn bala ne coŋɔn baan konɛ warda, ɔci ɛkkɛn jitkɛn tieŋtan ma waakɛnda.
Kan ‘ya jyeka guagdɛ mena neeni kuoliwiyɛ, ‘ya a miiŋ te jyeka guagdɛ ɛkɛ wanna.
Te bwakta ɛkkɛ buagɛ waka ma ‘wondɛ Booŋyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ toottɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ waka kaniica ciɛndi ñamuy.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan mena gɔki te tugga pookɛnyɛ, dala ɛkɛ cɔkti Juaŋti aŋka ɛkɛ yɔɔrdi war tɛɛn te lwoŋi jyeka neeni.
Oŋ kan ‘ya cɔk te tuka parɛyɛ, gena boŋ ‘ya cɔkiy, oŋ yeti paŋi ‘ya yɔɔrdi genga bɛɛ.
Oŋ ‘ya noŋja a ɔki? ‘Ya cɔkca te boŋ ‘ya, ɔci moki cɔkca te paŋi ‘ya, ɔci ‘ya ‘ualja te boŋ ‘ya, ɔci ‘ya ‘ualja te paŋi ‘ya moki.
Kan i jiey Juaŋ te booŋy, oŋ mena balkɛ waka ma ‘wondɛ booŋ bɛɛ neeni, ɛkɛ yaaktanti ñoodi iki i te cɔŋi a ɔki ne i cɔkiy? Acaan ɛkɛ jyeka guaga i wanna ŋeejɛ bɛɛ.
I waanu cɔk ne pwadan awarɛ, yeti i moodɔ maŋŋi bɛɛ.
’Ya gɔk Juaŋti a pwatcin, acaan ‘ya gɔk te tugga pookɛn ne tolan te ɛkkɛ.
Kan ‘ya loṭi kaniicaji te jyeka jitkɛn wɔkin ne dɔɔyɔyɛ, yɔmjin ne tolan te jyek tuka parɛ jyeka a alpn a inyaakkɛn (10,000) jitkɛn wɔkin bɛɛ neeni.
Modg ɔɔn, naa paŋi ɛkkɛ bala ba paŋi kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin bɛɛ. Yeti dala ɛkkɛ baldɛ ba kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin te naŋki nɔjjo, oŋ yeti dala paŋi ɛkkɛ bala ba paŋi maka ḍwaŋin.
Ɔci bala ba kiiwɛ ma ganuunji agi, “Te tuk maka pookɛn, ɔci te tuk wɛlga kwoyinyɛ, ‘ya gɔkca maka neeniti, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jwali ‘ya bɛɛ. Gena Ciɛggɔn gɔki a ɔɔn neeni.”
Oŋ yeti jyeka te tugga pookɛnyɛ, a naŋka tɛyan te maka jyeti Juaŋti neeni bɛɛy, yeti ɛkkɛn te maka jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ. Ɔci miti jiekyɛ, te maka jyeti Juaŋti baaw bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn te maka jyeti Juaŋtiy.

Kan ma kaniica wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ waakɛnda kaniicaji, ɔci ma gɔkti te tugga pookɛn, ɔci kan maka baan konɛti, walla maka jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ gɛɛg bɛya ɛkkɛti kaniicajiy, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ guaktɛ agi ɛkkɛ agjɛ maka wyetkɛn yeyin bɛɛ?

Yeti kan ma waakɛnda mieti ma te jyek Juaŋ ɔci mena jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ, walla mena baan konɛti gɛɛl bɛɛn orɔyɛ, ɛkɛ wiakti yomɛti te nɔji ɛkɛ te jyeka tieŋni ɛkɛ neeni, ɔci jyeka tieŋni ɛkɛ neeni nɔji ɛkɛ lɛɛltan bora a ɛkɛ a mena nɔɔdɔn.
Ɔci jyeka bala ɛkɛ yomɛti a coggin neeniyɛ, bɛya bora ɔci ɛkɛ ḍwondi iñɔ, ɔci morti Juaŋti, ɔci yomɛ wiakti, ɔci gɔkti agi, “Jwaŋa Tolan balgi iki ɛkkɛ awarɛ, hay!”

Modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn gɔktɔn a ɔki? Ne ɛkkɛ ḍwoṭɛ wyetkɔ a cyɛɛlɔ kaniicajiyɛ, ɛkkɛ men da balki ɔɔli, ɔci mena parɛ balki lali, ɔci mena parɛ balki gena ɛkɛ lɛɛrnɛ Juaŋy, ɔci mena parɛ balki lali jiek te tuka parɛ, ɔci mena parɛ balki lwoŋi jieko. Waka neeni waakɛndayɛ, kaniica ciɛntan ñamu.
Kan menga gɔki te tuka parɛyɛ, ma ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔci walla ne ḍoogɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn menga da jɔŋdi te wɔɔka ɛkɛ parɛ, oŋ yeti mena lwoki jiek jitkɛnyɛ, a cyɛɛlɔ.
Kan mena lwoki jiek baawyɛ, dala ma waakɛnda ciya lieda kaniicaji, ɔci men da gɔkti war ɛkɛti parɛ, ɔci gɔgdi i Jwaŋa Tolan.
Dala maka mieti jyek Juaŋ ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔci walla ne ḍoogɔ neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn gɔkti, ɔci dala maka pookɛn neeniyɛ, tieŋdi jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛny.
Kan Boŋ Juaŋ jiek lɛɛlnɛ bora mena ciyi iñɔ neeni gɛɛltiyɛ, dala mena gɔki ñamu neeni yɔɔda te jieko.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti agdɛ maka lwoki jiek waakida, menga da te wɔɔka ɛkɛ parɛ aŋka ma waakɛnda urtanti jiek, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda yomgɛn tɛya ɔci ñɔya.
Maka mieti mayɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki amaam bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn mwoki jyek Juaŋ ne pwadan.
Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, nwoci jiek bɛɛ, ɛkɛ a mena yɔŋi jieko. Bala ba ma kaniican waakɛnda, maka pwadgin Juaŋtiy,
dala moong ɛkkɛ ciya lieda kaniicanji. Ɛkkɛn balkɔn pɔɔdg aŋka gɔkti bɛɛ, oŋ yeti dala ɛkkɛn jyeddi ba jyeka guagdɛ ganuuny. Naa ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn eetan ñaalɔ ḍwaŋdi te maka ‘uay bɛɛ.
Kan moong buagɔn genga ŋeettanyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn tootti ‘uay ɛkkɛnti baanji. Acaan yaayɛ a lɔɔn ɛɛŋti ne ɛkɛ gɔkti jiek kaniicajiy.
Jyek Juaŋ bɛɛn te ɛkkɛtɛ? Walla ɛkkɛn bɛɛn ɛkkɛti pookɔ?
Kan men gɛɛl poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ agjɛ mena mieti ma ɔci walla balkiti Boŋ Juaŋyɛ, dala ɛkɛ jyeka kiid ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkɛ a jyek Ciɛggɔn.
Kan ɛkɛ jyeka neeni naŋŋɛ a wyeñ boojyɛ, ɛkɛ daŋkun naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ a mena wyeñɛ baawy.
Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ bwaktɛ waka ma ‘wondɛ Boŋ Juaŋ te miti, ɔci naa menga dɛɛdɛ ɛkkɛ te jyek tugga pookɛn bɛɛ.
Oŋ yeti dala waak waakɛnda bala te pɔya awarɛ, ɔci a ywaŋgɔny.
Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛ myettin moki te jyeka ɛkkɛ lallin ‘ya a jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jyeka muŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan neeniy.
Kan ɛkkɛ jyeka neeni tiektɛ ne tɛyanyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔtɛ ɛkkɛn. Yeti kan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyeka pookɛn gɛɛgtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔrdɛ yɔɔt bɛɛ.
’Ya ɛkkɛ ‘wonnin waka pwadin ne tolan waka muŋi ‘ya ñamu daŋkun, agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ tuun te nɔji ikin ba jyeka kiiwɛ ma te ɛkɛy.
Ɛkɛ jokci ma koolji ɔci ɛkɛ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te ninna akki ne ḍoogɔ tɛɛti moki ba jyeka a kiigin.
Ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora Butructi, hayya, ɛkɛ oŋ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora Cuudan A Inyaakkɛn Wyetkɛn Ne Yyɛɛwɔti oŋo.
Ɛkɛ oŋ moki warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora maka a miyyan ne dɔɔyɔti (500) te oŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Maka neeni gɛɛg bala ciyi tɛɛti acca men, yeti ɛkkin pookɛn tuun doki.
Ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora Yaakubti, ɔci ɛkɛ moki oŋ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora cuudanti waakɛnda oŋo.
Ɔci ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ‘ya baali ba kacca a guoṭi ne ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora ‘yatiy.
Acaan ‘ya a mena ḍiɛran te cuudan pookɛn waakɛnda, ‘ya a mena te naa bartan ma a cuuda bɛɛy, acaan ‘ya baal noŋ ne yaayan kaniica Juaŋti.

Yeti te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ‘ya baal ba bolji ‘ya bolja te baaṭi moki bɛɛ, ɔci yom pwani Juaŋ yom pwani ‘wonnata ‘ya neeni ḍakcin budan bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya kanŋan ne tolan te maka pookɛn waakɛnda. Yeti a ‘ya bɛɛ, gena yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan yom pwanna bala ‘yati neeniy.
Ɔci kan a ‘ya, walla maka waayiyɛ, ɔɔn waakida loṭɔn a ɔŋŋi, ɔci ɛkkɛ jyettɛ a ɔŋŋi.
Ɔci kan ma loṭi ma te jyek Kiṭɔ agi ɛkta jɔŋnɔ ñaalɔ te lientiy, oŋ ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛti gɔki agi jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ te kolk jitin baawɔ ogo?
Te jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ baawyɛ, te Yaccu Kiṭɔ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛ.
Kan te Kiṭɔ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛyɛ, te lali ɔɔn neeni budan, ɔci te jyenna jyettɛ ɛkkɛ neeni daŋkun yɔmdi te genga bɛɛ.

Kan Juaŋ te Kiṭɔ jɔɔŋnɛ ñaalɔ te lienti bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan maka tuun neeni jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te lienti bɛɛyɛ, ɔɔn aŋŋɔn maka jomi jiek Juaŋti, acaan ɔɔn loṭɔn ma ka Kiṭɔ jɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te lienti. Yeti kan te jyeka guaktan ma agi maka tuunɔ jɔŋdɔ ñaalɔ moki bɛɛ wanna a jyeka awarɛyɛ, te Kiṭɔ daŋkun jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛ.
Kan maka a tuutan jɔŋdi ñaalɔ bɛɛyɛ, te Kiṭɔ daŋkun jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛ.
Ɔci kan te Kiṭɔ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛyɛ, te jyeni ɛkkɛ wanna budan, te ɛkkɛ men balgɛ te nɔji jitin men ɔɔn.
Ɔci te maka jyeti Kiṭɔti oŋ tuun neeniyɛ, te ɛkkɛn ḍakcin daŋkun budan.
Kan te ikin ciyin kɛɛyin a tɛɛtin acca neeni parɛyɛ, te ɔɔn a maka beeldi ne tolan.
Yeti awarɛ awarɛyɛ, Kiṭɔ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te lienti doki. Ɛkɛ a juati maka jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te kolk jitiny.
Bala ba lien bɛɛn mati te mena ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ daŋkun bala te mena ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Bala ba ma waakɛnda tuun te naŋki Adam, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ma waakɛnda tɛɛti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Yeti menga da te non ɛkɛ. Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a juatto, ɔci maka jyeti ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn oŋ jɔŋdi ñaalɔ daŋkun te oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdɛy.
Naŋka neeni wyeñɛ bala oŋ te oŋŋa cyɛgji luldɛ weegɛn Jwaŋa Tolan te Kiṭɔti, ne Kiṭɔ akuuman ɔci cyekin ḍwaŋin ɔci war tɛɛn waakɛnda lɛɛŋŋɛ jitin dokiy.
Acaan ɛkɛ aga Ciɛggɔn ɔɔn, ne maka yoyi ñin iki ɛkɛ neeni buurtɛ ɛkɛ iñɔ ɛkɛ ciegɛti ɔɔn.
Mena yoyi ñin iki ɛkɛ aŋka lɛgdɛ ɛkɛ jitin ne ŋoyɔyɛ, gena lieno.

Worga Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki agi, “Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan waak waakɛnda ḍuannɛ iñɔ ɛkɛ ciegɛti.” Jwali konɛ wɔɔkcin ne jiek gɔkki agi “waak waakɛnda” Juaŋ waanɛ bala i waka neeni bɛɛ, ɛkɛ a mena waak waakɛnda ḍuannɛ Kiṭɔ bieŋɛtiy.
Ne ɛkɛ waak waakɛnda ḍuattɛ iñɔyɛ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ Kaci ɛkɛ daŋkun warɛ ḍuattɛ Juaŋ bieŋɛti, ɛkɛ a mena waak waakɛnda bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛtiy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan aga mena waak waakɛnda bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛtiy.
Oŋ maka buuli ma te maka tuun neeni noŋdi a ɔki? Oŋ kan maka tuun neeni jɔŋdi ñaalɔ bɛɛy, oŋ ma bultan ma te ɛkkɛn moki ogo?
Oŋ ‘ya baal nona yaayan a lien oŋki waakɛnda ogo?
’Ya gɔkka awarɛ te naŋka noŋa ‘ya waru te ɛkkɛy. Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya baal nona yaayan a lienti oŋkanda te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.

’Ya gɔk ba jyek ma baano. A gena yɔmjin te ‘ya, kan te ‘ya noonin iki wak luom ban Ɛpacacy? Kan maka tuun jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛyɛ, dala ikin noŋtin ba jyek maka gɔki agi, “Dala ikin omtin ɔci mottin, acaan ikin tuutin ne liidɔ.”
Naa ɛkkɛ maaldɛ menga bɛɛ acaan jiek gɔki agi, “Ñoowin ikin ñoowin i maka yeyinyɛ, wyeña pwadan yaadɛ.”
Dala ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ wyeñ ɛkkɛ wyeña pwadanti, ɔci noŋdɛ nɔji moki bɛɛ. Acaan ma gɛɛg balkɛ ñing tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔk a ɔŋŋi, aŋka ɛkkɛ waakɔ aga lɔɔno.
Yeti menga tootti agi, “‘Yeeñg jɔŋdi ñaalɔ moki? Ɛkkɛn bɛya ati te wara ɔkiy?”
Hay, i mena poŋi amaam nɛ, gena piitca i iñɔ ṭɛɛrji, kan ɛkɛ jada bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti ywoldi bɛɛ.
Ɔci gena piinni i wanna ɛkɛ yorti ba bolja piinni i wanna bɛɛ, yeti gena cyɛni ɛkɛ aŋka yulay, kan a yimi walla poka pookɛn gɛɛgy.
Yeti Juaŋ gena neeni ‘wondɛ warɛ ba bolja ɛkɛ buagɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ waak ñingɛn waakɛnda ‘wondɛ ñingɛn waakɛnda men da ‘woñgi war ɛkɛ.
Acaan war a cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ, war gɛɛl a war ma baano, ɔci gɛɛl a war maalo, ɔci ɛka parɛ a war ḍiirgo, ɔci ɛkan a war yako.
Wara pɔliji bala, ɔci wara ṭɛɛrji da bala, yeti wara pɔliji da te pwani ɛkɛ, ɔci wara ṭɛɛrji da te pwani ɛkɛ.
Pwani wɔɔka bala. Ɔci paan daŋkun, pwani ɛkɛ da parɛ moki. Ɔci kɛltan daŋkun balkɛ pwani ɛkkɛn, ɔci kɛltan gɛɛg pwani ɛkkɛn bala ñamu te makɛn pookɛn.
Jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ daŋkun bala a ɔɔn. Wara jogɛ mayɛ, ɛkɛ baadi jada, yeti wara jɔŋdi ñaalɔ mokiyɛ, ɛkɛ baadi bɛɛ.
Ɛkɛ jogɛ ma te jwoljo, yeti ɛkɛ jɔŋdi ñaalɔ pwanna pwanno, ɛkɛ jogɛ ma te war koñño, yeti ɛkɛ jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te war tɛɛno.
Ɛkɛ jogɛ ma te war ma baan wara baadi neeni budan, yeti ɛkɛ jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te war booŋo. Kan wara baadi neeni balayɛ, war booŋ daŋkun bala.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka a kiigin gɔki agi, “Adam mena aŋŋɛ Juaŋ ñamu neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ciyi tɛɛti.” Yeti Adam ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi mena ma ‘wondɛ tɛɛtin.
Adam mena ñamu neeni balkɛ war booŋ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ a war budan. Hayya mena balkɛ war booŋ oŋ bɛɛn ne ŋoyɔ oŋo.
Adam mena ñamuyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛɛn te ṭɛɛrji, ɔci ɛkɛ a ṭɛɛro. Yeti Adam akki ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka bɛɛn te ñaalɔ pɔliji.

Ba bolji Adam mena bɛɛn te ṭɛɛrti neeniyɛ, ma baan maka bɛɛn te ṭɛɛrti neeni waakɛnda daŋkun bala ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci ba bolji Kiṭɔ mena bɛɛn te ñaalɔ pɔliji neeniyɛ, maka jyeti ɛkɛti neeni daŋkun aga maka ñaalɔ pɔliji ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
Bala ba ne ikin balkinti bolji Adam mena bɛɛn te ṭɛɛrti neeniyɛ, bolji Yaccu mena bɛɛn te pɔliji neeni daŋkun bɛya ikinti.
Hay, modg ɔɔn, ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te gena neeni ka war ikin wara acca neeniyɛ, ooddi cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ, ɔci moki waak ikin waaka baadi neeniyɛ, tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni yuartan ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
Gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin gena konɛ a coggɔn neeni. Ikin tuutin waakida bɛɛ, yeti ikin waaki aktin.
Naŋka neeni bɛya ne pɛñan ba men ne woŋgɛ moortiti ne ṭwoŋa ne ŋoyɔ wiaktiy. Acaan ṭuoŋ wiakti, ɔci maka tuun jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te wara woonɛ, wara baadi bɛɛy, ɔci ikin da waaki aktin.
Acaan bolja baadi neeni ɛɛŋdi bolja baadi bɛɛy, ɔci yoŋi lien neeni ɛɛŋdi yoŋŋa lienɛ baawy.
Ne wara a jadɔn ɛɛŋdi wara jannɛ baawyɛ, ɔci ne war lien ɛɛŋdi wara lienɛ baawyɛ, jyeka a kiigin neeni bɛya bora oŋ agi, “Lien lannɛ bɔnnin.”
“Hay, i lieno, ba war tɛɛn bɔɔni i ma bɛ? Hay, i koolo, ba pɛñi i bɛ?”
War tɛɛn lienyɛ, ɛkɛ a nɔjjo. Ɔci war tɛɛn nɔjiyɛ, a jyek ganuun.
Yeti dala gɔktin a pwatcin Juaŋti mena ikin ‘wonnin war tɛɛn te Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka ikin yaakinti jyek lien bwantin neeniy.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, hay modg ɔɔn maka ana ‘yay, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔttɛ iñɔ ne tɛyan, naa ɛkkɛ kɛɛtɛ waakɔ bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ciɛndɛ ñamu coŋdɛ oŋkanda kanŋa Juaŋti. Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ kanŋa ɛkkɛ neeni ḍakti budan bɛɛ.
Acca ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti te jyek waka limtin te Ma Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, bala ba ‘ya kaniican ban Galatiya myetkan doki. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun noŋdɛ ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
Te oŋki Juaŋ waakɛndayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ waakida men da ḍɔccɛ genga bora, ɔci bwogdɛ ñino. Ɛkɛ ḍɔtti ba waka bala ɛkɛti aŋka ne ‘ya bɛɛda naa ɛkkɛ moki ɔgdɛ lyemɛ a limi ɔɔn bɛɛ.
Ɔci ne ‘ya dɛnda aŋanyɛ, waka limmɛ ɛkkɛ te yom pwani neeniyɛ, cundi ‘ya ban Urcaliim iki worgan i maka muonɛ ɛkkɛ bora wanna.
Kan jwali warɛ liɛllɛ a ‘ya oottayɛ, ɛkkɛn ooddin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ.
’Ya bɛɛd ḍieŋŋa ɛkkɛti ne ‘ya gorda ban Macɛdɔɔnyajiy, acaan ‘ya buaga gora ban Macɛdɔɔnyaji.
’Ya coottin i ɛkkɛ ne ḍiɛran kaapun, walla ‘ya wɛɛñi wyeñɛ cwamja aŋan aŋka ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ‘ya ‘yeettatɛ te won ‘ya nona oodda ‘yay.
Acaan ‘ya buaga naa ɛkkɛ yuardin gordinyɔ a gorti ɔɔn bɛɛ. ‘Ya buaga nink ṭɔlgɛn gɛɛg noktin i ɛkkɛ kan Ciɛggɔn ‘ya pɔŋna pɔyy.
Yeti ‘ya cood te ban Ɛpacac ne oŋ Iid Ninka A Ma Baan Ne Yyɛɛwɔ Mena Parɛ Byeŋkɛ (50) neeni bɛɛdi ɔɔn.
Acaan pɔy tuka tolan warɛ pɔŋŋɛ te kanŋa ‘yati, ɔci maka yookɔn te ‘ya bala kɔɔna kɔɔnno.
Ne Timutawuc bɛɛdi ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ gwaldɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan, acaan ɛkɛ noŋi kanŋa Ciɛggɔn ba ‘ya daŋkun.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa menga wooki ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Yeti dala ɛkɛ magdɛ ɛkkɛ pɔɔjɔ te pwani aŋka ɛkɛ dɔɔkti ‘yati. Acaan ɔɔn balgɔn kɛɛyɔn ɛkɛ i modg ikin.
Bala ba ‘ya gɔkcan mod ikin Apɔɔlɔcti ne pɛñan ka dala ɛkɛ bɛya ḍieŋdi ɛkkɛti, yeti ɛkɛ yomɛ buagɔn bɛya acca bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bɛya ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ yɔɔrdi wɔɔkay.
Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyeni ɛkkɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya, naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ tɛɛdɛ.
Dala waka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ waakɛnda naŋdɛ te oonnin yɔtin.
Acca modg ɔɔn, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ on tukɛ Ictɛɛpanuc ɛkkɛn a maka bɛɛn Juaŋti ñamu ban Akeeya, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn ‘woñgi kanŋa Ma Kiṭɔ.
Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya gɔk ɛkkɛti ne pɛñan ka dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka noŋi kanŋa Juaŋ a ɔɔn wanna, ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka pookɛn maka noŋi kanŋa Juaŋ ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔny.
’Ya yomu ñɔɔn ne Ictɛɛpanuc bɛɛni ɔci Pɔrtyunaatac, ɔci Akaaykacy, acaan ɛkkɛn non ɛkkɛ mugɛ aŋka ‘ya makta ne ɛkkɛ baagɛy.
Acaan ɛkkɛn ‘ya makka yomuti ba ɛkkɛ moki ɔɔn. Maka ba maka neeniyɛ, dala kanŋa ɛkkɛn yuartanji ma ɔci dala ma noŋdɛ ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti.
Kaniican ban Ecya cuoññin ñiimi ɛkkɛti. Akwilla ɔci Pricilla i kaniica on ɛkkɛn ban Ecya wɛnniyɛ, ñiepi ɛkkɛ te yoma pwadan te yenti Kiṭɔ.
Modg ikin waakɛnda ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ñiebdɛ yɔtin pookɔ waakida te ñiebbin pwadan.
Gena ‘ya, Buuluc kiewan jyek ñiimma neeni te byeŋ ‘ya paru ɛkkɛti neeni.
Kan men gɛɛl balki ani Ciɛggɔn bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ aga ‘walgɔn! Ciɛggɔn ɔɔn, dala i bɛɛdi!
Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti.
Dala ani bala ɛkkɛti waakida te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Gena ‘ya Buuluc cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ ba yom Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci mod ikin Timutawuc kiewɔn worga neen neeni. Worga neeni ooddi kaniica Jwaŋa Tolanti ban Kuruntuc i Ma Kiṭɔ maka pwadin ban Akeeyaji warda.
Dala yom pwani ɔci coodi pwani bala ɛkkɛti te Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔy.
Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwanno.
Ɛkɛ a mena ikin muntinji te yom yoñ ikin waakiday. A ɔŋŋi aŋka ikin da yaakinti maka yomgɛn yeyin muntinji te munna ikin munnintiji Jwaŋa Tolany.
Acaan bala ba ne ikin ñoowin iki Kiṭɔ te taab ɛkɛyɛ, ikin da yomgɔ pwada te Kiṭɔ te munna neeni daŋkun.
Kan ɔɔn taamnɔnyɛ, aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwaddi, ɔci yɔɔdɛ Juaŋo. Ɔci kan ɔɔn yomgɔ pwaniyɛ, aŋka ɛkkɛ da yomgɔ pwaddi. Naŋka neeni bɛya te tiekin ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tieŋni te taab bɛɛn ikinti waakida neeniy.
Ɔci paŋŋa poŋɔn ɔɔn te ɛkkɛyɛ, tɛɛna tɛɛno, acaan ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ba ñoowin ɛkkɛ ñoowin iki ɔɔn te taab neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ daŋkun ñootin iki ɔɔn te yom pwanno.
Hay modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn buagɔn dala naŋka bɛɛn ɔɔnti yaayan ban Ecya neeni ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ. Naŋka neeni cyɛŋŋa cyɛŋi ɔɔnti ne tolan, ɔci ɔɔn beelnɔn te kɛɛn coodi tɛɛtin moki.

Ɔɔn waakɔ poccin iñɔ bala ba ne ɔɔn wankɔnti ma te lien no. Yeti naŋka neeni bɛɛn a ɔɔn aŋka naa ɔɔn poŋdɔn te waak ɔɔn pookɔ bɛɛ, yeti dala ɔɔn poŋdɔn te gena Jwaŋa Tolan mena maka tuun jɔɔŋdɛ ñaalɔy.
Ɛkɛ ɔɔn wɛɛnɔn bora te nona yaayanti, ɔci ɛkɛ ɔɔn wɛɛdɔn bora moki. Ɔci paŋi ɔɔn ḍuannɔn aŋa ɛkɛti ka ɛkɛ ɔɔn wɛɛdɔn bora moki.
A ɔŋŋi ɛkkɛ daŋkun ɔɔn magdintɔ te cɔŋŋo, aŋka maka coŋin gɔkti a pwatcin te gena yuarŋɔn ɔɔn te cɔŋi maka coŋin neeni. Ɔci Juaŋ bieŋɛ tandɛ ɔɔnti, ɔci maka coŋin gɔkti a pwatcin ɛkɛti te ɔɔn.

Naŋka noŋɔn ɔɔn waakɔ bala a ɔŋŋi, jwali yomg ɔɔn te naŋka naŋŋɔn ɔɔn ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɔɔn noŋŋɔn te yoma ḍiɛran ɔci te pwani Jwaŋa Tolan, yeti te ñing tɛɛn war ma baan budan bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn noŋŋɔn te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci noŋŋɔn ne tolan aŋa ɛkkɛti nɔñji.
Ɔɔn kiedɔn gena parɛ gɛɛl ɛkkɛti bɛɛ, gena waka ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti paŋŋɛn ɔci jitkɛn yuartɛy. ‘Ya baal poŋ ka ɛkkɛ waka neeni jitkɛn yuartɛ ne pwadan.
Bala ba ɛkkɛ waak jitkɛn yuarnɛ ne ḍiɛran dokiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti noŋdɛ waakɔ te ɔɔn bala ba ne ɔɔn noŋɔn waakɔ te ɛkkɛ, ne oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdɛy.
Acaan naŋka neeni ŋeej ‘ya ne pwadanyɛ, ‘ya buaga ka bɛɛd ḍieŋŋa ɛkkɛti te ñamu aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya ñɔɔn ne tolan.
’Ya buaga ka ḍieŋŋa ɛkkɛti ne ‘ya gorda oodda ban Macɛdɔɔnya ɔci dɔɔkta ɛkkɛti moki te ban Macɛdɔɔnya, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘ya ‘yeettatɛ pɔɔjɔ ne ‘ya oodda ban Yahuudiyay.
’Ya yomu ŋoodan ne ‘ya buagati noŋa naŋka neeniyɛ? Gena ‘ya buaga ka ɛkɛ naŋdi neeniyɛ, naŋdi ‘ya ba naŋka ṭɛɛrji wɛnni aŋka ‘ya gɔkca ka “Ɛɛ” ɔci “A’a” te oŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ? A’a, ɔɔn noŋɔn a ɔɔn bɛɛ.
Awarɛ, te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan mena ooki jyek ɛkɛ waakɛn bɛɛ neeniyɛ, jwali ɔɔn ɛkkɛtiyɛ, a “Ɛɛ” ɔci “A’a” bɛɛ.
Acaan Yaccu Kiṭɔ Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ a mena ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔny. Ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn i Cila ɔci Timutawuc, ɔci jwali ‘ya a “Ɛɛ” ɔci “A’a” bɛɛ. Yeti jwalla a “Ɛɛ” aŋka bala Juaŋti oŋkanda.
Acaan jwalla ḍuaññɛ Jwaŋa Tolan balkɛ jwalla a “Ɛɛ” te Kiṭɔ, a ɔŋŋi aŋka ɔɔn gɔkɔn ka dala bala a ɔɔn te ɛkɛ te pwani Jwaŋa Tolan neeni.
Yeti Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ a mena ɔɔn yɔɔnnɔn iñɔ iki ɛkkɛ Kiṭɔtiy, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin kanŋa byeŋkɔti.
Ɛkɛ ikin naŋŋin te mañ ɛkɛ, ɔci ikin ‘wonnin Boŋ ɛkɛ yomgɔti ba gena mwoki ikin lakun.
Yeti ‘ya gɔkca te yenti Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ waakɔ aga lɔɔn bɛɛ. Gena te jyeka neeni aŋka ‘ya bɛɛna ban Kuruntuc men bɛɛ neeni.
’Ya gɔkka ɔŋŋi aŋka ɛkkɛ myettin te waka ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn kanŋɔn iki ɛkkɛ te yom ñɔɔn ɛkkɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan te jyeni ɛkkɛ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya yomu muŋi ka naa ‘ya bɛɛd ḍieŋŋa ɛkkɛti moki aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi bɛɛ.
Kan ‘ya ɛkkɛ yaadin yomgɔti oŋ a menɛ ‘ya ywaŋda yomutiy, pari ɛkkɛ maka yaañi ‘ya yomgɛnti neeni bɛɛ?

A ɔŋŋi aŋka ‘ya kiena worga neeni ɛkkɛti te ñamu wanna. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne ‘ya bɛɛdayɛ, ‘ya yomu yaaya te ɛkkɛ maka ‘ya ywaŋka yomuti neeni bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ waakida ŋeejin ‘ya ne pwadan. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, yom ñɔɔn ‘ya aga yom ñɔɔn ɛkkɛ waakida.

Acaan ne ‘ya ɛkkɛ kieŋnin worgayɛ, ‘ya yomu wiak ne tolan, ɔci ‘ya yomu ñɔni warɛ, ɔci pieg bala wɔyi ‘ya ñinguti. Yeti ‘ya noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ yaadin ‘ya yomgɔti bɛɛ, yeti aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ te anna ana ‘ya ɛkkɛ ne tolan neeni.
Kan menga eccin yom yoñ mengatiyɛ, ‘ya yomu yaaya bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ yaaññɛ yomgɔti pookɔ. ‘Ya gɔk a ɔɔn acaan ‘ya buaga naa ‘ya naŋka neeni, ‘uotkati ɛkɛ wyeñɛti bɛɛ.
Mena noŋi a ɔɔn wanna kan maka coŋin jiek duakcɛ ɛkɛ wyeñɛtiyɛ, yɔmjin doki.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ bɔɔktɛ ɔci ywaŋdɛ yomɛti aŋka naa ɛkɛ bwandɛji yom yoñ bɛɛ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ne pɛñan, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ lɛɛrtɛ ani ɛkkɛ aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkɛ.
Worga kiewan ‘ya ne ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, ‘ya poci ɛkkɛ a poccin buaga gɔrca ne ɛkkɛ agɛ maka tieci jiek te waak waakɛnda boki no.
Mena bɔɔktɛ ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ bɔɔka ‘ya daŋkun. Kan genga bala aŋka ɛkɛ bɔɔka ‘ya, oŋ ɛkɛ bɔɔkan ‘ya Kiṭɔ ñamɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ bɔɔkan ‘ya te ɛkkɛ
aŋka naa Jwaŋa Yaayan ikin naŋtin ñin acaan ikin paŋi ɛkɛ kuolin ñin bɛɛ.
Ne ‘ya bɛɛna ban Trɔwacti aŋka lor ma te jyek Kiṭɔ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadinyɛ, Ciɛggɔn pɔy tukɛ pɔŋnɛ te kanŋa aŋan.
Yeti paŋi ‘ya warɛ ḍiemnɛ iñɔ bɛɛ, acaan mod ɔɔn Tituc mɔkcan ‘ya aŋan bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya bana neeni daljan ɔntɔ, ɔci ‘ya ati ban Macɛdɔɔnya.
Ɔɔn gɔktɔn a pwatcin Juaŋti, acaan ɛkɛ a mena ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn bɔnnin te Yaccu Kiṭɔ te war tɛɛn aŋka ŋeejin ɛkɛ ŋeettiti ma eedɔn ɔɔn noon warda bala ba piinŋan pyeni milany.
Acaan ɔɔn agɔn pyen Kiṭɔ pyena milan maka uniti ɔci maka tuwati.
Pyena neeni etti lien maka yienti, yeti ɛkɛ a pyena etti tɛɛtin maka unitiy. Oŋ a menɛ yɔmjin te kanŋa neeniy?
Acaan ɔɔn balgɔn ba maka coŋin yieyɔn jwali Juaŋ a yied bɛɛ. Yeti ɔɔn balgɔn ba maka yɔɔññɛ Juaŋo. Ɔɔn gɔkɔn te Juaŋ te yoma awarɛ Juaŋ ñamɛti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ ba maka kanŋan Kiṭɔtiy.
Ɔɔn jɔɔttɔn te jiɛt waakɔ pookɔ moki? Walla ɔɔn buagɔn kiedɔn worgan ɛkkɛti aŋka mieti ɛkkɛ te waak ɔɔnɔ? Walla moki ɔɔn buagɔn ɛkkɛ kieddɛ worgan mieti te ɔɔnɔ? A'a.
Ɛkkɛ woodgɔ agɛ kiikan ɔɔn, ɔci balgɛ ɔɔn yomgɔti aŋka ŋeettan ma waakɛnda ɔci paktan ma waakɛnda.
Gena Kiṭɔ kieñi kiikan neeni, ɔci cuuññɛ ɛkɛ te ɔɔny, oŋ yeti te ñɔɔn galam bɛɛ, yeti te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tɛɛti, ɔci moki te kiikan guonanti bɛɛ, yeti te kiikan men baan yomɛti.
Ɔɔn balkɔn jwalla awarɛ te Kiṭɔ Juaŋ ñamɛti.
Ɔɔn yaakɔnti poŋɔn te genga te waak ɔɔn pookɔ aŋka noŋɔn kanŋa neeni bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti war tɛɛn ɔɔn bɛya te Juaŋti.

Gena ɛkɛ ɔɔn naŋŋɔn aŋka ɔɔn yaakɔnti kanŋa jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ wonkɛn neeniy. Oŋ yeti te jyek ganuun a kiigin bɛɛ, yeti te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan. Jyek ganuun jyeka a kiigin etti lieno, yeti Boŋ Juaŋ aŋka etti tɛɛtin.

Pɔy ganuun kiinɛ Juaŋ a kiin gwoyi ṭɔlgɛn ŋotkɛnti pɔya ñamu neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ eccin lieno. Yeti ɛkɛ balki pwani Juaŋ ne tolan. Ɔci pwanna neeni bala galdan Muuca ñingɛti ne tolan, ɔci ma Icrayiil yaakɛnti gɔrti Muuca woŋgɛti te wɔɔka wanna bɛɛ. Acaan pwanna neeni bala galdan ne yaajan ɛkkɛn ciɛrɛ ñingɛnti. Yeti te wɔɔka wannayɛ, pwanna neeni ati ooddi baadi doki,
pwani kanŋa Boŋ Juaŋ aŋka tol tol nɔñji.
Kan kanŋa jiek oldɛ ma wyetkɛnti ɛkɛ pwatcinyɛ, kanŋa etti yɔɔt neeni aŋka pwatcin ne tolan nɔñji.
Pwanna ñamu tolan neeniyɛ, kan ɛkɛ poortinti i pwani jyeka naŋŋa Juaŋ ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a genga moki bɛɛ. Ɛka ñamu neeni pwani ɛkɛ bala moki bɛɛ, bawwin doki.
Oŋ kan naŋka ñamu naŋka bawwin neeni balki pwani ne tolany, oŋ pwani jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ wonkɛn jyeka baadi bɛɛ neeni bala a ɔki? Pwanna neeni aŋka bala ñamu ne yaajan nɔñji.
Ne jyenna kɛɛyin ɔɔn baali ɔɔntiyɛ, ɔɔn waakɔ tɛɛcin ne tolan.
Ɔɔn balgɔn ba Muuca mena kwomi woŋgɛ te bworŋ aŋka naa ma Icrayiil pwanna ati ɔci bawwin neeni yuartan bɛɛ.

Oŋ yeti paŋi ɛkkɛnyɛ, aŋi wyeñ boojo, ɔci ne acca neeniti ɔɔnyɛ, kan jyek ganuun jyeka te baaṭi paktan mayɛ, ɛkkɛn men wyetkɛn niin a uulgin ba wyeña te baaṭi wanna ɔɔn, ɛkkɛn jyeka awarɛ neeni jitkɛn yuartan bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛn meni bala kwomi ñingɛn te bworŋa kwomki ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn te baaṭi bworŋa kɛki ɛkkɛn wanna meni ɔɔn. Yeti kan men jyeddi Yaccutiyɛ, ɛkɛ oŋ jyeka awarɛ neeni jitkɛn yuartɛji oŋo. Ɔci a ɔɔn bala ba bworŋa neeni warɛ uunnɛ ɔntɔ oŋo.
Ɔci acca men ɔɔnyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn pokki ganuun Muucayɛ, ɛkkɛn jiek jitkɛn yuartanji bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn men bala yomgɛn niin a uulgin bala ba ne bworŋa kwomki ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn wanna baali kɛki ɛkkɛn men ɔɔn.
Bala ba jyeka kiigin worga Juaŋji gɔki agi, “Muuca bworŋ uunnɛ ɔntɔ te woŋgɛti ne ɛkɛ warɛ yallɛ Ciɛggɔntiy.”
Accayɛ, “Ciɛggɔn” a Boŋ Juaŋo, ɔci ne Boŋ Ciɛggɔn baaliyɛ, ikin ḍɔɔggɔ wɔkɔ.
Ɔci ikin maka woŋgɛn a kwomgin te bworŋa neeni bɛɛyɛ, ikin balkin pwani Ciɛggɔn. Ɔci ikin waakɔ aaŋŋin balkin ba ɛkɛ te pwani ɛkɛ pwanna tolan pwanna bɛya te Ciɛggɔnti, mena a Boŋ Juaŋy.
A ɔŋŋi ne kanŋa neeni baali ɔɔnti te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɔɔn yaakɔnti poddɔn bɛɛ.

Ɔɔn kɛŋnɔn te lɔna niin lieda neeni bɛɛ, ɔci ɔɔn menga dieddɔn ñin bɛɛ, ɔci ɔɔn jomɔn jwali Juaŋ a jomi bɛɛ. Yeti ɔɔn buagɔn ciyɔn ne pwadan aŋka ŋeettan ma waakɛnda ɔɔn ciyɔn ba coodda naŋki Juaŋ naŋka awarɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ɔɔnti Juaŋ ñamɛtiy.
Yeti kan jwalla oonɔn ɔɔn neeni konɛ ḍiilcinyɛ, ɛkɛ konɛ ḍiilcin aŋa maka ati ooddi ḍakti neeniti pookɛn.
Jwaŋa Yaayan iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni maka jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ neeni uullɛ ñingɛnti aŋka naa ɛkkɛn nona dɛki te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin te pwani Kiṭɔ neeni yuartan bɛɛ. Kiṭɔ ɛkɛ bala ba bolji Jwaŋa Tolan.
Acaan ne ɔɔn loṭɔnyɛ, ɔɔn loṭɔn te gena Ciɛggɔn Yaccu, ga ɔɔn loṭɔn ma te waak ɔɔn woodgɔ bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn loṭɔn ka ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn, ɔci waak ɔɔn bala ba maka kanŋan ɛkkɛti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Acaan gena Jwaŋa Tolan waanɛ gɔki agi, “Dala nona dɛki dɛkti te miel jitin.” Gena ɛkɛ a Jwaŋa mañ ɛkɛ bala dɛki ɔɔn yomgɔti aŋka ɔɔn pwani Jwaŋa Tolan yuartɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ ñingɛtiy.
Yeti ɔɔn balkɔn waka ḍuaññɔn ɔɔn a wak booŋ te kullan a lop neeni. Ɛkkɛn nɔɔti a naŋka naŋŋɔn ɔɔn pwadan neeni, naŋŋɔn te waak ɔɔn pookɔ bɛɛ. Yeti naŋka neeni bɛɛn te Juaŋti.
Ɔɔn yomgɔ wiak te naŋki waakɛnda, yeti genga bɛɛn ɔɔn ḍɔɔggɔti bɛɛ. Ɔɔn waakɔ yiŋnɔn ñaalɔ, gena naŋdɔn ɔɔn gɛɛl yuartɔn bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn ponnɔn bɛɛ.
Ɔɔn naŋkɔn ma ne yaayan, yeti ɔɔn dalkɔn ma ɔntɔ bɛɛ. Ɔɔn yiɛpkɔn ma iñɔ, yeti ɔɔn nuonnɔn jitin bɛɛ.
Ma buagɔn noki ɔɔn budan bala ba lyena ɛkkɛn Yaccu nokkitiy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, tɛɛtin Yaccu daŋkun warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora waak ɔɔnti.
Acaan ɔɔn maka a tɛɛtan neeniyɛ, waakɔ ‘wondɔn lien oŋkanda te Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka tɛɛtin ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ɔɔn waakɔti daŋkun.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, lien bala ɔɔnti, yeti tɛɛtin aŋka bala ɛkkɛti.
Bala ba kiiwɛ ma agi, “‘Ya jyetto, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkcan.” Ɔɔn daŋkun jyettɔn te boŋ jyenna neeni, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn daŋkun gɔkɔn.
Çeejɔn ɔɔn Jwaŋa Tolan Mena Yaccu jɔɔŋnɛ ñaalɔ te lienti neeni, ɔɔn daŋkun luoldɔn ɛkɛ ñaalɔ iki Yaccu a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci ɔɔn oodɔn iki ɛkkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ ɛkɛ ñamɛti.
Naŋka neeni waakɛnda bala te ɛkkɛ aŋka yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan bala maka coŋinti, ɔci maka coŋin gɔkti a pwatcin, ɔci jieddi Juaŋo.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn poddɔn bɛɛ. Kan war ɔɔn wara bora neeni noŋi baadi dokiyɛ, ɛka jiju neeni aga ɛka woonɛ oŋkanda oŋkanda.
Acaan naŋka bala ikinti puaran ɔci baadi lakun neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ pwani ɔɔn ‘uottiti ne tolan. Naŋka bɛɛn ɔɔnti pɛñan neeni bwandɛ pwanna baadi bɛɛ neeni.

Ɔɔn gɔṭɔn waka yuartin te waakɛn neeni bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn gɔṭɔn waka yuartin te waakɛn bɛɛ neeniy. Acaan waka yuartɔn te waakɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a waka baadi lakun, yeti waka yuartin te waakɛn bɛɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a waka bala yuonginday.
Acaan ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ne daran ciyɔn ɔɔn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni neeni baadiyɛ, ɔɔn balkɔn ona parɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ona neeni cɔnnɛ menga te bieŋɛ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ baadi bɛɛ.
Ɔɔn ne ciyɔn te ona iñɔ neeniyɛ, ɔɔn joŋdɔn buagɔn ɛka ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni.
Ne ɔɔn kwomɔn ona neeni waakɔtiyɛ, ɔɔn coottɔn waakɔ budan moki bɛɛ.

Acaan ne ɔɔn men balgɔn te daran neenitiyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn joŋdɔn, ɔci ñokɔn jitkɔ acaan ɔɔn buagɔn coottɔn waakɔ budan bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn buagɔn ɛɛŋdɔn ɛka ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, wara a tuuta neeni laddɛ tɛɛtin.
Gena Juaŋ waanɛ ɔɔn ḍuaññɔn te gena neeniy. Ɛkɛ a mena ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn Boŋ Juaŋ bala ba juati waka ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛ ɔɔntiy.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ɔci ɔɔn yomgɔ tɛɛcin oŋkanda. Ne ɔɔn balgɔn ciyɔn te war ɔɔn war ma baan menyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn ɔntɔ ne loonan te Ciɛggɔnti.
Ɔɔn ciyɔn te jyenno, ga ɔɔn ciyɔn te ñali budan bɛɛ.
Ɔɔn yomgɔ tɛɛcin ɔci buagɔn ban ɔɔn daldɔn ɔci baldɔn ɔntɔ te waak ɔɔnti, yeti baldɔn iki Ciɛggɔn baanji.
A ɔŋŋi kan ɔɔn balgɔn baanji walla balgɔn ɔntɔyɛ, ɔɔn poŋɔn te yom pwani ɛkɛ.

Acaan ikin waakida waakɔ lɛɛltin bora non kaakci godan Yaccu ñamɛti, ɔci ikin waakida menga da yɔɔrdi gena yuardɛ ɛkɛ ba naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ wona ɛkɛ baali ciyɛ te war ma baan meny, kan a pwani walla yoñ kaapun no.
Acaan bwajja ɔɔn buayɔn Ciɛggɔn ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ne pwadanyɛ, ɔɔn yaakɔnti ma myettɔn ne pwadan. Juaŋ ɔɔn ŋeejɔn ne pwadan, ɔci ‘ya poŋ ɛkkɛ ‘ya ŋeejati yomgɔti daŋkun.
Ɔɔn jieyɔn waakɔ ɛkkɛti moki bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn noŋŋɔn a ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ waakɔ te ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti ṭwokti maka noŋi waakɛn te ma ñingɛn budan neeniti. Ɛkkɛn noŋi te yomgɛn bɛɛ.
Kan ɔɔn wilnɔnyɛ, ɔɔn wilnɔn te Jwaŋa Tolan. Kan ɔɔn aŋŋɔn wiilin bɛɛyɛ, ɔɔn aŋŋɔn wiilin bɛɛ te ɛkkɛ.
Acaan ani Kiṭɔ ɔɔn kɛɛyɔnyɔyɛ, naŋka neeni pagdɔn ɔɔn a kan mena ne cyɛɛlɔ tuun te maka coŋin waakɛndayɛ, a ɔŋŋi bala ba ma tuun waakɛnda daŋkun.
Ɔci ɛkɛ tuun te ma waakɛnda, a ɔŋŋi aŋka maka ciyi tɛɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ciyi tɛɛti te waak ɛkkɛn pookɛn moki bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn ciyi te mena tuun te ɛkkɛn ɔci jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ neeni.
A ɔŋŋi acca ɔci ne ñamu ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn menga ŋeejɔn ba paŋi ma baan bɛɛ. Kan ɔɔn Yaccu ŋeennɔn doki ba paŋi ma baanyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeejɔn ɔɔn acca ba paŋi ma baan moki bɛɛ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan menga bala Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi gena cɔnnɛ Juaŋ woonɛ. Bolja a daan ati bora doki, ɛka woonɛ aŋka bɛɛni.
Naŋka neeni waakɛnda bɛɛn te Juaŋti mena noŋŋin iki ikin ŋɛy te Yaccu Kiṭɔy. Ɛkɛ ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn kanŋa ŋeewin.
Juaŋ noŋi ŋɛy iki maka ṭɛɛrji wɛnni waakɛnda te Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɛkɛ poŋi te nɔji ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ jwali ŋeewin ḍuannɛ ɔɔnti.
A ɔŋŋi ɔɔn agɔn cuudan Yaccu. Ɔɔn gɔktɔn ɛkkɛti bala ba gena Kiṭɔ waanɛ gɔkti ɛkkɛti wanna ɔɔn. Ɔɔn gɔktɔn ɛkkɛti te yenti Yaccu ka dala ɛkkɛ ŋeedɛ i Juaŋo.
Yaccu mena baaki nɔji neeni naŋŋɛ Juaŋ aŋi nɔji te ikin. Oŋ te ñoowin ikin ñoowin iki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ikin ñootin iki ɛkɛ te pwani Juaŋo.
Te kanŋa ɔɔn i Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɔɔn toottɔn ɛkkɛti acaan dala yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan neeni naa mugdɛ ɛkkɛ te kona baaw budan bɛɛ.
Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki agi, “‘Ya ɛkkɛ tieŋnin te oŋŋa ‘ya yomu pɔŋna ɛkkɛtiy, ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛ maŋŋin te oŋ yɔɔto.” ‘Ya ɛkkɛ nɔɔttin, acca Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ! Ɔci acca gena oŋŋa Juaŋ yuoci ikin neeni!
Ɔɔn buagɔn kandɔn ne pwadan aŋka naa menga kanŋa ɔɔn yuartɛ a damgɔn bɛɛ, acaan ɔɔn buagɔn naa menga yɔddɔnyɔ ɔɔn te yuarŋa ɛkɛ Ciɛggɔn yuardɛ bɛɛ.
Dala ɔɔn waakɔ lɛɛldɔn bora te pɔyi waakɛnda ba kɛɛnk Juaŋ te tiit yomgɔ, ɔci te taabn, ɔci te naŋka pɛñan, ɔci te naŋka bɛya ɔɔnti ne yaayan,
ɔci te jyepto, ɔci te cigin, ɔci te ywobjo, ɔci te kanŋa pɛñan, ɔci te yuon ween konɛ, ɔci te koño,
ɔci te yoma giikkɛ baaw mati, ɔci te ŋeejin, ɔci te loomga tɛyan, ɔci te yoma pwadan, ɔci te Boŋ Juaŋo, ɔci te anna awarɛ,
ɔci te jyeka awarɛ, ɔci te war tɛɛn Juaŋo. Ɔɔn balkɔn naŋka pwadan bala ba byeŋgaaran ɔci kɔɔrñi ɔɔn kɛɛyɔn ɔɔn waakɔ ɔci noŋɔn ɔɔn ṭwaŋo.
Ma noŋi ɔɔnti ne pwadan, ɔci moki ɔɔn ñaltɔn a genga bɛɛ, ɔci ɔɔn ḍorkɔnyɔ ma, ɔci jiekɔn ma. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ɔɔn jomjɔn jieko, oŋ yeti ɔɔn gɔkɔn te jyeka awarɛ.
Ɔɔn balgɔn ba ne kuokɔnti ma ɔɔn, oŋ yeti ɔɔn ŋeeckɔn mako. Ɔɔn a tuutan, oŋ yeti ɔɔn tɛɛtɔn men.

Ɔɔn yomgɔ wiak ne tolan, oŋ yeti ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔyɔ oŋkanda. Ɔɔn aŋŋɔn ba maka bɔwan, oŋ yeti ɔɔn ma naŋŋɔn aŋi maka cyɛgan ne coŋɔn. Ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn ba balkɔnti waak bɛɛ, oŋ yeti ɔɔn balkɔn waak waakɛnda men ɔɔn.
Hay, ma Kuruntuc! Ɔɔn gɔŋnɔn ɛkkɛti ne pwadan doki, ɔci ɔɔn yomgɔ pɔŋnɔn ɛkkɛti.
Ɔɔn yomgɔ uullɔn ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ aŋka yomgɔ uullɛ ɔɔnti.
’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ba kɛɛgin ‘ya, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pɔktɛ ne tolan daŋkun!
Naa ɛkkɛ ñoodi i maka jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ neeni te naŋki ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Naŋka pwadan ñoodi i naŋka yaayan a ɔki? Ɔci nona bɔwan ñoodi i nona a miel a ɔki?
Kiṭɔ ñoodi i Jwaŋa Yaayanɛ? Ɔci mena jyeti Juaŋti ñoodi i mena ciyi budan te Jyek Juaŋɔ?

On Juaŋ ona tolan balkɔn jiek gɛɛg i jɔkin yeyin waka maltan ma budan nɛ? Ikin agin on Jwaŋa tɛɛti. Juaŋ gɔki agi, “‘Ya coocca ɛkkɛn jitin ɔci atca bootca ɛkkɛn jitin, ɔci ‘ya agdi Jwaŋ ɛkkɛn ɔci ɛkkɛn aga ma ‘ya.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ koodɛ bora te ɛkkɛnti ɔci ɛkkɛn daldɛ. Naa toptɛ gena yaayan gɛɛlti bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛ mugdin.
’Ya agdi Wey ɛkkɛ ɔci ɛkkɛ agdɛ kɛɛgin ‘ya kɛɛgin a ‘uay ɔci kɛɛgin a moongo. Gena Jwaŋa Yaakinti Naŋki Waakɛnda gɔki a ɔŋŋi neeniy.”
Maka ana ‘yay, ne jyeka ikin ḍuaññinti Juaŋ neeni balki ikintiyɛ, dala ikin waakɔ ywaŋtin te bora ne jiju. Ɔci dala ikin pwattin awarɛ te coodda ciyin ikin te bwajja ikin buayin Juaŋy.
Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pɔktɛ ɔɔnti, ɔɔn dommɔn naŋki mengati bɛɛ, ɔci ɔɔn menga yaaññɔn bɛɛ. Ɔɔn menga naŋŋɔn ñin bɛɛ.
’Ya gɔk a ɔŋŋi aŋka jiek dɔwwa ɛkkɛ wyetkɔti bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya gɔkkan te ñamu doki, ka ɛkkɛ balgɛ ɔɔn yomgɔti ne ikin tuutin a cyɛɛlɔ ɔɔn, ɔci ne ikin tɛɛttin a cyɛɛlɔ ɔɔn.
Ɛkkɛ ŋeejin ‘ya yomuti awarɛ. ‘Ya noŋ waru te ɛkkɛ ne tolan. ‘Ya waru wookkan te beelin ɔɔn warda. ‘Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan.
Acaan ne oŋŋa ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn ban Macɛdɔɔnya ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn waakɔ wooŋnɔn bɛɛ, yeti naŋka yeyin bɛɛn ɔɔnti nonk waakɛnda. Ma bala wɛyyɔn iki ɔɔn, ɔci ɔɔn buayɔn yomgɔti jiju.
Yeti Jwaŋa Tolan mena mwoni maka waakɛn dɔɔtan iñɔ yomgɛnyɛ, ɔɔn munnɔnji te bɛɛna bɛɛni Titucy.

Yeti te bɛɛn ɛkɛ parɛ budan bɛɛ, yeti te yom pwani te ɛkkɛti. Ɛkɛ ɔɔn myennɔn te yom yoñ ɛkkɛ, ɔci kuut ɛkkɛ moki, ɔci te bwakta ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘ya ne tolany. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, yom ñɔɔn ‘ya nɔñji ciɛñjin ñamu ne tolan.

Kan ‘ya ɛkkɛ yaaññin yomgɔti te worgan cuoññan ‘yayɛ, ‘ya yomu wiakcin bɛɛ. Ɛɛ, ‘ya yomu wiakcin te naŋka neeni ne ḍiɛran, acaan yuarcan ‘ya worgan wanna ɛkkɛ yaakɛ yomgɔti ba wɔɔka ne ḍuulan budan.

’Ya yomu ñɔɔcin acca men ɔɔn, yeti ‘ya yomu ñɔɔcin acaan ɛkkɛ yomgɔ wiakcin bɛɛ, yeti acaan yom joon ɛkkɛ neeni ɛkkɛ wɛɛññɛ ɔci ɛkkɛ waakɔ yallɛ. Acaan ɛkkɛ yomgɔ wiakcin ne pɛñan ba bolja Jwaŋa Tolan buagɛy, ɔci ga ɛkkɛ yaakɛ ɔɔn te genga bɛɛ.
Yom joona ba naŋki Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ etti yali waakɔ, yalla ikin wɛɛtin yɔɔta ikin yɔɔtinti Juaŋ ɔci ɛkɛ etti yom joon bɛɛ. Yeti yom joona iñɔ baanji wɛnni ɛkɛ etti lieno.

Gɔrtɛ Juaŋ noŋi gena te yom yoñ ɛkkɛ neeni. Ɛkɛ eccin war byerŋ ɛkkɛti, ɔci eccin bwakti aŋka pwani ɛkkɛ cwamdɛ, ɔci eccin loñko, ɔci bwajjo, ɔci war mwordin, ɔci ani kanŋa. Ɔci eccin jyek wani te naŋka a damgin neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛ waakɔ lɛɛlnɛ bora aŋka ŋeettan ma ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔ wɔkɔ te naŋka neeniti warda.
Ne ‘ya kiena worga ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ‘ya kiewan te mena noŋi nɔji wanna bɛɛ, ɔci walla te mena naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ne yaayan wanna bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya kieñi te gwalla gɔṭɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛ ne tolan neeni Ciɛggɔn ñamɛti.
’Wota te naŋka neeniyɛ, ɔɔn yomgɔ tɛɛn te yom pwani ɛkkɛ, yeti ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔn nɔñji te yom ñɔɔn Tituc, acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ luun ɛkkɛti waakida.

Ne wona ɛkɛ luoṭṭi te ‘yati wɛnni men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ nɔɔtkɛn ‘ya te naŋka noŋa ‘ya waru te ɛkkɛy, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘ya poollati yomuti. ‘Ya ɛkkɛ myennin te naŋka awarɛ oŋkanda, ɔci acca naŋka noŋa ‘ya waru te Titucyɛ, aŋi naŋka awarɛ.
Ɛkɛ ani ɛkkɛ ne tolan ne ɛkɛ poŋdi te naŋka ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba jyek ɛkɛ ɔci te muŋŋa ɛkkɛ jyek ɛkɛ muŋŋɛ te yoma pwadan yom bwaji ɔci war ḍiediny.
Acca ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. ‘Ya ɛkkɛ ŋeennin ne pwadan.
Acca modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn buagɔn dala yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan yom pwani ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ ma kaniican ban Macɛdɔɔnya pwadan neeniyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ.
Ɛkkɛn bala pɔɔt jitin, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔni. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔcin ne tolan ɔci bala ‘woñi waak te yoma pwadan ne ɛkkɛn akki maka bɔwan ɔɔn.
Gena ŋeej ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn yaaŋnɛti ḍɔccin ba waka bala ɛkkɛnti. Ɛkkɛn yaaŋnɛti naŋka neeni ɔci ‘uotkiti te yomg ɛkkɛn.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin ɔɔnti oŋkɛn ne coŋɔn te maŋŋa mokɔn Ma Kiṭɔ ban Yahuudiyay.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ne tolan nɔñji naŋka paŋdɔn ɔɔn ‘yeeyɛyɔ, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn waakɛn ‘woñgi Ciɛggɔn ñamu lakun, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn ‘woñkɔn ɔɔn moki te yom pwani Juaŋo.
A ɔŋŋi ɔɔn toonnɔn Titucti ka dala ɛkɛ kanŋa neeni cwamdɛ bala ba ne ɛkɛ jɔɔnni te kanŋa yom pwani neeni.
Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka cyɛgan te waak waakɛnda. Gena jyeni, ɔci jiek, ɔci ŋeejin, ɔci war byerŋ, ɔci anna anɛ ɛkkɛ ɔɔny. Ɔci a ɔŋŋi ɔɔn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ bwagdɛ kanŋa yom pwani Juaŋ neeni ne tolan.
’Ya ‘yer ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya buaga ani ɛkkɛ poorcati i war byerŋ maka pookɛn aŋka gɔrca ne ani ɛkkɛ agi warɛ boki no.
Acaan naŋki yom pwani Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ, ɛkɛ a mena cyɛgan, yeti ɛkɛ warɛ naŋŋɛ bɔɔn te ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka cyɛgan te bɔɔn ɛkɛ neeni.

Paŋi ‘yayɛ, bala a ɔŋŋi, dala kanŋa jɔɔnni ɛkkɛ ywoniti neeni cwamdɛ. Gena ɛkkɛ a maka jɔɔtcin te kanŋa neeniy. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ kanŋa neeni te yom ñɔɔn ɛkkɛ buagɛ noŋɛ kanŋa neeni ba bolja ɛkkɛ jɔɔnnɛ wanna ɔɔn.
Accayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ kanŋa cwamdɛ aŋka bwakta yomg ɛkkɛ buagi noŋi kanŋa neeni ḍɔtti ne pwadan ne ɛkkɛ kanŋa naŋdiy. Dala ɛkkɛ menga da ‘woñi ba gena bala ɛkɛtiy.
Kan ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘woññɛyɛ, Juaŋ waka ‘woññɛ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, mugdɛ te waka ‘woññɛ ɛkkɛ neeniti, ga te waka baaw ɛkkɛti neeniti bɛɛ.
’Ya buaga maka pookɛn woodi ɔci ɛkkɛ aŋka taabdɛ bɛɛ, yeti ne ɛkkɛ balkɛ waak ne coŋɔn te waka neeniyɛ, dala te ɛkkɛ maka baaki waak neeni maŋŋɛ.
Ne ɛkkɛ baakɛti waak, ɔci ɛkkɛn balkiti waak ne coŋɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ maktɛ. Te naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ poṭṭɛ a poṭṭin.
Bala ba jyeka a kiigin worga Jwaŋa Tolanji ne gɔkki agi, “Mena lyemi ne coŋɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ balki ne coŋɔn nɔñji bɛɛ. Ɔci mena lyemi ne ḍiɛkanyɛ, ɛkɛ balki ne ḍiɛkan nɔñji moki bɛɛ.”
’Ya gɔk a pwatcin Juaŋti acaan ɛkɛ Tituc ‘wonnɛ bwakti bala ba ne ɔɔn buagɔnti mokɔn ɛkkɛy.
Acaan ɛkɛ jyeti jyeka ɔɔn toonnɔn ɛkkɛti pookɛn bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ buagɔn moki ɛkkɛ te yom ɛkɛ parɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ ḍyɛŋŋɛ aŋka bɛya ɛkkɛti aŋan.
Ɔci ɔɔn menga cuonnɔn i ɛkɛ. Mena neeni kaniican kanŋi ɛkɛyɛ, yomgɛn ñɔɔna a ñɔɔn ɛkɛti te lali ɛkɛ te jyeka wonkɛn.
Awarɛ, ‘wana neeni mwowwɛ kaniican bora aŋka atɔn i ɔɔn noŋɔn kanŋa ani neeni, ɔci naŋka neeni a pwani Ciɛggɔn, ɔci nɔɔti te bwakta ɔɔn buagɔnti mokɔn ɛkkɛy.
Ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn tiecɔn woŋgɔ aŋka naa jwalla yaayan gɛɛl bɛya te kanŋa ‘woññin ne coŋɔn kanŋa bala ɔɔn byeŋkɔti neeni bɛɛ.
Acaan gena ɔɔn buagɔn naŋdɔnyɛ, ɔɔn buagɔn noŋdɔn naŋka pwadin Juaŋ ñamɛti parɛ bɛɛ, yeti ma baan ñomgɛnti daŋkun.
Mod ɔɔn cuonnɔn ɔɔn i ɛkkɛn. Ɔɔn ɛkɛ pɔɔññɔn oŋki ne coŋɔn, ɔci yuarŋɔn ɔɔn ɛkɛ yomɛ buagɔn moki ma.
Ɔci Titucyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena ñoowin i ‘ya te kanŋa te ɛkkɛ ɔci maka a modg ikin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka cuntan kaniican, ɔci noŋi ba jyek Kiṭɔ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ani ɛkkɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ‘uaya neeniti a ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkkɛn, ɔci dala kaniican gɔrti ani ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn nɔɔttɛ ɔɔn jieyɔn waakɔ te ɛkkɛ awarɛ.
Te waka cuuññɛ ɛkkɛ wanna ‘ya balka gen gɛɛl aŋka ‘ya ɛkkɛ kiegdin worga te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.

Acaan bwakta ɛkkɛ buagɛ moki mayɛ, ŋeej ‘ya, ɔci ‘ya noŋ waru te ɛkkɛ ma Macɛdɔɔnyati, ɔci ‘ya gɔkcan agi ɛkkɛ ma Akeeyayɛ, waakɔ ywaŋŋɛ te ywonna ati waayi doki, ɔci bwakta ɛkkɛ buagɛ neeniyɛ, magga ṭyɛllɛyɔ te ɛkkɛnti.
Acca ‘ya modg ɔɔn cuoñña aŋka naa jiɛta jieyin ɔɔn waakɔ te ɛkkɛ neeni koodi bora aga jyeka budan bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti bala ba guaŋi ‘ya doki, dala waak ɛkkɛ nina a ywaŋgɔn te jyek moowin.
’Ya buay kan ma Macɛdɔɔnya gɛɛg bɛɛdin i ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ woottɛ ɛkkɛn waakɔ a ywaŋgɔn bɛɛyɛ, ɔɔn nogdɔn lɔɔno, ɔci gɔktɔn te lɔn ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ, acaan yomg ɔɔn ḍuannɔnti ɛkkɛti doki.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, modg ɔɔn gɛɛg cuoññan ‘ya ñamu ɛkkɛti aŋka gɔrti waka limmɛ ɛkkɛ ne baali ḍaaŋŋɛ te limi ba jwalla ḍuaññɛ ɛkkɛy, acaan ‘ya buaga ‘woññin ɛkkɛ neeni aga ‘woññin awarɛ, naa aga ‘woññin mwaji bɛɛ.
Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, mena duodi pok ne ḍiɛkanyɛ, ɛkɛ yɔɔrdi ne ḍiɛkan daŋkun, ɔci mena duodi ne coŋɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ yɔɔrdi ne coŋɔn daŋkun.
Dala men da ‘woñi ba yom ɛkɛ. Naa ɛkɛ ‘woñi te yoma baaw bɛɛ, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ ñɔɔcin te mena ‘woñi te yoma pwadany.
Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan yaakinti ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛti pwani ɛkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ baltɛ waka ɛkkɛ yɔɔmti oŋkanda ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛti waak ne coŋɔn nɔñji waakɛnda te naŋka pwadan.
Bala ba jyeka kiigin worga Juaŋji gɔki agi, “Mena pwadanyɛ, ɛkɛ maka bɔwan ‘wonnɛ waako, ɔci naŋki pwani ɛkɛ bala yuonginda ɔɔn.”

Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan mena ‘woñi kookin dɔktan ma, ɔci ‘woñi ma te oomdin, aŋka amtan ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ daŋkun ‘wondɛ kookin ɛkkɛ buagɛ waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn yuoldɛ ñaalɔ ɔci ‘wondɛ ḍɔŋo, ɔci jieda ne pwadan te wak ɛkkɛ waka ‘wonnɛ ɛkkɛ ne coŋɔn neeni.
Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ agdɛ maka cyɛgan te waak waakɛnda, ɔci maka coŋin gɔkti Juaŋti a pwatcin te waka ‘wonnɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn, ɔci luulɛ ɛkkɛn te ɔɔnti neeni.
Acaan naŋki moowin neeniyɛ, maka pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti yɔɔmtan pookɛn bɛɛ, yeti ciɛndi ñamu te jwali pwani Juaŋti, gɔ moki ciɛñji ɔɔn.

Acaan ɛkkɛ waakɔ lɛɛlnɛ bora te kanŋa neeniyɛ, ma waakɛnda gɔkti a pwatcin Juaŋti te jyeni ɛkkɛ, ɔci te naŋka ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadiny, ɔci moki te waka ‘wonnɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn, ɔci ma waakɛnda mokiy.
Ne ɛkkɛn balki cɔkki te ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn ani ɛkkɛ ne tolan te yom pwani ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan neeniy.
Pwatcin ne tolan Juaŋti te ‘woññin ɛkɛ ‘woññin tolan ne yaajan neeni.
Gena ‘ya Buuluc toocca ɛkkɛti te war ‘ya. ‘Ya a mena gɔk ɛkkɛti ka ‘ya waru dɔwwa iñɔ ne ‘ya balgin iki ɛkkɛy, ɔci ‘ya waru koobba ñaalɔ ne ‘ya baawa ɛkkɛtiy.

’Ya toocca ɛkkɛti te yom pwani Kiṭɔ, aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘ya tindati wyeñu yaaya ne ‘ya bɛɛda aŋan bɛɛy. Çeej ‘ya ne pwadan ma gɛɛg gɔki agi ɔɔn noŋjɔn ba naŋka iñɔ baanji wɛnni neeni. ‘Ya noŋdin iki ɛkkɛn ne yaayan.
Ikin ciyin iñɔ baanji wɛnni awarɛ, yeti ikin noŋin ṭwaŋ te wara ṭɛɛrji baanji wɛnni bɛɛ.
Waka noŋin ikin ṭwaŋ neeni a waka iñɔ baanji wɛnni bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn a wak war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan. Ikin noŋin ṭwaŋ te ɛkkɛn. Ikin nonka tɛyan yaatin iki tyewwin jyeka a jomgin nuutin jitin.
Naŋki waakɔ naŋka kooki ŋeejin ma Juaŋ ŋeettiti neeni oortin iñɔ. Paŋi waakɛnda muktinyɔ ɔci naŋtin tieŋdi jyek Kiṭɔ.
Ɔci ne naŋka ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba jyek Kiṭɔ neeni cwamnɛ ɛkkɛ dokiyɛ, ɔɔn waakɔ ywaŋŋɔn doki aŋka jiek oldɔn maka bɛɛyi jiek neeni wyetkɛnti.
Ɛkkɛ gɔṭɛ waka niin te waaka bora neeni. Menga bala poŋi te war ɛkɛ, a ɛkɛ a men Kiṭɔ? Pwatcin, dala ɛkɛ poŋdi moki te war ɛkɛ, acaan ɔɔn daŋkun agɔn Ma Kiṭɔ ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
Kan ‘ya noŋ waru ne tolan te jyeka ɔɔn ‘wonnɔnti Ciɛggɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ kooptɛ ɔɔn ñaalɔ neeniyɛ, ‘ya waru a lɔɔn te naŋka wanna bɛɛ. Ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn ɛkɛ jyeka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ jietɛ ma jitin bɛɛ.
’Ya buaga naa bala ba ne ‘ya kiewa worgan neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ poddɛ bɛɛ.
Menga kɔŋji gɔkti agi, “Worgan Buuluc jiekɛn pɛñɔ ɔci tɛɛcin, yeti ne ɛkɛ balgin iki ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ tɛɛcin bɛɛ, ɔci jyek ɛkɛ a genga bɛɛ.”
Mena gɔki a ɔɔn wannayɛ, dala ɛkɛ ñingɛ ñiektɛ te waka kiidɔn ɔɔn te worgan ne ɔɔn longɔn ɔntɔ, ɔci te waka naŋdɔn ɔɔn ne ɔɔn balgɔn ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ, a kɛɛptin bɛɛ.

Ɔɔn poṭṭɔn waak ɔɔn ɔci walla balgɔn ba maka noŋi waakɛn oltan ñamu wanna bɛɛ. Poca gɔrtɛ! Wyeñ booj ɛkkɛn bala a ɔki. Ɛkkɛn waakɛn kooptan ñaalɔ pookɛn, waakɛn poortanti pookɛn te bolja bala ɛkkɛntiy.
Oŋ yeti ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn noŋɔn waakɔ te gena loonan te kanŋa ɔɔnti bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn ningɔn te kanŋa Juaŋ ɔɔn ‘wonnɔnti naŋdɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛti, ɔci nona yɔɔnnɔn ɔɔn te kanŋa ɔɔn ‘wonnɔnti Juaŋy.
Ne ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn ɛkkɛtiyɛ, naŋki wari ɔɔn ati ne loonan ‘yeeccin bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn dɛnnɔn ɛkkɛti te jyek Kiṭɔ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn noŋdɔn waakɔ te kanŋa naŋɛ maka pookɛn ‘yeettɔn bora te nona yɔɔnnɛ Juaŋ aŋka naŋdɔn ɔɔn neeni bɛɛ. Yeti ɔɔn poŋɔn ka jyeni ɛkkɛ ‘uotti ñamu, ɔci ɔɔn yaaktɔnti noŋdɔn kanŋa tolan ɛkkɛti oŋkanda te nona ɔɔn yɔɔnnɔnti Juaŋtiy.
Ɔci ɔɔn jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin eedɔn bonka lonin ban ɛkkɛ ŋoyɛti aŋan aŋka naa ɔɔn noŋdɔn waakɔ te kanŋa naŋɛ maka pookɛn te jyeka lali ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
Bala ba jyeka a kiigin worga Juaŋji ne gɔkki agi, “Kan mena buagɔn noŋi warɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi warɛ te naŋka naŋŋi Juaŋy.”
Ciɛggɔn poŋi te mena maŋdɛ ɛkɛy, oŋ yeti ɛkɛ poŋi te mena mooŋi war ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ.
’Ya poŋ ka dala te ɛkkɛ ‘ya bɔɔŋnata te jwali ṭɔɔlɛ owwan ‘ya bora te wyeñ booj neeni, dala ɛkkɛ ‘ya bɔɔktatɛ.
’Ya yomu tolcin ne tolan te ɛkkɛ bala ba Juaŋ yomɛ toli te ɛkkɛy. Ɛkkɛ ḍuaññin ‘ya te jwali te ‘uan ne cyɛɛlɔ, gena Kiṭɔ aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wondin ɛkɛ ba ṭɔla pwadan.
’Ya buay dita ɛkkɛ ñomgɔ yaldɛ ɔntɔ te naŋka awarɛti, ɔci te ani Kiṭɔti ba Awwa ne dienni ñin kaaŋ te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛy.

Kan magga bɛɛn ɛkkɛti ɔci ɛkkɛ lalkɛ te pɔya parɛ gɛɛl te Yaccu bala ba pɔya ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn wanna bɛɛyɛ, ɔci moki kan ɛkkɛ mwokkɛ boŋa parɛ gɛɛl te ɛka muŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ te ɔɔnti ɔci kan ɛkkɛ mwokkɛ jwalla parɛ gɛɛl te jwalla muŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ te ɔɔntiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ doki jyeka neeni mugdɛ ne byeran ɔɔn.
Oŋ yeti ‘ya poŋ ka ‘ya a mena ḍiɛran te kanŋa te maka boṭi waakɛn agi ɛkkɛn aginti “cuudan Yaccu” neeni bɛɛ.
’Ya urkati jiek ne tolan bɛɛ, yeti awarɛ ‘ya waak ŋeejo. Waka neeni jitkɛn lɛɛlnɔn ɔɔn bora korkɛn ne wɔkɔn oŋki waakɛnda.
’Ya waru dɔwwan iñɔ aŋka ɛkkɛ koobdin ñaalɔ te jyek Juaŋ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin budan. ‘Ya buaga genga te ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Oŋ naŋka neeni dami ‘ya?
Ne ‘ya baala kanŋa ɛkkɛtiyɛ, kaniican pookɛn bala moki ‘ya. ‘Ya baal ec wak ɛkkɛn ne coŋɔn aŋka ‘ya gɔk jiek mok ɛkkɛ.

Ne ‘ya baala ciyin iki ɛkkɛyɛ, ‘ya tooccan ɛkkɛti te genga ne ‘ya buagati bɛɛ. Ma ban Macɛdɔɔnya waka ‘ya buagatiyɛ, ḍuaccɛ ɛkkɛn. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya waru tiekan te oljin waka cyɛgan olda ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti, ɔci naŋka neeni tieka ‘ya oŋkanda ɔɔn.
Naŋki Kiṭɔ naŋka awarɛ, naŋka bala ‘yati neeniyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ ḍuadin te jwali ka naŋka noŋa ‘ya waru neeni ḍieptɛ iñɔ menga ban Akeeya aŋan bɛɛ.
’Ya gɔk a ɔŋŋi acaan ‘ya yooka te ɛkkɛ? A’a, ŋeejɛ Juaŋ ‘ya an ɛkkɛ.
’Ya kanja budan te bilk ba kanŋa kanŋa ‘ya acca neeni ɔɔn aŋka maka noŋi waakɛn agi ɛkkɛn balginti ba ɔɔn neeni yɔddiyɔ te naŋki waakɛn.
’Uaya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a cuudan Yaccu awarɛ bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn a cuudan jomi jieko, ɔci a maka jomi jiek te kanŋan ɛkkɛn, ɔci noŋi waakɛn ba ɛkkɛn akki cuudan Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.
Ikin waakɔ potti iñɔ te naŋka neeni bɛɛ! Acaan Jwaŋa Yaayan daŋkun warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora bala ba malɛɛka nona dɛkiy.

A ɔŋŋi ikin korkɔ buaya noon bɛɛ, acaan kɛɛnk jwaŋa yaayan neeni daŋkun waakɛn lɛɛltan bora noŋi bala ba ɛkkɛn akki kɛɛnk Jwaŋa Tolan ɔɔn. Yeti ne ŋoyɔyɛ, jiek dɔɔkti ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti ba naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin neeni waakɛnda.
’Ya gɔk moki, naa menga poŋdi ‘ya a aamma bɛɛ. Dala ‘ya mugdata kan ‘ya a aamma ɔɔn, aŋka ‘ya jiejja waru ne ḍiɛran.
Te naŋki ‘ya waru paru neeniyɛ, ‘ya gɔk ba jyeka buagi Juaŋ bɛɛ, oŋ yeti ‘ya gɔk ba jyek wyeñ booj awarɛ.
Acaan maka coŋin maka noŋi ba naŋka baan konɛti, noŋi waakɛn agi ɛkkɛn pwadgintiyɛ, ‘ya daŋkun noŋja waru ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
Ɛkkɛ woodgɔyɛ, wyetkɔ pwadɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛ maka wyetkɛn baaw muŋŋɛ te yoma pwadan.

Ne ma balki noŋki ɛkkɛ a kɛɛnkyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ gɔktɛ genga bɛɛ, ɔci ne ma noŋki ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ gɔktɛ genga bɛɛ, ɔci ne ɛkkɛ kantɛ ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋki waakɛn ɛkkɛti ɔci jiepki ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔŋnɛ genga ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.

Ɔɔn waakɔ aŋi lɔɔn acaan ɔɔn noŋŋɔn ba naŋka naŋɛ maka pookɛn wanna bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti kan mena balkɔn war tɛɛn acaan gɔkti te pwani war ɛkɛyɛ, ‘ya da balka yoma tɛyan aŋka gɔkca te pwani war ‘ya, ɔci jyeka guagdi ‘ya neeniyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya a jyek wyeñ boojo.
Kan ɛkkɛn a ma Ibrunyɛ, ‘ya da baal a ɔɔn. Ɔci kan a ma Icrayiilyɛ, ‘ya da baal a ɔɔn moki. Ɔci kan a kɛɛn Abrahimyɛ, ‘ya da baal a ɔɔn moki.

Kan ɛkkɛn a maka kanŋan Yaccutiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk ba mena wyeñɛ baawo, oŋ yeti ‘ya kanŋ ne pwadan te ɛkkɛn, ‘ya baal kanŋ ne pɛñan, ɔci kanŋa ɛkkɛn buannɛ kanŋa ‘ya. Ɔci ‘ya cien ciginji oŋki ne coŋɔn te ɛkkɛn ‘wota. Ɔci ‘ya ḍuaka ma oŋki ne coŋɔn ɛkkɛn buanno, ɔci ‘ya baal lien tukɛti oŋki ne coŋɔn ɛkkɛn buanno.
Ɔci ‘ya ḍuaka ma Yahuud oŋki ne dɔɔyɔ woong tuggɛn a men baan mena parɛ byeŋkɛ ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (39).

Ɔci ‘ya jiepka ma Ḍɔɔm oŋki ne ḍoogɔ te gɔlko. Ɔci yepka te gwoyi oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci ‘ya lɛŋna murka tolan Galŋa Tolanji oŋki ne ḍoogɔ, ɔci ‘ya oŋ konɛ ɔci ween konɛ noŋi te tɔɔn pieg wyetkɛnti ne murka lɛɛŋniy.

Wodin ata ‘ya korkɛn ne coŋɔnyɛ, ‘ya koogjin i naŋka yeyin pwatcin bɛɛ, noŋ eeda toolo, ɔci noŋ kalta ɛɛjan, ɔci ma Yahuud noŋi ne yaayan ɔci Keedin Pookɛn noŋi ne yaayan ‘yati moki. Ma bonka ḍwaŋin noŋi ne yaayan ‘yati, ɔci ne ‘ya baala luom jitin naŋka yaayan bɛɛn moki, ɔci ne baala toolji, ‘ya yɔṭi naŋka yaayan, ɔci munga jomi jiek bala noŋi ne yaayan ‘yati moki.
Ɔci oŋki ne coŋɔn ‘ya woŋgu dɛtkan nink baaw acaan te kanŋan coŋin, ɔci amma koñ ɔci yiɛno. Ɔci waka amdi ‘ya baaw oŋki ne coŋɔn, ɔci moki noŋŋa jwami, ɔci baaka bworŋin.
Te naŋka bala bɛɛn ‘ya waruti coŋin neeni toŋkɛntiyɛ, ñalla ñoṭa ‘ya kaniican waakɛnda neeniyɛ, cyɛŋi ‘yati.
Kan men gɛɛl warɛ koocinyɛ, ‘ya da waru koya ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn bɛɛ? Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ḍɛmdi nɔji jitiny, ‘ya yoma yaayɛ te ɛkɛ bɛɛ?
Kan ‘ya buaga gɔkca te war ‘yayɛ, ‘ya gɔkca te waka waakɛn lɛɛllɛ bora te war koñi ‘yay.
Jwaŋa Tolan Wey Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu mena maltin ikin yuonginda neeniyɛ, ‘ya ŋeeja ‘ya jom jiek bɛɛ.
Ḍuaŋ ṭɔɔlɛ ḍuannɛ Ariitac ḍuaŋa tolan ban Ḍimaacka neeniyɛ, gɔkcin bɔlin kɛɛyi ‘yegin tuggɛn ban Ḍimaackati aŋka ‘ya muktayɔ.
Oŋ yeti ‘ya ḍuacka ma guppaji, ɔci guppa wiɛnɛ ma te wyenti, ɔci ‘ya luotka ma bora te kaañ waŋɛ, ɔci boottan kaañ warɛti ne iñɔ aŋka ‘ya unna te byeŋ ɛkɛti neeni.
Dala ‘ya noŋja waru. Yeti ‘ya yɔɔra genga te naŋka neeniti bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te loggin ɔci te waka ‘ya lɛɛrnati Ciɛggɔny.
Çeej ‘ya te yuonga ati a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ waayiyɛ, ‘ya eñña Juaŋ ñaalɔ pɔli jiña loonan, yeti kan ‘ya baal ciy te war ma baan walla wara baawyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ, ŋeejɛ gena Juaŋ parɛ.
Çeej ‘ya ‘ya eñña Juaŋ ñaalɔ ban Jwaŋa Tolan te waro, walla kan te war bɛɛyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ, ŋeejɛ gena Juaŋ parɛ.
Ɔci aŋanyɛ, ‘ya tieŋjan waka ma yaakinti guaktan bɛɛy, waka neeni Juaŋ dɛyi ma aŋka guaktan ma bɛɛ.
’Ya jiejja waru te war ‘ya, yeti ‘ya jiejja waru paru bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya noŋja waru te gena war koñi ‘ya.

Kan te ‘ya noŋja waruyɛ, ‘ya baldi ba mena wyeñɛ baaw bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya gɔk te jyeka awarɛ. Yeti ‘ya noŋja waru bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya buaga naa menga poŋdi ne tolan te ‘ya nɔñji te waka yuartɛ ɛkɛ ɔci tieŋdi ɛkɛ te ‘yati neeni bɛɛ.
Aŋka naa ‘ya noŋja waru te waka waakɛn lɛɛllɛ bora coŋin neeni bɛɛyɛ, Juaŋ ‘ya ‘wonna kuun waruti bala ba mena cundɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan, aŋka ñoki ‘ya kono, ɔci ‘ya dɛɛda te naŋki waru.
’Ya wiakcan Juaŋti oŋki ne ḍoogɔ ka dala ɛkɛ naŋka neeni eedɛ ɔntɔ te ‘yati.
Yeti ɛkɛ ṭwokkin ‘yati agi, “A’a, yom pwani ‘ya i yɔɔmdi, acaan war tɛɛn ‘ya warɛ cwamdɛ te war koñño.” Ya yomu ñɔɔcin acaan ‘ya noŋ waru te war koñi ‘ya aŋka war tɛɛn Kiṭɔ bɛya ‘yati.

’Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te war koñi, ɔci te ŋɛɛgga ḍorki ma ‘ya, ɔci te yaata yoocki ma ‘ya, ɔci te naŋka noŋki ma ‘ya ne yaayan, ɔci te tiñña ‘ya tiñkati ma ñaalɔ te Kiṭɔy. Acaan ne ‘ya waru koyiyɛ, ‘ya waru tɛɛcin dɔki.

Gena ɛkkɛ ‘ya olnatɛ noŋjan ba mena wyeñɛ baawy. Acaan gena te ɛkkɛ aŋka jieddɛ jiek te ‘yay, ga te ‘ya jiejja jiek te war ‘ya paru bɛɛ. Acaan ‘ya buanka cuudan pookɛn neeni te genga bɛɛ, kan ne ‘ya aga genga baaw ɔɔny.

Ne ‘ya baala aŋanyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ lɛɛrnin naŋki mena a cuuda waakɛnda. ‘Ya cuonna Juaŋ waanɛ ɛkkɛti. ‘Ya yomu tiekan, ɔci noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma war tɛɛn Juaŋ ne coŋɔn, ɔci liɛlgin ɔci war tɛɛn kanŋa ɛkkɛti.
Ɛkkɛ buankɛ kaniican pookɛn te genga? A’a, yeti gena ŋeej ‘yayɛ, ‘ya tooccan ɛkkɛti te jyek maŋi te genga te kanŋa ‘ya neeni bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ‘ya bɔɔktatɛ te naŋka neeni.

Gena oŋŋa akti ḍoogɔ neeni, ‘ya waru ywaŋi doki aŋka ‘ya bɛɛd ɛkkɛti, ɔci ‘ya agdi gena cyɛgan ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti bɛɛ, ‘ya lier ɛkkɛ woodgɔ. ‘Ya lier waka bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Gena kɛɛgin weyyɛn ɔci mɛyyɛn aŋka kɛɛgin ‘wontan waaky. Kɛɛgin yaakinti weyyɛn ɔci mɛyyɛn ‘wontan waak bɛɛ.
Yeti ‘yayɛ, wak ‘ya ‘uaccanyɔ te ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ magdin. Kan ‘ya an ɛkkɛ ne tolany, ɛkkɛ andɛ ‘ya ne ḍiɛran?
Yeti ŋeej ‘ya magga te ɛkkɛti poŋi agi, ɛɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi gena cyɛgan ikinti te genga bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ noŋi ikinti te ñing tɛɛno.
’Ya yomu toli te genga te maka cuoññan ‘ya ɛkkɛti wanna?
’Ya ‘yercan Titucti ka dala ɛkɛ ooddi, ɔci mena a mod ikin neeni cuoññan iki ɛkɛ. Tituc yomɛ toli te genga ɛkkɛtɛ? Ɔɔn kanŋɔn te boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ? Ɔɔn atɔn te ciya ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ?
Ɛkkɛ balgɛ poŋɛ a ɔɔn yuocɔn waakɔ ɛkkɛ ñomgɔtɛ? A’a, ɔɔn gɔkɔn Juaŋ ñamɛti te Kiṭɔ. Yeti naŋka neeni waakɛnda naŋŋɔn ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu hay, maka ana ‘yay.

Acaan ‘ya buay ne ‘ya bɛɛda ḍieŋda ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dita ɛkkɛ mɔktin ciyɛ ba coodda buagati ‘ya neeni bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ, dita, ‘ya yuartata ba bolja ɛkkɛ buagɛ bɛɛ. Dita naŋka neeni aŋka bala, gena wɛɛdin, ɔci kon moni, ɔci loñko, ɔci ani waakɔ, ɔci jomtan jieko, ɔci lɔɔrin yɔtin, ɔci jiɛt waakɔ, ɔci naŋka amaamo.

Ɛɛ, ‘ya buay acaan ne ‘ya bɛɛda moki ɛkkɛtiyɛ, Juaŋ ‘ya dɔɔda iñɔ ɛkkɛ ñomgɔti kaapun, ɔci ‘ya yomu wiakti te maka noŋi nɔji te ñamu, ɔci waakɛn yali te naŋka naŋɛ ɛkkɛn yaayan, ɔci tomi, ɔci wɛlja naŋɛ ɛkkɛn wanna bɛɛ neeni kaapun.
Oŋŋa bɛɛda ‘ya ɛkkɛti acca neeni gena oŋŋa akki ne ḍoogɔ. Jyeka a kiigin worga Juaŋti gɔki agi, “Jiek waakɛnda aga jyeka awarɛ te tuk maka ne yyɛɛwɔ, walla te tuk maka ne ḍoogɔ.”

’Ya gɔkka maka noŋi nɔji te ñamu dokiti, ɔci maka pookɛnti waakɛnda. ‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛnti, yeti ‘ya baal wɛnan bɛɛ, bala ba naŋka naŋi ‘ya te ciya ‘ya bɛɛna ḍieŋna te oŋŋa akki ne yyɛɛwɔy. Kan ‘ya bɛɛd mokiyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn bɔɔka moki bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛ buagɛ gɔrtɛ Kiṭɔ gɔki a lyɛlta ‘yatiɛ? Ɛkɛ a war tɛɛn ɛkkɛti, ɛkɛ warɛ koy koy ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.

Acaan ɛkɛ ŋaabɛ ma te war koñño, yeti ɛkɛ tɛɛti te war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔɔn da waakɔ koocin te ñoowin ɔɔn ñoowin iki ɛkɛy, yeti te jyeka ɔɔn ñoowin iki ɛkkɛyɛ, war tɛɛn Juaŋ bala ɔɔnti daŋkun te tɛɛtin ɛkɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ pɔɔdɛ, ɔci gɔrtɛ kan ɛkkɛ balgɛ tiecɛ jyeni ɛkkɛ boki no. Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ pɔɔdɛ. Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ? Yeti ɛkkɛ buannɛji pɔɔta neeni.
’Ya baal kɛɛy ɛkkɛ ka ɔɔn ñiidɔntɔ, acaan ɔɔn buannɔn genga bɛɛ.

Yeti ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti aŋka naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ gena yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛ. Ɔɔn dita buagɔn dala ɔɔn aŋka gwaltɔn ma ba maka kanŋa ɛkkɛn yɔmjin ne tolan bɛɛ, a’a, ɔci ba bolja wookki ma kanŋa ɔɔn wanna ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ naŋa pwadin.
Ɔɔn noŋdɔn naŋka awarɛ oŋkanda. Ɔɔn yaakɔnti noŋdɔn ne yaayan naŋka awarɛti neeni bɛɛ.
Acaan ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne ɔɔn waakɔ kooki ɔci ɛkkɛ aŋka waakɔ tɛɛkiy. Ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu.
’Ya kiew jyeka neeni ɛkkɛti ne ‘ya baawa ɛkkɛtiy. A ɔŋŋi ‘ya noŋja ɛkkɛti ne pɛñan ne ‘ya bɛɛda ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. ‘Ya buaga noŋja war tɛɛn ‘ya ‘wonnata Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ koobdin ñaalɔ, ɛkkɛ mɔɔrtin iñɔ bɛɛ.

Ne ŋoyɔyɛ, hay, modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu! Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka guagdi ‘yay. Dala jwali ɛkkɛ aga cyɛɛlɔ waakida. Dala ɛkkɛ coodɛ te pwanno, ɔci Jwaŋa ani ma ɔci noŋi ne pwadan mati baldi iki ɛkkɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ ñiebdɛ yɔtin te ñiebbin yoma pwadan,
Ma Kiṭɔ wɛnni ñiepi ɛkkɛ waakida.
Dala yom pwani Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci ani Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ñoowin Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkkɛti waakida.
Gena ‘ya Buuluc ñiep ɛkkɛ neeni. Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ ‘ya cuonna men baan gɛɛl bɛɛ. Gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ ‘ya cuonna ɔci Weegɛn Jwaŋa Tolan mena ɛkɛ jɔɔlnɛ ñaalɔ te lientiy.
Ɔci modg ikin modga balgin iki ‘ya wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Ɔɔn ñiepɔn ɛkkɛ ma kaniican ban Galatiya.
Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwanno, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti moki.
Yaccu a mena war ɛkɛ ‘wonnin ikin te nɔji ikin aŋka ɛkɛ yuoci ikin te ṭɛra ciyin ikin acca ṭɛra yaayan neeni. Ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn ba yom Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan.
Dala ma jieyi ɛkɛ yuonginda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.

’Ya yomu wiak ne ɛkkɛ waakɔ yalnɛ ɔntɔ ne pɛñan te Juaŋti mena ɛkkɛ muonɛ bora neeniy. Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwad pwad ɛkkɛti ɔci ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora te yom pwani Kiṭɔ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ waakɔ yalnɛ ɔntɔ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pookɛnti neeni.
Jyeka pookɛn neeniyɛ, a jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin awarɛ bɛɛ. Ma gɛɛg bala, ɔci ɛkkɛn buagɔn ɛkkɛ nuutɛ wyetkɔti ɔci ɛkkɛn jyek Kiṭɔ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin aktanyɔ aga jyeka jomgin budan ɛkkɛti.
Kan men gɛɛl te ɔɔnti, walla kan a malɛɛka gɛɛl bɛɛn te ñaalɔ pɔliji ɔci lorti ɛkkɛ te jyeka pookɛn gɛɛg bala ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn ñamu neeni bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ḍardɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.
’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti moki, kan men gɛɛl bɛɛn ɔci lorti ɛkkɛ te jyeka pookɛn gɛɛg bala ba jyeka muŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ ñamu neeni bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ḍardɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.

Ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi ‘ya buagata ma baan gɔktɔ agi ‘ya pwadjɔ? A’a, ‘ya buaga Juaŋ aŋka gɔkti agi ‘ya pwadjɔ. ‘Ya buaga ŋeetta ma baan ne coŋɔn? A’a. Te ‘ya baala potta noŋa aŋka ŋeetta ma ne coŋɔnyɛ, te ‘ya noŋ kanŋa Kiṭɔ ne pwadan bɛɛ.
Modg ɔɔn, tieŋdɛ ne pwadan. Jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin ɛkkɛ nɔɔnnin ‘ya neeni a jyek men baan gɛɛl budan bɛɛ.
’Ya myenna men baan gɛɛl te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci moki ‘ya lalka ma te jyeka wonkɛn neeni bɛɛ. Gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka ‘ya lɛɛrna jyeka wonkɛn neeni te naŋki ɛkɛy.

Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek naŋki ‘ya doki. Wona ‘ya aŋŋa cuuda Yaccu men bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya baal noŋ ba naŋki ma Icrayiil. ‘Ya baal noŋ ne yaayan ma kaniicati oŋkanda ne tolan, acaan ‘ya buaga dala jyek Yaccu baadi, ɔci maka booti ɛkɛti nogdi waakɛnda.
Maka ‘uayi maka a ma ɔɔn ba ‘ya ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn buani ‘ya te mali ma Icrayiil a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya waru byerŋa byerŋ te jyek naŋki yɔrg ikin yɔrga te baaṭi.
Yeti ne ‘ya jiennata mɛy ɔɔn men bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya doki muona Jwaŋa Tolan bora te kanŋa ɛkɛ doki. Ɔci oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘ya borna te yom pwani ɛkɛ ‘yati.
Ɔci ‘ya lɛɛrna ɛkɛ Kaci ɛkɛ, ɔci ‘ya oŋ cuuñña ɛkɛ ati lor Keedin Pookɛn te Jyek Kiṭɔ oŋo. Ne ‘ya cuuññati Juaŋ a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya tooccan men gɛɛlti te jiek gɛɛg bɛɛ.

Maka muonɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bora ñamu te ‘ya ŋeej ‘ya ne balki ban Urcaliimji ɔɔn. Yeti ‘ya ati aŋan aŋka myetta ɛkkɛn te jwali gɛɛl bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya ati gena ban Arabya, ɔci ne baaṭi ‘ya dɔɔkkan dɔki ban Ḍimaackati.
Ɔci ne yuonga ne ḍoogɔ bɛɛki borayɛ, ‘ya oŋ ati ban Urcaliimji, ḍieŋjan Butructi oŋo. Ɔɔn balgɔn iki ɛkɛ nink a inyaakkɛn om ne cyɛɛlɔ (15).
Yeti Cuudan Yaccu makɛn pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn yuarŋ ‘ya bɛɛ, gena Yaakub mod Yaccun aŋka yuarŋ ‘ya parɛy.
Jyeka kiewan ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, a jyeka jomgin bɛɛ. Çeejɛ Juaŋ jyeka neeni a jyeka awarɛ.
Ɔci ne baaṭi ‘ya oŋ ati ban Cuurya ɔci ban Ciliicya oŋo.
Ɔci ma kaniican ban Yahuudiya, ɛkkɛn ‘ya yuarka te woŋgɛn bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛn tieŋŋin te jyetkɛn budan agi mena noŋɔ ne yaayan ɛkkɛnti te ñamuyɛ, agi ɛkta baalɔ loṭɔ ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyek Kiṭɔ jyeka ɛkta baalda nokta ma agi dala baadɔ te ñamuy.
Ɔci ma bala jieyi Juaŋ te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ‘yati te akta ɛkɛ ‘ya aaŋŋati ñin pwanna neeni.
Ne yuonga a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ neeni bɛɛki borayɛ, ‘ya ati ban Urcaliim moki. Ɔɔn attɔn i Barnabac, ɔci Tituc eñi ‘ya.

’Ya myenna Kiṭɔ te won ‘ya ban Urcaliim. Ɔci maka ḍwaŋin myetkan ‘ya pookɛn ñamu te jyeka loṭa ‘ya Keedin Pookɛn neeni, acaan ‘ya buaga naa jyeka loṭa ‘ya ma neeni aga ba jyeka budan ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci moki, ‘ya buaga naa jyeka loṭa ‘ya ɛkkɛn ne baaṭi aga ba jyeka budan ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.

Ma gɛɛg bala aŋan ɛkkɛn noŋi ba ne ɛkkɛn akki modg ikin ɔɔn no, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn a modg ikin awarɛ bɛɛ. A menɛ ɛkkɛn barŋɛ a modg ikin lieda neeni yeti? Ɛkkɛn buagɔn naa ikin ḍɔɔggɔ wɔkti te jyek ganuun bɛɛ, acaan acca ikin jyettin Kiṭɔti doki. Maka neeni ɛkkɛn ṭoki dala ikin naŋtin a kɛɛnk ganuun moki. Mena mod ɔɔn Titucyɛ, ɛkɛ a men ma Giriik, yeti maka wɛɛyi ma neeni ‘yercin ɛkɛti te jyek ŋuni moki aŋka ɛkɛ naŋtan aga men Ma Icrayiil ba ikin ɔŋŋi bɛɛ.
Yeti maka bala ñaltan ma ba ne akki maka wɛɛyi ma ḍwaŋin neeniyɛ, ‘ya gɔk ka naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni eccin paŋŋa woonɛ gɛɛl ‘yati bɛɛ. Jwaŋa Tolan gɔṭi waak maka wɛɛyi ma neeni waaka bora budan bɛɛ.

Maka ḍwaŋin neeni ɛkkɛn ‘ya myetka te jyek kanŋa lali ma parɛ budan bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn ‘ya ciŋkaji te naŋki kanŋa maka Kɛɛna Pookɛnti. Yaakub i Butruc i Yɔhannayɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka ḍwaŋin. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki naŋka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ mati te jyek ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn te ɔɔn yaakkɔ Barnabac bɛɛ. Butruc ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan kanŋa te lali ma Icrayiil maka balki jyek ŋwoti oŋkanday.
Ɛkkɛn balki jwali gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ budan agi dala ɔɔn ma Juaŋ maka bɔwan magjɔn ban Urcaliimji. Jyek ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, bala ba jyeka buagata ‘ya neeni daŋkun.
Ne Butruc bɛɛni ban Antyakyɛ, ‘ya gɔkcan ɛkɛti ne pɛñan acaan ɛkɛ bala noŋi ne pwadan bɛɛ.

Te ñamu ɛkɛ bala omi iki Keedin Pookɛn. Yeti ne ma gɛɛg bɛɛki te Yaakubtiyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ yɔɔnnɛ te amma ɛkɛ omki iki Keedin Pookɛny. Ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ buayi ma Icrayiil maka buagɔn jyek ŋwoti Keedin Pookɛn neeni.
Ɔci ma Icrayiil a Ma Kiṭɔ maka pookɛnyɛ, ñokcinti ɔci bala noŋi ba naŋki ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkkɛnyɛ, Barnabac daŋkun jyɛtci ɛkkɛn ɔntɔ ɔci noŋi ba ɛkkɛn moki ɔɔn.

Ɔci ne ‘ya gɔrna ɛkkɛn atki te pɔy waŋɛ a tyɛlga ba bolji jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya gɔkcan Butructi te ma ñomgɛnti waakɛnda ka, “Hay Butruc, i a men ma Icrayiil ɔci i baal ciy ba ma Keedin Pookɛn neeni. Oŋ te gena aŋka i buagi dala Keedin Pookɛn neeni naŋki ɛkkɛn daltan ɔci dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi ba naŋki ma Icrayiily?”
Ɛkkɛn oŋ myetkan ‘ya jwalla awarɛ neeni agi ikin jietkin ma akin ma Icrayiil maka noŋi ba jyek ganuun jitkɛn.

Yeti ŋeecin ikin men gɛɛl ikinti pwada Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛn bɛɛ. Ikin ma Icrayiil pwattin Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyenna ikin jyettin Yaccu Kiṭɔti. Ɔci Keedin Pookɛn neeni, ɛkkɛn pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetti Yaccu Kiṭɔti daŋkun. Ikin waakida balkin bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ. Men gɛɛl pwada Juaŋ ñamɛti te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛn bɛɛ.

Ikin ma Icrayiil yɔɔnnin te naŋki mali ikin ma Icrayiil acaan ŋeecin ikin ikin pwatkin Juaŋ ñamɛti acca acaan te jyenna jyettin ikin Kiṭɔti neeni. Ɔci ma ikin ma Icrayiil ɛkkɛn ikin ñaltin ba nɔɔtka ḍwaŋin te naŋka neeni. Hay! Yaccu ikin eeŋnin nɔji ḍɔɔggɔtɛ? Hayɛllɛ! Nɔji bɛya te Yaccuti bɛɛ.
’Ya baal lor ma te jyenna ikin pwattin Juaŋ ñamɛti neeni, ɔci acca kan ‘ya jiek agdiyɔ, ɔci kan ‘ya dɔwwa lorca ma ka da ɛkkɛn tieci jyek ganuun mokiyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya jiek dami doki.
Ne ‘ya baala noŋa ba jyeka ganuun buagɛ aŋka naŋdi ‘yayɛ, naŋki ‘ya neeni yuarcan ‘ya a jomgɔn budan, acaan yuarcan ‘ya pwad awarɛ te naŋki ganuun wanna bɛɛ.

’Ya tuunin iki Kiṭɔ a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci acca gena ‘ya ciy neeni moki bɛɛ. Gena Kiṭɔ aŋka ciyi ‘ya yomuti neeni. Ɔci coodda ciya ‘ya acca neeniyɛ, ‘ya ciy te jyenna ‘ya jyetta Kaci Jwaŋa Tolanti mena ani ‘ya ɔci ‘ya ‘wonna war ɛkɛy.

Gena naŋŋɛ Juaŋ pwadan neeniyɛ, a jyeka budan ‘yati bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ma yaakinti pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti te tiid jyek ganuun pookɛnyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ne ɛkɛ gɔki agi lyen Yaccu neeniyɛ, bala ba ne ɛkɛ tuuni budan no.
Hay, ɛkkɛ maka ban Galatiya, ɛkkɛ naŋŋɛ ñin menɛ yeti? Ɛkkɛ nɔɔnnin ‘ya ne pwadan te kon lyen Yaccu Kiṭɔ te ñamu te oŋŋa tuuni ɛkɛ kakanti neeni.
Acca ‘ya buaga toocca ɛkkɛti te jwali gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ Boŋ ɛkɛ te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛn boki, walla te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Kiṭɔti te oŋŋa ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek ɛkɛy?
Oŋ acca ɛkkɛ poŋɛ amaam ɔɔn ogo? Ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ Ma Kiṭɔ te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci acca ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ‘uottɛ ñamu te naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka tɛyan te waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ?

Te ñamu taab ɛkkɛ tol tol te naŋki maka ‘yeṭi ɛkkɛ te jyek ganuun. Ɔci acca kan ɛkkɛ dɔɔdɛ naŋki ɛkkɛntiyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba yom tiekin te taab neeni bɛɛn ɛkkɛti budan. Yeti ‘ya poŋ gɔk ka taab ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ eektɛ jyeka pwadin.

Yaccu mena ‘woñi ɛkkɛ te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci mena noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛ tiecɛ jyek ganuun Muuca jitkɛn boki? Walla acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ɛkɛti, ɔci tieŋnɛ jyek ɛkɛ?
Ɔci ba jyek jyenna neeniyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki te jyeni Abrahim agi, “Abrahim jyeti Juaŋti, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti.”
Ɔci dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ maka a kɛɛgin Abrahim awarɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka jyeti Juaŋti ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn.

Te baaṭi ne jiek bɛɛki bora men bɛɛyɛ, jyek worga gɔki agi Juaŋ gɔkcin Abrahimti agi, “Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan mati baan konɛ warda te i.” Juaŋ gɔki a ɔɔn acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ Keedin Pookɛn jyeddi ɛkɛti, ɔci pwaddi ɛkɛ ñamɛti te jyeni ɛkkɛn.
Oŋŋa Abrahim jyetti Juaŋtiyɛ, Juaŋ noŋi ɛkɛti ne pwadan. Ɔci acca maka jyeddi Juaŋtiyɛ, Juaŋ da noŋdi ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda ba Abrahim ɔɔn.

Maka buagɔn pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛn pookɛnyɛ, jiek bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti. Acaan jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Kan men gɛɛl jyek ganuun tiidiyɔ waakɛnda bɛɛyɛ, jiek bɛya ɛkɛ wyeñɛti dita.” Men gɛɛl jyek ganuun tiiññiyɔ oŋgati waakɛnda boki? Hayɛllɛ! Men gɛɛl jiek tiiññiyɔ waakɛnda bɛɛ.

Çeecin ikin ne pwadan menga yaakinti pwada Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti te tiit jyek ganuun waakɛn bɛɛ acaan jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Gena mena pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyenna ɛkɛ jyetti Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka uda.”
Yeti jyek ganuun ñoowin i jyek jyeni bɛɛ. Jyek ganuun gɔki agi, “Kan mena jyek ganuun tiidiyɔ waakɛndayɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka uda.”

Yeti jiek bɛya ɔɔn wyetkɔti te jyek ganuun bɛɛ, acaan ɔɔn wannɔn Kiṭɔ doki te oŋŋa jiek bɛɛki ɛkɛ wyeñɛti te ɔɔny. Acaan jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Kan menga ŋaaptan ma ñaalɔ jaantiyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba jiek bɛɛn ɛkɛ wyeñɛti doki.”
Kiṭɔ noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka dala jyeka guaŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan Abrahimti a jyeka pwadin neeni, dala ooddi Keedin Pookɛnti daŋkun te ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, Boŋ Juaŋ bala ɔɔnti te jyenna ɔɔn jyettɔn Juaŋti neeni.

Modg ɔɔn, tieŋdɛ jwali ṭɔɔlɛ neeni, gena jwali naŋki ikin. Kan jiek naŋɛ ma doki ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, ɔci kan maka neeni jwali ḍyɛgɛ a warɛ dokiyɛ, jiek bawwin doki. Mena parɛ gɛɛl yaakinti gɔkti agi jyeka neeni agi jyeka budan moki bɛɛ. Ɔci menga yaakinti jyeka neeni agdiyɔ moki bɛɛ.
Jyeka naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan neeni a jyek kɛɛgin Abrahim waakɛnda bɛɛ. Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Gena Kaci i parɛ.” Gena Kiṭɔ mena bɛɛn te Abrahimtiy.

Ba jyeka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek Abrahim. Jwaŋa Tolan jiek naŋɛ iki Abrahim te ñamu te jyek mena bɛya te Abrahimti. Oŋŋa Juaŋ noŋki jiek iki Abrahimyɛ, jyek ganuun men bala bɛɛ. Ne yuonga coŋin ba miyyan ne ŋaanɔ ɔci men baan mena parɛ byeŋkɛ (430) bɛɛki borayɛ, jyek ganuun bɛɛn oŋo. Yeti jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki Abrahim aŋi jyeka budan bɛɛ. Jiek aaŋŋɛyɔ Juaŋ bɛɛ.

Kan te jyek ganuun ma yɔɔkitiyɛ, te jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Abrahimti neeniyɛ, te aŋi jyeka budan. Yeti jiek bala a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ma yɔɔtan jyek ganuun bɛɛ. Ma yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ Abrahimti. Pɔya parɛ gɛɛl bala bɛɛ.

Ɔci kan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, oŋ Muuca ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ jyek ganuun te gena? Ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ jyek ganuun acaan ma a nɔɔtko, ɔci te jyek ganuun neeniyɛ, ŋeettan ɛkkɛn naŋki ɛkkɛn a nɔjjo. Ɔci jyek ganuun bala ɛkkɛnti oŋkanda ɔɔn ne oŋŋa Kacca Abrahim myennɛ Juaŋ neeni bɛɛni ɔɔn. Ma ‘wonni Juaŋ ganuun waakɛnda bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ ganuun ‘wonnɛ malɛɛkan byeŋkɛnti ɔci ‘woñgi ɛkkɛn Muuca bieŋɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ ma ‘wonnɛ oŋo, acaan Muuca a cuuda. Yeti jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki Abrahim bala a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Cuuda bala bɛɛ. Juaŋ gɔkcin Abrahim waanɛti. Ɛkɛ gɔkcin mena parɛ gɛɛlti bɛɛ.
Ɔci kan men buagɔn noŋi gen parɛyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn cuuda gɛɛl moki bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ noŋi parɛ, ɔci mena neeniyɛ, gena Jwaŋa Tolan.

Gɔṭṭɛ, jyek ganuun kooki jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki Abrahim nɛ? A’a. Jyeka neeni kooki makɛn neeni bɛɛ, hay! Kan te tɛɛtin baali mati te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛndayɛ, ma te pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti, ɔci te jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki Abrahim neeniyɛ, te aŋi jyeka budan doki.

Yeti jyek Juaŋ bala a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ganuun bala aŋka ŋeettan ma, ma waakɛnda a nɔɔtko. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka pwadin jyeka guaŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan Abrahimti neeniyɛ, bɛya mati te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Yaccu Kiṭɔtiy.

Te ñamu ne Kiṭɔ bɛɛni men bɛɛyɛ, jyek ganuun bala ṭeyi ikin ma Icrayiil waakida te nɔji ikin aŋka ikin poŋtin jyek nɔji ikin. Ɔci jyek ganuun neeni bala ikinti oŋkanda ɔɔn, ɔci ŋeecin ikin mena ikin pɔktinyɛ, bɛya ne baaṭi, ɔci ikin balgin kɛɛyin ɛkɛ.
Ikin ma Icrayiilyɛ, ikin balkin ba kɛɛgin. Ɔci ganuunyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba ṭuoñ ikinti, ɔci ɛkɛ bala gɔṭi ikin oŋkanda ne Kiṭɔ bɛɛni ɔɔn. Ɔci ikin pwannin Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyenna ikin jyettin ɛkɛti neeni.
Ɔci acca acaan jyek jyeni bala dokiyɛ, ganuun neeni a ṭwoñ ikin moki bɛɛ.
Oŋŋa ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan waakida.
Acaan ɛkkɛ waakida buulkɛ ma te yenti Kiṭɔyɛ, Kiṭɔ bala ɛkkɛti doki. Ɔci acca ɛkkɛ waakɔ ‘yɛɛŋŋɛ te tɛɛtin Kiṭɔ waanɛ.

Ikin ne aŋŋin Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ikin moki gɔkin agi menga a ma Icrayiil walla menga a ma Keedin Pookɛn, walla menga a mena kɛɛngɔn walla menga a mena ḍwaŋɛ wɔɔgan te kɛñji, walla menga a mena ɛɛŋ walla menga a mena ‘uan bɛɛ, ikin waakida balkin ba bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ Yaccu Kiṭɔti.
Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ a Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin Abrahim woodgɛn, ɔci jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Abrahimtiyɛ, bɛya ɛkkɛti daŋkun.

Ɔci acca ‘ya gɔk daŋkun te mena guagdɛ weegɛn agi dala maal wiɛnda ɛktayɛ, ne ɛkɛ wona ḍiɛri menyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba bolji mena kɛɛngɔn. Acaan mena kɛɛngɔn ɛkɛ noŋi ba yom ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ ne waak waakɛnda bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛti ɔɔn.

Mena guagdɛ weegɛn neeniyɛ, ne baaṭi ɛkɛ aga mena mwoki mal weegɛn. Yeti ne ɛkɛ wona ḍiɛri menyɛ, ma bala gɔṭi ɛkɛ ne pwadan ɔci ma bala gɔṭi mal ɛkɛ daŋkun ne pwadan ne oŋŋa guaŋŋɛ weegɛn te baaṭi neeni bɛɛni ɔɔn.
Ɔci ba jyeka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek ikin daŋkun. Te ñamu ne ikin jyek Juaŋ jitkɛn ŋeecin ne pwadan men bɛɛyɛ, ikin balkin ba maka kɛɛnk men. Ikin balkin loṭin te jyeka jyetki yɔrg ikin te baaṭiy.
Ɔci ne oŋŋa guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ wanna waanɛ jiñɛ bɛɛniyɛ, ɔci Juaŋ Kaci ɛkɛ cuonnɛ iñɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ jiennɛ mena ɛɛŋo, ɔci ɛkɛ aŋi men baano. Ne ɛkɛ bɛɛniyɛ, ɛkɛ daŋkun cien te jyek ganuun ma Icrayiil.
Kaci Juaŋ bɛɛn aŋka maka ciyi te jyek ganuun neeniyɛ, wandɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci aŋka ikin pirtin Juaŋ aktin kɛɛgin ɛkɛ.
Ɔci acaan ikin akin kɛɛgin Juaŋ awarɛyɛ, ikin ‘wonnin Juaŋ Boŋ Kaci ɛkɛ ikin yomgɔti. Ɔci Boŋa bala ikin yomgɔti neeniyɛ, gɔki Juaŋti agi, “Wey ɔɔn, Wey ɔɔn!”
Ɔci acca i baal ba kɛɛngɔn moki bɛɛ. I aŋŋi kacca tolan doki, ɔci acaan i a kaci Juaŋ a ɔɔnyɛ, i baal ba mena guaŋŋɛ Weegɛn agi dala maal wiɛnda ɛktay.
Te ñamu ne Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛnk waka bartan ma agi jɔkin. Ɔci ɛkkɛn a waka budan. Ɛkkɛn a jɔkin woodgɛn bɛɛ.
Yeti acca Juaŋ ŋeennɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Ɔci ɛkkɛ ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ daŋkun. Oŋ te gena yeti ɛkkɛ jyennɛ ɔntɔ aŋka ɛkkɛ dɔɔkkɛ jyeka yeyinti neeni moki? Ɛkkɛ buagɛ agdɛ kɛɛnk moki?
Ɛkkɛ dɔɔkkɛ ŋoyɔ cooŋɛ ñingɔ te waka bala naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ te baaṭiy, gena jyek oŋko, ɔci jyek ponko, ɔci jyek yuongo.
Ɔci ‘ya buay kanŋa ‘ya aga kanŋa budan dita.
Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ baldɛ ba ‘ya ɔɔn. Acaan ganuun yaakinti gɔkti genga ‘yati bɛɛ. ‘Ya aŋi ba men ma ɛkkɛ doki. Ɛkkɛ dommɛ naŋki gɛɛl ‘yati bɛɛ.
Oŋŋa ‘ya bɛɛna loṭa ɛkkɛ te ñamuyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ‘ya waru yaayɛ.
Waja ‘ya neeni a pɔɔt ɛkkɛti, yeti ɛkkɛ yookɛ te ‘ya bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘ya liɛllatiyɔ bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ne pwadan ‘yati ba ne ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ malɛɛka gɛɛlti walla Kiṭɔtiy.
Ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te ñamu! Oŋ a gena bɛɛn ɔŋ? Te wɔɔka wannati kan te ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, te ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ dɔɔnnɛ bora ɔci ‘wonnata ‘ya te yoma ñɔyan.
Ɔci acca ba yom ñɔɔn ɛkkɛ bala aŋɛ? Ɛkkɛ yookɛ te ‘ya ne ‘ya mieta ɛkkɛ te jyeka ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya a jyeka awarɛ nɛ?
Maka pookɛn maka bɛɛn ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔki ne pwadan ɛkkɛti, yeti ɛkkɛn balkɔn yoma awarɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn ɛkkɛ kɛptɛji i ‘ya acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ myɛldi ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
Gɔṭṭɛ, kan ma yomgɛn myɛlɔ te naŋka pwadanyɛ, yaayɛ bɛɛ, pwatcin. Yeti naa naŋka neeni bala te oŋka ‘ya balgin iki ɛkkɛ budan bɛɛ, dala naŋka neeni bala ne ‘ya baawa ɛkkɛti daŋkun ɔɔn.
Kɛɛgin ‘ya kɛɛgin onga ‘yay, kan ɛɛŋ amɛ jiediyɛ, kaci pɛñ pɛñ ɛkɛti, ɔci ba jiedi kaciyɛ, bala ba ‘ya daŋkun, ‘ya yomu yaayɛ ne tolan acaan ‘ya buaga dala Yaccu bala ɛkkɛti ne pwadan.
Hay, a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba dala te ikin balkin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ aŋan aŋka ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti te tuk ‘ya, acaan ‘ya baal poŋ te ɛkkɛ a jiñu bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔk ka ɛkkɛ balgɛ ɔntɔ kaapun.
Hay ɛkkɛ maka buagɔn ciyi te jyek ganuun nɛ, jyek ganuun jitkɛn ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan boki?
Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi kɛɛgin Abrahim kɛɛgin a ‘uay bala ne yyɛɛwɔ. Kacca ne cyɛɛlɔ gɛɛl jiennɛ mena kɛɛngɔn, ɔci ɛka parɛ jiennɛ ɛŋ ɛkɛ waanɛ.
Kaci mena kɛɛngɔn neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ jiedɛ ma ba naŋki ma baan oŋkanda. Yeti kaci ɛŋ Abrahim waanɛyɛ, ɛkɛ jiedɛ ma ba jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki Abrahim te ñamuy.
Ba jyek moonga ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, ɔci bala ba jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki ma Icrayiil te baaṭiy. Haajaryɛ, ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn, ɔci kɛɛgin ɛkɛ a kɛɛnk ba ɛkɛ daŋkun.

Ɔci ba jyek Haajar neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek ganuun jyeka ma ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan poomti, poma yenti Pom Cina ban Arayaji. Ɔci maka ciyi te jyek ganuunyɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛnko. Ɔci maka ciyi ban Urcaliim accayɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛnk ba Haajar ɔɔn, acaan ɛkkɛn bala ciyi te jyek ganuun men.

Yeti jyek Caarayɛ, da pookɛn. Ɛkɛ a ɛŋ Abrahim waanɛ. Ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn bɛɛ. Ɔci ba jyek ɛkɛyɛ, bala ba jyek maka jyeti Juaŋti, maka a ma Urcaliim ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni. Ɛkɛ a mɛy ikin. Ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn bɛɛ. Ɔci ikin balkin ba ɛkɛ daŋkun. Ikin akin kɛɛnk bɛɛ.

Acaan worga gɔki agi, “Dala i yomu ñɔya, hay, i ɛŋa kɛɛggɛ baawy! Dala i yaajja dɛɛrja te pwana tolan te yom ñɔɔno. I a mena dɛnni pɛñi jiedi kaci oŋgati bɛɛy! Acaan ɛŋa ‘uarɛ ati ɔntɔ te ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ baltan kɛɛgin ne coŋɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛŋa niin iki ‘uarɛ oŋkanda neeni bwandɛ ɛkɛ te kɛɛgin.”
Modg ɔɔn, ikin aŋŋin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan ba jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ yaakkɛn iki Abrahim te baaṭiy. Ɔci te naŋka neeniyɛ, ikin balkin ba Icaak.
Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, mena jiedɛ ma ba naŋki ma baan budanyɛ, ɛkɛ bala noŋi ne yaayan kacca neeniti, gena kacca jiedɛ ma te Boŋ Juaŋy. Ɔci acca moki taab ikin bala a ɔɔn daŋkun.

Jyek worga gɔki a ɔki te naŋka neeni? Worga gɔki agi, “Ɛŋa a kɛɛngɔn neeniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ oldɛ ɛkkɛ ɔntɔ iki kaci ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ aŋka kaci ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, naa jyek ɛkɛ ñoodi i jyek kacca guaŋŋɛ weegɛn agi dala maal wiɛnda ɛkta neeni bɛɛ.”
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin akin kɛɛgin mena kɛɛngɔn bɛɛ. Ikin akin kɛɛgin mena ciyi budan te kɛnjo.
Ikin pɔŋnin Kiṭɔ te jyek kɛnjo. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ dɔɔdɛ kɛnjiti moki bɛɛ.
Tieŋdɛ jyek ‘ya neeni. Gena ‘ya Buuluc gɔk ɛkkɛti neeni. Naa ɛkkɛ ŋwottɛ ma bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ ŋwottɛ mayɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba jyek Kiṭɔ aŋi jyeka budan ɛkkɛti doki.
Ɛkkɛ maka buagɔn jyek ŋwotiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti moki, kan ɛkkɛ buagɛ jyek ŋwotiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ jyek ganuun tiidɛyɔ waakɛnda.
Kan ɛkkɛ buagɛ pwaddɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛnyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba jyek Kiṭɔ baaw ɛkkɛti, ɔci a ɔɔn moki bala ba ɛkkɛ yookɛ te naŋka naŋdɛ Juaŋ mati te yom ɛkɛ yoma pwadan neeni.
Te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ikin yomgɔtiyɛ, ŋeecin ikin oŋŋa ikin yɔɔttin Juaŋ ñamɛtiyɛ, jiek bala moki bɛɛ. Ikin pwannin ɛkɛ ñamɛti doki.
Maka bala Yaccu Kiṭɔti, kan jyek ŋwoti bala ɛkkɛnti ɔci kan walla baaw ɛkkɛntiyɛ, jyeka neeni bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ. Kan jyek jyeni ɔci jyek ani aŋka bala ma yomgɛntiyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin.
Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ yɔɔdɛ ne pwadan. Oŋ ɛkkɛ jyɛnnɛ menɛ ɔntɔ yeti te jyeka awarɛ neeniti?
Jyeka pookɛn neeni bɛɛn te mena ɛkkɛ muonɛ bora neeniti bɛɛ.
Jyeka pookɛn neeni bala ba jyek ñamgo. Ma gɔki agi, “Kan ñamg bala ḍuobjiti ne ḍiɛkanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ooddi ḍuobji warɛti warda.”
Çeej ‘ya yomuti ɛkkɛ magdɛ Ciɛggɔn, ɔci ɛkkɛ moki dɔɔktɛ jyek ‘yati. Ɔci mena eccin jyeka pookɛn ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ, yeti ne baaṭi ywobji Juaŋ bɛya ɛkɛ wyeñɛti.

Modg ɔɔn, te ‘ya baala loṭa ɛkkɛ te jyek ŋwoti menyɛ, te ma Icrayiil bala etti jyek taab neeni ‘yati boki? A’a. Kan ‘ya te loṭa ma agi dala ma ŋwottan mayɛ, te ma Icrayiil te yookɔn te jyek lyen Yaccu bɛɛ.
’Ya poŋ ka dala te maka poṭi ɛkkɛ waakɔ te jyek ŋwoti wanna dala ɛkkɛn ‘uotti ñamu te naŋka wanna ɔci ‘wolgɛn yuutan aga luoko. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn uuttan ɔntɔ te kaniicaji.
Modg ɔɔn, ɛkkɛ muonɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bora, ɔci ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ doki. Ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Juaŋ acaan ɛkkɛ noŋɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Juaŋ aŋka dala ɛkkɛ oondi yɔtin pookɔ.
Jyek ganuun jitkɛn waakɛndayɛ, jitk ɛkkɛn bala te jwalla ne cyɛɛlɔ kiiwɛ ma agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ anɛ maka ciyɛ iki ɛkkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ ba anna ɛkkɛ anɛ waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ neeni ɔɔn.”
Yeti kan ɛkkɛ yoyyɛ ñin, ɔci yaccɛ waakɔ pookɔ bala ba leyya ywobkyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyeka bɛya bora te coodi ɛkkɛy. Acaan coodda pwadan baadi te yoyyin ñino.
Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka ciedɛ te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba yoma te baaṭi moki bɛɛ.
Yoma te baaṭi neeniyɛ, yookɔn te Boŋ Juaŋo, ɔci moki Boŋ Juaŋ yookɔn te jyek yoma te baaṭi. Ɛkkɛn noowi yaakkɛn a ɔɔn. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti noŋdɛ ba naŋka ɛkkɛ buagɛ bɛɛ.
Kan ɛkkɛ wɛɛdɛ Boŋ Juaŋ oŋkandayɛ, jyek ganuun bala ɛkkɛti moki bɛɛ.
Naŋki yoma te baaṭiyɛ, gena tommo, ɔci naŋka amaamo, ɔci wɛljo,

ɔci mali jɔkin yeyin waka pɔɔtan ma a pɔɔto, ɔci ṭyejjo, ɔci pɔñko, ɔci yom yoño, ɔci jyek wɛɛdin, ɔci yom monno, ɔci loñko, ɔci anna anki ma waak ɛkkɛn pookɛny. Ɔci jyek kɛɛptin ɔci jyek tyewwin daŋkun,

ɔci nooŋi mooyo, ɔci naŋki bajjo, ɔci naŋka pookɛn waakɛnda ba naŋka neeni ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛya te yoma te baaṭiti. Ɔci ‘ya ṭey ɛkkɛ moki bala ba ṭeena ɛkkɛ ṭeenin ‘ya te ñamu ɔɔny, maka noŋi naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki noon ban cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ.

Te naŋki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ma yomgɛntiyɛ, Juaŋ etti naŋka pwadin. Ɔci te Boŋ Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ma ani Juaŋo, ɔci ma ooni yɔtin pookɛn. Ɔci naŋka pookɛnyɛ, gena yom ñɔɔno, ɔci coodi pwanno. Ɔci te naŋki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, ma loomgɛn tɛy tɛyo. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ mati. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn bɔw bɔwo, ɔci ɛkkɛn jiekɛn a yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛ,
ɔci ɛkkɛn a ywobk bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti paŋi jiek ñamu, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi amaam budan bɛɛ. Jyek ganuun yaakinti gɔkti genga te naŋka pwadan neeni bɛɛ.
Yoma buagɔn naŋka yaayan ne pɛñan neeniyɛ, ma Yaccu Kiṭɔ mwonnin te ɛkɛ doki. Bala ba yoma te baaṭi neeni olji ɛkkɛn kakanti ɔci tuun doki bawwin.
Kan tɛɛtin Juaŋ bala ikinti te Boŋ ɛkɛyɛ, dala ikin noŋtin ba jyeka guagdɛ Boŋ ɛkɛ ikinti oŋkanda neeni.
Naa ikin jieyin waakɔ pookɔ te naŋka naŋtin ikin bɛɛ. Naa ikin noŋtin naŋki aŋka maka pookɛn loondi ikinti bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ikin korkɔ modɔ yɔtin bɛɛ.

Modg ɔɔn, kan men gɛɛl yuardɛ ɛkkɛ, kan ɛkɛ bala noŋi ne yaayan, dala ɛkkɛ maka yɔɔd ne tɛyan neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ magdɛ te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan te yoma pwadan aŋka ɛkɛ jiek ywaŋdɛ. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ magdɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ daŋkun aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn bɛɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ moowɛ yɔtin pookɔ te jyeka tɛyan, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti tiecɛ Jyek Kiṭɔ waakɛn.
Kan men gɛɛl poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ toljiyɛ, ɛkɛ dyeti war ɛkɛ parɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ waakida gɔrti naŋki ɛkkɛ ne naŋki ɛkkɛ pwatki boki no. Ɔci ne men gɛɛl gɔrti naŋki ɛkɛ pwadiyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni. Ɔci ɛkɛ poŋi te kanŋa mena parɛ bɛɛ.
Menga da kɛṭi naŋki ɛkɛ te ḍwaŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da kɛṭi naŋki ɛkɛ te ḍwaŋ ɛkɛ.
Mena laltan ma te jyek Juaŋyɛ, dala ɛkɛ mena loṭi ɛkɛ kɛndɛ waka pwadin waka bala ɛkɛti waakɛnda.
Naa ɛkkɛ waakɔ dieddɛ ñin pookɔ bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi men gɛɛl yaakinti Juaŋ naŋdɛ ñin bɛɛ. Acaan kan menga dwoki waak gɛɛgyɛ, waka wanna ‘yɛrdɛ ɛkɛ parɛ daŋkun.

Acaan jyek ikin waakɛnda ŋeejɛ Juaŋo, ɔci ba naŋka naŋtin ikin acca neeniyɛ, naŋka neeni etti naŋka pookɛn ne baaṭi. Kan men gɛɛl bala noŋi ne yaayan ba yom ɛkɛ yoma te baaṭi neeniyɛ, ne baaṭi naŋka neeni etti lieno. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl noŋi ne pwadan te war tɛɛn Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ yomɛtiyɛ, ne baaṭi naŋka neeni etti tɛɛtin, ɔci tɛɛtin neeni bɛya te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanti. Ɔci tɛɛtin neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ.
Acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, naa ikin taaptin te naŋka pwadin neeni bɛɛ. Acaan ne oŋŋa guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ neeni bɛɛdiyɛ, kan yomg ikin ḍɛɛmdin iñɔ bɛɛyɛ, jyeka neeni ikin ‘wontin waka pwadin te kanŋa ikin.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne pɔya ikin noŋtin ne pwadan mati baaliyɛ, dala ikin noŋtin ne pwadan mati waakɛnda. Ɔci maka jyeti Juaŋti dokiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn maktin ikin ne pwadan nɔñji.
Gɔṭṭɛ, ne ‘ya kieda worga ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ‘ya kiewa ɛkkɛti te kiikan ḍwaŋin.
Maka ‘yeṭi ɛkkɛ te jyek ŋwoti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛn pwaddi ma ñomgɛnti aŋka naa taab bɛya ɛkkɛnti te jyek lyen Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, lyena tuuni ɛkɛ kakanti neeni bɛɛ.

’Uaya ŋuodɛ ma neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieci jyek ganuun jitkɛn ne pwadan boki? Hayɛllɛ! Ɛkkɛn gɔki ɛkkɛti te jyek ŋwoti acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ agdɛ ba maka ne cyɛɛlɔ iki ɛkkɛn aŋka ɛkkɛn jiɛtan ma te naŋka neeni.

’Ya buaga jiɛt waru te naŋki gɛɛl bɛɛ, gena lyena tuuni Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ kakanti neeni aŋka ‘ya jieya ɛkɛ neeni. Te lyen ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ‘ya tuun daŋkun. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka bala iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrjiyɛ, aŋi ba jyeka budan ‘yati doki. Ɔci jyeka bala iñɔ wɛnni baan konɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti gɔkti genga ‘yati moki bɛɛ. Acaan ‘ya aŋi ba gena tuuta ɛkkɛnti doki.
Kan jyek ŋwoti balayɛ, jyek ŋwoti neeni a genga bɛɛ. Ɔci kan jyek ŋwoti moki baawiyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋdi genga bɛɛ. Gena jyek aŋŋa ikin aktin maka wonkɛn te jyek Juaŋyɛ, aŋka tolcin.
Maka ciyi te jyeka neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ciya te coodda pwadan, ɔci dala Juaŋ yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkkɛnti. Gena ma Icrayiil woodgɛn ɛkkɛn guagdi ‘ya neeni.
Acca menga yaakinti etti taab ‘yati te genga moki bɛɛ. Bilgin bala ‘ya waruti te naŋka naŋɛ ma yaayan ‘yati te jyek Yaccu. Ɔci te bilgin neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ma ‘ya a men Kiṭɔ.
Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ Ciɛggɔn ikin yomgɔti waakida. Amɛɛn.
Gena ‘ya Buuluc mena bornɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te yom ɛkɛ ɔci naŋŋɛ a cuuda Ciɛggɔn Yaccuy. ‘Ya kiew worga Ma Kiṭɔti maka ciyi ban Ɛpacacy. Gena maka jyek Yaccu tiiyɛyɔ ne pwadany.
Dala Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwanno.
Dala ikin jieyin Jwaŋa Tolan Wey Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ acaan Kiṭɔ cuonnɛ ɛkɛ ikinti aŋka ɛkɛ noŋdi naŋka pwadin ikin yomgɔti, ɔci naŋka pwadin ñaalɔ ban Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, oonɛ ɛkɛ ikinti waakɛnda.

Te baaṭi ne noon warda aŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan men bɛɛyɛ, Juaŋ ikin muonin bora doki. Ɛkɛ ikin muonin bora a ɔɔn te ‘woñgin ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonninti Yaccu Kiṭɔ te baaṭi doki agi ikin akcin maka ciyi budan te naŋka yaayan, ɔci agi ikin pwatcin ɛkɛ ñamɛtiy.

Acaan ɛkɛ ani ikinyɛ, jiek naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ñamu doki agi dala ikin akcin kɛɛgin ɛkɛ woodgɛn te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkɛ jiek naŋŋɛ a ɔɔn te yom ɛkɛ parɛ, acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ bala ikinti. Jiek paŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu agi ikin akcin kɛɛgin ɛkɛ, ɔci acca ɛkɛ noŋjin a ɔɔn doki.
Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin cuonnin ɛkɛ Kaci ɛkɛ Kacca ani ɛkɛy. Dala ikin jieyin Jwaŋa Tolan acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ pwanna a pwani ikinti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
