Ikin wannin ɛkɛ te yimg Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin bɔɔŋnin ɛkɛ acca doki te nɔji ikin. Yom pwani Juaŋ neeni tol tolo hay!
Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwanna a pwani ikinti awarɛ te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.
Ɔci acca ikin nɔɔnnin Juaŋ te ñing tɛɛn waakɛnda te jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te Kiṭɔ te yom ɛkɛ te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ jyeka jitkɛn kuoliwi ma te baaṭiy. Yeti ɛkɛ jiek oonɛ bora ikinti acca doki.

Jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ yomɛti neeni gɔki agi ne oŋ gɛɛlti ba oŋŋa guagdɛ ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ jiek ywaŋdɛ waakɛnda. Gena jyek waka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji, ɔci jyek waka bala ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ waak ywaŋdɛyɔ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci Kiṭɔ aga Ciɛggɔn waak waakɛnda.

Ɔci moki kan Juaŋ gɔki agi ɛkɛ noŋji gengayɛ, ɛkɛ jyeka neeni daldɛ budan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ noŋdi ba jyeka guagdi ɛkɛy. Gɔṭṭɛ, ɛkɛ ikin kɛnnin bora ba jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te baaṭi aŋka ikin aktin ma ɛkɛ woodgɛn te ñoowin ikin, ñoonin iki Kiṭɔ ba naŋka ɛkɛ buagɛ naŋka ḍaaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu dokiy.
Ikin maka jyeti Kiṭɔti ñamu neeniyɛ, dala ikin jieyin Juaŋ te pwani ɛkɛ.

Ɛkkɛ maka ciyi ban Ɛpacacyɛ, ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyeka awarɛ neeni daŋkun. Jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, gɔki agi Yaccu yaakinti yuoci ɛkkɛ. Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Kiṭɔti, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan Boŋ ɛkɛ Boŋa guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ agi ‘woñji may. Ɔci te Boŋ ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ lɛɛlnɛ Juaŋ bora a ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ ma Jwaŋa Tolan doki.

Te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ikinti neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin ne oŋ gɛɛlti ikin ‘wontin Juaŋ waka pwadin ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ikinti neeni, ɔci te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ŋeettin ikin a Juaŋ ikin wannin ɔci naŋŋin a ma ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin jiettin ɛkɛ te pwani ɛkɛ neeni.
’Ya tieŋŋan jyek ɛkkɛ doki agi ɛkkɛ jyetcɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔti, ɔci ɛkkɛ anjɛ Ma Kiṭɔ waakcinda.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk a pwatcin Juaŋti oŋkanda te ɛkkɛ. ‘Ya cɔk Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda.
’Ya cɔk Jwaŋ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti. Ɛkɛ a Wey ikin weya pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ Boŋ ɛkɛ Boŋa ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ñing tɛɛn ɔci ɛkkɛ laldɛ te Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ne pwadan.

Ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora, ɔci ɛkkɛ jyettɛ balgɛ kɛɛyɛ naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka bɛya ne baaṭiy. Ɔci ‘ya baal cɔk Juaŋti aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ ñing tɛɛno, aŋka jyeka neeni ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan yomgɔti. Ɔci ‘ya cɔk Juaŋti moki aŋka jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ neeni ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan ne Juaŋ gɔki agi ɛkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ ‘woñji waak ba naŋki ma baan ne kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn ‘wontiti ɛkkɛn moldiny. Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ ‘wondɛ waak ne pwadan.
’Ya cɔk Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ aŋka dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan war tɛɛn ‘wonninti ikin neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ tol tolo. Ikin maka jyeti ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ikin ‘wonnin ɛkɛ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.
War tɛɛn neeniyɛ, gena war tɛɛn Juaŋ Kiṭɔ luolnɛ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti mokiy. Ɔci te oŋŋa wanna Kiṭɔ coonnɛ Juaŋ taaŋɛti taaŋŋa byerɔn ñaalɔ pɔliji.
Ɔci waak waakɛnda waka bala acca ɔci waka bɛya ne baaṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala Kiṭɔ bieŋɛti. Gena malɛɛkan, ɔci jɔkin ṭɔlgɛn, ɔci cyekin bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji waakɛndayɛ, bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛti.
Te naŋki Juaŋyɛ, waak waakɛnda bala byeŋ Kiṭɔti. Jiek waakɛnda a jyek Kiṭɔ. Ɔci Kiṭɔ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ aŋi Ciɛggɔn ma kaniica waakɛnda.
Ɛkɛ a wyeñ ma kaniica, ɔci ma kaniica a war ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, genga bɔɔnjin Kiṭɔti moki bɛɛ. Ɔci waka aŋŋɛ Juaŋ ɔci noon wardayɛ, kuumi te ɛkɛ.
Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba maka tuutan acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ne yaayan, ɔci moki acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ nɔjjo. Yeti acca ɛkkɛ tɛɛtɛ te naŋka naŋŋɛ Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛti neeni.
Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ba naŋka iñɔ baanji wɛnni budan. Ɔci naŋka neeni gena naŋki ḍuaŋa boŋka yeyin. Gena ɛkɛ bala noŋi naŋka neeni maka bɛɛyi jyek Juaŋ yomgɛnti neeniy.

Te ñamu ikin waakida balkin noŋin ba maka yeyin neeni. Ikin balkin noŋin ba yomg ikin. Ɔci ikin balkin noŋin ba naŋka waak ikin buagɔn, ɔci ba paŋi ikin paŋŋa yaayan neeni. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya ikintiyɛ, ɔci kan ywobji ɛkɛ bɛya mati waakɛndayɛ, a ɔɔn yaayɛ bɛɛ. Yɔmjin a ɔɔn.
Yeti Jwaŋa Tolan noŋi a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ikinti. Ɛkɛ ani ikin ne tolan.
Ɔci ne ikin balkin ba maka tuutan te nɔji ikinyɛ, ikin ‘wonnin ɛkɛ tɛɛtin te tɛɛtin ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ Kiṭɔ wanna. Gɔṭṭɛ, ikin yɔɔññin ɛkɛ te naŋka ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonninti tɛɛtin te yom pwani ɛkɛ neeni.

Oŋŋa Kiṭɔ luolnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti mokiyɛ, ikin luolnin Juaŋ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛtin moki daŋkun. Ɔci ne Yaccu coonni Juaŋ taaŋɛtiyɛ, ikin coonnin Juaŋ taaŋɛti ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn, acaan ikin akin war ɛkɛ.
Ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka yom pwani ɛkɛ yom pwani tolan naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ikinti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni, warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ne yuonga bɛya ne baaṭi neeni.
Oŋŋa ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔññɛ ɛkɛ te yom pwani ɛkɛ parɛ neeni. Ɛkkɛ yɔɔññɛ ɛkɛ te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ gɛɛl bɛɛ.
Acaan Juaŋ buagɔn naa menga jieyi warɛ te yɔɔta ɛkɛ yɔɔññɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ.
Ikin naŋŋin Juaŋ aŋŋin maka wonkɛn te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ ikinti aŋka ikin noŋin naŋka pwadan naŋka ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ agi naŋcin ikiny.

Naa ɛkkɛ yiedɛ bɛɛ, ɛkkɛ jietki ma agi Keedin Pookɛn. Ɔci ma yahuud maka balkin jyek ŋwotiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍori ɛkkɛ agi maka ciyi budan te jyek ŋwotto. Yeti gɔṭṭɛ, jyek ŋwoti mayɛ, a jyek ŋwoti ma yoŋgɛn budan.

Ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ ɔntɔ te Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ kɛɛptɛ jitin iki maka muonɛ Juaŋ bora neeni, gena ma yahuud. Ɔci jyeka ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeniyɛ, a jyek ɛkkɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ kɛɛyɛ Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ waka pwadin. Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan a Jwaŋ ɛkkɛ bɛɛ.
Te ñamu ɛkkɛ longɛ ɔntɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti, yeti acca te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ ornɛti Jwaŋa Tolanti te yimg Kiṭɔ.

Kiṭɔyɛ, gena ɛkɛ eccin coodda pwadan ikinti aŋka jyek ma yahuud ywaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ i jyek Keedin Pookɛn aŋka ɛkkɛn ŋeeki neeni. Yoyyin ɛkkɛn yooki ñin wannayɛ, bala moki bɛɛ. Bawwin doki. Ɔci acca ɛkkɛn kɛɛptan jitin moki bɛɛ.
Oŋŋa Kiṭɔ tuuniyɛ, ganuun a genga nɔñji moki bɛɛ, ɔci ma yahuud i Keedin Pookɛn neeni naŋŋɛ Yaccu aŋi maka ne cyɛɛlɔ te naŋki ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ coodda pwadan oonɛ ikinti.

Gena te jyeka neeni aŋka Yaccu bɛɛni neeni. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn ɔci tuun kakanti aŋka maka neeni aga maka ne cyɛɛlɔ. Yoyyin ɛkkɛn yooki ñin neeni lɛɛŋŋɛ ɛkɛ jitin doki te oŋŋa ɛkɛ tuuni neeni. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn ñaaŋŋɛ ñin akki mena ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn yɔŋni jiek i Juaŋ daŋkun.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛn ɔci Keedin Pookɛn maka bala ɔntɔ lonin neeniyɛ, ñaaŋŋɛyɔ i ma yahuud maka cwalŋan neeni te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Gena jyek coodda pwadan.
Te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ikin waakida Keedin Pookɛn ɔci ma yahuudyɛ, yaakinti ortinti Wey ikinti te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Gena Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan.
Acca ɛkkɛ Keedin Pookɛn balgɛ ba maka wɛlg moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ maka ne cyɛɛlɔ i Ma Kiṭɔ. Ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan doki.
Ɛkkɛ waakida balgɛ ba ona pwadan ona cɔdi ma te gwoyiy. Ɔci cuudan Yaccu ɔci bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn a gwoyya yiecki ma on ŋwayɛ. Ɔci guonan tolan on warɛtiyɛ, gena Yaccu.
Ɔci gwoyya cɔttan ma on warɛtiyɛ, gena ɛkkɛ. Yaccu ɛkkɛ ywaŋŋɛyɔ ɔci ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ wara ne cyɛɛlɔ iki ɛkɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ waakida aŋŋɛ ba ona ne cyɛɛlɔ on Jwaŋa Tolan ona pwadan.
Ɛkkɛ Keedin Pookɛn ɔci ma yahuud acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ ona ciyi Jwaŋa Tolan te Boŋ ɛkɛ.
Gena ‘ya Buuluc mena olji ma ciginji te ɛkkɛ Keedin Pookɛn ne ‘ya baala mieta ɛkkɛ te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔy.
Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ ne ‘ya naŋŋata Juaŋ aŋŋa mena moki ɛkkɛ te yom pwani ɛkɛ parɛ boki?
Ɛkkɛ kieŋnin ‘ya jiek gɛɛg doki te naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan ne ɛkɛ ‘ya lɛɛrnati jyek Yaccu jyeka coggin te ñamuy. Ɛkkɛn oonɛ Juaŋ bora ‘yati.
Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ poktɛ jyeka kiewan ‘ya ɛkkɛti te ñamu neeniyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan jyek Kiṭɔ jyeka coggin te ñamuyɛ, jitkɛn ŋeej ‘ya ne pwadan.
Yɔrg ikinyɛ, jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ ŋeecin ɛkkɛn ne pwadan bɛɛ. Yeti acca jiek oonɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bora ma ɛkɛti. Gena Cuudan Yaccu ɔci bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan maka yomgɛn bala Juaŋti ne pwadany.

Jyeka coggin oonɛ Boŋ Juaŋ bora neeniyɛ, gena jyek ñoowin ma yahuud iki Keedin Pookɛn te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Jyeka neeni gɔki agi waka ‘wondɛ Juaŋ ma yahuudyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ Juaŋ Keedin Pookɛn daŋkun, ɔci ɛkkɛn aŋi yoŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ma yahuudti te Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, aŋi jyek Keedin Pookɛn daŋkun.
’Ya naŋŋa Jwaŋa Tolan aŋi mena mieti ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. ‘Ya ‘wonna Juaŋ kanŋa neeni te yom pwani ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bala kanŋan ne tolan ‘yati te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.

’Ya a mena ḍiɛran te Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda, yeti ‘ya ‘wonna Jwaŋa Tolan kanŋa ɛkɛ te yom pwani ɛkɛ aŋka ‘ya miet Keedin Pookɛn te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni te Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci jyeka neeni bala ba mala ma ‘wondɛ Juaŋ a mala tolany.
Juaŋ buagɔn ‘ya ma myetka jiek jitkɛn waakɛnda agi ɛkɛ jyeka neeni cɔmdɛ bora a ɔki. Te ñamu jyeka neeni a coggin yuonginda ɔɔn, ɔci jyeka neeni bala aŋa Juaŋti mena oki waak waakɛnda neeni parɛ.

Ɔci acca jyek yɔɔta ma yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ bɛɛn bora doki, ɔci ñing tɛɛn Juaŋ ñing tɛɛn tolan ŋeecin malɛɛkan ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci boŋko, ɔci jɔkin waakɛnda. Ñing tɛɛn Juaŋ neeni yuarɛ ɛkkɛn ne Juaŋ noŋi naŋki ɛkɛ ma kaniicatiy.
Jwaŋa Tolan balki jyek naŋka neeni yomɛti te baaṭi doki ne ṭɛɛr men baawiy. Ɔci ne Yaccu Kiṭɔ Ciɛggɔn ikin neeni bɛɛni dokiyɛ, Juaŋ jyeka neeni naŋŋɛ ba jyeka ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛ dokiy.
Ɔci ne ikin balkin Yaccuti te jyenna ikin jyettin ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ikin yaakinti ortinti Jwaŋa Tolanti ne pwadan. Ikin buayin genga bɛɛ.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ka naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tuwa te taab bala ‘yati neeni bɛɛ. Taab ‘ya neeniyɛ, etti naŋka pwadan ɛkkɛti.
Ne ‘ya baala poŋa jyek naŋka naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan pwadan neeniyɛ, gɔ ‘ya moki ḍwoñji iñɔ morci Wey ɔɔn ñamɛti ɔɔn.
Ɛkɛ a mena ‘woñi ma waakɛnda te yenti ɛkɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji ɔci iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni.
Ɔci ‘ya cɔk Juaŋti ka dala ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ yomgɔti te Boŋ ɛkɛ, te pwani ɛkɛ pwanna tolan neeniti acaan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ tɛɛna tɛɛno.
’Ya cɔk Juaŋti ka dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ aga nona ciyi Kiṭɔ oŋkanda te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ɛkɛti neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ tiittɛti jyek oonnin ma oonki yɔtin ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan
aŋka ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ne tɛyan. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ i Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda anna Kiṭɔ ani ɛkkɛ tol tol bala a ɔki.
Anna neeniyɛ, tol tolo. Mena anna neeni ŋeejɛ warda ne pwadanyɛ, gɔ bala bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya aŋka baal cɔk Juaŋti aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ kuma ne tolan te Jwaŋa Tolan.

’Ya jiey Jwaŋa Tolan mena noŋi naŋka tɛyan ikin yomgɔti te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ neeni. ‘Ya jiey ɛkɛ a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ yaakinti noŋi naŋka tɛyan neeni ne tolan nɔñji, ɔci naŋki ɛkɛ neeni ‘uottiti ɛkɛ parɛ ba bolja ikin yaakinti paŋtin bɛɛy.
Dala ma jieddi Juaŋ ne tolan te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ma kaniicati te Yaccu Kiṭɔy. Dala ɛkkɛn jyeddi ɛkɛ yuonginda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.
Gena ‘ya a mena olji ma ciginji te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔy. ‘Ya ṭey ɛkkɛ ka dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan acaan ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora.
Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ḍyɛrdi. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwaddi mati oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ loomgɔ tɛya. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ bɔyyɛ yɔtin pookɔ ne ɛkkɛ oonni yɔtin pookɔy.
Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka ne cyɛɛlɔ te Boŋ Juaŋ Boŋa ɛkkɛ noŋnɛ ŋɛyy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ŋeewin ɛkkɛ ŋeenɛ, ɔci ñoonɛ neeni tiidɛ ñin oŋkanda ɔɔn.
Ɛkkɛ agɛ yoŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci Boŋ Juaŋ a Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ moki. Ɛkkɛ muonɛ bora Jwaŋa Tolan ne cyɛɛlɔ parɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ jyettɛ kɛɛyɛ naŋka ne cyɛɛlɔ daŋkun.
Ɛkkɛ balkɛ Ciɛggɔn ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci jyenna ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci bulta ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Jwaŋ ɛkkɛ a Jwaŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ a Wey ikin waakida. Waak waakɛnda buannɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ kanŋan waakti waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ ciyi waak jitin waakɛnda.

Juaŋ yomɛ pwad pwad ikinti waakida. Ikin ‘wonnin Kiṭɔ naŋka pwadin waakida te yom ɛkɛ parɛ. Ɔci naŋka ikin ‘wonninti Kiṭɔ pwadin neeniyɛ, a naŋka ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ. Ikin ‘wonnin ɛkɛ naŋko, ɔci menga da te naŋki ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da te naŋki ɛkɛ.
Jyeka neeni bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Ne ɛkɛ atti ñaalɔ pɔlijiyɛ, ɛkɛ ma gɛɛg yaallɛ eññɛ bieŋɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ ma baan ‘wonnɛ waak te yom ɛkɛ budan.”
Ne worga gɔki agi, “Kiṭɔ atti ñaalɔ pɔlijiyɛ,” a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba worga gɔki te bɛɛna ɛkɛ bɛɛni te ñaalɔ, bɛɛni iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrjiy.
Yaccu neeni bɛɛn iñɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ moki ati ñaalɔ nona loonan pɔlijiy. Ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka noon warda kuma te ɛkɛ te iñɔ wɛnni ne nona loonan ñaalɔ ɔɔn.

Ikin ‘wonnin ɛkɛ naŋki ɛkɛ budan. Ɔci naŋka neeni waakɛnda bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ. Ma gɛɛg ikinti a cuudan Juaŋ eci jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci ma gɛɛg naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ a bɔwan. Ɔci ma gɛɛg naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ aŋi maka booti baan konɛ loṭi ma te jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci ma gɛɛg naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ a gaciicin. Ɔci ma gɛɛg naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ aŋi maka loṭi may.
Acaan ikin agen war Yaccuyɛ, Juaŋ men da ‘woñgi kanŋa ɛkɛ, ɔci men da ‘woñgi kanŋa ɛkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛn Ma Kiṭɔ maktan ne pwadan te jiek waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn aŋka Ma Kiṭɔ kooptan ñaalɔ.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin maktin Juaŋ te naŋki ikin neeni oŋkanda, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ikin aktin maka ne cyɛɛlɔ te jyenna ikin jyettin Yaccuti, ɔci te ŋeejjin ikin Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeennin ne pwadan neeniy. Acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ikin baltin waak waakɛnda yomgɔti waakida, ɔci ‘uottin ñamu, ɔci ikin baltin ba Yaccu ɔɔn.

Ɔci kan ikin balkin a ɔɔnyɛ, ikin balkin ba kɛɛgin moki bɛɛ. Ɔci kan jyeka laltan ma a jomgin gɛɛg bɛya ikintiyɛ, ikin balkin ba waka peedɛ jwami budan bɛɛ. Pɔya ikin yɔɔttin ne tɛyan bala doki. Ɔci maka ñingɛn tɛyan te naŋki ma ñingɛnyɛ, kan ɛkkɛn buagɔn noŋdi a ɔɔn ikintiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti noŋdi genga ikinti bɛɛ.
Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ikin waakida gɔktin jyeka awarɛ te yoma pwadan. Dala ikin ‘uottin ñamu aŋka baltin ba Kiṭɔ te naŋki waakɛnda, ɛkɛ a wyeñ ikin.

Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn i Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn a wara ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a wyeñ ikin, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena ikin naŋtin ciyin ne pwadan ba maka ne cyɛɛlɔy, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin naŋtin kantin ne pwadan waakida aŋka ikin balkin ba wara baaki waja ɔci tɛyany. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan menga da te kanŋa ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da te kanŋa ɛkɛyɛ, ikin ‘uottin ñamu te jyek oonnin yɔtin.
Tieŋdɛ jyeka guagdi ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeni. ‘Ya gɔk ɛkkɛti te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin, ka dala ɛkkɛ mwondɛ te naŋki maka ciyi budan te jyek Juaŋo. Dala ɛkkɛ paŋŋa paŋtan ɛkkɛn a paŋŋa budan neeni daldɛ.
Acaan ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi jiek jitkɛn ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn balki tɛɛtin Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ciyi budan amaamo. Ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn tɛy tɛy aŋka tɛɛtin Juaŋ baawi ɛkkɛnti neeni.
Ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi te jyek naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn, walla balkɛ lɔɔn moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn poŋi te gena jyek naŋki tomi budan. Ɛkkɛn naŋki tomi gɛɛl dalji bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi naŋka yeyin jitkɛn waakɛnda.
Ne ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek Kiṭɔyɛ, jyeka neeni bala ba jyeka neeni boki? Hayɛllɛ!
Çeej ‘ya ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ te naŋki Yaccu doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ Yaccuti doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ma te jyek Yaccu jyeka awarɛ neeni.

Jyek ɛkɛ neeni gɔki agi dala ɛkkɛ mwonjɛ te yom ɛkkɛ yoma te baaṭi yoma ɛkkɛ oldɛ noŋɛ ba naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka te baaṭiy. Yom ɛkkɛ yoma a daan neeni ɛkɛ buagɔn waka coŋin amaam budan, ɔci waka coŋin neeniyɛ, yomg ɛkkɛ maaltan ɔci yaatan ɛkkɛn.

Dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun ooktɛ yomga wonkɛn, ɔci wyetka wonkɛn naŋŋɛ Juaŋ ba yom ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ baldɛ ba Juaŋo, ɔci ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ɛkɛ jyeka awarɛ neeni te naŋka pwadin naŋka ɛkɛ buagɛy.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ mwondɛ te jomi jieko. Dala ɛkkɛ gɔgdɛ yɔtin te jyeka awarɛ oŋkanda, acaan ikin waakidayɛ, ikin akin yoŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Kan ɛkkɛ looñi te gengayɛ, naa loñka neeni etti nɔji ɛkkɛ yomgɔti bɛɛ. Ɔci naa loñka neeni ḍuadɛ yomgɔti oŋkanda ɔɔn bɛɛ. Dala baadi ne noon men bɔwi ɔɔn.
Naa Jwaŋa Yaayan pɔktɛ pɔy aŋka ɛkkɛ pɔɔdɛ yomgɔti te loñk ɛkkɛ neeni bɛɛ.
Mena bala koṭi waakyɛ, dala ɛkɛ mwondi te kali waako. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ noŋdi kanŋa pwadan te byeŋ ɛkɛ. Dala ɛkɛ balki waak te kanŋa naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te byeŋ ɛkɛ aŋka dala ɛkɛ moki maka anin daŋkun.
Naa ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ jyeka yeyin oŋgati bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ jyeka pwadan jyeka ma kooptan ñaalɔ aŋka maka neeni maktan jyek ɛkkɛ neeni.

Naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ naŋka yaayan aŋka Boŋ Juaŋ yomɛ wiak a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Acaan Boŋ Juaŋ ɛkkɛ yomgɔti neeni bala ba mañ Juaŋo. Ɔci maka balki mañ Juaŋ te Boŋ ɛkɛ te wanna ɛkkɛn wannɛ Juaŋ neeniyɛ, cwamdi ɛkɛ ne baaṭi.
Dala ɛkkɛ mwondɛ te yom yoño, ɔci te ywobjo, ɔci moki te loñka budan, ɔci moki te wɛyyin, ɔci moki te lomi jieko. Ɔci naa jwalla yaayan gɛɛl daldɛ niin ɛkkɛ yomgɔti bɛɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ moowɛ yɔtin pookɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ bala mati moki, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ bɔyyɛ yɔtin pookɔ daŋkun bala ba bɔɔkin ɛkkɛ bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni.
Dala ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ani ɛkkɛ ne tolan.
Kiṭɔ ani ikin ne tolan aŋka ɛkɛ tuuni te nɔji ikin, ɔci baalli ba gena ‘yɛri ma pwadan Juaŋti neeni. Ɔci dala anna ɛkkɛ oondi yɔtin bala a ɔɔn daŋkun.

Acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, naa jiek bɛya te bora ɛkkɛti agi ɛkkɛ baljɛ noŋjɛ tomi a ɔɔn bɛɛ, ɔci walla naa jiek bɛya ɛkkɛti agi ɛkkɛ anjɛ wak maka pookcɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci kan jyek naŋka neeni bɛya Ma Kiṭɔti bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin.
Naa ɛkkɛ jyeyɛ te jyek wɛlji ɔci te jyeka yeyin bɛɛ. Ɔci moki naa ɛkkɛ juolɛ jyeka yeyin bɛɛ. Jyeka neeniyɛ, yɔmjin Ma Kiṭɔti bɛɛ. Yeti dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ agi pwatcin Juaŋti oŋkanda.

Acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ maka noŋi tomi ɔci maka poŋi jyeka yeyin, ɔci maka ani wak maka pookɛnyɛ, non ɛkkɛn baaw ban Kiṭɔ i ban Juaŋo. Jyek ani wak maka pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba jyek mali jɔkin yeyin ɔɔn daŋkun.
Naa ɛkkɛ naŋtɛ ma ñin te jyeka budan neeni bɛɛ. Te naŋka yeyin neeniyɛ, ywobji Juaŋ bɛya mati. Gena maka tuoci waakɛn te jyek ɛkɛy.
Naa ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ iki ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ te nona mielo, yeti acca ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ yoŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ iki Yaccu, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ nona bɔwanti acca. Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ne pwadan ba maka ciyi te nona bɔwany.
Naŋka bɛya te nona bɔwantiyɛ, gena naŋka pwadan ɔci naŋka awarɛ.
Te ñamu dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ ne pwadan, ɔci kan naŋki ɛkkɛ pwad pwad Ciɛggɔn ikintiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ oŋ noŋdɛ oŋo. Kan naŋka neeni pwatcin bɛɛyɛ, naa noŋdɛ bɛɛ.
Naŋka naŋtan maka ciyi te nona ulanti menyɛ, etti jyeka pwadin bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ iki ɛkkɛn te naŋka neeni bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka gɔktɛ ɛkkɛnti, ɛkkɛn ṭeedɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛn.
Acaan naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn lieda neeniyɛ, yaayɛ ne tolan. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ‘ya gɔkta jyek naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni ‘ya tukuti bɛɛ.

Naŋki waakɛndayɛ, kan eetan ma bora nona bɔwantiyɛ, ɔci ŋeettan ma ne kan naŋki pwadɔy. Kan noon bɔw bɔwyɛ, ma yaakinti naŋka yeyin neeni coktan iñɔ moki bɛɛ. Acaan ne nona bɔwan dɛkti nona ulantiyɛ, ɔci nona ulan neeni baadi doki.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, bala ba jwalla gɔki agi, “Mena wici, i ṭiewa, hay! Mena tuuta, i jɔlla ñaalɔ, ɔci Kiṭɔ i dyɛgdi.”
Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te coodi ɛkkɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba maka jiek kwoyɔn noŋi amaam budan ɔɔn bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba maka ñingɛn tɛyan.
Dala ɛkkɛ tiecɛ oŋki ɛkkɛ waakɛn ne pwadan acaan nɔji tol tol mati.
Naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba maka jiek kwoyɔn bɛɛ. Dala yom Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan.
Naa ɛkkɛ noktɛ mooy bɛɛ. Acaan nooŋi mooyyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ yaatɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ aŋka kuma te gena Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda.
Ne ɛkkɛ coottɛ iñɔ a cyɛɛlɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ jyeyɛ te ɔɔlga ɛkkɛ laldɛ Boŋ Juaŋy, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ‘ualɛ Juaŋti moki te yomg ɛkkɛ.
Ɔci oŋkandayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ a pwatcin Wey ikin Juaŋti te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ te waak waakɛnda.
Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek modg ɛkkɛ acaan ɛkkɛ waakida noŋɛ ne pwadan Yaccu Kiṭɔti.
Moongo, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛ bala ba bolja ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek Ciɛggɔn ikiny.
Maka ‘uayyɛ, ɛkkɛn a wyetk maka moong bala ba Kiṭɔ ɛkɛ a wyeñ ma kaniica. Ma kaniicayɛ, ɛkkɛn a war Kiṭɔ, ɔci Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci Ma kaniica.
Ɔci ba bolja ma kaniica tyeŋki jyek Kiṭɔ oŋkanda neeniyɛ, dala moong tieŋdi jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛn oŋkanda daŋkun.
Ɛkkɛ, maka ‘uayo, dala ɛkkɛ anɛ moong ɛkkɛ ne tolan bala ba bolja Kiṭɔ ani ma kaniica, ɔci ɛkɛ tuuni te ɛkkɛny.
Yaccu tuun te ma kaniica aŋka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwaddi te nɔji ne ɛkkɛn bultɛti may. Ɔci jyek Jwaŋa Tolan neeni ɛkkɛn naŋtan pwaddi Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti.

Ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ma kaniica pwada ɛkɛ ñingɛti ne tolan. Dala ɛkkɛn bala ba mena ɛŋi bworŋin pwadin, bworŋin giikkɛn baawy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Kiṭɔ buagɔn naa gena yaayan gɛɛl bala kaniica ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala maka ‘uayyɛ, ɛkkɛn ani moong ɛkkɛn ba ne ɛkkɛn anki waak ɛkkɛn ɔɔn. Kan menga ani ɛŋ ɛkɛyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkɛ ani war ɛkɛ daŋkun.

Men gɛɛl yookɔn te war ɛkɛ boki? Hayɛllɛ! Men gɛɛl yookɔn te war ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔṭi kon ɛkɛ oŋkanda ne pwadan te waka amdɛ ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔṭi war ɛkɛ ne pwadan oŋkanda bala ba ne Kiṭɔ gɔṭi kaniica ɛkɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn,
acaan ikin akin war ɛkɛ.

Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne mena kaalgɔn ḍɛɛdi ɛɛŋyɛ, ɛkɛ on weegɛn ɔci mɛɛgɛn daldɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ciyi iki ɛŋ ɛkɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ñoowin yaakkɛn doki. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋi ba mena ne cyɛɛlɔ doki, a yyɛɛwɔ moki bɛɛ.”
Jwalla neeniyɛ, gɔki te mena ‘uan i ɛŋ ɛkɛ. Ɔci jwalla neeniyɛ, kon ɛkɛ ɛka parɛ bala moki. ‘Ya gɔk ka gena jyek ñoowin Kiṭɔ i kaniica ɛkɛ.
Ɛkkɛyɛ, dala maka ‘uay ani moong ɛkkɛn ba ne ɛkkɛn anki waak ɛkkɛn ɔɔn. Ɔci moongyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛn te yoma pwadan.
Kɛɛgin, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek weyi ɛkkɛ ɔci ba jyek mɛyi ɛkkɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin Jwaŋa Tolanti.
Ne Juaŋ gɔŋni mati te ganuun jiña neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ jwali gɛɛl naŋɛ ɛkɛ iki ma doki te ganuun jiña neeni. Ganuun jiña neeni gɔki agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek weyi ɛkkɛ ɔci jyek mɛyi ɛkkɛ te yoma pwadanyɛ,
ɔci coodi ɛkkɛ pwada ɔci beya iñɔ baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni.”
Hay, kɛɛgin weyyɛn, naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ kɛɛgin ɔɔrndɛ a ɔɔrŋin a ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛn loondi bɛɛ. Dala kɛɛgin ɛkkɛ laldɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ṭeedɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan aŋka ɛkkɛn bootti Ciɛggɔn ikinti.

Maka kɛɛnko, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyek kanŋa weyyɛn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ te yoma pwadan kanŋa weyyɛnti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ buattɛ ɛkkɛn. Ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ kanŋa neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ kanŋa neeni a kanŋa Kiṭɔ.

Acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛnk Kiṭɔyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ kanŋa ne pwadan te kanŋa weyyɛn ñingɛnti budan bɛɛ, ne ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn te ma ñingɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛ buagɛ dala ma jieyi ɛkkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun kandɛ ne pwadan ne kanŋa weyyɛn baaki daŋkuny. Kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn te yoma pwadanyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti noŋdɛ ba naŋka Juaŋ buagɛy.
Dala kanŋa ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ waakɛnda te yoma pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ kanŋa neeni naŋdɛ Juaŋti, naa naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ ma baanti budan bɛɛ.
Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ kan men gɛɛl a kɛɛngɔn walla kan a kɛɛngɔn bɛɛyɛ, waka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ne pwadan wannayɛ, etti waka pwadin ne baaṭi te Ciɛggɔn ikinti.

Hay! Kanŋa weyyɛn, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwaddi kɛɛnk ɛkkɛti daŋkun. Naa ɛkkɛ ɔɔrŋɛ kɛɛnk ɛkkɛ waakɛn a ɔɔrŋin te jyeka yeyin neeni bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ yeya te jyeka neeni bɛɛ. Wey ɛkkɛ Weya ñaalɔ pɔlijiyɛ, ɛkɛ a Wey ɛkkɛ waakida i kɛɛnk ɛkkɛ. Ɛkɛ a mena kɛɛb ma jitkɛn bɛɛ.
Jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl bala moki ne cyɛɛlɔ. Acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ Jwaŋa Tolantiyɛ, dala war tɛɛn ɛkɛ bala ɛkkɛti oŋkanda, acaan war tɛɛn ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, tol tol ɔci tɛɛna tɛɛno.

Ne lañ baaliyɛ, ma ɛŋi wak laño. Ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ naŋki Juaŋ aŋka ne ɛkkɛ noogdɛ iki Jwaŋa Yaayan daŋkunyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ te naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkɛ te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ.
Ikin noowin iki ma baan bɛɛ. Ikin noowin iki jɔkin yeyin pɔɔldinji, ɔci ikin noowin i jɔkin yeyin i Jwaŋa Yaayan mena etti naŋka yeyin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni neeni.
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋki Juaŋ waakɛnda aŋka ne oŋŋa jiek yiekti ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan. Ɔci ne lañ baali toliyɛ, ɛkkɛ yooŋdɛ ɔntɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ yɔɔttɛ iñɔ ne tɛyan ɔɔn.

’Ya gɔk ɛkkɛti dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te ŋeejin ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ŋeejɛ ba mena warɛ ywaŋŋɛ buagɔn noŋi ṭwaŋy. Dala ɛkkɛ baltɛ yoma pwadan. Yoma pwadan neeniyɛ, bala ba buarñan ḍyɛktan ma korkɛnti ne ma nookiy.
Dala ɛkkɛ baltɛ yoma buagɔn mieti ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Gena jyek coodda pwadan. Ɔci ba jyek yoma buagɔn miti ma neeniyɛ, bala ba mena ɛŋi wɛyi ṭwaŋ ciegɛtiy.
Dala jyeni ɛkkɛ tiektɛ ne tɛyan oŋkanda bala ba kɔɔrña eetan ma ṭwaŋti aŋka dooŋɛ ɛkkɛ jyek Jwaŋa Yaayan jyeka bala ba cowwa tuggɛn bitin cowwa noki ɛkkɛy.

Dala ɛkkɛ baltɛ yɔɔt Juaŋ yɔɔta yuoci ɛkkɛy. Ɔci jyek yɔɔt neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek taaggan ‘yɛŋtan ma a taaggan ṭwaŋy. Dala ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ jyeka ikin ‘wonninti Boŋ Juaŋ neeni ŋeeddɛ. Ɔci jwali Juaŋ neeni bala ba byeŋgaaran ikinti.

Dala ɛkkɛ cɔkɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn. Naa ɛkkɛ woodɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ toottɛ aŋka dala Juaŋ ɛkkɛ magdɛ, cɔktɛ ɛkɛti te wɔɔkan waakɛnda ne ɛkkɛ wɛɛdɛ Boŋ Juaŋy. Acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan, naa togdɛ bɛɛ, dala cɔktɛ oŋkanda te Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda.

Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te ‘ya daŋkun. Ne ‘ya tuku pɔkta gɔkta mati loṭa mayɛ, dala Juaŋ ‘ya ‘wonda jyeka pwadin tukuti aŋka ‘ya yaaktati gɔkca mati ne pwadan te jyeka jitkɛn a coggin mati te baaṭi jyeka lɛɛlnɛ Juaŋ bora a jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni.

’Ya a cuuda Yaccu ec jyek ɛkɛ mati, ɔci acca ‘ya ḍɛɛkka ma te jiŋgin te jyek ɛkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te ‘ya aŋka ne ‘ya gɔkta matiyɛ, naa ‘ya buay genga bɛɛ. Dala ‘ya gɔkca mati te yoma tɛyan, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin.
Ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘ya ŋeeddata ne ‘ya baala ciya a ɔkiy, ɔci ne ‘ya baala noŋa a ɔkiy. Ticcikoc, ɛkɛ a mena anki may, ɔci ɛkɛ bala tieci kanŋa Juaŋ warɛ ne pwadan. Ɛkkɛ nɔɔttɛ ɛkɛ te coodi ‘ya waakɛnda.
’Ya ɛkɛ cuoñña ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ myettɛ ɛkɛ te jyek ɔɔn, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya ɔci yomgɔ tɛya.

Modg ikin waakɛndayɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ Juaŋ coodda pwadan. Ɔci anna Juaŋ ani mayɛ, dala oldɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti daŋkun. Ɔci dala Juaŋ ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ jyek jyeni daŋkun. Dala waka neeni bɛya mati te Wey ikin Juaŋti, ɔci te Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti moki.
Maka ani Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ne pwadan oŋkandayɛ, dala Juaŋ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda.

Hay! Ɛkkɛ modg ɔɔn Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda ban Pilibbi, ɔɔn kienɔn worga ɛkkɛti, ɔci gaciicinti daŋkun, ɔci dikannti daŋkun. Gena ‘ya Buuluc ɔci mod ikin Timutawuc kɛɛnk Yaccu Kiṭɔ kienɔn worga ɛkkɛti neeni.
Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin i Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwani daŋkun.
Gɔṭṭɛ, modg ɔɔn, oŋkanda ne ‘ya baala poŋa te ɛkkɛyɛ, ‘ya gɔk Jwaŋa Tolanti a pwatcin te ɛkkɛ.
Ɔci oŋkanda ne ‘ya baala cɔka Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ waakida a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya cɔk te yoma ñɔyan.
’Ya yomu ñɔy ñɔy acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ mokɛ ‘ya oŋkanda te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan te oŋŋa ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek Juaŋ wanna ne acca neeniti ɔɔn.
Çeej ‘ya ne pwadan, Jwaŋa Tolan mena poccin noŋi kanŋa pwadan ɛkkɛ yomgɔti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ kanŋa neeni daldɛ budan amaam bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ kandi ne pwadan ɛkkɛti ɔɔn ne oŋŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdi ɔɔn.

Ɛkkɛ balgɛ ‘ya yomuti oŋkanda! A ɔŋŋiyɛ, yɔmjin ‘yati doki ne ‘ya noŋa a ɔɔn ɛkkɛtiy, acaan ɛkkɛ waakida ñoonin iki ‘ya te wɔɔka ‘ya ‘wonnata Juaŋ neeni. Kan ‘ya baal ciginji walla kan ‘ya baal borayɛ, ‘ya yuoc jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ ñoonin iki ‘ya te jyeka neeni aŋka ‘ya jyeka neeni yɔɔtca iñɔ ne tɛyan.
Yom ‘ya ŋeejɛ Juaŋ ne ‘ya baala ana ɛkkɛ a ɔkiy. ‘Ya yomu bala ɛkkɛti ne tolan ba ne Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomɛ baali ɛkkɛti wanna ɔɔn.

’Ya cɔk Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ ka dala anna ɛkkɛ anɛ Juaŋ ɔci anna ɛkkɛ anɛ ma baan dala tola daŋkun. Ɔci ŋeejin ɛkkɛ jiek ŋeejɛ neeniyɛ, dala ciɛña a ciɛnñi gɔ moki ciɛñji ñamu ɔɔn. Dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ tɛya gɔ moki ñingɔ tɛyin ɔɔn

aŋka jiek jitkɛn ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, jyeka neeni pwadɔ walla yeyɔ. Naa jyeka pookɛn gɛɛg bala ɛkkɛ yomgɔti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ ne oŋŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdi ɔɔn. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan, naa maka pookɛn ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ te naŋki ɛkkɛ bɛɛ.
Ɔci ba bolji jana wyeñɛ kuumi te ṭɔlgɛ neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun yomgɔ kuma te naŋka pwadin naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ma gɔrti ne naŋki Juaŋ pwadiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn jieddi ɛkɛ.
Hay! Modg ɔɔn, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne ‘ya olkata ma ciginji a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya kanŋa Juaŋ yaañi te naŋka neeni bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, aŋka jiek ooddi baan konɛ warda.
Jyek coodi ‘ya jiju ciginji te jyek Kiṭɔyɛ, ŋeecɔn ackan i ma akuuma nona neeni wɛnni waakɛnda. Ɔci jyek ‘ya ati baan konɛti warda daŋkun.
Modg ikin modga coŋinyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki jyek coodi ‘ya jiju ciginjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn tɛɛn te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala mieti ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan ne pwadan. Ɛkkɛn buayi menga moki bɛɛ.

Awarɛ, hay! Modg ɔɔn, ma gɛɛg mieti ma te jyek Kiṭɔ te yoma pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn korkɛn modɔ te naŋka naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ‘yati neeni, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ mati bɛɛ. Yeti maka pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn loṭi ma te yoma pwadan.
Ɛkkɛn ani ‘ya acaan te kanŋa naŋdi ‘ya a kanŋa Kiṭɔ neeni, ɔci ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn ‘ya baal jiju wɛnni te jyek kanŋa Yaccu.
Maka loṭi ma te yoma yaayan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn korkɛn modɔ ‘yati, ɔci ɛkkɛn loṭi ma te yoma awarɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi ne ɛkkɛn lortinti ma a ɔɔnyɛ, agi aŋka ‘ya taabjɔ ne tolan ciginji wɛnni.
Yeti baatɔ! Ne ma balki lorki ma te yoma yaayan walla te yoma awarɛyɛ, jyek Kiṭɔ bala ooddi mati men ɔɔn, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
Yom ‘ya mwondi te ñɔɔn bɛɛ. ‘Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ cɔkɛ Juaŋti te ‘ya, ɔci Boŋ Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala ‘yati, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya ‘ya pɔkta Juaŋo.
Yom ‘ya buagɔn dala ‘ya gɔkca mati ne pwadan acca, ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔn lɔɔdja bɛɛ. Kan ‘ya nokta ma, walla kan ‘ya ciy tɛɛt men ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya buaga dala Kiṭɔ ŋeettan ma a Kiṭɔ tol tol te naŋki ‘ya neeni.
Kan ‘ya ciy tɛɛt ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya ciy noŋ kanŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Yeti kan ‘ya tuudyɛ, pwatcin ne tolan nɔñji, acaan Juaŋ ‘woñi ‘ya te waka pwadin.
Kan ‘ya ciy tɛɛtyɛ, ɔci ‘ya yaakati ma magdi te jyek Juaŋo.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya waru yikcan ñaalɔ gena naŋdi ne cyɛɛlɔ yuarca bɛɛ, ‘ya yaakati gɔkca lien pwatcin, walla jyek tɛɛtin aŋka pwatcin bɛɛ. Yomg ‘ya a yyɛɛwɔ. Yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ gɛɛl buagɔn ‘ya ciy meni. Ɔci yoma parɛ buagɔn ‘ya tuudo. Ɔci gena yom ‘ya buagiti ne pɛñanyɛ, gena lyena ‘ya tuuda ɔci oodda ban Yaccuti ɛkɛ aŋka pwatcin ne tolan te coodda ciya ‘ya iñɔ wɛnniy.
Yeti kan ‘ya yadi wɛnni te ɛkkɛyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin.
Ɛɛ, jwali gɛɛl ŋeej ‘ya ne pwadan, ‘ya yaddo. Ɔci ɛkkɛ magdin ‘ya aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu, ɔci aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi te jyek jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti neeni.
Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ne ‘ya bɛɛda ɛkkɛti mokiyɛ, ɛkkɛ jieddɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.

Yeti kan ‘ya bɛɛd ɛkkɛti ɔci walla kan ‘ya bɛɛd ɛkkɛti bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan te yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ. Dala naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ oŋkanda neeniyɛ, dala bala ba naŋki jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ mietɛ ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, dala paŋi ɛkkɛ aga paŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ.

Ɔci ne ma tiekti te jyeka neeniyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yeyɔ te jyek ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ŋeettan ɛkkɛn jiek bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti ne baaṭi. Ɔci te naŋka wanna mokiyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ Juaŋo.

Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Kiṭɔti doki, ɔci a ɔɔn pwatcin. Yeti jyek jyenna ɛkkɛ jyetti Kiṭɔti neeniyɛ, bala parɛ bɛɛ, jyek taab bala ɛkkɛti daŋkun. Kan taab bala ɛkkɛti te yenti Kiṭɔyɛ, a ɔɔn yaayɛ bɛɛ. A ɔɔn pwatcin daŋkun.
Taab yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ ‘yati te kanŋa Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ɛkkɛti daŋkun, ɔci bala ‘yati acca men ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ bawwin men bɛɛ.
Tieŋdɛ, modg ɔɔn Ma Kiṭɔ, kan ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛy tɛy te naŋki ɛkɛ, ɔci kan lati ma korkɛn ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ, ɔci kan Boŋ Juaŋ bala ɛkkɛti, ɔci kan yomg ɛkkɛ bala mati ne pwadanyɛ,
dala ‘ya yomu ñɔya te naŋki ɛkkɛ neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ oondi yɔtin waakida. Ɔci dala yomg ɛkkɛ aga ba yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ba maka ne cyɛɛlɔ.

Naa ɛkkɛ anɛ waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ naŋki yyɛji bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ waakɔ naŋdɛ ba maka ḍwaŋin bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ bala ba maka ḍyɛrin, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ agi maka pookɛn ɛkkɛn aŋka pwadɔ te ɛkkɛ.
Naa ɛkkɛ mokɛ waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ maka pookɛn magdɛ daŋkun.
Dala yomg ɛkkɛ bala ba yom Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.
Ɛkɛ a Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkɛ a wara ne cyɛɛlɔ iki Jwaŋa Tolan, yeti ɛkɛ yookɔn te jyek ḍyɛrji bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala ‘yeṭi warɛ aŋka warɛ poortɛti Juaŋti te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ.
Ɛkɛ warɛ naŋŋɛ ba ne ɛkɛ a genga bɛɛ no. Ɔci ɛkɛ aŋi ba bolji mena kɛɛngɔn. Ɛkɛ warɛ aaŋŋɛ aŋi men baano.
Ɔci ɛkɛ jyek Juaŋ tiiññiyɔ waakɛnda iki jyek lyen ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Gena lyena tuuni ɛkɛ kakantiy.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu koomnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ñaalɔ ɔci ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ yenta tolan. Ɔci yenta neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ tol tol te yenga pookɛn waakɛnda.
Ɔci ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ma ḍwondi iñɔ ɛkɛ ñamɛti morti ɛkɛti waakɛnda. Gena maka ñaalɔ pɔliji i maka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni, ɔci maka bala kolk jitin waakɛnda.
Ɔci ma waakɛnda gɔkti te lɛmma ne cyɛɛlɔ waakɛnda, agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkta agi Ciɛggɔn tolɔ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ma jieyi Wey ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan daŋkun.

Munga ana ‘yay, ba bolja ɛkkɛ jyek ‘ya tiiññɛ ñin ne ‘ya balkin iki ɛkkɛ aŋan neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ Jiek tiidɛyɔ ne pwadan waakɛnda ne ‘ya baawa loona ɔntɔ te ɛkkɛti ɔɔn. Jwaŋa Tolan bala kanŋan ɛkkɛ yomgɔti, ɔci te kanŋa ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ buagɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ɛkɛ, noŋdɛ ba yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ moki bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ buattɛ Juaŋ te yoma awarɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu te yɔɔd Jwaŋa Tolan.
Gɔṭṭɛ, gena ɛkkɛ buagɛ naŋdɛyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ te yoma yaayan ywoñɛ waakɔ bɛɛ, ɔci naa ɛkkɛ tyewwɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ budan te nɔjjo.

Naa ɛkkɛ a maka waaktan ma a maka noŋi naŋka yeyin bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan. Maka coŋinyɛ, ɛkkɛn ciyi amaam budan. Naŋki ɛkkɛn yeyɔ. Noon yaayɛ ɛkkɛn te nɔjjo. Nɔjiyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba nona mielo. Yeti ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba kɛltan ne dɛkki nona mielti,

acaan ɛkkɛ mietɛ ma te jyeka tɛɛtki ma neeni. Kan ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadanyɛ, ɔci ne oŋŋa Kiṭɔ bɛɛdiyɛ, ‘ya lɔɔdja te ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ñamɛti bɛɛ. ‘Ya aŋka yomu ñɔya ñɔɔn te naŋki ɛkkɛ neeni, acaan coodi ‘ya iñɔ wɛnni a coodda budan bɛɛ, ɔci kanŋa ‘ya iñɔ wɛnni aŋi kanŋa budan bɛɛ.
Kan lyen ‘ya jyeni ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛtiyɛ, ‘ya yomu ñɔya ñɔɔn ne tolan. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔki daŋkunyɛ, ɔci ‘ya daŋkun yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
Ɔci ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya daŋkun ba ‘ya ɔɔn.
Gɔṭṭɛ poca, ‘ya buaga Timutawuc cuoñña ɛkkɛti. Kan Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu buagɔn a ɔɔn daŋkunyɛ, ‘ya ɛkɛ cuoñña ɛkkɛti aŋan aŋka ɛkɛ ‘ya eekta jiek ṭɔlgɛn gɛɛg te ɛkkɛti aŋka ‘ya yomu luudɛ parun.
Mena parɛ gɛɛl bala wɛnni yomɛ bala ɛkkɛti ba Timutawuc ɔɔn bɛɛ.
Maka pookɛn waakɛnda ɛkkɛn poŋi te jyek kanŋa wak ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan. Ɛkkɛn bala poŋi te kanŋa wak Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛ.
Oŋ yeti Timutawucyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ pwadiy. Ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ baali kanŋin iki ‘ya ba kaci ne kanki iki weegɛn ɔɔn.
Ne ‘ya gɔrta jyek godan ‘ya ne baali a ɔkiyɛ, ‘ya oŋ Timutawuc cuoñña ɛkkɛti oŋo.
Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ɔɔn, ŋeej ‘ya, ‘ya bɛɛd ooda Juaŋ ne cwakanti ḍieŋŋa ɛkkɛti.

’Ya poŋ gɔk ka Ipaprodaaytoc cuoñña dɔwwa ‘ya nona ɛkkɛti ne cwakanti moki. Ɛkɛ bala ba mod ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ bala kanŋin iki ‘ya, ɔci ɛkɛ a ackan Juaŋ ba ‘ya ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ cuonnɛ ‘yati wɛnni, ɔci ɛkɛ bala moki ‘ya.
Ɛkɛ ñingɛ boŋi te ɛkkɛ ne tolan. Ne ɛkɛ tieŋni agi ma ɛkɛ tieŋnɔ agi ɛkɛ warɛ yaayɔyɛ, ɛkɛ bala poŋi jiek yomɛti.

Ɛkɛ warɛ yaayɛ ne tolan, ɛkɛ noŋi tuwa doki. Yeti Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ pwani doki. Ɔci Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ‘yati daŋkun te ywaŋŋa ɛkɛ ‘wana neeni ywaŋŋɛy. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, taab ‘ya bala moki bɛɛ.
Ɔci acca ‘ya yomu noki warɛ ne tolan te bwakta ‘ya buagati ɛkɛ cuonda ɛkkɛtiy. Acaan ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya ɔci gɔktɛ a pwatcin ne ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ yuardɛy, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya yomu pwada daŋkun.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ magdɛ te yom ñɔɔn ba mod ɛkkɛ te yenti Ciɛggɔn. Maka pwadin ba Ipaprodaaytoc neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkkɛn.

Acaan Ipaprodaaytoc neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi tuwa te kanŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘ya magdatɛ, yeti acaan ban ɛkkɛ looncin ɔntɔyɛ, aŋka ɛkkɛ Ipaprodaaytoc cuonnɛ ‘yati moki ‘ya neeni. Taab ɛkɛ tol tolo, yeti ɛkɛ buayi lyen ḍwaŋ ɛkɛ moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala moki ‘ya men ɔɔn.

Jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ. Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya oŋkanda, acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ Ciɛggɔn ikinti doki. Kan ‘ya kiewa jyeka neeni ɛkkɛti oŋki ne coŋɔn ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn yaayi ‘yati bɛɛ. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyek ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan.
Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te maka bala ba gɔki maka yeyin a laaban neeni. Acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn ŋwoti ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ naŋtɛ a Ma Yahuud ba ɛkkɛn budan ɔɔn.
Ikin maka moṭi Jwaŋa Tolanti te Boŋ ɛkɛyɛ, ikin aŋka balkin jyek ŋwoti awarɛ. Ikin yomgɔ ñɔyɔ te Yaccu Kiṭɔ parɛ. Ɔci ikin poŋin gɔkin agi ikin yaakinti naŋka pwadan te waak tɛɛn ikin pookɔ bɛɛ.
Kan men gɛɛl gɔki jieyi warɛ agi ɛkɛ yaakiti warɛ udjɛ te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ parɛ budanyɛ, ‘ya yaakati jyek ɛkɛ bwandi ‘ya daŋkun.

Tieŋdɛ, ɛkkɛ poktin naŋki war ‘ya. Ne ‘ya jiennata mɛy ɔɔn, ɔci ne nink ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛki bora ba naŋki yɔrg ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya ŋutka ma doki te ninna akki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ. ‘Ya jietka ma Icrayiil. ‘Ya bɛɛn te kɛɛn Benjaminti. ‘Ya jietka ma Icrayiil. ‘Ya a Pɛriciy, ɔci ba naŋki ma Pɛriciinyɛ, ‘ya baal tiec Jyek ganuun waakɛn ne pwadan.
’Ya waru byerŋa byerŋ te kanŋa yɔɔro, ɔci ‘ya baal noŋ ne yaayan ma kaniicanti. Jyek ganuun jitkɛn tiiñiyɔ ‘ya waakɛnda. Gɛɛl bɛɛñiji bɛɛ.
Gɔṭṭɛ, jyek yɔrg ɔɔn, ɔci jyek naŋki ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwadɔ ‘yati, yeti ɛkkɛn daljan ‘ya ɔntɔ waakɛnda a kucin te jyek Kiṭɔ.

Awarɛ, jyeka pookɛn waakɛnda aŋi ba jyeka budan ‘yati. Gena jyek ŋeejiin Ciɛggɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ ŋeeja ‘ya neeni aŋka pwatciny. Acaan ‘ya buaga jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, waak waakɛnda yorkan ‘ya ŋoyu, yom ‘ya bala ɛkkɛnti moki bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn ɔga ḍakti doki. ‘Ya buaga ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ. ‘Ya buaga gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ parɛ.

’Ya buaga dala ɛkɛ bala ‘yati. ‘Ya poŋ ka ‘ya pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti te naŋki ‘ya paru bɛɛ, walla te tiit jyek ganuun waakɛn bɛɛ. ‘Ya pwani ɛkɛ ñamɛti te jyenna ‘ya jyetta Kiṭɔti neeni. Acaan maka jyeddi Yaccu Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn naŋdɛ Juaŋ pwaddi ɛkɛ ñamɛti.
’Ya buaga dala Kiṭɔ ŋeejja ‘ya ne pwadan. Ɔci ‘ya buaga dala war tɛɛn jɔlni ɛkɛ ñaalɔ neeni ŋeejja ‘ya daŋkun. Ɔci ‘ya buaga dala taab Yaccu ŋeejja ‘ya daŋkun, ɔci dala lyen ɛkɛ aga ba lyen ‘ya,
ɔci dala ‘ya jɔŋŋa ñaalɔ moki ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn.

’Ya gɔkca te war ‘ya ka jyeka neeni ḍaaŋi ‘ya waakɛnda men bɛɛ. ‘Ya a mena domi jiek men. Yeti ‘ya ciɛñ ‘uocca ñamu te jyek Yaccu a ‘uoccin gɔ moki ‘uocci ɔɔn, aŋka gena odga ‘ya ñamuti neeni aga gen ‘ya bala ba ne ‘ya koonati Yaccu Kiṭɔ bora aŋŋa men ɛkɛ dokiy. Ɔci ‘ya buaga naŋka ‘ya koonati ɛkɛ bora neeniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ bala ‘yati.

Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya gɔk ka naŋka neeni ḍaaŋi ‘ya waakɛnda doki bɛɛ. A’a. Naŋka coŋin bala men, yeti gen gɛɛl aŋka bala ne cyɛɛlɔ naŋdi ‘ya oŋkanda. Waka dollanyɔ ‘yayɛ, ‘ya poŋ te jyek ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ. ‘Ya poŋ te waka bala ñamu,
ɔci ‘ya ciɛñ ‘uocca ñamu a ‘uoccin gɔ moki ‘uocci ɔɔn. ‘Ya muona Jwaŋa Tolan bora te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci ‘ya buaga jyek naŋka pwadin neeni pookɛn.
Ikin maka loonnin ñamu doki te jyek Yaccuyɛ, dala paŋŋa neeni bala ikinti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti paŋi ɛkɛ bala ɔntɔyɛ, ɛkɛ myettɛ Jwaŋa Tolan agi paŋi ɛkta neeni baalɔ ɔntɔ.
Dala ikin noŋtin ne pwadan ba jyeka ŋeecin ikiny.
Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki ‘ya ɔɔn. Gena ɔɔn agɔn maka lwaktan ma te naŋka pwadin neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ maka lɔki naŋka neeni wanna ne pwadan.

Ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te jyeka neeni oŋki kɔɔna kɔɔnno, ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin acca moki ɔɔn. Ɔci gɔṭṭɛ maka coŋin maka yeyinyɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn te kakan Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ne ‘ya baala gɔka ɛkkɛti te jyeka neeniyɛ, ‘ya baal gɔk a ɔɔn ne pieg bala ‘ya woŋguti ɔɔn.

Ne baaṭi ɛkkɛn ñɔɔdi ɔci ḍakti budan. Jyek bwakti waak bala ñamu ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti aŋi ba jwaŋ ɛkkɛn. Ɛkkɛn jieyi waakɛn te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn yaayan neeni budan. Ɛkkɛn bala poŋi te jyek waka bala iñɔ baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni budan.
Ikinyɛ, ikin aŋka akin maka bana ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci ikin kɛɛyin mena bɛya te aŋany, gena Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ.

Ɔci ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ waak ikin waaka yeyin neeniyɛ, agdiyɔ ɛkɛ aga ba war ɛkɛ wara pwadan neeni. Ikin aktinyɔ ɛkɛ te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ. Ɔci te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aga Ciɛggɔn noon warda, ɔci waak waakɛndayɛ, noŋdi ba jyek ɛkɛ.
Modg ɔɔn Ma Kiṭɔ modga ana ‘yay, te naŋka bɛya neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin. ‘Ya ñingu boŋi te ɛkkɛ. ‘Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te ɛkkɛ.
’Ya gɔk Yuadyati yaakkɛn i Cintiki, dala ɛkkɛn ciya te yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ te jyek Yaccu, naa ɛkkɛn yoyi ñin yaakkɛn a ɔɔn bɛɛ.

Hay! Mena kanŋin iki ‘yay, ‘ya gɔkka iti, dala moonga neeni magdɛ te jyek ɛkkɛn, acaan moonga neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala kanŋin iki ‘ya te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Ɛkkɛn bala kanŋin iki ‘ya i Klɛmanti i maka pookɛn daŋkun, maka yeng ɛkkɛn bala worgajiy. Worga neeniyɛ, a worga balki yeng maka tɛɛtiy.
Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ te yoma ñɔyan te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin oŋkanda ɔɔn. ‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti moki ka dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te yoma ñɔyan!
Dala ŋeettan ma waakɛnda yomg ɛkkɛ pwadɔ mati, ɔci dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ Ciɛggɔn ikin bala bɛya ne cwakanti ikinti.

Naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ jiek te jyek waagga bɛɛ. Dala yeti ɛkkɛ aŋka cɔktɛ gena Jwaŋa Tolanti te jiek waakɛnda. Ɔci oŋkanda ne ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ ɛkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ toottɛ te waka ɛkkɛ buagɛy. Dala ɛkkɛ gɔkti ɛkɛti a pwatcin.

Kan ɛkkɛ noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ coodi pwanno. Ɔci Yaccu Kiṭɔ waŋɛ tiittɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ, ɔci te paŋi ɛkkɛ moki. Naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, da parɛ. Naŋka neeni jiñɛ yuartanji ma baan te wyetk ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.

Modg ɔɔn, jwali gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te waka pwadin jitkɛn waakɛnda. Waka pwadin neeniyɛ, gena naŋka awarɛ, ɔci naŋka pwadan, ɔci ani mako, ɔci yenta pwadan, ɔci naŋka balki yom pwani, ɔci jiɛt Juaŋ jiɛta pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ caŋdɛ te gena paŋi waka neeni.

Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ noŋdɛ ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lallin ‘ya neeni. Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ gɔrnɛ naŋki ‘ya. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn daŋkun. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan mena ‘woñi ma te coodi pwani ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ baldɛ iki ɛkkɛ.

Ɛɛ, te baaṭi ɛkkɛ balgɛ poŋɛ te ‘ya, ɔci ‘ya maŋŋata ɛkkɛ. Ɔci acca ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ poŋɛ te ‘ya ɔci mokɛ ‘ya men. Çeej ‘ya ɛkkɛ yomgɔ bala ‘yati ɔci buagɛ mokɛ ‘ya oŋkanda, yeti pɔya ɛkkɛ ‘ya magdatɛ gɔ bala bɛɛ.
’Ya gɔk a ɔɔn ɛkkɛti acaan ‘ya bɔw bɛɛ. Acca ‘ya poŋ te jyek waka ciya ‘ya acca moki bɛɛ. Acca kan waak bala, ɔci walla kan waak baaw ‘yatiyɛ, ‘ya men yomu pwad pwad ɔɔn.

’Ya yaakati ciy ba mena bɔwan waak baaw ɛkɛtiy, ɔci ‘ya yaakati ciy ba mena cyɛgan waak bala ɛkɛtiy. Naŋka neeni yuarŋ ‘ya doki. Kan baan yooŋ yoŋ, walla kan baan yaayɛ moki a koñyɛ, ‘ya yaakati ciy ne pwadan men ɔɔn.
’Ya yaakati naŋki waakɛnda te war tɛɛna ‘ya ‘wondata Kiṭɔ oŋkanday.
Ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwanna pwani ‘yati ne ɛkkɛ ‘ya maŋŋata te oŋŋa taab baali ‘yatiy. Taab ‘ya aŋi ba taab ɛkkɛ doki.
Ɛkkɛ maka ban Pilibbi, jiek ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Ne ɛkkɛ lallin ‘ya te ñamu, ɔci ne ‘ya koona bora te ban Macɛdɔɔnyayɛ, ‘ya makka ma kaniican gɛɛg bɛɛ, ‘ya maŋŋata gena ɛkkɛ pookɔ.
Ɔci moki ne ‘ya baala ban Tacalunikayɛ, ‘ya maŋŋata ɛkkɛ oŋki aŋi ne yyɛɛwɔ doki.
Yom ‘ya buagɔn ɛkkɛ ‘ya ‘wondata waka neeni budan bɛɛ. Yom ‘ya buagɔn dala Juaŋ aŋka noŋdi ne pwadan ɛkkɛti te naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ pwadin neeni.

Ɛkkɛ ‘ya cuonnata bilk ne coŋɔn. Ɔci waka ‘ya cuonnata ɛkkɛ te byeŋ Ipaprodaaytoc neeniyɛ, yɔmjin te ‘ya doki. Ne ɛkkɛ ‘ya ‘wonnata waka neeniyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ ne Jwaŋa Tolan ‘wonnɛ gena ‘yɛrŋɛ ɛkkɛ gena pwadan gena ɛkkɛ buagɛ neeni, ɔci Juaŋ yookɔn te naŋka neeni bɛɛ. Naŋka neeni pwanna pwani ɛkɛti.
Dala Jwaŋ ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ waka baaw ɛkkɛti neeni ba bolja ɛkɛ agi mena cyɛgan neeni te byeŋ Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Jwaŋ ikin ɔci Wey ikinyɛ, dala ma jieddi ɛkɛ oŋkanda yuonginda ɔɔn.
Dala ɛkkɛ ma Yaccu Kiṭɔ ñiibdɛ waakɛnda te ‘ya. Modg ikin modga bala wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun.
Ma Kiṭɔ maka bala wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Ɔci maka bala on Kɛɛcartiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi ɛkkɛ ne pɛñan daŋkun.
Dala yom pwani Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala ɛkkɛti oŋkanda ɔɔn.
Gena ‘ya Buuluc, cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ te yom Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci mod ikin Timutawuc, kienɔn worga ɛkkɛti neeni.
Ɛkkɛ agɛ modg ɔɔn Ma Kiṭɔ maka ban Kuluci, maka pwadin maka jyettɛ Kiṭɔtiy. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ coodda pwadan.
Oŋkandayɛ, ɔɔn gɔkin a pwatcin ne ɔɔn cɔkɔn Jwaŋa Tolan Wey Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti te ɛkkɛy.
Acaan ɔɔn tieŋnɔn jiek te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔti, ɔci te jyek anna ɛkkɛ anɛ Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnday.

Jyek jyeni ɔci jyek ani neeniyɛ, bala ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ balgɛ kɛɛyɛ te coodda ne baaṭi coodda ciedɛ ɛkkɛ ñaalɔy. Paŋŋa neeni bɛɛn ɛkkɛti te oŋŋa ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jyeka awarɛy.

Jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni bɛɛn mati ṭɛɛr konɛ warda, ɔci bala eci naŋka pwadin ma yomgɛnti Ɔci jyeka neeni bala ciɛñ a ciɛñi gɔ moki ciɛñcin ñamu ɔɔn. Te oŋŋa ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ, ɔci ne acca ɔɔnyɛ, jyeka neeni bala etti naŋka pwadin oŋkanda ɛkkɛti. Acaan ɛkkɛ mwokɛ yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛti.
Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyeka neeni te Epapracti. Ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn Kiṭɔ ba ikin ɔɔn. Ikin anin ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ bala noŋi ba jyek Kiṭɔ ɔci loṭi ɛkkɛ ne pwadan aŋka ɛkɛ moki ‘ya.
Ɔci ɔɔn nɔɔnnɔn ɛkɛ te naŋki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ yomgɔti agi ɛkkɛ anjɛ ma ne tolan.

Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Jwaŋa Tolanti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda te oŋŋa ɔɔn tieŋnɔn jyek ɛkkɛ neeni, ɔci ne acca ɔɔn. Ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ jyeka loṭi Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeeddɛ, ɔci aŋka dala ɛkkɛ yom Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ne pwadan.

Ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti a ɔɔn aŋka dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ba coodi ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, coodi ɛkkɛ pwada Juaŋti. Ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala kanŋa kandɛ ɛkkɛ waakɛnda neeniyɛ, etti naŋka pwadan. Ɔci ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti moki ka dala Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan gɔ moki ŋeejjɛ ɔɔn te naŋki ɛkɛ, ɔci te yom pwani ɛkɛ.

Dala ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ war tɛɛn tolan neeni aŋka dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektɛ ne pwadan aŋka ne jwali gɛɛl bɛɛdi ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ yaakɛti yɔɔdɛ ne tɛyan te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ma jieddi Juaŋ te naŋki ɛkkɛ neeni.
Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ a pwatcin Wey ikinti oŋkanda, acaan ɛkkɛ muonɛ ɛkɛ bora naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ a maka ciyi te nona bɔwan.
Te ñamu ikin agin ma ciɛggɔn nona mielo, yeti ikin wɛɛnin Jwaŋa Tolan bora, ɔci eññin ḍuannin non Kaci ɛkɛ, Kacca ondɛ ɛkɛ aŋka tieŋtin gena jyek ɛkɛ parɛ.
Ikin wannin Kaci ɛkɛ, ɔci ikin bɔɔŋnin ɛkɛ te nɔji ikin.

Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ yuarɛ ma te woŋgɛn bɛɛ. Yeti Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a Jwaŋa Tolan waanɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ aaŋŋɛ aŋi men baan aŋka ɛkɛ yuarkiti ma ne pwadan neeni. Kiṭɔ ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn waka cɔnnɛ Juaŋ neeni waakɛnda.

Waak cɔnnɛ Juaŋ te Kiṭɔ waakɛnda waka ṭɛɛrji yuartin ikin te woŋgɔ, ɔci waka ñaalɔ pɔliji waka yuartin ikin te woŋgɔ bɛɛ, ɔci jɔkin waakɛnda ɛkkin ḍwaŋin i ɛkkin ḍyɛrin. Ɛkkɛn bɛɛn te Kiṭɔ aŋka ɛkɛ jiɛtan ma te waak waakɛnda.
Ne waak waakɛnda baaki menyɛ, ɛkɛ doki bala. Waak waakɛnda bala te nonk ɛkkɛnti te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.

Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a ḍuaŋa acaan ɛkɛ a wyeñ ma kaniican. Ma kaniican ɛkkɛn ciyi tɛɛti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn a war ɛkɛ. Gena ɛkɛ a mena bɔɔni lien te ñamu aŋka jyek ɛkɛ balki ñamu te jyek waka pookɛn waakɛnda neeni.
Te yom Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, Kiṭɔ bolji Jwaŋa Tolan lɛɛlnɛ bora warda.
Ɔci moki te yom Jwaŋa Tolan te naŋki Kiṭɔ te oŋŋa yimg ɛkɛ kɛɛki iñɔyɛ, Juaŋ ŋeewin i ma baan doki, ɔci ŋeewin i waka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni, ɔci ŋeewin i waka bala ñaalɔ pɔliji moki.
Ɔci ɛkkɛ, te ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ɔntɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci paŋi ɛkkɛ da bala ɔntɔ pookɔ moki. Ɛkkɛ yookɛ te Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci naŋki ɛkkɛ moki yeyɔ.
Yeti acca ɛkkɛ ŋeenɛ i Jwaŋa Tolan doki te lyena tuuni Kiṭɔ kakanti neeni. Yaccu tuun te ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka pwadin ne tolan Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti.

Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan oŋkanda te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti neeni. Ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn naa yɔɔta ɛkkɛ yɔɔññɛ Juaŋ neeni daldɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni doki. Ɔci jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni ati ṭɛɛr konɛ warda. Ɔci ‘ya Buuluc neeniyɛ, ‘ya a mena noŋi kanŋa jyeka neeni.

Ne ‘ya balkati taab te ɛkkɛ ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya yomu ñɔy ñɔy men ɔɔn acaan taab ‘ya neeni etti pwani ɛkkɛti. Taab ‘ya neeniyɛ, bala ba taab Yaccu. Taab bala ɛkɛti te ma kaniica ɛkɛ. Ɔci ‘ya daŋkun taabba aŋka ma kaniica magdi ne coŋɔn.
Juaŋ ‘ya naŋŋa a mena noŋi kanŋa ma kaniicati, ɔci ‘ya naŋŋa Juaŋ a cuuda noŋ kanŋa ɛkkɛti. Ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te jyek ɛkɛ waakɛnda.

’Ya cuonna ɛkɛ aŋka ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te baaṭi jitkɛn a coggin matiy. Jyeka neeni lɛɛlnɛ ɛkɛ bora acca. Ɛkɛ buagɔn ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te ɛkkɛn ne pwadan. Ɛkɛ Keedin Pookɛn yɔɔññɛ te baaṭi te yuonga ati coŋin waayi bɛɛ. Yeti acca ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ma ɛkɛ waakɛnda jwalla neeni ŋeettan.

Ɛkkɛ Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, jyeka coggin neeni oonɛ Juaŋ bora ɛkkɛti aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ jyeka neeni pwadɔ ne tolan. Jyeka bɛɛn bora neeniyɛ, gena Kiṭɔ mena bala ɛkkɛ yomgɛti neeni. A ɔŋŋi ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ciyɛ kɛɛyɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn, aŋka ɛkkɛ kaattɛ ban Jwaŋa Tolan.
Ɔɔn moki balgɔn mietɔn ma oŋkanda te jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔɔn balgɔn ṭeyɔn ma waakɛnda, ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn loṭɔn ma waakɛnda te jiek acaan ɔɔn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛn oodɔn Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti pwadgin a pwadgin.
’Ya kanŋ ne pɛñan waru byerŋa byerŋ te kanŋa te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ ‘ya yomuti.
Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ‘ya baal kanŋ te ɛkkɛ ne tolan, ɔci te Ma Kiṭɔ maka ban Lɛyoduciiya daŋkun. Ɔci ‘ya baal kanŋ moki te Ma Kiṭɔ maka yuarŋ ‘ya te woŋgu ‘ya men bɛɛy.

’Ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te yoma ñɔyan oŋkanda, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ oondi yɔtin pookɔ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ne pwadan, ɔci jyeka naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te baaṭi jitkɛn a coggin neeni ŋeeddɛ ne pwadan, jyeka neeniyɛ, gena Kiṭɔ waanɛ.
Jyek ñing tɛɛn bɛɛn te ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena jiek ŋeejɛ waakɛnda.
’Ya ɛkkɛ myennin a ɔɔn aŋka naa ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛ maaltɛ ɛkkɛn ɔntɔ te lɛmma milan bɛɛ.
Ne ‘ya baawa ɛkkɛti te war ‘ya waanɛ jiñɛyɛ, ‘ya baal ba ne ikin balkin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ te booŋ no. Ɔci ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te yɔɔdda ɛkkɛ yɔɔnnɛ ne tɛyan te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Kiṭɔti neeni.
Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Yaccu muŋŋɛ yomgɔti doki aŋi Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan ɛkɛti oŋkanda ɔɔn.

Dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ ba jana bɛɛkkɛ ati iñɔ ne pwadan. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu te jyek ɛkɛ. Dala jyeni ɛkkɛ tɛya gɔ moki tɛyi ɔɔn te jyek ɛkɛ, ba naŋka ɛkkɛ lallɛ Ɛpaprac te ñamu wanna ɔɔn. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ a pwatcin Juaŋti oŋkanda te jyeka neeni.

Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ, naa ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ maka loṭi ma te Jwaŋa Tolan amaam te jyeka pookɛn neeni bɛɛ. Jyeka lorki ɛkkɛn ma neeni a jyek naŋki ma baan ṭɛɛr wyeñɛti wɛnni budan. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ acaan jyeka neeni bɛɛn te Kiṭɔti bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn pɛɛdan i jyek Kiṭɔ.
Juaŋ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora warda ikinti te lali Kiṭɔ oŋŋa ɛkɛ aŋŋi men baan, ɔci baali ciyin iki ikin ba men baany.
Ɔci acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔ dokiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balkɛ coodda pwadin waakɛnda. Gɔṭṭɛ, Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn jɔkin waakɛnda, ɔci moki ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn ḍuaŋan waakɛnda.

Ɛkkɛ maka bala Yaccutiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balkɛ jyek ŋwoti daŋkun. Yeti jyek ŋwotta neeniyɛ, gena naŋka naŋtan ma te byeŋkɛn bɛɛ. Gena naŋka naŋdɛ Kiṭɔ ma yomgɛnti, ɔci naŋka neeni aŋka yɔmjin acaan yomg ɛkkɛ yomga te baaṭi neeniyɛ, eññɛ ɛkɛ ɔntɔ doki.

Ɔci ba jyek bulti ɛkkɛyɛ, bala ba jyek lyen ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Lyen Yaccu aŋi ba lyen ɛkkɛ, ɔci jɔŋŋin ɛkɛ jɔŋni ñaalɔyɛ, aŋi ba jɔŋŋin ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Naŋka neeni bala ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti. Te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ tolla tollo. Yaccu luolnɛ ɛkɛ ñaalɔ te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.
Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba maka tuutan te nɔji ɛkkɛ. Ɔci yomga yeyin eññɛ Kiṭɔ men bɛɛ. Yeti acca ɛkkɛ unnɛ iki Kiṭɔ a cyɛɛlɔ te naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛti. Ikin bɔɔŋnin ɛkɛ te nɔji ikin waakɛnda.
Ikin noŋŋin nɔji waakida, ɔci jiek dɔɔkkin ikin wyetkɔti te nɔjja neeni, ɔci yeti jyeka neeni nuunnɛ ɔntɔ Juaŋ te ikinti te oŋŋa Yaccu tuuni ñaalɔ kakantiy.

Ɔci te oŋŋa wannati ɔɔn daŋkunyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan Jwaŋa Yaayan buannɛ i ma ɛkɛ. Gɔṭṭɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan oŋ warɛ jaaññɛ bala lɔti ɛkkɛn te wyeng ba kɛɛnka kwayɛ ma te nona loonan. Ɛkɛ bala lɔti ɛkkɛn malɛɛkan ñomgɛnti.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, ne ɛkkɛ tiecɛ waka neeni waakɛn bɛɛyɛ, naa menga wooki ɛkkɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛ wanna bɛɛ. Waka neeni gena waka tiitanyɔ Ma Yahuudy, ɔci waka neeniyɛ, gena ami oomdin gɛɛg ɔci waka maattan ma gɛɛg, ɔci iidn Ma Yahuud, ɔci iid paan waŋɛ oŋkanda, ɔci Oŋ Cabit. Naa menga wooki ɛkkɛ te waka neeni bɛɛ.
Naŋki tiit ninka neeniyɛ, bala ba ṭiebji naŋka bɛyay. Ɔci naŋka bɛya neeniyɛ, gena Kiṭɔ. Jyek ɛkɛ aŋka awarɛ, dala tiitinyɔ.

Naa ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ ma ɔntɔ te malla awarɛti neeni bɛɛ, acaan ma gɛɛg poŋi gɔki agi waka yuarɛ ɛkkɛn te loggin neeniyɛ, a jyeka awarɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka neeni buagɔn ɛkkɛ waakɔ dɔɔdɛ iñɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛ mortɛ malɛɛkanti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala poŋi amaam budan, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ḍwaŋgin.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn kɛpcin ɔntɔ yookɔn te jyek Kiṭɔ wyeñ kaniica. Ma kaniica aga maka ne cyɛɛlɔ te wyeñ ɛkkɛn neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘uotti ñamu, ɔci kaniica naŋdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan tɛya te Kiṭɔ.

Ɔci gɔṭṭɛ, naa ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba ne ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin iñɔ baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni moki bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ tyeŋɛ jyeka naŋtan ma iñɔ ṭɛɛrji baanji moki bɛɛ. Acaan te oŋŋa ɛkkɛ tuunɛ iki Kiṭɔyɛ, paŋŋa bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji, ɛkɛ a paŋi ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ. Maka iñɔ wɛnni ɛkkɛn gɔki agi,
“Naa i gena neeni luolla ñaalɔ bɛɛ.” Ɔci moki agi, “Naa i topci gena neeniti bɛɛ.” Ɔci moki agi, “Naa i dɛcca gena neeni bɛɛ.” Naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.

Naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka dɛɛki Ma Yahuud te naŋki waka coŋin wanna bɛɛ. Acaan waka neeni ɛkkɛn a waka baadi lakun budan ne ikin noŋin ɛkkɛny. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jiek ṭɔlgɛn naŋɛ ɛkkɛn te waka neen neeni bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ jyeka neeni bɛɛ. Yeti jyeka neeni naŋɛ ɛkkɛn pookɛn a jyek ma baan budan.

Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkkɛn wanna bɛɛ, acaan jyeka wanna ma naŋtan noŋdi nɔji ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn yomga yeyin wanna buagɛ men ɔɔn, ɔci moki ba bolja ɛkkɛn balki poŋki agi ma ñingɛn tɛyɔ te naŋki jyeka neeni ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn poŋi ‘wota gɔkɛ agi kan ɛkkɛn waakɛn dɔɔdinti iñɔ Jwaŋa Tolan ñamdanti, ɔci moki agi kan ɛkkɛn waakɛn jyebdinti jitin te nɔji ɛkkɛn, ɔci agi kan ɛkkɛn mortɛnti Juaŋti ba naŋki ma ɛkkɛnyɛ, agi a ɔɔn ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛyɔ katan.

Gɔṭṭɛ, dala yomg ɛkkɛ buagdɛ jyek waka bala ñaalɔ nona ciyi Kiṭɔy. Acaan ɛkkɛ jɔŋnɛ ñaalɔ iki Yaccu Kiṭɔ a cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkɛ bala ciyi Jwaŋa Tolan taaŋɛti taaŋŋa byerɔn acaan ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ a Ciɛggɔn Tolan.
Ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ jyek waka bala ñaalɔ neeni. Naa ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ jyek naŋka naŋtan ma yeyin iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrji bɛɛ.
Acaan ɛkkɛ tuunɛ doki, ɔci tɛɛtin ɛkkɛ tɛɛtin Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, bala Juaŋti.
Kiṭɔ mena tɛɛtin ikin neeniyɛ, ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdi warɛ lɛɛldɛ borayɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun baldɛ ba ɛkɛ te pwani ɛkɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji.

Yomg ɛkkɛ yomga te baaṭi neeniyɛ, dala nogdɛ tuwa baadi. Naŋki yoma te baaṭi neeniyɛ, gena tomi, ɔci wɛlji, ɔci yoma ulan, ɔci tomi maka ‘uayiti, ɔci bwakti naŋka yeyin neeni, ɔci war ḍiŋŋo, ɔci yom ḍɔŋ te waako. Mena buagɔn wak mena parɛ naŋki ɛkɛ bala ba mali jɔkin yeyin, waka pɔɔtan ma a pɔɔto.
Naŋka yeyin neeniyɛ, etti ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan maka noŋi naŋka neeniti.
Ne ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ Ma Kiṭɔ men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ ba coodda yaayan neeni ɔɔn.
Yeti accayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ mwondɛ te loñko, ɔci kon cyɛñño, ɔci yom yoño, ɔci waaŋi maka pookɛn. Naa jyeka yeyin bala ɛkkɛ tuggɔti bɛɛ.
Naa ɛkkɛ joommɛ yɔtin pookɔ bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ waka neeni moki bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ yoma te baaṭi neeni olnɛ ɔntɔ iki naŋki ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
Ɔci acaan ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan yoma woonɛ, ɔci yoma woonɛ neeni ciɛñ a ciɛñi gɔ moki ciɛñji ñamu ɔɔn ne ɛkɛ Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ne pwadan ɔɔn. Yoma neeni warɛ agdɛ aga ba mena oki ɛkiy.

Kan yoma woonɛ neeni bala ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ menga yaakinti gɔkti moki agi Keedin Pookɛn aŋka pwadgɔ, walla Ma Yahuud pwadgɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci walla menga gɔkti agi maka balki jyek ŋwoti ɔci bɔɔrk aŋka pwadgɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci walla menga gɔkti agi maka ani ṭwaŋ oŋ aŋi Ma Kiṭɔ neeni, ɔci walla agi maka kɛɛnk aŋka pwadgɔ bɛɛ. Acaan Kiṭɔ bala ikinti waakida. Ɔci Ma Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛn bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ waakɛnda. Yeti Kiṭɔ aŋka bala ñamu ne tolan te waak waakɛnda.

Ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora aŋŋɛ ma ɛkɛ maka anɛ ɛkiy. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ bala mati. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan mati. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ waakɔ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ tuggɔ luucin. Dala ɛkkɛ loomgɔ tɛɛcin. Dala ɛkkɛ bɔyyɛ yɔtin pookɔ. Kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti balki jwali gɛɛl te naŋki mena parɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ mena parɛ neeni bɔɔktɛ. Bala ba ne ɛkkɛ bɔɔŋnɛ Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ maka pookɛn neeni bɔɔktɛ daŋkun.
Jwali gɛɛl bala ñamu agi dala ɛkkɛ oonji yɔtin pookɔ. Ɔci te jyek oonnin ɛkkɛ oonni yɔtin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti coodɛ a cyɛɛlɔ ne pwadan oŋkanda ɔɔn.

Dala coodi pwani bɛya te Kiṭɔti neeni aga ba ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛ yomgɔti. Ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora aŋka ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te coodi pwani waakida. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ Juaŋti a pwatcin oŋkanda.

Dala jyek Kiṭɔ bala ɛkkɛ yomgɔti ne pwadan oŋkanda ɔɔn. Dala ɛkkɛ loordɛ yɔtin pookɔ te jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛ ṭeewɛ yɔtin pookɔ te ñing tɛɛno. Dala ɛkkɛ ‘ualdɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ jieddɛ ɛkɛ te jyek ɔɔlgo, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ‘ualdɛ ɔɔlga loṭi Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan may. Ɔci gɔktɛ a pwatcin Juaŋti te yoma awarɛ.

Kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ gengayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu. Ɔci moki kan ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ gengayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ a pwatcin te yenti Yaccu Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolanti.
Moongo, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛ. A ɔɔn pwatcin Ciɛggɔnti.
’Uayo, dala ɛkkɛ andɛ moong ɛkkɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ ɛkkɛn ɔɔrndɛ a ɔɔrŋin bɛɛ.
Kɛɛgin, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek mɛyyɔ ɔci ba jyek weyyɔ. A ɔɔn pwatcin Ciɛggɔnti.
Kɛɛgin weyyɛn ɔci mɛyyɛn, naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ ‘yeṭɛ kɛɛginti a ñaccu ɔɔn nɔñji bɛɛ. Kɛɛgin yomgɛn tuwa dita.

Hay, maka kɛɛnko! Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek kanŋa weyyɛn iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrji oŋkanda. Naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ kanŋa ne pwadan te kanŋa weyyɛn ñingɛnti budan aŋka ɛkkɛn gɔkti agi ɛkkɛ pwadjɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ te yoma awarɛ, ɔci buattɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.
Ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ kanŋa neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋɛ te yoma awarɛ, ɔci poŋdɛ kanŋa neeni a kanŋa Kiṭɔ. Gena kanŋa ma baan budan bɛɛ.
Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ gena Ciɛggɔn ikin ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ gena ma ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛ neeni ne baaṭi te kanŋa ɛkkɛ neeni, acaan kanŋa weegɛn waanɛyɛ, gena Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Kan men gɛɛl noŋi ne yaayan, kan ɛkɛ a mena ḍiɛran walla kan ɛkɛ a mena daanyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan jiek oldɛ ɛkɛ wyeñɛti ɔɔn.
Kanŋa weyyɛn, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan kɛɛnk ɛkkɛti. Naa ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn amdɛji bɛɛ. Acaan ɛkkɛ daŋkun balkɛ Weya gɔṭi ɛkkɛ ñaalɔ daŋkun.
Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ cɔktɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te cɔŋi ɛkkɛ oŋkanda. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ a pwatcin ɛkɛti.

Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ cɔktɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ te ɔɔn daŋkun. Dala ɔɔn noŋdɔn Juaŋ pɔy aŋka ɔɔn mietɔn ma te jyeka pwadin. Gena jyek Kiṭɔ mena cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan yuoci ma, jyeka bɛɛn bora acca neeni. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ te ‘ya Buuluc acaan ‘ya baal ciginji te jyeka neeni.
Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti aŋka ‘ya jiek owwa bora ne pwadan mati ba bolja Jwaŋa Tolan buagɛy.
Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛ ɔci te jyek ɛkkɛ, ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ gɔwwɛ iki maka pookɛn maka ciyi budan te jyek Jwaŋa Tolany. Dala wɔɔkan ṭɔlgɛn yuardɛ ɛkkɛyɛ, oldɛ loṭi ɛkkɛ ma waakɛnda.
Dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ maka neeniti te lɛmma pwadan oŋkanda. Naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ amaam budan bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ jiek ñamu oŋ ɛkkɛ oŋ ṭwoktɛ mati te jyeka tootti ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛti te Kiṭɔ neeni.
Ɛkkɛ nɔɔttɛ Ticcikoc te jyek ‘ya waakɛnda. Ticcikoc neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mod ikin moda ana ‘yay. Ɛkɛ a mena tieci kanŋan waakɛn. Ɛkɛ bala kanŋin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ te kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolan.
’Ya ɛkɛ cuoñña ɛkkɛti acaan ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ myettɛ ɛkɛ te jyek ɔɔn aŋka dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya te jyek ɛkɛ ɛkkɛti.
Ɛkkɛn bɛya iki Ɔnɛɛcimac. Ɔnɛɛcimacyɛ, bala tieci kanŋan ɛkɛ waakɛn ‘yati daŋkun. Ɛkɛ a mod ikin acca, ‘ya an ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ a maka ban ɛkkɛ. Maka neeni yaakkɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ myettɛ te jyek ɔɔn waakɛnda.

Mod ikin Erictaarkoc mena balgin iki ‘ya ciginji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Ɔci Mark ñaakan Barnabac ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ban ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ ñiibdɛ ne pwadan ba bolja ‘ya ɛkkɛ myennin te jyek ɛkɛ dokiy.

Jicac mena bartan ma agi Jactac neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Maka ḍokkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a Ma Kiṭɔ maka a Ma Yahuud. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala kanŋin iki ‘ya te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkkɛn ‘ya makka ne pwadan, ma ɔɔn Ma Yahuud maka pookɛn gɛɛg bala moki wɛnni bɛɛ.

Ɛpaprac men ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ ne tolan. Ɛkɛ a mena noŋi kanŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkɛ bala cɔki Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda ne tolan agi dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔdjɛ ne tɛyan, ɔci agi dala ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ ŋeejjɛ ne pwadan, ɔci agi dala yomg ɛkkɛ bwagda naŋki yom Juaŋo.
Naŋki ɛkɛ ŋeej ‘ya ne ɛkɛ baali kanŋi kanŋa Juaŋ ne tolan ɛkkɛti, ɔci ne ɛkɛ baali kanŋi maka pookɛnti daŋkuny. Gena Ma Kiṭɔ maka ban Lɛyoduciiya ɔci ban Yarɔɔpolic.
Luuk mena a kiimi mena anin ikin, ɛkkɛn yaakkɛn i Dimacyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi ɛkkɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ maka ban Lɛyoduciiya ñiibdɛ te ‘ya. Ɔci Nimpac ñiibdɛ te ‘ya daŋkun iki maka ḍwoṭi wyetkɛn on ɛkɛ te jyek Juaŋy.
Ne ɛkkɛ ḍoodɛ te paŋi worga ‘yayɛ, dala ɛkɛ paktan ma kaniicati ban Lɛyoduciiya. Ɔci worga bɛɛn te ban Lɛyoduciiyayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poktɛ ɛkɛ daŋkun.
Ɔci gɔṭṭɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ Arkippocti agi dala ɛkɛ waŋɛ tiittɛ te kanŋa ɛkɛ kanŋa ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Kiṭɔy.

Gena ‘ya Buuluc kiewan jwali ṭɔɔlɛ neeni ɛkkɛti te byeŋ ‘ya paru neeni, aŋka ‘ya ñiep ɛkkɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ ñingɔ yeya te ‘ya ciginji wɛnni bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ te ‘ya! Dala Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti.

Gena ‘ya Buuluc ɔci Cila ɔci Timutawuc ñiepɔn ɛkkɛ ma kaniica ban Tacalunika neeni. Ɛkkɛ agɛ ma Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ma Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Dala ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ coodi pwani ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ yomgɔti.
Ɔɔn gɔkɔn a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋkanda te ɛkkɛ. Ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn

acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ naŋka pwadan jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ kanŋɛ kanŋa Juaŋ acaan ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan ne ɛkkɛ jyettɛ balgi kɛɛyɛ oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdiy. Ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn gɔkɔn te naŋki ɛkkɛ neeni oŋkanda Juaŋ ñamɛti.
Modg ɔɔn, ŋeejɔn ɔɔn Juaŋ ani ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ muonɛ ɛkɛ bora aŋka agdɛ ma ɛkɛ.

Acaan ne ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn ennɔn jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn gɔkɔn te jyek tuggɔ budan bɛɛ. Ɔɔn noŋɔn te naŋki Juaŋ naŋka tɛyan neeni, ɔci te Boŋ Juaŋ daŋkun. Ɔci ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ne pwadan jyeka loṭṭɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛ wanna a jyeka awarɛ. Ɔci coodda cienɔn ɔɔn ban ɛkkɛ waayiti ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ coodi ɔɔn ban ɛkkɛ aŋan wanna ɛkkɛ magdɛ.
Ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ lɔkɛ naŋki ɔɔn, ɔci naŋki Ciɛggɔn ikin daŋkun. Acaan ne taab bɛɛni ɛkkɛti ne tolan te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔnnɛ te jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te Boŋ Juaŋo.
Ma Kiṭɔ maka ban Macɛdɔɔnya ɔci maka ban Akeeyayɛ, kan ɛkkɛn lɔkti ba naŋki ɛkkɛ ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin daŋkun.

Te naŋki ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ ati ban Macɛdɔɔnya konɛti ɔci ban Akeeya konɛti. Jyek Juaŋ bala ban Macɛdɔɔnyati ɔci ban Akeeyati pookɛn bɛɛ. Bala bonka pookɛnti waakɛnda daŋkun, ɔci ma tieŋŋin agi ɛkkɛ jyetcɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn mietɔn ma te jyek ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ. Acaan jyek ɛkkɛ ŋeecɔn ma doki.

Maka tieŋŋin jyek ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala mieti ɔɔn agi ne ikin balkin iki ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ɛkkɛ mwonjɛ te mali jɔkin yeyin neeni. Ɔci agi ɛkkɛ morcɛ gena Jwaŋa Tolanti pardan. Gena Jwaŋa ciyi tɛɛti Jwaŋa awarɛy.

Ɔci ɔɔn myetkɔn ɛkkɛn agi ɛkkɛ baljɛ kɛɛjjɛ oŋŋa Kaci ɛkta bɛɛdda te ñaalɔ pɔlijiy. Gena Yaccu mena luolnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te lientiy. Ɔci ɛkɛ a mena yuoci ikin te ywobji Juaŋ ywobja bɛya ne baaṭi ma wyetkɛntiy.
Modg ɔɔn, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ te coodda cienɔn ɔɔn ban ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, eccin naŋka pwadan ɛkkɛti.

Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ te ñamu ne ɔɔn balgɔn ban Pilibbiyɛ, taab bala ɔɔnti. Ma bala noŋi ne yaayan ɔɔnti. Yeti ɔɔn buayɔn bɛɛ. Ɔɔn yomgɔ tɛy tɛy te naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn ban ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn mietɔn ɛkkɛ te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin te Jwaŋa Tolan ne ma yookɔn te ɔɔn ɔɔn.
Ɔɔn loṭɔn ma oŋkanda te jyeka awarɛ neeni ɔci te yoma pwadan. Ɔɔn noŋɔn ma ñingɛn bɛɛ.

Ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn Jwaŋa Tolan kanŋa miti ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, aŋka ɔɔn loṭɔn ma neeni. Ɔɔn buagɔn dala jyeka loṭɔn ɔɔn ma neeniyɛ, pwaddi aŋa Juaŋti parɛ. Ɔɔn buagɔn jyek ɔɔn pwaddi ma baanti bɛɛ. A’a, aŋa Juaŋti parɛ. Acaan ɛkɛ poci ikin a poccin aŋka gɔrti ne ikin yomgɔ balki a ɔkiy.
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ, ɔci ŋeejɛ Juaŋ moki, ɔɔn gɔkɔn dyetɔn ɛkkɛ ñingɔ te lɛmma milan bɛɛ. Ɔɔn buagɔn wak ɛkkɛ eedɔn ɔɔn bɛɛ. A’a.
Kan maka cundɛ Yaccu jiɛtan mayɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin doki. Ɔɔn agɔn cuudan Yaccu, yeti ɔɔn buagɔn naa ma jieyi ɔɔn bɛɛ. Kan a ɛkkɛ ɔci kan walla a mena parɛyɛ, ɔɔn buagɔn menga jieddi ɔɔn bɛɛ.
Ne ikin balkin iki ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn gɔṭɔn ɛkkɛ ne pwadan ba ɛŋa gɔṭi kɛɛgin ɛkɛ ne pwadany.

Acaan yomg ɔɔn bala ɛkkɛti ne tolan ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ eekkɛ ɔɔn jyek Juaŋ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn poŋɔn gɔkɔn agi kan ɔɔn tuudɔn te kanŋa neeniyɛ, baatɔ. A ɔɔn aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ɔɔn anɔn ɛkkɛ ne tolan awarɛ.

Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ ñiektɛ te kanŋa kanŋɔn ɔɔn ban ɛkkiy. Ɔci te kanŋa neeniyɛ, taab dɔɔkkin ɔɔn waakɔti acaan ɔɔn balgɔn kanŋɔn te ween jiñɛ ɔci te oŋ jiñɛ aŋka ɔɔn yɔɔrdɔn waka amdɔn ɔɔn. Ɔɔn balgɔn loṭɔn ɛkkɛ te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin, ɔci ɔɔn buagɔn naa coodi ɔɔn ban ɛkkɛ wanna bɛya ɛkkɛti a taab bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛ ɔɔn yuarŋɔntɔ ne ɔɔn balgɔn ciyɔn a ɔkiy. Ɔci coodda ciyin ɔɔn neeniyɛ, ŋeejɛ Juaŋ daŋkun. Naŋki ɔɔn pwad pwad ɛkkɛti maka jyeti Juaŋti neeni. Gena yaayan gɛɛl bala ɔɔn ḍɔɔggɔti bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛ ɔɔn ŋeejɔntɔ ne ɔɔn balgɔn ṭeyɔn ɛkkɛ waakɔ waakiday, bala ba kɛɛgin weegɛn ne ṭeyi kɛɛgin waakɛny.
Ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora, ɔci aŋŋɛ ma ɛkɛ, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn cyeŋɔn ɛkkɛ aŋka dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ba coodda ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔyɛy.

Ɔɔn gɔkɔn a pwatcin Juaŋti oŋkanda te ɛkkɛ, acaan ne ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek Juaŋ te tuk ɔɔntiyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyeka neeni muŋŋɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ gɔŋnɛ agi jyeka neeniyɛ, a jyek ma baan budan bɛɛ. Gena jyek Jwaŋa Tolan. Awarɛ, jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyek Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci jyeka neeni bala kanŋan ɛkkɛ yomgɔti acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti doki.
Hay! Ɛkkɛ modg ɔɔn, taab bɛɛn ɛkkɛti te ma ɛkkɛti neeni bala ba taab bɛɛn ma kaniicanti ban Yahuudiya ne Ma Yahuud ma ɛkkɛn woodgɛn balki noŋki ne yaayan ɛkkɛntiy.

Ma Yahuudyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan ban ɛkkɛn nokkitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn oŋ Yaccu Kiṭɔ nogɛ moki. Ɔci ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɔɔn ŋualkɔn ɔntɔ te bonk ɛkkɛnti. Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn te Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci yookɔn te ma baan waakɛnda moki.

Ma Yahuud, ɛkkɛn dɛyi ɔɔn agi naa ɔɔn lorcɔn Keedin Pookɛn te jyek Yaccu bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn naa Keedin Pookɛn neeni yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ. Nɔji ɛkkɛn tola gɔ moki toli ɔɔn, ɔci acca toli doki, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛn ɛkkɛn ḍɔɔggɛnti doki.

Modg ɔɔn, te ninka ne ḍiɛkan neeniyɛ, ikin balkin iki ɔɔn bɛɛ. Yeti te paŋi ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ne ikin balkin iki ɔɔn doki no. Ɔɔn ñingɔ boŋi te ɛkkɛ, ɔɔn buagɔn ikin yɔɔrtin iki ɔɔn. Ɔɔn noŋɔn bɛɛdɔn ḍieŋdɔn ɛkkɛti,
yeti pɔya ɔɔn bɛɛdɔn ḍieŋdɔn ɛkkɛti neeni ga bala bɛɛ. Pɔya neeniyɛ, uullɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan. Ɔci ‘ya Buuluc neeniyɛ, ‘ya baal poc te jyek woon oŋkanda paru, yeti pɔy baawo.
Hay! Oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi ɛkɛ ñamɛti te gena yeti? Ɛɛ, ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi ɛkɛ ñamɛti te ɛkkɛ.
Acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ maka ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔki oŋkanday.

Ɔci ne ɔɔn ñingɔ bokki ne pɛñanyɛ, ɔɔn jiek naŋŋɔn ka dala mod ikin Timutawuc, ɛkɛ aŋka bɛya ban ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɔɔn aŋka yaddɔn pookɔ te ban Atɛnicji. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn ɛkkɛti ɔci dɔɔkkin wɛnni acca doki. Timutawuc neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala kanŋin iki ɔɔn te jyek Kiṭɔ. Ɛkɛ cuondɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛti aŋka dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ṭeediyɔ aŋka ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Kiṭɔti neeni.

Yeti taab ɛkkɛ bala acca tolcin te naŋka noŋki ma ne yaayan ɛkkɛti wanna, ɔci ɔɔn buagɔn naa men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti dɔɔdi ŋoyɔ jyeni ɛkɛ daldɛ bɛɛ. Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda ɛkkɛn balki taab a ɔɔn daŋkun.
Ne ikin balkin iki ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn doki ka taab bala bɛya, ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ taab bɛɛn doki ba jyeka guaŋŋɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛti te ñamu neeni.

Ɔci bala ba ‘ya gɔkkan doki ka ne ɔɔn ñingɔ bokki te ɛkkɛ ne pɛñanyɛ, ‘ya Timutawuc cuoññan ɛkkɛti, acaan ‘ya buaga tieŋŋa te coodi ɛkkɛ te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan ne coodi ɛkkɛ baali a ɔkiy. ‘Ya buay ‘ya baal poŋ ka ɛkkɛ maaldɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan mena mooṭi ma neeni dita. Ɔci ‘ya poŋ gɔk ka dita kanŋa ɔɔn aga kanŋa budan dita.

Ɔci Timutawuc, bɛɛn wɛnni dɔɔkkin nona ɔɔnti doki. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɔɔn eeŋnɔn jyeka pwadin te jyek jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti, ɔci te jyek anna ɛkkɛ anɛ may. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkkɛ baljɛ poŋjɛ te ɔɔn daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi ɛkkɛ ñingɔ boŋŋɔ te ɔɔn daŋkun ba ɔɔn ne ñingɔ bokki te ɛkkɛ ɔɔn daŋkuny.
Hay! Modg ɔɔn, taab ɔɔn tol tolo. Yeti te jyeka oonɛ Timutawuc te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ne pwadan neeniyɛ, ɔɔn yomgɔ pwani doki.
Ɛɛ, kan ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin a ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn pwad pwad ɔɔnti ne tolan, ɔɔn yomgɔ noki waakɛn te genga moki bɛɛ.
’Ya gɔkca Juaŋti a pwatcin te ɛkkɛ a ɔki yeti? Acaan ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ñamɛti.

Oŋkandayɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ ne tolan. Ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti te oŋ jiñɛ a ñaccu, ɔci te ween jiñɛ a ñaccu. Acaan ɔɔn buagɔn dala ikin yɔɔrtin iki ɔɔn, kan jyeka tɛyan gɛɛg balayɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ makti ɔɔn aŋka jyeni ɛkkɛ ‘uotti ñamu.
Wey ikin waanɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccuyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ɔɔn pɔktɔn pɔy aŋka ɔɔn bɛɛdɔn ɛkkɛti.
Dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin pookɔ ne tolan, ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛ andɛ ma waakɛnda daŋkun bala ba anna ɔɔn anɔn ɛkkɛ neeni daŋkun ɔɔn.

Ɔci te naŋka neeniyɛ, dala nɔji baaw ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ te naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya te naŋki Juaŋ ɛkkɛti aŋka ne oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛti iki ma ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti yɔɔddɛ ne pwadan Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti.

Yɔɔddɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ‘wota hay! Modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn ṭeyɔn ɛkkɛ ne tolan te jwali gɛɛl te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn te coodda pwadan coodi Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ a ɔɔn, ɔci ɔɔn gɔkɔn ɛkkɛti ka dala ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu gɔ moki ‘uoccɛ ñamu ɔɔn te coodi Juaŋo.
Jyeka ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccuyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ.
Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn agi dala ɛkkɛ ciejjɛ budan te nɔjjo. Ɔci moki agi dala ma mwondɔ te naŋki tomi waakcinda.
Maka ‘uayo, Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛ, menga da ciya ɛŋ ɛkɛ aŋka tiidɛyɔ ne pwadan.
Ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ waak ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋɛ tomi bɛɛ. Maka jyek Juaŋ kwoyɔn, maka kɛɛna pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka noŋi tommo, yeti ɛkkɛyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.

Naa men gɛɛl noŋdi ne yaayan ɛŋ moodɛnti bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl noŋdi ne yaayan ɛŋ moodɛntiyɛ, bala ba ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan mod ɛkkɛnti doki. Ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn doki, ɔci moki ɛkkɛ ṭeekɛ ɔɔn te ñamu ka maka noŋi ba naŋka neeniyɛ, ywobji Juaŋ bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti ne tolan.
Ɛɛ, gɔṭṭɛ, ikin muonin Juaŋ bora aŋka noŋin tomi bɛɛ. Yeti ikin muonin ɛkɛ bora aŋka ikin cietin ne pwadan ɛkɛti.

Kan men gɛɛl yookɔn warɛ te tiid jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyek men baan ɛkɛ yookiti warɛ wanna bɛɛ. Gena Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ yookiti warɛ wanna. Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, gena ɛkɛ ‘woñi ɛkkɛ te Boŋ ɛkɛ, Boŋa Pwadan neeni.
Yeti te jyek oonnin Ma Kiṭɔ oonnin labjɛ baaw neeniyɛ, men gɛɛl ɛkkɛ kiegdɛ worga te jyek oonnin yɔtin neeni moki bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ lallɛ Juaŋ te jyek oonnin yɔtin neeni doki.
Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ anɛ Ma Kiṭɔ modga ban ɛkkɛ ban Macɛdɔɔnya waakɛnda baan konɛ warda. Ɔɔn ṭeyɔn ɛkkɛ ka dala ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu ne tolan te ani ɛkkɛ a ‘uoccin gɔ moki ‘uoccɛ ñamu ɔɔn.
Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki waak ɛkkɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ te byeŋkɔ menga da te ḍwaŋ ɛkɛ ba jyeka ɛkkɛ ṭeeki ɔɔn te ñamu neeni.
Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛ pwada maka ciyi budan te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan ñomgɛnti. Ɔci moki te kanŋa ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ buagɛ ñwoyɛ maka pookɛn waakɛn te waak gɛɛg moki bɛɛ.

Acca hay! Modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn buagɔn dala jyek Ma Kiṭɔ maka tuwa ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan. Acaan ɔɔn buagɔn naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi kuuyɛ ba maka pookɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yaakinti jyeti kɛɛy naŋka pwadin naŋka bɛya ɛkkɛnti ne ŋoyɔ neeni bɛɛ.

Ɛɛ, ikin jyettin jiek agi Yaccu tuunɔ ɔci jɔŋnɔ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki. Ɔci ba naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ikin yaakinti jyettin moki agi Ma Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛn luoldɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te kolk jitin te naŋki Yaccu neeni ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdɛy.
Ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin ka ikin maka ciyi tɛɛti men neeniyɛ, ne oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn bɛɛdiyɛ, ikin bottin ñamu kooktin i ɛkɛ ñamu te maka tuun neeni bɛɛ. A’a, ikin oottin iki ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ.

Ne malɛɛka tolan gɛɛl yaaddi te pwana tolanyɛ, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan kuotti ṭuoŋ oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ, acaan Ciɛggɔn ikin koodi iñɔ te pɔliji. Ɔci Ma Kiṭɔ maka tuunyɛ, ɛkkɛn jɔldi ñaalɔ te kolk jitin tɛɛti moki.

Ɔci ikin maka tɛɛtin baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ikin oŋ oottin ñaalɔ oŋ iki maka jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te lienti neeniy, ɔci ikin waakida oottin pɔliji, ɔci kooktin iki Ciɛggɔn pɔliji. Ɔci ikin cietin iki ɛkɛ yuonginda ɔɔn.
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne ma ɛkkɛ tuutiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyeka neeni, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ muondɛ jitin pookɔ te joono.
Gɔṭṭɛ modg ɔɔn, jiek ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, men gɛɛl yaakinti kiedi worga ɛkkɛti aŋka ɛkkɛ myettɛ te oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛdi moki bɛɛ.
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne Oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛya lieda ba mena ɛɛn ɔɔn.

Maka pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieki gɔki agi haldu, gena yaayɔ gɛɛl bɛɛdɔ ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki poŋki ba paŋŋa wanna men ɔɔnyɛ, Yaccu bɛya dɛndi bora ne pɛñan lieda ɔɔn. Ɔci ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya ɛkkɛnti ɛkkɛn yuurdɛ ñin, ɔci pɔya yooŋti ɛkkɛn ɔntɔ gɛɛl bala moki bɛɛ. Bala ba ɛɛŋ ne amɛ jiediyɛ, kaci bɛya ne pɛñan te wɔɔka kwoyi ɛkɛ, ɔci pɔya ɛkɛ tuoci warɛ te jiedi gɔ bala bɛɛ.
Modg ɔɔn, ɛkkɛ balgɛ nona mielti ba maka pookɛn neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci ne oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkkɛ poddɛ ba ma ne potki te naŋki mena ɛɛn neeni bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛ waakida agɛ maka ciyi te nona bɔwan. Ɛkkɛ jiek kwoyɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ jiek ŋeejɛ. Ikinyɛ, akin maka ciyi te nona ulan bɛɛ.
Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ikin cietin amaam ba coodi maka pookɛn bɛɛ. Dala ikin woŋgɔ tiittin oŋkanda te coodi ikin.

Maka wiciyɛ, ɛkkɛn wici te ween jiñɛ. Ɔci moki, maka noktan mooyyɛ, ɛkkɛn noktan mooy te ween jiñɛ. Ɔci ba jyek naŋka naŋtan ma te ween jiñɛ neeniyɛ, ɔci bala ba jyek coodda cieki maka jiek ŋeecɔn bɛɛy. Ɛkkɛn ciyi te nona ulan.

Ikinyɛ, aŋka akin maka ciyi te nona bɔwan. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin jyettin Juaŋti ne pwadan oŋkanda. Ɔci dala ikin anin Juaŋ i ma baano. Ɔci kan ikin noŋtin a ɔɔnyɛ, jyeni ikin ikin kɛɛtin ñin ba maka ooddi lañti ne ecki kɔɔrjin ɛkkɛn byeŋkɛntiy. Ɔci moki dala ikin kɛɛttin naŋki mena yuoci ikiny. Ɔci ba jyek jyenna kɛɛyin ikin yɔɔt Juaŋ te Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, bala ba taaggan a bilk ne balki maka noowɔ wyetkɛntiy.
Jyeka naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te baaṭi gɔki agi ywobji bɛɛdɔ ikintɛ? A’a, a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ikinyɛ, gɔki agi ikin yɔɔtinti ɛkɛ te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni tuun te ikin, ɔci kan ikin ciyin tɛɛtin walla kan ikin tuuninyɛ, ikin balkin tɛɛtin iki ɛkɛ men ɔɔn.
Ɔci ba ṭeena ɛkkɛ ṭeyɛ yɔtin pookɔ neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ṭeeddɛ yɔtin a ɔɔn oŋkanda aŋka ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan ba naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna ɔɔn.
Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka wɛɛyi ɛkkɛ kaniicaji maka kanŋan ne tolan te ɛkkɛ neeni. Ɛkkɛn a cyekin ɛkkɛ te kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn ṭeyi ɛkkɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkkɛn ne tolan te kanŋa ɛkkɛn neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan. Naa ɛkkɛ yoyyɛ ñin bɛɛ.

Gɔṭṭɛ hay! Modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn ṭeyɔn ɛkkɛ kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti warɛ pɛñcin te kanŋa waakyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ ṭeedɛ wyeñɛti. Dala ɛkkɛ maka buayi ciŋdɛji aŋka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn tɛya, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ maka waakɛn koyan magdɛ yomgɛnti te jieko, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektɛ mati waakɛnda.

Kan men gɛɛl noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne yaayan ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka noŋdɛ ne pwadan gena ɛkɛti. Dala ɛkkɛ moowɛ yɔtin ne pwadan oŋkanda, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan mati waakɛnda.
Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn oŋkanda ɔɔn.
Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti a ñaccu.
Dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ a pwatcin Juaŋti oŋkanda te jiek waakɛnda, acaan maka bala Yaccutiyɛ, Juaŋ buagɔn dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi a ɔɔn.
Naa ɛkkɛ kɛkɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.
Naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi jyek maka lwoki ma te jyeka bɛya te Juaŋti neeni a jyeka budan bɛɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ pottɛ gɔrtɛ jyeka neeni ne pwadan ne jyeka neeni balki ba jyek Juaŋ awarɛ boki no. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ jyeka pwadin neeni mugdɛ ɛkkɛ yomgɔti.
Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yooktɛ te jyeka yeyin waakɛnda.

Jwaŋa Tolan waanɛ, mena ‘woñi ma te coodi pwaniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi naŋki ɛkɛ ɛkkɛti aŋka ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ. Dala Juaŋ waak ɛkkɛ ɔci paŋi ɛkkɛ ɔci yomg ɛkkɛ moki gwaldɛ ɛkɛ ne pwadan ne oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdi ɔɔn. Ɔci ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ mɔktɛ ɛkɛ ciyɛ ne pwadan.
Jwaŋa Tolan mena ɛkkɛ bornɛ aŋka agdɛ kɛɛgin ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena tieci jyek ɛkɛ jitkɛn ne pwadan. Ɔci ɛkkɛ gwaldɛ ɛkɛ ne pwadan awarɛ ba jyeka ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛy.
Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te ɔɔn.
Dala ɛkkɛ modg ikin ñiibdɛ waakɛnda.
’Ya gɔk ɛkkɛti te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin ka dala ɛkkɛ worga neeni pagdɛ modg ikinti waakɛnda.
Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti oŋkanda.
Gena ‘ya Buuluc ɔci Cila ɔci Timutawuc, ñiepɔn ɛkkɛ ma kaniica ban Tacalunika neeni. Ɛkkɛ agɛ ma Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci ma Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔci Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwani ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ yomgɔti.

Hay! Modg ɔɔn, Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ɔɔn gɔktɔn a pwatcin ɛkɛti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin. Te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya gɔ moki tɛyin ɔɔn. Ɔci moki anna ɛkkɛ oonnɛ yɔtin neeniyɛ, tola gɔ moki toli ɔɔn.
Ɔɔn balgɔn jieyɔn ɛkkɛ te yoma ñɔyan ma kaniican Juaŋti acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan ne ma balki noŋki ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiy. Ɔci moki ne taabn pookɛn balki ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan.
Ne ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwatki ne taab baali ɛkkɛti men ɔɔnyɛ, ŋeecɔn ma naŋki Juaŋ pwad pwad ne ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ muonɛ bora naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ a ma cyɛgji ɛkɛy.
Naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan pwad pwad awarɛ. Ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkɛ jiek kɔɔktɛ maka noŋi ne yaayan ɛkkɛti neeni wyetkɛnti.
Ne oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, taab ɛkkɛ baadi ɔci taab ɔɔn moki baadi. Oŋŋa Yaccu warɛ lɛɛldɛ borayɛ, ɛkɛ bɛya te pɔliji iki malɛɛkan ḍwaŋin ɔci maaño.
Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, maka yookɔn waakɛn te jyek Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ywobji bɛya ɛkkɛnti te yookɔn ɛkkɛn yookiti waakɛn te tieŋŋin jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni.

Ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan neeni bala ɛkkɛnti yuonginda, baadi bɛɛ. Ɔci pɔya ortiti ɛkkɛn Juaŋti bala moki bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ neeni yuartan ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ḍakcin doki.

Ɔci oŋŋa tolan oŋŋa wannayɛ, pwanna pwani ma Juaŋti waakɛnda. Ɔci maka jyeti Juaŋtiyɛ, ne oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkkɛn jieddi ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ daŋkunyɛ, jieddi ɛkkɛ te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyeka ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn neenitiy.

Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Jwaŋa Tolanti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda. Ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala Juaŋ gɔkti agi ɛkkɛ pwadjɛ. Ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ ɛkɛ te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ te naŋka ɛkkɛ buagɛ naŋdɛ a naŋka pwadan neeni. Acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ kanŋɛ kanŋa pwadan neeni, ɔci ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ ɛkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ kanŋa neeni cwamdɛ te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.

Ɔci naŋka neeniyɛ, ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ tola mati te naŋki ɛkkɛ, ɔci moki ka dala ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ te naŋki ɛkɛ. Naŋka neeni bɛya te ɛkɛti te yom pwani ɛkɛ ikinti, ɔci moki te yom pwani Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn gɔkɔn ɛkkɛti te jyek bɛɛna Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdi dɔɔkti iñɔ baanji wɛnniy, ɔci te jyek oŋŋa ikin oottin kooktin iki ɛkɛy.

Kan ma gɛɛg gɔkti ɛkkɛti agi Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛnɔ dɔɔŋnɔ iñɔ baanji wɛnni dokiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ jyeka neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci moki kan men gɛɛl gɔkti ɛkkɛti agi ɛkɛ myennɛti Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan te jyeka neeniyɛ, ɔci walla kan men gɛɛl gɔki budan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci moki kan men gɛɛl worga kiedɛ ɛkkɛti gɔki agi Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛnɔyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ worga neeni kiinɛ bala ba worga kienɔn ɔɔnyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛ.

Naa men gɛɛl ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ñin te jyeka neeni budan bɛɛ. Ne Yaccu bwagdɛ bɛɛnyɛ, maka coŋin lakun yooktan waakɛn ne pɛñan te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan ñamu. Ɔci moki mena bartan ma a nɔɔdɔn kaci bana yaayanyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora mati ñamu. Yeti ɛkɛ ciya yuonginda ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya ɛkɛti dɔki.

Mena neeni ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ a naŋki yyɛjjo. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkɛ toljɛ te jɔkin pookcɛn jɔkin maldi may, ɔci ɛkɛ daŋkun toljɛ te waka pookcɛn waka maldi ma waakcinday. Ɔci ɛkɛ cootti on Juaŋji, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋdi ba ɛkɛ agi Jwaŋa Tolan ɔɔn!
Ne ikin balkin iki ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya a ɔɔn doki, ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyeka neeni bɛɛ?
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ mena dɛyi ɛkɛ te bɛɛna ɛkɛ bɛɛdi wɛnni neeniyɛ, bala. Ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ba oŋŋa guagdɛ Jwaŋa Tolany.

Ɔci acca ɛkɛ bala kanŋan kanŋa ɛkɛ kanŋa yaayan neeni iñɔ lieda ɔɔn, ɛkɛ waanɛ bɛya men bɛɛ. Yeti ne mena dɛyi ɛkɛ oŋkanda neeni warɛ uuttɛ ooddiyɛ, mena yookɔn te jiek waakɛnda neeni ɛkɛ oŋ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora oŋo.
Ɔci ne Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdiyɛ, Mena Yaayan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ nogdɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ te boŋ ɛkɛ tukɛ. Ɔci kanŋa ɛkɛ lɛgdɛ jitin baadi doki.
Mena Yaayan neeniyɛ, ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ balki war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Yaayan, ɔci ɛkɛ ma naŋdɛ ñin te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka tɛyan neeni.
Maka naŋdɛ ñin ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka ooddi bana maaño. Ɛkkɛn a maka yookɔn te jyeka awarɛ jyeka pwadin neeni. Gena yookin ɛkkɛn aŋka ɛkkɛn ḍakti wanna.
Ɔci te yookin ɛkkɛn yookiti te jyeka awarɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn daldɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi jiek ne pwadan bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeddi gena jyeka jomginti.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka yookɔn te jyeka awarɛ ɔci buagɔn gena jyeka yeyin neeniyɛ, jyeka neeni bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti waakɛnda ba naŋki ɛkkɛn wanna.

Ɔci ɛkkɛyɛ, ɔɔn gɔkɔn a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti te ɛkkɛ, ɔci a ɔɔn pwatcin. Modg ɔɔn, Juaŋ ani ɛkkɛ ne tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛ muonɛ ɛkɛ bora ñamu acaan ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ buagɔn ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ɛkɛ agdɛ maka pwadin te naŋki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ yomgɔti, ɔci te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyeka awarɛ neeniti.
Ne ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora aŋka dala ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ ba Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ daŋkun.
