Modg ɔɔn, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyeka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn te tugi ɔɔn neeni, ɔci te jyeka kienɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛti waakɛnda neeni.
Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin mena ani ikin, ɔci ikin ‘wonnin yom tɛɛn ɔci kɛɛna ikin kɛɛyin te yom pwani ɛkɛ neeniyɛ,
ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ yom tɛɛno, ɔci ɛkkɛ tɛldɛ oŋkanda aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ɔci gɔktɛ a waka pwadin oŋkanda.

Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti te ɔɔn aŋka dala jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin ooddi mati ne pɛñan te war tɛɛn ɔci ma jyeddi ɛkɛti bala ba jiek ne bɛɛki ban ɛkkɛ wanna ɔɔn. Ɔci dala ma jieddi Juaŋ te jyeka neeni.
Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti aŋka naa maka yeyin maka wyetkɛn baaw neeni noŋdi ne yaayan ɔɔnti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn waakɛnda jyeti Juaŋti men bɛɛ.
Yeti Ciɛggɔn ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena tieci jyek ɛkɛ waakɛn. Ɔci ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ war tɛɛno. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ te Jwaŋa Yaayan.
Ɔɔn poŋɔn aŋa Juaŋti parɛ gɔkɔn ka Jwaŋa Tolan bala moki ɛkkɛ. Ɔci moki ɔɔn balgɔn poŋɔn ka ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ba jyeka neeni oŋkanda ɔɔn.
Dala ɛkkɛ wɛɛdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu te jyek ɛkɛ aŋka anna ɛkɛ ani ma neeniyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya ba yom Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.

Gɔṭṭɛ, hay! Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛ myettin te jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ moki te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ. Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, maka waakɛn pɛñin te naŋki waak, ɔci maka yookɔn te jyeka loṭɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛnyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ ñoodi iki ɛkkɛn te coodi bɛɛ.
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ kan ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin. Ne ɔɔn balgɔn iki ɛkkɛ ban ɛkkɛyɛ, ɔɔn waakɔ pɛñɔ te naŋki waak bɛɛ.

Ɔɔn balgɔn omɔn wak ɛkkɛ budan bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn balgɔn wɛɛṭɔn oomdin ɔɔn a wyɛlto. Ɔɔn balgɔn kanŋɔn ne tolan te oŋ jiñɛ ɔci te ween jiñɛ aŋka naa coodi ɔɔn ban ɛkkɛ cyɛga ɛkkɛti te jyek waka amtin bɛɛ.
Kan ɔɔn gɔktɔn ɛkkɛti ka ɔɔn ‘wondɔntɔ ɛkkɛ oomdinyɛ, a ɔɔn yaayɛ bɛɛ. Yeti ɔɔn kanŋɔn te byeŋkɔ a ɔɔn acaan ɔɔn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki ɔɔn neeni.
Ne ɔɔn balgɔn iki ɛkkɛ ban ɛkkɛyɛ, ɔɔn gɔŋnɔn ɛkkɛti agi, “Kan men gɛɛl noŋi kanŋa bɛɛyɛ, naa ɛkɛ daŋkun omdi waak bɛɛ.”
Ɛɛ, ɔɔn nɔɔtkɔn ma agi ma ɛkkɛ gɛɛg balgi tieci kanŋan ɛkki waakcin bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛn bala cooŋi ñingɛn te gena luarŋ ma waakɛn.
Maka noŋi naŋka neeniyɛ, ɔɔn ṭeyɔn ɛkkɛn te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ka dala ɛkkɛn tieci kanŋan ɛkkɛn waakɛn ne pwadan aŋka oomdin ɔci waka pookɛn bala ɛkkɛn byeŋkɛnti daŋkun te kanŋa ɛkkɛn.
Ɔci gɔṭṭɛ, hay! Modg ɔɔn, naa ɛkkɛ taabdɛ ɔci mwondɛ te naŋka pwadin bɛɛ.
Kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti yookɔn te jyeka kiewan ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te ɛkɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ jyeyɛ iki ɛkɛ oŋkanda bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ poŋdi te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka yaayan neeni.
Yeti gɔṭṭɛ, naa ɛkkɛ yooktɛ te ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ ṭeedɛ ba ṭeena ma ṭeeki modg ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ɔɔn.
Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin mena ma ‘wondɛ coodi pwani neeniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ coodi pwani ɛkɛ oŋkanda te jiek waakɛnda. Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin bala ɛkkɛti waakida.

Gena ‘ya Buuluc kiewan jwali ṭɔɔlɛ ne ŋoyɔ neeni te byeŋ ‘ya paru neeni. ‘Ya ñiep ɛkkɛ. Ɔci te jyek ñiebbin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn kiewan ‘ya te byeŋ ‘ya aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ worga neeni bɛɛn te ‘yati paru. Naŋki ‘ya bala a ɔɔn oŋkanda worganti.
Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti waakida.
Gena ‘ya Buuluc, cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ te yom Jwaŋa Tolan Mena Yuoci ikin, ɔci te yom Yaccu Kiṭɔ moki. Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena etti naŋka pwadin naŋka jyettin kɛɛtin ikiny.

Timutawuc, ‘ya kiewan worga iti. I aŋŋi kaci ‘ya te jyenna i jyetti Kiṭɔti neeni. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomgɛn pwada a pwani iti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pɔktan iti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn i ‘wonti coodi pwanno.

Ne ‘ya noŋa jɔŋda te ban Ɛpacacti oodda ban Macɛdɔɔnyatiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkkan iti ka dala i yedda te ban Ɛpacacti acaan ma gɛɛg bala loṭi ma amaam aŋan. Ɔci ‘ya buaga dala i gɔkca ɛkkɛnti te naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni. Dala ɛkkɛn naŋki ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, daltan.

Ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛn mwondi te jyeka jomgin ɔci te jyeka lwoktan ma te jyek yɔrg ɛkkɛny. Te jyeka neeniyɛ, jiek ḍuobbin ma wyetkɛnti, ɔci pɔy Jwaŋa Tolan pɔya yuartan ma ne ma jyetti neeni pɔya neeni yuartan ma moki bɛɛ.

Dala i maka neeni myetka jyeka lorki ɛkkɛn ma amaam wanna yɔttan ñin, acaan ikin buagin dala Ma Kiṭɔ oondi yɔtin. Ma Kiṭɔ ooniyɔ awarɛ ne yomg ɛkkɛn pwatkiy, ɔci moki ne jwalla yaayan gɛɛl baali ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti aŋka ma wookki ɛkkɛn bɛɛy, ɔci ne ɛkkɛn jyetki Yaccuti ne pwadany.
Yeti maka loṭi ma amaam neeni ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ te waka pwadin neeniti. Ɛkkɛn jyek naŋka pwadan neeni ŋeecɔn ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala tyewɔ te wyeñ booji te jyeka budan.

Maka neeniyɛ, buagɔn agi dala ɛkkɛn ŋeeddɛnti maka pookɛn agi ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛyɔ te lali jyek ganuun Muuca neeni. Yeti ɛkkɛn jyek ganuun jitkɛn ŋeecɔn ne pwadan bɛɛ. Jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn mati neeni jitkɛn kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn.
Ɛɛ, ŋeecin ikin jyek ganuun pwadɔ, kan ɛkkɛn tiiyɛyɔ ma ba bolja Juaŋ buagɛy.

Yeti ŋeecin ikin jyek ganuun bɛɛn acaan maka noŋi ba jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ. Yeti ganuun bɛɛn acaan te maka nɔɔtk maka noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn yookɔn te Jwaŋa Tolany, ɔci moki bala te maka bɛɛyi jyek Juaŋ jitkɛny. Ɔci moki te maka jyek Juaŋ baaw ɛkkɛntiy. Ɔci moki te maka paŋi ɛkkɛn yeyiny. Ɔci moki te maka gɔki jyeka yeyiny. Ɔci moki ganuun bala te maka noki weyyɛn iki mɛyyɛn iki maka pookɛny.

Ɔci moki jyek ganuun bala te maka noŋi tommo, ɔci te maka ‘uay maka tobi yɔtin pookɛny, ɔci te maka koṭi may, ɔci te maka jomi jieky, ɔci te maka aaltan te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan te jyeka awarɛ bɛɛy. Kan gen gɛɛl bala ɔntɔ te jyek Juaŋtiyɛ, jyek ganuun bala te ɛkɛ daŋkun.
Jwaŋ ikin Jwaŋa pwadan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonna kanŋa miet ma te jyek ɛkɛ jyeka pwadin neeni.
Ɛɛ, ‘ya gɔk a pwatcin Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti, hay! Acaan ɛkɛ ‘ya muona bora noŋ kanŋa ɛkɛ neeni, ɔci ‘ya ‘wonna ɛkɛ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ noŋa kanŋa ɛkɛ neeni.

Te ñamuyɛ, ‘ya baal gɔk ka yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni yaayɛ, ɔci ‘ya baal noŋ ne yaayan Ma Kiṭɔti, ɔci ‘ya baal wook ɛkɛ te jyeka yeyin. Yeti Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ‘yati acaan ne ‘ya baala noŋa naŋka yaayan neeniyɛ, ‘ya jyeti Yaccuti men bɛɛ, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naŋka naŋi ‘ya wanna konɛ ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ.
Acc, hay! Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ‘yati, ‘ya maŋŋa ɛkɛ aŋka ‘ya yomu ḍuacca ɛkɛti ne pwadan. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘ya maŋŋa aŋka ‘ya jyeti Yaccuti ɔci ‘ya an maka pookɛn ne tolan te ani Yaccu.

Jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ. Jwalla neeniyɛ, gena jwalla awarɛ, ma yaakinti jyeddi jwalla neeniti waakɛnda. Jwalla neeni gɔki agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛnɔ iñɔ baanji wɛnni, aŋka maka nɔɔtk yɔɔnda ɛkta. Ɔci ‘yayɛ, maka pookɛn buani ‘ya te nɔjjo, yeti ɛkɛ ‘ya yɔɔñña doki.

Ɔci Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ‘yati. Ɛkɛ buagɔn dala maka pookɛn gɔrti naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka Yaccu ŋeettiti ma ne ɛkɛ loomgɛ tɛɛki mati oŋkanda aŋka ŋeettan ma Yaccu Kiṭɔ noŋi a ɔɔn maka jyeddi ɛkɛti waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ tɛɛtin, ɔci tɛɛtin neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk a pwatcin Juaŋti mena a Ciɛggɔn Tolan mena ciyi yuonginda neeniti. Ɛkɛ baadi bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkɛ yuartin ikin te woŋgɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a Juaŋ waanɛ. Ɛkɛ pwanna pwanno, ɔci ma noŋi ne pwadan ɛkɛti. Dala ma jieddi ɛkɛ yuonginda ɔɔn! Amɛɛn.

Gɔṭṭi acca hay! Kaci ‘ya, Timutawuc, ‘ya buaga i myettin te jyek kanŋa i bala ba te ñamu ne ma myennɛ Juaŋ gɔkki te jyek naŋki i naŋka bɛya ne baaṭiy. Dala i poŋja jyeka guagɛ ma te i neeni aŋka i noŋja kanŋa Juaŋ ne pwadan.
Dala jyeni i Kiṭɔti tieka te yoma wɔɔgan. Ma gɛɛg yomg ɛkkɛn tiiyɛ ñin bɛɛ, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeni ɛkkɛn jyenna jyetki Yaccuti neeni daljɛ doki.
Aymaneeyac ɔci Alɛkcaandaryɛ, ɛkkɛn bala noŋi a ɔɔn. Ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛn oljan Jwaŋa Yaayan bieŋɛti aŋka dala ɛkkɛn taabdi aŋka ɛkkɛn mwondi te ŋɛɛgga ḍorki ɛkkɛn jyek Jwaŋ ɛkkɛn neeni.

Gɔṭṭi, ‘ya gɔkka iti, jwalla bala ñamu te jyeka pookɛn waakɛndayɛ, gena jyek cɔŋŋo. Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te maka pookɛn waakɛnda. Dala ɛkkɛ toottɛ Juaŋti aŋka ɛkɛ yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkkɛnti. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ cɔktiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.

Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin waakɛnda, ɔci maka bala ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin neeni ŋotkɛnti daŋkun aŋka ɛkkɛn magdɛ Juaŋ te muŋi baan aŋka ikin cietin ne pwadan, ɔci aŋka ikin noŋtin ba naŋki Juaŋ oŋkanda.
Cɔŋŋa neeniyɛ, pwad pwado, ɔci yɔmjin Juaŋti Mena Yuoci ikiny.
Acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn yuoci ma waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn dala jyeka awarɛ neeni ŋeettan ɛkkɛn.
Juaŋ bala ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Ɔci cuuda ikin daŋkun bala ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Gena mena etti jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ ikintiy. Gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ, mena aŋi men baany.
Ɛkɛ tuun aŋka ɛkɛ woni ma waakɛnda. Te lyen ɛkɛ te oŋŋa ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ wannayɛ, jiek lɛɛlnɛ ɛkɛ bora ne pwadan a Juaŋ buagɔn ma waakɛnda uda.

A ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya naŋŋa Juaŋ aŋi mena loṭi ma ɔci cuuda Yaccu. ‘Ya cuonna Juaŋ aŋka lor Keedin Pookɛn te jyeka awarɛ te jyek jyenna jyetki ma Juaŋti neeni. Ɛɛ, ne ‘ya gɔka ka ‘ya cuonna Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ‘ya jom jiek bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔk awarɛ.
’Ya buaga dala maka ‘uay cɔkti Juaŋti kaniicanji waakɛnda. Dala ɛkkɛn cɔkti te yoma pwadan. Ne ɛkkɛn cɔkkiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn looñi mengati bɛɛ, ɔci naa ɛkkɛn wɛyyɔ bɛɛ.

Ɔci gɔṭṭi moki, dala i maka moong myetka, ne ɛkkɛn bɛɛtɛ on Juaŋ ona tolanyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ɛɛŋdi bworŋin ne pwadan, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn waakɛn tiitan ne pwadan aŋka naa maka ‘uay gɔṭi booti ɛkkɛn waakɛn bɛɛ. Yeti naa ɛkkɛn buagɔn ma jieddi ɛkkɛn te pani jyeyi a ɔɔn bɛɛ, ɔci walla te waka ‘yɛŋtan ɛkkɛn ba dahab bɛɛ, ɔci lirga ‘yɛŋtan ma a luulan ɔci bworŋin wiɛlɛn tɛyan a ɔɔn bɛɛ.
Moonga gɔki agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka moṭi Juaŋtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn aŋka jiɛtan ma te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn pwadin neeni.
Gɔṭṭi ‘wota, moongyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ciya lieda kaniicaji, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyeka laltan ma te yoma pwadan. Naa ɛkkɛn noŋi waakɛn bɛɛ.
’Ya buaga naa maka moong loṭi maka ‘uay bɛɛ, ɔci naa ɛkkɛn ḍwaŋdi yomgɛnti aŋka ‘yeṭi maka ‘uay jitkɛn bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn ciya lieda.
Jiek bala a ɔɔn moongti ogo? Jiek bala a ɔɔn acaan Adamyɛ, ɛkɛ cɔnnɛ Juaŋ ñamu, ɔci Awwayɛ, ɛkɛ cɔnnɛ Juaŋ ne ŋoyɔ.
Ɔci moki a Adam ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ ñin Jwaŋa Yaayan bɛɛ. Gena Awwa aŋka naŋŋɛ ñin Jwaŋa Yaayany. Ɔci ɛkɛ jyek Juaŋ bɛɛññɛji.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Juaŋ moong cuonnɛ pɛñi ɔci taab ne ɛkkɛn jiedki kɛɛginy. Yeti kan maka moong ciyi ne pwadan te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Juaŋti neeni, ɔci kan anna ɛkkɛn anki ma bala ɛkkɛn yomgɛntiyɛ, ɔci kan naŋki ɛkkɛn pwadɔyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi jiek ne pwadanyɛ, ɛkkɛn magdɛ Juaŋ te jiedi kɛɛgin.
Jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl bala, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Kan mena buagɔn naŋtan ma a gaciicyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn gena pwadan.” Jwalla neeniyɛ, a jwalla awarɛ.

Mena naŋtan ma a gaciicyɛ, naa ɛkɛ naŋtan ma a mena waaktan ma bɛɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena balkin ɛɛŋ ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Dala ɛkɛ aga mena tukɛ luyan. Dala ɛkɛ poŋi jiek te ñamu. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena cooddɛ pwadan. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena yomɛ pwadan Ma Kiṭɔ maka wɛlgtiy. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena yaakinti lali ma te worga Juaŋ ne pwadan.
Naa ɛkɛ a mena nokkin mooy bɛɛy. Ɔci naa ɛkɛ a mena noowi i ma bɛɛy. Dala ɛkɛ a mena yomɛ pwadan maka pookɛnti. Naa ɛkɛ a mena ani wɛɛdin iki maka pookɛn bɛɛy. Naa ɛkɛ a mena ani bilk bɛɛy.
Dala ɛkɛ a mena gɔṭi ma on ɛkɛ ne pwadan. Dala kɛɛgin ɛkɛ noŋi ba jyek ɛkɛ oŋkanda te yoma pwadan.
Acaan kan men yaakinti gɔṭi kɛɛgin ɛkɛ ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, oŋ ɛkɛ yaakinti gɔrti ma kaniica a ɔki?

Naa ɛkɛ a mena jyeti Yaccuti woonɛ bɛɛ. Kan ɛkɛ a mena jyeti woonɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ naŋtan ma a gaciic ne pɛñan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ tola dita, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋdi amaam dita. Ɔci jiek bɛya ɛkɛ wyeñɛti daŋkun ba jyeka bɛɛn Jwaŋa Yaayan wyeñɛti neeniy.
Dala mena neeni a mena jiɛtan maka bora agi ɛkta pwadɔ. Kan a ɔɔn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ dita waaktan ma, ɔci ɛkɛ ḍɛmdi iñɔ te naŋki Jwaŋa Yaayan neeni dita.
Maka dikannyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn a maka yaakinti paŋi jieko. Naa ɛkkɛn balki yomgɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛn ani mooy bɛɛ. Ɔci moki naa ɛkkɛn yomgɛn buagɔn waka coŋin bɛɛ.
Jyek yɔɔt Jwaŋa Tolan jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin, jyeka bɛɛn bora neeniyɛ, dala bala ɛkkɛnti te yoma wɔɔgan ne pwadan.
Dala ma gɔrti naŋki ɛkkɛn te ñamu ne ɛkkɛn cieki ne pwadan boki no, hayya! Ɛkkɛn oŋ naŋtan ma aga dikann oŋo.

Dikann a moongyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn daŋkun a maka yaakinti paŋi jieko. Naa ɛkkɛn a moonga ani luarŋ ma waakɛn bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn a moonga tuggɛn luyan. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛn a moonga woŋgɛn a tiicin te jiek waakɛnda ne pwadan.
Maka dikannyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn balki moong ne ciṭin. Dala ɛkkɛn a maka gɔṭi kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn ne pwadan iki maka cieki iki ɛkkɛn oorg ɛkkɛn jitin waakɛnda.
Kan dikann noŋi kanŋa Juaŋ neeni ne pwadanyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka anki may. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti gɔkti ne pwadan mati te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkkɛn buayi menga bɛɛ.
Ɛɛ, ŋeej ‘ya ne ‘ya buagati bɛɛda ban ɛkkɛ ne cwakanti ɔɔn. Yeti ‘ya kiewan jyeka neeni iti men ɔɔn

aŋka kan ne ‘ya kwattayɛ, jyek naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ŋeejja i te worga kiewan ‘ya iti neeni doki. Ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ kaniica Jwaŋa Tolan. Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a tuuta bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a tɛɛta. Juaŋ buagɔn dala ma kaniica yɔɔda ne tɛyan aŋka ma gɔrti a jwali Juaŋ neeni a jwalla awarɛ.

Ɛɛ, awarɛ, jyek Juaŋ ikin tɛy tɛyo, ɛkkɛn jitkɛn wɔkɔ mati te ñamu bɛɛ. Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora mati te oŋŋa ɛkɛ aŋŋi men baany. Naŋki pwani ɛkɛ lɛɛlnɛ Boŋ Juaŋ bora te jɔɔŋŋin ɛkɛ jɔŋni ñaalɔ te kooljiy. Ɛkɛ yuarɛ malɛɛkan te woŋgɛn. Ma bala loṭi keedin waakɛnda te jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci ma gɛɛg jyeti ɛkɛti baan warda. Ɔci ɛkɛ eññɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ pɔliji.

Ɔɔn myennɔn Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ne pwadan agi ne ninka bɛya ne ṭɛɛr noŋɛ wyeñɛ baldiyɛ, ma kaniica gɛɛg jyeka awarɛ neeni daltan. Ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeddi ɔci bootti amaam jyeka ɛkkɛn laltɛti jɔkin yeyin a jyeka a jomgin neeniti.
Maka loṭi ɛkkɛn te jyeka pookɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi ba ɛkkɛn akki maka pwadin ɔɔn, yeti ɛkkɛn a maka pwadin bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jomi jieko, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti paŋi jyeka pwadin bɛɛ.

Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn dɛyi ma te jyek ḍɛɛwin, ɔci ɛkkɛn moki dɛyi ma te waka amtan ma gɛɛg. Yeti waka neeni aŋŋɛ Juaŋ ɔci ‘wonnin ɛkɛ ikin. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin maka jyeti Juaŋti, maka jyeka awarɛ neeni ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛnyɛ, ikin gɔktin a pwatcin Juaŋti te waka neeni. Ɔci ma Juaŋ yaakinti omi waka neeni te yoma pwadan.
Waka aŋŋɛ Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwadɔ waakɛnda. Kan men gɛɛl gɔkti a pwatcin Juaŋti te waka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti omdi waka neeni waakɛnda,
acaan waka neeni pwadgin te jyek Juaŋ ɔci te cɔŋŋa neeni.
Kan i Ma Kiṭɔ nɔɔtka jyeka neeni jitkɛnyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, i noŋ kanŋa ne pwadan Yaccu Kiṭɔti, bala ba ne i pyeṭi waru te jyek jyeni, ɔci te jyeka boonni i a jyek lalla awarɛ neeni.
Dala i waru uutca ɔntɔ ne loonan te jyeka jiɛtan ma a jyeka jitkɛn baaw budan wanna, naa i tieŋja ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Dala i waŋu tiicca oŋkanda te yom i aŋka i noŋja naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan.

Kan i waŋu tiicca te war i aŋka ɛkɛ tɛy tɛyyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin. Yeti jyek tiit yomgɔ te coodi Juaŋ aŋka bala ñamu. Acaan jyek tiit yomgɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn etti waka pwadin iñɔ baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni acca, ɔci moki ne baaṭi daŋkun.
Jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ. Jwalla neeni gena jwalla awarɛ. Ma yaakinti jyeddi jwalla neeniti waakɛnda.

(Ikin kanŋin ne tolan ne taab baali ikinti ɔɔn.) Ɔci jwalla neeni gɔki agi, “Ikin kɛɛyin naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan mena ciyi tɛɛti yuonginday. Ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci ma waakɛnday. Ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci maka jyeddi ɛkɛti nɔñji ne tolan.”
Gɔṭṭi Timutawuc kaci ‘ya, naa i mwonna te myetkin ma te jyeka i myennin ‘ya worgaji neeni bɛɛ, ɔci walla te lalla neeni bɛɛ.

Naa ma lɛɛrti i waru agi i agji gaciic ne i a mena ḍiɛran bɛɛ. Dala i gɔk te lɛmma pwadan, ɔci noŋja naŋka pwadin aŋka maka jyeti Jwaŋa Tolanti neeni lɔkti ba naŋki i neeni, ɔci moki ba anna ani i ma neeniyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn moki lɔkti. Ɔci moki ba jyenna i jyetti Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn moki lɔkti. Ɔci ba coodi i coodda pwadan neeniyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn moki lɔkti.
Dala i pokca worga Juaŋ mati, ɔci dala i ṭey ma, ɔci lorca ma oŋkanda ne ‘ya bɛɛda iti ɔɔn.
Dala i waŋu tiicca te naŋka i ‘wonniti Juaŋ te oŋŋa cyekin kaniica byeŋkɛn tañkiti itiy. Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔki te Boŋ Juaŋ te jyek naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ itiy.
Dala i waŋu tiicca te kanŋa i neeni. Dala i ñingu juaddi te ɛkɛ, aŋka dala i ŋeetti ma waakɛnda i baal ‘uocca ñamu gɔ moki ‘uoci ɔɔn.
Dala i waŋu tiicca te coodi i, ɔci te lali i daŋkun. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, i waru maga paru, ɔci i yaaktiti maka pookɛn, maka tyeŋi jyek i maga daŋkun.

I Timutawuc, gɔṭṭi i myettin te kanŋa i kaniicaji ‘wota. Tieŋŋa, kan men a mena tolanyɛ, naa i gɔk ṭey ɛkɛ ne pɛñan bɛɛ. Dala i gɔkca ɛkɛti ne maalan ṭɔɔlɛ bala ba ne ɛkɛ agi wey ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci ‘uaya ḍyɛrinyɛ, dala i gɔkca ɛkkɛnti bala ba ne ɛkkɛn akki modg ɛkkɛ ɔɔn.

Moonga ḍwaŋinyɛ, dala i gɔkca ɛkkɛnti ne maalan ṭɔɔlɛ bala ba ne ɛkkɛn akki mɛyi ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci moonga ḍyɛrinyɛ, dala i gɔkca ɛkkɛnti ne maalan ṭɔɔlɛ bala ba ne ɛkkɛn akki kowi ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Naa paŋŋa yaayan gɛɛl bala iti bɛɛ.
Moonga ciekyɛ, kan mena gɔṭi ɛkkɛn baawiyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn maga.

Moonga ciekyɛ, kan ɛkkɛn balki kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn kɛɛgin a kɛɛginyɛ, dala ŋeettan ɛkkɛn ne pwadan a dala ɛkkɛn moki mɛyi ɛkkɛn, ɔci walla moki ṭyerg ɛkkɛn, ɔci a ɔɔn pwatcin. Dala kɛɛgin moki ma ɛkkɛn a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛn magɛ mɛyyɛn a ɔɔn te ñamu daŋkun, ɔci a ɔɔn pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti daŋkun.

Ɛŋa cieñyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ bala ciyi parɛ acaan menga bala gɔṭi ɛkɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ bala Juaŋti ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkɛ bala cɔki Juaŋti oŋkanda te oŋ jiñɛ, ɔci te ween jiñɛ. Ɛkɛ tooci Juaŋti te waka ɛkɛ buagitiy.
Yeti ɛŋa cieñyɛ, kan ɛkɛ bala lieṭi waak ne coŋɔn te ḍwaŋ ɛkɛ parɛyɛ, ɛŋa cieñ neeni ɛkɛ bala ba mena tuuta doki.
Dala i ɛkkɛn myetka ‘wota te jiek jitkɛn daŋkun te gwali moonga ciek neeni aŋka naa ma wookti Ma Kiṭɔ te naŋki ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
Acaan kan men gɛɛl moki ma ɛkkɛn, mɛyyɛn ɔci ṭyerkɛn bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkɛ yookɔn te jyek Juaŋ doki. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ yaayɛ ne pɛñan te naŋki maka ciyi budan te jyek Juaŋy.

Moonga ciekyɛ, kan ɛkkɛn yuongɛn a ma baan ne ḍoogɔ (60) men bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn ‘uaya ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛkɛ te baaṭi tiiyɛyɔ ne ciṭin bɛɛyɛ, naa yeng ɛkkɛn olja worga kiewi i yeng moonga ciekji, aŋka i ɛkkɛn maga te bilk Juaŋ bɛɛ.

Ɔci moonga yeng ɛkkɛn olja worgajiyɛ, gena moonga guaktan ma agi naŋki ɛkki pwadgɔy. Kan ɛkkɛn kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn gwalɛ ne pwadanyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ maka wɛlgtiyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn moki noŋi Ma Kiṭɔti ne pwadan te yoma pwadanyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn moki maka balki taab magɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn buagɔn noŋdi ne pwadan mati oŋkandayɛ, dala i moonga neeni aŋka yengɛn olja worgaji.

Moonga ḍyɛrin, moonga ciekyɛ, naa yeng ɛkkɛn olja worga kiewi i yeng moonga ciekji bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛn poŋi jyek ḍɛɛn oŋkanda ne tolanyɛ, ɔci paŋŋa neeni bala ñamu ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyek Kiṭɔ daltan ɔci ḍɛɛtan ma moki.
Ɔci a ɔɔn jyeka naŋɛ ɛkkɛn i Kiṭɔ te ñamuyɛ, bɛɛtan ɛkkɛn jitin, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jiek bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti.

Ɔci moki, moonga ḍyɛrin moonga ciekyɛ, ɛkkɛn ma gɛɛg ciyi budan waakɛn pɛñɔ te kanŋa, ɔci ɛkkɛn ati ḍɔki a ḍwaŋi lɔṭi ma waakɛn oorg maka pookɛn jitin. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala nɔɔti jiek amaam budan. Ɛkkɛn ani nwati jiek pwatcin bɛɛ.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk yomuti ka dala moonga ḍyɛrin moonga ciekyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛtan mako, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn jietti kɛɛgin, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn tiittan ma ɛkkɛnti oorg ɛkkɛn jitin. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, maka yookɔn te jyek Juaŋ neeni yaakinti wooki ikin te genga moki bɛɛ.
Acaan moonga ciek gɛɛg jyetcin ɔntɔ te kaniicaji doki, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala booti Jwaŋa Yaayanti doki.

Yɔɔddi i myettin lakun ‘wota! Ma Kiṭɔ maka ‘uay ɔci maka moong kan ma ɛkkɛn gɛɛg a moonga ciekyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛn magtan. Naa moonga ciek balki ma ɛkkɛn neeni bɛya a taab kaniicati bɛɛ. Dala kaniicayɛ, moonga ciek anin baaki maka gɔṭi ɛkkɛn neeni aŋka magdɛ ɛkɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn ma ɛkkɛn baawo.
Cyekin kaniica maka noŋi kanŋa ɛkkɛn ne tolanyɛ, ɔci maka loṭi ma ne pwadan mokiyɛ, dala i noŋja ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti ba kanŋa ɛkkɛn.
Acaan worga Juaŋ gɔki agi, “Kan yaan bala olni i wɔɔci jana deeki ma pok aŋka deyi pok iyɛ, naa ɛkɛ ḍyɛga tukɛti bɛɛ.” Ɔci worga moki gɔki agi, “Mena noŋi kanŋayɛ, dala ɛkɛ omdi bilk ba kanŋa ɛkɛ.”
Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ciɛggɔn kaniica neeni baalɔ noŋi ne yaayanyɛ, naa i jyedda budan men bɛɛ. Kan ma gɛɛg ɛkɛ yuarki ne yyɛɛwɔ walla ne ḍoogɔyɛ, dala i oŋ jyedda gɔrca jyek ɛkɛ oŋo.
Kan men noŋi nɔji awarɛyɛ, kan i buagi gɔkca ṭey ɛkɛyɛ, dala i gɔkca ɛkɛti maka pookɛn ñomgɛnti waakɛnda aŋka ɛkkɛn buatti nɔjja neeni yaayɛ awarɛ.

Timutawuc, ‘ya gɔkka iti Juaŋ ñamɛti ɔci Yaccu Kiṭɔti ɔci malɛɛkan pwadin ñomgɛnti daŋkun, ka dala i noŋja ba jyeka i myennin ‘ya neeni. Ɔci ne i noŋdi a ɔɔnyɛ, dala i noŋja ma waakɛndati ba bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ. Dala i yomu bala ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda.

Kan i buagi noŋja mena wɛɛyi ma gɛɛlyɛ, naa i ɛkɛ naŋa ne pɛñan ñamu doki budan bɛɛ. Kan i men gɛɛl naŋa ɔci kan ɛkɛ noŋi ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, jyeka neeniyɛ, bɛya aŋa i wyeñuti dɔki. Naa nɔji bala i ḍwaŋuti bɛɛ.
Naa i mot pieg pookɛn bɛɛ. Dala i motca mooy ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ acaan kon i balki taab, ɔci aŋka dala i waru pwada acaan i waru yaayɛ a ñaccu gɔ moki waru yaayɛ acaan taab bala i konuti neeni.

Ma gɛɛgyɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin niin te waakɛn a lyɛlta, ɔci nɔji ɛkkɛn neeni ɛkkɛn eedɛ non godan. Ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛgyɛ, ɛkkɛn coki naŋki ɛkkɛn waakɛn. Jyek ɛkkɛn ootan bora bɛɛ. Yeti jyek ɛkkɛn bɛya bora ne baaṭi dɔki te oŋ godan Jwaŋa Tolan.
Ɔci jyek naŋka pwadin bala a ɔɔn daŋkun. Jyek naŋka pwadin gɛɛgyɛ, ŋeettan ma waakɛnda, ɔci jyek naŋka pwadin gɛɛgyɛ, bɛya bora ne pɛñan bɛɛ, bɛya bora ne baaṭi dɔki.
I Timutawuc, gɔṭṭi ‘wota, i myettin baa! Maka kɛɛnkyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ani weyi ɛkkɛn aŋka naa maka pookɛn wookti yenti Juaŋ bɛɛ, ɔci walla jyeka loṭin ikin ma neeni bɛɛ.

Maka kɛɛnkyɛ, kan maka ḍɔci ɛkkɛn maka waka pwadin bɛya ɛkkɛnti te kanŋa kɛɛnk neeni a Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn yooktan te jyek weyyɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛn gɔkti agi ɛkkɛn aŋŋinti modin aŋka ɛkkɛn yookinti te jyek ɛkki wanna bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn kandi ne tolan te yoma pwadan acaan weyi ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a Ma Kiṭɔ ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn daŋkun. Ɔci Juaŋ ani ɛkkɛn. Dala i ma lala te jyeka awarɛ neeni, ɔci dala i ɛkkɛn ciŋaji te jiek aŋka ɛkkɛn tieŋdi ɔci noŋdi ba jyek weyya ḍɔci ɛkkɛny.
Kan men gɛɛl loṭi ma te jyeka pookɛn gɛɛg jyeka a jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ yookɔn te jyek coodda cieki Ma Kiṭɔyɛ,

mena neeni ɛkɛ noŋi warɛ amaam budan. Ɛkɛ poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ jiek ŋeejjɛ waakcinda. Yeti ɛkɛ genga ŋeejɛ bɛɛ. Mena neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ani tyewwin iki ma te jieko. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛyɛ, ma korkɛn modɔ, ɔci ma wɛyyɔ, ɔci ma woowɔ yɔtin, ɔci ma pooŋɔ yɔtin te jyeka budan.

Maka ani tyewwin neeni ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi jyeka pwadin gɛɛg moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn yiegin jiju poŋi gɔki agi mali Jwaŋa Tolan neeni agi pɔya ma yɔɔrdi waka coŋin neeni budan. Naa i ñoodi iki ɛkkɛn te jiek bɛɛ.
Awarɛ, mali Juaŋ ikin naŋtin balkin ba maka cyɛgan kan ikin yɔmnin doki te waka ikin ‘wonninti Juaŋy.
Gɔṭṭi, oŋŋa ikin jiedkinti mayɛ, ikin ennin waagga byeŋkɔti iñɔ baanji wɛnni bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ikin tuutinyɛ, ikin daŋkun eetin waagga byeŋkɔti bɛɛ.
Ɔci acaan ikin akin Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, kan waka amtin bala ikintiyɛ, ɔci kan moki ikin balkin bworŋinyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin doki ikinti.

Maka buagɔn aga maka cyɛgan te waakyɛ, paŋŋa coŋin bala ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ. Jyek bwakti waka coŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn maaldɛ ne ɛkkɛn noŋtɛ nɔji ɔɔn. Kan ma buagɔn waka coŋin amaam ɔɔnyɛ, bwakti waka coŋin neeniyɛ, etti naŋka yeyin ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ma gɛɛg ḍakti te naŋka neeni.
Ani bilk neeni, ɛkɛ a ŋway naŋka yeyin jitkɛn waakɛnda. Ɔci te jyek ani bilk neeniyɛ, ma gɛɛg jyetcin ɔntɔ doki te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Juaŋtiy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn taabbin ne tolan doki te yom yoño.

Yeti hay! I Timutawuc, i ag men Juaŋo, dala i waŋu tiicca te bwakti waka coŋin neeni waakɛnda amaamo. Dala i noŋja naŋka pwadin, dala naŋka naŋa i bala ba naŋka Juaŋ buagɛy. Dala i jyedda Juaŋti ne pwadan ɔci dala i balki ani yomuti. Dala i yɔɔd ne tɛyan, ɔci dala i yomu pwad pwad mati.

Coodda i ciyi te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba maka yiŋ boddi guoñjiy, mena ma boddiyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wontan ma genga ba ŋañ ɛkɛ neeni. Ɔci bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, kan i noŋja kanŋa ne tolan ba mena ma bonnɛ guoñji neeniyɛ, Juaŋ daŋkun i ‘wondi tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛy. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, aŋka Juaŋ i borniti te oŋŋa i Jiek ooni bora te jyeni i maka coŋin ñomgɛnti neeni.

’Ya gɔkka iti Jwaŋa Tolan mena waak waakɛnda ‘wondɛ tɛɛtin neeni ñamɛti, ɔci moki ‘ya gɔkka iti Yaccu Kiṭɔ ñamɛti, ɛkɛ a mena jyeni ɛkɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora ne tɛyan Bilaatuc Bunti ñamɛtiy. ‘Ya gɔkka iti ɛkkɛn ñomgɛnti
aŋka dala i jyeka i myennin ‘ya te kanŋa i neeni tiyayɔ ne pwadan oŋkanda naa i jyeka neeni gɛɛl dalja bɛɛ, ne oŋŋa Yaccu warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora mati ɔɔn.

Yaccu lɛɛldɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bora oŋgati ba oŋŋa ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te ɛkɛ, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ pwad pwado, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ñamu te cyekin ḍwaŋin pookɛn waakɛnda ɔci cyekin bala makɛn ḍwaŋin neeni ŋotkɛntiy.

Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ bala te baaṭi doki, ɔci ɛkɛ bala parɛ yuonginda ɔɔn. Ɔci nona ciyi ɛkɛyɛ, galla gallo, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, menga yaakinti ortiti nona ciyi ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ yuarŋɛ menga te waŋɛ oŋgati bɛɛ, ɔci menga yaakinti ɛkɛ yuartɛ acca bɛɛ. Dala yenti ɛkɛ tola, ɔci dala war tɛɛn ɛkɛ bala yuonginda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.

Maka cyɛgan te waka iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn myetka naa ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ḍwaŋdi bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ḍuattan waka coŋinti, waka baadi neeni bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ḍuattan gena Juaŋti parɛ, mena ‘woñi ma te waka ma yomgɛn ñɔɔti waakɛnday.
Dala i ɛkkɛn myetka, dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi naŋka pwadan mati te bilk ɛkkɛn. Dala naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn neeni coŋdi. Dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pɔktan, ɔci ma ‘wontan waak te yoma pwadan.
Ɔci naŋka pwadan neeni warɛ bwogdɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji ban Juaŋ bala ba mal ɛkkɛn ne baaṭi. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni ne baaṭi.

I Timutawuc, dala i waŋu tiicca ne pwadan te kanŋa i, kanŋa i ‘wonniti Juaŋ neeniy. Dala i yooki te jyeka guaktan ma budan a jyeka cɔggin neeni. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ma ñingɛn tɛɛdɔ te jyeka neeni katan. Yeti ma ñingɛn tɛya te jyeka neeni awarɛ bɛɛ.
Ma gɛɛg gɔki agi ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛɛnɔ te jyeka cɔggin neeni doki, yeti ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ te jyek Juaŋti. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti waakida. Bawwin.
Gena ‘ya Buuluc cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Jwaŋa Tolan ‘ya muona bora aŋka ‘ya ma myetka te naŋki ɛkɛ. Ɔci naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, gena tɛɛtin Juaŋ ma ḍuaññɛ te jwali agi ɛkki ‘woñji ɛkɛ te Yaccu Kiṭɔy.
Kaci ‘ya Timutawuc, dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin, ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomgɛn pwada a pwani iti, ɔci dala yom pɔkkin Juaŋ bala iti.
’Ya gɔk a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋkanda te i, hay, Timutawuc. ‘Ya kanŋ ɛkɛti te yoma pwadan. Ɛkɛ a Jwaŋ yɔrg ɔɔn ɔci a Jwaŋ ‘ya. ‘Ya cɔk ɛkɛti oŋkanda, te oŋ jiñɛ ɔci te ween jiñɛ ka da ɛkɛ i ordiyɔ.
’Ya ñingu boŋi ne pɛñan te i. Ne ‘ya poŋa te joon i te oŋŋa ikin kɛɛmninji iki iyɛ, ‘ya buaga dala ikin yɔɔrtin iki ‘ya, aŋka ‘ya yomu ñɔɔdɛ.
Ɛɛ, ‘ya baal poŋ te jyenna i jyetti Juaŋti ne pwadan neeni. Šyer ɛkkɛ Lɔwic jyeti ne pwadan daŋkun yaakkɛn i mɛy ɛkkɛ Yunic. Ɔci acca ‘ya gɔk ka i jyetti ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn daŋkun.
Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya i myettin ‘wota, dala i waru tɛya ‘wota te naŋki i naŋka i ‘wonniti Juaŋ te oŋŋa ‘ya byeŋku tanna itiy.

Acaan Boŋ Juaŋ Boŋa ikin ‘wonninti Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ etti jyek bwaji bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ etti gena war tɛɛn iki anna ikin anin Juaŋ iki ma baany. Ɔci moki te Boŋ Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ikin yaakinti maŋi waakɔ ne pwadan.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa i noŋ ba i lɔɔdi te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛ. ‘Ya baal jiju ciginji acca te jyek ɛkɛ, ɔci naa i poŋ gɔk naŋka neeni a lɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɔci kan taab bɛya iti te jyeka loṭi i ma a jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, naa i yooki bɛɛ. Dala war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan bala iti.

Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, gena ɛkɛ ikin yɔɔññin neeni, ɔci gena ɛkɛ ikin muonin bora aŋka ikin aktin ma ɛkɛ maka pwadin neeni. Ikin muonin ɛkɛ bora te naŋka naŋŋin ikin pwadin gɛɛl bɛɛ. Yeti ikin muonin ɛkɛ bora ba naŋka ɛkɛ buagiti ikin ne ṭɛɛr men baawiy. Ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin yom pwani ɛkɛ te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ.

Ɔci acca jyek yom pwani Juaŋ neeni bɛɛn bora doki. Jyeka neeni bɛɛn bora oŋŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛni iñɔ baanji wɛnniy. Ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci ikin. War tɛɛn lien lɛɛŋŋɛ ɛkɛ jitin, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin tɛɛtin te jyenna ikin jyettin jyek ɛkɛy. Ɔci tɛɛtin neeniyɛ, baadi ywongati bɛɛ.
Te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, ‘ya naŋŋa Yaccu aŋi cuuda ɛkɛ miet ma te jyek ɛkɛ, ɔci lor ma te jyek ɛkɛ.

Ɔci te jyeka neeniyɛ, aŋka taab bɛɛni ‘yati neeni. Yeti ‘ya lɔɔd te jyeka neeni bɛɛ, acaan mena jyetta ‘ya neeniyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya ne pwadan. Ɔci ŋeej ‘ya kanŋa ‘ya ‘wonnata ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔṭi kanŋa neeni oŋkanda ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ɔɔn.
Jyeka i laldin ‘ya a jyeka awarɛ neeniyɛ, dala i waŋu tiicca te ɛkkɛn. Dala yom i an ma ne pwadan, ɔci dala i yomu ḍuacca Juaŋti ne pwadan oŋkanda. Naŋka neeni bɛya te Yaccu Kiṭɔti waakɛnda.
Dala i waŋu tiicca ne pwadan te kanŋa i ‘wonniti Juaŋ pwadan neeni te Boŋ Juaŋ mena ciyi ikin yomgɔti neeni.
Çeej i doki ne ‘ya dalkata maka ciyi ban Ecya waakɛnday. ‘Ya dalka Pijiiloc ɛkkɛn yaakkɛn iki Ɛrmɔɔjɛnic.

Yeti Ɔnɛciipɔracyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘ya dalna bɛɛ. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pɔktɛ on tukɛ ɛkɛti, acaan ‘ya maŋŋa ɛkɛ oŋki ne coŋɔn te yoma pwadan. Ne ‘ya byeŋku akki ḍɛɛggin te jiŋginyɛ, ɛkɛ buayi warɛ a lɔɔn bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkɛ bɛɛn ḍieŋŋin ‘yati ɔci ‘ya maŋŋa yomuti.
Ɛɛ, awarɛ, ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni ban Ḍɔɔmyɛ, ɛkɛ bala lieṭi ‘ya a lilti ne tolan ne ‘ya yuarŋata ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
Ne oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, dala Yaccu yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkɛti. Ɛkɛ ŋeej i ne pwadan, ne ɛkɛ ‘ya maŋŋata te naŋka coŋin ban ɛkkɛ ban Ɛpacacjiy.
Kaci ‘ya Timutawuc, dala i waru tɛya gɔ moki tɛyi ɔɔn te yom pwani ikin ‘wonninti Juaŋ te Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni i yomuti.
Jyeka i myennin ‘ya maka pookɛn ñomgɛnti neeniyɛ, dala i ‘uaya pookɛn ‘uaya tieci jiek waakɛn oŋkanda neeniyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn ‘woñga jyeka neeni daŋkun, aŋka ɛkkɛn lorti ma te jyeka neeni daŋkun.
Naa i buay taab bɛɛ. Kan taab bala itiyɛ, dala i yomu tɛya ɔɔn ba mena ackan. Ikin da balkin ba ackan Yaccu Kiṭɔ ackan pwadin neeni.
Mena ackanyɛ, ɛkɛ ñingɛ juadan te kanŋa parɛ gɛɛl bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala naŋki ɛkɛ pwada mena ɛkɛ naŋŋi a ackan neeniti.

Gɔṭṭi ‘wota, maka boddɔ guoñjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn boddɔ ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan guoñji bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn boddɔ ba naŋki jyek boddin. Ɔci maka ma bwantanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wontan ma waka pwadin. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl noŋdi ba yom ɛkɛ parɛ budanyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ maka pookɛn bwandɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wontan ma genga bɛɛ.
Ɔci gɔṭṭi ‘wota, mena kanŋan ne pwadan oŋkanda yieljiyɛ, waka ‘yɛgdi ñamu yieljiyɛ, aga wak ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin.
Dala i poŋja te waka neeni. Ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin i magdi, ɔci i tieŋja jyeka neeni ne jiek jitkɛn balki a ɔkiy.
Dala i poŋja te Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena yɔr ɛkkɛn a Dawuud neeni, ɛkɛ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te lienti doki, bala ba jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin loṭa ‘ya ma neeni mieti a ɔɔn te ɛkɛ.
’Ya lor ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni, ɔci acca ‘ya balka taab te jyeka neeni. Ɔci ‘ya olka ma jiju ciginji doki ba mena nɔɔdɔn ɔɔn. Yeti jyek Juaŋ neeniyɛ, menga yaakinti ɛkkɛn mugdɛyɔ bɛɛ.
’Ya yɔɔd ne tɛyan taab bɛɛn ‘yati neeni jitin ɔɔn, aŋka dala maka muonɛ Juaŋ bora neeni daŋkun yɔɔrdi tɛɛtin bala Yaccuti neeni ɔci pwanna baadi bɛɛ neeni.
Jwalla pwadan gɛɛl bala, ɔci ikin yaakinti jyettin jwalla neeniti. Jwalla neeni gɔki agi, Kan lyen Yaccu aŋi ba lyen ikinyɛ, ɔci tɛɛtin ɛkɛ aŋi ba tɛɛtin ikin daŋkun.
Ɔci moki kan taab ɛkɛ aŋi ba taab ikinyɛ, ikin ‘wontin ɛkɛ jyek cyɛgji ne baaṭi, ɔci ikin aktin cyekin iki ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ. Kan ikin kɛkin te ɛkɛyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ da kɛkti te ikin daŋkun.
Yeti ne ikin bɛɛyin jiek jitkɛnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ men tieci jiek waakɛn ɔɔn. Acaan ɛkɛ yaakinti warɛ agdɛ moki bɛɛ.

Dala i gɔkca ma kaniicati moki aŋka ɛkkɛn ñingɛn ñiektan te jyeka neeni. Dala ɛkkɛn myetka i Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti, dala ɛkkɛn mwondi te tyewwin te jyeka jitkɛn baaw neeni. Acaan jyek tyewwin neeniyɛ, etti naŋka pwadan gɛɛl mati bɛɛ. Yeti ma ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ te naŋka neeni.
Dala i waŋu tiicca te naŋki i aŋka Juaŋ yomɛ pwada te naŋki i ko. Dala i kanja ɔci lorca ma ne pwadan te jyeka awarɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn aŋka ne baaṭiyɛ, i lɔɔdja bɛɛ.
Dala i jyeka pookɛn, jyeka coŋin neeniyɛ, dalja. Acaan maka ani jyeka coŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ooddi ɔntɔ te jyek Jwaŋa Tolanti.
Ɔci jyek ɛkkɛn jyeka yeyin neeniyɛ, ooddi mati waakɛnda ba naŋki waja yaayan neeni ɔɔn. Aymaneeyac yaakkɛn i Payliitocyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki jyeka neeni.

Ɛkkɛn jiek pɔɔdɛ acaan ɛkkɛn jyeka awarɛ neeni ŋeecɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi oŋŋa ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ te kolk jitinyɛ, agi bɛɛnɔ doki. Ɔci Ma Kiṭɔ gɛɛg tieŋŋin jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn neeni, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ doki.

Yeti kaniica Juaŋyɛ, yɔɔd ne tɛyan oŋkanda acaan ma Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki jyeka ne yyɛɛwɔ. Jwalla ne cyɛɛlɔ gɔki agi, “Maka a ma Juaŋ awarɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn ŋeejɛ Juaŋo.” Ɔci jwalla parɛ neeni gɔki agi, “Maka yenti Juaŋ bala ɛkkɛntiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn nɔji daltan waakɛnda.”

Gɔṭṭi, maka ciyi te ona tolan ona pwadanyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki waak ne coŋɔn. Ɔci waka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg naŋɛ ma te dahab, ɔci gɛɛg naŋɛ ma te bil pɔdda, ɔci gɛɛg moki naŋɛ ma te jango, ɔci gɛɛg naŋɛ ma te lommo. Ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda kɛɛptin jitin te kanŋa ɛkkɛn daŋkun. Waak gɛɛg balki kanŋan pwadin, ɔci ɛkkɛn pookɛn gɛɛgyɛ, balki kanŋan yeyin.
Ɔci ba jyek waka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek ikin daŋkun. Kan mena warɛ uuttɛ ɔntɔ te maka gɔki jyeka budanti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aga ba gena pwadan weegɛnti, ɔci ɛkɛ ‘wondi ɛkɛ kanŋa pwadan.

Dala i waŋu tiicca te waka ma ḍyɛrkɔ yomgɛn buagiti ne pɛñany. Dala i pocca noŋja naŋka pwadin, ɔci dala i jyedda ne pwadan, ɔci dala i anja Juaŋ ɔci ma baan ne pwadan, ɔci dala i yomu niin pwanna pwanno. Gɔṭṭi, ‘ya gɔkka moki,
dala i noŋja naŋka neeni maka cɔki Juaŋti te yoma pwadan neeni, kan ma tyewɔ te jyeka pookɛn jyeka budanyɛ, naa i ñoodi iki ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Acaan ŋeej i tyewwin neeniyɛ, etti wɛyyin.

Acaan mena noŋi kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, naa ɛkɛ ani wɛyyin iki ma bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ yomɛ niin pwanna pwani mati waakɛnda aŋka ɛkɛ loṭi maka domi naŋkiy. Dala ɛkɛ loṭi ma ne pwadan, ɔci dala ɛkɛ loomgɛ tɛya.

Ɔci kan ma gɛɛg yookɔn waakɛn te jyeka loṭi i ma neeniyɛ, dala maka neeni ṭeyayɔ te yoma pwadan. Ɔci a ɔɔn Juaŋ dita noŋdi naŋki ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn yaltan kaapun, ɔci naŋka awarɛ ŋeettan. Ɔci ɛkkɛn poŋdi te naŋki ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeka awarɛ ŋeettan, ɔci waakɛn yaltan dɔɔktiti jyeka awarɛ neeniti.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn bɛya moki, ɔci ɛkkɛn pɔktɛ Juaŋ te Jwaŋa Yaayan bieŋɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋdi kanŋa Juaŋ moki.
Timutawuc, dala ŋeejja i ne pwadan acaan oŋka bɛya ookti ne ŋoyɔyɛ, jiek tɛya.

Acaan maka coŋinyɛ, gɛɛg andi gena waak ɛkkɛn pookɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn andi bilk daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkkɛn andi yyɛji daŋkun, ɔci moki ɛkkɛn andi jied waakɛn pookɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn moki andi lomi jieko. Ɔci ɛkkɛn andi weyyɛn walla mɛyyɛn bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti a pwatcin oŋgati te genga bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ciyi a nɔɔtk budan oŋkanda ɔɔn.
Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn baaw mati waakɛnda. Ɛkkɛn yaakinti yɔŋi jiek i ma bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jomi ma waakɛn budan. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan amaam ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn a ywobko. Ɛkkɛn yookɔn te jyeka pwadin waakɛnda.

Ɛkkɛn ma ‘wontan maka pookɛn byeŋkɛnti aŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn ne yaayan. Ɛkkɛn poŋdi jiek ñamu oŋ ɛkkɛn oŋ noŋti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi amaam budan ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi ɛkkɛn ḍwaŋgintɛ. Ɛkkɛn ñingɛn juadan te waka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔtiy, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn baaw Juaŋti.
Ɛkkɛn noŋi ba ɛkkɛn akki Ma Kiṭɔ ɔɔn, yeti ɛkkɛn war tɛɛn Juaŋ daltan aŋka noŋdi kanŋa ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci naa i ñoodi iki ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.

Maka neeni gɛɛgyɛ, ɛkkɛn kaatti orɔ oorg maka pookɛnti mooṭi moonga wyetkɛn baaw neeni aŋka moonga neeni aga maka booti ɛkkɛnti. Moonga neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala poŋi oŋkanda te nɔjja naŋɛ ɛkkɛny, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ba naŋka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn buagiti ne pɛñan oŋkanda neeni.
Ɛkkɛn buagɔn tieŋdi jiek ne coŋɔn, yeti ɛkkɛn jyeka awarɛ yuartanji bɛɛ.

Bala ba Janic ɔci Jambric ne ɛkkɛn yookiti te jyek Muuca te baaṭiyɛ, ɔci acca daŋkun ‘uaya neeni yookɔn waakɛn te jyeka awarɛ daŋkun. ‘Uaya neeniyɛ, yaakinti paŋi jiek ne pwadan bɛɛ. Jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki neeniyɛ, a jyenna awarɛ bɛɛ.
Yeti ɛkkɛn ‘uotti ñamu ne loonan bɛɛ, acaan jyek naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yaayan neeniyɛ, bɛya bora ne cwakanti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ŋeettan ma te naŋki ɛkkɛn. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyek Janic ɔci Jambric.

Gɔṭṭi hay! Timutawuc, jyeka loṭa ‘ya neeniyɛ, yuarniji i, ɔci coodda ciya ‘yayɛ, ŋeej i moki. Ɔci paŋi ‘ya ŋeej i, ɔci jyeni ‘ya mokiyɛ, ŋeej i, ɔci loomg tɛɛn ‘yayɛ, ŋeej i, ɔci anna ana ‘ya mayɛ, ŋeej i moki. Ɔci yɔɔdda yɔɔda ‘ya ne tɛyan ne ma balki noŋki ne yaayan ‘yatiyɛ, ŋeej i moki.
Taab ‘ya tol tol ban Antyak ɔci ban Aykɔɔnyam, ɔci ban Lictara, ɔci ‘ya baal yɔɔd ne tɛyan men ɔɔn. ‘Ya maŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin ɔci wɛɛna bora ɛkɛ te taab neeniti waakɛnda.
Ɛɛ, awarɛ, maka buagɔn ciyi ne pwadan te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, taab bɛya ɛkkɛnti te maka pookɛnti.
Ɔci maka yeyin maka a laabanyɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛn pɛɛddi te yoñ gɔ moki pɛɛddi ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ma ñingɛn gɔ ɛkkɛn da naŋin ñin ma ɔɔn.
Yeti iyɛ, dala i waŋu tiicca te jyeka i lalkiti ma jyeka jyetti iy. Ɔci ŋeej i te maka i lalki te jyeka awarɛ neeniy.

Ɔci ŋeej i moki jyek Juaŋ jyeka kiigin neeniyɛ, ŋeej i ne wona i ḍiɛri meny. Ñing tɛɛn bɛya te jyeka kiigin neeni. Ɔci te jyek ñing tɛɛn jyeka kiigin neeni mokiyɛ, i yaaktiti jyedda Yaccu Kiṭɔti ɔci i yɔɔdi ɛkɛ.

Jyek Juaŋ jyeka kiigin waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyeka ma myennɛ Juaŋ te Boŋ ɛkɛy. Ɔci te jyeka kiigin neeniyɛ, ma laltan ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan jitkɛn ne pwadan. Ɔci moki te jyeka kiigin neeniyɛ, naŋka naŋtan ma yaayan neeniyɛ, ŋeettan ma ne naŋka yaayan neeni baali a ɔkiy. Ɔci moki te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan jyeka kiigin neeniyɛ, ma yaakinti naŋka yeyin neeni daltan. Jyeka kiigin neeni loṭi ma te naŋka pwadin.
Kanŋa jyeka kiigin neeniyɛ, bala a ɔɔn acaan Juaŋ buagɔn dala ma ɛkɛ ‘uotti ñamu ne pwadan aŋka dala ɛkkɛn naŋki waka pwadin neeni ŋeettan ɛkkɛn waakɛnda.

’Ya gɔkka iti Juaŋ ñamɛti ɔci Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena noŋdi godan mati waakɛnda neeni ñamɛti. Gena ɛkɛ a mena godan maka tɛɛti ɔci maka tuuny. Acaan ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora mati, ɔci ɛkɛ aga Ciɛggɔn Tolan mati waakɛnda ṭɛɛr wyeñɛ warda.

Dala i lor ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda ɔɔn. Naa i poŋ gɔk agi pɔya loṭi ma baaw bɛɛ. Dala i gɔkca mati ne pwadan aŋka ma tieŋdi ɔci jyeddi. Kan ma bala noŋi ne yaayanyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn ṭeya ñin ne pɛñan te yoma pwadan. Dala i lor ma te jyek Juaŋ oŋkanda ɔɔn.
Acaan oŋŋa bɛya waayiyɛ, ma bwagdɛ jyeka pwadin neeni moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn buagdɛ gena jyeka budan. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ooddi lieṭi maka loṭi ɛkkɛn te jyeka ɛkkɛn buagiti jyeka milin ɛkkɛnti jyeka yeyin neeni.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn yooktan te jyek worga Jwaŋa Tolan jyeka awarɛ neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn tieŋdi gena jyek ṭɛɛr wyeñɛ jyeka budan neeni.
Yeti iyɛ, dala i waru muga oŋkanda. Kan taab balayɛ, dala i yɔɔdi ne tɛyan ɔɔn. Dala i noŋja kanŋa i kanŋa miti ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Naa kanŋa gɛɛl dalja bɛɛ.
Yeti gɔṭṭi! ‘Yayɛ, ‘ya tuud ne cwakanti te kanŋa Juaŋo. Oŋŋa ‘ya ṭɛra neeni daldayɔyɛ, moki looncin bɛɛ.
’Ya noonɔn i Jwaŋa Yaayan ne pwadan. Kanŋa ‘ya ‘wonnata Juaŋ neeni cwamjan ‘ya doki. Jyek jyeni Juaŋ daljan ‘ya oŋgati bɛɛ.

Ne oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔ a oŋŋa tolanyɛ, mena pwadan Mena Noŋi Godan matiyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonda gena pwadan te coodi ‘ya coodda pwadan. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonda paru bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonda iki maka bala kɛɛy buagɔn oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdi daŋkuny.
Gɔṭṭi hay, Timutawuc! Dala i pocca bɛɛd ‘yati wɛnni ne pɛñan ne cwakanti.
Acaan ‘ya dalna Dimac. Ɛkɛ bala ani jyeka iñɔ baanji wɛnni ne tolan. Ɔci acca ɛkɛ ati ban Tacalunika. Ɔci Krɛcɛnicyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ban Galatiya, ɔci Tituc, ɛkɛ ati ban Dalmeecya.
Gena Luuk aŋka bala ‘yati parɛ wɛnniy. Dala i ootta Mark owwa, ɔci ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ yaakkɔ wɛnni nona ‘yati, acaan Markyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka yaakinti ‘ya magda ne pwadan te kanŋa ‘ya.
Ticcikoc cuuñi ‘ya ban Ɛpacac.

Ne ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ bworŋ ‘ya bworŋ jwami oodɛ. Ɛkɛ dollanyɔ ‘ya Karpocti ban Trɔwac. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ worgan ‘ya oodɛ daŋkun. Yeti kan ɛkkɛ worgan pookɛn dolnɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ worgan a geek aŋka oodɛ.
Alɛkcaandar mena a gɔɔñi gɔci waak te bilka tɛyan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan ‘yati. “Ciɛggɔn ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ jiek duaktɛ mena neeni wyeñɛti te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ yaayan ‘yati neeni.”
Ɔci i daŋkunyɛ, dala i waŋu tiicca te Alɛkcaandar acaan ɛkɛ yookɔn te jyeka loṭin ikin ma neeni ne pɛñan.

Ne ‘ya noŋkata ma godan te ñamuyɛ, men gɛɛl ‘ya maŋŋa yuonna taaŋuti te jyek godan ‘ya bɛɛ. ‘Ya dalka ma paru ɛkkɛn yiŋi ɔntɔ waakɛnda. Yeti ‘ya buaga Juaŋ jiek oldɛ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti te naŋka neeni bɛɛ. A’a.

Ciɛggɔn ikin aŋka bala ‘yati parɛ, ɔci ‘ya ‘wonna ɛkɛ war tɛɛno, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya ma myetkan te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni waakɛnda. Ɔci Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieŋŋin jyeka neeni waakɛnda. ‘Ya maŋŋa Juaŋ te jyek godan, bala ba mena wɛyɛ ma te jiɛl tukɛti.
Ɛɛ, ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔnyɛ, Juaŋ ‘ya yɔɔda te naŋka yeyin neeni waakɛnda ne ‘ya dɛnda ban cyɛgji ɛkɛti ñaalɔ ɔɔn. Dala Juaŋ jiɛtan ma oŋkanda oŋkanda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.
Dala i ñiepca Pricillati te ‘ya, ɔci ñiepca Akwillati te ‘ya moki, ɔci ñiepca ma Ɔnɛciipɔracti te ‘ya moki.
Iraactac yeddin te ban Kuruntuc. Ɔci Trɔpimoc dollanyɔ ‘ya te ban Mayliitac, acaan ɛkɛ warɛ yaayɛ.

Dala i pocca bɛɛd ‘yati wɛnni ne pɛñan ne ñaal jiñɛ baawi men ɔɔn. Yubyuulac ñiepi i, ɔci Pudɛnic moki ñiepi i, ɔci Laynac moki ñiepi i, ɔci Klɔdya moki ñiepi i, ɔci modg ikin waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi i daŋkun.
Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin bala iti. Dala ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada a pwani iti. Bawwin.

Gena ‘ya Buuluc kɛɛngɔn Jwaŋa Tolan. ‘Ya a cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ te jyek jyenna ma jyetki Juaŋti neeni. Gena maka muonɛ Juaŋ boray. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘ya cuonna aŋka ‘ya lor ma te jyek ɛkɛ jyeka awarɛ, ɔci coodda ɛkɛ buagɛ ma cootɛ a ɔki te jyek ɛkɛy.
Ikin jyettin kɛɛyin jyek tɛɛtin Juaŋ tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeniy, acaan Juaŋ gɔki te baaṭi doki wona ṭɛɛr men baawi agi ikin ‘wontinti ɛkɛ tɛɛtin neeni. Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan yaakinti dyeti ma ñingɛn bɛɛ.

Ɔci ɛkɛ jyek tɛɛtin ɛkɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora mati te oŋŋa pwadan oŋŋa ɛkɛ buagɛtiy. Gena jyeka loṭa ‘ya ma a jyek Jwaŋa Tolany. Jwaŋa Tolan Mena Yuoci ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonna kanŋa miti ma te jyeka neeni bieŋuti.

Hay! Kaci ‘ya Tituc, ‘ya kiewan worga neeni iti. I aŋŋi kaci ‘ya te jyenna i jyetti Kiṭɔti neeni. Ikin jyettin Juaŋti yaakkɔ. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin, ɔci Cieggɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ Mena Yuoci ikin neeni yomgɛn pwada a pwani iti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn i ‘wonti coodi pwanno.
Ɛɛ, gɔṭṭi, Tituc, i dolninyɔ ‘ya Kaŋ Kriit wyeñɛti aŋka kanŋa dollanyɔ ‘ya wanna cwamja, ɔci aŋka i ma maga te jyek cyɛgji kaniicanji, bonka neeniti waakɛnda ba jyeka i myennin ‘ya te ñamuy.

Cyekin kaniicanyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn naŋa i a maka waaktan ma bɛɛ. Ɔci maka neeni dala ɛkkɛn balki moong ne ciṭin. Dala kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn a maka jyeti Jwaŋa Tolanti. Naa ɛkkɛn balki kɛɛgin guaktan ma a kɛɛgin cooddɛn yeyin bɛɛ, ɔci walla kɛɛgin yookɔn te jyek weyyɛn bɛɛ.

Mena gaciicyɛ, naa ɛkɛ a mena waaktan ma bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ a mena Ma Kiṭɔ bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛti. Walla naa ɛkɛ a mena yyɛcan bɛɛ. Ɔci walla naa ɛkɛ a mena loomgɛ cwalŋan bɛɛ. Ɔci walla naa ɛkɛ a mena ani mooy bɛɛ. Ɔci walla naa ɛkɛ a mena cooddɛ yaayan bɛɛ. Ɔci walla naa ɛkɛ a mena warɛ ḍigan ani waak bɛɛ.

Dala ɛkɛ a mena yomɛ pwadan mena gɔṭi wɛlgo. Dala ɛkɛ a mena ani naŋka pwadin, ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena mwoki warɛ ne pwadan. Dala ɛkɛ a mena pwadan Juaŋ ñamɛti. Dala ɛkɛ a mena ciyi noŋi ba naŋka Juaŋ buagɛy. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena yaakinti poŋi te warɛ.
Dala ɛkɛ waŋɛ tiittɛ te jyeka pwadin jyeka loṭɔn ɔɔn ma neeni, aŋka ɛkɛ ṭeyi ma ɔci loṭi ma te jyeka pwadin neeni, ɔci moki aŋka maka tieki jiek bwandɛ ɛkɛ.
Ma Kiṭɔ maka coŋin gɛɛg bala noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn. Ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek menga bɛɛ. Ɔci maka coŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg a Ma Yahuud. Ɛkkɛn balki jyeka coŋin tuggɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ma ñingɛn.

Dala ɛkkɛn yɔddɛ ñin te lali jyeka yeyin neeni. Acaan maka coŋin gɛɛg bala jyetcin ɔntɔ doki te jyek ɛkkɛn. Ɛkkɛn bala loṭi ma amaamo. Ɛkkɛn loṭi ma a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn ‘wontan ma waako. Naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni a labjo.

Jyeka neeni bala ba men gɛɛl bɛɛn te ma maka neeniti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki te ma Kriit agi ma Kriityɛ, ɛkkɛn jomi jiek waakɛnda. Ɔci moki ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkki agi ywobk ba leyi gɛɛg, ɔci agi ɛkki waakcin pɛñgɔ te kanŋa waak ne tolan, yeti ɛkkɛn ati booti omi gena oomdin mati.
Jyeka guaŋŋɛ mena neeni te ɛkkɛn neeni a jyeka awarɛ, hay! Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn ṭeya ne pɛñan te jyeka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn tɛya te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetkɛ Juaŋti neeni.

Ɔci dala Ma Kiṭɔ mwondi te jyeka guaktan Ma Yahuud a jyeka budan neeni. Maka yookɔn te jyeka awarɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔki mati te jyeka ɛkkɛn buagɛti dala naŋtan may. Jyeka neeni bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ. A’a, jyeka neeni bɛɛn te ma baanti budan. Dala i ma myetka naa ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.

Yeti maka yomgɛn pwadinyɛ, waak waakɛnda pwadɔ ɛkkɛnti, ɔci maka jyeti jyek Juaŋti bɛɛyɛ, waak waakɛnda yeyɔ ɛkkɛnti, acaan maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waka pwadin walla waka yeyin ŋeecɔn yomgɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi paŋŋa pwadan bɛɛ.

Ɛkkɛn gɔki te tuggɛn agi ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeejinti katan. Yeti te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn yaayan neeniyɛ, ɔci ŋeecɔn ma ɛkkɛn Juaŋ ŋeecɔn awarɛ bɛɛ. Hay! Ɛkkɛn yeyɔ, ɛkkɛn bɛɛyi jyek Juaŋ neeni. Ɛkkɛn yaakinti noŋdi gena pwadan gɛɛl bɛɛ.
Ɔci iyɛ, hay Tituc! Dala i lorca ma te jyeka pwadin jyek coodi Ma Kiṭɔ.

Dala i ‘uaya ḍwaŋin myetka dala ɛkkɛn tuggɛn luya. Dala ɛkkɛn yaakinti muŋi waakɛn. Dala ɛkkɛn poŋdi jiek ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛn jyeddi Juaŋti ne pwadan. Dala ani Juaŋ bala ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn yɔdi ne tɛyan.

Ɔci moonga ḍwaŋinyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn myetka dala ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn tiittan ciyi ba maka moṭi Juaŋti awarɛ. Naa ɛkkɛn ati booti ma wyetkɛnti wooki maka pookɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛn aga maka nokkin mooy bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn loṭi ma te naŋka pwadin.
Dala moonga neeni ɛkkɛn moonga ḍyɛrin laltan aŋka dala ɛkkɛn andi ‘uay ɛkkɛn, ɔci dala andi kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn daŋkun.

Ɔci dala ɛkkɛn waakɛn muktan ne pwadan, ɔci naa paŋŋa yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn gɔṭi oorg ɛkkɛn jitkɛn ne pwadan, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ mati. Dala ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛn ne pwadan. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ma yaaktanti wooki jyek Jwaŋa Tolan neeni moki bɛɛ.
Ɔci dala i ‘uaya ḍyɛrin ṭeyayɔ daŋkun aŋka naa ɛkkɛn noŋdi amaam bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn waakɛn muktan ne pwadan.

Ɔci i waanuyɛ, dala naŋki i waakɛnda pwaddi aŋka maka pookɛn lɔkti ba naŋki i. Ɔci oŋkanda ne i loṭi mayɛ, dala i lorca ɛkkɛn ne pwadan, ɔci a ɔɔn jyeka loṭi i ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ŋeettan ɛkkɛn jyeka neeni a jyeka a ñiek bɛɛ.

Ne i loṭi mayɛ, dala i lorca ɔci gɔkca te jyeka menga yaakinti wooki jyeka lala i neeni bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, maka yookɔn te ikin neeni ɛkkɛn yaakinti wooki ikin te genga moki bɛɛ, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn aga lɔɔno.

Dala i maka kɛɛnk myetka dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi ba jyek maka ḍɔci ɛkkɛn. Dala naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn waakɛnda neeniyɛ, dala pwaddi maka ḍɔci ɛkkɛnti neeni. Ɔci kan maka ḍɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti genga ɛkkɛntiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn koogdi i ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.

Dala i ɛkkɛn myetka naa ɛkkɛn kɛndi wak maka ḍɔci ɛkkɛn neeni te yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi gena naŋka pwadin oŋkanda aŋka ɛkkɛn ŋeettiti ma ɛkkɛn labjin baawo. Ɔci te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn pwadin waakɛnda neeniyɛ, jyek Jwaŋa Tolan Mena Yuoci ikin neeniyɛ, pwaddi mati.
Acaan yɔɔta yuoci Jwaŋa Tolan ma neeniyɛ, bɛɛn mati waakɛnda acca doki ba yom pwani ɛkɛ.

Ɔci yom pwani Juaŋ neeni loṭi ikin agi dala ikin mwoncin te naŋki coodi ikin coodda te baaṭi wona ikin balkin ciyin budan te jyek Juaŋ neeni, ɔci moki agi dala ikin mwoncin te paŋi jyek waka ikin buaginti ne coŋɔn ba maka ciyi baan konɛti neeni. Ɔci agi dala ikin cieccin noŋcin naŋka pwadin naŋka Juaŋ buagɛ aŋka naŋtin ikin ne wonta ikin ciyin tɛɛtin men ɔŋ.

Acaan acca ikin jyettin kɛɛyin te naŋki Jwaŋ ikin naŋka pwadan neeni. Ɔci oŋŋa kɛɛtin ikin neeniyɛ, gena oŋŋa Jwaŋ ikin ɔci Cieggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ Mena Yuoci ikin bɛɛdi pwanni a pwani, ɔci warɛ lɛɛldi bora ikintiy.

Yaccu tuun te ikin te yom ɛkɛ, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn woni ikin te nɔji waakɛnda, ɔci naŋtin a maka giikin baaw yomgɛnti te nɔji waakɛnda. Ɛkɛ buagɔn dala maka neeni aga ma ɛkɛ woodgɛn. Ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ma ɛkɛ waakɛn byerdi te naŋka pwadin.

Dala i ma myetka te jyeka neeni. Dala i ma ṭeyayɔ, ɔci kan men gɛɛl ciyi ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, dala i gɔkca ɛkɛti. Dala i noŋja naŋka neeni ne pwadan acaan i balki war tɛɛn bieŋuti doki. Ɔci naa menga wooki i bɛɛ.
Dala i ma myetka jiek dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi ba jyek akuuma ɔci jyek ma kuuma maka ḍwaŋin. Dala ɛkkɛn bwagdɛ naŋka pwadin.
Naa ɛkkɛn wooki menga bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn ciyi iki ma te pwani, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn poŋi te maka pookɛn, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi mati waakɛnda te wara bala iñɔ.

Te baaṭiyɛ, ikin wyetkɔ bala ɔntɔ daŋkun. Ikin balkin tyeŋin jyek menga bɛɛ. Ikin noŋin ba yomg ikin pookɔ. Ɔci waka ikin buaginti ne tolan neeniyɛ, ikin mukkinyɔ naŋkin ba kɛɛnk ɛkkɛn, ɔci ikin balkin lieṭin waka ikin yomgɔ ñɔɔki ne pɛñany. Ɔci oŋkandayɛ, ikin balkin ciyin amaamo. Ɔci ikin korkɔ modɔ, ɔci ikin yookin te maka pookɛn, ɔci ikin balkin yoyyin ñin pookɔ daŋkun.
Yeti oŋŋa Jwaŋa Tolan noŋni ne pwadan ikinti te anna ɛkɛ ani ikin neeniyɛ,

ɛkɛ ikin yɔɔññin doki. Ikin yɔɔññin ɛkɛ acaan naŋki ikin pwad pwad ɛkɛti pookɔ bɛɛ. Ikin yɔɔññin ɛkɛ acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ pwad pwad ikinti. Ɛkɛ ikin yɔɔññin te Boŋ ɛkɛ Boŋa ikin luaŋŋin yomgɔti te nɔji, Boŋa ikin jiennin te jiedda woonɛ aŋka ikin aŋŋin maka wonkɛny.
Ikin ‘wonnin Jwaŋa Tolan Boŋ ɛkɛ ne tolan te naŋka naŋŋɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ Mena Yuoci ikiny.

Ikin yɔɔññin ɛkɛ a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ikin pwattin Juaŋ ñamɛti te yom pwani ɛkɛ ikinti neeni. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeecin ikin tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ, tɛɛtin jyettin kɛɛtin ikin neeniyɛ, yuartin ikin ne baaṭi.

Ikin yaakinti jyettin jyeka neeni acaan ɛkkɛn a jyeka awarɛ waakɛnda. Ɔci te jyeka neeniyɛ, ‘ya buaga dala i ma myetka te jyeka neeni ne pwadan aŋka naa ɛkkɛn yeya bɛɛ. Acaan maka jyeti Jwaŋa Tolanti dokiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn tiittan te kanŋa pwadin neeni. Kanŋa neeni pwad pwado, ɔci etti naŋka pwadin mati.

Dala i ma myetka naa ma tyewɔ iki maka pookɛn te jyeka budan neeni bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛn tyewɔ te jyek yɔrg ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci moki naa ɛkkɛn wɛyyɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛn tyewɔ te jyek tiit jyek ganuun Ma Yahuud bɛɛ. Acaan tyewwinyɛ, etti jyeka pwadin mengati bɛɛ. Naŋka neeni a naŋka budan.

Kan men gɛɛl buagɔn Ma Kiṭɔ kɛbdɛ jitin kaniicajiyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ ṭeya, ɔci kan ɛkɛ tieŋdi bɛɛyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ ṭeya moki. Ɔci kan ɛkɛ yookɔn men ɔɔnyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ dorka warɛti, ɔci naa i ñoodi iki ɛkɛ te genga moki bɛɛ.
Çeecin ikin kan men gɛɛl naŋki ɛkɛ bala a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci kan paŋi ɛkɛ bala ɔntɔ mokiyɛ, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, a nɔjjo. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛ wannayɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ lyɛldɛ ne naŋki ɛkɛ agi damgin awarɛy.
Gɔṭṭi, ne Artɛmac walla Ticcikoc cuonda ‘ya ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala i pocca bɛɛd ‘yati ne pɛñan. Ikin kooktin ban Nikɔɔpolic acaan ‘ya buaga coocca wɛnan te ñaal konɛ.
Jinac mena kanŋa ɛkɛ a jyek ganuun, ɔci Apɔɔlɔcyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn maga ne pwadan ne ɛkkɛn bwagdɛ woony. Dala i ɛkkɛn maga te waak aŋka naa genga bɔɔndi ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.
Ma ikinyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn kandi ne pwadan oŋkanda aŋka dala waak bala ɛkkɛnti aŋka ɛkkɛn moki maka pookɛn te wak ɛkkɛn, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, coodi ɛkkɛn aga coodda budan bɛɛ.
Maka bala ‘yati wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ñiepi i. Ɔci iyɛ, dala i ma ñiiba te ɔɔn daŋkun. Gena maka ani ikiny, maka jyeti Juaŋti dokiy. Dala Juaŋ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti oŋkanda waakida. Bawwin.
I, Pilimun, gena ‘ya Buuluc ɔci mod ikin Timutawuc ñiepɔn i neeni. ‘Ya a mena bala jiju ciginji te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔy. Ɔɔn anɔn i acaan i a mena kanŋin iki ɔɔny.
Ɔɔn ñiepɔn kow ikin Apya, ɔci ɔɔn ñiepɔn Arkippoc mena noŋi kanŋa Kiṭɔ ba ikin ɔɔny. Ɔci ɔɔn moki ñiepɔn ma kaniica maka ḍwoṭi wyetkɛn oŋkanda on iy.
Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwanno.
Oŋkanday ne ‘ya baala cɔka Jwaŋ ‘yatiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk Juaŋti a pwatcin te i.
’Ya gɔk a pwatcin Juaŋti te i a ɔɔn acaan ‘ya tieŋŋan te jyenna i jyetti Ciɛggɔn Ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti, ɔci te anna ani i ma ɛkɛ ne tolany.

’Ya cɔk Jwaŋa Tolanti ka dala i maka pookɛn daŋkun myetka te Kiṭɔ te jyenna i jyetti neeni aŋka dala ɛkkɛn jyeka pwadin ŋeettan waakɛnda daŋkun. Gena jyek naŋka pwadin, naŋka bɛya maka jyeti Yaccu Kiṭɔti neeni.
Mod ɔɔn, ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan te naŋki i. ‘Ya yomu wiak moki bɛɛ. Te anna i ani ma neeniyɛ, modg ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn tɛɛn te naŋki i neeni ɛkkɛnti.

Gɔṭṭi, mod ɔɔn Pilimun, ‘ya tuku a jwali ṭɔɔlɛ iti. ‘Ya dita te gɔkka iti ne pɛñan te yenti Yaccu ka dala i noŋja gena guagdi ‘ya neeni, acaan naŋka neeni gena naŋka te naŋa i te yom i paruy. Oŋ yeti te oonnin ikin oonnin yɔtinyɛ, ‘ya buaga toocca iti ba yom i. Dala jwalla neeni muga i te ‘yati ba jwali ‘ya mug ɛkkɛ Buuluc muka aŋi daan, mena bala ciginji acca te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeniy.
Acca ‘ya tooc iti te kaci ‘ya Ɔnɛɛcimac. Ne ‘ya baala ciginjiyɛ, ‘ya aŋi ba wey ɛkkɛn te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan.
Te ñamu ɛkɛ pwatcin iti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ yiŋi ɔntɔ te iti. Yeti accayɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti noŋdi kanŋa i ne pwadan bala ba ne ɛkɛ baali noŋi kanŋa ‘ya wɛnni ne pwadany.
’Ya baal ɛkɛ cuoñña dɔwwa iti dɔki. Ne ‘ya ɛkɛ cuonda iti a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba gena yom ‘ya aŋka cuoñña iti wanna.
’Ya yomu pwanna pwani ka dala ɛkɛ ciedin iki ‘ya wɛnni aŋka ‘ya magda. A ɔɔn bala ba gena i waanu aŋka mok ‘ya ne ‘ya baala jiju ciginji te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni.

Ɔci acca ‘ya toocca iti te ɛkɛ. ‘Ya ɛkɛ ‘woñga kanŋa ‘ya budan te yom ‘ya bɛɛ. Kan ‘ya ɛkɛ muŋiyɔ ciya te wɛnniyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba i noŋ ne pwadan ‘yati te yom i paru bɛɛ. A ɔɔn, bala ba i moki ‘ya te yom ‘ya no. Yeti ‘ya buaga kan i noŋja ne pwadan ‘yatiyɛ, dala i noŋja te yom i paru.
Ɔci naŋka ɛkɛ yiŋŋi ɔntɔ amaam neeniyɛ, naŋka neeni bɛɛn iti budan bɛɛ. Jwaŋa Tolan naŋka neeni yallɛ ñin aŋi pwani iti. Ɔci ɛkɛ dɔɔdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan iti moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ baldi iki i yuonginda ɔɔn.

Ɔci acca ɛkɛ bala ba mena kɛɛngɔn budan iti moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ aŋi mod ɛkkɛ moda ani i doki. ‘Ya an ɛkɛ daŋkun. Ɔci acca i yaakiti an ɛkɛ ne tolan acaan ɛkɛ bala kanŋan ne pwadan. Ɔci moki dala i anja ɛkɛ acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔ yaakkɔ doki.
Gɔṭṭi, i baal ba mod ɔɔn waanɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka iti te Ɔnɛɛcimac. Ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, dala i noŋja ɛkɛti ne pwadan bala ba gena ‘ya waanu aŋka naŋda i wanna.
Ɔci kan ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan te gengayɛ, walla kan ɛkɛ balki dɛɛn gɛɛl itiyɛ, dala i waka neeni kiijja worgaji, dala aga dɛn ‘ya.
Gena ‘ya Buuluc kiewan jyeka neeni te byeŋ ‘ya iti neeni. I wondin ‘ya waka bala ɛkɛ ḍwaŋɛti neeni waakɛnda. Ɔci naa i ñingu yeya te naŋki ‘ya bɛɛ. Te ‘ya baawayɛ, te i jyetti Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ.
Mod ɔɔn, dala i yomu pɔkka ‘yati, ɔci noŋja ne pwadan Ɔnɛɛcimacti. ‘Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn acaan ikin yaakkɔ akin Ma Kiṭɔ.
Çeej ‘ya yomuti i buagi noŋja ba jyek ‘ya neeni. Ɔci i buagi noŋja naŋka pookɛn naŋka pwadin Ɔnɛɛcimacti daŋkun.

Ɔci jwalla parɛ gɛɛl bala daŋkun. Dala ‘ya yɔŋda on maka wɛlg gɛɛl jiñɛ acaan ‘ya buaga bɛɛd ban ɛkkɛ moki. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ cɔkɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti te ‘ya. Dala Juaŋ tieŋdi cɔŋi ɛkkɛ, aŋka ‘ya ooda ɛkɛ nona ɛkkɛti.
Ɛpaprac, mena bala ciginji te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ ba ‘ya ɔɔn neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi i.
Maka kanŋin iki ‘ya wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi i daŋkun. Gena Mark ɔci Ɛrictaarkoc, ɔci Dimac ɔci Luuk.
Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti waakida.
Jwaŋa Tolan ne maka yɔrg ikin ɔci weyi ikin nɔɔnnɛ te baaṭi te maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te jiek jitkɛn ne coŋɔn ɔci oŋki ne coŋɔnyɛ,
ɛkɛ oŋ ikin nɔɔnnin te ninka bawwin doki neeni te Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ a mena mwoki waak waakɛnday, ɔci te ɛkɛ mokiyɛ, Juaŋ cɔti ṭɛɛr ɔci pɔllo.

Ɔci Kaci ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena yɔṭṭin ikin pwani Jwaŋa Tolany, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ba bolji Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ eci waak waakɛnda ati te ɛkɛ yɔɔda bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ ma pɔŋnɛ te nɔjiyɛ, ɛkɛ oŋ cooccin Jwaŋa Tolan taaŋɛti taaŋŋa a byerɔn ñaalɔ pɔliji.
Ɔci Kaci Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ tolcin te malɛɛkan waakɛnda bala ba ne ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Weegɛn yenta pwadan te malɛɛkan waakɛnday.
Acaan Juaŋ gɔkcin malɛɛka gɛɛlti oŋgati a ɔŋŋi bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “I a Kaci ‘ya, i jiennin ‘ya te oŋŋo.” Ɔci moki agi, “‘Ya agdi Wey ɛkkɛn ɔci ɛkɛ aga Kaci ‘ya.”
Yeti ne Juaŋ buaŋŋi aŋka cuondi Kacca a kɛɛgɔn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Dala malɛɛkan Jwaŋa Tolan morti ɛkɛti waakɛnda.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Ɛkɛ malɛɛkan ɛkɛ naŋdɛ aga jwammo, ɔci maka kanŋan ɛkɛti aga maañ lɛmmɛ.”
Oŋ yeti te Kaci ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Hay Juaŋo, kaakci iyɛ, ɛkɛ bala oŋki waakɛnda baadi bɛɛ. Ɔci naŋka pwadanyɛ, aga war tɛɛn cyɛgji i.
I an naŋka pwadan, ɔci i yooki te naŋka yeyin. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan Jwaŋ iyɛ, i muoni bora ɔci ‘wonnɛ yoma ñɔyan ne tolan te mung ɛkkɛ.”
Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkcin moki agi, “Ciɛggɔn, te ñamuyɛ, i okki ṭɛɛr ɔci pɔllo. Ɛkkɛn a kanŋa byeŋ i.
Yeti ɛkkɛnyɛ, baadi, oŋ iyɛ, aŋka baldi oŋki waakɛnda. Ɔci ɛkkɛn aga donk ba bworŋ ne agdi daany.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn wiñayɔ i ba bworŋa tolan ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn aktan ba bworŋ ɔɔn. Oŋ yeti iyɛ, waru aga oŋgati bɛɛ. I ciy yuong waakɛnda ɔɔn.”
Juaŋ gɔkcin malɛɛkan ɛkɛ gɛɛlti oŋgati boki agi, “I coocca ‘ya taaŋuti taaŋŋa a byerɔny, ɔci ‘ya maka noŋi ne yaayan iti neeni bwandi, ɔci ḍuacca ‘ya iñɔ i cieguti.”
Malɛɛkan ɛkkɛn waakɛnda a boŋka cundɛ Juaŋ noŋi kanŋan maka ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ aŋka non yɔɔt ɛkɛ muktan neeniti.
Yaccu tol tol te malɛɛkan, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin woŋgɔ tiittin te waka tieŋnin ikin aŋka naa ikin jyettin ɔntɔ bɛɛ.
Jyeka guagɛ malɛɛkan a jyeka awarɛ, ɔci jyeka neeni bɛɛyɛji ma. Ɔci maka noŋi nɔji neeniyɛ, ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda awarɛ.

Kan ikin woŋgɔ tiittin te yɔɔta Juaŋ yuoci ikin neeni bɛɛyɛ, ikin uttin bɛɛ. Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkɛ jɔɔtcin te jyek yɔɔta neeni ñamu, ɔci maka tieŋŋin ɔci jyek ɛkɛ mugɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn mieti ikin a jyeka neeni awarɛ ɔci tiekɛ ne ikin bɛɛnin ɔɔn.

Ɔci Juaŋ daŋkun ikin myennin a jyeka neeni ɛkkɛn awarɛ. Ɛkɛ ikin myennin te naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma war tɛɛn ɛkɛ ɔci te naŋka ma woŋgɛn ñiektiti te ɛkɛ, ɔci te ‘woñgin ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonninti Boŋ ɛkɛy. Ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin waka neeni aŋka ŋeettin ikin jyeka neeni awarɛ.
Šɛɛr warda ṭɛra bala ne baaṭi ṭɛra guaktin ikin neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍuannɛ Juaŋ malɛɛkan byeŋkɛnti bɛɛ.
Oŋ yeti menga gɔki worga Juaŋji agi, “Men baan ɛkɛ a menɛ aŋka i poŋi te ɛkɛy? Ɔci ɛkɛ a menɛ aŋka i gɔṭi ɛkɛy?
I ɛkɛ naŋŋi ḍiɛrŋ te malɛɛkan wɔɔka ne ḍuulan, ɔci i ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ pwanno,

ɔci i waak waakɛnda ḍuanni ɛkɛ bieŋɛti.” Jwalla neeni kon ɛkɛ bala a ɔŋŋi, kan waak tieŋdi jyek ɛkɛ waakɛndayɛ, Juaŋ genga dalnɛ bora ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ, waak waakɛnda ‘wonni ɛkɛ men baan bieŋɛti. Yeti acca waak yuartin ikin tyeŋi jyek men baan waakɛnda moki bɛɛ.

Yeti Yaccu Mena ḍuannɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ḍiɛrŋ te malɛɛkan wɔɔka ne ḍuulan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yuartin ikin ne ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ yom pwani aŋka ɛkɛ dɛccin pɛñi lieno. Ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ ḍiɛrŋ te malɛɛkan te naŋki pwani Juaŋo. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ tuun te ma waakɛnda.

Acaan waak waakɛnda cɔnnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ waak waakɛnda naŋŋɛ bala ati yɔɔda bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, yɔmjin doki ne Juaŋ Yaccu naŋŋɛ kanŋa ɛkɛ cwamdɛ te taaby. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ eccin kɛɛgin ne coŋɔn aŋka ñoowɔ iki ɛkɛ te pwani ɛkɛ. Acaan Yaccu a mena ɛkkɛn wɛɛdɛ nona ɛkkɛn yɔɔdɛ Juaŋy.
Yaccu ma pɔŋnɛ te nɔjjo. Ɔci ɛkɛ i maka pɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ te nɔji neeni Wey ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu lɔɔddi te barŋa ɛkkɛn bardɛ a modin bɛɛ.
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin Juaŋti agi, “Modg ɔɔn nɔɔtka ‘ya te yenti i, ɔci ‘ya ‘ualja te yenti i kaniicaji.”
Ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi, “Paŋi ‘ya ḍuacca aŋa Juaŋti.” Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi, “‘Ya wɛnni iki kɛɛgin ‘ya ‘wonnata Juaŋ nɛ.”
Acaan kɛɛgin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a ma baano, ɔci Yaccu daŋkun aŋi men baan ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn. Ɔci te lyen ɛkɛ neeni ɛkɛ mena balki jyek lien neeniyɛ, nuudɛ jitin. Gena Jwaŋa Yaayan.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka ciyi kɛñji jitin neeni pɔŋnɛyɔ ɛkɛ te kɛñji acaan ɛkkɛn buayi lien ne tolan.
Oŋ yeti awarɛyɛ, ɛkɛ moki malɛɛkan bɛɛ. “Ɛkɛ moki gena kɛɛn Abrahim.”
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ bala ba modgɛn te waak waakɛnda aŋka ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada ɛkkɛnti ɔci noŋdi ba jyek gaciic tolan Ma Yahuud awarɛ te wak Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka ɛkɛ ma wandɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛn.
Acaan ɛkɛ taabbin, ɔci ɛkɛ pɔɔññɛ Jwaŋa Yaayanyɛ, ɛkɛ daŋkun yaakinti moki maka pɔɔdɛ Jwaŋa Yaayany.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, hay modg ɔɔn maka pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti maka bornɛ Juaŋy, dala ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena cuonnɛ ɛkɛ a gaciic tolan ɔci a Ciɛggɔn jyeni ikin neeniy.
Ɔci ɛkɛ a mena noŋi ba jwali Juaŋ mena ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ a gaciic tolan bala ba Muuca ne baali noŋi ba jwali Juaŋ on Juaŋy.
Oŋ a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ pwatcin ne tolan te Muuca bala ba mena eñi ony. Acaan kan men gɛɛl eñi onyɛ, ma noŋi ne pwadan ɛkɛti ne tolan te ono.
Oorg waakɛndayɛ, eetan ma a een balki maka cɔti ɛkkɛny, oŋ yeti Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena cɔti waak waakɛnday.
Oŋ yeti awarɛyɛ, Muuca bala gɔṭi on Juaŋ ne pwadan ba mena kanŋan a kanŋin ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala nɔɔti ma te waka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ agi balgɔ bɛɛdɔ te oŋka bɛɛdɔ ne ŋoyɔy.

Oŋ yeti Kiṭɔ bala gɔṭi on Juaŋ ne pwadan acaan ɛkɛ a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ikin agin on ɛkɛ kan ikin ɛkɛ tieŋnin ne pwadan te yomg ikin, ɔci kan ikin yomgɔ ŋoodan te waka pwadin waka ɛkɛ buagɔn acaan ‘wontin ikin neeni bɛɛy.
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, bala ba jyeka guagdi Boŋ Juaŋ agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ pwan Juaŋ te oŋiyɛ,
naa ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ tɛy tɛy ba naŋka naŋɛ yɔrg ɛkkɛ te baaṭi wanna bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ yookɔn te jyek ‘ya ne ɛkkɛn balki wɔɔŋjiy.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘ya pɔɔka, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔrcin naŋki ‘ya yuong ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ (40).
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya baal looñ ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ‘ya gɔkcan ka ɛkkɛn oŋkanda noŋi nɔji yomgɛnti, yeti ɛkkɛn pɔɔk ‘ya ŋeecɔn bɛɛ.
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkcan te loñk awarɛ ɛkkɛnti ka naa ɛkkɛn kaatti nona wooti ma nona ‘woñga ‘ya ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.”
Hay modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ, naa menga baltan yoma yaayan yoma baaw Juaŋti te dwakta ɛkɛ dɔɔdi ŋoyɔ te Jwaŋa tɛɛti neeniti bɛɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ ṭeewɛ yɔtin pookɔ oŋkanda ba jyek jwalla gɔki agi “Te Oŋŋo,” aŋka naa menga ɛkkɛti wyeñɛ tɛya te maalla ɛkɛ maaldɛ nɔji bɛɛ.
Kan ikin yɔɔnnin ne tɛyan Jwaŋa Tolanti ne baaṭi ɔɔn ba bolja ikin jɔɔnnin jyettin ɛkɛti ñamu neeniyɛ, ikin ñootin a cyɛɛlɔ waakida Yaccu Kiṭɔti.
Bala ba Boŋ Juaŋ ne gɔki agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ pwan Juaŋ te oŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ tɛy tɛy bɛɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋka naŋɛ yɔrg ɛkkɛ ne ɛkkɛn jyecki bora wɔɔŋji yookiti te jyek Juaŋ wanna bɛɛ.”
Oŋ a makɛ tieŋjin pwan Juaŋ ɔci looñjiny? Gena maka koonɛ Muuca bora te ban Macory.
Oŋ a makɛ Juaŋ looñjin ɛkkɛnti yuong a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔy (40)? Gena maka noŋi nɔji, ɔci ɛkkɛn a maka tuun wɔɔŋjiy.
Juaŋ gɔkcin makɛti te loñk awarɛ agi, “Naa ɛkkɛn kaatti nona wooti ma nona ‘woñga ‘ya ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛy?” Gena maka yookɔn waakɛn te tieŋŋin jyek ɛkɛy.
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, yuartin ikin ɛkkɛn yaaŋnɛti kaaccin nona wooti ma neeni bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ.
Oŋ kan ne Juaŋ bala ikin ḍuaññin te jwali aŋka ikin kaattin nona wooti may, dala ikin buattin aŋka naa menga ikinti dita dɛndi nona wooti ma aŋan baaw bɛɛ.

Acaan ikin lalkin ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin bala ba ɛkkɛn ne lalkiti ma daŋkuny. Oŋ yeti jyeka tieŋjɛ ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, yɔmjin te genga ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Acaan maka tieŋŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeti jyeka neeni te yoma awarɛ bɛɛ.

Oŋ yeti ikin a maka jyeti Jwaŋa Tolanti neeni aŋka kaattin nona wooti may. Gena guagdɛ Juaŋ agi, “‘Ya gɔkcan te loñk awarɛ ɛkkɛnti ka, ‘Naa ɛkkɛn kaatti nona wooti ma nona ‘woñga ‘ya ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.’ ”

Juaŋ gɔki a ɔɔn ne ɛkɛ ḍookki te kanŋa wona ɛkɛ okki waaky. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki worgaji te ninna akki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ agi, “Jwaŋa Tolan wooki te ninna akki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni ne ɛkɛ ḍookki te kanŋa ɛkɛy.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi, “Naa ɛkkɛn kaatti nona wooti ma nona ‘woñga ‘ya ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.”
Acaan maka lali ma ñamu te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn kaaccin nona wooti ma bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn tieŋŋin jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ. Maka pookɛn gɛɛg kaatti nona wooti ma acaan ɛkkɛn tieŋŋin jyek Juaŋo.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Juaŋ oŋŋa parɛ gɛɛl kɛnnɛ bora barŋɛ agi, “Te Oŋŋo.” Ɛkɛ gɔki ɔɔn te tuk Daawud te baaṭi agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ pwan Juaŋ te oŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ tɛya bɛɛ.”
Kan te Jɔcwa ma Icrayiil kaannɛ nona wooti ɛkkɛnyɛ, te Juaŋ moki gɔki te oŋŋa parɛ gɛɛl bɛɛ. Yeti Jɔcwa ɛkkɛn kaannɛ aŋan bɛɛ.
Ma Juaŋ aŋka balki wooka ba wooka woonɛ Juaŋ te ninna akki dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔy.
Kan mena kaatti nona wooti ma nona ma ‘wondɛ Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ woodi te kanŋa ɛkɛ bala ba Juaŋ ne wookki te kanŋa ɛkɛy.

Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin kantin ne pɛñan aŋka ikin kaattin nona wooti ma neenitiy. Dala ikin buattin aŋka naa menga ḍaga yomu budan te kaaccin ɛkɛ kaatti nona wooti ma neeni te naŋki waka bala ba waka naŋi maka jyek Juaŋ lɛɛgɛ jitin waayi bɛɛ.

Jwali Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ tɛɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ kanŋan mati. Ɛkɛ byeŋgaaran balki lɛkɛ ne yyɛɛwɔ buannɛ te ñɔjjo. Ɛkɛ i waru ŋwoddɛ jitin i booŋo, ɔci wɔtti owi jitin ɔci ṭuŋiti. Ɛkɛ paŋi ma baan ɔci waka yomg ma baan buagɛ byɛŋdɛji waakɛnda.
Genga bala warɛ a coggɔn Juaŋti bɛɛ. Waak waakɛnda waakɛn a liɛlgin Juaŋ woŋgɛti. Ɛkɛ a mena myettin ikin naŋki ikin waakɛnday.
Ikin balkin gaciic tolan. Gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan, ɛkɛ ati ñaalɔ Juaŋti, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala jyeni ikin muktin ikin yomgɔti ne tɛyan.
Ikin balkin Yaccu a gaciic tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti ikin maktin te war koñi ikin, acaan ɛkɛ pɔɔññɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan te waak waakɛnda ba ikin ɔɔn, oŋ yeti ɛkɛ noŋi nɔji bɛɛ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin ortinti Jwaŋ naŋki pwaniti te yoma tɛyan aŋka Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pɔktɛ ikinti, ɔci ikin yɔɔrtin yom pwani Juaŋo. Ɔci ne naŋka yeyin bɛɛti ikintiyɛ, ɛkɛ ikin maktin.

Ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn lɔɔttan ma bora te ma jitin, aŋka kanŋan kanŋa Juaŋ te ma waakɛnda. Mena gaciic tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ waak ‘wondɛ Juaŋ te mako. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛṭi waak Juaŋti te mako. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Juaŋ ɛkkɛn bɔɔktɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛn.
Ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti moki maka noŋi nɔji, ɔci maka pɔy Juaŋ ŋeecɔn bɛɛy, acaan ɛkɛ da warɛ koy koy ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ da warɛ ‘yɛrdɛ te nɔji ɛkɛ bala ba bolja ɛkɛ ɛṭi ma ɛkɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛn wanna ɔɔn.
Yeti menga warɛ naŋdɛ aga gaciic tolan parɛ bɛɛ. Gena mena borti Juaŋ a borkin bala ba Juaŋ ne Haruun borniy.
Oŋ Kiṭɔ daŋkunyɛ, warɛ olnɛ ñamu parɛ nona ɛkɛ agɛ gaciic tolan neeniti bɛɛ. Gena Juaŋ aŋka gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I a Kaci ‘ya. I jiennin ‘ya te oŋŋo.”
Ɔci Juaŋ gɔki worga kona parɛ gɛɛlti moki agi, “I ag gaciic younginda ba Mɛlki Caadik.”

Ne Yaccu men baali ciyi te coodi ma baanyɛ, ɛkɛ bala cɔki Juaŋti, ɔci bala wiak te pyeg woŋgɛ Juaŋti, ɔci bala yaadan Juaŋti acaan Juaŋ yaakinti ɛkɛ yɔɔdɛ te lieno. Ɔci Juaŋ tieŋŋin cɔŋi ɛkɛ, acaan ɛkɛ bala noŋi ba jyek Juaŋo.
Ɛkɛ a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan, oŋ yeti ɛkɛ yaaŋnɛti tiit jyek Juaŋ te taab ɛkɛ neeni.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ cwamnɛ Weegɛnyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi mena yuoci maka tyeŋi jyek ɛkɛ waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛy.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Juaŋ ɛkɛ barŋɛ a gaciic tolan ba Mɛlki Caadik.
’Ya buaga ɛkkɛ myettin jiek ne coŋɔn te jwalla neeni, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn lwoŋŋɛn tɛɛcin ɛkkɛti, acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba maka miŋko.

Awarɛ, ɛkkɛ balkɛ wɔɔka aŋka te ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka loṭi mako, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛ buagɛ dɔkɔ mena ɛkkɛ laldɛ te jɔɔtcin ɛkkɛ jɔɔttɛ te lali jwali Juaŋy. Ɛkkɛ buagɛ jyek Juaŋ jyeka koyan ba aak neeni, ɛkkɛ buagɛ oomdin tɛyan bɛɛ.
Mena moti aakyɛ, ɛkɛ a kacco, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena jyeka pwadin ŋeejɛ bɛɛy.
Oŋ yeti oomdin tɛyanyɛ, gena oomdin maka ḍwaŋin maka tɛyan, acaan ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛɛn ɔci yaaŋnɛti naŋka pwadan ŋeejjɛ, ɔci naŋka yeyin ŋeejjɛ moki.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala bolja ikin loṭin ñɔkin a ñwaŋi a jiek ŋwayya ne cyɛɛlɔ a ñaccu te jyek jyenna ma jyetti Kiṭɔti neeniyɛ, daltin lakun. Dala ikin ‘uottin ñamu lalla korkɛn twotinti. Naa ikin moki dɔɔtin ŋoyɔ aŋka gɔwwin te jyek bolja ma waakɛn yaltiti te naŋka yeyin naŋka etti lienti bɛɛ, ɔci moki te jyek jyenna ma jyetti Juaŋti bɛɛ,
ɔci te jyek lali bulti ma ɔci tañña ma byeŋkɛn tantiti ma wyetkɛnti bɛɛ, ɔci jɔŋŋin maka a tuutan jɔŋti ñaalɔ te lienti bɛɛ, ɔci ywobji Juaŋ ywobja baadi bɛya neeniti bɛɛ.
Kan Juaŋ ikin daltinyɛ, dala ikin ‘uottin ñamu te naŋki waka neeniti!

Oŋ kan magga jyeni ɛkkɛn dalji dokiyɛ, dɔɔkkin ɛkkɛn dɔɔktiti aŋka waakɛn yaltitiyɛ, koocin ɛkkɛnti moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala te ñamu non Juaŋ nona dɛki, ɔci ɛkkɛn dɛccin gena ma ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ te ñaalɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn balki ñoowin Boŋ Juaŋ daŋkun.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn jwalla pwadan ŋeejjɛ te Juaŋti, ɔci naŋka tɛyan naŋka bɛya ñomgɔti neeni ŋeejjɛ daŋkun.

Oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ, ɔci dɔɔkkin ɛkkɛn dɔɔkti aŋka waakɛn yaltitiyɛ, kooccin ɛkkɛnti moki bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛn Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan ŋaaptan ñaalɔ kakanti moki te naŋki yoñ ɛkkɛn aŋka ɛkɛ ‘wontan lɔɔn ma ñomgɛnti.
Acaan ṭɛɛr ne ñaal liɛbi ɛkɛti oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ moti piego. Kan ɛkɛ poka piidi ma yuoldɛ ñaalɔ ne pwadan maka dwokiti neeniyɛ, Juaŋ yomɛ pwad pwad ṭɛra neeniti.
Oŋ yeti kan ṭɛɛr etti kuwi ɔci janga yeyinyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘waldɛ Juaŋo, ɔci ne baaṭi ɛkɛ amdɛ maaño.
Mung ɔɔn, ‘ya gɔkkan doki te waka yeyin, yeti ŋeej ‘ya ne pwadan ɛkkɛ yɔɔrdɛ waka pwadin te Juaŋti acaan ɛkkɛ yɔɔññɛ ɛkɛ.

Acaan Juaŋ menga amdɛji te genga bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ñingɛ yeya te naŋki ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, ɔci te anna lɛɛlni ɛkkɛ bora ɛkɛti te yenti ɛkɛ ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ kanŋɛ mokɛ Ma Kiṭɔy, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ kanŋɛ te maka neeni men ɔɔn.
Ɔci ɔɔn buagɔn men da war tɛɛn ɛkɛ lɛɛldi bora warda ne naŋka neeni baadi ɔɔn, a ɔŋŋi ɛkkɛ yɔɔrdɛ waka pwadin waka kɛɛdɛ ɛkkɛ neeni te Juaŋti.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn buagɔn naa ɛkkɛ waakɔ morndi bɛɛ, oŋ yeti dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba maka jyeti jwali Juaŋ, ɔci yomgɛn tiektany. A ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn mwoki waka pwadin te Juaŋti waka jwallɛn ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛy.
Ne Juaŋ Abrahim ḍuaññɛ te jwaliyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin awarɛ te yenti ɛkɛ, acaan menga bala tolcin te Juaŋ aŋka ɛkɛ gɔŋni te yenti mena parɛ gɛɛl bɛɛ.
Ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya noŋja ne pwadan iti awarɛ, ɔci kɛɛn i naŋdi ne coŋɔn.”
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Abrahim yomɛ tieŋnɛ ɔci yɔṭi waka ɛkɛ ḍuaññɛ Juaŋy.
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ma gɔki awarɛ te mena tolan te ɛkkɛny, ɔci jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn awarɛyɛ, jyek pɛɛdin yɔɔdɛyɔ waakɛnda.
Acaan Juaŋ buagɔn maka jyeti jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ neeni nɔɔttɛ ne pwadan agi paŋi ɛkɛ agjiyɔ moki bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya gɔkka awarɛ.”

Ikin balkin jyeka ikin ḍuaññinti ɛkɛ, ɔci jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te yenti ɛkɛ awarɛy. Waka yaakkɛn neeniyɛ, yɔɔd ne tɛyan, Juaŋ yaakinti jomi jiek te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci ikin yiŋŋin Juaŋti, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ ikin yɔɔññin, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin myennin awarɛ aŋka ikin yomgɔ tiektin ne ikin jyettin kɛɛyin waka pwadin, waka ikin ḍuaññinti ɛkɛ te jwali aŋka ikin ‘wontin ɛkkɛny.

Jwalla ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te waka pwadin neeniyɛ, bala ba lɔña tɛyan coodi ikinti, ɛkɛ tɛɛna tɛɛno. Jwalla ikin ḍuaññinti Juaŋ neeni moki, ikin wɛɛtin ne jiju bworŋa on Juaŋ ona a bworŋji neeni aŋka ikin dɛntin nona baali Jwaŋa Tolany.
Gena nona kaanni Yaccu ñamu te ikiny, ɔci ɛkɛ aŋi gaciic tolan yuonginda ba Mɛlki Caadik.

Mɛlki Caadik neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a ciɛggɔn tolan ban Celam. Ɛkɛ a gaciic Jwaŋa Tolan. Gena ɛkɛ ati kookcin Abrahimti ne Abrahim dɔɔŋni te nona ɛkɛ cyekin pookɛn cyekin ḍwaŋin buannɛy. Ɔci Mɛlki Caadik cɔkcin ne pwadan Juaŋti aŋka Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan Abrahimti.

Ɔci ɛkɛ kɛnnɛ Abrahim gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka a inyaakkɛnti te waka yoolnɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda neeni. Kon yenti ɛkɛ a Mɛlki Caadik neeni agi, “Ciɛggɔn Tolan Ciɛggɔn Naŋka Pwadan.” Ɔci ɛkɛ bartan ma a ciɛggɔn ban Celam ciɛggɔn tolan. Yenta a ciɛggɔn tolan ban Celam neeni kon ɛkɛ agi, “Ciɛggɔn Tolan Ciɛggɔn Coodda Pwadan.”
Ɛkɛ balkɔn weegɛn ɔci mɛɛgɛn ɔci yɔrgɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ balkɔn oŋŋa ɛkɛ jɔɔnnɛ te coodi ɔci oŋŋa coodi ɛkɛ wyeñɛ baadi bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkɛ bala ba Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan, acaan ɛkɛ a gaciic Jwaŋa Tolan oŋki waakɛnda.
Gɔṭṭɛ moki, ‘wana neeniyɛ, tolcin hay! Aŋka Abrahim yɔr weyi ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti te waka oonɛ ɛkɛ waakɛndati neeniy.
Ɔci gaciicin kɛɛn Laawiyɛ, ganuun gɔki ɛkkɛnti aŋka ɛkkɛn eedi gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti te mati. Ɛkkɛn eedi waak te modg ɛkkɛn modga bɛɛn te Abrahimtiy.

Oŋ yeti Mɛlki Caadikyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛɛn te kɛɛn Laawiti bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ eci gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti te Abrahimti, ɔci ɛkɛ cɔkcin Juaŋti aŋka Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan Abrahimti. Gena Abrahim ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛy.
Awarɛ, gena mena tolan aŋka gɔkti jyeka pwadin mena ḍiɛrantiy.

Gaciicin kɛɛn Laawi maka eci gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti waakɛnda neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka tuwa lakun. Yeti Mɛlki Caadik mena eci gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti neeni, worga Juaŋ gɔki agi ɛkta tuudɔ bɛɛ, agi waka ‘wontan ma Juaŋ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti neeni limmɛ Mɛlki Caadik mena tɛɛti neeni.
Ɔci ‘ya gɔkca te ma Laawi maka eci waak te mati neeni, ka ɛkkɛn daŋkun ḍɔccin waka neeni ne ɛkkɛn men balki te Abrahim konɛtiy.
Acaan te wɔɔka Mɛlki Caadik kookki i Abrahim waayiyɛ, Laawi men biɛṭi te yɔr ɛkkɛn Abrahim konɛti.

Juaŋ ma ‘wonnɛ ganuun te gaciicin ma Laawi, ɔci te kanŋa yɔmni te gaciicin ma Laawiyɛ, te Juaŋ moki noŋdi gaciic parɛ mena bala ba Mɛlki Caadik neeni boki? A’a. Yeti Juaŋ noŋi gaciic parɛ bala ba Mɛlki Caadik neeni ɔɔn acaan kanŋa ma Laawi bɔɔnjin, ɔci gaciic neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba Haruun bɛɛ.
Kan kanŋa gaciicin warɛ aaŋŋɛyɛ, ganuun warɛ agdɛ daŋkun.
Kiṭɔ mena guagdɛ Juaŋ mena bala ba Mɛlki Caadik neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛɛn te kɛɛna parɛti. Ɔci maka te kɛɛna neenitiyɛ, menga noŋi kanŋa ‘yɛrŋ waak neeni bɛɛ.
Oŋ yeti awarɛyɛ, Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛn te kɛɛn Yahuujati, ɔci Muuca gɔki jwali gɛɛl te kɛɛna neeni te jyek gaciicin bɛɛ.
Naŋka neeni warɛ liɛllɛ ne pwadan moki, acaan gaciic parɛ gɛɛl warɛ liɛllɛ bala ba Mɛlki Caadik ɔɔn.
Ɛkɛ naŋɛ ma a gaciic ba jyek ganuun ma baan bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ a gaciic te war tɛɛn tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛy.
Ɔci worga Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki agi, “I agdi gaciic oŋki waakɛnda ba Mɛlki Caadik.”
Waka ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛn baaw yɔɔni acaan ɛkkɛn bɔɔnjin, ɛkkɛn yɔmjin te genga bɛɛ.
Acaan ganuun Muuca genga naŋŋɛ ḍaaŋŋɛ warda bɛɛ, oŋ yeti acca Juaŋ gɔkkin te jyek waka pwadin ɛkɛ buagɔn ‘wontin ikiny, ɔci te jwalla neeniyɛ, ikin ortinti Jwaŋa Tolanti.
Ɔci jyeka neeniyɛ, Juaŋ gɔkcin ɛkkɛn budan bɛɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛn te yenti ɛkɛ awarɛ!

Ɔci maka pookɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋi gaciicin budan. Juaŋ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti te yenti ɛkɛ awarɛ bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti Yaccuyɛ, aŋi gaciic te jwalla awarɛ ne Juaŋ gɔŋni ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn paŋi ɛkɛ agdɛyɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin awarɛ agi, ‘I a gaciic oŋki waakɛnda.’ ”
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu aŋi mena ikin woŋgɔ ñiektin a Juaŋ noŋdi waka ikin ḍuaññinti ɛkɛ te jwali a waka pwadin neeni ikinti.
Awarɛ, gaciicin ma Laawiyɛ, ɛkkɛn coŋɔ, acaan ɛkkɛn tuw ɔci yaakinti noŋi kanŋa moki bɛɛ.
Oŋ Yaccuyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka bala oŋki waakɛnda, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, kanŋa ɛkɛ agi gaciic neeniyɛ, luldɛ menga bɛɛ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti maka ortiti Juaŋti te ɛkɛyɛ, yɔɔdɛ oŋki waakɛnda, acaan ɛkɛ bala cɔki Juaŋti te ɛkkɛn oŋkanda, ɔci ɛkɛ tuwa oŋgati bɛɛ.

Acaan Yaccu a gaciic tolan, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ yɔmjin te ikin ɔci ɛkɛ a mena pwadan, ɛkɛ balkɔn nɔji bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ balkɔn naŋka yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ kooyin bora te maka a nɔɔtkti doki. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ciyi ñaalɔ ban Jwaŋa Tolan.

Ɛkɛ bala ba maka a gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud neeni bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn eci waka ‘yɛrtan ɛkkɛn oŋkanda te nɔji ɛkkɛn ñamu, ɔci te nɔji mako. Yaccu buagɔn noŋdi a ɔɔn bɛɛ, te nɔji mayɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi naŋka neeni oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ ne ɛkɛ ŋaapkiti ma kakantiy.
Acaan ganuun Muuca maka waakɛn koyanyɛ, muodɛ bora aga gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud, oŋ yeti jyek Juaŋ jyeka awarɛ bɛɛn ganuun ŋoyɛti, ɛkɛ mwoki Kaci Juaŋ aŋka aga gaciic tolan awarɛ oŋki waakɛnda.
Jyeka a jiek wyetkɛnyɛ, ikin balkin gaciic tolan a ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ cooccin ñaalɔ pɔliji kaakci Jwaŋa Tolan taaŋɛti byeŋa byerɔn non Ḍɔŋ Jwaŋa Tolan.
Ɔci ɛkɛ bala kanŋan Nona Pwadan Ne Tolanti. Gena on Juaŋ ona awarɛ, ona cɔnnɛ Ciɛggɔny. Gena ona cɔdɛ ma baan bɛɛy.
Kanŋa gaciic tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi kanŋa waka ‘yɛrtan ma Juaŋti i waka ‘wontan ma Juaŋy. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Kiṭɔ mena gaciic tolan neeniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ daŋkun etti genga Juaŋti.
Kan te ɛkɛ baali ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ te aŋi gaciic bɛɛ. Acaan gaciicin ‘woñi waak te jyek ganuun Ma Yahuudyɛ, bala doki.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn kanŋan a muacin budan te ṭiebji waka bala ñaalɔ pɔlijiy. Bala ba Muuca ne buagi eyi on Juaŋyɛ, Juaŋ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala i waŋu tiicca, ɔci noŋja waak waakɛnda ba naŋka i nɔɔnnin poomtiy.”

Oŋ yeti accayɛ, Yaccu ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ kanŋa pwadan te kanŋa gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud waayi, acaan jwalla naŋŋɛ Juaŋ a ɛkɛ a cuuda Juaŋ ma ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka pwatcin ne tolan, acaan jwalla neeni yɔɔnnɛ iñɔ Juaŋ te jyeka ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛ a jyek waka pwadin ne tolany.
Kan jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ ñamu yɔmjin dokiyɛ, oŋ te Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn noŋdi jyeka pookɛn moki boki? A’a.
Ɔci Juaŋ bala wooki maka te ñamu ne ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Ciɛggɔn gɔki agi, ‘Hay, oŋka bɛya neeniyɛ, ‘ya noŋdin ikin kɛɛn Icrayiil ɔci kɛɛn Yahuuja jyeka wonkɛn.

Oŋ yeti bala ba jyeka naŋi ‘ya i yɔrg ɛkkɛn oŋŋa ‘ya ɛkkɛn muoŋŋa te byeŋkɛn acaan kooya bora te ban Macor wanna bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn jyek ‘ya tiikitiyɔ bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn daljan noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn. ‘Ya waŋu tiiccan ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.’
Ɔci Ciɛggɔn gɔki moki agi, ‘Ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ‘ya noŋdin jiek iki ma Icrayiil, ɔci ganuun ‘ya ḍuacca ‘ya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti, ɔci ḍuacca ‘ya ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti, ɔci ‘ya agdi Juaŋ ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn aga ma ‘ya.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn modgɛn laltan moki bɛɛ. Walla gɔkti modgɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛn Ciɛggɔn ŋeettan bɛɛ,” acaan ɛkkɛn ‘ya ŋeecka waakɛnda doki. Gena maka ḍyɛrin ɔci maka ḍwaŋin.
Ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛn bɔɔka te nɔji ɛkkɛn, ɔci ‘ya poŋja te nɔji ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ.’ ”
Ɔci te jwali Juaŋ jwalla guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te jyeka wonkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛka ñamu naŋŋɛ aŋi daan doki. Ɔci waak waakɛnda waka aŋi donk neeniyɛ, noŋi baadi doki.
Jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ i ma ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛn ma myetkɛ te malla ɛkkɛn mortɛ Juaŋti a ɔkiy, ɔci aŋka ma ona morki ɛkkɛn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni neeni cɔttan a ɔki.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ona a bworŋ cɔdɛ ma yenti Nona Pwadanyɛ, ɛkɛ balkɔn dyɛkan dɛki, ɔci tarabɛɛca ɔci byedga ‘wontan ma Juaŋy.
Ɔci on kona neenitiyɛ, bworŋa kɛkci ma bala. Ɔci on kona bworŋa neeni ŋoyɛtiyɛ, bartan ma agi, “Nona Pwadan Ne Tolany.”

Gena on ṭɔla balkɔn gena ṭuorki ma jien gena naŋi ma te dahab, ɔci canduuk jyeka ḍyɛŋŋɛ Juaŋ canduuk naŋɛ ma te dahab warɛ warday. Ɔci kulla naŋi ma te dahab kulla ḍuacki ma ama bartan ma a “Manna” ama ma ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ te ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci gɔl Haruun gɔla pworŋ, ɔci gwoyi ṭɔlgɛn kieññi Juaŋ jyeka ḍyɛŋŋɛ ɛkɛyɛ, bala jiju canduuk neeniji wɛnan.

Ɔci canduuk neeni wyeñɛtiyɛ, malɛɛkan bartan ma agi caryubim bala yɔɔd ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɛkkɛn mieti ma agi Juaŋ baalɔ nona yɔtki ɛkkɛn wanna, ɔci ɛkkɛn kɔggɛn nona Juaŋ bɔɔci ma te nɔji kwomiyɔ. Oŋ yeti accayɛ, wɔɔka gɛɛl bala aŋka lookin jiek korkɛn bɛɛ.
Waak waakɛnda a ywaŋgɔn a ɔŋŋi, gaciicin kaatti on kona ñamu oŋkanda aŋka noŋi kanŋa.

Oŋ yeti on kona parɛtiyɛ, gaciic tolan Ma Yahuud aŋka kaatti parɛ oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ te ywonna ne cyɛɛlɔ. Oŋ yeti ɛkɛ kaatti budan bɛɛ, ɛkɛ eedi yimg gena ŋardɛ ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ Juaŋ te nɔji ɛkɛ, ɔci te nɔjja naŋɛ ma ɛkɛy.
Boŋ Juaŋ nɔɔti te Nona Pwadan Ne Tolan agi pɔy tuktan agi uulgɔn, acaan ona yɔɔd bora bala yɔɔd men.
Ɔci kanŋa a ywaŋgɔn neeniyɛ, nɔɔti te oŋka accay. Waka ‘wontan ma Juaŋ ɔci waka ŋartan mayɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti nɔji ma eetan ɔntɔ te ma yomgɛnti bɛɛ.
Oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn a waka amtin, ɔci waka maattin, ɔci lɔɔŋa luaktan ma jitkɛn ne coŋɔny. Ɛkkɛn kandi te waka neeni ɔɔn ne kanŋa woonɛ neeni bɛɛdi ɔɔn.

Oŋ yeti Yaccuyɛ, ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni aŋŋi gaciic tolan te jyek waka pwadin waka bala acca neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ doki kaaccin on Juaŋ ñaalɔ ona naŋɛ ma te byeŋkɛn bɛɛ neeni. Ona kaannɛ ɛkɛ neeni tol tolo, ɔci pwatcin ne tolan te oorga naŋtan ma te byeŋkɛn. Ɔci ona neeni te ṭɛɛrji wɛnni bɛɛ.
Ɔci ne ɛkɛ kaanni Nona Pwadan Ne Tolanti oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɛkɛ kaaccin te yimg ḍɛɛk ɔci yimg yotk ṭɔlgɛn bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ kaaccin te yimg ɛkɛ parɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin eeŋnin yɔɔta baadi bɛɛy.
Oŋ kan gañi yimg ḍɛɛk ɔci yotk, ɔci twon neek ṭɔlgɛn a moong, maka a nɔɔtk ywaŋtan pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛtiy,

oŋ poca, gɔrca! Yaccu Kiṭɔ, yimg ɛkɛ noŋi ne pwadan ne tolan ikinti. Ɛkɛ warɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ ba gena ‘yɛrŋɛ ɛkɛ Juaŋti pwadan te Boŋa baadi bɛɛy. Ɔci yimg ɛkɛ nɔji ikin eetan ɔntɔ te ikin yomgɔti i waka budan neeni aŋka ikin mortin Jwaŋa tɛɛtiy!

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkɛ a cuuda jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ wonkɛn aŋka maka bornɛ Juaŋ neeni yɔɔrdi waka pwadin waka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ agi ‘woñji ɛkkɛn waka baadi bɛɛy. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ tuun aŋka ma wandɛ te nɔjja naŋɛ ɛkkɛn ne ɛkkɛn balki cieki te jyeka naŋŋi Juaŋ ñamuy.
Ɔci kan men ne noŋi tuudiyɛ, jyeka ɛkɛ buagɛ aŋka naŋtan mayɛ, kiiddɛ ɛkɛ worgaji, yeti kan ɛkɛ tuun men bɛɛyɛ, jyek ɛkɛ yɔmdi te genga men bɛɛ.
Jyeka kiinɛ mena tuun worgaji neeniyɛ, balkɔn war tɛɛn ne mena kieñi ɛkkɛn neeni tuuni dokiy. Oŋ kan men tɛɛti menyɛ, jyeka neeni balkɔn war tɛɛn bɛɛ.
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ ñamuyɛ, yɔɔtcin iñɔ ne tɛyan budan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yɔɔtcin iñɔ te yimgo.

Te ñamuyɛ, Muuca ne ma nɔɔnnɛ te jyek ganuun jitkɛn waakɛndayɛ, ɛkɛ oŋ yimg yotk ɔci yimg ḍɛɛk ñaaŋŋɛyɔ i pieg ɔci gannɛ worga ganuunti, ɔci gannɛ ma waakɛnti moki. Ɛkɛ bala goci te aamk min ɔci jyeyya tidan.
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Yimga neeniyɛ, gena yimga guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ agi, ‘Dala naŋjɛ ɛkkɛy.’ ”
Muuca yimg gannɛ ona a bworŋti, ɔci yimg gannɛ waka morki mati moki.
Waak waakɛnda pwaddi te yimg te jyek ganuun. Kan yimg pwokci ma bɛɛyɛ, buat nɔji gɛɛl bala bɛɛ.

Ona a bworŋ ona morki ma ɔci waka bala jiju ɛkɛ konɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a muacin budan, a waka awarɛ ba waka ñaalɔ pɔliji bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn waakɛn pwaddi te oljin yimg oltiti ma ɛkkɛntiy. Oŋ yeti waka ñaalɔ pɔlijiyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn pwaddi te waka ‘yɛrtan ma pwadin ne tolany.
Acaan Kiṭɔ kaaccin Nona Pwadan Ne Tolan naŋi ma baan nona a muacin neeni bɛɛy. Oŋ yeti ɛkɛ ati ñaalɔ pɔliji aŋka warɛ liɛldɛ bora Juaŋ ñamɛti te ikin.
