Gaciic tolan Ma Yahuudyɛ, ɛkɛ kaatti Nona Pwadan oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ te ywoni te yimg maalo. Yeti Kiṭɔ warɛ ‘wondɛ ma noktan te ikin, gɔ moki nokin a ñaccu ɔɔn bɛɛ.

Te baali a ɔɔnyɛ, Kiṭɔ te tuun oŋki ne coŋɔn te ma waakɛnda wona noon aŋŋɛ Juaŋy. Oŋ yeti te oŋka ookkin ne ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci nɔji eññɛ ɔntɔ te naŋka ɛkɛ warɛ naŋŋɛ a gena ‘yɛrŋɛ ɛkɛ Juaŋti neeni.
Men baanyɛ, tuwa oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ lakun, Juaŋ oŋ hayya gɔrti jyek godan ɛkɛ oŋo.
A ɔɔn daŋkun Kiṭɔ tuun oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ aŋka nɔji ma waakɛnda eedɛ ɔntɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ dɔɔkti te nɔji moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ dɔɔkti aŋka maka kɛɛy ɛkɛ neeni yɔɔdɛ.

Ganuun Ma Yahuud, ɛkɛ a ṭiebji waka pwadin waka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeni budan. Ɛkɛ awarɛ ba waka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeni bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, waka ‘yɛrtan ma Juaŋti yuonginda neeni yaakinti maka moṭi Juaŋti neeni naŋtan pwaddi bɛɛ.

Oŋ kan te waka ‘yɛrtan ma neeni yaakinti nɔji eetan ɔntɔyɛ, te ma yɔɔni te ‘yɛrŋ ɛkkɛn doki. Acaan maka moṭi Juaŋti neeni te nɔji ɛkkɛn te eyɛ waka neeni doki, ɔci te ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi te nɔji ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, te waka ‘yɛrtan ma neeni te yɔɔni waakɛnda doki.
Yeti ma ɛṭi waka neeni yuonginda aŋka ma poŋdi te nɔji ɛkkɛn.
Acaan yimg yotk ɔci yimg ḍɛɛk yaakinti nɔji eetan ɔntɔ bɛɛ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne Yaccu buaŋŋɛ woon bɛɛdi iñɔ ṭɛɛrjiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin Juaŋti agi, “Waka ‘yɛrtan ma ɔci waka ‘wontiti ma iyɛ, i buagi ɛkkɛn bɛɛ, yeti i ‘ya noŋna waro.
I buagi waka ṭultan ma ɔci waka ‘yɛrtan ma te nɔji neeni bɛɛ.
Ɔci ‘ya gɔkcan ka, ‘‘Ya wɛnni nɛ, hay Juaŋo, aŋka ‘ya noŋ ba gena ṭaga i bala ba jyeka a kiigin worgaji te ‘yay.’ ”

Ɛkɛ gɔki ñamu agi, “Waka ‘yɛrtan ma ɔci waka ‘wontiti ma i, ɔci waka ṭultan ɛkkɛn gena ɛrki ma waak wyeñɛti neeni, ɔci waka ‘yɛrtan ma te nɔjiyɛ, i buagi ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.” Ɛkɛ gɔki a ɔɔn ne ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ waka neeni ‘yɛri ma ba jyek ganuun ɔɔn.

Ɛkɛ gɔkcin moki agi, “‘Ya wɛnni neeni, ‘ya bɛɛn aŋka noŋ naŋka ṭaga iy.” Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu jyek naŋka ɛrki ma waak ñamu olnɛ ɔntɔ, ɔci jyek naŋka Juaŋ buagɛ naŋka woonɛ neeni aŋka ḍuannɛ ɛkɛ non waka te ñamu.
Ɔci te naŋka wannayɛ, ikin pwannin oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ doki te war Yaccu Kiṭɔ ne ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋi te ikiny.
Gaciicin Ma Yahuud ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi kanŋa ɛkkɛn oŋki waakɛnda. Ɛkkɛn ɛṭi a waka ne cyɛɛlɔ oŋkanda ɔɔn. Waka neeni yaakinti nɔji eetan ɔntɔ bɛɛ.
Yeti Kiṭɔ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ te nɔji ma waakɛnda. Te naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ nɔji eññɛ ɔntɔ ne baaṭi ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ cooccin iñɔ Juaŋ taaŋɛti taaŋŋa a byerɔn.
Yaccu bala kɛɛy oŋŋa maka yoyi ñin iki ɛkɛ neeni bwandɛ Juaŋ ɔci ḍuattɛ Juaŋ iñɔ ɛkɛ ciegɛtiy.
Te gena ‘yɛrŋɛ ɛkɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, maka ɛkɛ buagɔn naŋdi pwaddi neeniyɛ, naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ pwadgin doki.
Boŋ Juaŋ moki nɔɔti ikin te naŋka neeni. Te ñamu ɛkɛ gɔki agi,
“Gena jyeka naŋdɔn ɔɔn iki ɛkkɛn ne ninka neeni baatiy. Ciɛggɔn gɔki agi ganuun ‘ya olja ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti, ɔci ‘ya ganuun ḍuacca jiju ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin moki agi, “Nɔji ɛkkɛn ɔci naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyinyɛ, ‘ya poŋja te ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ.”
Acaan Juaŋ ma bɔɔŋnɛ te nɔji dokiyɛ, jyek ‘yɛrŋ waak bala moki bɛɛ, bawwin doki.
Acca modg ɔɔn, Yaccu Kiṭɔ tuun te ikin. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin balkin bwaji moki ne ikin kaattin Nona Pwadan Ne Tolanti neeni bɛɛ.
Ɛkɛ ikin pɔŋnin pɔya woonɛ pɔy tɛɛtin te ‘yɛrŋa ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin kaattin jiju bworŋa kɛkci ma on Juaŋ neeni konɛti.
Ikin balkin gaciic tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ mwoki on Jwaŋa Tolan.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin ortinti Juaŋti te yoma pwadan, ɔci te jyenna awarɛ, ɔci te yomga nɔjjɛn baaw, ɔci te waaka a luaggin te pyega pwadiny.
Dala ikin yomgɔ tiektin ne ikin kɛɛyin waka pwadin waka ikin ḍuaññinti Juaŋ te jwaliy. Acaan ikin jyettin ka Juaŋ jwalla guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ikinti neeni daldɛ budan bɛɛ.
Dala ikin gɔɔrin yɔtin aŋka ikin moowin yɔtin pookɔ aŋka ikin ani lɛɛltin bora ɔci noŋtin ne pwadan.

Naa ikin mwontin te ḍɔɔlla ikin ḍwoṭin wyetkɔ oŋkanda neeni bɛɛ. Ma gɛɛg te baaṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛn mwonnin te ḍɔɔli wyetkɛn. Yeti dala ikin moowin yɔtin pookɔ waakida ne tolan, acaan yuartɛ ɛkkɛ oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛdi cɔɔllin doki.
Kan ikin naŋka awarɛ ŋeennin oŋ ikin buagin noŋin nɔji men a labji ɔɔnyɛ, gena ‘yɛrtan ma gɛɛl bala moki nɔji ikin eedɛ ɔntɔ bɛɛ.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋi aŋka ikin buayin ywobji Juaŋ ywobja bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeni, ɔci maña koldan maña maka yoyi ñin iki Jwaŋa Tolan neeni amdiy!
Mena ganuun Muuca lɛgdɛjiyɛ, ɔci kan ma ne yyɛɛwɔ walla ne ḍoogɔ gɔkcin te naŋki ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ noktan ma. Menga yomɛ pwada ɛkɛti bɛɛ.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ poŋɛ naŋka bɛya mena noŋdi ne yaayan Kaci Juaŋti neeni bala a ɔki? Ɔci mena yimg Yaccu yimga ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ pwanni neeni ñaldɛ a genga bɛɛ neeniy, a gena bɛya ɛkɛtiy? Ɔci a gena bɛya mena wooki Boŋ Juaŋ Boŋa etti yom pwani Juaŋ mati neeniy? Maka noŋi naŋka neeniyɛ, Juaŋ jiek oldɛ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti.
Çeecin ikin mena gɔki agi, “‘Ya noŋja ne yaayan maka noŋi ne yaayan ‘yati neeni.” Ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi, “Juaŋ noŋdi godan ma ɛkɛti.”
Ḍɛmmin ma ḍɛmti Jwaŋ tɛɛtin bieŋɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ a gena buayin ikiny!
Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te ninka ati waayi ne ɛkkɛ koonɛ bora Juaŋ te miel jitinyɛ, ɛkkɛ beelkɛ waak jitkɛn ne coŋɔn, yeti ɛkkɛ buankɛ ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
A oŋki ɛkkɛ balgɛ lɔɔn jitin, ɔci ma noŋi ne yaayan ɛkkɛti. Ɔci a oŋki ɛkkɛ ñoowɛ iki maka naŋtan ma ne yaayan neeni.
Ɛkkɛ ñoonɛ iki ma te taab ne ɛkkɛn balki ciginji, ɔci ne mal ɛkkɛ kuakiti mayɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn men ɔɔn, acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki ɛkkɛ balkɛ mala pwadan mala baadi bɛɛy.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ toga bɛɛ, acaan ne ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektiyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ waka pwadin ñaalɔ pɔliji ne baaṭi.
Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋka ṭagdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka ɛkkɛ yɔɔrdɛ gena guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛy.
Acaan bala ba jwalla guagdɛ worga agi, “Ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ lakun, ɔci mena bɛya neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛya, ɛkɛ kwatti bɛɛ.
Men ‘ya mena pwadanyɛ, ɛkɛ ciya te jyeni ɛkɛ, yeti kan ɛkɛ dɔɔki ŋoyɔyɛ, ‘ya yomu pwada ɛkɛti bɛɛ.”
Ikin agin maka dɔɔdi ŋoyɔ ɔci ḍakti bɛɛ. Yeti ikin balkin jyenno. Ɔci ikin unnin doki.
Jyeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a gena ñyecin ikin waka kɛɛtin ikiny. Ɔci te jyeniyɛ, ikin jyettin yomgɔti awarɛ te waka yuarŋin ikin men bɛɛy.
Te jyeniyɛ, maka te baaṭi Juaŋ yomɛ pwanna pwani ɛkkɛnti.
Te jyeniyɛ, ikin waak ŋeecin waakɛnda ka cɔnnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te jwali ɛkɛ, ɔci waka ñaltin ikin acca neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn cɔnnɛ Juaŋ te waka yuartin ikin te woŋgɔ bɛɛ neeniti.

Te jyeniyɛ, gena oonɛ Habiil Juaŋti ɛkɛ pwatcin te gena oonɛ mod ɛkkɛn kɛɛn Juaŋtiy. Te jyeniyɛ, ɛkɛ maaŋŋɛ Juaŋ agi ɛkta agɔ mena pwadɔ acaan Juaŋ bala gɔki ne pwadan te gena ‘wonnɛ Habiil ɛkɛy. Ɔci te jyeniyɛ, ne Habiil tuuniyɛ, jyek ɛkɛ bala gɔki ikinti acca men ɔɔn.
Te jyeniyɛ, Inak eññɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ ne ɛkɛ a tɛɛta ɔɔn, tuun bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ yuarŋɛ menga bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ eññɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ doki. Worga Juaŋ gɔki agi ne Inak eññɛ Juaŋ men bɛɛyɛ, Juaŋ yomɛ pwatcin ɛkɛti.
Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwada mengati budan kan jyeni baaw ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Kan menga buagɔn bɛya Juaŋtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ jyeddi a Juaŋ bala, ɔci moki dala ɛkɛ jyeddi a maka lieṭi Juaŋ neeni ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ waka pwadin.

Te jyeniyɛ, Nɔwa noŋi ba jyeka ɛkɛ myennɛ Juaŋ te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ naŋka yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ men bɛɛ neeni. Ɛkɛ cɔti murka tolan aŋka ɛkkɛn uddɛ iki kɛɛgin ɛkɛ i moongɛn. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ywobji Juaŋ bɛɛn ṭɛɛr wyeñɛ warda, ɔci Juaŋ gɔki agi Nɔwa agɔ mena pwadɔ te jyeni ɛkta.
Te jyeniyɛ, Abrahim jyeti jwalla guaŋnɛ Juaŋ ɛkɛti agi ɛkta gortɔ bora ooddɔ bana ɛkɛ ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te jwaliy. Ɛkɛ ban ɛkɛ dalnɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ati ooddi bana kwoyi ɛkɛ.

Te jyeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ciyi ba mena wɛli bana ɛkɛ ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ neeniji. Ɛkɛ bala ciyi te ona a bworŋo, ɔci Icaak i Yaakub ɛkkɛn bala ciyi te oorga a bworŋin daŋkun. Ɔci Juaŋ daŋkun ɛkkɛn ḍuaññɛ te jwali ba jwalla guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ Abrahimti neeni daŋkun.
Abrahim bala kɛɛy bana yɔɔd ne tɛyan neeni, ɔci gena Jwaŋa Tolan, ɛkɛ a mena cɔti bana neeniy.
Te jyeniyɛ, Caara waanɛ yɔṭi war tɛɛn aŋka ɛkɛ laatti ne ɛkɛ aŋi ṭien doki ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ jyeti agi Juaŋ mena ɛkɛ ḍuaññɛ te jwali neeniyɛ, gɔki awarɛ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Abrahim bala ba mena tuuta acaan ɛkɛ aŋi daan doki, yeti ɛkɛ jieni kɛɛgin ne coŋɔn ba kɛltan, ɔci ɛkkɛn kɔɔna kɔɔni bala ba ŋɔmma niin kɔmi ḍwaŋɛti.

Maka neeni bala ciyi te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Juaŋti neeni ne oŋŋa ɛkkɛn tuuki ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn waka jwallɛn ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ neeni yuarɛ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn waka neeni yuarcɛji te nona loonan ɔci mugɛ ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeti yomgɛnti a ɛkkɛn ciyi a wɛlg iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni.
Maka gɔki te waka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn mieti agi ɛkkɛn lieṭi ban ɛkkɛn waanɛ.
Ɛkkɛn poŋi te bana dolliyɔ ɛkkɛn waayi moki bɛɛ. Te ɛkkɛn poŋki te bana dollɛ ɛkkɛn waayiyɛ, te ɛkkɛn dɔɔki doki.
Yeti ɛkkɛn dɔɔki bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn bana ñaalɔ pɔliji bana pwadan. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Juaŋ lɔɔdan ne ɛkkɛn borki ɛkɛ a Juaŋ ɛkkɛn bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn noŋnɛ baano.
Oŋŋa Juaŋ Abrahim pɔɔññɛ aŋka gɔrti ne yom ɛkɛ baali a ɔkiyɛ, Abrahim jyeti Juaŋti men ɔɔn, ɔci kaci ɛkɛ Icaak ‘wonnɛ Juaŋo, ɛkɛ yookɔn bɛɛ.
Te ñamu Jwaŋa Tolan Abrahim ḍuaññɛ te jyek kacca neeni agi, “Kɛɛgin Abrahim bɛya te Icaakti.” Yeti Abrahim noŋi kaci ɛkɛ kacca nɔɔti ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni ‘yɛrdɛ Juaŋti.
Abrahim poŋi gɔki agi Juaŋ Icaak jɔɔŋda ñaalɔ te lienti moki, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, bala ba ne ikin gɔkin agi Abrahim Icaak duaŋŋɛ dɔkɔ te lienti.
Te jyeniyɛ, Icaak gɔkcin Yaakubti ɔci Icɔti te naŋka bɛya pwadan ɛkkɛnti ne baaṭiy.
Te jyeniyɛ, Yaakub ne buaŋŋɛ lienyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ne pwadan kɛɛgin Yuocipti waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ ḍaŋnɛ tɛɛlnɛ kɔmñi ɛkɛ wyeñɛti, ɔci morcin Juaŋti.
Te jyeniyɛ, Yuocip ne buaŋŋɛ lienyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin te jyek kooyin ma Icrayiil bora te ban Macor, ɔci ɛkɛ ma nɔɔnnɛ te nona jokki ma owi ɛkɛy.

Te baaṭi ḍuaŋa tolan ma Macor bala noki kɛɛgin ma Icrayiil. Yeti te jyeniyɛ, Muuca ne jietkiti mayɛ, ɛkɛ cogɛyɔ weegɛn i mɛɛgɛn ponk ne ḍoogɔ, acaan ɛkɛ yuarcɛ ɛkkɛn pwanna pwanno. Ɔci ɛkkɛn buañi jwali ḍuaŋa tolan ma Macor moki bɛɛ.
Te jyeniyɛ, Muuca ne tolliyɛ, ɛkɛ yookɔn warɛ te barŋa ɛkɛ bartiti ma a kaci ṭɔl ḍuaŋa tolan ma Macory.
Ɛkɛ buagɔn taabdi ba taab taabki ma Juaŋ wanna, ɔci buagɔn yomɛ ñɔya te wak nɔji neeni wɔɔka ne ḍuulan bɛɛ.
Acaan yuarnɛ ɛkɛ te jwolta ma juolki Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka pwatcin ne tolan te mal ma Macor mala coŋin mala pwadin neeni, acaan ɛkɛ bala poŋi gɔki agi gena ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ neeni aŋka pwatcin ɛkɛti.
Te jyeniyɛ, Muuca kooyin bora te ban Macor, ɔci ɛkɛ buañi te loñk ḍuaŋa tolan ma Macor bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ yookɔn warɛ te dɔɔkkin bala ba Juaŋ mena yuartan ma te woŋgɛn bɛɛ neeni yuartɛ ɛkɛ no.

Te jyeniyɛ, Muuca ma myennɛ aŋka ɛkkɛn ŋordi kulin ṭɔlgɛn ɔci noŋdi iid. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn myennɛ aŋka ɛkkɛn yimg kulin ṭɔlgɛn gattan ‘yegin tuggɛnti aŋka Malɛɛka Lien kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn kɛɛgin a kɛɛgin nogdɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci iid neeni ma boṭi agi, Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋo.
Te jyeniyɛ, ma Icrayiil galŋa bartan ma a Galŋa Tidan jyɛdɛji. Ɛkkɛn bala ati ba ne atki nona iwanti ɔɔn. Ɔci ne ma Macor buaŋŋɛ acaan kaatti daŋkunyɛ, galŋ ɛkkɛn muulnɛ ñaalɔ ɔci eññɛ.
Te jyeniyɛ, ne ma Icrayiil kaatan ban Jɛrikɔ wiilkitiyɔ nink ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, kaatan ḍɛɛmdin.
Te jyeniyɛ, Rahab ɛŋa toban neeni tuun iki maka a nɔɔtk bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ ma Icrayiil maka ati lɛɛl noon neeni coŋŋɛyɔ.
’Ya ‘uocca gɔkca a ɔki moki? ‘Ya balka wɔɔka aŋka gɔkta te Gidyan, ɔci te Baraak, ɔci te Camcuun, ɔci te Jɛpta, ɔci te Daawud, ɔci te Camwil, ɔci te maka a bɔwan moki bɛɛ.
Te jyeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn keedin buanɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkɛn waka ɛkkɛn ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te jwali mugɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyer ‘uorkɛ tuggɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn amɛ jyer bɛɛ.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn war tɛɛn maañ buannɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn uni te lyen byeŋgaaran. Ɛkkɛn a maka waakɛn koyan yeti ɛkkɛn waakɛn tɛɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn tɛɛna tɛɛn lañti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ackan bonka pookɛn buanɛ.

Te jyeniyɛ, moong gɛɛg ma ɛkkɛn maka jɔŋŋin te lientiyɛ, yuarɛ. Ɔci ma gɛɛg korkɛn ñakcin te jwolto. Yeti ɛkkɛn yookɔn waakɛn te pɔkkin ɛkkɛn pɔktiti ma aŋka ɛkkɛn ḍɔɔggɛn wɔkti te lyena ɛkkɛn noktiti ma, acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn jɔŋdi te lienti te tɛɛtin pwadan.
Ɔci ma gɛɛg juoli ma, ɔci ḍwayɛ, ɔci gɛɛg ḍɛɛgɛ, ɔci oljɛ jiju ciginji.

Ɔci gɛɛg yepci ma te gwoyi ɔci nogɛ. Ɔci gɛɛg ŋuodɛ ma jitin, ɔci gɛɛg nogɛ te byeŋgaaran. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ɛŋi geek kulin i geek ḍɛɛko, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ati amaam budan, gena bartan ɛkkɛn a gen ɛkkɛn gɛɛl bala bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn naŋɛ ma ne yaayan.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn yɔmji i baan konɛ moki bɛɛ! Ɛkkɛn ati amaam wɔɔŋji ɔci pomk jitin, ɔci ɛkkɛn wɔti kɔki pomkti.
Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn maaŋi ma te jyeni ɛkkɛn. Oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn waka jiekɛn a ḍuagin neeni yuarɛ men bɛɛ.
Juaŋ ikin ḍɔɔŋnin gena pwadan aŋka ɛkkɛn pwattin iki ikin a cyɛɛlɔ.

Maka boorŋ ‘ya te yengɛn coŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔṭi ikin, ikin yudkinyɔ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin waka cyɛgan ɔci nɔjja kɔrcinti ikinti ne tɛyan neeniyɛ, yiɛptin ɔntɔ, ɔci dala ikin yomgɔ tiektin ne ikin yiŋin boddin oŋkanda te boddin ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ ikin ñomgɔti neeniy.

Ɔci dala ikin woŋgɔ tiittin gena Yaccu Kiṭɔt mena a bɛɛkin jyeni ikiny. Ɔci ɛkɛ a mena ikin naŋtin pwattin te jyeni ikiny. Ɛkɛ yookɔn warɛ te kakan bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ poŋjin te ŋɛɛgga ḍorki ma ɛkɛ bɛɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ yom ñɔɔn bala kɛɛy ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ poŋjin te lɔna tuudɛ ɛkɛ kakanti neeni bɛɛ. Oŋ accayɛ, ɛkɛ bala ciyi Juaŋ taaŋɛti byeŋa byerɔn.
Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te loomg tɛɛn ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ naŋka naŋɛ maka yeyin ɛkɛti buannɛ jitin waakɛnda aŋka naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ poda, ɔci yomgɔ buaya bɛɛ.
Te lañ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ noowɛ i nɔjjo, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛ noonɛ ne tuunɛ men bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛ ñingɔ yien te jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ɛkkɛti ba ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin ɛkɛyɛ? Juaŋ gɔki agi, “Hay, kaci ‘ya, dala i waŋu tiicca ne Ciɛggɔn i ṭeeditiy, ɔci naa i yomu koya ne ɛkɛ i ṭeeditiyɔ bɛɛ.
Acaan Ciɛggɔn ṭeyi maka ɛkɛ aniy, ɔci mena mugdɛ ɛkɛyɛ, ḍuadɛ ɛkɛ ba kaci ɛkɛ.”
Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektɛ ne Juaŋ ṭeyi ɛkkɛy. Ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ɛkɛ ba kɛɛgin ɛkɛ. Kɛɛgin waakɛnda ṭeetan weyyɛn.
Kan ɛkkɛ ṭeedɛ Juaŋ ba kɛɛgin ɛkɛ waakɛnda bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin ɛkɛ awarɛ bɛɛ. Kan a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin jiedi ma te tommo.
Weyya ikin jietkinyɛ, ɛkkɛn ṭeyi ikin ɔci ikin buayin ɛkkɛn, oŋ dala ikin tieŋtin Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolanti aŋka ikin tɛɛttin.
Weyya ikin jietkinyɛ, ikin ṭeekin wɔɔka ne ḍuulan ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn buagɔn, oŋ yeti Juaŋyɛ, ikin ṭeenin ɛkɛ yɔŋi ikin a ywaŋi aŋka ikin ñootin te pwani ɛkɛ.
Ikin ne ṭeekinti mayɛ, te oŋŋa wanna ikin poŋŋin ka ṭeena neeni yaayɛ, pwatcin bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ṭeena neeni etti naŋka pwadan te maka ṭeyi ma te naŋka neeniy. A ɔŋŋi, ɛkkɛn ciya ne pwadan.
Dala byeŋki ɛkkɛ byeŋka morŋan neeni koobdɛ ñaalɔ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ‘woŋga ḍiedan neeni tiittɛ iñɔ.
Dala ɛkkɛ ooddɛ te pɔɔka a tyɛlgan aŋka naa ciega morŋan beeldi bɛɛ, yeti dala ɛkkɛn waakɛn tiittan iñɔ ne tɛyan.
Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ i ma waakɛnda ne pwadan te coodda pwadan. Kan pwani baaw mentiyɛ, mena neeni Ciɛggɔn yuardɛ bɛɛ.

Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ, acaan naa menga warɛ ñiedɛ jitin te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan te gena Juaŋ buagɛ aŋka ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci naa mena yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛti, ɔci ma yaadɛ ne coŋɔn te naŋki ɛkɛ bɛɛ. “Ɛkɛ bala ba jana yaayan ywollin baljiy.”
Naa ɛkkɛ menga noŋdi ne yaayan aga tomma ba Icɔ mena jyek Juaŋ baaw yomɛti ɔci ḍɔŋa ɛkɛ jiennɛ mɛɛgɛn agi kacca ñamu neeni wiɛlnɛyɔ te ama ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni bɛɛ.

Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ buaŋŋi ne ŋoyɔ aŋka dala weegɛn gɔkti ne pwadan ɛkɛtiyɛ, Icɔ ṭiiŋŋɛ wey ɛkkɛn acaan ɛkɛ yaakinti naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ neeni agdiyɔ moki bɛɛ, yeti Icɔ bala wiak te pyeg woŋgɛ, ɔci yɔṭi jyeka pwadin te weegɛnti moki bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ non waka ɛkkɛ yaakɛti yuartɛ, bala ba yɔrg ɛkkɛ ne bɛɛki Pom Cinati bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bɛɛn maña koldanti, ɔci nona miel ɔci ṭuuli wiew ɔci nona yiŋɛ tuol neeni.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛɛn nona wiagi ṭuoŋ, ɔci non pwana gɔkiy. Ɔci maka tieŋŋin pwana neeniyɛ, kɛkkin agi naa ɛkkɛn tieŋdinti jwali gɛɛl moki bɛɛ.
Acaan ɛkkɛn buañi jyeka neeni. Jyeka neeni bala gɔki agi, “Kan mala ati te ciegɛn gɛɛl jokcin poomtiyɛ, ɛkɛ yeptan ma te gwoyi ne tuudi ɔɔn.”
Muuca buañi ne tolan ne ɛkɛ gɔrni poomtiy, ɔci ɛkɛ waanɛ gɔki agi, “‘Ya buay ne pɛñan, ɔci waru ḍiedan.”
Yeti ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ Pom Ciyɔnti ɔci ban Jwaŋa tɛɛtiti Urcaliimti ñaalɔ pɔliji i malɛɛkan coŋiny.

Ɔci ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ non yom ñɔɔn ñoowin kɛɛgin Juaŋ kɛɛgin a kɛɛgin, maka yengɛn a kiigin ñaalɔ pɔlijiy. Ɔci ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ Juaŋti mena noŋi godan ma waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ moki non boŋki maka pwadgin naŋŋɛ Juaŋ aŋi maka awarɛy.

Ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ Yaccuti mena a cuuda jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ wonkɛn neeniti. Ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ yimg Yaccuti yimga mieti ikin te bɔɔkin ikin bɔɔŋninti Juaŋ te nɔjiy. Yimg Yaccu neeni bala ba yimg Habiil yimga balkɛ jyek yoni waakɛn wanna bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛnɛ yimga a gaagin jiekɛn a naŋgin ne pwadan te yimg Habiily.

Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ, naa jyek mena gɔki neeni tuodɛ bɛɛ. Kan maka jyek mena gɔki ṭeyi ma waakɛn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni neeni tuoyɛ ɔci ɛkkɛn uni te ywobji Juaŋ bɛɛy, oŋ ikin uttin a ɔki, kan ikin jyek mena gɔki te ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni tuoññiny!
Pwan ɛkɛ te oŋŋa waayiyɛ, ṭɛɛr jiɛññɛyɔ. Yeti acca ɛkɛ gɔkkin moki agi, “‘Ya ‘uocca oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ moki ṭɛɛr jiɛdyɔ ɔci ‘ya ṭɛɛr jiɛdyɔ parɛ bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya pɔli daŋkun jiɛdyɔ.”
Jyeka gɔki agi “Oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ moki,” jyeka neeni nɔɔti te waka jieci waakɛn neeni ɛkkɛn uuttɛ Juaŋ ɔntɔ. Ɛkkɛn a waka a cɔdgin. Ɔci waka waakɛn jiɛtan bɛɛ neeni aŋka ciya.
Dala ikin gɔktin a pwatcin Juaŋti acaan ikin mwokkin cyɛgja jieci warɛ bɛɛy. Dala ikin buayin Juaŋ ne ikin moṭin Juaŋti te malla buagi ɛkɛy.
Acaan Jwaŋ ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ a maña omiy.
Dala ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin pookɔ ba maka a modin.
Naa ɛkkɛ ñingɔ yeya te ḍuat maka wɛlg bɛɛ. Te naŋka wannayɛ, ma gɛɛg malɛɛkan ḍuayɛ ne ɛkkɛn kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te maka ciyi ciginji bala ba ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ iki ɛkkɛn jiju ciginji ɔɔn, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te taab maka naŋtan ma ne yaayan neeni. Dala taab ɛkkɛn bala ba taab ɛkkɛ ɔɔn.
Dala ma waakɛnda poŋdi a ḍɛɛn neeni ɛkɛ a gena pwadan. Ɔci maka ‘uay i moongyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn noŋdi tomi maka pookɛnti bɛɛ. Juaŋ jiek oldɛ maka noŋi tomi wyetkɛnti.
Naa ɛkkɛ anɛ bilk bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yɔmdɛ te waka bala ɛkkɛti wanna doki. Acaan Juaŋ gɔki agi, “‘Ya i daldin bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya i yiɛptin ɔntɔ bɛɛ.”
Dala ikin yomgɔ tɛya, ɔci gɔktin agi, “Ciɛggɔn a mena moki ‘yay. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya buay genga moki bɛɛ. Menga yaakinti ‘ya naŋda ɔŋka bɛɛ.”
Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te maka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ te jyek Juaŋy. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te coodda cieki ɛkkɛn, ɔci te lyena tuuki ɛkkɛny. Dala jyeni ɛkkɛ bala ba jyeni ɛkkɛn.
Yaccu Kiṭɔ warɛ agdɛ oŋgati bɛɛ. Tɛɛnɔ, ɔci te oŋŋo, ɔci yuonginda ɔɔn ɛkɛ warɛ agdɛ bɛɛ.

Naa ɛkkɛ maaltɛ jyeka pookɛn gɛɛg ɔntɔ te jyeka awarɛti neeni bɛɛ. Pwatcin doki ne i yɔɔrdi war tɛɛn i yomuti te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolany. Yeti yom tɛɛna neeni yuara i te tiit jyek ganuun te jyek oomdin bɛɛ. Maka bala tieci jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn magɛ jyeka neeni bɛɛ.
Maka moṭi Juaŋti nona morki ma Juaŋti te baaṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛn omi waka ‘yɛrtan ɛkkɛn Juaŋti neeni, yeti ɛkkɛn yaakinti omdi genga te nona ɛṭin ikin waak a nona woonɛ neeniti bɛɛ.
Gaciic tolan Ma Yahuud etti yimg maal Nona Pwadan Ne Tolanti neeni aŋka ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ Juaŋ te nɔjjo. Yeti yoŋgi waka ‘yɛri ma neeni tontan ma maañ baan ŋoyɛti bora aŋan.
Yaccu daŋkun tuun bora baan ŋoyɛti a ɔɔn aŋka ma pwaddi te yimg ɛkɛ.
Dala ikin gortin bora ɛkɛti baan ŋoyɛti aŋan aŋka ɛkɛ yoortin ikin te lɔɔno.
Acaan ikin balkin bana yɔɔd ne tɛyan gɛɛl iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni moki bɛɛ. Ikin kɛɛyin bana ikin ‘wontinti Juaŋ ne baaṭi neeni.
Acaan Yaccu tuun te ikinyɛ, dala jiɛta jieyin ikin Juaŋ oŋkanda neeni, bala ba waka ‘yɛrtin ikin Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci te jiɛta neeniyɛ, ikin mietin a ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn.
Naa ɛkkɛ yiedɛ te naŋka pwadin ɔci te moowin yɔtin pookɔ bɛɛ, acaan Juaŋ yomɛ pwatcin te naŋka pwadan neeni bala ba ne ɛkkɛn akki waka ‘yɛrŋin ikin ɛkɛti no.

Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka wɛɛyi ɛkkɛ, ɔci noŋdɛ ba jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛtiy. Ɛkkɛn gɔṭi ɛkkɛ woodi bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn taadɛ Juaŋ te kanŋa ɛkkɛn neeni. Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋdi kanŋa ɛkkɛn te yoma ñɔyan. Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋdi kanŋa te yoma pwadan bɛɛ, ɔci yɔɔrdi gena pwadan gɛɛl te naŋka neeni bɛɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ te ɔɔn oŋkanda Juaŋti. Çeejɔn ɔɔn ne pwadan paŋŋa bɛya te yomg ɔɔnti pwanna pwani, acaan ɔɔn buagɔn noŋdɔn a naŋka pwadan oŋkanda ɔɔn.
Ɔci ‘ya toocca ɛkkɛti moki ne tolan ka dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti aŋka ɛkɛ ‘ya cuonda dɔɔda ɛkkɛti moki ne pɛñan.
Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ luolnɛ Jwaŋ coodda pwadan ñaalɔ te lienti, Yaccu aŋi ḍɛɛnɔn kulin Ḍɛɛnɔn Tolan te lyen ɛkɛ. Ɔci te yimg ɛkɛyɛ, Juaŋ jiek naŋɛ iki mako. Jyeka naŋi ɛkkɛn neeni baadi bɛɛ.

Dala Jwaŋ naŋka pwadan ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ waka pwadin waka ɛkkɛ buagɛ waakɛnda aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋka ṭagdɛ ɛkɛy. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ikinti te Yaccu ba naŋka ṭagdɛ ɛkɛy. Ɔci dala Yaccu Kiṭɔ jiɛtan ma yuonginda ɔɔn! Amɛɛn.
Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jwalla ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ yoma pwadan, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya. Acaan worga kiewan ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeni beecin bɛɛ.
’Ya buaga dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ mod ikin Timutawuc pɔkkɛ ma te ciginji doki. Kan ɛkɛ bɛɛn ne pɛñan dokiyɛ, ‘ya baldin iki ɛkɛ oŋŋa ‘ya ɛkkɛ yuardiny.
Dala ɛkkɛ maka wɛɛyi ɛkkɛ ñiiptɛ iñɔ te ɔɔn, ɔci Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda. Modg ikin maka ban Itali ñiepi ɛkkɛ waakida.
Dala Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti oŋkanda.
Gena ‘ya Yaakub kɛɛngɔn Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci kɛɛngɔn Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Hay! Ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ Ma Yahuud maka cyɛnŋin jitin baan konɛ warda nɛ, ‘ya ñiep ɛkkɛ waakida.
Hay! Ɛkkɛ modg ɔɔn, kan taabn gɛɛg bala ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya ne tolan.

Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya acaan taabn bɛya ɛkkɛti wannayɛ, gena Jwaŋa Yaayan poci ɛkkɛ a poccin, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn jyenna jyettɛ ɛkkɛ Juaŋti neeniyɛ, dala baadi. Yeti taabn neeniyɛ, etti yɔɔdda ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ne tɛyany.
Dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan oŋkanda ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu te jyek Juaŋ ɔci coodi ɛkkɛ yɔmdi ne pwadan te jyek Juaŋo.

Kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti buagɔn ñing tɛɛn te gengayɛ, dala ɛkɛ tootti Juaŋti ɔci ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ. Acaan Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena ‘woñi ma te waak waakɛnda ne pwadan, ɔci ne ɛkɛ ma ‘wondɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘woñi ma te yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci te yoma pwadan.

Ɔci ne ɛkɛ tootti Juaŋtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ jyeddi yomɛti a Juaŋ ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ. Naa ɛkɛ tieki yomɛti bɛɛ. Kan mena tieki yomɛti jyeni ɛkɛ niin te nona ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba pɔɔgi pieg galŋji ne eedi jwami amaam budany.
Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ba mena yomgɛ a yyɛɛwɔy, mena ooki jyek ɛkɛ waakɛn oŋkanday. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkɛ poŋdi gɔɔdi agi ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ genga bɛɛ.
Gɔṭṭɛ, Men Yaccu mena anan iñɔ wɛnniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔya acaan ne ɛkɛ aŋŋi men Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ koomnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ aŋi mena pwadan ɛkɛ ñamɛti doki.
Mena cyɛgan, kan ɛkɛ warɛ dɔɔdɛ iñɔ Juaŋ ñamɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔya daŋkun, acaan coodi ɛkɛ iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, tolcin bɛɛ, bala ba pɛɛppin luom jitin budan,

acaan ne oŋ waŋɛ toldi ɔci myɛldiyɛ, oŋ waŋɛ pɛɛppin amdɛ, ɔci pɛɛppin pwani ɛkkɛn bala moki bɛɛ. Ɔci ba jyek pɛɛppin neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek mena cyɛgan, acaan ne ɛkɛ baali lieṭi waka ɛkɛ buagɔn menyɛ, ɛkɛ tuwa amaam budan ɔɔn.

Kan mena balki taabyɛ, dala ɛkɛ yɔɔda ne tɛyan, ɔci kan ɛkɛ jyeni ɛkɛ daldɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ gena pwadan, gena tɛɛtin. Ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ tɛɛtin neeni ba jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te ñamu agi maka ani Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ tɛɛtin.

Kan men gɛɛl taabbin te genga ɔci buagɔn noŋdi ne yaayan te taab neeniyɛ, naa ɛkɛ gɔkti agi pɔɔta neeni bɛɛnɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ. Jwaŋa Tolan poci menga bɛɛ, ɔci menga yaakinti Jwaŋa Tolan pɔɔdɛ noŋdi ne yaayan bɛɛ.
Kan menga buagɔn noŋdi ne yaayanyɛ, gena yom ɛkɛ yoma buagɔn waak poci ɛkɛ neeni, ɔci yom ɛkɛ neeni ɛkɛ eedɛ ɔntɔ te Juaŋti, ɔci mugdɛ ne tɛyan ba yiicco. A Jwaŋa Tolan ba, a’a.
Ɔci kan ɛkɛ tieŋdi ba yoma poci ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ neeni a nɔjjo. Ɔci ne nɔji toldiyɛ, ɛkɛ etti lieno.
Modg ɔɔn modga ana ‘yay, naa menga ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ñin bɛɛ.
Waka bɛya te Jwaŋa Tolantiyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda pwadɔ, gena yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a Wey waka dɛki pɔlijiy. Yeti ɛkɛ warɛ agdɛ ywongati bɛɛ.
Juaŋ buagɔn dala pwani ikin bala ñamu te pwani waka cɔnnɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin jwali ɛkɛ jwalla awarɛ aŋka ikin jiɛtkinti ma te jiedda woonɛ te jwali ɛkɛ neeni.

Modg ɔɔn, modga ana ‘yay, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka neeni ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka guaktan ma ɛkkɛti oŋkanda ne pwadan. Yeti naa gɔ ɛkkɛ lakun gɔkcɛ ne pɛñan bɛɛ. Ɔci naa gɔ ɛkkɛ lakun looñjɛ ne pɛñan bɛɛ.
Acaan loñkyɛ, yaakinti etti naŋka pwadan naŋka Juaŋ buagiti neeni bɛɛ.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ naŋka yeyin ne coŋɔn neeni yiɛptɛ ɔntɔ waakɛnda. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ aŋka mugdɛ te yoma pwadan, acaan jyek Juaŋ neeni kan ḍuannɛ ɛkkɛ yomgɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔtɛ ɛkkɛn.
Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek Juaŋo. Naa ɛkkɛ tyeŋɛ jiek te jyetkɔ budan bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ tyeŋɛ Jiek te jyetkɔ budan ɔci noŋɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ dyetɛ waakɔ amaam budan.
Mena tyeŋi Jiek te jyetkɛ budan ɔci noŋdi ba jyeka neeni bɛɛyɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ wanna pwatcin bɛɛ, yaayɛ. Ɛkɛ bala ba mena gɔṭi ñing ɛkɛ te yuar waŋɛ.
Ɔci kan ɛkɛ warɛ uuttɛ ɔntɔ te nona yuar waŋɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ ñingɛ yeya te ñing ɛkɛ doki.

Yeti jyek ganuun jyeka ma pɔktan neeni kan menga waŋɛ tiittɛ ɛkkɛnti ne pwadan ɔci ɛkkɛn tiidɛyɔ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ tyeŋi a tyeŋi budan bɛɛ, ɔci ñingɛ yeya te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ noŋdi ba jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ magdɛ Juaŋ te naŋki ɛkɛ.
Kan mena poŋi agi ɛkɛ agjɛ men Juaŋ, yeti lɛmi ɛkɛ gɔki ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ dyeti war ɛkɛ budan. Ɔci jwalla guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ agi ɛkɛ agjɛ men Juaŋ neeni aŋi ba jwalla budan doki.

Kan men gɛɛl buagɔn aga men Kiṭɔ ne pwadan Wey ikin Juaŋ ñamɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ moki kɛɛgin a ciek te taab ɛkkɛn, ɔci dala ɛkɛ moki moonga ciek te taab ɛkkɛn daŋkun. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ woŋgɛ tiittɛ te naŋka pwadan. Naa ɛkɛ noŋdi naŋka yaayan gɛɛl ba naŋki maka iñɔ baanji wɛnni bɛɛ.

Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ mati waakɛnda ba bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ, naa ɛkkɛ ma gɛɛg aŋka naŋdɛ ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkin pookɛn aŋka naŋdɛ yaaldɛ a yaali bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena pwadan neeniti doki. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ jiek ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛ.

Gɔṭṭɛ, jwali ‘ya neeni bala a ɔŋŋi te naŋki ɛkkɛ, kan men gɛɛl ɛŋi tiŋkin naŋɛ ma te dahab ɔci bworŋin pwadinyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ bɛya nona ḍwoṭɛ ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ on Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ gena ɛkɛti ne pwadan agi, “Hay! Dala i bɛɛd coocca nona pwadanti neeni.” Yeti ne mena anan mena ɛŋi bworŋa yaayan, bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkti ɛkɛti agi, “Hay, dala i bɛɛd yɔɔtca wɛnni,” walla agi, “Dala i bɛɛd coocca iñɔ ṭɛɛrji ɔɔn ñomgɔti wɛnni.”
Tieŋdɛ hay modg ɔɔn, kan ɛkkɛ noŋɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba ɛkkɛ yookɛ te ma gɛɛg no. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ ma kɛɛmmɛ jitin doki te yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ amaamo.

Modg ɔɔn modga ana ‘yay, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ! Maka anin maka wak ɛkkɛn baawyɛ, ɛkkɛn lɔɔnnɛ Juaŋ bora ɔci aŋi ba maka cyɛgan te jyeni ɛkkɛn ɛkɛti ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ Juaŋ cyɛgji ɛkɛ ba jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu agi maka ani ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ cyɛgji ɛkɛ.
Yeti ɛkkɛ aŋka noŋɛ ne yaayan maka ananti neeni. Ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba ne ɛkkɛn a waagga bɛɛ. Hay, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne maka cyɛgan ɛkkɛn a maka ñieyi te ɛkkɛ bɛɛ? Ɔci ɛkkɛn a maka ɛkkɛ eetɛ noŋtɛ godan bɛɛ?
Ɔci ɛkkɛn a maka ḍori yenti Yaccu yenta pwadan yenta bala ɛkkɛti neeni bɛɛ? Ɛɛ, gena ɛkkɛn woodgɛn.
Kan ɛkkɛ ganuun Ciɛggɔn tiidɛyɔ ne pwadan ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Dala anna i ani maka pookɛnyɛ, yoomdi i anna i ani war iy,” a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin.
Yeti kan ɛkkɛ ma gɛɛg aŋka naŋdɛ ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkin pookɛn aŋka yaaldɛ a yaaliyɛ, naŋka neeni aŋka a nɔjjo. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ maka lɛɛwi jyek ganuun doki.
Kan men gɛɛl jyek ganuun jitkɛn tiiññɛyɔ waakɛnda, ɔci ɛka ne cyɛɛlɔ aŋka bɛɛnɛjiyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ganuun pookɛn lɛɛŋŋɛ jitin waakɛnda daŋkun.

Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan mena gɔki agi naa ma noŋdɔ tomi bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi naa ma nokkɔ maka pookcɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ciya budan te naŋki tomi oŋ yeti kan ɛkɛ nokti mengayɛ, a ɔɔn ɛkɛ aŋi mena bɛɛyi jyek ganuun daŋkun.
Dala jyek ɛkkɛ ɔci naŋki ɛkkɛ bala ba naŋki maka godan bɛya ɛkkɛnti ba jyek ganuun ikin pɔŋninti Yaccu ḍɔɔggɔti neeni.
Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pɔktɛ ne ɛkɛ jiek oldɛ mena yomɛ ulan neeni wyeñɛti bɛɛ, yeti mena yomɛ pwadan matiyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka buayi jyek godan Juaŋ neeni bɛɛ.

Modg ɔɔn, kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ɛkɛ jyetci Juaŋti, ɔci kan ɛkɛ noŋi ne pwadan maka pookɛnti bɛɛyɛ, oŋ a ɔɔn yɔmdi a ɔki? Jyenna ɛkɛ jyeti Juaŋti neeni yɔmjin boki? Ɛkɛ yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ a ɔɔn boki? Ɛkɛ yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ te jwali jyeni budan kan naŋka pwadan baaw ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
Kan mod ɛkkɛ gɛɛl walla kow ɛkkɛ gɛɛl bɛɛn nona ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔti, ɔci kan bworŋ ɛkɛ yaañi ɔci waka amdɛ ɛkɛ oŋkanda moki bɔɔnjin,
ɔci kan i ɛkɛ ‘woñga genga bɛɛyɛ, jyeka guaŋŋi i ɛkɛti agi dala ɛkta ciedɔ ne pwadan, ɔci agi naa ɛkta nogda jwami bɛɛ, ɔci agi naa ɛkta amda koñ bɛɛ neeniyɛ, a jyeka budan.
Ɔci ba jyeka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyenna ikin jyettin Juaŋtiy. Kan jyeni bala parɛ ɔci kan naŋka pwadin baawyɛ, jyenna neeni a jyeka budan.

Men gɛɛl kaapun kɛkti te jyeka guaŋi ‘ya neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkti kaapun agi ma gɛɛg a maka balki jyenno, ɔci maka pookɛn daŋkun a maka noŋi naŋka pwadin, kan men gɛɛl bala gɔki a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya ṭwokca ɛkɛti a ɔŋŋi daŋkun agi, “Dala i ‘ya myetta poca, men gɛɛl yaakinti jyeddi Yaccuti ɔci naŋka pwadin dɔki baaw ɛkɛti a ɔki? Yeti ‘yayɛ, naŋki ‘ya naŋka pwadin jyenna ‘ya jyetta lɛɛltan bora.”

Ne ɛkkɛ jyettɛ gɔkɛ agi Juaŋ baalɔyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin. Yeti jwali jyeni ɛkkɛ wanna yɔmdi parɛ te gena? Tieŋdɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeecɔn jɔkin yeyin daŋkun agi ɛkta baalɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn buayi waakɛn ḍiedan ne tolan.
Hay! Ɛkkɛ ñingɔ tɛɛcin boki? Tieŋdɛ, ɛkkɛ myettin ‘ya te jyenna jyetki may. Kan jyeni bala parɛ ɔci naŋka pwadin baawyɛ, jyenna neeni yɔmjin te genga bɛɛ.
Gɔṭṭɛ, poca te jyek Wey ikin Abrahim neeni. Wey ikin Abrahim pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti te naŋka naŋŋi ɛkɛ oŋŋa ɛkɛ Juaŋ ‘wonnɛ kaci ɛkɛ Icaak ba gena ‘yɛrŋɛ ɛkɛ nona ɛrki ma waak bɛɛ?

Te naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin jyeni bala parɛ bɛɛ. Yeti jyeni bala yaakkɛn i naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka pwadan. Ne ɛkɛ noŋni naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, bala ba jyenna ɛkɛ jyetti Juaŋti neeni bɛɛn bora ne pwadan doki.

Te naŋka naŋŋɛ Abrahim neeniyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin worgaji bɛɛn bora doki, gena jyeka gɔki agi, “Abrahim jyeti Juaŋti, ɔci te jyenna ɛkɛ jyetti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti.” Ɔci ma boṭi Abrahim agi mug Jwaŋa Tolan.
Te jyeka neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin men gɛɛl pwada Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyeni ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ baltan naŋka pwadin daŋkun i jyenno.

Ɔci jyek Rahab ɛŋa toban bala a ɔɔn daŋkun. Wɔɔka gɛɛltiyɛ, maka cuuñɛ ma lɛɛl noon ban Jɛrikɔ bɛɛn on ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn maŋŋɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn cuuññɛ ɛkɛ te pɔya parɛ aŋka naa ɛkkɛn mwoktan ma ɔci noktan bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.

Bala ba kan boŋ tɛɛtin baaw mentiyɛ, mena neeni a tuuta doki. War ɛkɛ niin budan. Ɔci ba jyeka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyeni moki. Kan jyeni bala menti parɛ ɔci naŋka pwadan baawyɛ, jyenna neeni bala ba jyeka budan.
Naa maka coŋin ɛkkɛti aga maka loṭi ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan budan amaam ɔɔn bɛɛ. Acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ikin maka loṭin mayɛ, kan ikin domtin jiekyɛ, jiek tɛya ikin wyetkɔti ne pɛñan.

Ikin ma baan waakida a maka domi naŋka coŋin. Kan men gɛɛl gɔki jyeka yeyin oŋgati bɛɛyɛ, mena neeni a mena domi naŋki gɛɛl bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ loonin ñamu doki. Kan ɛkɛ yaakinti lɛmi ɛkɛ mugdɛyɔ ne pwadan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti daŋkun war ɛkɛ mugdɛyɔ warda.
Jyek muŋi lɛmmu neeni bala ba jyek muntan. Kan jiŋgin wiɛntin ikin muntan tukɛti acaan ikin buagin dala muntan noŋdi ba jyek ikinyɛ, jiŋgin yaakinti muntan mugdɛyɔ warda ɔci noŋdi ba jyek ikin.

Ɔci jyek lɛmmu moki bala ba jyek murka tolan. Murkan ḍwaŋinyɛ, ɛkkɛn ati ne pɛñan ne jwamma tolan baaliy. Ɔci te gɔmña ṭwokki ma ɛkkɛn waakɛn ḍiɛran neeniyɛ, murkan ḍwaŋin ati ba yom maka nɛɛyi ɛkkɛn neeni.

Ɔci lɛmmu mokiyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍiɛr ḍyɛro, yeti ɛkɛ gɔki jyeka ḍwaŋin bala ba mena yyɛcan. Ɔci jyek lɛmmu moki bala ba jyek maaño. Gɔṭṭɛ poca, kan piilñan ṭɔɔlɛ maañ piilñan ḍiɛran tontan ma lwoma tolantiyɛ, lwoma tolan neeni amdɛ ɛkɛ warda.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin waakɔyɛ, balki gena yaayan, gena lɛmmo. Ɔci waak ikin waakɛnda yiegdi te jyek lɛmmu neeni. Te jyek lɛmmu neeni ma buagɔn noŋdi ne yaayan, ɔci jyeka yeyin neeniyɛ, bɛya te bana maaño.

Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ daŋkun te jyek waka bala bora luomji a ywobk neeni, ma yaakinti ɛkkɛn mwoktan, waagga da te kɛɛnɛn, ɔci waagga da te kɛɛnɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn pirtan ma baanji, ɔci ɛkkɛn a ywobk moki bɛɛ. Waka neeniyɛ, gena leyi, ɔci ḍiirg, ɔci kogi, ɔci waka bala pietin waakɛnda.
Yeti lɛmmuyɛ, ɛkɛ yaayɛ a yuom ne tolan hay! Menga yaakinti lɛmmɛ agdiyɔ aŋka jyeka yeyin neeni baadi bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔki ne yaayan amaam budan, ɔci jyek ɛkɛ bala ba jan lieno.
Gɔṭṭɛ, te lɛmi ikin neeniyɛ, ikin gɔkin ne pwadan te Wey ikin mena Ciɛggɔn neeni. Ɔci te lɛmi ikin moki lɛmma ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, ikin ḍorin maka pookɛn waakɛn. Gena maka aŋŋɛ Juaŋ ba bolji ɛkɛy.
Jyeka pwadin neeni ɔci jyeka yeyin neeni ɛkkɛn bɛya bora te tuka ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniti. Modg ɔɔn, naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ naŋka neeni a ɔɔn bɛɛ! A’a, yaayɛ a ɔɔn.
Jina piegɛ pwadin ɔci jina piegɛ yeyinyɛ, ɛkkɛn piegɛn bɛya bora te nona ne cyɛɛlɔ boki? A’a.
Jan ŋuami yaakinti jieda toon ṭɔlgɛ boki? A’a. Ɔci luutkin yaakinti jieda ŋuami ṭɔlgɛ boki? A’a. Ɔci jina piegɛ bala ba eeñanyɛ, pyega pwadin bɛya bora te ɛkɛti boki? A’a.

Kan ma ɛkkɛ gɛɛg ñingɛn tɛy tɛy ɔci kan ɛkkɛn jiek ŋeecɔn ne pwadanyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi naŋka pwadin te yoma pwadan, naa ɛkkɛn noŋi ba maka yyɛcin bɛɛ. Te naŋki ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ŋeettan ma naŋka neeni bala ba naŋki maka ñingɛn tɛyan awarɛ.

Yeti kan ɛkkɛ korkɔ cyɛy cyɛy ɔci korkɔ modɔ ne pɛñan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛ ṭiewɛ te waak a ɔɔnyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔki agi ñing tɛɛn bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ yookɛ te jyeka awarɛ no.
Ñing tɛɛn guaŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, bɛɛn te ñaalɔ bɛɛ, bɛɛn te iñɔ ṭɛɛrji a ñing tɛɛn ma baan budan. Ɔci ɛkɛ a ñing tɛɛn Juaŋ bɛɛ, gena ñing tɛɛn Jwaŋa Yaayan.
Kan ma korkɛn modɔ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn ṭiewɔ te waakyɛ, jyek ɛkkɛn a jyek laño, ɔci naŋka yeyin bala coŋɔ.

Ñing tɛɛna bɛya te ñaalɔyɛ, da parɛ. Maka balki ñing tɛɛn neeniyɛ, poŋi jyeka yeyin bɛɛ. Coodi ɛkkɛn pwad pwado. Ɛkkɛn ṭiewɔ te waak bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn yeyɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn gɔki ne pɛñan mati bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn tyeŋi jiek ne pwadan. Yomg ɛkkɛn bala mati ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ne pwadan oŋkanda. Jyek ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ma ñingɛn bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛn a maka yɔŋi jiek maka pookɛnti aŋka ma cootɛ te pwaniy, ɔci te naŋki ɛkkɛn mati neeniyɛ, ma noŋdi naŋka pwadin naŋka Juaŋ buagɛy.
Jyek lañ ɔci jyek ṭiewin bɛɛn te aŋɛ ɛkkɛti? Jyeka neeni bɛɛn te yomg ɛkkɛti, acaan yomg ɛkkɛ noowɔ jiju te jyek bwakti waako.

Ne ɛkkɛ buagɛ waak ɔci waak baaki ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ nokkɛ ma te bwakti waako. Acaan ne ɛkkɛ korkɔ motki te wak maka pookɛn ɔci ne ɛkkɛ yaakɛti genga eedɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ ṭiewɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ noowɛ wanna. Yeti waak gɛɛg baaw ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ toonnɛ Juaŋti te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
Ɔci oŋkanda ne ɛkkɛ toocɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti te waakyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ buagɛ waka neeni te yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ budan.

Hay ɛkkɛ maka jyetcin ɔntɔ nɛ, ŋeejɛ agi ne mena ani jyeka iñɔ baanji wɛnni naŋki ɛkɛ yaayɛ Juaŋti ne pɛñan bɛɛ? Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, mena ani jyeka iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mug Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a mena yoyi ñin i Juaŋo.
Ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi jyeka worgaji neeni a jyeka budan ne Jiek gɔkki agi, “Boŋa ikin ‘wonninti Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ konɛ motcin ne pɛñan.”

Yeti yom pwani ikin ‘wontinti Juaŋ neeni, ɛkɛ aŋka tɛɛcin ne tolan te kon monno. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu agi, “Kan ma kooŋi waakɛn agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, Juaŋ kɛkti te ɛkkɛn. Yeti maka poŋi yomgɛnti agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka ḍyɛrinyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwada pwani gena ɛkkɛnti.”
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda, ɔci Jwaŋa Yaayan kaaktɛti ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ kwaya te ɛkkɛti.

Dala ɛkkɛ ortɛti Jwaŋa Tolanti ɔci ɛkɛ daŋkun ortiti ɛkkɛti. Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛ agɛ nɔɔtko, ɔci naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ yaayanyɛ, dala lɛgdɛ ɛkkɛ jitin. Hay! Ɛkkɛ maka noŋi waakɛn te ma ñingɛn budan nɛ, dala ɛkkɛ nɔji daldɛ te naŋki yomgɔti.

Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ wiakti awarɛ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi te nɔji ɛkkɛ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ wiaktɛ! Naa ɛkkɛ lɛɛṭɛ bɛɛ, yeti dala ɛkkɛ wiaktɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔyɔ bɛɛ, yeti dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi te nɔji ɛkkɛ!
Naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba maka yomgɛn ḍwaŋin Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba maka yomgɛn ḍyɛrin, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ magdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.

Modg ɔɔn, naa ɛkkɛ woowɛ yɔtin pookɔ bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl wooki mod ɛkkɛn men Kiṭɔ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ gɔki agi naŋki ɛkta neeni yaayɔyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkɛ wooki jyek ganuun, ɔci a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkɛ gɔki agi jyek ɛkɛ aŋka pwadgɔ te jyek ganuun. Kan i noŋja a ɔɔnyɛ, i tiec jyek ganuun waakɛn bɛɛ, yeti i waru naŋŋi a mena jiek oldɛ ma wyetkɛnti.

Ciɛggɔn godan gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ. Gena Jwaŋa Tolan mena ma ‘wonnɛ jyek ganuun. Ɔci gena ɛkɛ aŋka yaakinti gɔkti mati agi dala men uddɔ walla agi dala ɛkta tuudɔ. Oŋ i gɔk i aŋka a menɛ yeti ne i wooki mod ɛkkɛ a ɔɔn wan hay, muka maam?
Gɔṭṭɛ wɛnni poca, ɛkkɛ maka gɔki agi, acca walla ne liidɔ ɔɔn ooddɔn bana parɛti, ɔci ciedɔn aŋan ywoni ne cyɛɛlɔ aŋka ɔɔn cɔtɔn waak aŋka bilk bɛya ɔɔntiy.
Naŋka bɛya ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti ne liidɔ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ? Coodi ɛkkɛ bala a ɔki? Coodi ɛkkɛ bala ba wiew ne baali ne ḍyɛṭ ṭɔɔlɛ ɔci baadi dokiy.
Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka gɔktɛ agi, “Kan Juaŋ buagɔn ɔɔn ciedɔn noŋdɔn a ɔɔn ne liidɔyɛ, ɔɔn noŋdɔn a ɔɔn.”
Naŋki ɛkkɛ yeti bala ba naŋki maka yyɛcin. Ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ amaam budan bala ba ne ɛkkɛ jiek ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki no. Ɔci yyɛji ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, pwatcin bɛɛ, yaayɛ.
Kan men gɛɛl jyeka pwadin ŋeejɛ oŋ yeti ɛkɛ noŋi ba jyeka neeni bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn gena nɔjjo.
Tieŋdɛ hay! Ɛkkɛ maka ciyi baan konɛti maka waakɛn coŋin, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ wiakti te taab bala bɛya ɛkkɛti ne baaṭi neeni.
Wak ɛkkɛ waka coŋin neeni yiegin doki. Bworŋin ɛkkɛ amɛ ḍillan doki.

Ɔci dahab ɛkkɛ ɔci bil pɔdda moki, ɛkkɛn aŋi dalŋaañan doki. Ɔci te oŋ godan ɛkkɛyɛ, jyek dalŋaañan neeni bɛya bora, ɔci jiek tɛya acaan waak ḍuaññɛ ɛkkɛ amaam budan. Ɔci te oŋŋa bɛya wannayɛ, jiek pɛñ pɛñ ɛkkɛti bala ba maaño.
Gɔṭṭɛ! Maka ɛṭi pok ɛkkɛyɛ, bilk ɛkkɛn ammɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Ɔci jyek bilka neeni waakɛn coktan bɛɛ, bɛya bora. Jyek maka ɛṭi pok neeniyɛ, tieŋnɛ Ciɛggɔn Tolan doki.
Iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, wak ɛkkɛ kɔɔna kɔɔnno, ɔci oŋkanda ɛkkɛ balgɛ lieṭɛ waka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔtɛy, ɛkkɛ waakɔ caaŋŋɛ te waak balgɛ ba moldin oomi ma aŋka noktan te iidy.
Ɛkkɛ maka pwadin neeniyɛ, jomnɛyɔ ɛkkɛ nonk godan agi ɛkki yiegɔ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti kɛkti genga ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.

Yeti hay, modg ɔɔn! Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ kɛɛddɛ Ciɛggɔn te yoma ñɔyan ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ɔɔn. Gɔṭṭɛ! Maka dwoki waakyɛ, te ñamu ɛkkɛn kɛɛy ñal ḍuoŋ tukɛ, ɔci ne baaṭi ɛkkɛn kɛɛy ywakṭi moki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ciyi kɛɛy pok te yoma ñɔyan ne pok ḍwaŋti ɔɔn.
Ɔci ɛkkɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun ciedɛ te yoma ñɔyan. Naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ genga bɛɛ. Acaan oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn bɛɛdiyɛ, cɔɔllin doki.
Modg ɔɔn, naa ɛkkɛ woowɛ yɔtin pookɔ bɛɛ. Kan mena wooki mena parɛyɛ, jiek bɛya ɛkɛ wyeñɛti. Ciɛggɔn Godan Tolan bala bɛya, bala pɔy tukɛti doki.
Dala ikin poŋtin te taab maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan maka bala gɔki mati te yenti Ciɛggɔnyɛ, taab ɛkkɛn tol tolo, yeti ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔyɔ men ɔɔn.

Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan maka yɔɔd ne tɛyanyɛ, ikin boṭin ɛkkɛn agi ɛkkɛn a maka yomgɛn ñɔyin. Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek Ayuub ne ɛkɛ baali yɔɔdi ne tɛyan ne taab baali ɛkɛti ne tolany. Ɛkɛ dalnɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ maŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ Juaŋ yomɛ a pɔkɔn mati, ɔci ɛkɛ ani ikin ne tolan.

Modg ɔɔn, jwalla tolan bala, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Naa ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ genga te yenti pɔlla ñaalɔ ɔci te yenti ṭɛra iñɔ ɔci te yenti menga bɛɛ.” Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ te jwali gɛɛlyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ ne pwadan agi, “Ɛɛ.” Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ yooktɛ te jwali gɛɛlyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ kɛktɛ ne pwadan agi, “A’a.” Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, jiek bɛya ɛkkɛ wyetkɔti bɛɛ.
Kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti balki taabyɛ, dala ɛkɛ cɔkti Juaŋti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Kan men gɛɛl yomɛ ñɔy ñɔyyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ‘ualdi ɔɔlg agi Juaŋ pwadɔ.
Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti warɛ yaayɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ borti cyekin kaniicati aŋka ɛkkɛn bɛya. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ñɔɔn oltan ɛkɛ wyeñɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn cɔkti Jwaŋa Tolanti te ɛkɛ.
Ɔci te jyenna jyetki Ma Kiṭɔti ne ɛkkɛn cɔkki ɛkɛti a ɔɔnyɛ, Juaŋ yaakinti mena warɛ yaayan neeniy ywaŋdɛ. Ɔci kan ɛkɛ balki nɔjiyɛ, ɛkɛ bɔɔktɛ Juaŋo.

Dala ɛkkɛ nɔji ɛkkɛ lɛɛldɛ bora modgɔti pookɔ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te maka pookɛn, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn daŋkun cɔkti Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ waakɔ pwaddi. Acaan kan men gɛɛl pwani Juaŋti doki ɔci kan ɛkɛ cɔkti Juaŋtiyɛ, Juaŋ yaakinti noŋdi naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka tɛyan.

Gɔṭṭɛ poca, te jyek cɔŋi neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek Iliiya. Iliiyayɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba ikin daŋkun ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala cɔki Juaŋti ne tolan te jyek ñaal agi naa ñaal bɛɛdɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci ñaal yɔɔni yuong ne ḍoogɔ ɔci ponk ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Ɔci ɛkɛ cɔkcin Juaŋti moki, ɔci ñaal bɛɛn ne tolan, ɔci waka amtin bɛɛn moki.
Modg ɔɔn, kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti jyetcin ɔntɔ te jyeka awarɛtiyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ dɔɔnɛti mena parɛ gɛɛlyɛ,
mena men dɔɔnɛti neeniyɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkɛ ne pwadan mena neeni yɔɔññɛ Juaŋo, ɔci ɛkɛ ḍakti moki bɛɛ, ɛkɛ bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ te nɔji ɛkɛ nɔjja coŋin neeni doki.

Gena ‘ya Butruc Cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ kiewan worga ɛkkɛti neeni. Ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔ Ma Yahuud maka bala ciyi a wɛlg bonka pookɛn neeni jitiny. Gena ban Buntɔc, ɔci ban Galatiya, ɔci ban Kapadociiya, ɔci ban Ecya, ɔci ban Bitinnya.

Ne ɛkkɛ baagɛ menyɛ, ɛkkɛ ŋeejɛ Wey ɔɔn Jwaŋa Tolan doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ muonɛ ɛkɛ bora. Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ ywaŋŋɛyɔ yomgɔti doki te Boŋ ɛkɛ. Acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ oŋkanda, ɔci dala yimg Yaccu ɛkkɛ ywaŋtɛ yomgɔti te nɔji ɛkkɛ. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwada pwani ɛkkɛti oŋkanda, ɔci dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ coodi pwanno.

Jwaŋa Tolan Jwaŋ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci Wey Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ pwad pwado. Ɛkɛ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ikinti ne tolan. Ɔci ikin jiennin ɛkɛ te jiedda woonɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, ikin jyettin kɛɛyin naŋki Juaŋ naŋka bɛya ikinti a naŋka pwadin neeni. Ikin yaakinti kɛɛyin a ɔɔn acaan Yaccu Kiṭɔ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki, ɔci ɛkɛ lien buannɛ.

Ɔci ba naŋki ma baan ne maal baali weegɛntiyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ kɛɛgin wɛɛddɛ maalo, ɔci bala ba naŋki Juaŋ daŋkun. Mala ma ‘wondɛ ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ñaalɔ pɔliji daŋkun. Ɛkkɛn ḍuannɛ Juaŋ te ɛkkɛ. Mala aŋan neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yiegdi bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn aga donk bɛɛ.

Te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti neeniyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan bala yuoci ɛkkɛ oŋkanda te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ɛkɛ oŋkanda ne oŋŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdi ɔɔn. Ɔci ne oŋŋa ookti bɛya ne ŋoyɔyɛ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛya, ɔci jyek yɔɔd baadi doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ dɛttɛ coodda pwadan doki.

Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ciyɛ te yoma ñɔyan acca ne taabn balki ɛkkɛti ɔɔn. Taabn neeniyɛ, jitkɛn a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ. Yeti taab neeni bala oŋkanda bɛɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi te taab neeni wɔɔka ne ḍuulan ṭɔɔlɛ budan.

Taab bala ɛkkɛti neeni poci jyeni ɛkkɛ a poccin, ne jyeni ɛkkɛ agi jyenna awarɛ boki no. Ɔci naŋka neeni bala ba ma ne pocki dahaby. Dahab piɛltan ma maccu aŋka ɛkkɛn gɔrti ne ɛkɛ pwadi awarɛ boki no. Dahab ɛkɛ a gena iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni budan, ɔci jyeni ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka pwatcin ne tolan nɔñji Juaŋti te dahab. Yeti bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, Juaŋ poci jyeni ɛkkɛ te taab neeni. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ne oŋŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdiyɛ, jyeka pwadin bɛya ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ jieddi ɛkkɛ ɔci ɛkɛ andi ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ɛkɛ pwaddɛ a pwadgin.

Yaccu yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ baali iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkɛ ne tolan. Yeti ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ yuartɛ te woŋgɔ acca bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ɛkɛti men ɔɔn. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan te yom ñɔɔna menga yaakinti konɛ gɔɔdɛ bora ne pwadan bɛɛ neeni.
Ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔyɔ a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ te baaṭi doki agi ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ Yaccu, ɔci acca ɛkɛ yuarnɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ baali yuoci ɛkkɛ dokiy.
Maka a bɔwan bala gɔki te baaṭi te jyek yɔɔta yuoci Juaŋ ɛkkɛy. Ɛkkɛn ma myetkɛ agi Juaŋ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛti yom pwanno. Ɛkkɛn bala poŋi te jyeka neeni, ɔci bala tooci agi ma yɔɔdda Juaŋ te pɔya bɛ?

Boŋ Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala gɔki ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti te Kiṭɔ agi ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, taab ɛkɛ bala. Ɔci ne taab baadiyɛ, naŋka pwadin oŋ bɛya oŋo. Ɔci bɔwan neeni bala tooci te jyek Kiṭɔ mena bɛya yuoci ma neeni agi ɛkta agi menɛ katan, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tooci agi ɛkta bɛɛdɔ ne tua?

Ɔci jiek lɛɛlnɛ Juaŋ bora maka bɔwan neeniti, agi naŋka neeni bɛya ne cwakanti ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ, yeti agi bɛɛdɔ ne baaṭi te yuonga ciyɛ ɛkkɛ neeni. Ɔci acca jyeka neeni bɛɛn bora ne pwadan. Ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ lalkɛ te war tɛɛn Boŋ Juaŋo. War tɛɛn Boŋ Juaŋ cuonnɛ Juaŋ ɛkkɛnti te ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci acca jyek yɔɔd Juaŋ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan. Malɛɛkanyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn yɔɔta neeni jiñɛ yuartan daŋkun.

Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te paŋŋa paŋdɛ ɛkkɛ oŋkanday. Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ tiidɛ ne pwadan aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋɛ kanŋa Juaŋti. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ oŋkanda te jyek naŋka naŋdɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛti, ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ɔɔn. Naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka pwadan neeniyɛ, naŋdɛ ɛkɛ te yom ɛkɛ parɛ yoma bɔwan.

Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek Jwaŋa Tolan acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin ɛkɛ woodgɛn. Naa ɛkkɛ moki noŋdɛ ba naŋka yeyin naŋka yomg ɛkkɛ buagɛ te baaṭi ne wona ɛkkɛ men Juaŋ kwoyɛ wanna bɛɛ. Te ñamu ne Juaŋ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ naŋka yeyin naŋka yomg ɛkkɛ buagɛ ne tolan te baaṭi neeni.
Jwaŋa Tolan mena ɛkkɛ bornɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ da parɛ. Ɛkɛ pwad pwado. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala naŋki ɛkkɛ pwadɔ oŋkanda daŋkun.
A ɔɔn bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Acaan ‘ya pwadyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun pwaddɛ.”

Oŋkanda ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ cɔkɛ Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ boṭɛ ɛkɛ agi Wey ɛkkɛ, ɔci acca a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ ṭɛɛr wyeñɛti a ɔɔnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ ne pwadan te naŋki ɛkkɛ. Mena bardɛ ɛkkɛ a Wey ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋdi godan ɛkkɛti, menga da te naŋki ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da te naŋki ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ jiek gwaldɛ jitin ne pwadan waakɛnda.

Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛ a ɔɔn acaan te baaṭi ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ba ganuun yɔrg ɛkkɛ, ɔci ba naŋki yɔrg ɛkkɛ moki. Yeti ɛkkɛ koonɛ Juaŋ bora te naŋka budan neeniti. Ɛkkɛ wonnɛ Juaŋ bora te coodi yɔɔrti te bil pɔdda walla te dahab bɛɛ. Waka neeni baadi budan.
Ɛkkɛ wannɛ Juaŋ te yimg Kiṭɔ yimga pwadin. Ɛkɛ nogɛ ma te ikin bala ba kalŋ ṭɔɔlɛ pwadan Kalŋ ṭɔɔlɛ ‘yɛri ma te nɔjiy. Ɛkɛ bala ba kalŋa balkɛ gena yaayan gɛɛl warɛti bɛɛy.
Jyek lyen Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te baaṭi ne ṭɛɛr baawi meny. Ɔci acca jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛn bora doki ne pwadan. Ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora ɛkkɛti doki te ninka ṭɛɛr noŋi wyeñɛ baldi neeni.
Te naŋki Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Jwaŋa Tolan mena ɛkɛ luolnɛ ñaalɔ te lienti ɔci ‘wonnɛ pwani neeni. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti ɔci balgɛ kɛɛyɛ pwanna bɛya ne baaṭiy.
Ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba jyek Juaŋ awarɛ. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, aŋka yomg ɛkkɛ pwatki te naŋka neeni wanna. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala yomg ɛkkɛ pwadɔ modg ɛkkɛti. Dala ɛkkɛ andɛ ɛkkɛn ne tolan.

Acaan ɛkkɛ jiennɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te jiedda woonɛ doki. Jiedi ɛkkɛ jiedda woonɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ maka wonkɛn. Jiedda neeniyɛ, a jiedi ma baan bɛɛ. Jiedda ma jiettiti ma te jiedi ma baanyɛ, ma baadi. Yeti jiedda ma jieddɛ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ma baadi bɛɛ. Jyek Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyeka tɛɛtki may. Ɔci jyeka neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ.
A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Ma baan waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba luom budan, ɔci ɛkkɛn pwanna pwani ba pɛɛppin luom jitin budan. Luomyɛ, iwa, ɔci pɛɛppin ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ.
Yeti Jyek Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka bala yuonginda ɔɔn.” Jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jyeka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ may.
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ mwondɛ te yom yoñ waakɛnda, ɔci te jomi jiek waakɛnda, ɔci te naŋka noŋi ɛkkɛ ma ñingɛn waakɛnda, ɔci te kon moni waakɛnda, ɔci te waaŋi jiek waakɛnda.

Ba bolji kɛɛgin jiettan ma wonkɛn ne ɛkkɛn buagiti aak ne pɛñanyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun bwagdɛ jyek Juaŋ a ɔɔn, acaan jyek ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, pwadɔ. Gena yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci te jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu te jyek yɔɔt Juaŋ yɔɔta ɛkɛ yuoci ma neeniy.
Ɛkkɛ dɛnnɛ jyek ɛkɛ doki. Ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ Juaŋ pwad pwado.
Dala ɛkkɛ ortɛti Yaccuti. Ɛkɛ tɛɛti. Ɛkɛ bala ba guonan tuotan maka cɔti oorgy. Yeti ɛkɛ a mena muonɛ Juaŋ boray. Ɛkɛ pwad pwad Juaŋti ne tolan.

Ɔci ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba gwoyya cɔti Boŋ Juaŋ on Jwaŋa Tolany. Ɛkɛ buagɔn ɛkkɛ agdɛ gaciicin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci noŋdɛ kanŋa gaciicin. Ɔci jwalla neeni kon ɛkɛ agi ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ‘wondɛ waka ‘yɛrdɛ ɛkkɛ a wak naŋki Boŋ Juaŋo. Juaŋ ‘wondɛ ɛkkɛ waka neeni te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci gena naŋka Juaŋ buagɛ wanna.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka kiigin gɔki te Yaccu Kiṭɔ agi, “‘Ya guonan ḍuacca ban Urcaliimji. Gena guonan mwowwan ‘ya bora a guonan cɔtki ma on pwadany. Maka jyeddi guonan neenitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn lɔɔddi bɛɛ.”

Ɛkkɛ maka jyettɛ Yaccutiyɛ, Yaccu pwanna pwani ɛkkɛti. Yeti maka jyeti bɛɛyɛ, jyek Yaccu pwad pwad ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Guonan guaktan maka cɔti oorg agi ɛkta yaayɔ neeniyɛ, agi ɛkta aŋŋɔ guonan pwadɔ on wardanti.”

Ɔci jyeka kiigin gɔki moki agi, “Guonan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn twordɛ awarɛ. Ɔci ma gɔkti agi ɛkta yaayɔ.” Ma twordɛ guonan neeni acaan ɛkkɛn jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ tiitanyɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci te tworŋa ɛkkɛn twordɛ guonan a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te ɛkkɛn te baaṭi dokiy.

Yeti ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora naŋŋɛ a kɛɛna ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkkɛ agɛ gaciicin Mena Ciɛggɔn Tolan ñaalɔ. Kɛɛn ɛkkɛ da parɛ. Ɛkkɛ agɛ ma Jwaŋa Tolan woodgɛn. Ɛkkɛ muonɛ ɛkɛ bora a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ maka pookɛn myettɛ te naŋka pwadin naŋki mena ɛkkɛ bornɛ neeni. Ɛkkɛ oonɛ ɛkɛ bora te nona mielti. Ɔci acca ɛkkɛ ciyɛ non ɛkɛ nona bɔwan ne yaajan neeniti.
Te ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ maka budan, ɔci acca ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ ma Jwaŋa Tolan. Te ñamu yom pɔkkin Juaŋ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛ. Yeti acca yom pɔkkin ɛkɛ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki.

Maka ana ‘yay, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ acca iñɔ baanji wɛnni ba maka wɛlgo! Dala ɛkkɛ yooktɛ te naŋki maka pookɛn ne ɛkkɛn noŋki ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn buagiti noŋti ne pɛñany. Naŋka neeniyɛ, ma yomgɛn lɛɛktan te ɛkkɛn.

Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan bonk maka ciyi budan jyek Juaŋ kuokɔn neeni jitin. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛn wooki ɛkkɛ ne pɛñan agi naŋki ɛkkɛ yiegɔyɛ, dala naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka pwadan yuartan ɛkkɛn te woŋgɛn, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ne oŋŋa godan Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkkɛn jieddi Juaŋo.
Acaan ne ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka naŋɛ ma a maka ḍwaŋin akuumati neeni waakɛnda. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ḍuaŋa akuuma ḍuaŋa tolan, acaan ɛkɛ bala ñamu te ma akuuma waakɛnda.

Ɔci maka ḍuaŋan ṭɔlgɛnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ɛkkɛn daŋkun. Ḍuaŋan ṭɔlgɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn cundɛ ḍuaŋa tolan bonk jitin aŋka goddan maka naŋki yeyiny. Ɔci maka naŋki ɛkkɛn pwadinyɛ, ḍuaŋan ṭɔlgɛn gɔkti ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti.
Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan oŋkanda. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka wooki ɛkkɛ amaam maka jiek kwoyɔn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti gɔkti genga ɛkkɛti moki bɛɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba maka pɔŋnɛ Juaŋy, naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba yomg ɛkkɛ budan pookɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛnk Juaŋo. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ɛkɛ.
Dala ɛkkɛ andɛ ma waakɛnda. Dala ɛkkɛ andɛ modg ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ buattɛ Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci dala moki ɛkkɛ buattɛ ḍuaŋa ɛkkɛ ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔm neeni.
Maka kɛɛnko, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek weyi ɛkkɛ. Kanŋa weyyɛn, kan ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ ɛkkɛti, ɔci walla kan jyek ɛkkɛn tɛy tɛy ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ buattɛ ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
Kan taab bala mena kɛɛngɔn mena pwadanti amaam te naŋki weegɛn ne ɛkɛ noŋŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan kɛɛngɔn neeni bala poŋi te Juaŋ men ɔɔnyɛ, Juaŋ yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkɛti.

Kan i ḍuati ma te naŋka naŋŋi i yaayan neeniyɛ, ɔci kan i yomu tieŋni te ḍuana i ḍuakiti ma neeniyɛ, yom tiekin i neeni a genga boki? A’a. Yeti kan i baal noŋ ne pwadan, ɔci i eekti ma taab te naŋka naŋŋi i pwadin neeniyɛ, kan i yomu tieŋni men ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pɔktɛ iti.
Ɛkkɛ bornɛ Juaŋ ɔci ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ coodda tɛyan neeni aŋka coodi ɛkkɛ bala ba coodi Yaccu daŋkun. Ɛkɛ warɛ eejjin te ɛkkɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba coodi ɛkɛ daŋkun. Dala ɛkkɛ boottɛ ɛkɛti.
Yaccuyɛ, ne ɛkɛ baalɛ ciyi ṭɛɛrji wɛnni menyɛ, naŋka yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Jyeka jomgin bala ɛkɛ tukɛti oŋgati bɛɛ.
Ne ma balki ḍorki ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ men gɛɛl ḍaarŋiyɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci moki ne ma balki noŋki ne yaayan ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin jwali gɛɛl ne yaayan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ yomɛ ḍuannɛ aŋa Jwaŋa Tolanti mena noŋi godan ne pwadany.
Nɔji ikin eññɛ Kiṭɔ kakanti, aŋka ikin yaakinti mwontin te nɔji ikin, ɔci ikin yaakinti cietin noŋtin naŋka pwadin. Te taab bɛɛn ɛkɛ warɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ ywaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ doki.
Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba kulin ne jyecki ɔntɔy. Ɔci acca ɛkkɛ dɔɔnɛti Kiṭɔ mena gɔṭi ɛkkɛ ba Ḍɛɛnɔn ɛkkɛ neeni.
Maka moongo, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛ. ‘Uay ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg jyeti jyek Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.

Yeti kan ɛkkɛn gɔrti naŋka pwadan ɛkkɛti ne ɛkkɛ waakɔ dɔɔdɛ iñɔ buayɛ ɛkkɛn oŋkandayɛ, ɛkkɛn buagdɛ jyek Juaŋ daŋkun. Ɛkkɛn dita jyeddi te jyeka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛnti a jyek Juaŋ te tuggɔ wanna bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛn gɔrti gena naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka pwadan, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeddi.
Naa ɛkkɛ anɛ ywaŋi waaka bora budan aŋka ma gɔṭi ɛkkɛ pwannɛ a pwadgin a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Gena waka ba pani jyeyi, ɔci waka ‘yɛŋgan ma a waka naŋɛ ma te dahab, ɔci bworŋin pwadin.

Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka pwaddɛ a pwadgin aŋa yomgɔti. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka tuggɛn luyan. Waka yɔŋki ma waakɛn ba dahab ɔci pani jyeyi ɔci bworŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn baadi. Yeti yoma pwadan neeni, ɛkɛ baadi bɛɛ. Yoma pwadan neeni pwad pwad Juaŋti ne tolan.
Te baaṭi moonga pwadin maka jyeti Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwanna pwani te tuk luun te yom pwani ɛkkɛn neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tyeŋi jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛn ne pwadan.

A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba naŋki Caara ɛŋ Abrahim. Ɛŋ Abrahimyɛ, ‘war ɛkɛ barŋɛ ɛkɛ agi, “Ciɛggɔn.” Ɔci ɛkkɛ hay moongo, kan ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba naŋki Caara, ɔci kan ɛkkɛ buayɛ genga bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ agdɛ moonga pwadin Juaŋ ñamɛti ba Caara awarɛ.

Ɔci ɛkkɛ maka ‘uay daŋkun, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ ne pwadan te moong ɛkkɛ. Ɛkkɛn waakɛn tɛɛcin ba ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛ agɛ maka ne cyɛɛlɔ te tɛɛtin ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeniy. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ andɛ moong ɛkkɛ, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, aŋka cɔŋi ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ Juaŋo.
Ɛkkɛ waakidayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ te paŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te modg ɛkkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin pookɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwada mati. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ tuggɔ luya.

Kan men gɛɛl noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ɛkɛti ne yaayan bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛ ḍardɛyɔyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ yettɛ ḍardɛyɔ bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl ḍor ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ Juaŋti aŋka Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan ɛkɛti, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan ɛkkɛti daŋkun.
Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Kan men gɛɛl buagɔn ciyi tɛɛti te yoma ñɔyan ɔci kan buagɔn coodda pwadanyɛ, naa jyeka yeyin bala ɛkɛ tukɛti bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkɛ jomi jiek bɛɛ.
Dala ɛkɛ warɛ yaldɛ ɔntɔ te naŋka yeyinti neeni. Dala ɛkɛ noŋdi naŋka pwadin. Dala ɛkɛ lieṭi pɔya ɛkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ pɔy yuardɛyɛ, dala pɔya neeni mugdɛ ɛkɛ ne pwadan.
Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan bala gɔṭi maka pwadin. Ɔci ɛkɛ jyetkɛ a pɔggin, ɔci ɛkɛ tieŋdi ne ɛkkɛn cɔkti ɛkɛti. Yeti Jwaŋa Tolan yooktan te maka yeyin.”
Kan ɛkkɛ yomgɔ buagɔn naŋka pwadin ne pɛñany, a menɛ noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiy?
Yeti kan taab bɛya ɛkkɛti te naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka pwadinyɛ, Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan ɛkkɛti. Naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ maka noŋi ne yaayan ɛkkɛti neeni bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ jiek yomgɔti bɛɛ.

Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ naŋki Kiṭɔ yomgɔti agi ɛkta agdɔ Ciɛggɔn Tolɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ ywaŋdɛ oŋkanda aŋka ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ṭwoktɛ mena tootti ɛkkɛti te jyek kɛɛna kɛɛyɛ ɛkkɛ Juaŋ yomgɔti neeni. Yeti dala ɛkkɛ ṭwoktɛ maka neeniti te yoma pwadan ɔci ne maalan.
Naa jwalla yaayan gɛɛl niindi ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, kan ma wooki ɛkkɛyɛ, ɔci ne ɛkkɛn gɔrtɛ coodda ɛkkɛ ciyɛ te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, ne baaṭi waaŋi ɛkkɛn neeni aga lɔɔn ɛkkɛnti.
Kan men gɛɛl balki taab te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka pwadin neeni ba yom Juaŋ a ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin ne tolan te taab bɛya ɛkɛti te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka yaayan neeniy.

Taab Kiṭɔyɛ, bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, ɛkɛ balki taab te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka pwadan. Ɛkɛ tuun oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ te nɔji ma waakɛnda. Mena pwadan neeni tuun te maka yeyin, aŋka ikin ootin ɛkɛ Juaŋti. War ɛkɛ tuun yeti boŋ ɛkɛ aŋka bala tɛɛti men.
Ɔci te boŋ ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ɔci ‘yeeñga bala ciyi ciginji bana maañ neeni lallɛ te jyek Juaŋo.

’Yeeñga bala ciginji neeni, gena ‘yeeñg maka jyek Juaŋ bɛɛyɛji te baaṭi ne Nɔwa baali cɔti murka tolany. Jwaŋa Tolan bala kɛɛy ɛkkɛn. Ɛkɛ looñi ɛkkɛnti ne pɛñan bɛɛ. Nɔwa bala noŋi murka. Ɔci ma gɛɛg tieŋŋin jiek ne ḍiɛkan ṭɔlgɛn budan ba ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ. Ɛkkɛn aŋka yɔɔññɛ Juaŋ te piego.

Bala ba Nɔwa ne unni te piegyɛ, bala a ɔɔn daŋkun te ɛkkɛ ne oŋŋa ɛkkɛ buulkɛ mayɛ, ɛkkɛ unnɛ doki te yɔɔta ɛkkɛ yɔɔññɛ Juaŋ te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ ne ɛkɛ jɔŋni ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti mokiy. Jyek bulti neeniyɛ, gena jyek lɔŋ ma waakɛn te giikin bɛɛ. Ne ma bultiti mayɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkkɛn gɔkti Juaŋti agi dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwaddɔ.

Ne Yaccu jɔŋni ñaalɔ te lientiyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci acca ɛkɛ bala ciyi Jwaŋa Tolan taaŋɛti taaŋŋa byerɔn. Ɔci malɛɛkan waakɛnda bala noŋi ba jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci war tɛɛn boŋki ɔci jɔkin waakɛnda bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛti.

Kiṭɔ warɛ taabbin ne tolan te ɛkkɛ. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ yooktɛ te taab bɛɛ. Dala paŋi ɛkkɛ bala ba paŋi Kiṭɔ, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ waakɔ tɛya. Kan men gɛɛl taabbin ne tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ mwonnin te nɔji ɛkɛ awarɛ.
Acca a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔci oŋkanda ne ñamu ɔɔnyɛ, dala coodda ciyɛ ɛkkɛ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni neeni ‘wondɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bieŋɛti, naa ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ba naŋka ma baan yomgɛn buagiti bɛɛ.

Te baaṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ba naŋki maka ciyi budan Juaŋ kwoyɔn neeni. Naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn moki bɛɛ. Naŋki ɛkkɛ te baaṭi neeniyɛ, gena jyek paŋi tomi ɛkkɛ yomgɔti, ɔci nooŋi mooyo, ɔci naŋki tomi waakɛnda. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ naŋka yeyin jitkɛn ne coŋɔn te mali jɔkin yeyin neeni.
Ɔci acca ma korkɛn buañi, acaan ɛkkɛ yookɛ te naŋka yaayan neeni iki ɛkkɛn. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn wooki ɛkkɛ.
Yeti ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyek naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni ootan bora Jwaŋa Tolan mena noŋi godanti. Mena neeni noŋdi godan maka ciyi ñaalɔ acca, ɔci maka tuutan daŋkun.

Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, aŋka maka tuun te baaṭi lalkɛti ma te jyek Juaŋ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin wanna. Waak ɛkkɛn ḍakcin ba lyen ma waakɛnda. Yeti boŋ ɛkkɛn bala tɛɛti men te tɛɛtin Juaŋo. Ɔci Juaŋ noŋdi godan ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda.
Oŋ coodda iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, wyeñɛ noŋi cɔɔldi doki. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ paŋi ɛkkɛ ywaŋdɛyɔ ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te coodi ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti cɔktɛ a cɔŋi oŋkanda ɔɔn.
Naŋka pwadan te naŋka pookɛnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin pookɔ oŋkanda ne tolan. Mena ani mayɛ, ɛkɛ ma bɔɔktɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛn nɔjja naŋtan ɛkkɛn coŋin neeni.
Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwadɔ Ma Kiṭɔ maka wɛlgti, naa ɛkkɛ korkɔ ŋuurŋan te waka amtan ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.

Ɛkkɛ waakida ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan kanŋan jitkɛn ne coŋɔn, menga da te kanŋa ɛkɛ, menga da te kanŋa ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala naŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeni kandɛ ne pwadan aŋka dala ɛkkɛ moowɛ yɔtin pookɔ te yom pwani ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeni.

Gɔṭṭɛ poca, kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti loṭi mayɛ, dala ɛkɛ gɔkti mati te jyeka Juaŋ buagiti ɛkɛ loṭi may. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl moki ma te kanŋa parɛ gɛɛlyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba war tɛɛn Juaŋ daŋkun. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ naŋki ɛkkɛ waakɛnda te war tɛɛn Juaŋo, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ma jieddi Juaŋ te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Dala ɛkɛ jiɛtan ma yuonginda yuonginda ɔɔn. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ aga mena tolan yuonginda yuonginda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.

Maka ana ‘yay, naa ɛkkɛ korkɔ buaya noon ne taab pɛñan ba maañ neeni gɛɛl bɛɛdɛ ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ toottɛ agi taab neeni bala a ɔki a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Taab neeni bala aŋka Jwaŋa Tolan gɔrti ɛkkɛ, ne ɛkkɛ yomgɔ balki a ɔkiy.
Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka yomgɔ ñɔya ne ɛkkɛ ñoowɛ iki Yaccu te taab ɛkɛy. Kan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ yuartan ma ne ɛkɛ pwanni a pwaniy, ɔci ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya a ñɔɔn ne tolan.
Kan ma wooki ɛkkɛ te yenti Kiṭɔyɛ, Juaŋ ɛkkɛ magdɛ, ɔci Boŋ ɛkɛ Boŋa pwadan neeniyɛ, bala ɛkkɛti.

Kan taab ɛkkɛ balayɛ, naa taab neeni bala ɛkkɛti te naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka yeyin bɛɛ, ɔci walla te nooŋi ma bɛɛ, ɔci walla moki te kali waak bɛɛ, ɔci walla moki te luupcin menga tukɛ luuptɛ jyek maka pookɛnti bɛɛ.
Yeti kan men gɛɛl balki taab acaan ɛkɛ a men Kiṭɔyɛ, naa ɛkɛ yomɛ wiakti poŋi agi taab neeni a lɔɔn bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ gɔkti mati te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni men ɔɔn. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ jieddi Juaŋo.

Oŋŋa Jwaŋa Tolan noŋdi godan mati bɛɛn doki. Ɛkɛ bala noŋi godan acca ma ɛkɛti ñamu. Ɔci kan godan ɛkɛ tɛɛcin ikin Ma Kiṭɔtiy, oŋ maka yookɔn te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin pɔya yooŋti ɛkkɛn ɔntɔ te ywobji ɛkɛti bala boki? A’a.
A ɔɔn bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Maka pwadinyɛ, kan jyek yɔɔt ɛkkɛn tɛy tɛyyɛ, oŋ maka yookɔn te Juaŋ ɔci maka noŋi ne yaayan pɔya ɛkkɛn yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ bala wɛnɛ?”
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan ma balki taab ba yom Juaŋyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi naŋka pwadin. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛn waak ɛkkɛn ‘wontan Juaŋ bieŋɛti, acaan Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ a Mena oki waako, ɔci ɛkɛ wak ɛkɛ daldɛ bɛɛ.

Cyekin kaniica, ‘ya ṭey ɛkkɛ. ‘Ya a ciɛggɔn kaniica ba ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci ‘ya a mena Kiṭɔ yuarŋɛ ne taab baali ɛkɛtiy. Ɔci moki ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ naŋdɛ Juaŋ pwada pwanno, ɔci pwani ɛkɛ neeni bɛya ‘yati daŋkun.

Maka bala kaniican ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔṭɛ ɛkkɛn ne pwadan. Ɛkkɛn bala ba kulin Juaŋo. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ kanŋa neeni te yoma pwadan, naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ kanŋa te yoma baaw ba ɛkkɛ iirkɛ ma a iirŋ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ kanŋa neeni te waka bɛya ɛkkɛti a bilk a waka budan neeni bɛɛ. Naŋka neeni a lɔɔno. Dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ acaan ɛkkɛ buagɛ ma magdɛ a maŋŋo.
Naa ɛkkɛ menga iirdɛ a iirŋ kaniicaji te coodi ɛkkɛ byeŋkɔti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan mati aŋka ɛkkɛn lɔkti ba naŋki ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba ḍɛɛnin kulin.

Kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan Ma Kiṭɔti a ɔɔnyɛ, ne mena tolan mena a Ḍɛɛnɔn Kulin bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ waka pwadin. Yeti waka ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ neeni bala ba waka ‘wontan ma maka ḍwaŋin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni bɛɛ. Wak maka iñɔ wɛnni ɛkkɛn baadi lakun. Yeti Yaccu ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ pwani ɛkɛ pwanna baadi bɛɛy.

Ɔci ɛkkɛ maka kaalko, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka ḍwaŋin. Ɔci ɛkkɛ waakidayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ nooŋdɛ yɔtin ne pwadan te yoma ḍiɛran. A ɔɔn, jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Kan ma kooŋi waakɛn agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, Juaŋ kɛkti te ɛkkɛn. Ɔci maka poŋi yomgɛnti agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka ḍyɛrinyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwad pwad ɛkkɛnti.”
Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ḍyɛrdi. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ Juaŋ bieŋɛti ɔci ɛkɛ tolla tollo. Ɔci ne oŋ gɛɛlti a oŋŋa pwadan ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ɛkɛ agdɛ maka ḍwaŋin.
Jyeka lildɛ ɛkkɛ yomgɔti te jyek coodiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn oldɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ bieŋɛti waakɛnda, acaan ɛkɛ tieci waŋɛ te ɛkkɛ.
Woŋgɔ pɔktɛ, hay! Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ! Acaan Jwaŋa Yaayan mena yookɔn te ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn muowi ɛkkɛ bala ba jyɛl ne ati wiagi lieṭi gena amdɛ ɛkiy.
Dala ɛkkɛ kɛktɛ te ɛkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti neeni. Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ modg ɛkkɛ baan konɛ wardayɛ, ɛkkɛn balki taab ba ɛkkɛ ɔɔn.

Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwad pwad mati te jiek waakɛnda. Ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ muonɛ bora te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ ciedɛ iki ɛkɛ yuonginda yuonginda ɔɔn. Yeti accayɛ, taab bala ɛkkɛti ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ men. Dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ Juaŋ aŋka dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ tɛya te jyek ɛkɛ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ne tɛyan oŋkanda.
Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena tolan te waak waakɛnda. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala yuonginda yuonginda ɔɔn! Amɛɛn.

Cilayɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi ba mod ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ a mena tieci jiek waakɛn. ‘Ya maŋŋa ɛkɛ te kiin worga ṭɔɔlɛ ḍuulan neeni. Ɔci te worga neeniyɛ, ‘ya baal ṭey ɛkkɛ. Jyeka ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te yom pwani Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyeka awarɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ne tɛyan te jyeka neeni.
Ma kaniica wɛnni ban Baabilyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Ɛkkɛn muonɛ Juaŋ bora ba ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci kaci ‘ya Markyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun.
Dala ɛkkɛ ñiebdɛ yɔtin pookɔ ne pwadan te yoma pwadan. Ɛkkɛ waakida maka bala Kiṭɔtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwada a pwanno. Bawwin.

Gena ‘ya Cimaan Butruc kiewan worga ɛkkɛti neeni. ‘Ya a kɛɛngɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci ‘ya a Cuuda ɛkɛ moki. Ɛkkɛ maka kiegan ‘ya worga nɛ, ɛkkɛ a maka balki jyek jyenna pwadan ba ɔɔny. Ikin balkin jyek jyenna neeni te naŋki Jwaŋ ikin ɔci Yaccu Kiṭɔ Mena Yuoci ikin neeni. Ɛkɛ pwad pwado.

Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccuyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ magdɛ ne tolan yomgɔti. Ɔci dala yom pwani ɛkɛ bala ɛkkɛti ne tolan. Dala naŋka neeni bala ɛkkɛti te ŋeejin ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ ŋeejɛ ne pwadan i jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ Ciɛggɔn ikin daŋkuny.

Te war tɛɛn Juaŋ ikintiyɛ, ikin yaakinti cietin ne pwadan, ɔci noŋtin ba naŋki ɛkɛ. War tɛɛn ɛkɛ bala ikinti acaan ɛkɛ ŋeecin ikin doki. Ɛkɛ ikin bornin acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ikin pwattin ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn dala war tɛɛn ɛkɛ bala ikinti ne tolan.

Ikin myennin ɛkɛ te naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkɛ ikintiy. Jyek naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, pwanna pwani ne tolan hay! Ɔci te jyek ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ikin yaakinti kootin bora te naŋka yeyinti, naŋka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniy. Nɔji tol tol iñɔ ṭɛɛrji acaan ma bala noŋi ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn buagiti ne pɛñan neeni. Ikin yaakinti kootin bora te naŋka neeniti, acaan ikin ‘wonnin Juaŋ yom ɛkɛ waanɛ ikin yomgɔti.
Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti doki, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ naŋka pookɛn naŋka pwadin ne pɛñan daŋkun. Naŋka pookɛn neeniyɛ, gena coodda pwadan ɔci ŋeejjin jiek ŋeettiti ma,
ɔci muŋŋa ma mwokki waakɛn, ɔci yɔɔdda ma yɔɔtti ne tɛyan,
ɔci yom pwanna ma yomgɛn pwatki Juaŋti, ɔci yom pwanna ma yomgɛn pwatki maka pookɛnti, ɔci anna ma anki maka pookɛny.

Naŋka guaŋi ‘ya neeniyɛ, kan ɛkkɛn bala ɛkkɛti ne tolan waakɛnda, ɔci ŋeejin ɛkkɛ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ŋeennɛ neeniyɛ, bala ɛkkɛti budan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ aarŋɛ kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. Ɔci naŋka pwadan baaw ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
Maka naŋka neeni baaw ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba maka ñingɛn ulan. Ɛkkɛn yaakinti jiek jitkɛn yuartan ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn poŋi te oŋŋa nɔji ɛkkɛn eññɛ Juaŋ ɔntɔ neeni bɛɛ.

Modg ɔɔn, acaan naŋka neeni bala matiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ aŋka poŋdɛ te naŋki Juaŋ ne pwadan, acaan dala naŋki Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan ne ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ bornɛ ɔci muonɛ boray. Ɔci kan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ oŋgati moki bɛɛ.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne oŋŋa ɛkkɛ kaattɛ cyɛgji Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkkɛ kaattɛ Juaŋ ne pwadan ban ɛkɛ. Ɔci cyɛgji ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, bala yuonginda ɔɔn.
Jyeka neeni jitkɛn ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan te jyeka neeni. Yeti a oŋkiyɛ, ‘ya baal gɔk ɛkkɛti aŋka dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ jyeka neeni.
’Ya poŋ gɔk ka ne ‘ya baala ciya men te wara neeni ɔci kan ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti aŋka naa ɛkkɛ yiedɛ te jyeka neeni bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin.
’Ya poŋ a ɔɔn acaan ‘ya myenna Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ agi oŋŋa ‘ya tuudjɔ cɔɔlnɔ doki.
Ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya ne pwadan te jyeka neeni aŋka ne ‘ya baada wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti poŋdɛ jyeka neeni oŋkanda.

Ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te jyek war tɛɛn Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔci te jyek bɛɛna ɛkɛ bɛɛdi dɔɔkti iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniy. Jyeka ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyeka budan jyeka naŋŋɔn ɔɔn te ñing tɛɛn ɔɔn bɛɛ. Pwani Yaccu yuarnɔn ɔɔn te woŋgɔ ne ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora ba mena tolany.

Ɔɔn balgɔn i ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ poom wyeñɛti te oŋŋa ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Wey ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan ne pwadany. Te oŋŋa wannayɛ, pwan gɔkkin ɛkɛti te ñaalɔ Mena Tolanti agi, “I a Kaci ‘ya Kacca ana ‘yay. ‘Ya yomu pwanna pwani iti.”
Ɔɔn tieŋnɔn pwana neeni ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni te ñaalɔ pɔliji ne ɔɔn balgɔn poom wyeñɛti iki ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔy.

Çeejɔn ɔɔn jyek bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan a jyeka awarɛ. Ɔci te naŋka yuarnɔn ɔɔn poom wyeñɛti neeniyɛ, jyek ɛkkɛn ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ne pwadan ‘wota ne ɛkkɛn akki jyeka awarɛy. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyek bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan neeni, acaan jyek ɛkkɛn bala ba dyɛka ne nona ulan dyɛgdɛy. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyeka neeni oŋkanda ne noon bɔɔdi ɔɔn, ɔci moki ne jiek jitkɛn yuartɛji ɛkkɛ ne pwadan ɔɔn.
Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan jyek bɔwan jyeka guagɛ ɛkkɛn te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, jiek jitkɛn neeni ŋeejɛ menga te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ.
Jyeka guagɛ bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, guagɛ ɛkkɛn te paŋi ɛkkɛn pookɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn gɔki ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛnti neeni.

Ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg te baaṭi maka gɔki amaam agi ɛkkɛn aginti bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg bala mati daŋkun. Yeti ɛkkɛn a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan woodgɛn bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka jomi jiek budan. Ɔci ma bɛya ɛkkɛti daŋkun, ɔci ɛkkɛn loṭi ma amaam te jyek ɛkkɛn jyeka pookɛn neeni. Jyeka lorki ɛkkɛn ma neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn lɛɛwi jyek Jwaŋa Tolan jitkɛn. Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn ne pɛñan te Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛn mena ɛkkɛn wannɛ neeni. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ywobji bɛya ɛkkɛnti ne pɛñan, ɔci ɛkkɛn ḍakti.
Maka coŋin bootti ɛkkɛnti, ɔci lɔkti ba naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋki tomi neeni. Ɔci te naŋki maka loṭi ma amaam neeniyɛ, jyeka awarɛ aga ba jyeka budan mati.
Ɔci acaan yomg ɛkkɛn buagi waak ne tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ naŋtɛ ñin te jyeka jomgin. Te baaṭi jyek ywobja bɛya ɛkkɛnti naŋŋɛ Juaŋ doki agi ɛkki ḍaktɔ.
Malɛɛkanyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn noŋki nɔjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn dalnɛ Juaŋ te ywobji bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yiemnɛ ɛkɛ iñɔ bana maañti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn olnɛ ɛkɛ nona ulan, ɔci ɛkkɛn ciyi aŋan ne oŋŋa godan Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛdi ɔɔn.

Ɔci moki maka bala te baaṭi dalnɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ. Gena Nɔwa mena loṭi ma te naŋka pwadiny. Ɛkɛ iki maka pookɛn gɛɛg ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka yɔɔññɛ Juaŋ te oŋŋa wanna. Tol bɔrda oonɛ Juaŋ ɔci maka yeyin ṭɛɛrji eññɛ ɛkɛ.
Ban Caduum ɔci ban Gamɔɔra ḍakcin te ywobji Juaŋ moki. Ɛkkɛn ammɛ maaño. Juaŋ noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka dala maka ciyi budan te ɛkɛ poŋdi te naŋki ɛkkɛn.
Mena pwadan yenti Lutyɛ, aŋka yɔɔññɛ Jwaŋa Tolan. Lut bala wiak yomɛti ne pɛñan te naŋki maka yeyin noŋi tomi neeni.
Ne Lut baali ciyi ban maka neenitiyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ yaayɛ ne pɛñan te naŋka yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ mati ɔci te jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkɛ te ɛkkɛntiy. Ɛkkɛn bala noŋi ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn buagitiy.
Kan Juaŋ yaakinti naŋka tɛyan neeniyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti ma ɛkɛ magdɛ te taab ɛkkɛn. Ɔci moki ɛkɛ yaakinti ywobji ɛkɛ oldɛ maka yeyinti, ɔci ywobji bala ɛkkɛnti oŋkanda ne oŋŋa godan bɛɛdi ɔɔn.

Maka ani naŋki tomi maka paŋi ɛkkɛn yiegin te naŋka neeni, ɔci maka yookɔn te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ywobji Juaŋ bɛya ɛkkɛnti ne tolan. Ɛkkɛn buayi menga bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan. Ɛkkɛn buayi te waaŋi malɛɛkan bala ñaalɔ bɛɛ.
Maka noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, war tɛɛn ɛkkɛn tol tol ba war tɛɛn malɛɛkan bɛɛ. Yeti malɛɛkanyɛ, ɛkkɛn wooki jwali gɛɛl Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti bɛɛ.
Maka noŋi ne yaayan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn baali ba kulin mwoktan ma ɔci noktan may. Maka neeni bala gɔki ne yaayan te jyeka kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn neeni, ɔci ba leyi ne ḍaktiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn daŋkun ḍakti a ɔɔn.

Taab dɔɔkti ɛkkɛnti daŋkun ba naŋka naŋi ɛkkɛn yeyin maka pookɛnti wanna. Ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi kan ɛkkɛn ciyinti te coodda milan coodda noŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin a lɔɔn ma ñomgɛnti oŋkanda neeniyɛ, agi a ɔɔn pwadɔ ɛkkɛnti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔy ñɔy poŋi agi ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ naŋŋɛti ñin te naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni. Ɔci nonk iidn yaakɔn ɛkkɛn ne ɛkkɛn balki omi iki ɛkkɛy. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔy ñɔy ne ɛkkɛn poŋki te naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin, ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ naŋkɛ ñin neeniy.

Kan ɛkkɛn jyɛyi iki moongyɛ, paŋi jyek tomi bala ɛkkɛnti doki. Ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala poŋi te jyek tommo. Ɔci ɛkkɛn maka moong maka ñingɛn tɛyan bɛɛyɛ, maaltan ɔci naŋtan ñino. Oŋkandayɛ, yomg ɛkkɛn buagɔn waka coŋin. Jwaŋa Tolan noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛnti.
Pɔya pwadan dalji ɛkkɛn. Ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala noŋi ba naŋki Balaam kaci Biyɔr. Balaamyɛ, ɛkɛ ani ami bilka bɛya te kanŋa ɛkɛ kanŋa yaayan neeniy.

Juaŋ bala ṭeyi ɛkɛ te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka yaayan neeni. Tɔɔrɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ a gena kookinti jieko. Yeti ɛkɛ gɔkcin Balaamti te pwan men baano. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, bɔwa neeni naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkɛ te wyeña yaayan neeniyɛ, dalnɛ ɛkɛ doki.

Maka noŋi ne yaayan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba jiidg ne ɛkkɛn iiki ɔci menga motti pyeg ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛy. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛn bala ba wiew ne eedɛ peedɛ jwami ɔntɔ amaam ɔci etti ñaal gɛɛl yelk jitin bɛɛy. Noon gɛɛl ywaŋŋɛ Juaŋ doki te ɛkkɛn. Gena nona iñɔ nona mielo.
Ɛkkɛn gɔki jyeka coŋin jyeka budan. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋki tomiyɛ, maka pookɛn ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ. Gena maka kooyin bora te naŋka yeyintiy. Ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ ne pɛñan moki te naŋki maka neeni.

Maka loṭi ma amaam neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki mati agi ɛkkɛn yaakinti noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn oŋkanda. Yeti maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛnk naŋka yeyin. Kan men gɛɛl buannɛ gengayɛ, ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn gena ɛkɛ buannɛ neeni.

Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci mako. Ɔci kan ma kooyin bora te nɔji ɛkkɛnti te ŋeejin ɛkkɛn Yaccu ŋeeckiti ɔci kan ɛkkɛn dɔɔdi nɔjiti moki ɔci kan ɛkkɛn bwandɛ nɔjja neeniyɛ, coodda ne ŋoyɔ neeni yaayɛ ne tolan te coodi maka jyeti Yaccuti bɛɛy.
Kan te pɔya pwadan ŋeeckiti ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn aŋka pwatcin. Kan pɔya pwadan ŋeecɔn ma, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn oŋ ganuun pwadan ganuun ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeni daltanyɛ, a ɔɔn yaayɛ ne tolan.

A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jwali ṭɔɔlɛ awarɛ jwalla gɔki agi, “Gɔɔŋyɛ, kan ɛkɛ ŋɔktiyɛ, ɛkɛ dɔɔdi waka ŋɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ neeni amdɛ moki.” Ɔci jwalla parɛ gɔki agi, “Kuciyɛ, kan ɛkɛ lwaktan mayɛ, ɛkɛ dɔɔdi cotinti moki ne pɛñan.”

Maka ana ‘yay, worga kiewan ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, gena worga akki ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɔci te worgan yaakkɛn neeniyɛ, ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti ka dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyeka guagɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔy.
Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyek bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan jyeka te baaṭi, ɔci te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin Mena Yuoci ikin neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ikinti te tugi ɔɔn Cuudan ɛkɛy.
Jwalla bala ñamu te jyeka pookɛnyɛ, gɔki agi ne oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔyɛ, maka lɛɛṭi jyek Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya. Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋdi ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn buagiti ne pɛñan neeni.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti agi, “Ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi Yaccu bɛɛdɔ, oŋ ɛkɛ bala wɛnɛ?” Ɔci agi, “Yɔrg ikin ɛkkɛn tuun te baaṭi doki, ɔci naŋka parɛ gɛɛl bɛɛn mati men bɛɛ. Naŋki waakɛnda bala ba bolja oŋŋa Juaŋ okki noon warday.”

Maka neeni jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ okki ɛkɛ waak neeni ñalɛ a genga bɛɛ. Acaan te baaṭi ma yaayanyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkcin te jwali tukɛ agi dala pɔli ɔci ṭɛɛr bala, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala doki. Šɛɛr oonɛ ɛkɛ bora te pietin, ɔci pieg bala te nonk ɛkkɛn.
Ɔci oŋ gɛɛlti te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ṭɛra wanna jaadɛ piego, ɔci maka bala ciyi ṭɛɛrji i maal jitkɛn waakɛnda ḍakcin.
Ɔci te jyek Juaŋ mokiyɛ, pɔli ɔci ṭɛɛryɛ, ɛkkɛn bala oŋkanda ɔɔn ne oŋŋa ɛkkɛn amdɛ maañ ɔɔn. Gena oŋŋa Juaŋ noŋdi godan maka yeyinti, oŋŋa ɛkkɛn ḍakti neeni.

Jwali gɛɛl bala, ɔci naa ɛkkɛ ñingɔ yeya te jwalla neeni bɛɛ! Jwalla neeni gɔki agi Juaŋ poki nink bɛɛ. Oŋ jiñɛ ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, bala ba bolja yuonga coŋin ɛkɛti ba yuong a alp ne cyɛɛlɔ (1,000) ɔɔn. Ɔci moki yuonga a alp (1,000) neeniyɛ, bala ba bolja oŋ jiñɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ ɛkɛti.

Ma ɛkkɛ gɛɛg poŋi gɔki agi Ciɛggɔn ikin kwaci te naŋka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ agi noŋjɛy. Yeti ɛkɛ kwaci bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala poŋi te ɛkkɛ, ɔci kɛɛy ɛkkɛ, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn naa men gɛɛl ḍakti bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ma waakɛnda waakɛn yaltan te naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin ɔci bɛya ɛkɛti.

Yeti ne Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛya lieda ba mena ɛɛno. Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, pɔli baadi ɔci joon ɛkɛ tolla tollo. Ɔci waka bala ñaalɔ amdɛ maaño. Ɔci ṭɛɛr ɔci waka bala ṭɛɛr konɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn amdɛ maañ waakɛnda daŋkun.
Acaan waka neeni ḍakti ne baaṭiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te coodi ɛkkɛ! Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda.

Dala ɛkkɛ kɛɛddɛ oŋŋa oŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛdiy. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ ne pwadan aŋka dala oŋŋa neeni bɛya ne pɛñan. Oŋŋa oŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛdi neeniyɛ, pɔli kola maañ ɔci waka bala ñaalɔ waakɛnda amdɛ maaño.
Te Jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ikintiyɛ, ikin kɛɛyin oŋŋa pɔlla woonɛ bɛɛdi ɔci ṭɛra woonɛ bɛɛdiy. Ɔci ṭɛra woonɛ neeniyɛ, naŋka pwadin bala pookɛn oŋkanda ɔɔn.

Maka ana ‘yay, acaan ɛkkɛ kɛɛyɛ naŋka neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ aŋka dala ɛkkɛ mɔktɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ne ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadany. Naa gena yaayan gɛɛl mɔktɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, menga yaakinti gɔkti agi gena yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.

Dala Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ loomgɛ tɛɛki ikintiy. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, pɔya ɛkɛ yuoci ikin bala. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiinɛ mod ikin Buuluc ikintiy. Ikin anin Buuluc. Ɛkɛ bala gɔki te jyeka neeni daŋkun te worga kienɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛti neeniy. Ɛkɛ bala gɔki jiek te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeni.

Ɛkɛ bala gɔki te jyek oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛdiy. Jyeka kiinɛ ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, jitkɛn gɛɛg tɛy tɛyo. Ɔci jyeka tɛyan neeniyɛ, aktanyɔ ma gɛɛg. Maka noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn jiek ŋeecɔn ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛy tɛy bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ḍakti te naŋka neeni. Ɛkkɛnyɛ, jyeka kiigin jyeka pookɛn daŋkun aktanyɔ.
Ɛkkɛ maka ana ‘yay, jiek ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ aŋka naa ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ maka yeyin ɔntɔ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan.

Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka ‘uottɛ ñamu te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci te ŋeejin Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ neeni. Ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci ikin neeni. Dala ma jieddi Yaccu acca ɔci yuonginda ɔɔn ne ṭɛɛr baadi ɔɔn! Amɛɛn.

Ɔɔn kieyɔn worga ɛkkɛti acca te jyek Mena bala te ñamu. Ɛkɛ a Mena jiekɛ tieŋnɔn ɔɔn te tuk ɛkɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ a Mena yuarŋɔn ɔɔn te woŋgɔ, ɛɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn gɔṭɔn ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɔɔn moki tomnɔn ɛkɛ warɛti te byeŋki ɔɔn. Mena guagdɔn ɔɔn neeniyɛ, gena Kiṭɔ mena tɛɛtki may.

Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ ɔɔn lɛɛrnɔn Mena tɛɛtki ma neeni, ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn lwokɔn ma te jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci acca ɛkkɛ myettɛ ɔɔn daŋkun te jyek ɛkɛ. Jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyek Mena tɛɛtki may. Ɛkɛ bala i Weegɛn te ñamu ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci tɛɛtin ɛkɛ baadi ywongati bɛɛ. Ɔci acca ɛkɛ lɛɛlnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bora ɔɔnti.

Ɔɔn gɔktɔn ɛkkɛti moki ka Mena ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn neeniyɛ, gena Mena yuarŋɔn ɔɔn ɔci tieŋnɔn ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn te jyeka neeni aŋka jyek ikin aga jyeka ne cyɛɛlɔ iki ɔɔn, acaan ɔɔn jyeyɔn i Jwaŋa Tolan i Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Ɔci ɔɔn kienɔn jyeka neeni ɛkkɛti aŋka ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔya ne pɛñan.
Gena jyeka tieŋnɔn ɔɔn te Kaci ɛkɛti aŋka ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ma neeni. Jyeka neeni gɔki agi Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ dɛki bɔɔna bɔɔno. Nona miel gɛɛl bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
Kan ikin gɔkin agi ikin jyeyin iki Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci yeti kan ikin ciyin te nona mielti menyɛ, a ɔɔn ikin jomin jieko, ɔci naŋka naŋtin ikin neeni a naŋka awarɛ bɛɛ.
Jwaŋa Tolan ciyi te nona bɔwan. Ɔci kan ikin da ciyin te nona bɔwan ba ɛkɛ ɔɔnyɛ, ikin yaakinti jyeyin waakida, ɔci yimg Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ nɔji ikin eedɛ ɔntɔ te ikin yomgɔti waakida oŋkanda ɔɔn.
Kan ikin poŋin gɔkin agi nɔji ikin baawiyɛ, ikin poŋin amaam budan, ɔci jyeka awarɛ bala ikin yomgɔti bɛɛ.
Kan ikin nɔji lɛɛltin borayɛ, ɛkɛ ikin bɔɔktin te nɔji ikin waakɛnda. Jyek bɔɔkin ɔci jyek eñña ɛkɛ nɔji eedɛ ɔntɔ neeni daldɛ ɛkɛ budan bɛɛ, tiidiyɔ ɛkɛ. Naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, pwatcin.
Kan ikin gɔkin agi ikin noŋŋin nɔji bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ikin gɔkin agi Jwaŋa Tolan a mena jomi jieko. Kan ikin gɔkin a ɔɔnyɛ, jyek ɛkɛ bala ikin yomgɔti bɛɛ.

Kɛɛgin ‘ya, ‘ya kiey jyeka neeni ɛkkɛti aŋka naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ nɔji bɛɛ. Yeti kan men gɛɛl ikinti noŋdi nɔjiyɛ, ɔci Men gɛɛl bala ikinti, ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti gɔkti Wey ikinti te ikin. Gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ Mena domi jiek bɛɛy.
Ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ te nɔji ikin aŋka Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwanni ikinti neeni. Ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ te ikin pookɔ bɛɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ te ma waakɛnda baan warda.
Kan ikin noŋin ba jyek ɛkɛ oŋkandayɛ, ikin aktin ma ɛkɛ woodgɛn ne pwadan.
Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ɛkɛ Juaŋ ŋeejjɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ noŋi ba jyeka guagdɛ Juaŋ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ a laaban, ɔci jyeka awarɛ bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
Kan mena noŋi ba jyek Juaŋyɛ, anna ani ɛkɛ Juaŋ neeni yɔmjin doki. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeettin ikin ikin balkin ɛkɛti.
Kan mena gɔki agi ɛkɛ balginti i Juaŋ oŋkandayɛ, dala ɛkɛ ciyi ba Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.
Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya kiey jyeka wonkɛn gɛɛg ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Gena jyeka te baaṭi jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te ñamuy.
Yeti jyeka neeni bala ba jyeka wonkɛn ɛkkɛti oŋkanda. Yaccu bala noŋi ba jyeka neeni, ɔci acca ɛkkɛ daŋkun noŋɛ ba jyeka neeni. Acaan nona miel noŋi baadi, ɔci Mena dɛki awarɛ bala doki.
Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ɛkɛ baaljɛ ciejjɛ nona bɔwanti, ɔci kan ɛkɛ yomɛ yaayɛ mod ɛkkɛnti oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ bala te nona mielti men.
Kan mena ani mod ɛkkɛn oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka bala ciyi te nona bɔwanti oŋkanda, ɔci ma ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ te jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛ.

Mena yomɛ yaayan mod ɛkkɛnti oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ bala te nona mielti, ɔci ɛkɛ ati te nona mielti men. Ɔci nona ooddi ɛkɛyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛ acaan ɛkɛ noon yuartɛ te woŋgɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ uullɛ nona miel ñingɛti doki.
Kɛɛgin ‘ya, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ bɔɔŋnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te nɔji ɛkkɛ doki. Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ bɔɔŋnɛ acaan yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala ɛkkɛti.
Weyi ɔɔn, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti, acaan mena bala te ñamu ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Kaalko, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti moki, acaan ɛkkɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan buannɛ ɛkkɛ doki.

Kɛɛgin ‘ya, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti acaan Wey ikin ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ. Weyi ɔɔn, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti, acaan Kiṭɔ Mena bala te ñamu ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Kaalko, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ maka yɔdi ne tɛyan ɔci jyek Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkkɛ yomgɔti oŋkanda, ɔci Jwaŋa Yaayan buannɛ ɛkkɛ doki.
Naa ɛkkɛ anɛ wak ṭɛɛr wyeñɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ anɛ waka bala baan jiñɛti iñɔ wɛnni bɛɛ. Kan mena ani baan jiñɛ iñɔ wɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti ani Wey ikin bɛɛ.

Acaan waka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a wak Wey ikin bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn a waka baan jiñɛti iñɔ wɛnni budan. Waka baan jiñɛti iñɔ wɛnni neeniyɛ, gena waka yomg ma baan buagiti ne pɛñan, ɔci waka gwaltan ma baan te ñingɛn ɔci pwanna pwani ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ma buagiti ne pɛñan, ɔci jyeka yomg ma baan buagiti akti maka ḍwaŋin.
Ɔci ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, baan jiñɛ baadi, ɔci waka yomg ma baan buagiti ne pɛñan neeniyɛ, baadi daŋkun. Yeti mena noŋi ba jyek Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka ciyi oŋkanda a ñaccu ɔɔn, baadi oŋgati bɛɛ.

Kɛɛgin ‘ya, wɔɔka neeni noŋi baadi doki! Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ agi “Mena Yookɔn Te Yaccu Kiṭɔ” baali bɛɛdɔ. Ɔci acca maka yookɔn te Yaccu gɛɛg bala kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Gena maka jyek ɛkkɛn bala ba Mena Yookɔn Te Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeniy. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeecin ikin wɔɔka neeni noŋi baadi doki.

Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ikin dalkin, ɛkkɛn a ma ikin awarɛ bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛn te akki ma ikin awarɛyɛ, te ɛkkɛn balkin iki ikin a cyɛɛlɔ men. Ɛkkɛn kaaccin bora te ma ikinti aŋka ŋeettan ma ɛkkɛn a ma ikin bɛɛ.
