Ɛkkɛ waakidayɛ, jyeka neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ.
’Ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ jyeka neeni kwoyɛ bɛɛ. ‘Ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti acaan jyeka neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Jyeka neeni etti jyeka jomgin bɛɛ.
Kan menga gɔki agi Yaccu neeni agɔ Kiṭɔ mena cuonda Juaŋ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena jomi jieko. Kan mena gɔki agi Kaci Weegɛn baawiyɛ, ɔci Kaci moki baawiyɛ, ɛkɛ a Mena Yookin Te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Kan mena yookɔn te Kaciyɛ, ɔci Kaci Weegɛn da bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Kan mena jyeti Kacitiyɛ, ɔci Kaci Weegɛn da bala ɛkɛti.
Ba jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te ñamu neeniyɛ, dala jyeka neeni bala ɛkkɛti oŋkanda, ɔci kan a ɔɔnyɛ, Kaci Weegɛn bala ɛkkɛti oŋkanda yaakkɛn i Kaci ɛkɛ.
Ɔci gena guagdɛ ɛkɛ agi ikin ‘wontintiyɛ, gena tɛɛtin, ɔci tɛɛtin neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ.
’Ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti te jyek maka noŋi ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ wanna.

Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ te ñamu te Boŋ ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ɛkkɛ yomgɔti men acca. Ɔci kan mena loṭi ɛkkɛ baawyɛ, noŋdi genga bɛɛ, ɛkkɛ laldɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan te jiek waakɛnda. Jyeka loṭi Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, a jyeka awarɛ. Jyeka neeniyɛ, a jomi jiek bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ iki Yaccu oŋkanda ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lallɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan neeni.

Kɛɛgin ‘ya, dala ɛkkɛ baldɛ ɛkɛti oŋkanda, ɔci kan a ɔɔnyɛ, kan ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ikintiyɛ, ɔci ikin yaakinti gɔwwin iki ɛkɛ ne pwadan. Ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ikin buatin ɛkɛ yooŋtin ɔntɔ te ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ pwad pwado, ɔci kan ma noŋi ne pwadan ba ɛkɛ ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn a kɛɛgin ɛkɛ awarɛ.

Anna Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ani ikinyɛ, da parɛ, acaan ɛkɛ boṭi ikin agi kɛɛgin ɛkɛ. Awarɛ, ikin balkin a ɔɔn. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ikin ŋeeckin bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan kwoyɔn daŋkun.

Gɔṭṭɛ mung ɔɔn, ikin akin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan acca, yeti ne baaṭi kan ikin baltin a ɔki ŋeecin ikin ne pwadan men bɛɛ. Yeti oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, ikin waakɔ aktin baltin ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn, acaan ikin ɛkɛ yuartin ne pwadan te woŋgi ikin.
Maka bala jyeti kɛɛy jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeka yeyin daltan niin ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwaddi ba Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.
Kan men gɛɛl noŋdi nɔjiyɛ, ɛkɛ jyek Juaŋ lɛɛŋŋɛ jitin doki, acaan nɔjiyɛ, ɛkɛ a gena lɛɛwi jyek Juaŋ jitkɛn.
Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ Yaccu aŋi men baan aŋka nɔji ikin eedɛ ɛkɛ ɔntɔ. Ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ moki nɔji ɛkɛ bala bɛɛ.
Kan men bala ciyi iki Yaccu oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi nɔji a ñaccu bɛɛ. Mena noŋi nɔji a ñaccuyɛ, ɛkɛ Yaccu yuarŋɛ oŋgati bɛɛ. Yaccu kwoyi ɛkɛ.
Kɛɛgin ‘ya, naa men gɛɛl ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ te jyek Yaccuti bɛɛ. Kan mena noŋi ne pwadan oŋkandayɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ pwad pwad bala ba naŋki Yaccu daŋkun.
Kan mena noŋi nɔji oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ a men Jwaŋa Yaayan, acaan Jwaŋa Yaayan bala noŋi nɔji te baaṭi doki. Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛn aŋka ɛkɛ kanŋa Jwaŋa Yaayan neeni lɛgdɛ jitin.

Kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi nɔji a ñaccu bɛɛ, acaan tɛɛtin Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti oŋkanda, baadi bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti noŋi nɔji a ñaccu bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn a kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan.

Ma Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ŋeecin ikin te naŋki ɛkkɛn, ɔci ma Jwaŋa Yaayan moki ŋeecin ikin te naŋki ɛkkɛn. Kan mena noŋi ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ a men Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. Ɔci kan mena ani mod ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ daŋkun a men Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.
Jyeka neeni bala ba jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te ñamu doki agi dala ikin ooncinyɔ pookɔ.
Naa ikin baltin ba ‘wana yenti kɛɛn ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a men Jwaŋa Yaayan, ɔci ɛkɛ mod ɛkkɛn noŋŋɛ. Ɛkɛ moodɛn noŋŋɛ ogo? Ɛkɛ moodɛn noŋŋɛ acaan moodɛn bala noŋi ne pwadan, ɔci kɛɛn bala noŋi ne yaayan.
Modg ɔɔn, kan maka baan jiñɛti iñɔ wɛnni yomgɛn yeyɔ ɛkkɛti oŋkandayɛ, naa ɛkkɛ jitkɔ buaya noon te jyeka neeni bɛɛ.
Te ñamu ikin balkin ba maka tuutan, ɔci acca ikin baallin ba maka tɛɛtan. Çeecin ikin a ɔɔn acaan ikin anin modg ikin. Kan mena ani modg ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba mena tuuta men.
Kan mena yomɛ yaayɛ mod ɛkkɛnti oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba mena noki mako, ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ maka noki mayɛ, tɛɛtin Juaŋ bala ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti bɛɛ.
Jyek anna ani Juaŋ ikin neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin doki te naŋki Yaccu oŋŋa ɛkɛ warɛ ‘wonninti ikiny. Ɔci ikinyɛ, dala yomg ikin bala ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Dala ikin anin modg ikin ba anna ani ɛkɛ ikin neeni.
Mena balki waak iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, kan ɛkɛ gɔrti mod ɛkkɛn ancinyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ yomɛ baaw mod ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ yookɔn te maŋi ɛkɛyɛ, oŋ anna ani ɛkɛ Juaŋ neeni ciyi ɛkɛ yomɛti a ɔki?
Kɛɛgin ‘ya, naa ikin anin ma te jyek tuggɔ budan bɛɛ. Dala ikin anin ma te yoma awarɛ, ɔci dala ikin noŋtin ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti.
Ɔci kan ikin anin ma te yoma awarɛ ɔci noŋtin ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti a ɔɔnyɛ, ŋeettin ikin jyeka bala ikinti neeniyɛ, a jyeka awarɛ. Ɔci ŋeettin ikin yomgɔti ne pwadan Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti.
Ɔci kan ikin poŋin gɔkin agi ikin yiekin Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛtiyɛ, jyeka neeni yaakinti ciyi ikin yomgɔti bɛɛ. Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ tol tol te yomg ikin, ɔci waak waakɛnda ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ.
Ɔci kan jiek ŋeecin ikin yomgɔti a ikin noŋŋin gena yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛyɛ, ikin yaakinti ortinti Jwaŋa Tolanti ne pwadan, ɔci ikin buayin ɛkɛ bɛɛ.
Ɔci kan ikin toottin ɛkɛti te gengayɛ, ɛkɛ ikin ‘wontin, acaan ikin noŋin ba jyek ɛkɛ oŋkanda, ɔci naŋki ikin neeni pwanna pwani ɛkɛti.
Gena jyeka ɛkɛ buagiti ikin noŋtin neeni. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi dala ikin jyetcin yenti Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔti, ɔci agi dala ikin ooncin yɔtin pookɔ oŋkanda. Jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyeka ikin myenninti ɛkɛy.

Kan mena noŋi ba jyek ɛkɛ oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ ciyi i Jwaŋa Tolan a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkɛ yomɛti daŋkun. Çeecin ikin Juaŋ bala ikin yomgɔti, ɔci ikin da balkin ɛkɛti acaan Jwaŋa Tolan ikin ‘wonnin Boŋ ɛkɛ.

Modg ɔɔn, kan jyeka pookɛn bala, ɔci kan ma gɔki agi jyeka neeni agi jyek Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ men jyeddɛ jyeka guaktan ma coŋin neeni men budan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ te ñamu parun aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ kan jyeka neeni a jyek Juaŋ awarɛ boki no. Acaan maka loṭi ma gɛɛg dɛndi bora ɔci jomdi jiek mati.
Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛnɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci aŋŋi men baanyɛ, paŋŋa neeni bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jiek ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ jyeka neeni a jyek Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛ.

Kan men gɛɛl kɛki agi Yaccu bɛɛnɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛyɛ, paŋi ɛkɛ bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ. Paŋi ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, gena paŋi Mena Yookɔn Te Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te ñamu agi bɛɛdɔy, ɔci acca ɛkɛ bɛɛn doki.
Kɛɛgin ‘ya, ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan. Maka gɔki ba jyeka pookɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn buannɛ ɛkkɛ doki, acaan Mena bala ɛkkɛ yomgɔti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ tolcin te mena bala iñɔ baanji wɛnni.
Maka gɔki jyeka pookɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a ma Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki te jyeka bala iñɔ baanji wɛnni, ɔci maka a ma Juaŋ bɛɛyɛ, tieŋdi jyek ɛkkɛn.

Ikin akin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan. Maka Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeecɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek ikin. Ɔci maka a kɛɛgin Juaŋ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek ikin bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeettin ikin jyeka bala mati neeniyɛ, kan a jyeka awarɛ, walla kan a jyeka jomgin.
Modg ɔɔn, dala ikin oontin yɔtin pookɔ oŋkanda, acaan jyek anna neeniyɛ, bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti. Maka ani ma a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeecɔn.
Mena ani ma bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeejɛ bɛɛ, acaan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena ani may.
Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan bala ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan Kacca neeni cuonnɛ iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrji aŋka ikin tɛɛttin te ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ ikin myennin te anna ɛkɛ ani ikiny.

A ikin aŋka anin Juaŋ ñamu bɛɛ. A’a, gena Juaŋ aŋka ani ikin ñamuy. Ɔci ŋeecin ikin anna Juaŋ ani ikin neeniyɛ, a anna awarɛ, acaan Kaci ɛkɛ cuonnɛ iñɔ baanji wɛnni aŋka ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ te nɔji ikin aŋka Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwanni ikinti neeni.
Modg ɔɔn, kan Jwaŋa Tolan ani ikin a ɔɔnyɛ, dala ikin da oontin yɔtin pookɔ.
Men gɛɛl Jwaŋa Tolan yuarŋɛ bɛɛ. Yeti kan ikin oonnin yɔtin pookɔ oŋkandayɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan ciyi ikin yomgɔti. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin anin Juaŋ awarɛ.
Çeecin ikin ikin balkin Jwaŋa Tolanti ɔci ɛkɛ da bala ikinti. Jyeka neeni ŋeecin ikin te Boŋ ɛkɛ Boŋa ikin ‘wonninti ɛkɛy.
Yaccu yuarŋɔn ɔɔn te woŋgɔ aŋka ɔɔn lwokɔn ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan Wey Yaccun neeni. Ɛkɛ Kaci ɛkɛ cuonnɛ iñɔ wɛnni aŋka ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ te nɔji ma baan baan warda.
Kan mena jyeti ɔci gɔki agi Yaccu a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan bala ciyi ɛkɛ yomɛti oŋkanda, ɔci ɛkɛ da bala Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋkanda daŋkun.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, anna Juaŋ ani ikin neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin ne pwadan, ɔci ikin jyettin yomgɔti Juaŋ ani ikin. Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena ani may. Kan mena ciyi ani Juaŋ bala ɛkɛ yomuti oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ ciyi iki Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan da ciyi ɛkɛti oŋkanda.

Oŋkanda ikin anin Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeettin ikin ne pwadan yomgɔti ikin buayin oŋ godan Juaŋ moki bɛɛ, acaan ne ikin balkin ciyin iñɔ wɛnniyɛ, ikin balkin ciyin ba Yaccu ɔɔn, ɔci acaan ikin anin Juaŋ awarɛ.

Kan anna i ani Jwaŋa Tolan bala itiyɛ, ɔci bwajja i buayi genga bala moki bɛɛ. Acaan jyek bwaji ɔci jyek ani yaakinti ñoodi nona ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ. Bwaji bawwin doki. Jyek bwaji bala mati acaan ma buayi jyeka bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti te naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin. Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, kan men gɛɛl buayiyɛ, bala ba anna ɛkɛ ani Juaŋ neeni bɔɔnjin men.
Ikin anin ɛkɛ acaan ɛkɛ ani ikin te ñamu doki.

Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ɛkɛ anji Juaŋyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ yomɛ yaayɛ moodɛnti mena cieki iki ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena jomi jiek budan. Ɔci kan ɛkɛ ani mod ɛkkɛn mena yuartɛ ɛkɛ te woŋgɛ neeni bɛɛy, oŋ ɛkɛ yaakinti ani Juaŋ mena yuartɛ ɛkɛ te woŋgɛ bɛɛ neeni a ɔki?
Gena jyeka ikin myenninti Juaŋ neeni, agi kan mena ani Juaŋyɛ, dala ɛkta ani mod ɛkki daŋkun.
Maka jyeti agi Yaccu a Kiṭɔ Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Borayɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan waakɛnda. Kan maka ani kɛɛgin weegɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn ani kɛɛgin ɛkɛ daŋkun.
Kan ikin anin Juaŋ, ɔci kan ikin noŋtin ba jyeka ikin myettinti ɛkɛyɛ, ŋeettin ikin ikin anin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛ.
Kan ikin anin Juaŋyɛ, ikin noŋin ba jyek ɛkɛ oŋkanda, ɔci jyeka ikin myettinti ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, yeyɔ ikinti bɛɛ.
Kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn waka iñɔ wɛnni baanji bwantan ɛkkɛn. Te jyenna ikin jyettin Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ikin yaakinti naŋka iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrji bwantin.
Kan menga jyeti Yaccuti agi ɛkta agi Kaci Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, mena neeni yaakinti waka bala iñɔ baan konɛti wɛnni bwandɛ.

Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni ɛkɛ a mena cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolany, ɛkɛ a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkɛ ŋeecin ikin ne ɛkɛ agi Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan acaan Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkkin a ɔɔn te ñaalɔ agi ɛkta agɔ Kaci ɛkɛ. Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkcin a ɔɔn te wɔɔka Yaccu buulkiti may, ɔci moki ne Yaccu tuuni men bɛɛ te oŋŋa ɛkɛ ŋaapkiti may. Ɔci Boŋ Juaŋ daŋkun gɔki mieti ikin te Yaccu a ɔɔn moki. Ɔci jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn neeni bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci awarɛ.
Kan men baan lwoki ikin te jyek men gɛɛlyɛ, jyeka neeni pwadɔ ikinti ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ. Ɔci kan Jwaŋa Tolan lwoki ikin te Kaci ɛkɛyɛ, jyek ɛkɛ neeni aŋka pwad pwad ne tolan.

Kan mena jyeti jyek Kaci Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, jyeka guagdɛ Juaŋ te Kaci ɛkɛ neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ yomɛti doki. Kan mena jyeti Kaci Juaŋti bɛɛyɛ, bala ba ɛkɛ poŋi gɔki agi Jwaŋa Tolan a mena jomi jieko. Jyek ɛkɛ bala a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ jyeti jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ te Kaci ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ.
Jyeka guaŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ikinti neeni bala a ɔki? Ɛkɛ gɔki ikinti agi ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonninti tɛɛtin, ɔci agi tɛɛtin neeniyɛ, baadi ywongati bɛɛ, ɔci agi tɛɛtin neeniyɛ, bala Kaci ɛkɛti.
Ɔci kan mena Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan bala yomɛtiyɛ, tɛɛtin bala ɛkɛti. Kan mena Kaci Juaŋ baaw ɛkɛ yomɛtiyɛ, tɛɛtin bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
Ɛkkɛ maka jyeti yenti Kaci Jwaŋa Tolantiy, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ tɛɛtin bala ɛkkɛti acca doki, ɔci tɛɛtin neeniyɛ, baadi oŋgati bɛɛ.
Çeecin ikin ne pwadan Juaŋ ñamɛti kan ikin toottin ɛkɛti te gengayɛ, ɔci kan gena ikin toottin ɛkɛti neeni bala ba jyeka ɛkɛ buagitiyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ tieŋdi.
Ɔci kan Juaŋ tieŋdi a ɔɔnyɛ, ŋeecin ikin daŋkun ɛkɛ noŋi ba jyek cɔŋi ikin.

Kan men gɛɛl mod ɛkkɛn men Juaŋ gɛɛl yuartɛ bala noŋi naŋka yaayan gɛɛl a naŋka ɛkɛ eedɛ non lienti bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ cɔkti Juaŋti te mena neeni, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ mena neeni bɔɔktɛ ɔci ‘wondɛ tɛɛtin. Jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyek maka mwondi te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛy. Yeti nɔji gɛɛl bala a nɔjja men eedɛ non lienti. Ɔci ‘ya dɛyi ma te cɔŋŋa ma cɔkti te mena nɔŋdi nɔjja neeni bɛɛ.
Waka naŋŋin ikin yeyin ɛkkɛn waakɛnda a wak nɔjjo. Yeti naŋki gɛɛg etti lien bɛɛ.
Çeecin ikin maka a kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi nɔji a ñaccu bɛɛ, acaan Kacca jiennɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bala gɔṭi ɛkkɛn, ɔci Jwaŋa Yaayan yaakinti noŋdi genga ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.
Çeecin ikin ikin akin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ŋeecin ikin moki maka yeyin baan wardayɛ, bala byeŋ mena yaayan neeniti.

Çeecin ikin Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛn doki, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin ñing tɛɛn aŋka ikin mena awarɛ ŋeettin. Ɔci mena awarɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ciyin iki ikin a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci Kaci ɛkɛyɛ, gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Jwaŋa neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a Jwaŋa awarɛ, ɔci tɛɛtin ɛkɛ a tɛɛtin awarɛ, baadi bɛɛ.
Kɛɛgin ‘ya, dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ uuttɛ ɔntɔ te jɔkin yeyin jɔkin maltan ma amaam neeniti. Amɛɛn.

Ɛɛŋo, i a mena muonɛ Juaŋ boray. Gena ‘ya ciɛggɔn kaniica kiey worga iti ɔci kɛɛgin iti daŋkun neeni. Ɛkkɛ a maka ana ‘ya acaan te jyeka bala ikinti a jyeka awarɛ neeniy. ‘Ya an ɛkkɛ paru bɛɛ, maka jyeka awarɛ neeni ŋeecɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn da ani ɛkkɛ.
Jyeka awarɛ neeniyɛ, ciyi ikin yomgɔti, ɔci bala ikinti yuonginda ɔɔn.

Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn ikin ‘wontin yom pwanno, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pɔktan ikinti, ɔci ikin ‘wontin coodi pwanno. Ɛkkɛn ikin ‘wontin waka neeni awarɛ te anna Jwaŋa Tolan ani ikiny.
’Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne kɛɛgin i gɛɛg yuarŋa ‘ya balki cieki ne pwadan te jyeka awarɛ ba jyeka ikin myenninti Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan agi naŋcin ikiny.
Hay, ɛɛŋo, ‘ya gɔk iti te jyeka wonkɛn gɛɛg bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔkka iti te jyeka bala ikinti te ñamu dokiy. Gena jyeka agi ikin ooncin yɔtin pookɔ oŋkanday.
Kan mena ani Juaŋ awarɛyɛ, ɛkɛ jyek Juaŋ tiidiyɔ oŋkanda. Jyek Juaŋ gɔki agi dala ikin ooncin yɔtin pookɔ. Gena jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te baaṭi neeni, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyeka neeni oŋkanda ɔɔn.

Maka noŋi ma ñingɛn te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala bonk jitin kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋŋi men baan bɛɛ. Kan men gɔki a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena noŋi ma ñingɛn, ɔci ɛkɛ moki a mena yookɔn te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ ne pwadan te waak ɛkkɛ aŋka jyeka laldɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛti neeni aga jyeka budan bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ aŋka ne baaṭi Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ waka pwadin te kanŋa ɛkkɛ.

Kan men gɛɛl loṭi ma te waka loṭi Kiṭɔ ma neeni pookɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ jyeka neeni uottɛtiyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Yeti mena loṭi te gena jyeka loṭi Kiṭɔ ma pookɛnyɛ, Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkɛti, ɔci Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan da bala ɛkɛti moki.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan mena loṭi ma bɛya on iyɛ, ɔci kan jyek ɛkɛ bala ba jyeka loṭi Yaccu ikin bɛɛyɛ, naa i ɛkɛ kaacca on i bɛɛ, ɔci naa i ɛkɛ ñiiba bɛɛ.
Kanŋa mena neeniyɛ, yaayɛ. Kan i ɛkɛ ñiibayɛ, bala ba naŋki ɛkkɛ a naŋka ne cyɛɛlɔ yaakkɔ.
Jiek bala ‘yati kɔɔna kɔɔnno, yeti ‘ya buaga kiewa jyeka neeni waakɛnda bɛɛ. ‘Ya aŋka buaga bɛɛd ban ɛkkɛ, ɔci ikin yɔɔrtin iki i ban ɛkkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin jiɛtin, ɔci jiɛn mila millo.
Kɛɛgin kow ɛkkɛ mena muonɛ Juaŋ bora neeniyɛ, ñiepi i daŋkun. Bawwin.
Mug ɔɔn Gayac, gena ‘ya ciɛggɔn kaniica kiewan worga iti neeni. I a mena ana ‘ya te jyeka bala ikinti a jyeka awarɛ neeniy.
Hay i Gayac mena ana ‘yay, ‘ya baal cɔk te i aŋka Juaŋ i magdi te waak waakɛnda. I yomu pwad pwad Juaŋti, ɔci ‘ya baal cɔk te i aŋka i cied waru ne pwadan daŋkun.
’Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn acaan modg ikin gɛɛg bɛɛn, ɔci ‘ya nɔɔtka ɛkkɛn agi i baalji ciejji ne pwadan te jyeka awarɛ neeni oŋkanda.
Ne ‘ya tieŋda agi kɛɛgin ‘ya balgɔ ciyɔ ne pwadan te jyek Juaŋ oŋkandayɛ, ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan.
Gayac mena ana ‘yay, i baal mok modg ikin maka wɛlg kwoy i te ñamu neeni. Kan i baal mok ma a ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn pwad pwado.
Maka maŋŋi i neeni ɛkkɛn jɔllin ñaalɔ ma kaniica ñomgɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ma nɔɔtkɛ te anna ani i ɛkkɛny. Ne maka neeni jɔŋti ootti bana parɛtiyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn maga ba yoma Juaŋ buagiti.
Maka ati loṭi ma neeniyɛ, ati te yenti Kiṭɔ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn luoṭi waagga te non maka ciyi budan te jyek Juaŋ neeni bɛɛ.
Kan maka ‘uay ati noŋi kanŋa Juaŋ a ɔɔn ba naŋka neeniyɛ, dala ikin Ma Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛn gwaltin ne pwadan. Ne ikin noŋtin a ɔɔn ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ikin ñoowin iki ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ te jyeka awarɛ neeni.
’Ya kiewan jiek ṭɔlgɛn ne ḍiakan ma kaniicati, yeti Dayɔɔtrapac mena buagɔn jyek ɛkɛ jɔɔtti ñamu oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ yookɔn te tieŋŋin jyek ‘ya.

Ɔci ne ‘ya bɛɛdayɛ, ɛkkɛ myettin te naŋki ɛkɛ, acaan ɛkɛ bala wooki ‘ya te kona baaw budan, ɔci gɔki ne yaayan mati te jyek ‘ya. Ɔci gena jyeka neeni pookɛn bɛɛ, jiek gɛɛg bala daŋkun. Acaan ne Ma Kiṭɔ bɛɛti ban ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yookɔn te ɛkkɛn. Ɔci kan ma gɛɛg buagɔn noŋdi ne pwadan Ma Kiṭɔ maka bɛya kaniica ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, Dayɔɔtrapac ɛkkɛn ŋualdɛ bora te kaniicaji doki.

Mena ana ‘yay, kan ma noŋi ne yaayanyɛ, naa i lɔkca naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Kan naŋki ɛkkɛn pwadɔyɛ, dala i lɔkca acaan maka noŋi ne pwadanyɛ, ɛkkɛn a Ma Juaŋo. Yeti mena noŋi ne yaayan oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ Jwaŋa Tolan yuarŋɛ oŋgati bɛɛ.
Dɛmiitriyac yuarcɛ ma ɛkɛ bala noŋi ba jyeka awarɛ, ɔci ma waakɛnda gɔki agi naŋki ɛkta pwadɔ. Ɔci ‘ya daŋkun gɔk ka naŋki ɛkɛ pwad pwado. Ɔci ŋeej i jyeka guagdi ‘yayɛ, a jyeka awarɛ.
Jiek bala ‘yati kɔɔna kɔɔnno, yeti ‘ya buaga kiewa jyeka neeni waakɛnda ne coŋɔn iti bɛɛ.
’Ya buaga bɛɛd ban ɛkkɛ ne cwakanti ɔci ikin jiɛtin ne pwadan iki i dɔki.
Mung ikin wɛnni ñiepi i. Ɔci dala i ñiepca mung ikinti aŋan te ‘ya daŋkun, ɛkkɛn ñiipca iñɔ waakɛnda, menga da te yenti ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da te yenti ɛkɛ te ‘ya daŋkun. Bawwin.
Gena ‘ya Yahuuja mod Yaakubn kiewan worga ɛkkɛti neeni. ‘Ya a kɛɛngɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Jwaŋa Tolan Wey Yaccu Kiṭɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ muonɛ bora. Ɛkɛ ani ɛkkɛ ne tolan. Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala ḍɔci ɛkkɛ.
Dala Juaŋ yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkkɛti ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwadɔ oŋkanda. Ɔci dala ani Juaŋ bala ɛkkɛti ne tolan.

Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya noŋ ɛkkɛ kiegdin worga te jyek yɔɔt Juaŋ yɔɔta yuoci ɛkɛ ikiny. Yeti acaan maka yeyin gɛɛg aŋi ma kaniica lieda ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya buaga ṭey ɛkkɛ te worga neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyek Juaŋ jyeka ikin ‘wontinti ɛkɛ neeni.

Maka yeyin maka aŋi ma kaniica lieda neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala noŋi ba jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ. Ne baaṭi jiek oodɛ Juaŋ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti ba jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te ñamu te ɛkkɛny. Ɔci a ɔɔn yɔmjin, acaan ɛkkɛn gɔki agi Juaŋ yomdan pwadɔ mati, ɔci agi a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ma yaakinti noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan, yomga buagɔn naŋki tomi neeni. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛn gɔki agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ agi Juaŋ bɛɛ, ɔci agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ agi Ciɛggɔn bɛɛ.

Ɔci acca ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jwali gɛɛl. Jwalla neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɛkkɛn koonɛ Juaŋ bora te ban Macor waakɛnda. Ɔci ne baaṭi maka neeni gɛɛg maka jyeti ɛkɛti bɛɛyɛ, noŋŋɛ ɛkɛ.

Ɔci malɛɛkanyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg bala tieci kanŋa ɛkkɛn ñaalɔ pɔliji bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn non ɛkkɛn dalji, ɔci ɛkkɛn olnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan nona ulanti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ciyi waakɛn a ḍɛɛggin te jiŋgin yuonginda ɔɔn ne oŋŋa tolan oŋ godan bɛɛdi ɔɔn.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, bala ba jyek maka ban Caduum ɔci maka ban Gamɔɔra ɔci maka ciyi ɛkkɛn toŋkɛntiy. Maka neeniyɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛn a tommo. Naŋki tomi gɛɛl dalji ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci ywobji Juaŋ bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti doki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala wooci maccu oŋkanda yuonginda ɔɔn. Ɔci Juaŋ buagɔn dala ma poŋdi te ywobja neeni aŋka naa ywobji bɛya ɛkkɛnti daŋkun bɛɛ.

Ɔci maka aŋi ma kaniica amaam neeniyɛ, paŋi ɛkkɛn yaayɛ ne tolan, ɔci naŋki ɛkkɛn yeyɔ daŋkun ba paŋi ɛkkɛn ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn yookɔn te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn lɛɛṭi waka bala ñaalɔ pɔliji ba malɛɛkan ɔɔn.

Malɛɛka tolan gɛɛl bala yenti Maykal. Ɔci ne malɛɛka neeni balki gɔɔki tieki iki Jwaŋa Yaayan te war Muucayɛ, Maykal bala juoli Jwaŋa Yaayan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkti iti ne pɛñan.”
Yeti ‘uaya neeniyɛ, wooki waka bala ñaalɔ waka jitkɛn ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn bɛɛy. Ɛkkɛn poŋi jiek ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi amaam ba leyi ɔɔn. Kan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍakti.

Ywobja bɛya ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɛkɛ ñyɛrcin bɛɛ. Acaan naŋki ɛkkɛn bala ba naŋki kɛɛn. Ɛkkɛn bala poŋi te jyek bilk pookɛn ba Balaam ɔɔn. Ɔci moki ba ywobji Juaŋ ywobja bɛɛn Kɔrati ne ɛkɛ yookiti te jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ wɛɛyi mayɛ, bɛya ɛkkɛnti moki, acaan ɛkkɛn yookɔn te Jwaŋa Tolan ba Kɔra ɔɔn.

Kan ɛkkɛ balgɛ jyeyɛ ne pwadan iidnti te jiɛn modinyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn balayɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛn a lɔɔno. Ɛkkɛn poŋi te mena parɛ gɛɛl bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn poŋi te waak ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan. Ɛkkɛn bala ba pɔɔldin ne balkiti pieg bɛɛy. Ɛkkɛn eedɛ jwami amaamo. Ɔci moki, ɛkkɛn bala ba janga baaki ṭɔlgɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn balki bɛɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn a waka budan, ɔci dɔɔttan ma ɔntɔ iki bɛɛkkɛn ɔɔn.

Naŋki ɛkkɛn yeyɔ. Ɛkkɛn bala ba pɔɔgi pieg galŋa tolanti, acaan pɔɔgi piegyɛ, ɛkkɛn waka yeyin waka ŋooyan ɛɛtan ñaalɔ. Naa ɛkkɛ boottɛ ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ te pɔy Jwaŋa Tolanti ati amaam ba kɛltan nonk ɛkkɛn woodgɛn daljɛy. Maka neeni ati bana maañ doki.

Te kɛɛn Adamti ne kɛɛn Inakti ɔɔnyɛ, kɛɛn Adam a dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ. Inak neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala gɔki te jyek maka neeni daŋkun. Ɛkɛ bala gɔki te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan bala bɛya iki malɛɛkan ɛkɛ malɛɛkan a alpn coŋgin a coŋgin neeni.

Ɛkɛ buagɔn noŋdi godan maka bala ṭɛɛr konɛti baan warda. Ɔci maka yeyinyɛ, jiek oldɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti. Jiek oldɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti te naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin neeni, ɔci te jyeka ḍorki ɛkkɛn Juaŋ neeni.”

Maka yeyin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala wooki waak waakɛnda. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ te genga bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn buagiti ne pɛñan oŋkanday. Ɛkkɛn jieyi waak ɛkkɛn pookɛn. Ɛkkɛn gɔki jyeka milin mati aŋka dala ɛkkɛn ‘wontan ma waka pwadin.
Yeti ɛkkɛ maka ana ‘ya neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyeka guagɛ Cuudan Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔy.
Ɛkkɛn gɔki ɛkkɛti agi, “Ne oŋka bɛya ookti ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ma gɛɛg bɛya, ɔci ɛkkɛn wookti jyek Juaŋo, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋdi naŋka yeyin ba yomg ɛkkɛn buagɔn.”
Maka yeyin neeniyɛ, gena ɛkkɛn kɛɛbi ma jitkɛn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniy, acaan Boŋ Juaŋ bala ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.
Yeti ɛkkɛ maka ana ‘yay, dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ tɛya gɔ moki tɛyin ɔɔn te jyenna pwadan jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te war tɛɛn Boŋ Juaŋo.
Dala ɛkkɛ anɛ Juaŋ oŋkanda bala ba Juaŋ ne ani ɛkkɛ wanna. Naa anna neeni daldɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ kɛɛddɛ oŋŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛ eedɛ ɛkɛ nona ciyɛ ɛkkɛ yuonginday.
Maka paŋi ɛkkɛn ḍuobbinyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn magdɛ ɛkkɛ.
Ɔci maka pookɛn daŋkunyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn magdɛ ɛkkɛ aŋka naa ɛkkɛn ooddi bana maañti bɛɛ. Maka pookɛn maka magdɛ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, naa naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
Juaŋ yaakinti moki ɛkkɛ aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ eedɛ ɛkɛ non ɛkɛ nona galanti neeni. Nɔji ɛkkɛ bala moki bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya ne pɛñan.

Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ parɛ a Juaŋo. Ikin yɔɔññin ɛkɛ te naŋki Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ciɛggɔn ikin neeniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ dɛki galla gali acca ɔci yuonginda ɔɔn! Dala war tɛɛn ɛkɛ bala oŋkanda ɔɔn! Ɔci dala jyek ɛkɛ bala ñamu yuonginda ɔɔn! Amɛɛn.
Liɛlta neeni gena liɛlta ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka lɛɛldɛ ɛkɛ bora maka moṭi ɛkɛti te gena bala bɛya ne pɛñan neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ malɛɛka cuonnɛ aŋka kɛɛngɔn ɛkɛ Yɔhanna nɔɔttɛ,
ɔci Yɔhanna ma myennɛ te jwali Juaŋ ɔci te jwali Yaccu Kiṭɔ te waka yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnday.
Yom ñɔɔn bala mena poki ɔci maka tieŋdi jyeka guaŋŋɛ mena a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan neeni, ɔci pwatcin ne tolan te maka noŋi ba jyeka neeniy.

Gena ‘ya Yɔhanna kiew worga neeni ɛkkɛti maka ban Ecya kaniican ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔtiy. Dala naŋki pwani ɔci coodi pwani bala ɛkkɛti te Jwaŋa Tolan men bala acca, ɔci te baaṭi, ɔc mena bala bɛya neeni, ɔci te boŋka ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ boŋka bala yɔdi Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛ neeni,

ɔci te Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena pwadan mena gɔki awarɛ, mena a Kacca a kɛɛgɔn neeniy. Ɔci ɛkɛ a mena jɔŋŋin ñamu te lienti, ɔci ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn Tolan Ciɛggɔn ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin waakɛnda iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni. Ɛkɛ a mena ani ikin, ɔci ikin pɔŋnin ḍɔɔggɔti te nɔji ikin.

Ɔci ɛkɛ ikin naŋŋin aŋŋin ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin. Ɔci ɛkɛ ikin naŋŋin aŋŋin ba maka gaciicin Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ɛkkɛnti aŋka ikin cɔkin ɛkɛti. Dala naŋka pwadan bala Yaccu Kiṭɔti, ɔci war tɛɛn moki ne baaṭi ɔɔn, baadi bɛɛ! Amɛɛn.
Ɛkɛ bala bɛya te pɔllo! Ɔci ɛkɛ yuartan ma waakɛnda te woŋgɛn, ɔci maka ɛkɛ dɔkki daŋkun, ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ yuartan te woŋgɛn, ɔci maka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji waakɛnda wiakti ne pɛñan. Dala bala a ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.
Ciɛggɔn Ikin Jwaŋa Tolan Mena Balki War Tɛɛn Waakɛnda neeni gɔki agi, “‘Ya a mena bala te ñamu, ɔci ‘ya a mena bala ne ŋoyɔ. ‘Ya a mena bala acca, ɔci te baaṭi, ɔci bala bɛyay.”

Gena ‘ya Yɔhanna mod ɛkkɛ te bolja ‘ya aga mena bootcin Yaccutiy. ‘Ya a mena ñoowɛ iki ɛkkɛ te yom tiekin ikin yomgɔ tieŋnin te taab bɛya maka a ma cyɛgji ɛkɛtiy. ‘Ya baal ḍuacka ma Kaŋ Patmac Wyeñɛti aŋan, acaan ‘ya ma myetkan te jwalla awarɛ jwalla lɛɛlnɛ Yaccu bora ‘yati neeni.
Ɔci ‘ya eñña Boŋ Juaŋ te Oŋ Juaŋ, ɔci ‘ya tieŋjan pwan wiaŋi ne tolan ‘ya ŋoyuti bala ba pwan ṭuoŋ gɔki agi,

“Dala waka yuarca i waakɛnda neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn kiijja jiju worgaji waakɛnda, ɔci cuña i kaniican ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniti. Gena kaniica ban Ɛpacac, ɔci kaniica ban Camiirna, ɔci kaniica ban Pargaamom, ɔci kaniica ban Tayataayra, ɔci kaniica ban Cardic, ɔci kaniica ban Piladɛɛlpya, ɔci kaniica ban Lɛyoduciiya.”
Ɔci ‘ya waru yali aŋka gɔrca pwana gɔkkin ‘yati neeni, ɔci ne ‘ya waru yallayɛ, dyɛkan gɛɛg yuarcan ‘ya bala yɔɔd ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci dyɛkan neeni naŋi ma te dahab.
Ɛkkɛn bala yɔɔd gena bala ba men baan ɔɔn yudiyɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛŋi bworŋa bɔwan bworŋa beyan ooddi ne ɛkɛ ciegɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ ḍyɛŋŋɛ te buarñan naŋi ma te dahab.
Ɔci jyeyi ɛkɛ wyeñɛ bɔɔna bɔɔn bala ba ŋwoltɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ woŋgɛ bala ba maañ lɛmmɛ.
Ɔci ɛkɛ ciegɛ bala ba bila garan ne piɛlkiti ma maccu ɔɔn, ɔci pwan ɛkɛ bala ba pwan pyega coŋin ne yiŋki a ŋañy.
Ɔci ɛkɛ bala tieci kɛltan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ te byeŋa byerɔn, ɔci jwali ɛkɛ kuawin bora te ɛkɛ tukɛti bala ba byeŋgaaran beyan a ñɔɔny. Ɔci woŋgi ɛkɛ bala ba oŋ ne dɛki a dyɛŋi ne pɛñany.
Ɔci ne ‘ya ɛkɛ yuarnayɛ, ‘ya ḍɛmman iñɔ ɛkɛ ciegɛti bala ba ‘ya tuuna tuun doki no, ɔci ɛkɛ byeŋa byerɔn tannɛ ‘yati ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Naa buay bɛɛ! ‘Ya a mena bala te ñamu, ɔci mena bala ne ŋoyɔy.
’Ya a tɛɛta! Ɔci ‘ya tuuno, yeti acca ‘ya tɛɛto, tuud oŋgati moki bɛɛ. Lien bala ‘ya bieŋuti, ɔci non lien moki bala ‘ya bieŋuti.
Ɔci dala waka yuarca i neeni kiijja jiju worgaji waakɛnda, gena waka bɛya ne baaṭiy.
Ɔci kɛltan yuarca i ‘ya bieŋuti neeniyɛ, gena maka bala wɛɛyi ma kaniican ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniti, ɔci dyɛkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, gena kaniican ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔy.

“Dala i kiejja mena bala wɛɛyi ma kaniica ban Ɛpacacti agi, Gena jyeka guagdɛ mena mwoki kɛltan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ te byeŋa a byerɔn neeni, ɔci mena bala ati yeccu dyɛkan a dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ dyɛkan naŋi ma te dahaby.

Naŋki i ŋeej ‘ya, ɔci kanŋa i kanŋa pɛñan ɔci kɛɛna i kɛɛyi moki ŋeej ‘ya. Ɔci ŋeej ‘ya i buagi maka yeyin bɛɛ, ɔci i gɔrni naŋki maka gɔki agi ɛkkɛn aginti cuudan Yaccuy, yeti ɛkkɛn a cuudan Yaccu bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yuarŋi i ɛkkɛn jomi jiek a jomi budan.
I baal kɛɛy ne pwadan, ɔci i taabni ne pɛñan te yenti ‘ya, ɔci i kanŋa dalni bɛɛ.
Yeti ‘ya balka genga aŋka gɔkka iti, i ani i anna ñamu dalni i.
Ɔci dala i poŋja i ḍɛmni aŋɛ, ɔci dala i waru yala, ɔci noŋja ba naŋki i naŋka te baaṭiy. Kan i waru yala bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya baal bɛɛd ɔci dyɛka i eed ɔntɔ te noonɛti.
Yeti naŋka neeni aŋka bala iti, i yooki te naŋki maka bartan ma a ma ‘Nikɔla’ naŋka yookati ‘ya daŋkuny.
Kan mena balki jyetkɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyeka guagdɛ Boŋ Juaŋ ma kaniicanti agi, ‘Mena naŋka yeyin bwandɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘woñga ‘ya omdi jana tɛɛtki ma Bal Jwaŋa Tolanti.’
“Dala i kiejja mena bala wɛɛyi ma kaniica ban Camiirnati agi, Gena jyeka guagdɛ mena bala te ñamu ɔci mena bala ne ŋoyɔy. Ɛkɛ a mena tuuny, yeti ɛkɛ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bala tɛɛti acca.

Taab i ŋeej ‘ya, ɔci bɔɔna i bɔwi te waak moki ŋeej ‘ya, yeti i a mena cyɛgan te wak Jwaŋa Tolan! Ɔci ŋɛɛgga ḍorki ma yeyin neeniyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya moki, gena maka gɔki agi ɛkkɛn aginti Ma Yahuud, yeti ɛkkɛn a Ma Yahuud bɛɛ! Ɛkkɛn a ma Jwaŋa Yaayan!

Naa i buay naŋka bɛya iti pɛñan neeni bɛɛ! Yeti ɛkkɛ magga oldɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan jiju ciginji aŋka ɛkɛ poci ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ taabdɛ ba nink ne inyaakkɛn ɔɔn. Dala i yomu pwada ne i tuudi ɔɔn, ɔci ‘ya i ‘wondin tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛy.
Kan mena balki jyetkɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyeka guagdɛ Boŋ Juaŋ ma kaniicanti agi, ‘Kan mena naŋka yeyin neeni bwandɛ waakɛndayɛ, jyeka bɛya ma wyetkɛnti ne ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, bɛya ɛkɛ wyeñɛti moki bɛɛ.’
“Dala i kiejja mena bala wɛɛyi ma kaniica ban Pargaamomti agi, Gena jyeka guagdɛ mena jwali ɛkɛ bala ba byeŋgaaran beyan byeŋgaaran lɛkɛ a ñɔdgy.

Nona ciyi i ŋeej ‘ya, non cyɛgji Jwaŋa Yaayan bala nona wannatiy, yeti i baal tiec yenti ‘ya awarɛ, ɔci jyenna jyetti i ‘yati ɛkɛ dalni i bɛɛ. Antipac mena pwadan neeni nogɛ ma nona ciyi Jwaŋa Yaayan bana ciyi wanna.

Yeti ‘ya balka genga aŋka gɔkka iti, acaan ma gɛɛg bala ɛkkɛti noŋi naŋki Balaam naŋka loṭi ɛkɛ Baalak aŋka Baalak noŋdɔ ne yaayan ma Icrayiilti aŋka ma Icrayiil noŋdɔ nɔjiy. Ɔci moki aŋka ɛkki omdɔ waka ‘yɛrtan ma boŋka yeyinti, ɔci noŋdi tommo.
Ɔci i balki maka bootcin naŋki ma Nikɔla maka yookati ‘yay.
Yeti dala i waru yala, ɔci kan i waru yalli ne pɛñan bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya baal bɛɛd ne cwakanti aŋka noowin i ɛkkɛn te jwali ‘ya jwalla bala ba byeŋgaaran neeni.

Kan mena balki jyetkɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyeka guagdɛ Boŋ Juaŋ ma kaniicanti agi, ‘Kan mena naŋka yeyin bwandɛ waakɛndayɛ, ɛkɛ ‘woñga ‘ya ama ñaalɔ pɔliji ama yuartan ma bɛɛy, ɔci ɛkɛ ‘woñga ‘ya guonan ṭɔɔlɛ bɔwan, ɔci guonan neeni balki yenti warɛti, ɔci yenta neeni menga yaakinti poki bɛɛ, gena mena eci ɛkɛ aŋka yaakinti paŋi ɛkɛ parɛ.’
“Dala i kiejja mena bala wɛɛyi ma kaniica ban Tayataayrati agi, Gena jyeka guagdɛ Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan mena woŋgi ɛkɛ bala ba maañ ne omi a ami, ɔci cieg ɛkɛ bala ba bila garan ne piɛlkiti ma maccuy.
Naŋki i ŋeej ‘ya, ɔci ŋeej ‘ya moki ne i balkiti ani ɔci jyeni ɔci naŋka pwadin, ɔci ne i baali kɛɛy moki ɔɔn. Ɔci ŋeej ‘ya naŋki i naŋka ñamu buannɛ naŋka ŋoyɔ.

Yeti ‘ya balka genga aŋka gɔkka iti, i Jɛcabɛl ɛŋa gɔki agi ɛkɛ agjɛ bɔwa neeni ‘wonni wɔɔka ɔci ɛkɛ maka moṭi ‘yati naŋŋiyɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn lallɛ agi dala ɛkki noŋdɔ tomi, ɔci omdɔ waka ‘yɛrdi ma jɔkin yeyinti.
Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘woñgan ‘ya wɔɔka ka aŋka ɛkɛ warɛ yaldɛ, yeti ɛkɛ yookɔn buagɔn warɛ yaldɛ tomi ɛkɛ neeni daldɛ bɛɛ.

Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ yiɛpca ‘ya iñɔ, ɔci ‘woñga waka pɛñin warɛti, ɔci maka noŋi tomi neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yiɛpca nona yaayan nona pɛñanti neeni, kan ɛkkɛn waakɛn yaltan te naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yaayan neeni bɛɛy.
Ɔci ‘ya kɛɛgin ɛkɛ nogdi aŋka ŋeettan kaniican waakɛnda ‘ya a mena waak waakɛnda yuartɛ, ɔci yomg ma moki yuarca ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ waakida ‘wondin ‘ya waak menga da ba naŋki ɛkɛ.

Yeti ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ɔci maka pookɛn maka bala ban Tayataayra, maka balki jyeka neeni bɛɛy, ɔci maka Jwaŋa Yaayan ŋeecɔn bɛɛy. Ɛkkɛ urnɛti waka bartan ɛkkɛn agi wak Jwaŋa Yaayan waka kuolinwi ma neeni bɛɛ. ‘Ya waka cyɛgan gɛɛg olja ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti moki bɛɛ.
Yeti dala gena bala ɛkkɛti neeni tiidɛyɔ ɛkkɛ ne ‘ya bɛɛda ɔɔn.
Ɔci mena naŋka yeyin bwandɛ, ɔci naŋki ‘ya tiidɛyɔ ne baaṭi ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya da ɛkɛ ‘woñga wɛɛn warda bieŋɛti.
Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn bwandɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn lɛgdɛ jitin bala ba waka eetan ma te lomi ne ɛkkɛn wɛttiti ma jitiny. A ɔɔn bala ba war tɛɛn muŋi ‘ya te Wey ɔɔntiy.
Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘woñga ‘ya war ‘ya, wara bala ba kɛɛlla bɛya te liidɔy.
Kan mena balki jyetkɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyeka guagdɛ Boŋ Juaŋ ma kaniicantiy.

“Dala i kiejja mena bala wɛɛyi ma kaniica ban Cardicti agi, Gena jyeka guagdɛ mena balki boŋki Jwaŋa Tolan boŋka ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci kɛltan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniy. Naŋki i ŋeej ‘ya. I tɛɛt te yenti budan, yeti i ag tuuta.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala i ṭiewwa, ɔci dala i waka bala iti tɛɛti neeni yɔɔtca iñɔ ne tɛyan wona lien bɛɛni ɛkkɛnti men bɛɛy. Ɔci moki ‘ya naŋka awarɛ gɛɛl yuarŋ ‘ya iti Juaŋ ñamɛti bɛɛ.
Ɔci dala i poŋja te gena lalli iy, ɔci ɛkɛ muŋŋi i a ɔki, ɔci dala ɛkɛ naŋa i, ɔci dala i waru yala nɔji dalja. Kan i winniyɛ, ‘ya baal bɛɛd ba mena ɛɛno, oŋ waŋa bɛɛda ‘ya ne pɛñan neeni ŋeej i bɛɛ.
Yeti ma gɛɛg bala iti ban Cardic aŋan, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn cuuliyɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci ne oŋgati ɛkkɛn ooddin iki ‘ya te yoma bɔwan te yɔmjin ɛkkɛn yɔmki neeni.

Maka naŋka yeyin bwantanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛɛŋdi bworŋin bɔwan, ɔci ‘ya yeng ɛkkɛn nuutca bora te worga kiewi Juaŋ yeng maka ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ tɛɛtinti neeni bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya gɔkca Wey ɔɔnti ɔci malɛɛkan ɛkɛti te maka neeni, ka maka neeni ɛkkɛn a ma ‘ya.
Kan mena balki jyetkɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyeka guagdɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ma kaniicantiy!

“Dala i kiejja mena bala wɛɛyi ma kaniica ban Piladɛɛlpyati agi, Gena jyeka guagdɛ mena pwadan ɔci mena awarɛy. Ɛkɛ a mena mwoki waka bɛɛn te Daawudtiy. Ɛkɛ a mena balkɛ war tɛɛn aŋka ma kaattɛ Ban Juaŋ ñaalɔ pɔliji, walla ma kaaktɛti aŋka naa ɛkkɛn kaatti ban Juaŋ bɛɛy.
Naŋka naŋa i wanna ŋeej ‘ya. ‘Ya pɔy tukɛ pɔkkan te kanŋa iti kanŋa neeni menga yaakinti ɛkɛ uuldɛti bɛɛ. War koñi i ŋeej ‘ya, yeti i jwali ‘ya tiiññiyɔ, ɔci yenti ‘ya yiɛmni i ɔntɔ bɛɛ.
Ɔci ne oŋgati ma Jwaŋa Yaayan maka gɔki agi ɛkkɛn aginti Ma Yahuud, ɔci ɛkkɛn jomi jiek neeniyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn naŋdi bɛya, ɔci ḍwondi iñɔ i ñamuti, ɔci ŋeettan ɛkkɛn ‘ya an i awarɛ.
Ɔci acaan i baal kɛɛy ba jwalla guaŋi ‘ya itiyɛ, ‘ya i tiidinyɔ ne oŋŋa naŋka yaayan bɛɛdi iñɔ maka bala ciyi ṭɛra neeni wyeñɛtiy.
’Ya baal bɛɛd ne cwakanti doki, ɔci dala gena bala iti neeni tiyayɔ aŋka naa waka ‘ya buaga ‘wondin i pwadin neeni luldi menga bɛɛ.

Mena naŋka yeyin bwandɛyɛ, ɛkɛ naŋdi ‘ya tɛya a tɛɛn non Juaŋ ɔci ɛkɛ koodi bora te ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Ɔci ‘ya yenti Jwaŋ ‘ya kiija ɛkɛti, ɔci yenti ban Jwaŋ ‘ya moki kiija ɛkɛti. Gen ban Urcaliim woonɛ bana bɛɛn te ñaalɔ Juaŋtiy. Ɔci ‘ya moki yenti ‘ya kiija ɛkɛti.
Kan mena balki jyetkɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyeka guagdɛ Boŋ Juaŋ ma kaniicantiy!
“Ɔci dala i kiejja mena bala wɛɛyi ma kaniica ban Lɛyoduciiyati agi, Gena jyeka guagdɛ mena pwadan neeni, ɛkɛ a mena waak cɔnnɛ Juaŋ waakɛnda te ɛkɛy.
Naŋki i ŋeej ‘ya, ɔci moki ŋeej ‘ya i luy bɛɛ ɔci i myɛl bɛɛ. Ɔci dala te i luuni walla te myɛlli.
Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya i ŋuuldin ɔntɔ te ‘ya tukuti te poli i neeni. Dala te i myɛlli walla luuni.
I gɔk waruti agi, ‘‘Ya cyɛgo, ‘ya buaga genga moki bɛɛ.’ Yeti war i ŋeej ne i agi mena baaki waak bɛɛ, ɔci moki ŋeej i ne i agi ulli ɔci baakiti waka ‘yɛŋa i bɛɛy.

’Ya gɔkka iti, dala i toocca ‘yati te waka ñaalɔ pɔliji aŋka i agdi mena cyɛgan awarɛ. Ɔci i ɛɛŋja bworŋin bɔwan aŋka lɔn i kwomgayɔ, ɔci dala toocca ‘yati te dowa juoki ma woŋgɛn aŋka i woŋgɔ jwoya te ɛkɛ aŋka i ñorca noon ne pwadan.
’Ya gɔkca ne pɛñan mena ana ‘yati, ɔci ɛkɛ ṭeed ‘ya, ɔci dala i byerdi ɔci waru yala nɔji i dalja.
Gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya baal yɔɔd on tukɛti ɔci booro, ɔci kan menga tieŋŋin pwan ‘ya ɔci on tukɛ pɔŋŋɛyɛ, ‘ya kaacca orɔ ɛkɛti, ɔci ɔɔn omdɔn yaakkɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ da omdin i ‘ya.
Mena naŋka yeyin bwandɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘woñga ‘ya noon cootti ‘ya taaŋuti aŋka ɛkɛ noŋin iki ‘ya kanŋa cyɛgji Juaŋo, ba ‘ya ne naŋka neeni buannayɛ, ‘ya cooccan Wey ɔɔn taaŋɛti.
Kan mena balki jyetkɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyeka guagdɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ma kaniicantiy!”
Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan ‘yeŋi tukɛ warɛ pɔŋŋɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan pwan gɔkkin ‘yati bala ba pwan ṭuoŋ gɔki agi, “Bɛɛd wɛnni aŋka i nɔttin gena bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeni.”
Ɔci ne pɛñan ‘ya eñña Boŋ Juaŋ, ɔci kaakci gɛɛl bala ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci men gɛɛl bala ciyi kaakca neeni wyeñɛti.
Ɔci mena ciyi kaakciti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ dɛki galdan ne tidan bala ba liŋñan a ḍɔŋi warɛ a cyenga tidan, ɔci cyenga ṭeyan. Ɔci Jwaŋa yɔɔd ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni bala yɔɔd dɛki ne ṭeyan ɛkɛ warɛti.

Ɔci kaakca neeni warɛti kokin pookɛn bala ɛkɛ yuugɛ ñin a men baan wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (24), ɔci kokin neeni wyetkɛnti maka cyekin bala ciyi a men baan wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (24) ɛŋi bworŋin bɔwan, ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛŋi taaggan cyɛgji naŋi ma te dahab wyetkɛnti.

Ɔci kaakca neeni wildan, ɔci pwan bala wiak te ɛkɛti ne pɛñan, ɔci dyɛkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ bala yɔɔd dɛki a dyɛŋi ɛkɛ ñamɛti. Ɔci dyɛkan neeni gena boŋki Jwaŋa Tolan boŋka ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔy.
Ɔci puol bala yɔɔd kaakci ñamɛti wyeñɛ poorŋɛ a porti bala ba kajaaja. Ɔci nona kaakciti wannayɛ, waka tɛɛti gɛɛg bala yɔɔd ne ŋaanɔ kaakci yudiyɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn kɔɔna kɔɔnno, woŋga pookɛn ŋoyɔ.
Ɔci gena ñamu bala ba loono, ɔci ɛka akki yyɛɛwɔ bala ba yaan ṭɔɔlɛ, ɔci ɛka akki ḍoogɔ bala ba men baano, ɔci ɛka akki ŋaanɔ bala ba yan goow tolan peyi ñaalɔy.

Ɔci waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti peyi noon warda, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti noon yuartan warda, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala jieyi Juaŋ woodi bɛɛ, ween jiñɛ ɔci oŋ konɛ. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Pwatcin, pwatcin, pwatcin Ciɛggɔn ɔci Jwaŋa yaakinti Naŋki Waak Waakɛnday, ɛkɛ bala te baaṭi, ɔci acca, ɔci ɛkɛ bɛya moki.”
Ɔci waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ neeni, ne balki jieki mena ciyi te kaakci, mena balki tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni ne pwadanyɛ,

cyekin a men baan wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (24) neeni, ḍɛɛmdin ñingɛn kuomjɛ iñɔ mena ciyi te kaakci ñamɛti, ɔci morcin mena ciyi tɛɛti yuongindatiy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn taaggan cyɛgji ɛkkɛn guoddɛ bora. Ɔci yiɛpcɛ iñɔ kaakci ñamɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi,
“Hay, Ciɛggɔn ɔɔn ɔci Jwaŋ ɔɔn. I yɔmni aŋka dala pwani, ɔci jied, ɔci war tɛɛn bala iti. Gena i cɔtti waak waakɛnday, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ba naŋka naŋŋi i ba yom iy.”

Ɔci ‘ya worga yuarcan bala tiidɛ mena ciyi te kaakci neeni bieŋɛti byeŋa a byerɔn. Ɔci worga neeni kiikan bala konɛti ɔci ŋoyɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ balkɛ jitkɛ ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci jiña ne cyɛɛlɔ da marciti ma te waka moorki ma waaky.
Ɔci malɛɛka warɛ tɛyan gɛɛl yuarcan ‘ya, ɔci ɛkɛ bala boor te pwana tolan agi, “A menɛ yaakinti waka marci ma ɛkɛti neeni puattɛ ɔntɔ ɔci worga neeni pɔgdɛy?”

Ɔci menga ne cyɛɛlɔ yaakinti waka bala marci ma worgati neeni pɔɔnnɛ bora bɛɛ, worga neeni pɔŋŋɛ menga bɛɛ. Gena maka bala ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci maka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji, ɛkkɛn gɛɛl yaaŋnɛti naŋka neeni naŋŋɛ aŋka ɛkɛ gɔrti waka bala jiju neeni bɛɛ.
Ɔci ‘ya baal wiak ne tolan acaan menga bala yaakinti worga neeni pɔgdɛ aŋka jyeka bala jiju neeni pagdɛ, ɔci walla gɔrti worgati bɛɛ.

Ɔci mena ciɛggɔn gɛɛl gɔkkin ‘yati agi, “Naa wiak bɛɛ, acaan Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena bartan ma a jiɛl bɛɛn te kɛɛn Yahuujati ɔci ma Daawudti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti waka marci ma worgati ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, pɔɔktɛ ɔntɔ waakɛnda ɔci worga neeni pɔgdɛ.”

Ɔci Kalŋ yuarcan ‘ya bala yɔɔd yiika cyekin i waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ba ŋaarkiti ma a ŋarti ɔɔn. Ɔci Kalŋa neeni balki woŋgɛ ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci ṭwoŋkɛ ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɛkɛ noon yuartɛ warda awarɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ tɛɛcin awarɛ. Ɔci waka neeni gena boŋki Jwaŋa Tolan boŋka cuonnɛ ɛkɛ iñɔ ṭɛɛr konɛ warday.
Ɔci Kalŋa neeni bɛɛn ɔci worga luullɛ te Mena ciyi te kaakci neeni bieŋɛti byeŋa a byerɔn.

Ɔci ne ɛkɛ worga luullɛyɛ, waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ, ɔci cyekin a men baan wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (24) neeni ḍɛɛmdin ñingɛn kuomjɛ iñɔ Kalŋa neeni ñamɛti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda balki coŋkɔn byeŋkɛnti, ɔci paltan ṭɔlgɛn naŋi ma te dahab, ɔci waka neeni kuomgɛ ɛkkɛn te ḍɔŋi poomo. Ɔci ḍɔka ṭultan ma neeni gena cɔŋi maka jyeti Juaŋtiy.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ‘uali ɔɔlla woonɛ gɔki agi, “Te lyen iyɛ, ma waakɛnda keedin jitkɛn waakɛnda magga da te tuk ɛkkɛn ɔci ma da te ban ɛkkɛn wanni i te yimg i neeni. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, i yɔmni aŋka worga lula ɔci pɔga.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn naŋŋi i aŋi ḍuaŋan ɔci gaciicin Juaŋti ɔci ɛkkɛn aga ḍuaŋan ṭɛra neeni ne cwakanti.”
Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan, ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan pwan malɛɛkan a alpn coŋgin a coŋgin. Ɛkkɛn bala yɔdi kaakci yuugiyɔ i waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ ɔci cyekin.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ‘uali te pwana tolan agi, “Kalŋa ŋaarɛ ma neeni ɛkɛ yɔmjin aŋka dala war tɛɛn bala ɛkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkɛ aga mena cyɛgan, ɔci dala ñing tɛɛn bala ɛkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkɛ tɛya a tɛɛn, ɔci dala ma jieyi ɛkɛ!”

Ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan waka cɔnnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ pɔliji ɔci iñɔ ṭɛɛrjiy, ɔci waka bala toolji baan konɛ warda ‘uali agi, “Mena ciyi te kaakci neeni, naŋka pwadan bala ɛkɛti ɔci Kalŋti, ɔci war tɛɛn moki yuonginda baadi bɛɛ.”
Ɔci waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ gɔkcin agi, “Amɛɛn!” Ɔci cyekin ḍɛɛmdin ñingɛn kuomjɛ iñɔ morcin ɛkɛti.

Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan Kalŋ waka marci ma worgati ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni gɛɛl pɔɔnnɛ bora, ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ neeni gɛɛl gɔkcin, ɔci pwan ɛkɛ bala ba ñaal ne wiagi a joony. Ɛkɛ gɔkcin mena taab muntanti neeni agi, “Bɛɛdi!”
Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan ɔci muntan bɔwan gɛɛl bɛɛni, ɔci mena taab ɛkɛti eci kay bieŋɛti, ɔci ɛŋi taagga bɔnnin, ɔci kaaccin bora aŋka ma bwandɛ.
Ɔci ne gena akki yyɛɛwɔ pɔɔnnɛ bora Kalŋyɛ, ‘ya tieŋŋan gena tɛɛti akki yyɛɛwɔ gɔki agi, “Bɛɛdi!”
Ɔci muntan tidan bɛɛn bora, ɔci mena taab ɛkɛti balki war tɛɛn aŋka naŋka pwadin eedɛ ɛkɛ te ṭɛɛr wyeñɛti, ɔci ma noogdi ɔci tuwa, ɔci ɛkɛ ‘woñgi ma byeŋgaaran beyan byeŋgaaran tolan.

Ɔci ne gena akki ḍoogɔ ne pɔŋŋɛ Kalŋyɛ, ‘ya tieŋŋan gena tɛɛti akki makɛn ne ḍoogɔ gɔki agi, “Bɛɛdi!” Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan, ɔci muntan ulan bɛɛni, ɔci mena taab ɛkɛti neeni eci cyerñi bieŋɛti (Gena kɛɛrki ma waak aŋka waak ninti a tyɛlgay.)

Ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan pwan te yeccu waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ neeniti gɔki agi, “Cigga pok tuka ne cyɛɛlɔ eci bilk kanŋa oŋ kona ne cyɛɛlɔ waakɛnda, ɔci cigga pokkin tuggɛ ne ḍoogɔ eci bilk kanŋa oŋ kona ne cyɛɛlɔ waakɛnda. Yeti ñɔɔn ɔci mooy naa ɛkkɛn naŋa a ɔŋka bɛɛ.”
Ɔci ne gena akki ŋaanɔ ne pɔɔnnɛ Kalŋ borayɛ, ‘ya tieŋŋan gena tɛɛti akki makɛn ne ŋaanɔ gɔki agi, “Bɛɛdi!”

Ɔci ne ‘ya gɔrnayɛ, muntan ṭeyan yuarcan ‘ya, ɔci mena taab ɛkɛti neeni yenti Lieno, ɔci Non Lien bala booti ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘woñgi ma war tɛɛn aŋka ɛkkɛn ṭɛɛr taaŋɛ gɛɛl noktan te byeŋgaaran ɔci ṭwaŋ, ɔci koñ, ɔci waja, ɔci wak luom waka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniy.

Ɔci ne gena akki dɔɔyɔ ne pɔɔnnɛ Kalŋ borayɛ, ‘ya gɔrcan ɔci gena ɛrki ma waak pwanɛtiyɛ, boŋki maka tuutan gɛɛg bala nini, gena maka ŋaarɛ ma te bolja ɛkkɛn jyetki jwali Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci te jyeka lorki ɛkkɛn may.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaajjin te pwana tolan agi, “Ne tuwa, hay, Ciɛggɔn, Ciɛggɔn pwadan awarɛ ɔci balki war tɛɛny! I jiek olja maka bala ciyi iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni wyetkɛnti ɔci noŋja ne yaayan ɛkkɛnti aŋka yimg ɔɔn dɔwwa i bora bɛɛ?”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ‘wonnɛ Ciɛggɔn bworŋin bɔwan, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi ɛkki woodɔ ne ḍiɛran ne modg ɛkkɛn Ma Kiṭɔ makɛn noktiti ma ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan Kalŋ gena akki dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ pɔŋnɛ bora, ɔci noon warɛ Jiɛññɛ ne tolan, ɔci oŋ waŋɛ uli bala ba bworŋa ulan, ɔci paan tinna tini ba yimgo.
Ɔci kɛltan bala ñaalɔ ḍɛɛmdin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji bala ba ŋuami ṭɔlgɛ ne Jiɛññɛyɔ jwamma tolan ɔɔn.
Ɔci pɔli tukɛ pɔŋnɛ bala ba gaan ne wiñkiti ma ne beyany, ɔci pomk ɔci kaki wyetkɛn waakɛnda waakɛn uutci ɔntɔ te nonkɛnti.

Ɔci ḍuaŋan ṭɛɛrji wɛnni, ɔci maka ḍwaŋin ɔci maka ñingɛn tɛyan, ɔci maka cyɛgan ɔci ‘uay ṭwaŋ ɔci maka kɛɛnk ɔci maka a kɛɛnk bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda yooŋdi kɔki jitin, ɔci waakɛn yiiktan pomk jitin.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti pomkti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ ɔɔn wyetkɔti aŋka ɔɔn kwomdintiyɔ te woŋgi mena ciyi te kaakci neeni, ɔci te loñk Kalŋo!
Oŋ loñk ɛkɛ oŋŋa tolan bɛɛn doki, ɔci a menɛ yaakinti yɔɔtti iñɔy?”

Ɔci ne naŋka neeni baaniyɛ, malɛɛkan ne ŋaanɔ bala yɔɔd ṭɛɛr toŋka ne ŋaanɔ neeniti, ɔci ɛkkɛn jwamtan bala ṭɛɛrji ne ŋaanɔ neeni muogɛyɔ aŋka naa ɛkkɛn yiŋi ṭɛɛrji moki bɛɛ, kan bora, walla galŋji, walla jang jitin moki bɛɛ.

Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan malɛɛka gɛɛl bala bɛya te pɔya tyɛrñanti aŋan eci mañ Jwaŋa Tolan mena tɛɛti neeni bieŋɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin malɛɛkan ne ŋaanɔ malɛɛkan ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ war tɛɛnti aŋka noŋdi ne yaayan nona iwanti, ɔci galŋji, ɔci jangti neeni te pwana tolan.
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne yaayan nona iwanti, ɔci toolji, ɔci jangti meni bɛɛ, yɔɔddɛ lakun ɔɔn maka moṭi Jwaŋa Tolanti noŋdɔn maañ ñomgɛnti lakun waakɛnda.”

Ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan maka naŋi ma te mañ Jwaŋa Tolan ñomgɛnti kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Ɛkkɛn a alpn a miyya ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci alpn a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (144,000), gena keedin ma Icrayiil waakɛnda, kɛɛna ne cyɛɛlɔ balki ma a alpn ne inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ (12,000). Ɔci keedin neeni jitk ɛkkɛn bala a ɔŋŋi, Kɛɛn Yahuuja, Kɛɛn Ḍubɛn, Kɛɛn Gaad, Kɛɛn Acar, Kɛɛn Naptali, Kɛɛn Manaaca, Kɛɛn Cimyan, Kɛɛn Laawi, Kɛɛn Icikar, Kɛɛn Jɛbuluun, Kɛɛn Yuocip, Kɛɛn Benjamin.

Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan, ɔci poli ma polla tolan yuarcan ‘ya, ɔci maka neeni menga yaakinti ɛkkɛn pagdɛ bɛɛ. Keedin pookɛn, ɔci bonk waakɛnda, ɔci maka coŋin magga da te tuk ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala yɔɔd kaakci Ciɛggɔn Tolan ñamɛti, malɛɛkan coŋin neeni ŋotkɛnti, ɔci Kalŋ ñamɛti daŋkun. Ɛkkɛn ɛŋi bworŋin bɔwan ɔci eci tuum jyetkɛ byeŋkɛnti.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala yaadan te pwana tolan agi, “Yɔɔt bala Jwaŋ ikin Jwaŋa ciyi te kaakci neenitiy, ɔci bala Kalŋti daŋkun!”
Ɔci malɛɛkan bala yɔɔd kaakci yudiyɔ, ɔci cyekin, ɔci waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ neeni yudiyɔ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmdin ñingɛn kuomjɛ iñɔ ɔci morcin Juaŋti.

Ɔci gɔki agi, “Amɛɛn! Dala bala a ɔɔn. Dala jied, ɔci pwani, ɔci ñing tɛɛn bala ɛkɛti, ɔci dala ma gɔkti a pwatcin ɛkɛti, ɔci dala ma noŋdi ne pwadan ɛkɛti, ɔci dala war tɛɛn bala Jwaŋ ikinti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn!”
Ɔci maka cyekin neeni gɛɛl tooccin ‘yati agi, “A makɛ ɛŋi bworŋin bɔwan wannay? Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛɛn te aŋɛ?”
Ɔci ‘ya ṭwokcan ɛkɛti agi, “Çeej ‘ya bɛɛ. Çeej i, Ciɛggɔn.” Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkkin ‘yati agi, “Maka neeniyɛ, gena maka uni te taab tolantiy, bworŋin ɛkkɛn tuogɛ te yimg Kalŋo, ɔci ɛkkɛn bɔɔna bɔɔno.
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala kaakci Juaŋ ñamɛti orɔ on Juaŋ ñaalɔ moṭi ɛkɛti te oŋ konɛ, ɔci te ween konɛ. Ɔci mena ciyi te kaakci neeni ɛkkɛn kɛɛdiyɔ.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn amdɛ koñ bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn amdɛ yiɛn bɛɛ, ɔci oŋ ɛkkɛn amdɛ bɛɛ, walla nona myɛlan gɛɛl bɛɛ.
Acaan Kalŋa bala yeccu kaakciti neeniyɛ, a ḍɛɛnin ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn wɛɛdɛ nona balki pyega tɛɛtki ma, ɔci Juaŋ ɛkkɛn puudɛ ñingɛnti te pieg waakɛnda.”
Ɔci ne waka marci ma worgati ne ɛka akki dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ ne pɔɔnnɛ bora Kalŋyɛ, waka bala pɔliji coon lieda waakɛnda, genga warɛ jaŋŋɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ, bala ba oŋ ḍulnɛ ɔɔn.
Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan, ɔci malɛɛkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni yuarcan ‘ya bala yɔɔd Juaŋ ñamɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ ṭwoŋki byeŋkɛnti waakɛnda.

Ɔci malɛɛka gɛɛl yuarcan ‘ya moki, ɔci ɛkɛ eci gena ṭuorki ma maañ bieŋɛti, gena neeni naŋi ma te dahab, ɔci ɛkɛ yɔɔtcin gena ɛrki ma waak wyeñɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘woñgi ma ḍɔŋi poom ne tolan aŋka ṭuuldɛ ɛkɛ maccu iki cɔŋi ma Juaŋ maka pwadin neeni gena ɛrki ma waak wyeñɛti, Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti.
Ɔci jien ati ñaalɔ iki cɔŋi ma Juaŋ maka pwadin neeni te byeŋ malɛɛka Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti.

Ɔci moki malɛɛka gena ṭuorki ma jien luullɛ, ɔci kuomnɛ te maañ nona ɛrki ma waak neeni, ɔci yiɛmnɛ iñɔ ṭɛɛrji, ɔci pwan bala wiak ne pɛñan, ɔci noon wildan ne tolan, ɔci ṭɛɛr warɛ ḍiedan ne tolan.
Ɔci malɛɛkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni waakɛn ywaŋɛ aŋka kuotti ṭwoŋko, gena ṭwoŋka ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni.

Ɔci ne malɛɛka ñamu kuonni ṭwoŋ ɛkɛyɛ, ɔci tomŋin ɔci maañ ḍɛɛmdin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn a yimgo, ɔci ṭɛɛr taaŋɛ gɛɛl ammɛ maaño, ɔci jang taaŋɛn gɛɛl ammɛ maaño, ɔci lwomk waakɛnda ammɛ maañ iki lwomka ṭeyan.
Ɔci malɛɛka akki ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni kuotcin ṭwoŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci gen gɛɛl ḍɛmmin te ñaalɔ ḍɛmmin galŋji bala ba poma tolan, ɔci bala koldan ne tolan, ɔci galŋ konɛ taaŋɛ gɛɛl aŋi yimgo.
Ɔci waka cɔnnɛ Juaŋ ciyi galŋji gɛɛg tuuni, ɔci murkan ati galŋji a murkan ḍwaŋin gɛɛg lɛɛktin jitin.
Ɔci malɛɛka akki ne ḍoogɔ kuotcin ṭwoŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci kɛɛlla tolan gɛɛl ḍɛmmin te ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci ɛkɛ dɛki bala ba maañ lɛmmɛ ne koldi a koldin. Ɛkɛ ḍɛmmin toolji wɔɔrg gɛɛg woŋgɛnti.
(Ɔci kɛɛlla neeni yenti “Jana Cyɛyan.”) Ɔci ɛkɛ pieg naŋŋɛ cyɛñña cyɛñño. Ɔci maka moti pyega neeniyɛ, ma gɛɛg tuun ne coŋɔn te cyɛñi piego.
Ɔci malɛɛka akki ne ŋaanɔ kuotcin ṭwoŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci oŋ waŋɛ ɔci paan ɔci kɛltan monnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka naa ɛkkɛn dɛki ne tolan moki bɛɛ, ɔci oŋ konɛ ɔci ween konɛ ɛkkɛn yaakinti dɛkti ne tolan moki bɛɛ.

Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan, ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan yan goow tolan gɛɛl bala peyi yeccu ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki te pwana tolan agi, “Ywobjo! Ywobjo! Ywobji bala bɛya maka ciyi iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniti ne malɛɛkan ne ḍoogɔ neeni kuotti ṭwoŋki ɛkkɛny!”
Ɔci malɛɛka akki dɔɔyɔ kuotcin ṭwoŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan gen gɛɛl bala ba kɛɛli ḍɛmmin te ñaalɔ pɔliji ḍɛmmin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘woñgi ma mɔpta kola beyan.
Ɔci kɛɛlla neeni kola beyan pɔŋŋɛ tukɛti, ɔci jien bɛɛn bora ne tolan bala ba jien ḍwoŋa tolany. Ɔci pɔli konɛ kuumi te jien koolo, ɔci oŋ waŋɛ moki aŋi mielo.
Ɔci ṭooŋgi wɔɔwwin bora te jienti ɔci ṭɛɛr wyeñɛ kuumi warda, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ menga war tɛɛn bala ba war tɛɛn jiidga bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniy.
Ɔci menga gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Naa i jang ɔci lwomk ɔci waka ṭeyan iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni gɛɛl naŋa ɔŋka bɛɛ. A’a, gena maka baaki mañ Jwaŋa Tolan ñomgɛnti aŋka kootan ṭooŋgi pookɛny.”
Ɔci ɛkkɛn noktan bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn ñaktanji waak te kood ponk ne dɔɔyɔ. Ɔci ṭooŋga neeni tuggɛn bala ba jiidg te pɛñño.
Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ma bwagdɛ lieno, yeti lien kwaya te ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn kɛɛdi agi dala ɛkkɛn tuudintɛ, yeti lien kwaya te ɛkkɛnti.
Ɔci ṭooŋga neeni bala ba muntan ne ɛɛŋkiti ma wak ṭwaŋy. Ɔci waka bala ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti bala ba taaggan cyɛgji taaggan naŋi ma te dahab, ɔci ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn bala ba woŋgi ma baano.
Ɔci jyeyi ɛkkɛn bala ba jyeyi maka moongo, ɔci ɛkkɛn lɛkɛn bala ba jiɛl gɔrŋgɛ.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn jɔtkɛn bala ba kɔɔrjin naŋi ma te bily, ɔci ɛkkɛn kɔggɛn wiak bala ba babin wuatan muntan ne atki ootti ṭwaŋtiy.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn wilkɛn balki kuwi bala ba kun jiin ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkkɛn balki war tɛɛn aŋka noŋdi ne yaayan mati ponk ne dɔɔyɔ.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn balkɔn ḍuaŋa ɛkkɛn, gena men Jwaŋa Yaayan mena mwoki kola beyan, ɔci ɛkɛ yenti Abaadon te tuk Ma Icrayiil, ɔci ɛkɛ yenti Apɔɔlyɔn te tuk Giriik. (Ɔci yenta neeni kon ɛkɛ te tuk Mabaan agi, “Mena Yooci Noono.”)
Ywobja ñamu ati doki, ɔci ywobja pookɛn bala bɛya ne yyɛɛwɔ men.

Ɔci malɛɛka akki ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ kuotcin ṭwoŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan pwan bɛɛn te gena ɛrki ma waak ṭwoŋka ne ŋaanɔ neeniti, ɔci gena neeni naŋi ma te dahab, ɔci bala yɔɔd Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti.

Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin malɛɛka akki makɛn ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ malɛɛka eci ṭuoŋ bieŋɛti neeni agi, “Dala i malɛɛkan ne ŋaanɔ malɛɛkan bala toolji Tol Yuprɛɛtic tola tolan byeŋkɛn a ḍɛɛggin neeni lookka!”

Ɔci ne pɛñan wyeng waakɛn lookkɛ, ɔci malɛɛkan neeni waakɛn ywaŋɛ aŋka ɛkkɛn ma noktan te cani jiña wanna, ɔci te ninka wanna, ɔci te ponka wanna, ɔci te yuonga wanna, gena oŋŋa ḍuaññɛ Jwaŋa Tolany. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ma noktan ne coŋɔn.
Ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan pwan gɔki agi, “Ackan taab te muntan a alpn coŋgin a coŋgin bala ba milyuunn a miyyan ne yyɛɛwɔ.”

Ɔci muntan waakɛn lɛɛllɛ bora ‘yati, ɔci maka taab ɛkkɛnti neeni waka dooŋki ɛkkɛn waak bala ba maañ lɛmmɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn garŋa a garŋ bala ba ḍoŋ pɛɛpkɛ. Ɔci muntan neeni wyetkɛn bala ba jyeṭo. Ɔci maaño, ɔci jiena yaayan bɛya bora te ɛkkɛn tuggɛnti.
Ɔci te waka ne ḍoogɔ neeniyɛ, ma tuun ne coŋɔn te maañ, ɔci jiena yaayan jiena bɛɛn bora te muntan tuggɛntiy.
Ɔci war tɛɛn bala muntan tuggɛntiyɛ, bala ba war tɛɛn bala ɛkkɛn wilkɛntiy. Ɛkkɛn kooyi ma te wilkɛn ba kogi, ɔci noŋi ne yaayan mati te wyetk ɛkkɛn neeni.

Ɔci maka uni te naŋka neenitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn yali te mali waka naŋi ɛkkɛn te byeŋkɛn neeni bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn mwonnin te mali jɔkin yeyin bɛɛ, ɔci walla te mali waka pɔɔyi ɛkkɛn te byeŋkɛn te dahab, ɔci te bilk, ɔci te bilka tidan, ɔci te gwoyi, ɔci te jang neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci waka neeni yaakinti gɔṭi bɛɛ, ɔci walla tieŋdi bɛɛ, ɔci walla ati bɛɛ.
Ɔci walla ɛkkɛn waakɛn yali mwonnin te nooŋi ma bɛɛ, ɔci walla te omji bɛɛ, ɔci walla te tomi bɛɛ, ɔci walla te kali waak bɛɛ.
Ɔci malɛɛka warɛ tɛyan gɛɛl yuarcan ‘ya bala bɛya te ñaalɔ pɔliji ɛŋi pɔli warɛti, ɔci jwaŋa yɔɔd ñaalɔ bala yɔɔd ɛkɛ wyeñɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ woŋgɛ bala ba oŋ waŋɛ, ɔci tɛrkɛ bala ba maaño.
Ɔci ɛkɛ balki worga ḍiɛran bieŋɛti, ɔci worga neeni a pɔggɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ ciya a byerɔn yɔɔnnɛ galŋji pieg wyetkɛnti, ɔci ciya a aam yɔɔnnɛ nona iwan.
Ɔci ɛkɛ yaadjin te pwana tolan bala ba jiɛl ne wiagi a joony. Ɔci waka ṭɛɛntan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni, ɛkkɛn bala gɔki ṭɛɛntan ne pɛñan.

Ɔci ne waka neeni balki ṭɛɛnkiyɛ, ɔci ‘ya buaga ka jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn neeni kiido, yeti ‘ya tieŋŋan pwan te ñaalɔ pɔliji, gɔki agi, “Dala jyeka guagɛ waka ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ waka ṭɛɛntan neeni kuomjati, naa kiijja jiju worgaji bɛɛ!”
Yeti malɛɛka yuarcan ‘ya yɔɔd galŋji pieg wyetkɛnti ɔci nona iwan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ byeŋa byerɔn laŋnɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji,
ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan mena tɛɛti yuonginda, mena cɔti pɔli ɔci waka bala pɔlijiy, ɔci ṭɛɛr ɔci waka bala ṭɛɛrjiy, ɔci galŋ ɔci waka bala galŋji neeni agi, “Wɔɔka gɛɛl bala moki bɛɛ!
Yeti ne wɔɔka neeni cɔɔldiyɛ, malɛɛka akki makɛn ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ kuotti ṭwoŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci jyek Juaŋ jyeka jitkɛn a coggin, jyeka mietki maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan ma neeni jitkɛn gorti bora.”

Yeti pwana tieŋŋan ‘ya te ñaalɔ pɔliji neeniyɛ, gɔkkin ‘yati moki agi, “Ɔgdi ootta worga ḍiɛran konɛ a pɔggɔn wanna lula te malɛɛka yɔɔd ciya parɛ yɔɔnnɛ galŋji pieg wyetkɛnti, ɔci ɛka parɛ yɔɔnnɛ nona iwanti neeni.”
Ɔci ‘ya ati malɛɛkati, ɔci gɔkcan ɛkɛti agi, “Dala i ‘ya ‘wonda worga ḍiɛran neeni.” Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkkin ‘yati agi, “Anti, lula ɔci ama, ɔci ɛkɛ milla mili ba cyeñ i tukuti, yeti i juugdi konuti!”
Ɔci ‘ya worga luuli ɔci ammo, ɔci ɛkɛ milla mili ‘ya tukuti bala ba cyeño, yeti ne ɛkɛ amma ‘ya dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘ya juuŋŋa konuti.
Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkkin ‘yati agi, “Dala i gɔkca jyek Juaŋ mati moki, gena maka coŋin maka kɛɛna pookɛn ɔci ma baan jitkɛn waakɛnda, ɔci keedin, magga da te tuk ɛkkɛn, ɔci maka ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ne coŋɔn.”

Ɔci malɛɛka gɛɛl te ɛkkɛnti ‘ya ‘wonna jaan bala ba kɔmñi ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkkin ‘yati agi, “Jɔŋŋa ñaalɔ on Juaŋ ona tolan neeni pɔya iki gena ɛrki ma waako. Ɔci maka bala moṭi Juaŋti orɔ ona neenitiyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn paga.
Yeti nona kaañji borayɛ, naa ɛkɛ pɔya bɛɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan Keedin Pookɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn bana tolan bana pwadan neeni moortan iñɔ yuong ne ḍoogɔ ɔci ponk ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Ɔci ma gɛɛg cuondɛ Juaŋ ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ma nɔɔttan jyek Juaŋ yuong ne ḍoogɔ ɔci ponk ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛya ɛŋi bworŋin cieki ma waakɛnti.”
Maka ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba jang jɛtuun janga ne yyɛɛwɔy, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ba dyɛkan ne yyɛɛwɔ dyɛkan bala yɔdi Jwaŋa Tolan Ciɛggɔn ṭɛɛr ñamɛtiy.
Ɔci kan menga buagɔn noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛntiyɛ, maañ bɛya bora te ɛkkɛn tuggɛnti. Ɔci maka yoyi ñin iki ɛkkɛn neeni amdɛ, ɔci kan menga buagɔn noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɛkɛ noktan ma.

Ɔci maka neeni yaakkɛn balki war tɛɛn aŋka pɔli tukɛ uultan. Ɔci te ninka mietki ɛkkɛn ma neeniyɛ, ñaal yaakinti bɛya moki bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn balki war tɛɛn aŋka pieg yaltanyɔ aga yimgo. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛn buagɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti ṭɛɛr eektan naŋka yeyin korkɛn ne coŋɔn.
Ɔci ne jyeka nɔɔtki ɛkkɛn neeni baatiyɛ, mena bartan ma a gen luom bɛya bora te kola beyanti, ɔci noŋdi iki ɛkkɛn ywobjo, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn bwandɛ, ɔci nogdɛ.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn yiɛptɛ gen luom pɔɔjɔ ban Urcaliim bana tolan neeniji nona tuuni Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛn kakantiy. Bana neeni ɛkɛ yaayɛ ba ban Caduum ɔci ban Macor.

Ɔci keedin jitkɛn ne coŋɔn, makan da te kɛɛn ɛkkɛn, ɔci makan da te tuk ɛkkɛn, ɔci makan da te ban ɛkkɛn bɛya, ɔci gɔrti waak ɛkkɛn nink ne ḍoogɔ ɔci nini ḍulnɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ menga daldɛ maka neeni joktɛ koolji bɛɛ.

Ɔci maka ciyi iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni yomgɛn pwada, te lyen maka ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔya ñɔɔn, ɔci ‘uondi yɔtin te waak te bolja bɔwan ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni maka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni taabkiti ne pɛñany.

Ɔci ne ninka ne ḍoogɔ ɔci nini ḍulnɛ neeni baakiyɛ, boŋa tɛɛtki ma bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti te Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci ɛkkɛn jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ yɔɔtcin te ciegɛn, ɔci maka bala yɔɔd gɔṭi ɛkkɛn neeni buañi, kuaŋnɛji lien ne tolan.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn tieŋjin pwan ne tolan pɔliji bala boor ɛkkɛn yaakkɛn agi, “Bɛɛdɛ wɛnni!” Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati ñaalɔ pɔliji te pɔli yuarcɛ maka yoyi ñin iki ɛkkɛn te woŋgɛn.

Ɔci te oŋŋa ṭɛɛr warɛ Jiɛññɛ ne tolan te war tɛɛn Juaŋyɛ, baan taaŋɛ gɛɛl lɛɛktin jitin. Ɔci kɛɛn bana tolan neeni ma tuun a alpn ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ (7,000). Ɔci maka pookɛn buañi, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala jieyi Jwaŋa Tolan ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni.
Ywobja akki ne yyɛɛwɔ ati doki, yeti ywobja akki ne ḍoogɔ bala bɛya ne pɛñan!

Ɔci malɛɛka akki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ kuotcin ṭwoŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci pɔɔdg bala wiak ne pɛñan te pɔliji gɔki agi, “Cyɛgja iñɔ wɛnni aŋi cyɛgji Ciɛggɔn ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci Kiṭɔ Mena Muonɛ ɛkɛ boray. Ɔci ɛkɛ aga Ciɛggɔn yuonginda, yuonginda!”
Ɔci cyekin a men baan wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (24) neeni kooyin iñɔ te kokin wyetkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ñingɛn kuomjɛ iñɔ ɔci morcin Juaŋti.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin Jwaŋa Tolanti agi, “Ɔɔn gɔktɔn iti a pwatcin, hay, Ciɛggɔn ɔɔn Jwaŋa Tolan! I a Mena bala te baaṭi ɔci acca, ɔci i balki war tɛɛn, ɔci aŋŋi Ciɛggɔn Tolan.

Kɛɛna pookɛn looñi iti, yeti acca i daŋkun loonni ɛkkɛnti. Wɔɔka bɛɛn a wɔɔka i jiek oldi maka tuun wyetkɛnti, ɔci aŋka kɛɛnk i maka a bɔwan, ɔci maka pwadin, ɔci maka buayi yenti iyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘woñga i waak ba kanŋa ɛkkɛn. Gena maka ḍyɛrin ɔci maka ḍwaŋin. Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, maka yooci ṭɛɛr wyeñɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn tuwa.”

Ɔci on Jwaŋa Tolan ona ñaalɔ pɔliji tukɛ pɔŋnɛ, ɔci canduuk jyeka ḍyɛgɛ Jwaŋa Tolan iki ma, warɛ liɛllɛ bala yɔɔd orɔ. Ɔci noon bala wildan, ɔci pɔɔdg bala wiak, ɔci noon warɛ Jiɛññɛ ne tolan, ɔci tomŋin ḍɛɛmdin.
Ɔci naŋka tɛyan warɛ liɛllɛ pɔliji. Ɛɛŋ gɛɛl bala ɛŋi oŋ waŋɛ warɛti, ɔci paan bala yɔɔd ɛkɛ ciegɛti, ɔci kɛltan a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni bala ‘yɛŋdɛ ɛkɛ wyeñɛti a tɔŋi cyɛgjo.
Ɔci ɛkɛ laaccin, ɔci ɛkɛ bala yaadan te pɛñi kaci ne ɛkɛ baali jiediy.

Ɔci gena parɛ moki warɛ liɛllɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji. Kaŋa tolan tidan ba maañ yuarcan ‘ya, ɛkɛ balki wyetkɛ ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci ṭwoŋka ne inyaakkɛn, ɔci wyetka neeni balki taaggan cyɛgji waakɛnda.
Ɔci ɛkɛ kɛltan gɛɛg ne coŋɔn te pɔliji wɔɔnɛ iñɔ te wiilɛ, ɔci yiɛmnɛ ɛkɛ iñɔ ṭɛɛrji. Ɔci kaaŋ bala yɔɔd ɛŋa ami jiedi neeni ñamɛti kɛɛy aŋka ne ɛɛŋ jieddiyɛ, ɛkɛ kaci laddɛ.
Ɔci ɛɛŋ jieni kacca ‘uan aŋka aga ciɛggɔn ma waakɛnda. Ɔci cyɛgji ɛkɛ tɛya tɛɛn ba bilo. Yeti kacca neeni ɛkɛ eññɛ Juaŋ non kaakci ɛkɛti.
Ɔci ɛɛŋ yiŋi wɔɔŋji nona ywaŋŋɛ Juaŋ te ɛkɛ aŋka ɛkɛ ciya aŋan yuong ne ḍoogɔ ɔci ponk ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ.
Ɔci ṭwaŋ bɛɛn pɔliji. Malɛɛka yenti Maykal iki malɛɛkan ɛkɛ, ɛkkɛn bala noowɔ iki kaŋa neeni ɔci jɔkin yeyin ɛkɛ.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn buannɛ Maykal, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki noon gɛɛl ñaalɔ pɔliji moki bɛɛ.

Ɔci kaŋa a daan mena bartan ma agi Jwaŋa Yaayan Cɛtan neeni yiemnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni i malɛɛkan ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ a mena maka ṭɛɛrji diennɛ ñin waakɛnda ɔci ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmdin iñɔ iki ɛkɛ waakɛnda.

Ɔci ‘ya tieŋjan pwan ne tolan te pɔliji gɔki agi, “Te oŋŋa neeni yɔɔd Jwaŋ ikin bɛɛn doki! Ɔci war tɛɛn ɛkɛ, ɔci cyɛgji ɛkɛ, ɔci war tɛɛn Kiṭɔ Mena Muonɛ ɛkɛ bora neeni bɛɛn moki! Acaan mena bala tɛki modg ikin waakɛn Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti te oŋ jiñɛ ɔci te ween jiñɛyɛ, yiɛmnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ɔntɔ te pɔliji doki.
Ɔci modg ikin ɛkɛ buanɛ te yimg Kalŋ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci te jwalla mietkɛ ɛkkɛn may. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ani waak ɛkkɛn bɛɛ, walla buayi lien bɛɛ.

A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya. Hay, maka ciyi pɔlijiy, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya! Yeti naŋka yaayan bɛya ṭɛɛrji ɔci galŋji te bolja Jwaŋa Yaayan kooni iñɔ ɛkkɛtiy. Ɔci ɛkɛ balki loñk yomɛti ne tolan, acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ ninka ɛkɛ ḍakti cɔɔllin doki.”
Ɔci ne kaaŋ gɔrni ɛkɛ ḍɛmni iñɔ ṭɛɛrjiyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ŋɔɔṭi ɔci noŋjin ne yaayan ɛŋa jieni kacca a ‘uan neenitiy.
Ɔci ɛɛŋ ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan kɔgi yan goowa tolan aŋka ɛkɛ peya wɔɔŋji non ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ciya aŋan yuong ne ḍoogɔ ɔci ponk ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ te kaaŋo.
Ɔci ne ɛɛŋ baali atiyɛ, kaaŋ pieg ŋwaŋnɛ ɛɛŋ ŋoyɛti bala ba tool aŋka ɛɛŋ eedɛ.
Yeti ṭɛɛr ɛɛŋ maŋŋɛ, ṭɛɛr tukɛ pɔŋnɛ ɔci pieg lannɛ.
Ɔci kaaŋ looñjin ɛɛŋti ne tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ ati aŋka noowɔ iki kɛɛgin ɛɛŋ kɛɛgin pookɛn maka noŋi ba jyek Juaŋ ɔci balki jwali Yaccu Kiṭɔ waakɛnday.
Ɔci kaaŋ bala yɔɔd kɔmi ḍwaŋɛti.

Ɔci ‘ya gen luom gɛɛl yuarcan bala koodi wu te galŋji, ɛkɛ wyetkɛ a dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci ṭwoŋkɛ ne inyaakkɛn. Ɔci ṭwoŋka ne inyaakkɛn neeni balki taaggan waakɛnda. Ɔci yenga yeyin kiijji ma ɛkɛ wyetkɛti. Yenga neeniyɛ, ḍori Jwaŋa Tolan.
Ɔci gen luom gena yuarcan ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba kaño, ɔci ciegɛ kɛyyɛn tɛɛna tɛɛno, ɔci ɛkɛ tukɛ bala ba jiɛlo. Ɔci gen luom ‘wonnɛ kaaŋ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ, ɔci kaakci ɛkɛ, ɔci cyɛgji ɛkɛ cyɛgja tolan.
Ɔci ɛkɛ wyeñɛ gɛɛl yuarcan ‘ya bala ba ŋaarkiti ma a ŋarti noŋi tuudi doki no, yeti kɔɔŋ tuka noŋi ɛkɛ nogdi neeniyɛ, polli. Ɔci maka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni yomgɛn poni ɔci bootcin gen luomti waakɛnda.
Ɔci ma waakɛnda morcin kaaŋti acaan ɛkɛ gen luom ‘wonnɛ cyɛgji ɛkɛ. Ma morcin gen luomti, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “A menɛ bala ba gen luomy? Ɔci a menɛ yaaktanti noogdi iki ɛkɛy?”
Ɔci gen luom ‘woñgi ma tuka gɔki ne yaayan, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋi warɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘woñgi ma war tɛɛn aŋka kandi yuong ne ḍoogɔ ɔci ponk ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ.
Ɔci ɛkɛ bala gɔki ne yaayan Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci ḍori yenti Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci non Jwaŋa Tolanti ɔci maka ñaalɔ pɔliji moki waakɛnda.

Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘woñgi ma war tɛɛn aŋka noŋdi ṭwaŋ iki Ma Juaŋo, ɔci ɛkɛ Ma Juaŋ bwandɛ. Ɔci maka kɛɛna pookɛn ɔci keedin waakɛnda, makan da te tuk ɛkkɛn, ɔci makan da te ban ɛkkɛn ɔci ma baan jitkɛn waakɛnda mugdɛ ɛkɛ bieŋɛti.
Ɔci maka ciyi ṭɛɛrji morti gen luomti waakɛnda. Oŋ yeti gena maka yeng ɛkkɛn bala jiju worga Kalŋa ŋaarɛ ma worga tɛɛtinti ne wona ṭɛɛr cɔnnɛ Juaŋ men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka morti gen luomti bɛɛ.
Mena balki jyetkɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ tieŋdi!
Kan men gɛɛl buagɔn ɛkɛ kuatayɛ, ɛkɛ kuatan ma. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl buagɔn ɛkɛ noktanyɛ, ɛkɛ noktan ma. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala Ma Kiṭɔ balti jyeni ɔci kɛɛno.
Ɔci gen luom gena akki ne yyɛɛwɔ yuarcan ‘ya bala koodi wu te ṭɛɛrji. Ɔci ɛkɛ balki ṭwoŋkɛ ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɛkkɛn bala ba ṭwoŋki kalŋo, yeti ɛkɛ gɔki ba kaaŋo.
Ɔci ɛkɛ kandi te war tɛɛn gen luom ñamuy, ɔci ɛkɛ ṭɛɛr ɔci maka ciyi ṭɛɛrji wɛnni waakɛnda iirtɛ morti gen luom ñamuti, gena mena balki kɔŋa noŋi ɛkɛ nogdɛ ɔci kɔɔŋ poli dokiy.
Ɔci gen luom gena akki ne yyɛɛwɔ noŋjin naŋka tɛyan ma ñomgɛnti. Ɔci maañ bɛɛn te ñaalɔ pɔliji, bɛɛn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji yuarcɛ ma waakɛnda.

Ɔci te naŋka neeniyɛ, maka ciyi ṭɛɛrji wɛnni diennɛ ñin ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ te naŋka tɛyan naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ gen luom ñamu ñamɛti neeni. Ɔci gen luom gɔkcin mati waakɛnda agi dala ɛkki genga pɔɔdɛ ba bolji gen luom balki bilgin byeŋgaaran beyan wyeñɛti ɔci uni dɔki wanna.
Ɔci gen luom gena akki ne yyɛɛwɔ ‘woñgi ma war tɛɛn aŋka booŋ kuuttɛ pɔɔyama neeni konɛti aŋka ɛkɛ gɔkti jiek, ɔci maka morti ɛkɛti bɛɛyɛ, nogdɛ.

Ɔci pɔɔyama neeni ma eedɛ waakɛnda, maka ḍwaŋin ɔci maka ḍyɛrin, maka cyɛgan ɔci maka bɔwan, maka kɛɛnk ɔci maka kɛɛnk bɛɛy. Maka neeni eedi ɛkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛn noŋtan ma maañ byeŋkɛnti byeŋa byerɔn, walla ñomgɛnti.
Ɔci menga yaakinti wɛrdi genga moki bɛɛ, walla menga yaakinti genga wiɛldɛŋɔ moki bɛɛ, gena mena balki cyeni yenti gen luom walla mañ ɛkɛ aŋka wɛrdi ɔci wɛɛrtiy.

Dala ñing tɛɛn bala wɛnni. Mena ñingɛ tɛyanyɛ, dala ɛkɛ nimra yenti gen luom neeni pagdɛ. Ɛkɛ a nimra yenti men baano, ɔci nimra ɛkɛ a miyyan ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci ma baan ne ḍoogɔ ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ (666).

Ɔci ‘ya ñorcan, ɔci Kalŋ yuarcan ‘ya bala yɔɔd Pom Ciyɔn wyeñɛti ban Urcaliimji iki maka coŋin a alpn a miyya ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci alpn a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (144,000). Ɔci yenti kalŋ ɔci yenti Weegɛn ɛkɛ bala kiinnɛ Juaŋ maka neeni ñomgɛnti.

Ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan pwan te ñaalɔ pɔliji bala ba pɔɔkɔ ne yiŋi wiagi a joony, ɔci bala ba ñaal ne wiagi ṭɛɛnti a ṭɛɛntin ne tolany. Ɔci pwana tieŋŋan ‘ya neeni bala ba pwan maka ciepi coŋkɔn ne ɛkkɛn ciepkiy.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ‘uali ɔɔlla woonɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti, ɔci waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ ñomgɛnti, ɔci cyekin kaniica ñomgɛnti. Ɔci menga bala yaakinti ɔɔlla neeni bɛɛ, yeti maka coŋin neeni pookɛn a alpn a miyya ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci alpn a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (144,000) aŋka urkinti ɔɔlla neeni pookɛny, ɛkkɛn a maka wannɛyɔ Juaŋ te iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniy.

Maka neeni ɛkkɛn waakɛn yaayi te naŋki maka moong bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn a maka yeyin bɛɛ, maka neeni ɛkkɛn a maka bootcin Kalŋtiy, nona ɛkɛ ooddi gɔ ɛkkɛn moki bootcin ɔɔn. Maka neeni ɛkkɛn wannɛyɔ Juaŋ te ma jitin. Ɔci ɛkkɛn a ma ɛkɛ maka lɔɔnnɛ Juaŋ boray, ɔci ɛkkɛn a ma Kalŋ moki.
Ɛkkɛn pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti doki. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki jomi jiek bɛɛ.

Ɔci malɛɛka parɛ yuarcan ‘ya bala pey yeccu ñaalɔ pɔliji eci jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jwalla baadi bɛɛ neeni aŋka ɛkɛ maka bala ciyi ṭɛɛrji wɛnni myettɛ, ma baan jitkɛn waakɛnda ɔci keedin waakɛnda, magga te ban ɛkkɛn, ɔci magga te kɛɛn ɛkkɛn, ɔci magga da te tuk ɛkkɛn.
Ɔci ɛkɛ bala yaadan te pwana tolan agi, “Buattɛ Juaŋ ɔci jieddɛ pwani ɛkɛ! Oŋ ywobji Juaŋ bɛɛn doki, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ mortɛ mena oki pɔli ɔci ṭɛɛr ɔci tool ɔci bɔɔdgti!”

Ɔci malɛɛka parɛ malɛɛka akki ne yyɛɛwɔ bootcin ɛkɛti ɔci bala yaadan gɔki agi, “Aa, cca cca cca! Ban Baabil bana tolan ḍɛmmin. Ɛkɛ ḍɛmmin te motta ɛkɛ keedin pookɛn moonnɛ te mooya noŋi ɛkɛ tomiy.”
Ɔci malɛɛka parɛ, malɛɛka akki ne ḍoogɔ boottin ɛkɛti, ɔci yaajjin te pwana tolan agi, “Mena morti gen luomti ɔci pɔɔyama ɛkɛti, ɔci balki mañ ɛkɛ ñamɛti walla bieŋɛtiyɛ,

ɛkɛ daŋkun motti mooy ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan mooya bala ḍwan ṭɔɔlɛ ywobji ɛkɛji mooya ñaagɛyɔ ma iki pieg bɛɛ neeni! Ɔci ɛkɛ beeldɛ Juaŋ te maañ ɔci jiena yaayan malɛɛkan pwadin ñomgɛnti ɔci Kalŋ ñamɛti.

Ɔci jien ɛkkɛn bala ṭuul oŋkanda, baadi bɛɛ. Maka moṭi gen luomti ɔci pɔɔyama ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki wowwin bɛɛ. Taab ɛkkɛn bala oŋkanda te ween jiñɛ ɔci te oŋ jiñɛ. Ɔci maka balki yenti gen luom ñomgɛnti walla byeŋkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki wowwin daŋkun bɛɛ.”
Wɛnniyɛ, dala Ma Kiṭɔ maka pwadin, maka tieci jyek Juaŋ waakɛn, maka jyeti Yaccu Kiṭɔtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn tiektan.

Ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan pwan te ñaalɔ pɔliji gɔki agi, “Kiejja agi, Yom ñɔɔn bala maka tuwa acca ne ɛkkɛn a maka kanŋan kanŋa Ciɛggɔny!” Ɔci Boŋ Juaŋ gɔkti agi, “Ɛɛ, aŋka ɛkkɛn waakɛn wooktan te taab ɛkkɛn ba bolja ɛkkɛn balki noŋki ne pwadan ne ɛkkɛn balki iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniy.”

Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan, ɔci pɔlla bɔwan bɛɛni. Ɔci menga bala taab pɔliti bala ba Yaccu Mena bartan ma agi, “Kaci Ma Baano.” Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛŋi taagga cyɛgji taagga naŋi ma te dahab, ɔci ɛkɛ eci ‘yɛra lɛkɛ a ñɔdg bieŋɛti.

Ɔci malɛɛka parɛ kooyin bora te on Juaŋ ona bala ñaalɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ bala yaadan ne pɛñan mena ciyi te pɔliti agi, “Jyɛm i lula ɔci ɛrca. Oŋŋa ɛrki ma waak bɛɛn doki, ɔci waka ‘yɛrtan ma iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni ‘yɛggin doki!”
Ɔci mena taab te pɔli neeni jyɛm ɛkɛ wimnɛ iñɔ ṭɛɛrji, ɔci waka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni ‘yɛrŋɛ ɛkɛ.
Ɔci malɛɛka parɛ kooyin wu te on Juaŋ ona bala ñaalɔ pɔlijiy, ɔci ɛkɛ eci jyɛma lɛkɛ a ñɔdg bieŋɛti daŋkun.

Ɔci malɛɛka parɛ kooyin wu te nona ɛrki ma waakti. Ɛkɛ a mena mwoki maañy. Ɔci ɛkɛ yaajjin ne pɛñan malɛɛka tieci jiɛmti agi, “Jyɛm i lula, ɔci luutkin cuarkɛn ŋuodda wu te balk jitin, ɛkkɛn ‘yɛggin doki!”
Ɔci malɛɛka jyɛm ɛkɛ wimnɛ ṭɛɛrji, ɔci ɛkɛ luutkin ṭɔlgɛn limmiyɔ, ɔci pwoŋnɛ nona wyeṭi Jwaŋa Tolan luutkin loñka pɛñan loñk ɛkɛ neeni.

Ɔci luutkin buuri ma jitin baan ŋoyɛti aŋan te gena wyerki ma luutkiny. Ɔci yimg bɛɛn te gena wyerki ma luutkinti kɔɔna kɔɔni, ati ñaalɔ ne jiŋgin wɛnki ma muntan tuggɛnti ɔɔn. Ɔci yimga neeni jooti ne nona loonan ba jali ati ba wɔɔkan a miyyan ne yyɛɛwɔ (200).

Ɔci ‘ya naŋka tɛyan naŋka parɛ yuarcan ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɛkɛ tol tol ɔci parɛ. Malɛɛkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ bala eci ink tuggɛn ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni, gena ink tuggɛn ne ŋoyɔ aŋka Juaŋ loñk ɛkɛ cwamdɛ matiy.

Ɔci genga yuarcan ‘ya bala ba puol ne naŋkiti ma te kajaaja iki maañy. Ɔci ‘ya maka gen luom ɔci pɔɔyama ɛkɛ ɔci mañ ɛkɛ ɔci nimra yenti ɛkɛ buanɛyɛ, yuarcan. Ɛkkɛn bala yɔdi pwol kajaaja neeni taaŋɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn tieci coŋkɔn ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ byeŋkɛnti.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ‘uali ɔɔli Muuca kɛɛngɔn Juaŋ, ɔci ɔɔli Kalŋ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Hay, Ciɛggɔn, i a Jwaŋa Yaakinti Naŋki Waak Waakɛnda, Naŋki i tol tol ɔci ɛkɛ da parɛ! Ciɛggɔn keedin waakɛnda. Pɔy i a tyɛlga ɔci awarɛ!

A menɛ buayi i bɛɛy, hay Ciɛggɔn? A menɛ noŋi ne pwadan yenti iti bɛɛy? I pwad paru. Kɛɛna pookɛn waakɛnda bɛya ɔci morti iti, acaan naŋki i naŋka pwadin waakɛn liɛli doki yuarcɛ ma te woŋgɛn waakɛnda.”
Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan on Juaŋ nona pwadan ne tolan tukɛ pɔŋnɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji.

Ɔci malɛɛkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ malɛɛkan eci ink tuggɛn ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni kooyin wu te orɔ on Juaŋo. Ɛkkɛn ɛŋi bworŋa tiil bɔwan, ɔci bworŋa neeni pwanna pwani ɔci galla gallo. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ḍɛɛgɛ te buarka naŋi ma te dahab.

Ɔci waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ neeni gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɛkɛ malɛɛkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni ‘wonnɛ ilban ṭɔlgɛn ilban naŋi ma te dahab ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ byeŋkɛnti, menga da te ɛki ɛkɛ. Ɛkkɛn kuumi te ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan mena tɛɛti yuonginda yuonginda neeni.

Ɔci on Juaŋ ñaalɔ konɛ kuumi te jien naŋka pwadan Juaŋ, ɔci te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ moki. Ɔci menga yaaktanti kaatti orɔ moki te jien bɛɛ, ne ink tuggɛn eetan malɛɛkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni baati ɔɔn.
Ɔci ‘ya tieŋjan pwan ne tolan te on Juaŋ ñaalɔ gɔkcin malɛɛkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔti agi, “Ɔgdɛ ooddɛ waka bala ḍwayi ṭɔlgɛn ywobji Juaŋji neeni pwoktɛ ṭɛɛr wyeñɛti!”
Ɔci malɛɛka ñamu ati, ɔci waka bala elba ɛkɛji pwoŋnɛ ṭɛɛr wyeñɛti. Ɔci kɔɔgga yeyin kɔɔgga noki ne pɛñan bɛɛn maka moṭi pɔɔyama gen luomti, ɔci maka balki mañ ɛkɛti daŋkun.
Ɔci malɛɛka akki ne yyɛɛwɔ waka bala ilba ɛkɛji pwoŋnɛ galŋji. Ɔci pieg waakɛn naŋɛ aŋi yimg bala ba yimg mena tuuta. Ɔci waka tɛɛti galŋji waakɛnda tuuni.
Ɔci malɛɛka akki ne ḍoogɔ waka bala ḍwayi ṭɔlgɛn ɛkɛji pwoŋnɛ bɔɔdg woŋgɛnti, ɔci pieg aŋi yimgo.
Ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan malɛɛka mwoki pieg gɔki agi, “Ywobji i neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ awarɛ. Hay Mena Pwadan, i a mena bala te baaṭi ɔci acca!
Te lyena ɛkkɛn Ma Kiṭɔ ɔci maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan nokkitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wonni i yimg aŋka maattan ɛkkɛn. A ɔɔn yɔmjin te ɛkkɛn doki. Yɔmjin.”
Ɔci pwana parɛ tieŋŋan ‘ya te nona ɛrki ma waak gɔki agi, “Ɛɛ, hay Ciɛggɔn Jwaŋa yaakinti Naŋki Waak Waakɛnday, ywobji i a tyɛlga ɔci awarɛ!”
Ɔci malɛɛka akki ne ŋaanɔ waka bala ilba ɛkɛji pwoŋnɛ oŋ waŋɛti, ɔci ma ammɛ oŋ waŋɛ ne pɛñan ba maaño.
Ɔci ma ammɛ oŋ ne tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ḍori yenti Juaŋ mena balki war tɛɛn ink tuggɛn neenitiy. Yeti ɛkkɛn waakɛn yali aŋka jieddi naŋki pwani ɛkɛ bɛɛ.
Ɔci malɛɛka akki ne dɔɔyɔ waka bala ilba ɛkɛji pwoŋnɛ kaakci gen luomti. Ɔci cyɛgji ɛkɛ aŋi mielo. Ɔci ma bala kooyi lɛpɛn te pɛñi noono.
Ɔci te waka pɛñin ɛkkɛnti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ḍori Jwaŋa Tolan Jwaŋa ñaalɔ. Yeti te kɔɔgi ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn yali te naŋki ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.
Ɔci malɛɛka akki ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ waka bala ilba ɛkɛji pwoŋnɛ tola tolan, Tol Yuprɛɛtic. Ɔci ɛkɛ piegɛ iinɛ aŋka aga pɔy ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin bonka pɔya tyɛrñantiy.
Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan jɔkin yeyin gɛɛg ne ḍoogɔ bala ba ɔɔŋan. Ɛkkɛn bala koodi bora te gen luom tukɛti, ɔci te kaaŋ tukɛti, ɔci te bɔwa jomi jiek tukɛti.

Ɛkkɛn a boŋki jɔkin ṭɔlgɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki may. Ɔci ɛkkɛn maka ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ṭɛɛrji waakɛnda ḍɔɔltanyɔ ɛkkɛn te oŋ ṭwaŋ oŋŋa tolan, oŋ Ciɛggɔn Jwaŋa yaakinti Naŋki Waak Waakɛnday.
Ɔci Yaccu gɔki agi, “Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya bɛɛd ba mena ɛɛn neeni! Yom ñɔɔn bala mena wici bɛɛti ɔci ɛkɛ bworŋin ɛkɛ ywaŋdɛyɔ aŋka naa ɛkɛ ooddi warɛ budan ɔci war ɛkɛ yuartan ma bɛɛ.”
Ɔci jɔkin yeyin neeni ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ḍɔɔltanyɔ nona bartan ma te tuk Ma Icrayiil agi Armagɛdan.
Ɔci malɛɛka akki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ waka bala ilba ɛkɛji pwoŋnɛ jwamiji ñaalɔ. Ɔci pwan bɛɛn te on Juaŋ ñaalɔ te kaakciti gɔki agi, “Bawwin!”
Ɔci pɔɔdg bala ṭɛɛntan, ɔci noon wildan ne pɛñan, ɔci warɛ ḍiedan ne tolan. Ɔci ḍiedin neeni yuarŋi menga oŋgati, ṭɛɛr wyeñɛti wɛnni wona men baan aŋŋɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ!
Ɔci bana tolan ŋuottin jitin korki ne ḍoogɔ, ɔci bonk keedin pookɛn waakɛnda ḍɛɛmdin iñɔ. Juaŋ poŋjin te ban Baabil bana tolan aŋka moottɛ ɛkɛ kubaaya mooy ywobji ɛkɛ.
Ɔci kaki wyetkɛn waakɛnda ɔci pomk waakɛnda yien doki.
Ɔci tomŋin ḍwaŋin ḍɛɛmdin ma wyetkɛnti te ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci tamñan ne cyɛɛlɔ eci gena kierki ma waak tuggɛ a miyya ne cyɛɛlɔ (100). Ɔci ma bala ḍori Juaŋ te ḍɔŋ tomŋin neeni.

Ɔci malɛɛkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ malɛɛkan balki ilban byeŋkɛnti neeni gɛɛl bɛɛn ‘yati, ɔci gɔkkin ‘yati agi, “Bɛɛd, ɔci i lɛɛrtin ‘ya jyeka bɛya ɛŋa tommi tolan ɛŋa ciyi pyega coŋin wyetkɛnti neeni wyeñɛtiy.
Ɔci ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni noŋi tomi iki ɛkɛ, ɔci maka bala ciyi ṭɛɛrji wɛnni nogɛ mooya noŋi ɛkɛ tomiy.”

Ɔci ‘ya eñña malɛɛka wɔɔŋji te Boŋ Juaŋo. Ɔci ɛɛŋ gɛɛl bala taab gen luom tidanti aŋan, gena gen luom warɛ kuumi te yenga yeyin yenga ḍori Jwaŋa Tolany. Ɛkɛ balki wyetkɛ ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci ṭwoŋkɛ ne inyaakkɛn.

Ɔci ɛŋa neeni ɛŋi bworŋa buol ɔci bworŋa tidda, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛŋi dahab, ɔci gwoyya wiɛlɛn pɛñan, ɔci luulan. Ɔci ɛkɛ eci kubaaya naŋi ma te dahab bieŋɛti, ɔci kubaaya neeni kuumi te waka yeyin ne tolan wak tomi ɛkɛy.
Ɔci kiikan neeni bala ɛkɛ ñamɛti agi, “Baabil A Mɛy Maka Noŋi Naŋka Yeyin Ne Tolan Iñɔ Šɛɛrji Wɛnniy.”
Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan ɛɛŋ nogɛ yimg maka pwadin, ɔci yimg maka tuun te yenti Yaccuy. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ yuarna ‘yayɛ, ‘ya yomu buañi ne tolan.
Ɔci malɛɛka gɔkkin agi, “I buay ogo? Ɛŋa neeni konɛ lɛɛlla ‘ya bora iki gen luom taabi ɛkɛ neeni iti, gena gen luom balkɛ wyetkɛ ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci ṭwoŋkɛ ne inyaakkɛny.

Gena neeni oŋ gɛɛlti ɛkɛ lakun tɛɛti, yeti acca ɛkɛ tɛɛti moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ noŋi koodi bora te kola beyan, ɔci ooddi bora aŋka nuotti jitin. Ɔci ne maka ciyi iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni gen luom yuartitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn buaya. Gena maka yeng ɛkkɛn baaw worga tɛɛtinti te wona ṭɛɛr cɔnnɛ Juaŋ men bɛɛy. Gen luom neeni ɛkɛ bala tɛɛti lakun, ɔci acca ɛkɛ bala bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora moki.

“Ɔci wɛnniyɛ, dala ñing tɛɛn bala ɔci wyeñ wɔŋŋo. Wyetka ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, gena pomka ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ ciyi ɛŋa neeniy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn a ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ mokiy.
Ɔci ɛkkin ne dɔɔyɔ ḍɛɛmdin, ɔci ɛka ne cyɛɛlɔ aŋka bala mwoki noon men, ɔci ɛka parɛ bala bɛya. Ɔci ɛkɛ ne bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ noon mugdɛ wɔɔka ne ḍuulan budan.

Oŋ yeti gen luom mena bala te baaṭi oŋ baaw acca dɔɔkti moki neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a ḍuaŋa tolan akki makɛn a dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ. Yeti ɛkɛ te ɛkkin ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniti, ɔci ɛkɛ ooddi tuwa.
“Ɔci ṭwoŋka yuarca i a inyaakkɛn neeniyɛ, gena ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ne inyaakkɛn, ḍuaŋan kanŋa ɛkkɛn mugɛ men bɛɛy, yeti ɛkkɛn aga ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin wɔɔka ne ḍuulan iki gen luomo.
Maka neeni ɛkkɛn jiek ñaagɛyɔ aŋka gen luom ‘wontan ɛkkɛn war tɛɛn ɛkkɛn ɔci ḍwaŋji ɛkkɛn.

Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋdi ṭwaŋ iki Kalŋo, yeti Kalŋ ɛkkɛn bwandɛ acaan Kalŋ a Ciɛggɔn ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin waakɛnda, ɔci maka bala moki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, gena maka borni ɛkɛy, ɔci maka kɛnnɛ ɛkɛ boray, ɔci maka jyeti ɛkɛtiy.”
Ɔci malɛɛka ‘ya myenna te pyega ciyi ɛŋa toban neeni agi, “Pyega neeni a maka coŋin, ɔci kɛɛna pookɛn, ɔci keedin, makan da te tuk ɛkkɛn.
Yeti ṭwoŋka yuarca i gen luomti a inyaakkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yooktan te ɛŋa toban neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ yaatan ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkɛ daltan ɛkkɛn warɛ budan. Ɔci yoŋgi ɛkɛ tontan ɛkkɛn maaño.
Ɔci acaan Juaŋ ɛkkɛn naŋŋɛ yomgɛnti aŋka paŋi ɛkkɛn ñaaktanyɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gen luom ‘wontan ḍwaŋji ɛkkɛn ne jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ neeni baati ɔɔn.
“Ɔci ɛŋa yuarca i neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a bana tolan. Ɔci ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ṭɛɛrji wɛnni bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛti waakɛnda.”
Ɔci ne naŋka neeni baaniyɛ, malɛɛka parɛ yuarcan ‘ya moki kooyin iñɔ te pɔliji. Ɛkɛ balki war tɛɛn ne tolan, ɔci ṭɛɛr dyɛŋŋɛji ne tolan te dyɛŋi ɛkɛ.
Ɔci ɛkɛ yaajjin te pwana tolan agi, “Ḍɛmmin! Ban Baabil bana tolan, ḍɛmmin! Non ɛkɛ aŋi nona cieki jɔkin ṭɔlgɛn, ɔci jɔkin yeyin i ḍiirga yeyin yookiti may.
Acaan kɛɛn waakɛnda moti mooya noŋi ɛkɛ tomiy. Ɔci ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji noŋi tomi iki ɛkɛ. Ɔci maka taajin iñɔ ṭɛɛr konɛ warda, ɛkkɛn cyɛŋi te wak ɛkɛ waka yeyin.”
Ɔci ‘ya tieŋŋan pwana parɛ moki te pɔliji gɔki agi, “Koodɛ bora te ɛkɛti hay, ma ‘ya, naa ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ i ɛkɛ te nɔji ɛkɛ bɛɛ, ɔci naa naŋka bɛya ɛkɛti yaayan neeni bɛya ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
Nɔji ɛkɛ kɔɔni dɛñjin ne ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci Juaŋ poŋjin te nɔji ɛkɛ neeni.

Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ɛkɛti bala ba naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛtiy. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘uottɛti ɛkkɛ oŋki ne yyɛɛwɔ, ba naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkkɛ oŋki ne yyɛɛwɔ, bala ba mooya loommiyɔ ɛkɛ kubaayaji neeni.

Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne yaayan ɛkɛti bala ba jiɛta jieyi ɛkɛ warɛ agi ɛkɛ pwadjɛ wanna, ɔci dala ɛkɛ yaadɛ yomɛti. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, ‘‘Ya ciy ba ɛŋa a ḍuaŋa! ‘Ya a ɛŋa cieñ bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya yom yoñ ŋeej bɛɛ!’
A ɔŋŋiyɛ, naŋka yeyin bɛya ɛkɛti te oŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Gena waja, ɔci yom yoño, ɔci koño. Ɔci ɛkɛ amdɛ maañ acaan Ciɛggɔn mena ɛkɛ wannɛ neeniyɛ, gena Jwaŋa Tolan Mena Yaakɛnti Naŋki Waak Waakɛnday.
“Ɔci ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin noŋi iki ɛkɛ tomi ɛkkɛn wiakti te ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn yiegdi ne ɛkkɛn gɔrti jien ɛkɛ ḍuuŋiy.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn buaya, ɔci yɔɔtti te nona loonan, ɔci gɔkti agi, ‘Aa, cca cca cca! Hay, i bana tolan ban Baabil! Ywobji bɛɛn iti te oŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ doki!’
“Ɔci taajin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni wiakti waakɛnda moki, acaan wak ɛkkɛn menga bala wɛɛṭi moki bɛɛ.

Wak ɛkkɛn neeni gena dahab, ɔci bil pɔddan, ɔci gwoyya pwadin, ɔci luulan, ɔci tiil bɔwan, ɔci bworŋa a buol, ɔci bworŋa tidan, ɔci janga piedgɛn milin jitkɛn waakɛnda, ɔci waka naŋi ma te liañ lɛkɛ waakɛnda, ɔci waka naŋi ma te janga wiɛlɛn pɛñan, ɔci bila noŋki ma girin tidan, ɔci bila tɛyan, ɔci gwoyya cɔtki ma oorg pwadin,

ɔci girpa ɔci janga noŋki ma kilk, ɔci waka ṭultan ma, ɔci ḍɔŋi poom, ɔci mooy, ɔci ñɔɔn, ɔci ḍuobja liŋñan, ɔci pok, ɔci dok, ɔci kulin, ɔci muntan, ɔci babin wuatan muntan, ɔci maka kɛɛnk, ɔci ma baano.
“Ɔci taajin gɔkti ɛkɛti agi, ‘Acca naŋka war i buagiti ne pɛñan neeni waakɛnda ati te iti doki. Ɔci wak i waka coŋin ɔci pwani i ḍakcin budan doki, menga ɛkkɛn yuarŋɛ moki bɛɛ!’
Ɔci maka wɛɛṭi waka neeni ɔci aŋi maka cyɛgan neeni, ɛkkɛn yɔɔtti te nona loonan. Ɛkkɛn buayi te taab bɛɛn ɛkɛti yaayan neeni. Ɛkkɛn wiakti ɔci kuuddi ne tolan.
“Ɔci gɔkti agi, ‘Aa cca, cca cca! Ɛkɛ a bana tolan, ɛkɛ bala ɛŋi bworŋa tiil, ɔci bworŋa eci bilk ne coŋɔn bworŋa buol, ɔci bworŋa tidan. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛŋi dahab, ɔci gwoyya wiɛlɛn pɛñan, ɔci luulan!
Ɔci te wɔɔka ḍuulan neeni wak ɛkɛ waka cyɛgan neeni ḍakcin!’ “Ɔci maka ‘uoti murkan ḍwaŋin, ɔci maka bala murkan jitin, ɔci maka kanŋan murkan jitin. Ɛkkɛn bala yɔɔd te nona loonan,
ɔci yaadan ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki jien maañy, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, ‘A bana ɔki pari bala ba bana tolan neeniy!’

Ɔci ɛkkɛn ṭɛrk tuokci wyetkɛnti, ɔci bala yaadan, ɔci kuuyi, ɔci wiak gɔki agi! ‘Aa cca cca cca! Hay, i bana tolan! Maka ati galŋji korkɛn kuumi te wak ɛkɛ waka pwadin. Ɔci te wɔɔka ne ḍuulan ɛkɛ yaañi doki!

Hay, ɛkkɛ maka pɔliji, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya te lɛɛktin ɛkɛ neeni! Hay, ma Juaŋ ɔci cuudan Juaŋ ɔci maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya! Juaŋ ywobji olnɛ ɛkɛ wyeñɛti te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛtiy!’ ”
Ɔci malɛɛka tolan guonan tolan ba pom jien ɔɔn luolnɛ ñaalɔ, ɔci yiɛmnɛ galŋji, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Baabil bana tolan neeni, ɛkɛ yiɛptɛ Juaŋ iñɔ ne pɛñan a ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ yuartan ma oŋgati moki bɛɛ.

Ɔci pwan maka ciepi coŋkɔn, ɔci maka ‘uali, ɔci maka kuoti luañ, ɔci maka kuoti ṭwoŋki gɛɛg tieŋtan ma iti moki bɛɛ! Ɔci maka a gɔɔñk yuartan ma iti moki bɛɛ, ɔci walla pom jien gɛɛl tieŋtan ma iti moki bɛɛ!
Ɔci dyɛka gɛɛl dɛkti moki bɛɛ, ɔci pwan mena ñooni ɔci ‘war ñooni gɛɛl tieŋtan ma moki bɛɛ, acaan taajin i ɛkkɛn a maka iñɔ wɛnni, ɔci oomk i kɛɛna pookɛn jyɛnni i ɔntɔ waakɛnda!
Yimg maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan yuarɛ ma ban Baabil i yimg ma Juaŋ, ɔci yimg maka noŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ṭɛɛr wyeñɛti waakɛnda.”
Ɔci ne naŋka neeni baaniyɛ, ‘ya tieŋŋan pwana tolan, bala ba pwan maka coŋin, gɔki te ñaalɔ pɔliji agi, “Jieddɛ Juaŋo! Yɔɔd bala Jwaŋ ikinti, ɔci war tɛɛn ɔci jied bala ɛkɛti moki!
Ywobji ɛkɛ awarɛ, ɔci a tyɛlga! Ywobji ɛkɛ olnɛ ɛŋa toban ɛŋa ṭɛɛr konɛ yaaññɛ te tomi ɛkɛ neeni wyeñɛti. Ɔci Juaŋ yimg maka moṭi ɛkɛti dɔɔnɛ bora!”
Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin moki agi, “Jieddɛ Juaŋo! Jien ɛkɛ ṭuula ne baaṭi ɔɔn, baadi bɛɛ!”
Ɔci cyekin a men baan wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (24) i waka tɛɛti ne ŋaanɔ neeni ḍɛɛmdin ñingɛn kuomjɛ iñɔ, ɔci morcin Juaŋti mena ciyi te kaakci neeniti gɔki agi, “Ɛɛ, dala bala a ɔɔn. Jieddɛ Juaŋo!”
Ɔci pwan bɛɛn te kaakciti gɔki agi, “Jieddɛ Jwaŋ ikin hay, maka kanŋan ɛkɛti waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkkɛ maka buayi ɛkɛ maka ḍwaŋin ɔci maka ḍyɛrin!”

Ɔci moki ‘ya tieŋŋan pwan bala ba pwan polla tolan, ɔci bala ba pwan pyega coŋin, ɔci bala ba pwan ñaal ne wiagi ne pɛñan gɔki agi, “Jieddɛ Jwaŋo! Ciɛggɔn ikin Jwaŋa Tolan Mena balki War Tɛɛn Waakɛnda neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn Tolan!
Ɔci dala ikin yomgɔ ñɔya, ɔci jiettin ɛkɛ! Acaan oŋ ḍɛɛn Kalŋ bɛɛn doki, ɔci ñooni ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛɛŋŋɛ doki.
Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘woñgi ma bworŋ ḍɛɛn bworŋa bɔwan aŋka ‘yɛɛŋdɛ ɛkɛ.” Bworŋa neeni, ɛkɛ a naŋki ma Juaŋ naŋka pwadin.
Ɔci malɛɛka gɔkkin ‘yati moki agi, “Kiejja agi, ‘Yom ñɔɔn bala maka bornɛ Juaŋ te oŋ ḍɛɛn Kalŋy!’ ” Ɔci malɛɛka gɔkkin ‘yati moki agi, “Gena jyek Jwaŋa Tolan jyeka awarɛ neeni.”

Ɔci ‘ya ḍwoñjan iñɔ ɛkɛ ñamɛti ka morca ɛkɛti, yeti ɛkɛ gɔkkin ‘yati agi, “A’a, naa i ḍwoñja iñɔ ‘yati bɛɛ! Ya a mena kanŋan Juaŋti ba i, ɔci ba modg ɛkkɛ maka balki jwali Yaccu Kiṭɔy. Yeti dala i ḍwoñja iñɔ gena Jwaŋa Tolanti! Acaan lali Yaccuyɛ, ɛkɛ a jyek Boŋ Juaŋ jyeka guagɛ ma te baaṭiy.”
