Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan pɔli tukɛ pɔŋnɛ, ɔci muntan bɔwan yuarcan ‘ya, ɔci mena taab ɛkɛti neeni yenti Mena Pwadan ɔci Awarɛy. Ɔci ɛkɛ woni ma awarɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋi ṭwaŋ awarɛ.

Ɛkɛ woŋgɛ bala ba maañ lɛmmɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛŋi taaggan cyɛgji wyeñɛti ne coŋɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ balki yenti kiijji ma ɛkɛti, ɔci yenta neeni menga yaakinti paŋi ɛkɛ bɛɛ, gena mena balki yenta neeni aŋka yaakinti paŋi ɛkɛ parɛy.
Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛŋi bworŋa warɛ jali te yimgo, ɔci ɛkɛ yenti “Jwali Juaŋo.”
Ɔci ackan ñaalɔ pɔliji bootcin ɛkɛti bala taab te muntan bɔwan, ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛŋi bworŋa bɔwan pwadan.
Ɔci jwali Kiṭɔ bɛɛn bora te ɛkɛ tukɛti aŋka kɛɛna pookɛn moddɛ ɛkɛ te jwali ɛkɛ neeni. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn ciddɛ te kɔmña naŋi ma te bila tɛyan. Ɔci ɛkɛ ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan oldɛ ma wyetkɛnti iñɔ wɛnni.
Ɔci ɛkɛ balki yenti kiinɛ omɛti ɔci bworŋ ɛkɛti gɔki agi, “CIƐGGƆN CYEKIN ḌWAÇIN WAAKƐNDA.”
Ɔci malɛɛka gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ yuarcan ‘ya bala yɔɔd oŋ waŋɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ yaajjin ne pɛñan te pwana tolan gɔkcin wɛjjin peyi ñaalɔ yeccu pɔliji waakɛndati agi, “Bɛɛdɛ wyetkɔ ḍɔɔldɛ oomdin Jwaŋa Tolanti!

Bɛɛdɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ omdɛ yoŋgi maka a ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin, ɔci yoŋgi maka wɛɛyi ma, ɔci yoŋgi maka ackan, ɔci yoŋgi maka taab te muntan, ɔci yoŋgi muntan, ɔci yoŋgi maka a kɛɛnk bɛɛy, ɔci yoŋgi maka a kɛɛnk, ɔci yoŋgi maka ḍyɛrin ɔci maka ḍwaŋin!”
Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan gen luom ɔci ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ aŋka noŋi noow iki mena taab te muntan, i ackan ɛkɛ.

Ɔci gen luom i bɔwa jomi jiek mena noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma aŋka maka jyeti mañ gen luomti diennɛ ñin ɛkɛ ɔci morcin pɔɔyama ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn goomiyɔ malɛɛkan, ɛkkɛn yiɛpcɛ galŋji galŋ maña koldan ɔci jiena yaayan.
Ɔci ackan ɛkkɛn noŋŋɛ jwalla bɛɛn bora te mena taab te muntan tukɛtiy, ɔci wɛjjin waakɛnda korkɛn kuumi te yoŋgi ɛkkɛn.
Ɔci ‘ya gɔrcan, ɔci malɛɛka yuarcan ‘ya kooyin te ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɛkɛ eci mɔpta ṭɔɔli kola beyan bieŋɛti i jiŋgɔn tolan.
Ɔci ɛkɛ kaaŋ muŋŋɛyɔ ɔci ḍɛɛŋŋɛ aŋka ciya a ḍɛɛggɔn yuong a alp ne cyɛɛlɔ (1,000). (Gena Jwaŋa Yaayan mena noŋi ma ñingɛn.)

Ɔci malɛɛka ɛkɛ yiɛmnɛ jiju jiidɔ kola beyanti ɔci ‘uornɛti, ɔci mornɛ kitim aŋka naa kɛɛna pookɛn jyɛttɛ ɛkɛ ɔntɔ moki bɛɛ. Ɔci naŋka neeni bala a ɔɔn ne yuong a alp ne cyɛɛlɔ (1,000) neeni baati ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ oŋ pɔktɛ Juaŋ ne ḍiɛran te wɔɔka ne ḍuulan budan.

Boŋki maka morcin gen luomti, ɔci walla morcin pɔɔyama ɛkɛti bɛɛ, ɔci walla mañ gen luom mugɛ ɛkkɛn ñomgɛnti walla byeŋkɛnti bɛɛ neeniyɛ, yuarcan ‘ya. Ɛkkɛn nogɛ ma te mitta ɛkkɛn ma myetkɛti te jwalla awarɛ jwalla lɛɛlnɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ boray. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ma myetkɛ te jwali Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkkɛn ‘uowin, ɔci cooccin kokin wyetkɛnti. Ɛkkɛn wonnɛ Juaŋ war tɛɛn aŋka ɛkkɛn ma gottan, ɛkkɛn noon mugɛ i Kiṭɔ yuong a alp ne cyɛɛlɔ (1,000).
(Maka pookɛn maka tuunyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘uowin moki bɛɛ ne yuonga a alp ne cyɛɛlɔ (1,000) neeni baaki ɔɔn.) Gena jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ ñamu neeni.

Maka balki genga jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñamuti neeniyɛ, yom ñɔɔn bala ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn pwad pwado. Ɔci lyena ne ŋoyɔ bala ɛkkɛnti moki bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn aga gaciicin Juaŋ ɔci Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn noon muktan i ɛkɛ yuong a alp ne cyɛɛlɔ (1,000).
Ɔci ne yuong a alp ne cyɛɛlɔ (1,000) neeni baatiyɛ, Jwaŋa Yaayan oŋ pɔktan ma te ciginji,

ɔci ɛkɛ koodi bora aŋka kɛɛna pookɛn maka ciyi ṭɛɛrji pɔli ŋwayyɛ waakɛnda neeni jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ ɛkɛ moki. (Gena Gɔɔg ɔci Mɛgɔg.) Ɔci Jwaŋa Yaayan ɛkkɛn limdiyɔ ṭwaŋti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn kɔɔna kɔɔni bala ba ŋɔmi galŋo.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati ṭɛɛr konɛ warda, ɔci ɛkkɛn non ma Juaŋ yudiyɔ, ɔci bana anki ɛkkɛn moki yudiyɔ. Yeti maañ bɛɛn te ñaalɔ Juaŋti ɔci ɛkkɛn ammɛ.

Ɔci Jwaŋa Yaayan mena ɛkkɛn jyɛnnɛ ɔntɔ neeni yiɛpcɛ malɛɛkan galŋ maañ ɔci jiena yaayanti. Ɔci nona neenitiyɛ, gen luom ɔci bɔwa jomi jiek bala wɛnan. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ciyi aŋan aŋka taabdi yuonginda yuonginda ne baaṭi ɔɔn.
Ɔci kaakca bɔwan tolan yuarcan ‘ya moki. Ɔci mena ciyi te kaakca neeniyɛ, yuarcan ‘ya moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ a mena waka bala ṭɛɛrji ɔci pɔliji yiŋi ɔntɔ te ɛkɛ ñamɛti, ɔci ṭɛɛr ɔci pɔli baaw yieni.

Ɔci ‘yeeñga bala galŋji kooyin bora. Ɔci lien ɔci non lien maka naŋki ɛkkɛn yeyin bala ɛkkɛn korkɛntiyɛ, kooyin bora te nona tuuki ɛkkɛny. Ɔci maka tuutan maka naŋki ɛkkɛn yeyin, maka ḍwaŋin ɔci maka ḍyɛrin, ɛkkɛn yuarcan ‘ya bala yɔɔd mena ciyi te kaakci ñamɛti. Ɔci worgan korkɛn pɔɔggɛ, ɔci worga parɛ konɛ pɔŋnɛ, gena worga tɛɛtin. Ɔci jiek olnɛ Juaŋ maka tuun maka yeyin neeni wyetkɛnti bala ba jyeka bala worga neeni konɛti, menga da ba naŋki ɛkɛ.
Ɔci lien i bana maañyɛ, ɛkkɛn yiɛmnɛ Juaŋ galŋ maaño. (Ɔci ba jyek galŋa neeniyɛ, gena lyena ma oldɛ Juaŋ maccuy. Gena lyena akki ne yyɛɛwɔy.)
Ɔci maka yengɛn baaw worga tɛɛtinjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yiɛmnɛ Juaŋ galŋji galŋ maaño.
Ɔci ‘ya pɔlla woonɛ ɔci ṭɛra woonɛ yuarcan. Acaan pɔlla ñamu ɔci ṭɛra ñamu baaw yien doki, ɔci galŋ bala moki bɛɛ.
Ɔci ‘ya Yɔhanna bana pwadan Urcaliim woonɛ yuarcan bɛɛn te pɔlla ñaalɔ Juaŋti. Ɛkɛ warɛ ywaŋŋɛ bala ba ñooni ne luoṭṭi ‘uarɛtiy.
Ɔci ‘ya tieŋjan pwan ne tolan te ñaalɔ pɔliji gɔki agi, “Gɔrtɛ on Juaŋ bala iki mako! Ɔci ɛkɛ cootti iki ma a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn aga ma ɛkɛ. Ɔci Juaŋ waanɛ aga Jwaŋ ɛkkɛn.
Ɔci Juaŋ ɛkkɛn puudɛ ñingɛnti te piego. Ɔci lien bala moki bɛɛ. Ɔci yom yoñ, ɔci yook, ɔci pɛñi ɛkkɛn gɛɛl bala moki bɛɛ. Acaan naŋka ñamu bawwin doki.”
Ɔci mena ciyi te kaakci gɔkcin agi, “Gɔṭṭi, ‘ya waak naŋdi aga waka wonkɛn waakɛnda!” Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkkin ‘yati moki agi, “Kiejja jyeka neeni a jyeka awarɛ ɔci pwadɔ.”
Ɛkɛ gɔkkin ‘yati moki agi. “Bawwin. ‘Ya a mena bala te ñamu, ɔci ‘ya a mena bala ne ŋoyɔ. ‘Ya mena ami yiɛn ‘woñga pieg budan te bwan waŋi pyega tɛɛtki may.
Mena naŋka neeni bwandɛyɛ, ‘ya agdi Jwaŋ ɛkɛ ɔci ɛkɛ aga kaci ‘ya.

Yeti maka buayi ɔci maka jyeti bɛɛ, ɔci maka yeyin, ɔci maka noki ma, ɔci maka noŋi tomi, ɔci maka oomk, ɔci maka moṭi jɔkin pɔɔtan ma a pɔɔt, ɔci maka jomi jiek waakɛndayɛ, gen ɛkkɛn waakɛnda a coodi galŋa koldan maañ ɔci jiena yaayany. (Ɛkɛ a lyena akki ne yyɛɛwɔy.)”

Malɛɛkan a dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ gɛɛl bɛɛn ‘yati moki, gena malɛɛkan tieci ilban kuumi te ink tuggɛn ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ ink tuggɛn ne ŋoyɔ byeŋkɛntiy. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkkin ‘yati agi, “Bɛɛd ɔci ‘ya i lɛɛrtin Ñoonno, gena ɛŋ Kalŋo.”
Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘ya eñña te Boŋ Juaŋ ne poma tolan beyanti, ɔci ɛkɛ ‘ya lɛɛrna bana tolan ban Urcaliim bana pwadan bɛɛn te ñaalɔ pɔliji te Jwaŋa Tolantiy.
Ɛkɛ balki pwani Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci ɛkɛ galdan bala ba guonan pwadan lirŋany.

Ɔci bana tolan neeni balki kaña tolan beyany, ɔci kañ ɛkɛ balki tuggɛ a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɔci ‘yegin tuggɛn neeni balkin malɛɛkan a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɔci yeng bala kiinnɛ Juaŋ ‘yeginti, gena yeng keedin ma Icrayiil keedin a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔy.

Taaŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ balki ‘yegin ne ḍoogɔ. ‘Yegin ne ḍoogɔ yoṭi pɔya tyɛrñanti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ne ḍoogɔ yoṭi pɔya cuayati, ɔci ɛkkɛn ne ḍoogɔ yoṭi pɔya ‘wollanti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ne ḍoogɔ yoṭi pɔya kooriyati.
Ɔci kañ baan balki gwoyi kaañ ŋwayyɛ a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci balki yeng Cuudan Kalŋ a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ.
Ɔci malɛɛka gɔwwin i ‘ya neeni balkɔn kɔmña naŋi ma te dahab bieŋɛti aŋka poṭṭi ɛkɛ bana tolan neeni i kaak tuggɛn ɔci kaañ waanɛ daŋkun.

Ɔci bana tolan neeni pɔɔyi ma a mɔɔlla, ɛkɛ lɛkɛ poorŋɛ a porto. Ɔci malɛɛka baan poorŋɛ te kɔmñi yomgɛ bɛɛn wɔɔkan a alpn a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ (12,000). Ɔci beñi baan i baan yomɛ i wara ñaalɔ yoom a yoommin.
Ɔci ɛkɛ kaañ pɔɔññɛ, ɔci bɛɛn duran a miyya ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔci ne ŋaanɔ (144). Malɛɛka bala poci te duran pocki may.
Ɔci kaañ cɔdi ma te gwoyya pwadin galdan gwoyya wiɛlɛn pɛñan yenti alyaacib. Ɔci baan da cɔdi ma te dahab pwadin ne tolan lirŋin a lirŋin bala ba kajaajay.

Ɔci kañ baan ŋwayyɛ waakɛnda naŋiyɔ ma te gwoyya pwadin. Ɛkkɛn cyɛli ma a cyɛli te gwoyya pwadin galdan gwoyya wiɛlɛn pɛñany. Ɛkkɛn menga da te cyeni ɛkɛ parɛ. Çwaya ñamu naŋi ma te alyaacib, ɔci ɛka akki yyɛɛwɔ naŋi ma te yakuut ulan, ɔci ɛka akki ḍoogɔ naŋi ma te akik bɔwan, ɔci ɛka akki ŋaanɔ naŋi ma te jamurd.

Ɔci ɛka akki dɔɔyɔ naŋi ma te akik katim, ɔci ɛka akki wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ naŋi ma te akik tidan, ɔci ɛka akki wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ naŋi ma te jabriij, ɔci ɛka akki wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ naŋi ma te jaca, ɔci ɛka akki wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ naŋi ma te yakuut garan, ɔci ɛka akki inyaakkɛn naŋi ma te yakuut ṭeyan, ɔci ɛka akki inyaakkɛn wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ naŋi ma te piruuc, ɔci ɛka akki inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ naŋi ma te jamacti.

Ɔci ‘yegin a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔtiyɛ, luulan bala a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɔci ‘yegin waakɛnda men da naŋɛ ma te luula ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci pɔy bana tolan naŋi ma te dahab pwadin lirŋin a lirŋin bala ba kajaaja pwadany.
’Ya on Juaŋ ona tolan gɛɛl yuarcan baanji bɛɛ. Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci Kalŋ ɛkkɛn bana tolan neeni kuomgɛ warda.
Bana neeni buagɔn oŋ waŋɛ ɔci paan aŋka dɛki ɛkɛti bɛɛ, gena pwani Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci pwani Kalŋ aŋka bala dɛki ɛkɛtiy.
Keedin iñɔ baanji wɛnni ati te dyɛŋi ɛkkɛn, ɔci ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ṭɛɛrji wɛnni cyɛŋi ɛkkɛn ootan ɛkɛti.
Kaak tuggɛn bana neeniyɛ, yɔɔd a pɔkin oŋkanda, ɛkkɛn uultan bɛɛ, acaan ween jiñɛ bala aŋan bɛɛ.
Keedin waakɛnda ḍɔŋ ɛkkɛn i cyɛŋi ɛkkɛnyɛ, ootan bana neeniji.

Yeti gena a giikin gɛɛl kaatti bana neeniji bɛɛ, walla mena noŋi waka etti lɔɔn walla jomi jiek gɛɛl kaatti bana neeniji bɛɛ. Gena maka yengɛn bala worga Kalŋ worga tɛɛtinji aŋka kaatti bana neeniji pookɛny.
Ɔci moki malɛɛka ‘ya lɛɛrna tol tɛɛtin lirŋin a lirŋin bala ba kajaaja. Tola neeni wɔɔdi bora te kaakci Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci Kalŋti.

Ɔci tool bala yiŋi pɔy bana tolan neeni konɛti, ɔci jana tɛɛtki ma bala yɔɔd tool ḍɔɔggɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ jied ṭɔlgɛ jitkɛn a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɛkɛ jied ṭɔlgɛ ponk waakɛnda. Ɔci keedin waakɛn pwaddi te aamk ɛkɛ.
Naŋka yaayan gɛɛl bala moki bɛɛ. Kaakci Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci Kalŋ bala bana tolan neeniti, ɔci maka moṭi ɛkɛti ḍwondi iñɔ ɛkɛti.
Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔrti woŋgi ɛkɛ, ɔci yenti ɛkɛ bala ɛkkɛn ñomgɛnti.
Ween jiñɛ baawo, ɛkkɛn buagɔn dyɛka ɔci oŋ waŋɛ moki bɛɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan Ciɛggɔn ikin ɛkɛ dɛki ɛkkɛn. Ɔci ɛkkɛn noon muktan aga ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin yuonginda yuonginda ɔɔn.

Ɔci malɛɛka gɔkkin ‘yati agi, “Jyeka neeni ɛkkɛn a jyeka awarɛ. Ɔci Ciɛggɔn Jwaŋa Tolan, mena maka a bɔwan ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Boŋ ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, malɛɛka ɛkɛ cuonnɛ aŋka maka moṭi ɛkɛti neeni myettɛ te gena bala bɛya ne pɛñan neeniy.”
Yaccu gɔki ‘yati agi, “‘Ya baal bɛɛd ne pɛñan. Yom ñɔɔn bala maka bala noŋi ba jyeka jiju worga neeni konɛtiy.”
Ɔci ‘ya Yɔhannayɛ, tieŋjan ɔci gɔrcan. Ɔci ne ‘ya tieŋna waka neeniyɛ, ‘ya ḍɛmman iñɔ malɛɛka ciegɛti ka morca ɛkɛti.
Yeti ɛkɛ gɔkkin ‘yati agi, “Naa noŋja a ɔɔn bɛɛ! ‘Ya a kɛɛngɔn Juaŋ ba i, ɔci ba modg ɛkkɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci maka noŋi ba jyeka bala worga neenijiy. Dala i morca gena Juaŋti parɛ!
Naa i jyeka bala worga neeni konɛti gɛɛl cogayɔ bɛɛ, oŋŋa bɛɛdɛ Juaŋ cɔɔllin doki.

Mena omi ma korkɛn te waakyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba naŋki ɛkɛ wanna ɔɔn. Ɔci mena noŋi ne pwadanyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba naŋki ɛkɛ wanna ɔɔn. Ɔci mena noŋi waka yeyinyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba naŋki ɛkɛ wanna ɔɔn, ɔci mena pwadanyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ciya ba pwani ɛkɛ wanna ɔɔn, ɔci mena giikin baaw yomɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ciya ba bolji ɛkɛ wanna.”

Yaccu gɔkkin ‘yati moki agi, “Tieŋŋa. ‘Ya baal bɛɛd ne cwakanti! ‘Ya bɛɛd aŋka ‘ya ma ‘woñga waak ba naŋki ɛkkɛn, menga da ba naŋki ɛkɛ, menga da ba naŋki ɛkɛ, kan ɛkɛ noŋi ne pwadan walla ne yaayany.
’Ya a mena bala te ñamu, ɔci ‘ya a mena bala ne ŋoyɔ.
“Yom ñɔɔn bala maka bala noŋi ba jyek Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛn aga maka mwoki jan tɛɛtin, ɔci aŋka ɛkkɛn kaatti bana tolanti neeni te kaañ tuggɛ.
Yeti maka bala bana tolan neeni ŋoyɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba gɔkko, ɔci oomko, ɔci nɔɔtko, ɔci maka noki mako, ɔci maka moṭi jɔkin yeyinti, ɔci maka jomi jieko, ɔci maka ani jyeka a jomgin waakɛnda.
“‘Ya Yaccu, malɛɛka ‘ya cuoññan aŋka ɛkɛ ma myettɛ te naŋka neeni kaniican jitin. ‘Ya bɛɛn te Daawudti ɔci te kɛɛgin ɛkɛti. ‘Ya a kɛɛli liin, kɛɛlla dɛkiy.”
Boŋ Juaŋ ɔci Ñooni gɔkti agi, “Bɛɛdɛ!” Mena tieŋŋinyɛ, dala ɛkɛ gɔkti agi, “Bɛɛdɛ!” Mena ami yiɛnyɛ, dala ɛkɛ bɛya. Ɔci mena buagɔnyɛ, dala ɛkɛ pyega tɛɛtki ma neeni eedɛ budan.

Ɔci ‘ya Yɔhanna gɔkka maka tyeŋi jyeka guagɛ ma jiju worga neeni konɛti neeni waakɛnda aŋka naa ɛkkɛn jwali gɛɛl jiettanti ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ, dita Juaŋ ɛkkɛn jiedditi ink tuggɛn ywobji ɛkɛ ink tuggɛn guagɛ ma worga neeni konɛti neeni dita.

Ɔci kan men gɛɛl jwali waŋɛ gɛɛl kyɛññɛyɔ ne cyɛɛlɔ te jyeka neenitiyɛ, gena da ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ te jan tɛɛtinti neeni, cyɛndɛ ñin Juaŋ te ɛkɛti daŋkun, ɔci te bana tolanti bana pwadanti neeni, ɔci waka guagɛ ma jiju worga neeni konɛtiy.
Mena te jyeka neen neeniyɛ, gɔki agi, “Ɛɛ, ‘ya baal bɛɛd ne pɛñan.” Ɛɛ, dala i bɛɛdi, hay, Ciɛggɔn Yaccu!
Dala Ciɛggɔn Yaccu yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti waakida. Amɛɛn.
